Bino Museveni yabyogeredde mu lukung’aana lw’ebyobulamu olw’ensi yonna ku Ssande olwayindiddde ku Speke Resort Munyonyo mu Kampala. Olukung’aana luno lwategekeddwa aba M8 Alliance ne Ssettendero wa Makerere era nga lwakung’aanyizza abakulembeze ab’enjawulo naddala okuva mu Afirika okusobola okuteesa ku ngeri ekirwadde kino gye kisobola okulwanyisibwa ku Ssemazinga ono. Museveni agamba nti amawanga amagagga galina okutandika okuswala kuba geeyita agalumirirwa era agajjudde obukulisitaayo wabula ku biriwo geetaaga okwenenya gaweereze amawanga amaavu ku ddagala erisobola okugema ekirwadde kino. Wabula Musveni yannyonnyodde nti wadde ekirwadde kino kitawanyiza ensi naye ate kiwadde omukisa eri amawanga ga Afirika kuba gategedde nti galina okuzuukuka era gakomye okulowooleza mu bazungu buli lwe wabaawo ekizibu. “ Kizuukusiza abafirika. Abafirika beebaka nnyo. Nze sikkirizangako kwesigama ku mulala. Emyaka 60 egiyise, kino mbadde nkirwanyisa. Ekikolwa kino eky’okubeera n’eddagala naye nebagema abantu baabwe bokka, kijja kuzuukusa Afirika. Kiswaza okulaba nga Afirika yonna yeebase ng’erinda abazungu bagitaase, ” Museveni bw’agasseeko. Museveni yeegasse ku bakulembeze abalala abavumiridde amawanga g’abazungu n’ebitongole ebinene ebiremeddwa okuyamba ku baddugavu ne baleka ekirwadde kino kibasaanyeewo. Ekitongole kya World Health Organisation nakyo kyalumbye omukago gwa Bulaaya olw’okuteeka obukwakkulizo ku kufulumya eddagala erikolebwa mu mawanga gano, ekintu ekigenda okulemezaawo ekirwadde kino kuba amawanga amaavu tegasobola kufuna ddagala lino.

headline: Minisita Mayanja Nkalubo akunze abantu okwongera okugaba omusaayi
text: Minisita avunanyizibwa ku by’obulimi ne Bulungibwansi mu Buganda, Owek Hajjati Mayanja Nkalubo akubirizza bannayuganda okwenyigira mukugaba Omusaayi era kino bakikola mu nkola eya Bulungibwansi. Okwogera bino, Minisita Nkalubo abadde ku muzikiti e Wandegeya mu Kyaddondo mu nteekateeka y’okugaba omusaayi ku Lwokutaano. “Omulimu gw’okugaba omusaayi gwa Bulungibwansi era olwa leero ekyongedde okunywera mu bwongo bwaffe kwekutambulira awamu nokufaayo ku munno. Obubenje bwokka si bwebwetaaga omusaayi naye endwadde zonna kasita zinyinyitira mu mubiri zimalamu omusaayi,” Owek. Mayanja bw’ ategeezezza. Ono asabye abantu bulijjo okukwatira awamu ku nsonga eno kuba mu nsi yonna teriiyo kkolero lya musaayi kyokka nga buli lukya waliwo agwetaaga.  Minisita Nkalubo agamba nti singa abantu banavaayo okugaba omusaayi mu bungi ekizibu ky’okugutunda nakyo kisobola okukendeera. Amyuka Supreme Mufti wa Uganda Sheikh Ibrahim Itanda nga yabadde omugabi omukulu yeebazizza Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi olw’okusitula embeera y’ebyobulamu mu ggwanga. Ono agambye nti ekikolwa eky’okugaba Omusaayi kya bwa Katonda kubanga nemu biwandiiko ebitukuvu kyawandikibwako. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako abakulembeze abenjawulo era Olunaku olwenkya abavuuzi ba takisi mu ppaaka zonna eziri mu Kampala bebajja okugaba Omusaayi.

headline: Museveni agadde amasinzizo n’amasomero lwa Coronavirus
text: Museveni ku kkono   Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni olwaleero alagidde amasinzizo n’amasomero gonna okuggalawo okwetangira ekirwadde kya Coronavirus.  Bwabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga eggulo lyaleero Museveni agambye nti amasomero gonna okuva ku nasale okutuuka ku mattendekero galina okuggalwa obutasukka saawa mukaaga ku lwokutaano.  Pulezidneti era aragidde n’ebifo ebisinzibwamu byonna okwetooloola eggwanga okuggalawo mbagirawo okumala omwezi gumu.  Museveni era agambye nti n’abafu bonna balina okuziikibwa ba nganda zaabwe bokka. Ekirwadde kya Coronavirus kizinzeeko ensi yonna nga kati kyakatta abantu abagenda mu 8000 ng’ate abalala 180,000 kyamaze dda okubayoola.

headline: Owek. Nsibirwa akuutidde Abaami b’Amasaza ku kulwanyisa obwavu mu bantu ba Kabaka
text: Omumyuka Ow’okubiri owa Katikkiro, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa akuutidde Abaami b’Amasaza mu Buganda obutakoowa kulwanyisa bwavu mu bantu ba Beene kiyambe okutumbula embeera zabwe. Obubaka buno, Owek. Waggwa abuweeredde mu nsisinkano gyabaddemu n’Abaami b’Amasaza ku Lwokuna okusobola okwekebera n’okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwago mu Bulange e Mmengo. Owek. Nsibirwa agamba nti Abaami bano bakoze bulungi okwagazisa abantu ba Kabaka enteekateeka za Buganda ez’enjawulo ezireeteddwa okubabbulula. Ono annyonnyodde nti olw’ enteekateeka nga zino obwavu mu Buganda busobodde okukendeera nga kati buli ku bitundu 8 ku buli 100 so nga ebweru wa Buganda biri wakati w’ebitundu 13, 35 ate mu mambuka buli ku bitundu 48 ku buli 100. Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa asinzidde wano nabeebaza olwamaanyi gebatadde mukutumbula enteekateka z’Obwakabaka eziyambye abantu okweggya mu bwavu. Ayanjulidde Abaami bano enteekateeka eziriwo okuyamba abantu ba Kabaka abeetaaga okubeerwa nga bali wansi ne Habitat for Humanity nga wano ennyumba 13 zezimaze okuzimbibwa. Baminisita abavunaanyizibwa ku gavumenti ez’ebitundu Owek. Christopher Bwanika ne Joseph Kawuki bategeezezza waliwo okugenda mu maaso mu masaza bwogerageranya n’emyaka egiyise. Bino webijjidde nga Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ateekateeka okugenda e Kyaggwe abakwase ekirabo ky’omwaka guno oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula amalala mu buweereza bw’ omwaka guno. Wano Abaami babanjulidde enteekateeka y’ Enkuuka ya CBS nebyo ebigenda okusibwako essira era wano Omuk. Michael Kawooya Mwebe ategezeza nti bakulwanirira nnyo Obutondebwensi.

headline: Okwegatta kwa Opozisoni kwe kwatulwisizza – Nobert Mao
text: Kyambogo Ssenkaggale w’ekibiina kya Democratic Party (DP), Nobert Mao, ategeezezza ng’ekibiina kye bwe kyaluddewo okuwaayo emikono olw’okusuubira nti oludda oluvuganya lubadde lugenda kwegatta basimbewo omuntu omu okuvuganya Pulezidenti Museveni. Patrick Oboi Amuriat nga  Bino Mao abyogeredde Kyambogo nga yaakamala okukakasibwa okuvuganya ku bwapulezidenti bw’eggwanga mu kalulu ka bonna aka 2021. Mao agambye nti ekibiina kya DP kitambulira ku mateeka era nga baalina okutuuza ttabamiruka w’ekibiina okusooka, okulonda alina okukwatira ekibiina bbendera nga babadde tebasobola kutandika kukung’aanya mikono nga Ttabamiruka tannabaawo. “Ekibiina kyaffe kikkiririza mu nfuga ey’amateeka so si kubeera na Ssemateeka kyokka kuba ne bannakyemalira babeera ne ssemateeka. Tuluubirira nfuga ey’amateeka, bwetutyo bwe tutambuza DP. Abantu abamu babadde babuuza lwaki DP eruddeyo nebatukuba ne mu katooni nga bagamba tutambula kasoobo nga nfudu,naye njagala okubagamba nti kyaddaaki enfudu etuuse.” Mao bw’annyonnyodde. Okusinziira ku tteeka erirambika okulondebwa kwa Pulezidenti, omuntu yenna eyeesimbawo alina okufuna emikono egimusemba gya balonzi 100 okuva mu disitulikiti 98 mu ggwanga lyonna. Bannakibiina kya DP emikono baagireese ku Lwamukaaga ng’akakiiko kamaze okufulumya olukalala lw’abo abagenda okukakasibwa. Mao agambye nti babadde tebayinza kuteeka ssemateeka ku bbali kusemba muntu awamu n’okutandika okunoonya emikono egisemba omuntu waabwe nga abalala bwe bakoze. Ono annyonnyodde nti balina essuubi nti oludda oluvuganya lujja kuvaayo n’omuntu omu kubanga kino kye kibadde ekirooto kya Bannayuganda okuviira ddala mu mwaka gwa 2018, era nga buli omu abadde alinze. Mao agambye nti zino ensonga ebiri ze zibaleese ekikeerezi naye n’awera nga bwe beetegese kubanga emyaka 56, DP gy’emaze gyoleka buwanguzi. Agambye nti essira agenda kuliteeka ku kyakulaba ng’eggwanga lisobola okukyusa obuyinza mu mirembe wamu ne bannansi okusonyiwagana basobole okubeera obumu.

headline: Sipiika Among atabukidde ababaka abakoze obukunzi  mu Palamenti
text: Sipiika wa Palamenti, Anita Among alabudde ababaka ba Palamenti ku bukundi bwebatandise okutondawo kyagamba nti kigenda kuleetawo enjawukana nokukozimbya emirimu. Bino Sipiika Among yabyogeredde mu kutongoza enteekateeka gyeyatuumye ‘Meet Your Speaker’ egendereddwamu okwongera enkolagana wakati w’abakozi ba Palamenti, ababaka ne Sipiika. Ensisinkano zino zigendereddwamu okwongera omutima ogukola mu bakozi basobole okwongera okuganyula bannayuganda. Okusinziira ku Sipiika Kadaga abakozi n’ababaka tebasaanye kweyingiza mu njawukana za byabufuzi nga bakola emirimu gya Palamenti. “ Mu Palamenti eno, ffenna twenkana tewali ali waggulu wa munne. Tulina kukolagana bulungi netutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwaffe, tweyawule ku kukola obukuukulu tutwale emirimu mu maaso,” Sipiika Among bw’agambye. Sipika Among asabye abakozi mu Palamenti bakole n’obumalirivu bwonna baleme kwekulembeza naye bakimanye nti Palamenti gyebakolera kyekifananyi kya Uganda yonna. Ye Kalaani wa Palamenti, Adolf Mwesige, ategeezezza nti enteekateeka eno yaleeteddwa Palamenti okusobola okwanguya emirimu. Ono asabye abakozi mu Palamenti okuwaayo obudde nga bakola okusobola okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa n’ebigendererwa bya Palamenti eno.

headline: KITALO! Bisoopu Kaggwa afudde ekirwadde kya Sennyiga Corona
text: Masaka Omusumba w’essaza lye Masaka eyawummula John Baptist Kaggwa afudde olweggulo lwa leero era nga kigambibwa nti ono ekirwadde kya sennyiga Corona kyekimuggye mu budde.  Amawulire gano gakakasiddwa omukutu gwa lutikko ye Kitovu nga bayitira ku mutimbagano gwabwe ogwa Facebook. “Kitalo Nnyo. Bishop John Baptist Kaggwa, Mukama Amuyise,” obubaka obubadde obumpimpi bwebubadde busoma. Abakungu tebawadde bisingawo ku nfa ya Bisoopu Kaggwa wadde nga amawulire agatali matongole galaga nti ono afudde kirwadde kya sennyiga Corona. Ono abadde ajjanjabwa ekirwadde kya Corona muddwaliro e Mulago Sabiiti ebbiri eziyise.Omusumba Kaggwa yawummula omwaka oguwedde era nga ono Omusumba Serverus Jjumba ye yamuddira mubigere. Gusinze Ayi Beene

headline: Minisita Ssekabembe asabye abazadde okukuliza abaana baabwe mu ddiini
text: Minisita wa Buganda avunaanyizibwa ku bavubuka, ebyemizannyo n’okwewummuza, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu asabye abazadde mu ssaza lye’ Ssese okukuliza abaana baabwe mu mpisa kibayambe okukula nga batya Katonda n’okwagala Obwakabaka okusobola okufuuka ab’omugaso. Bino Owek. Kiberu yabyogeredde Bumangi ku kigo mu mmisa gye yabadde yeetabyemu ku Ssande e Kalangala gye yabdde ku mirimu emitongole. Owek.SSekabembe agamba nti singa abazadde balemwa okukuliza abaana baabwe mu mpisa, kabeera kabaate kennyini era n’asaba abazadde okuteekateeka obulungi abaana bakomye okulowooleza mu kubakolerera kuba byonna ebibamalidde obudde byakusaanawo singa abaana baabwe tebakuzibwa bulungi. Minisita Ssekabembe yennyamidde ku bikolwa ebiriwo ensangi zino ebityoboola eddembe ly’abantu, eby’obulyake naye nga bino byonna ekizibu kivudde ku baana kulemwa kutya Katonda na kukuzibwa muwawa. Ono yannyonnyodde nti ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebyamututte kwe kulaba nga Ssese etandika ku nteekateeka y’okutereeza obukulembeze, kisobozese Buganda ne Uganda okugenda mu maaso, eggwanga likulaakulane. Emmisa eno yeetabiddwamu ssentebe w’abavubuka ba Buganda Youth Council,Omuk. Baker Ssejjengo ng’ono yasabyeabavubuka bulijjo okwettanira enteekateeka za Buganda kibayambe okwekulaakulanyan’okwegobako obwavu. Ssaabakirisitu w’ekigo kino, Kato Joachim yeebazizza Obwakabaka olw’ennambika ennungi gye buwadde abantu b’e Ssese n’ebirungi bye bafunye. Sentebe w’abavubuka b’ekigo ky’e Bumangi era nga ye mukubiriza w’olukiiko lw’essaza ly’e Ssese eyakiikiride Kweba, omukungu Livingstone Njuba yeebazizza Ssaabasajjaolw’okwagala essaza ly’e Ssese. Bw’atyo n’aweera ng’Abassese bwe bajja okunywerera ku Kabaka waabwe olwobukulu bw’essaza ly’e Ssese. Bwanamukulu w’ekigo ky’e Bumangi, Fr.Kizito Mujjuzi Kakungulu nga ye yakulembeddemu Mmisa, yasabye abantu okuba abamalirivu mu buli kye bakola n’okuyamba abo abali mu bwetavu era bakwasizeeko Buganda okuzza Buganda ku ntikko.

headline: Abakulira Akakiiko k’ebyobulamu basisinkanye Minisita Nankindu
text: Abakulira akakiiko k’ebyobulamu mu Bwakabaka basisinkanye Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku by’obulamu n’embeera z’abantu mu Buganda, Owek. Dr. Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma mu nteekateeka y’okwongera okutuusa empeereza ku bantu ba Kabaka. Bano bakubye ttooci mu bigendererwa, ebituukiddwako mu mwaka 2021/ 2022 awamu nebisuubirwa okukolebwa mu mwaja gw’ebyensimbi 2022/ 2023 mu mwaka okutumbula embeera z’abantu ba Kabaka. Okusinziira ku alipoota Minisitule y’ebyobulamu gyeyanjulidde akakiiko yalaze nti abantu ba kabaka bajjumbidde nnyo enteekateeka y’okugaba omusaayi nga mu masaza Kyaddondo, Kyaggwe,Singo,Bulemeezi,ne Busiro Yuniti z’omusaayi eziwera emitwalo 6 nokusoba zezakungaanyizibwa. Minisita Nankindu ayanjulidde akakiiko ebirala ebituukiddwako neyeebaza abantu ba Kabaka okubeera abawulize eri enteekateeka ez’enjawulo ezigendereddwamu okukyuusa embeera zaabwe omuli okwegemesa COVID-19 awamu n’okugaba omusaayi ssaako okulwanyisa Mukenenya wadde wakyaliwo okusomoozebwa. Owek. Nankindu alaze ng’omulimu omunene ku Mukenenya bweguli mu abantu abawangaalira ku bizinga nga kalangala akawuka gyekali mukwegiriisa. Akulira akakiiko kano, Owek Richard Kabanda agamba Obwakabaka bubadde busaale nnyo mu kulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Covid 19 nakawuka ka mukenyenya kyokka nga wakyaliwo omulimu munene ogw’okukola okwongera okutumbula ebyobulamu nembeera zabantu yensonga lwaki akakiiko kano wekali. Ebiva mu bukiiko buno bikolebwamu alipoota eyawamu eyanjulwa eri Olukiiko lwa Buganda olukulu olwo nerusalawo engeri y’okwanganga ebibeera bivumbuddwa.

headline: Kafeero Ssekitoleko : Okweyagaliza kwa banene mu kibiina kwe kutusudde
text: Bya Jesse Lwanga Nakifuma Abadde omubaka w’essaza lya Nakifuma mu Palamenti, Robert Kafeero Ssekitoleko, akkiriza nga bwe yawanguddwa mu kalulu wabula ng’okugwa kwe akutadde ku banene mu kibiina b’agamba nti basussizza okweyagaliza. Hon Kafeero Ssekitoleko nga ayozaayoza Fred Ssimbwa eyawangudde ekya Nakifuma  Kafeero alaze okutya nti ekibiina kye ekya National Resistance Movement NRM kiri mu buzibu singa abakikulembera tebateekawo mpuliziganya n’omuntu wa wansi asembayo ku kyalo. Ssekitoleko alumirizza nti ebintu ebirina okuyamba abantu ebiva waggulu mu kibiina bikoma mu banene era ng’eno y’ensonga lwaki abantu babasuddeyo ng’akabonero akooleka obusungu abantu bwe babalinako. Ono asuubizza nga bwe bagenda okuddayo batuule n’abakulu mu kibiina basobole okugonjoola ekizibu kino era n’asaba abantu b’e Nakifuma okwegatta bave mu ntalo z’ebyobufuzi. Kafeero agambye nti tagenda kuwanika era nga 2026 agenda kudda yeddize ekifo kye kuba akyali muto mu myaka. Wabula ye Ssaabakunzi wa NRM mu ttundutundu lya Mukono omuli; Kayunga, Buikwe, Buvuma ne Mukono, Patric Mubiru akukkulumidde abalonzi olwokuva mu NRM ne balonda NUP ky’agamba nti kigenda kuzza ekitundu kino emabega. Mubiru annyonnyodde nti emu ku nsonga lwaki Pulezidenti Museveni naye yawanguddwa mu kitundu kino lwakuba akalulu kanoonyezebwa mu ngeri ya ssaayansi ssaako n’abavubuka abaalonda mu bungi mu kitundu kino. Wadde ekibiina kya NRM kyakoze bubi mu kitundu kino, naye bannakibiina bayisizza ebivvulu oluvannyuma lw’omuntu waabwe okuwangula Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi ku bwapulezidenti. Kinajjukirwa nti, ababaka bonna abaabadde ne kkaadi ya NRM mu kitundu kino, kumpi bonna baasuuliddwa nga ku bano kuliko; Johnson Muyanja Ssenyonga yawanguddwa Fred Kayondo owa DP, Hon. Ronald Kibuule yawanguddwa Munnamateeka Abdullah Kiwanuka, Hon Robert Kafeero Ssekitoleko yawaguddwa Fred Ssimbwa, Abbasi Ssozi yawaguddwa Hon Bakireke Betty Nambooze abaddeyo, ate ow’abakyala Margaret Nakavubu n’awangulwa Hanifah Nabukeera nga bonna ba kibiina kya NUP.

headline: Pulezidenti Museveni akunze Abawarabu mu UAE okusiga ssente e Uganda
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni asabye abagagga abali mu United Arab Emirates (UAE)okusiga ensimbi e Uganda bongere okufunamu kuba ebintu bingi byebasobola okutandikayo. Okusaba kuno Museveni akukoledde Abu Dhabi mu UAE mu lukung’aana olwategekeddwa okusikiriza abagagga baayo okuleeta kuno ensimbi. “Uganda ne Africa biringa birombe bya zzaabu, mmwe abakola bizineensi mulina okwekwata omukisa guno,” Pulezidenti Museveni bwatyo bwe yagambye. Abeeno Museveni yabannyonyodde nti wadde Uganda ekulira ku bitundu 6 ku buli 100 buli mwaka naye ebyenfuna byaayo bisobolera ddala okukula amangu nga n’ ebintu ebisobola okusigibwamu ensimbi webiri biwera. Museveni ategeezezza nti waliwo ebintu bingi byebasobola okugattako omutindo, okusiga mu Tekinologiya ne Saayansi awamu n’okubaako ebivumbulwa. Ono bamusigansimbi abasabye okwekwata akatale ka Uganda ak’ abantu obukadde 43 awamu naka East Africa abasobola okugula ebintu byonna byebabeera basazeewo okutandika okukola mu Uganda. Pulezidenti Museveni era yasisinkanye abagagga abaagala okuleeta ssente e Uganda era nabakakasa nti gavumenti ejja kubawa byonna byebeetaaga okukola basobole okufuna amagoba. Ambasada wa Uganda e UAE, Zaake Kibedi yeebazizza Pulezidenti Museveni olw’ enteekateeka eno kuba okuva Uganda bweyatandika okukolagana obutereevu ne UAE ssente abaliyo zebasindika e Uganda zabuuka okuva ku bukadde bwa ddoola 50 nezidda ku kawumbi kamu n’ekitundu. Ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwamu minisita w’ebyensimbi, Matia Kasaija, Ow’ amasanyalaze , Ruth Nankabirwa, ow’ebyobulimi, Frank Tumwebaze, Ow’ensonga z’ebweru Okello Oryem n’ow’okusiga ensimbi, Evelyn Anite.

headline: Obuganda bufiiriddwa munnaddiini abadde omutabaganya – Kabaka
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II aweerezza obubaka eri Ekelesia olw’okufiirwa Ssaabasumba Yonah Lwangaeyafiira mu ggwanga lya Buyonaani (Greece) gye buvuddeko gyeyali atwaliddwa okujjanjaba oluvannyuma lw’okutawaanyizibwa ekirwadde kya Kkookolo. Omutanda obubaka buno abutisse Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga abadde yeetabye mu kuziika Ssaabasumba Lwanga ku Eklesia y’Omutukuvu Nicholas e Namung’oona mu ssaza y’e Kyaddondo. “Obuganda ne Uganda bufiiriddwa munnaddiini abadde omutabaganya w’abannaddiini era ng’assa ekitiibwa mu nzikiriza zonna. Mu buweereza bwe abadde mwetowaze, muvumu era nga mwetegefu ekiseera kyonna okulung’amya n’okuwabula ensonga eziruma oba okunyigiriza abantu ba Katonda.” Obumu ku bubaka bwe busomye. Omutanda ategeezezza nti Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde amwebuuzaako era n’asaasira ab’enzikiriza eno kuba ono abadde abakulembedde okumala emyaka 24 miramba.

headline: AKAMYUFU KA NRM: Mukomye okunyingiza muntalo zammwe ez’obululu – Museveni
text: Ssembabule Ssentebe w’ekibiina ki NRM era Pulezidenti w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, alabudde abeesimbyewo mukitundu kye Ssembabule okukomya okuyingizza erinnya lye by’obufuzi naddala nga ab’enganda ze beesimbyewo.  Bino Museveni yabyogeredde Ssembabule ku Lwokuna bweyabadde asisinkanye enjuyi eziri mu kamyufu ke Mawogola North ne Mawogola West akayongezebwayo olw’efujjo n’okulwanagana. Museveni abakulembeze bano yabategeezezza nti kikyamu okuyingiza erinnya lye mu nsonga zino olw’okuba zirimu ab’enganda ze ate nga ye nga omuntu takiziriimu. “Temuyingiza linnya lyange Yoweri Kaguta Museveni mu byabufuzi birimu banganda zange. Nze munnakibiina yenna agoberera ssemateeka wa NRM era nga akola ekintu ekituufu naye abeera muganda wange,” Pulezidenti Museveni bweyategeezezza. Museveni yanyonyodde nti ab’enganda ze abali mu kalulu kano bakagendamu ku lwabwe nga n’olwekyo kibeera kikyamu okuyingizaamu erinnya lye. Embiranye eri e Mawogola North eri wakati wa muganda wa Museveni, Godfrey Aine Kaguta Sodo ne muwala wa Sam Kuteesa Shartis Kutesa Musherure era akalulu ka bano kayongebwayo oluvanyuma lw’ enjuyi zombi okulwanagana n’abamu nebalumizibwa. Ono yakkiriza nga bwewaliwo ekizibu mu kibiina eky ’abantu abalina ebifo ebyamanyi mu gavumenti n’ekibiina byebakozesa okuwagira ab’enganda zabwe okuyitawo mu by’obufuzi. Museveni yategeezezza nti ensonga eno bwagenda okugitwala mu kakiiko akafuzi aka NRM akamanyiddwa nga CEC basobole okugisalira amagezi kubanga eyawula bannakibiina. Ono yasabye bannakibiina okuddayo ku miramwa gy’ekibiina kwe kyazimbirwa ez’okuweereza abantu so ssi kufuniramu nsimbi. “ Ensonga enkulu lwaki abantu balwana okugenda mu Palamenti lwakuba ababaka beeyongeza omusaala. Bafuna ssente nyingi okusinga bannasayansi n’abantu abakulu mu ggwnga.  Nagezaako okubalabula ku kino naye tebawuliriza. Kati abantu basuddewo emirimu gyabwe bagende mu Palamenti basobole okufuna ssente enyingi. Abantu mu Palamenti balina kugendayo kuweereza bantu so ssi kugaggawala,” Museveni bweyanyonyodde. Museveni akizzeemu nga bwagenda okulaba nga omuntu yenna eyakola efujjo awamu n’okubba obululu mu kamyufu ka NRM abonerezebwa.

headline: Bannamawulire e Masaka bafunye ez’emyooga
text: Masaka -Buddu Bannamawulire b’e Masaka abeegattira mu Nyendo -Mukungwe Journalist SACCO eggulo baafunye enkata ya bukadde bwa siringi 30 zebagenda okukozesa  okwekulaakulanya. Bano be bamu ku bateekebwa mu nteekateeka eno ey’ Emyooga okuyamba  abantu okweggya mu bwavu nga bayita mu kwewola awamu n’okutereka ensimbi. Mu nkola eno abantu batereka ssente olwo gavumenti nebongerako basobole okwewola ssente eziwerera ddala okubaako byebatandikawo. SACCO eno ezingiramu ebibiina 5  nga buli kibiina kirimu abantu 15 era nga babadde baatandika okutereka emyezi ebiri emabega nga kino kyekimu ku bukwakkulizo obwetaagisa okufuna  ssente zino. Akulira Microfinance Support Centre mu Masaka, Wilfred Katonbe yabakuutidde okuzikwata obulungi era n’asaba abatanatuukiriza bukwakkulizo bakikole kuba ziwolebwa ku magoba amatono ddala. Omwaka amagoba ga 8% ate omwezi ga 0.7%. Abakulembeze ba  SACCO eno okuli; Kutamba Wilson ne Aliga Yisa baasabye bannabwe obutakozesa sente zino bubi nga bwezijja okugasa abalala.  Bano balaze obuzibu bwebayiseemu okufuna sente zino okuli okukubiriza abantu okutereka wamu n’okujjuza empapula ennyingi ekintu ekibadde kyetaagisa obudde n’okwewaayo.

headline: Mukole eby’obufuzi eby’ekisajja Kikulu – Minisita Kawuki
text: Minisita wa gavumenti ez’ebitundu mu Bwakabaka bwa Buganda Oweek. Joseph Kawuki asabye bannabyabufuzi okukola eby’obufuzi ebijjudde obugunjufu n’obuntu bulamu. Omulabirizi Ssebaggala nga mukusabira omugenzi “Nandisabye abalonzi nti omuntu akozesa okuyomba, alimirira munne, agulirira ssi ye mukulembeze omutuufu asaanye okuwa akalulu, “ Minisita Kawuki bweyategeezezza. Bino Kawuki yabyogeredde mukuziika eyaliko omumyuka w’omwami w’Essaza Bugerere Owek. Asaph Ssenyonga eyazikiddwa ku Lwomukaaga e Kayunga Bugerere. Kawuki yagambye nti wadde abantu abamu basabye Obwakabaka okubaako be buwandako eddusu naye nga Buganda bagala abeesimbyewo bewandeko eddusu nga balaga webayimiridde ku nsonga Buganda Ssemasonga etaano. “Omuntu abalage n’engeri gyanalwaniriramu ensonga za Buganda so ssi kwogera bwogezi nti njakulwanirira okwegatta kw’ abantu, tukimanyi nti Bugerere yeemu ku masaza agasingamu amawanga amangi wano mu Buganda naye onabagatta otya?” Owek. Kawuki bweyalambuludde. Ono yasabye abantu okulonda oyo yenna alaga emisana ttuku nti awagira ensonga za Buganda okuli; Okulwanirira enfuga ya Federo, okukuuma n’okutaasa Nnamulondo, okukuuma ettaka n’ensalo za Buganda, okukola ennyo okwekulaakulanya n’okugatta abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka. Minisita Kawuki bweyabadde ayogera ku mugenzi yanyonyodde nga Ssenyonga bwabadde omusajja omuvumu eyalwanirira ennyo ekitiibwa kya Buganda, mukaseera weyaberera nga yakuuma essaza lino wakati mu kusomoozebwa nasaba abantu okumuyigirako. Okusaba n’okwebaza olw’obulamu bw’omugenzi kwakulembeddwamu Omulabirizi w’e Mukono William Ssebaggala, eyasiimye Nnamwandu olw’okunywerera ku Ssenyonga mu mbeera yonna. Omugenzi Asaph Ssenyonga Omulabirizi Ssebaggala yayogedde ku mugenzi nga abadde omusajja buli muntu gwe yegomba wamu n’okukuza abaana be mu ngeri ennungi. Okuziika kuno kwetabiddwamu ebikonge okuva mu Bwakabaka bwa Buganda ne gavumenti eyawakati.

headline: Poliisi : Bobi Wine tumutwala Magere
text: Kampala Poliisi evuddeyo n’esaba abantu ab’enjawulo obutagendera ku mawulire gatambuzibwa ku mutimbagano agalaga nga eyeesimbyewo ku kkaadi ya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine bwakwatiddwa e Kalangala gy’abadde anoonya akalulu. Ennyonyi egambibwa okuggya Kyagulanyi ku kizinga okumuzza e Kampala “Twagala okutangaaza nti eyeesimbyewo ono agaaniddwa kwongera kukuba nkung’aana olw’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ekyeyongedde awamu n’okujeemera ebiragiro by’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda wamu ne Minisitule y’ebyobulamu. Ono azziddwayo e Kampala mu maka ge e Magere,” ekiwandiiko kya poliisi bwe kitegeezezza. Kino kiddiridde abantu ab’enjawulo okutandika okwekalakaasa okuggala enguudo n’okwekalakaasa nga bawakanya eky’okumukwata. Ku makya ga leero waliwo ennyonyi y’amagye eyasindikiddwa e Kalangala, nga Bobi Wine agendayo era ng’eno y’egambibwa okweyambisibwa okumuggya ku kizinga kino. Poliisi era ekakasizza nga bwe waliwo abamu ku ba ttiimu ya Kyagulanyi abakwatiddwa olw’okulabikira ku butambi bwa Kkamera nga baggya omupiira mu mmotoka za poliisi, okukuma mu bantu omuliro n’okulemesa abapoliisi okukola emirimu gyabwe. Okusinziira ku ntegeka z’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda, olwaleero Kyagulanyi abadde alina kubeera Kalangala era ku makya e Kidyeri ekyatutte emmotoka za Kyagulanyi era ze zaatutte n’ebimmotoka bya ttiyaggaasi. Bannamawulire ababadde bakwata amawulire nabo poliisi tebatalizza wadde ng’oluvannyuma bano bayimbuddwa. Ab’ebyokwerinda okuli; poliisi ekkakkanya obujagalalo wamu ne bannamagye be bayunguddwa okuyambako poliisi y’omu kitundu kino okukkakkanya embeera ebadde etandise okwonooneka. Mu kulonda okuwedde mu 2016, Pulezidenti Museveni yawangula ekitundu kya Kalangala n’ebitundu 53 ku buli 100 ate nga munne bwe baali ku mbiranye Dr. Kizza Besigye, yafuna ebitundu 42 ku buli 100.

headline: Poliisi ezinzeeko ekitebe kya FDC nga Amuriat agenda okwewandiisa
text: Kampala Poliisi n’eggye ekuumabyalo erya LDU bakedde kuzingako kitebe kya kibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change e Najjanankumbi ku Ntebe Road, wakati ng’akikwatidde bbendera, Patrick Oboi Amuriat ategeka okugenda okwewandiisa.  Bano tebamala gakkiriza muntu yenna kuyingira mu kitebe kino era ng’abamu ku bannakibiina ababadde bakedde ku woofiisi zaabwe balabiddwako nga bawanyisiganya ebisongovu ne poliisi. Tekinnamanyika lwaki poliisi esazeeko ekitebe kino era nga tennafulumyawo kiwandiiko kyonna kinnyonnyola nsonga eno wadde ng’ababisomera mu bbaasa bagamba nti bano bagezaako kuziyiza bannakibiina kukung’aanira ku kitebe kino, okuwerekera omuntu waabwe nga agenda okwewandiisa. Kino kiddiridde akwatidde FDC bbendera, Amuriat okutegeeza nga bw’agenda okukulemberamu abawagizi b’ekibiina bonna okugenda e Kyambogo okuwandiisibwa mu ttuntu lya leero. Eggulo omwogezi w’ekibiina kya FDC, Ibrahim Semujju Nganda, yakalambidde n’ategeeza bannamawulire nti sibaakugondera biragiro bya kakiiko ka byakulonda, n’annyonnyola nti ekitono bagenda kugenda n’abantu 20 so si 10 ng’akakiiko bwe kaalagidde. Ebisingawo tubireeta.

headline: Obwakabaka busse omukago n’Obulabirizi bw’e Namirembe ku Mmwanyi Terimba
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda busse omukago n’Obulabirizi bw’e Namirembe okutumbula okulima ekirime ky’emmwanyi era kiyambeko okuggya abantu ba Kabaka mu bwavu. Owek. Kakomo, Omulabirizi Luwalira nga balambuzibwa awagenda okusimbibwa emmwanyi Omukago guno guzingiramu Obusumba bwonna obuli wansi w’Obulabirizi bw’e Namirembe era nga ku lw’Ekkanisa, Bisoopu Wilberforce Kityo Luwalira ye yabaddewo ate Obwakabaka ne bukiikirira Minisita omubeezi ow’ebyobulimi, Hajji Amis Kakomo, Ssenkulu wa BUCADEF Omuk. Robert Musenze n’abalala. Bano baalambudde emirimu egy’enjawulo egikolebwa e Namayumba ne Masuliita mu Busabadikoni bw’e Kazo mu Bulabirizi bw’e Namirembe, okulaba bwe batandika enteekateeka eno. Omulabirizi w’e Namirembe, Bisoopu Kityo Luwalira, yategeezezza nti omukago guno gwakubayamba okufuna amagezi n’okulung’amizibwa ku ngeri gye basobola okukozesa ettaka lyabwe nga balima emmwanyi. Minisita omubeezi ow’ebyobulimi, Hajji Amisi Kakoma, yagamba nti ng’Obwakabaka balina essuubi nti ekirime ky’emmwanyi kyakweyongera okuyitimuka era mu kiseera kye baakatuukako mu nteekateeka ya Mmwanyi Terimba, kizzaamu amaanyi. Owek. Kakomo yategeezezza nti Obwakabaka bwetegefu okuwa abantu ba Kabaka amagezi agakwata ku by’obulimi ng’Omutanda bwe yalagira basobole okwekulaakulanya. Omulabirizi Kityo yasabye bannayuganda n’abakulembeze ku mitendera egyenjawulo okukomya okulera engalo kubanga n’ebitabo ebitukuvu bikivumirira. Bo abasumba b’Obusumba okubadde ow’e Namayumba, Rev Stephen Lumu now’e Masuliita, George Willson Nkonge, beeyamye okufuuka ekyokulabirako eri be bakulembera naddala ku nsonga y’ekirime ky’emmwanyi.

headline: Gavumenti ya Ssaabasajja eggaddwawo lwa COVID-19
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda Oweek. Charles Peter Mayiga alangiridde nti gavumenti ya Ssaabasajja Kabaka eggaddewo woofiisi zaayo olw’okwetangira ekirwadde kya senyiga omukambwe owa COVID-19. Oweek. Mayiga agambye nti okuva olwaleero paka nga Apuli 14 oba okusinziira ku biragiro bya gavumenti byenaaba ewadde naddala ku bikwata ku ntambula y’olukale, abakozi bonna baakusigala ewaka. “Nga April 14 tujja kuzza ekitundu ky’abakozi abalina obuvunanyizibwa obutalekeka. Abakozi abalala bajja kumalako ennaku 32 pulezidenti zeyalangirira eziwera embaga, ennyimbe, okugenda mu masizizo,” Mayiga bwagambye. Agasseeko nti singa gavumenti ennaku 32 ziggwako nezongezaayo, abakozi bajja kusigalayo okutuusa ekiragiro ekyo bwekinnagwayo. “Nga Apuli 14 ba minisita bajja kusigalayo n’abakozi abatonotono. Ebitongole byaffe byonna twabigambye bikole okuteteenkanya okusobola okuvvunuka akatyabaga kano,” Mayiga bwagambye. Obwakabaka bulina ebitongole 17 okugeza CBS leediyo, BBS Terefayina, Buganda Land Board, Muteesa I Royal University n’ebirala. Katikkiro era ayongeddeko n’abakozi n’abagumya nti embeera eno bwenaggwo, bonna bajja kuzzibwa ku mirimu gyabwe.

headline: Ab’e Kyabakadde Ssaabasumba Lwanga bamusiibulidde mu miranga
text: Kyabakadde – Kyaggwe Emiranga, ebiwoobe n’okwazirana bibuutikidde Ekeleziya ya St. Charles Lwanga e Kyabakadde ng’omulambo gwa Ssaabasumba Dr Cyprian Kizito Lwanga gutuusibwa, abatuuze n’abakkiriza basobole okumusiibula. E Kyabakadde wabadde wategekeddwayo ekitambiro ky’emmisa  okuwa abatuuze n’abakkiriza mu kitundu ekyo omukisa okukuba eriiso evannyuma ku mwagalwa waabwe.  Omulambo gwa Ssaabasumba Lwanga gutwaliddwa mu Namunkanga y’amagye okuva ku kisaawe ky’eggwanga e Kololo gye gwasoose okukungubagirwa n’okumukubira emizinga. Eno gwayaniriziddwa Omusumba w’e Lugazi, Christopher Kakooza ne munne gwe. yaddira mu bigere, Omusumba Matiya Ssekamanya wamu n’eyaliko omumyuka wa Pulezidenti wa Uganda, Dr. Specioza Wandera Kazibwe naye omwana enzaalwa ey’e Kyabakadde. Ekitambiro kya mmisa kikulembeddwamu Omusumba Christopher Kakooza era omuwandiisi w’Abeepisikoopi Ssaabasumba b’abadde akulembera nga ssentebe era n’alaga obwennyamivu olwa ssentebe okubafaako. “Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde ddoboozi ly’abo abalina eddoboozi ettono oba abatalina.” Omusumba Kakooza bw’akkaatirizza. Omusumba Kakooza agambye nti omugenzi abadde munnabyankulaakulana atasangika n’anokolayo ebimu ku by’akoze ng’okutumbula essaza lya Kasana-Luweero gye yaweereza ng’Omusumba waalyo eyasookera ddala, okuyooyoota Lutikko wamu n’ekiggwa ky’abajulizi e Namugongo. Omugenzi yazaalibwa ku kyalo Kyabakadde  nga January 19, 1953. W’afiiridde ng’atumbudde ebyenkulaakulana ku kyalo kino omuli n’okubazimbira essomero St. Cyprian Kizito Secondary School -Kyabakadde. Ssaabasumba Lwanga yatandikawo ekigo ky’e Kyabakadde n’akizimbako ne Ekeleziya era nga muno mwe bamutambiridde emmisa n’okumusiibula. Okusinziira batuuze, Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde atera okugenda Ku kyalo kino n’ayimbirayo emmisa naddala ku nnaku enkulu, ekintu ekibadde kikakasa abantu nti ekyalo Kyabakadde kimusula ku lufuba. Okusaba kwetabiddwamu abasomesa n’abayizi okuva ku ssomero ly’omugenzi, abakungu okuva mu gavumenti eyaawakati n’abakungu ba Ssaabasajja abakulembeddwamu Omutaka Gabunga okulira ekika ky’Emmamba, Omugenzi Dr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga mw’abadde azaalibwa.

headline: Lwaki omusango gwa Kyagulanyi, abakulu gwabafuukira kagumba weegoge
text: Lukyamuzi Joseph Nga 14 omwezi ogwa Gatonnya mu 2021, bannayuganda beeyiwa mu bungi ku bifo ebironderwamu okulonda abakulembeze baabwe ku mutendera ogwa Pulezidenti awamu n’ababaka ba Palamenti abanaabakulembera okuva mu 2021 okutuuka mu 2026 okusinziira ku Ssemateeka nga bw’ali olwaleero.  Akalulu kaagenda okumala okubalibwa ng’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kalangiridde Yoweri Kaguta Museveni ng’eyawangula ekyobukulembeze bw’eggwanga.  Ate ku bwammemba bwa Palamenti ebyavaayo ebitongole biraga nti ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza ekya NRM kyafuna ebifo 336, NUP n’efuna ebifo 61, FDC n’efuna ebifo 36, DP ebifo 9, UPC ebifo 9, Justice Forum ekifo 1 awamu ne PPP ekifo 1. Wabula olwokuba amawanga gano agaffe tukkiririza nnyo mu ndowooza eya Joseph Stalin eyagamba nti abalonda akalulu si be basalawo ebivaamu, wabula abakabala, kumpi buli kalulu naddala ku mutendera ogw’omukulembeze w’eggwanga mubeeramu vvulugu mungi. Ensonga era zitera kuggweera mu kkooti Ensukkulumu era ne ku luno tewaliiwo njawulo. Eyalangirirwa ng’eyakwata ekyokubiri, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, yalagira balooya be okuwaaba mu kkooti Ensukkulumu kyokka omusango ku luno tegwawulirwa kubanga mu kaseera katono nnyo ate yalagira balooya be omusango okugugyamu enta olwa kye yagamba nti abalamuzi abaali bagutuddemu baalina kyekubiira atalabibwangako. Kinajjukirwa nti Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu bwe yali agenda okuwaaba omusango guno yategeeza abawagizi be nti baali bagenda mu kkooti Ensukkulumu nga tebasuubirayo kya njawulo ku nsala endala z’eze ekola mu misango nga gino. Era yakozesa ekigambo nti tugenzeeyo ‘kubalabisa.’ Singa ekitongole ekiramuzi ebigambo bya Kyagulanyi kyali kibitutte nga bikulu, osanga kyandyegenderezza nnyo engeri gye kyandikuttemu omusango ogwo era ne kyewala ‘okwerabisa’ Kyagulanyi kwe yali ayogeddeko.  Omuntu akyayinza okugamba nti eno baali mu mateeka si mu byabufuzi naye omusango ogwo eri omuntu yenna alimu ensa, abeera asobola okukitegeera nti okusinga gusalibwa gusinziira ku byabufuzi so si mateeka.  Saagala kudda mu bya Kyagulanyi kusaba abalamuzi abamu okwesonyiwa omusango olwa kakwate ke balina n’abawawaabirwa oba Ssaabalamuzi okudda mu kuyomba n’omuwaabi ate nga yali asuubirwa kubeera mukkakkamu mu mbeera yonna. Olwaleero njagala tutunulire nnyo oba kyali kisaanidde Kyagulanyi okuggya omusango mu kkooti nga tegunnawaulirwa era ani yafunamu era ani yafiirwa. Robert Kyagulanyi ng’omuntu yafunamu ate era n’afiirwa. Yafunamu mu ngeri y’ebyobufuzi okukkirizisa abawagizi be n’abantu abalala abatekenneenya nnyo nsonga nti ddala kkooti za Ssemateeka nfu bwe fuffululu eziteetaaga kwesigibwa wadde n’olunaku n’olumu. Ssaabalamuzi Owiny Dollo musajja wattu ye enkovu gye yafuna mu buweereza bwe mu kisaawe ky’amateeka terimuvaako era alikkirira nayo mu ntaana. Wabula Kyagulanyi era yafiirwa kuba yeesubya okuyingira ebyafaayo mu nsibuko y’okukyusa amateeka agafuga ebyokulonda. Buli musango ogugenda mu kooti Ensukkulumu guyamba bannamateeka okwetegereza ensonga ezaalimu obumulumulu mu butongole era gisinziirwako oba girisinziirwako mu maaso gye tulaga okubaga amateeka agalitereeza ensonga zino okuba okuteekawo obuwayiro obukugira ebyaliwo okuddibwamu. Kino Kyagulanyi ayinza okukitwala ng’ekyokuzannya naye bwe buba bugolo alibwasimula mu 2026 oluusi ng’ebintu bye bimu bizzeemu okumukolebwako ate nga byali bisobola okulagirwa ku mulundi omulala bireme kuddibwamu. Bannayuganda n’abajagaliza ebirungi okuggibwayo kw’omusango guno kwabasala amagenda n’amadda. Bw’oyogera ne bannamateeka abatalina ludda awamu na b’oludda oluvuganya abatatya kwogera ndowooza yaabwe, bangi bagamba nti omusango bapuliida ba Kyagulanyi baguzannyiramu. Balaga ng’obujulizi obwaleetebwa bwe bwali obwomunguuba ate ng’obujulizi obuzitowa bwaliwo. Bagamba n’okugamba nti eyakulembera okuwaaba teyalina bumanyirivu mu nsonga zino kuba gwe gwali omulundi gwe ogusooka mu kkooti Ensukkulumu ate nga ku ttiimu gye yali akulembera mwalimu omumanyirivu ku kkooti Ensukkulumu era ng’omukugu oyo ayogerwako ne mu kkampuni mwe bawoleza bwombiriri era ye mukama w’oli omulala ate eyakulemberamu. Wabula omukugu ayogerwako ku nsonga ezo waggulu wadde yeewala okuzoogerako bulambalamba ye yagamba nti abalamuzi ba kkooti Ensukkulumu balinga mukyala muzaalisa, nti mulimu gwe okuyamba oyo azze nga gwe mulundi gwe ogusoose okuzaala okumuyigiriza okusindika omwana naye nti tamugoba bugobi nti nviira ne by’okola tobitegeera. Uganda yasuubwa okulaba abalamuzi engeri gye bandisaze ku nsonga y’ebifo ebironderwamu ebisoba mu 400 nga kumpi byonna bya mu Bugwanjuba bwa Uganda ng’eno abantu bonna abeewandiisa ng’abalonzi mu bifo ebyo bonna tewali wadde eyafa, wadde eyali omulwadde, wadde eyali asenguse, wadde eyalina entondo n’atalonda nga bonna baavaayo ne balonda ate akalulu kaabwe ne bakawa omuntu omu yekka. Kituufu kisoboka naye era kireetawo ebibuuzo ne bwekibeera kifo kimu kyokka. Abakugu mu mateeka era baalaga obwennyamivu olwomusango guno okuggibwayo nga teguwuliddwa ekyasubya eggwanga omukisa okulaba engeri abalamuzi gye bandiwabudde eggwanga engeri embeera ya kalulu gy’eyinza okukwatibwamu mu katyabaga akalala akalifaanana nga ke twesangamu aka COVID-19. Abalamuzi bandyogedde ki ku ky’amagye okwenyigira obutereevu mu kukwasisa amateeka mu kalulu nga n’okutuuka kati abamu ku baakwatibwa bakyali mu budukulu bw’amagye era nga bavunaanibwa kkooti y’amagye. Mu bufunze, kyetaagisa emboozi ennambulukufu ku nsonga y’omusango guno engeri gye gwakwatibwamu enjuyi zonna ezaagulimu okuva ku yaloopa wuuyo ku bawawaabirwa okutuuka ku baali balina okuguwuliriza. Kyankuba wala bwe nnabuuza munnamateeka w’oyo eyali ku mwanjo mu bawawaabirwa nga njagala ambuulire ku lw’obulungi bw’eggwanga oba omusango yandyagadde guveeyo oba nedda, n’antegeeza nti bo nga bapuliida bawooza musango gubapangisiddwa kuwooza so si ku lwa bulungi bwa ggwanga oba nedda. Kituufu munnamateeka apangisibwa kola ssente, naye ensonga ezimu tezeetaaga kubeera na bigendererwa bisukka ku nsimbi? Ng’eggwanga ebikyatusoomooza bikyali bingi nga mwe muli obwenkanya n’obulambulukufu buli lwe wabaawo okuvuganya. Omuwandiisi Munnamawulire

headline: Ebola : Abamakomera baweze eby’okukyaalira abasibe
text: Akulira ekitongole ky’ Amakomera mu ggwanga, Johnson Byabashaija ayimirizza mbagirawo abagenyi okukyalira abasibe mu makomera ng’omu ku kaweefube w’okwewala okusaasaanya ekirwadde kya Ebola ekitadde eggwanga ku bunkenke. Mu kiwandiiko ekifulumiziddwa olwa eri abakulira amakomera wonna mu ggwanga agamba nti mukiseera kino okukkiriza abagenyi okukyalira abasibe kibeera kyabulabe nga bwekityo balina okulindako okutuusa ng’ embeera eteredde. Byabashaija ategeezezza nti abasibe bonna kati bakujanjabirwa mu malwaliro g’amakomera gokka okutuusa ng’ Ebola aweddewo mu ggwanga. Ono era alagidde abasirikale b’amakomera okubeera nga bambadde masiki obudde bwonna. Okusinziira ku Byabashaija bagenda kuteekawo ekifo eky’enjawulo, abasirikale n’abasibe abakomawo okuva mu kkooti webalina okusooka okufuuyirwa eddagala eritta akawuka ka Ebola nga tebanakkirizibwa kuyingira munda mu makomera. Ekiwandiiko ekiriko omukono gw’ omwogezi w’ekitongole kino, Frank Baine, kiraga nti ebiragiro bya Kamisona Genero bitandikiddewo, nga bigendereredde okuziyiza Ebola okusaasaana mu makomera. Bino webijjidde nga ekitundu kya Masaka kyafunye omuntu asookedde ddala okufa ekirwadde ky’Ebola era abakulu mukitundu kino nebalabula abantu okusigala okulindaala ku kirwadde kino. Mu kiseera kino aba Minisitule y’ebyobulamu ekyekennenya embeera bweyimiridde, okusalawo ekiddako ku muggalo gwe nnaku 21, President Museveni gweyateeka e Mubende ne Kassanda ewasookera Ebola.

headline: Bobi Wine asannyalazza Arua, abasuubizza okuzzaawo ettutumu ly’ekitundu kyabwe
text: Arua Akwatidde ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) kkaadi ku bwapulezidenti mu kalulu ka 2021, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine), asannyalazza ekibuga Arua okumalira ddala akaseera bw’abadde anoonya akalulu mu kitundu kino. Bobi Wine nga ayingira mu kibuga kye Arua Wadde nga Kyagulanyi lwe yasemba okugenda mu Arua, amasasi gaavuga awamu n’okuyiwa omusaayi, leero libadde ssanyu jjereere ng’ono anoonya akalulu mu bitundu bya West Nile. Kyagulanyi atandikidde mu disitulikiri y’e Pakwach, Nebbi n’amalira mu Arua obwedda buli w’ayita ng’asanga abantu bakwatiridde ku makubo okumuwuubirako. Bw’abadde anaatera okuyingira mu kibuga Arua, kiyitiridde era wadde enkuba ebadde etonnya, abawagizi be tebalemye kumuwerekera era naye n’afuluma wakati mu kire ky’enkuba okubawuubirako. Kyagulanyi asinzidde mu bitundu bino n’atabukira poliisi gy’agambye nti yagaanye bannannyini wooteeri mu kitundu ky’e Pakwach okubasuza, n’ategeeza nti kino tekijja kubagaana kunoonya na kuwangula kalulu kano. Obwedda enkumi n’enkumi z’abantu ziyimba kimu “Bobi Bobi” wakati mu ssanyu. Bw’abadde e Nebbi, Bobi Wine agambye nti ekitundu kya West Nile ky’ekimu ku bisingamu ebitone eby’enjawulo, naye Pulezidenti Museveni ne gavumenti ye tebalina kye bakoze ku bitumbula. Kyagulanyi bano abagumizza nti mu Uganda empya, baakulaba ng’ekitundu kya West Nile kiddamu okufuna ettutumu n’ekitiibwa nga bwe gwali. “Mu kitundu kino kivaamu ebitone eby’enjawulo, wano we wava Docus Inzikuru era ye wavudde n’abawangudde engule ez’enjawulo mu nsi yonna. Naye tewali kitone kissibwamu kitiibwa kubanga Pulezidenti Museveni talina kitone kyonna.” Kyagulanyi bw’agambye. Ono ategeezezza abantu mu West Nile nti waakulaba ng’abaddiza ebyo bye bafiiriddwa era babizimbireko, okuteekawo enkulaakulana empya. Bobi Wine abantu mu kitundu kino abasabye baveeyo mu bungi balonde akabonero ka Manvuuli era bakuume akalulu kaabwe nga beekolamu obubinja bw’abantu 20, kubanga bakimanyi mu lwatu nti obululu Pulezidenti Museveni azze abukwatamu. Abasabye obutamuganya ku mulundi guno. Okusinziira ku pulogulaamu y’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda, Kyagulanyi addako kugenda Kitgum, Pader ne Gulu mu nnaku za wiiki eno ezisigaddeyo.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asabye abantu bakomye okwesaasira bwe baba baakwebbulula mu byenfuna
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abantu okukomya okwekubagiza ku mbeera y’ebyenfuna ekoseddwa ennyo omuggalo ogwava ku kirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona, naye basigale n’essuubi era bamalire okuddamu okusituka bwe baba baakugenda mu maaso. “Embeera si nyangu naye oyo anaasigala waggulu y’oyo anaatetenkanya akatono k’alinawo kalyoke kaveemu ekinene. Enkoko Sseggwanga esooka kubeera ggi, maama n’alyoka amaamira eggi ne livaamu enkoko ennene. Bw’oba oyagala ebinene, sooka olowooze ku bitono.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’ategeezezza. Owek. Mayiga, entanda eno agiweeredde mu Kampala mu musomo gwa NSSF ogw’okweddabulula okuva mu mbeera ya Corona mu ssabbiiti y’okuwuliziganya ne bakasitoma baabwe etuumiddwa ‘Customer Care Week’ ku Mmande. Mukuumaddamula Mayigaategeezezza nti waliwo obwetaavu okwogerako n’abantu okusobola okubazzaamu amaanyi n’essuubi kuba abasinga ebintu byabwe ne bbizineesi zaabwe ebyafa. Kyokka beetaaga okumanya ntiwakyaliwo ebisobola okukolebwa ne baddamu okusituka nate. Ono asabye abavubuka okubeera abatetenkanya nga bakyalina amaanyi basobole okusinziira baddemu bazimbe obulamu bwabwe bave mu by’okwekubagiza n’okulowooleza mu kubawa. Owek. Mayiga agamba nti singa bano bakola awatali kunyooma mirimu, basobola bulungi okugenda mu maaso. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, abantu balina okumalirira baleme kutya bizibu kuba buli mulimu gulimu okusoomoozebwa nayene mu mbeera eno obuwanguzi bubeera bwangu nga basigadde beesigwa era abaagala ebyo bye bakola. “Okweganya, okwesaasira tebiyamba bw’oba wazze emabega mu byenfuna.” Kamalabyonna Mayiga bw’alambise bannabbizineesi. Abaagala okweddabulula mu byenfuna, Katikkiro Mayiga abawadde amagezi bakole ebyo bye balinamu obukugu ng’obulimi, obulunzi n’ebirala, kuba bino birina obusobozi okubalokola mu byenfuna. Mukuumaddamula aliko n’entanda gy’awadde ebitongole mu ggwanga bwebiba tebyagala kuggalawo, nga bino abisabye okubaga enteekateeka ebeerawo okusobola okutambuza emirimu ne bwe baba basanze ebizibu era bafeeyo nnyo okukekkereza ensimbibaziteeke mu ebyo ebiteebereka. Kamalabyonna asabye abantu okumanya nti ebiseera ebizibu ng’ebya Corona bijjiramu emikisa nga kino kyeyolekedde nnyo mu bantu ababadde mu by’omutimbagano n’okutambuza ebintu, kuba ensi eyo gy’eraze kati. Ku bantu abatadde ekitongole kino ku nninga kibawe ku ssente zaabwe, Katikkiro Mayigaaba NSSF abasabye okwongera okumanyisa abantu ku ngeri ekitongole kino gye kikolamu era ensi emanye nti ssente NSSF z’etereka tezibeera awo wabula bazisiga mu bintu ebyenjawulo ng’eno y’ensonga lwaki basobola kuzifuna luvannyuma lw’akiseera ekigere. Ono agamba nti walina okubeerawo enteekateeka ennungi etakosa bantu batereka wadde ekitongole kya NSSF. Ate Omukungu wa NSSF, Apollo Mboowa awadde abantu abatereka ne NSSF amagezi, okubaako n’ekintu mwe balinze okuteeka ssente zaabwe kuba singa zibaweebwa nga tebalina kye bategese kuziteekamu ziba zigenda kubafa. Omusomo guno gwetabiddwako n’ababanguzi abalala okubadde; Abbey Mukiibi omukozi ku leediyo ya CBS awamu ne Munnabyanfuna Simon Ssenkaayi nga ne bano basomesezza abantu ku ngeri gye basobol

headline: Abakulembeze e Ssembabule balayiziddwa ne bawera okukolera awamu ne Buganda
text: Ssembabule Abakulembeze ku disitulikiti y’e Ssembabule bakubye ebirayiro era ne basuubiza okutambulira awamu n’Obwakabaka okukyusa embeera z’abantu mu kitundu kino. Okulayira kuno kubadde ku kitebe kya disitulikiti y’e Ssembabule era kukuliddwamu omulamuzi omukulu ow’e Masaka, Charles Yetise era nga ku balayidde ku baddeko bassentebe ku mitendera egy’enjawulo awamu ne bakkansala abaweredde ddala 37. Ssentebe wa disitulikiti eno omulonde, Nkalubo Patrick, yasoose okulayira era n’asuubiza abatuuze nti waakukolagana ne Muteesa  kuba balina okutuusa empeereza ennungi ku bantu ba Nnyinimu mu kitundu kino. “Ssebo Muteesa tujja kolera wamu naawe kubanga tumanyi wano we tuli wa Kabaka kuba Ssaabassajja bw’aba azze mu Ssembabule, asula ku mbuga ye wano we tuli, ekitegeeza nti aba asuze wuwe. Tujja kukwasiza wamu nammwe mutuukirize tukole nga bwe tubadde tukola, kuba Kabaka tagoba ffenna tuli bantu be. ” Nkalubo Patrick bw’agambye. Ssentebe Nkalubo asabye bakkansala okukolera awamu nga baweereza abantu era n’abalabula obutaganya muntu yenna kuzannyisa nsimbi za gavumenti. Bw’amaze okulayira ono, akulira abakozi, Willy Batalingaya, amukwasizza ebikola mu woofiisi mu butongole era n’amusaba okukulembera obulungi abantu.  Muteesa Sserwadda Muhammad asinzidde ku mukolo guno n’agamba nti ssentebe Nkalubo  aggyeeyo bulungi ekinyusi bw’akkiriza nti ettaka kwe bali lya Ssaabassajja Kabaka era n’amusaba okuteekawo enkolagana ennungi emirimu gisobole okutambula. Oluvannyuma lw’okulayira, okulonda kwa sipiika omupya kugenze maaso era ne kukomekkereza nga Kasozi Erias awangudde bwe babadde ku mbiranye, Ssebuggwawo Julius, n’obululu 20 ate Ssebuggwawo Julius n’afuna 17.  Alondeddwa nga sipiika Kasozi Erias asuubiza okukolagana ne banne obulungi era akole ekisaanidde okutumbula eby’enjigiriza kw’osa obulimi n’obulunzi.

headline: Maama Nnabagereka Sylivia Nagginda asisinkanye omukyala atwala omupiira gw’abakyala mu Africa
text: Maama Nnabagereka Sylivia Nagginda, asisinkanye Mukyala Sarai Bareman, akulira omupiira gw’abakyala mu nsi yonna ne munne atwala omupiira gw’abakyala mu Africa, Safia Abdeldayem ku Bulange. Maama Nabagereka, Omumbejja Katrina  Ssangalyambogo , Safia Abdeldayem ,Jean Sseninde ne Minisita wa Kabaka Henry Sekabembe Kiberu ku Bulange Boogedde ku ngeri gyebayinza okutumbulamu ebitone by’abaana abawala nga tebamenye buwangwa na nnono. Ku lw’obwakabaka, Minisita w’abavubuka, eby’emizannyo n’okwewummuza, Henry Sekabembe Kiberu, agambye nti nga onakyuusa obulamu bw’abavubuka mu nnono, obuwangwa, mu by’obulamu, empisa n’enneeyisa yabwe, olina kukulembeza bya mizannyo kubanga byebasinga okwagala mu kiseera kino. Owek. Henry Sekabembe,  Safia Abdeldayem ne Jean Sseninde ku Bulange Yeebazizza Jean Sseninde olw’okuggulira abaana abawala enzigi ne boolesa ebitone byabwe oluvannyuma nebitumbuka. Mu nsisinkano eno, Maama Nnabagereka abadde wamu n’omumbejja Katrina Ssangalyambogo anyumirwa ennyo eby’emizannyo era munna byamizannyo.

headline: Ttiya ggaasi anyoose mu Kampala nga poliisi eremesa Bobi okukuba olukungaana
text: Bobi Wine mu suuti n’ettayi enzirugavu ne banne mu kkooti  Abasirikale ba poliisi abawanvu n’abampi baakedde kuyiibwa ku wooteeri ya Pope Paul mu Ndeeba okulemesa omubaka wa Kyaddondo ey’obuvanjuba Robert Kyagulanyi okukuba olukungaana lwe olw’okwebuuza ku bantu kukigendererwakye eky’okwesimbawo ku bwa pulezidenti omwaka ogujja.  Poliisi yategeezezza nti Kyagulanyi yalemereddwa okutuukiriza obukwakkulizo bwebaamuteekako mu nsisinkano gyebaalimu n’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda omwezi oguwedde.  Omukka ogubalagala binyookedde mukitundu kino nga poliisi egezaako okugumbulula abawagizi ba Kyagulanyi ababadde bagenze okwetaba mu lukiiko.  Bino okubaawo Kyagulanyi abadde egenze mu kkooti okuwulira omusango gwe mwavunaanibwa okukuba olukungaana olumenya amateeka nga ali wamu ne banne mu kuwakanya omusolo ku ssimu guyite social media tax. Omusnago gubadde ku kkooti ya Buganda Road. N’eno nayo wabaddeyo okukubwa kwa masasi ne ttiya gaasi nga poliisi yezooba n’abawagizi ba Kyagulanyi.

headline: Abawagizi ba NUP 13 bayimbuddwa; Eddie Mutwe ne Nubian Li bazziddwayo
text: Kampala Kkooti y’amagye etuula e Makindye eyimbudde abawagizi b’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) 13 ku abo 49 abaakwatibwa e Kalangala omwaka oguwedde nga Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu anoonya akalulu. Nubian Li, Eddy Mutwe n’abalala tebayimbuddwa Bano 49 baakwatibwa mu Decemba w’omwaka oguwedde era ne basimbibwa mu kkooti y’amagye ku bigambibwa nti baasangibwa n’ebyokulwanyisa. Leero ku Mmande, akulira oludda oluwaabi, Capt.Ambrose Guma, ategeezezza omulamuzi Gutti ne kkooti nti, alina ebiragiro obutawakanya kweyimirirwa kw’abantu 12 ku bakwate 49 omuli abawagazi wamu n’abakuumi ba Kyagulanyi. Ku bano kuliko; Rachel Akiiki Tusiime, Saphinah Nansovo, Jamie’s Namwenje Kalyango, John Miiro, Bonny Obicho aka Makanika, Fatumah Namubiru, Joy Namuyimba aka Joy Strong, Monica Twashemerirwe alias Monic, Oliver Lutaaya, Benedict Musisi ne Nelson Ndyasiima. Oluvannyuma bannamateeka balaze ebiwandiiko okuva mu ddwaliro lya St.Francis Hospital Nsambya nga biraga nti William Ntege aka Kyuma Kya Yesu nti alina okugenda mu ddwaliro okufuna obujjanjabi mu kaseera nga tannakwatibwa. Mu nsala ye Lt. Gen Andrew Gutti akkiriza bano 13 okuyimbulwa naye n’abateekako obukwakkulizo obukakali okusobola okubeeyimirira. Bano Gutti abataddeko ekkoligo obutafuluma Kampala ne Wakiso nga tebafunye lukkusa kuva mu kkooti era nga bateekeddwa okweyanjula emirundi ebiri buli mwezi. “Buli omu ku mmwe alina okusasula akakalu ka kkooti ka bukadde 20 ezitali zabuliwo ate ababeeyimirira buli omu asasule obukadde 50 ezitali zabuliwo. Singa munaamenya akamu ku bukwakkulizo buno, okuyimbulwa kwammwe kujja kusazibwamu. Wabula ate Nubian Li amatuufu Ali Bukeni awamu ne Eddy Mutwe amatuufu Eddy Ssebufu n’abalala 34, kkooti ebagaanye okweyimirirwa era balina okulindako kkooti okusalawo ku nsonga zaabwe ku Mmande ejja. Oludda oluwaabi lulumiriza nti abakwate bano 49 wamu n’abalala abakyanoonyezebwa, baasangibwa n’amasasi nga January 3, e Makerere Kavule mu zzooni ya Kiggundu, ekintu ekimenya amateeka.

headline: Ab’e Kyotera bakkukkuluma lwa kulekebwa bbali ku ssente za COVID-19
text: Kyotera – Buddu Abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka abawangaalira mu ssaza ly’e Buddu naddala mu disitulikiti y’e Kyotera balaze okunyolwa olw’okusosolebwa gavumenti ne batafuna mukisa kufuna ku ssente zakudduukirira bantu abakoseddwa ekirwadde kya Covid-19. Kino kiddiridde gavumenti okulangirira okuyamba abantu abakoseddwa omuggalo naddala abo abakola emmere ya leero ng’eyita mu kubawa ssenteku ssimu zaabwe nga bano okusinga bali mu Wakiso, Kampala ne Munisipaali ezimu. Omubaka w’essaza ly’e Kyotera mu Palamenti, John Paul Lukwago Mpalanyi ku lwa bannakyotera agamba nti, buno busosoze bwennyini kubanga abantu mu bitundu ebitali bya Munisipaali nabo tebakyakola olw’omuggalo. Mpalanyi bino yabyogeredde ku wooteeri yaMaria Flo muMasaka n’asaba gavumenti okomye okusosola mu bantu baayo. Mu ngeri y’emu omubaka Mpalanyi alaze okutya olw’engeri gavumenti gy’ekuttemu ensonga y’ebyobulimi obuyimirizaawo eggwanga n’agamba nti enteekateeka eno ebuliramu ddala, kuba ebiriwo tebirina gwe bisikiriza ku bwenyigiramu. Ono yannyonnyodde nti akaseera katuuse gavumenti efune abakugu abasooka okukebera ettaka ly’omulimi ne bamanya birime ki ebisobola okudda ku ttaka lino, kibayambe obutafiirwa. Mpalanyi agamba nti ye ng’omubaka agenda kutandika okugikolera abantu be kibayambe obuteetundako ttaka era basobole okukungula ekiwera. Ku bbula ly’emirimu erisusse, Mpalanyi omusango agutadde ku gavumenti gy’agamba nti etunula butunuzi ng’amakolero agasukka mu 50 mu kitundu kye ekya Kyotera gasaanawo mu kifo ky’okugayambako. Mpalanyi yasabye abakulembeze okulaga abantu ekituufu eky’okukola era n’okubayambako mu kifo ky’okubasimbisa ennyiriri ne babagabira omuceere n’ebintu ebirala nti, kino kikontana n’obuwangwa bwa Buganda.

headline: Omusango gw’okutemula Thomas Sankara gutandika October 11
text: Ab’obuyinza mu BurkinaFaso beetegese okutandika okuwozesa eyali Pulezidenti w’eggwanga eryo, Blaise Compaorén’abalala 13, olw’okutemula gwe yaddira mu bigere Thomas Sankara okutandika nga 11 October. Ab’obuyinza bategeezezza ku Lwokubiri nti musango guno gugenda kuwulirwa mu lujjudde era nga gugenda kuwulirwa mu kibuga kya BurkinaFaso ekikulu Ougadougou. Kinajjukirwa ntiCompaoré yaggyibwa mu ntebe oluvannyuma lw’okugezaako okweremeza mu buyinza mu 2014 ng’ekisanja kye kiweddeko era n’adduka mu buwang’anguse. Ono mu kiseera kino ali mu ggwanga lya Ivory Coast era wadde taliiwo omusango guno gugenda kuwulirwa. Mu 2015 ono baamuyisaako ekibaluwa kibakuntumye, mu April akakiiko k’amagye mu ggwanga lino kaamusongamu olunwe okulumba eggwanga lino era n’okwenyigira mu ttemu wamu n’okutemula abantu, emirambo gyabwe n’agikweka. WabulaCompaore bino wamu n’ebyokutemula Sankara yabyegaanye ng’agamba tabimanyiiko. Sankara eyali ayitibwa ‘African Che Guevara’, yali waamaanyi nnyo era n’okutuusa katibangi naddala abaagazi b’enkyukakyuka bamutwala ng’ekyokulabirako.

headline: Ab’e Kyaggwe basabiddwa okwettanira okulimira awafunda
text: Abantu ba Kabaka mu ssaza ly’e Kyaggwe basabiddwa okwettanira okulima ebirime ebikula amangu era nga babirimira awafunda. Bino bibadde mu musomo ogutegekeddwa ku kyalo Kisoga mu ggombolola y’e Ntenjeru e Mukono, okwongera okuwa abantu b’ekitundu kino amagezi ku ngeri gye basobola okwekulaakulanya. Ssekiboobo Elijah Bogere Lubanga Mulembya agamba kino bakikoze okusobola okulaga abantunti kisoboka okufuna ssente nga balimira mu kifo ekifunda. Okusinziira ku Ssekiboobo Mulembya, baagala buli maka gabeeko ne kye gasobola okutundu mu butale obwetoolodde Mukono ne Buikwe era bakyuse obulamu bwabwe ne Buganda esobole okudda ku ntikko. Ssekiboobo asabyeamaka agalina ebifo ebikalu okusimbamuennyaanya, watermelon, emboga wamu n’ebirala bye basobola okufunamu ensimbi. Akulira ebyobulimi mu Kyaggwe, Philly Lubega agamba nti bagenda kutandikira ku birime ebisobola okukulira awafunda era nga bikula mangu mu kiseera kye kimu nga bireeta ensimbi. Omukugu mu by’okulima, Mike Ssegawa Ssali, abantu abasomesezza ebirime nga bwe birina okusimbibwamu awamu n’engeri y’okubirabirira.

headline: Ssaabasajja Kabaka aweereddwa engule emusiima okulwanyisa Siriimu
text: Ekitongole ekirwanyisa mukenenya mu nsi yonna ki UNAIDS kiwadde Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi, engule emwebaza olw’okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino mu Uganda ne Afirika nga ayita mu nteekateeka ez’enjawulo zateekawo okumanyisa abantu ku kirwadde kino. Engule eno Omutanda emukwasiddwa akulira ekitongole kino mu nsi yonna, Winne Byanyima ku mukolo gw’emisinde gy’okujjukira amazaalibwa ga Kabaka ag’omwaka 2022 oguyindidde mu Lubiri e Mmengo ku Ssande. Bw’abadde awaayo engule eno, Byanyima yeebazizza Obwakabaka bwa Buganda olw’okutumbula eby’obulamu awamu n’okukola ennyo okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino nga buyita mu nteekateeka ez’enjawulo.  “Kulwa UNAIDS njagala okwebaza Kabaka n’Obwakabaka obukulemberwa Katikkiro Mayiga olw’okuwaayo emisinde gino kati emyaka 3 eri okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya era twebaza aba Airtel olw’okuvujjirira emisinde egyeetabamu abantu enkumu bwebati,” Byanyima bw’ategeezezza. Emisinde gino gitambulidde wansi w’omulamwa, “Abaami tube basaale okulwanyisa Mukenenya, tutaase abaana ab’obuwala, ‘ era mu nteekateeka eno Omutanda ayagala omwaka 2022 wegunatuukira nga obulwadde buno bufuuse lufumo.  Kinajjukirwa nti Omuteregga yalondebwa ekitongole kino era nasiima okukulemberamu olutabaalo ku mukenenya ng’ emunyeenye ya Afirika yonna ku nsonga eno.

headline: Aba Uganda Aids Commission Bawaddeyo Obukadde 10 Okuwagira Amatikkira Ga Kabaka
text: Oweek. Kyewalabye Male ku ddyo ng’akwasibwa cheque akulira Uganda Aids Commission Mukooyo Ssefuluya Ekitongole ekirwanyisa obulwadde bwa Mukenenya ekya Uganda Aids Commission olwaleero kiwaddeyo cheque ya bukadde 10 okuwagira enteekateeka z’Amatikkira ga Kabaka aga 27. Cheque eno bagikwasizza ssentebe w’enteekateeka Oweek. David Kyewalabye Male ng’ali wamu n’olukiiko oluteesiteesi. Mukwogerakwe, Oweek. Kyewalabye ategeezezza nti balina essanyu nti omulamwa gw’omwaka guno gwategekebwa ku kulwanyisa mukenya ngatuyita mu by’obuwangwa. “Okuva siriimu bweyayingira mu Uganda mu myaka gyekinaana, kaweefube mungi akoleddwa okusomesa abantu era kizibu okusaanga abantu abatamanyi siriimu bwakwatamu okujjako nga yazaalibbwa jjo,” Kyewalabye bweyategeezezza. Agasseeko nti olugendo lunene olutambuddwa okuva okuva abantu nga bakyalowooza nti siriimu baloga muloge. “Nga tukozesa obuwangwa bwaffe tulowooza nti tusobola okulwanyisa mukenya. Abaganda basukka obukadde omusanvu ate nga bulina omukulembeze gw’ebuwuliriramu. N’olwekyo kwali kuleengera wala ekibiina kyamawanga amagatte okulengera Ssaabasajja Kabaka kubanga wano mu Buganda Kabaka kyayogera kiragiro,” Kyewalabye bweyagambye. Kululwe, Dr. Eddie Mukooyo Sefuluya ssentebe wa Uganda Aids Commission, yategeezezza nti beetegefu nnyo okukolagana n’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda mukulwanyisa akawuka ka siriimu wamu n’okusosolebwa. “Mwenna mbakoowoola okulaba nti obubaka bw’okulwanyisa siriimu butuuka ku bavubuka, abaami, abakyala n’abawala abato mu Buganda. Akawuka kakyali kangi nnyo mu Buganda n’olwekyo tufube nnyo okwongera amaanyi mu kakalwanyisa,” Mukooyo bweyagambye.

headline: Owek. Nsibirwa akubirizza  abavubuka okwettanira amasomo g’ebyemikono
text: Omumyuka Ow’okubiri owa Katikkiro II era omuwanika wa Buganda, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa akubirizza abavubuka okwettanira amasomo g’ebyemikono kibasobozese okwetonderawo emirimu okusobole era bakulaakulane. Entanda eno, Owek. Nsibirwa agiweeredde ku ttendekero lya Buganda Royal Institute of Businessand Technical Education mu nsisinkano n’abakungu abaddukanya ettendekero okulondoola entambuza y’emirimu bwebadde mu myaka esatu egiyise. Owek. Nsibirwa ategeezezza nti ebyemikono y’engeri yokka abavubuka gyebasobola okusimattuka ebbula ly’emirimu eririwo kuba kino kisobola bulungi okubawa obukungu obwenjawulo. Mukiseera kino Obwakabaka buli mukusisinkana abakungu abaddukanya ebitongole by’Obwakabaka by’enjawulo n’ekigendererwa eky’okukuba ttooci mu nzirukanya y’emirimu mu bitongole bino mu myaka esatu egiyise. Owek. Robert Waggwa nsibirwa asinzidde wano neyebazaSsaabasajja Kabaka olw’okuteerawo abantu be amatendekero agayamba okutendeka abantu mu bukugu obwenjawulo. Mu kulambula kuno Owek. Nsibirwa awerekeddwako minisita w’ebyamawulire mu Bwakabaka Owek. Noah Kiyimba, Ow’ebyenjigiriza Owek. Dr. Prosperous Nankindu era basisinkanye akulira ettendekero lino Omuk. Anthony Wamala. Ye Minsisita w’ebyenjigiriza, eby’Obulamu,enkulaakulana y’Abantu n’emirimu mu yafeesi ya Nnaabagereka,Owek. Dr. Prosperous Nankindu asabye abazadde okukozesa oluwummula luno olunene okuteekateeka abaana babwe. Ssenkulu w’ettendekero lino, Omukungu Anthony Wamala agamba nti bakwongera okuwa abayizi obukugu obubamala basobole okuvuganya mu katale k’emirimu munsi yonna n’obusobozi okwetandikirawo emirimu.

headline: Eyafiirwa omwana mu kwekalakaasa kwa Bobi Wine, alumbye Palamenti, ayagala bwenkanya
text: Kampala Nnyina w’omwana Amos Ssegawa eyakubwa ab’ebyokwerinda amasasi n’afiirawo, alumbye Palamenti enkya ya leero ng’abanja obwenkanya ku kufa kwa mutabani we. Hajara Nakitto nga ye yali azaala Ssegawa ow’emyaka 15  eyattibwa ab’ebyokwerinda oluvannyuma lw’okukwatibwa kwa Bobi Wine e Luuka  mu 2020.  Maama ono Nakitto agamba nti amaliridde okusula ku Palamenti okutuusa ng’afunye omukisa okulaba Pulezidenti Museveni ne Sipiika Kadaga. Ono alabiddwako n’ebipande okuli ebigambo ebibanja obwenkanya agamba nti poliisi ye yatta mutabani we awataali musango. Maama Nakitto abadde ne muwala we ow’emyaka 12 alumiriza poliisi okulemwa okumuwa obwenkanya. Oluvannyuma Poliisi ekuuma ku Palamenti emukkiriza okuyingira munda mu Palamenti wadde tetusobodde kumanya oba asobodde okulaba Sipiika Kadaga nga bw’abadde asabye. Ssegawa yattibwa mu kwekalakaasa okwaliwo mu mwezi gwa Novemba  bwe yali ne Nnyina nga bagezaako okudda ewaka, abawagizi ba Kyagulanyi bwe baali bawakanya okukwatibwa kwe. Ssegawa  yali muyizi ku ssomero lya Ssaabasajja Kabaka erya Lubiri High School (Buloba Campus) era y’omu ku bantu 54 abattibwa mu kwekalakaasa kwa Novemba okwetoloola eggwanga lyonna. Bangi ku b’enganda z’abantu bano abattibwa bagamba nti bakyalemeddwa okufuna obwenkanya oluvannyuma lw’abantu baabwe okuttibwa  awatali musango kuba bangi ku bano baali tebeetabye butereevu mu kwekalakaasa kuno.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga atongozza omwaka gw’Emmwanyi Terimba 2021
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, atongozza sizoni y’Emmwannyi terimba eya 2021 n’asaba abalimi okuyimusa omutindo gwazo kyanguye okubafunira obutale. Sizoni y’omwaka guno, Katikkiro Mayiga agitongolezza mu  ku Lwokubiri wadde nga yabadde erina kutongolezebwa Busujju naye olwa Ssennyiga Corona ne batasobola kugendayo. “Twatandika kaweefube w’Emmwanyi Terimba mu 2016 nga twagala okukyusa embeera z’abantu mu Buganda kubanga oluvannyuma lw’okutalaaga Buganda mu Ttoffaali, twalaba obwavu obusukkiridde naye nga mu kaweefube ono mugenderamu n’ebirime ebyenkizo ng’ebitooke.” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, abantu okulima emmwanyi baali baakuvaako olw’akawuka akazirumba ne badda ku birime ebirala nga Vanilla ne Moringa, nga kino kye kiseera okubbulula ekirime kino. Katikkiro agamba nti kikulu nnyo abantu ba Kabaka okwettanira okulima ky’emmwanyi kubanga kye kimu ku byatumbula ebyenfuna by’Obwakabaka ebiseera ebyeyita. Owek. Mayiga agamba nti newankubadde basanze okusoomoozebwa kw’abantu abatagoberera mutindo, naye ng’Obwakabaka baakwongera okubakwatizaako. Kamalabyonna agumizza abalimi nti Obwakabaka bugenda kutandika okunoonya akatale ky’emmwanyi n’okuzongerako omutindo ng’amawanga amalala kuba emmwanyi yali ya nkizo okukulaakulanya Buganda. Ono ategeezezza nti kaweefube ono alimu emitendera esatu omuli; okwagazisa abantu okuddamu okulima emmwanyi, okubagabira endokwa, okulambula abalimi awamu n’okwenyigira mu katale k’emmwanyi nga bazitunda ebweru oba okukolamu kkaawa wano. Owek. Mayiga era asinzidde wano n’akunga abantu okugenda mu maaso n’okwetangira ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona nga bagoberera ebiragiro.

headline: Emipiira gy’Ebika bya Buganda gyongezeddwayo
text: Minisita w’Abavubuka, Emizannyo n’Okwewummuza mu Bwakabaka, Owek. Henry Sekabembe Kiberu, atangaazizza ku nkyuukakyuuka mu nteekateeka ya Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II, okuggulawo emipiira gy’Ebika ezibadde ez’okubaawo ng’ ennaku z’omwezi 28/ May e Kasana Luweeo mu Bulemeezi. Okutangaaza kuno Ssekabembe akukoledde mu Bulange e Mmengo bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku nteekateeka zino, nalaga nti olunaku olulala lugenda kulangirirwa. “Munajjukira nti ku Lwokuna lwa Sabiiti ewedde nategeeza Obuganda bwonna ng’empiira gy’ Ebika eby’omwaka guno bwegigenda okuggulawo nga 28/May/ 2022. Mbayise okutegeeza Obuganda nti waliwo enkyuukakyuka entonotono ku nsonga eno, Olunaku lukyuseemu katono era mu bwangu ddala tujja kuba tutegeeza Obuganda olunaku olulala olunaaba lutuweereddwa okuggulawo emipiira gino,” Minisita Ssekabembe bw’alambuludde. Okusinziira ku Minisita Ssekabembe, Katikkiro Mayiga ajja kutongoza empaka zino nga 31/ May /2022 mu bimuli bya Bulange era Abataka ab’obusolya wamu n’abazzukulu ne ttiimu zonna zisabiddwa okwetaba ku mukolo guno. Owek. Ssekabembe agamba nti enteekateeka gyebalina kuluno nnungi era bakkiriza nga ettutumu n’ekitibwa, abantu okudda mu kisaawe n’ebbugumu ly’empiira gino ligenda kuddawo. Asabye ttiimu zonna okusigala nga zeteekateeka okusobola okwolesa omutindo omulungi mu kikopo kino kyonna.

headline: Kyagulanyi akunze bannayuganda balemese Museveni okukyusa Ssemateeka
text: Akulira ekibiina kyaNational Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine) alabuddeobutakkiriza Gen Yoweri Museveniokubaggyako eddembe lyabwe okwerondera omukulembeze w’eggwanga nga bayita mu kalulu. Bino Kyagulanyi abyogeredde mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire lw’atuzizza ku kitebe ky’ekibiina kye e Kamwokya ku Lwokusatu. “Bannayuganda bannange mbabuulira nti bitandika bwebiti mu mawanga ga bannakyemalira abasinga abakadiyidde mu ntebe ne balekawo batabani baabwe ne bazzukulu baabwe bwebityo bwebitandika. Njagala okubategeeza nti bino si byakusaaga, bulijjo bitandika nga byakusaaga ne Museveni asooka ku byegaana naye njagala okubategeeza nti guno gwe mukisa gwammwe ogusembayo.” Bw’atyo Kyagulanyi bw’ategeezezza. Kyagulanyi agamba nti kano katego Gen. Museveni k’ataddewo mw’ayagala okuyita akakatike mutabani we Gen Muhoozi Kainerugaba kubannayugandakubanga akimanyi tebasobola kumulonda mu kalulu. Bobi Wine alabudde nti singa eddembe lino liggyibwa ku bantu nga tebakyasobola kulonda mukulembeze waabwe bajja kuba bafuuse abaddu mu nsi yaabwe nga noolwekyo beetaagaokwerwanako. Ku nsonga eno abatunulira ebyobufuzi balowooza nti mu kaseera kano Gen. Museveni kino ky’alina kubanga akimanyi bulungi nti takyalina maanyi gatalaaga ggwanga kunoonya Kalulu, abalala balowooza nti ne bw’aba ayagala kusikiza Mutabani we era akulira amagye g’oku ttaka, Lt. Gen. Mujoozi Kainerugaba era kino kirina kukolebwa ng’ayita ku kaweweevu mu kukwata obuyinza. Era singa ekiteeso kino kinaaba kireeteddwa ne lifuuka etteeka gujja kuba mulundi gwakusatu ng’ababaka batigiinyaSsemateeka n’okusinga obuwayiro obuwa abantu eddembe kyabwe obutereevu kubakulembeze nga ogwasooka kwali kuggyawo kkomo ku bisanja okuva ku bibiri mu 2005, 2017 ababaka baggya ekkomo ku myaka omuntu kw’alina okuvuganyizaako ku ntebe y’obwapulezidenti ng’abavuganya NRM kino balowooza nti kyakolebwa mu mutima oguyamba Gen. Museveni okwenywereza mu buyinza.

headline: KITALO! Nanyini MTK Francis Kitaka afudde ﻿
text: Kampala Musajja wa Kabaka era Munnamakolero Francis Xavier Kitaka afudde. Francis  Xavier Kitaka                        Ono ye mutandisi wa kkampuni ya MTK ekola eddagala ly’ebisolo  ku Nasser Road era awamu ne Quality Chemicals Limited ekola eddagala eriwewezza ku kawuka akaleeta Mukenenya n’eddagala eddala. Kitegeerekese nga Kitaka afiiridde mu ddwaliro e Mulago gyeyabadde atwaliddwa okujjanjabwa, era waviridde mu bulamu bwensi nga aweza emyaka 85. Kitaka abadde munnasayansi omukugu mukutabula eddagala ely’ebisolo wamu nelya bantu era nga yomu ku bannayuganda abatono abasooka okufuna obukugu buno. Abantu ne Kkampuni mu biti eby’enjawulo okuli; Victory University ne Ekeleziya ya Kiwamirembe Martyrs Shrine e Kajjansi baweereza obubaka obusaasira ab’enju y’omugenzi. Mu budde buno ab’enju tebanaba kufulumya mawulire matongole ku nfa n’enteekateeka y’okukungubagira omugenzi. Ebisingawo ku ggulire lino tubireeta  Gutusinze nnyo Ayi Ssaabasajja Kabaka

headline: Gavumenti ekkirizza ab’enganda okuziika abafudde Ssennyiga Corona
text: Kampala Minisitule y’ebyobulamu kyaddaaki ekkirizza ab’enganda okuziika abantu baabwe ababeera bafudde Ssennyiga Corona. Mu kusooka gavumenti yali yeddizza obuvunaanyizibwa bw’okuziika abantu bonna ababeera bafudde ekirwadde kino, era nga n’abantu batono ababadde bakkirizibwa kutuuka ku ntaana mu kaweefube w’okulwanyisa Corona.  Omubiri gw’omugenzi nagwo gubadde gulina kuweebwa abasawo abakugu okuguteekateeka nga bano be bagukwasa ttiimu y’abakugu eyateekebwawo okugiziika. Omulimu gw’okuziika abafudde Corona gubadde gukolebwa ekitongole kya Red Cross era nga bano ekiragiro ekipya we kijjidde, nga bakaziika emirambo 50 mu bitundu by’eggwanga ebyenjawulo. Okusinziira ku biragiro ebipya ebyafulumiziddwa Minisitule y’ebyobulamu, kati ttiimu ezibadde ziziika zigenda kukola kimu kya kufuuyira mubiri gwa mugenzi n’oluvannyuma bamuteeke mu kisaawo ekiteekebwamu emirambo nga tebannagikwasa bang’anda. Omwogezi w’ekitongole Red cross, Irene Nakasiita, ategeezezza ng’enteekateeka eno empya bw’ebadde yeetaagisa kubanga tebakysobola kusasula bisale byetaagisa okuziika abantu ababeera bafudde Corona. Kamisona mu Minsitule y’ebyobulamu, George Okentho, yannyonnyodde nti ebiragiro ebipya byafulumiziddwa oluvannyuma lw’okukizuula nti ebisigalira by’omufu n’omulambo tebisobola kutambuza kirwadde kino. Ensonga y’abasawo okuziika abafudde Corona ebadde eyogeza abantu obwama era ng’abakugu baavaayo nebalaga nga bwe watali bujulizi ku nsonga y’emibiri gy’abagenzi okutambuza ekirwadde kino. Ekitongole ky’ebyobulamu mu nsi yonna ekya World Health Organisation (WHO), kyategeeza nga bwe watali bujulizi bumala kulaga nti ekirwadde kino kisigala mu mibiri gy’abagenzi, wabula nekisaba abantu okusigala nga beegendereza.

headline: Ng’Obwakabaka Buddamu Okukakkalabya Emirimu, Katikkiro Akubirizza Abantu Okwongera Okwetangira Coronavirus
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga Ng’Obwakabaka buddamu okukakkalabya emirimu oluvanyuma lw’emyezi kyenkana esatu ng’eggwanga liri ku muggalo olw’ekirwadde kya coronavirus, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abantu obutaddiriza kukola ebyo byonna ebibatangira okufuna ekirwadde kino. Mayiga era alambise engeri emirimu gyegigenda okuddukanyizibwamu okwetooloola Obwakabaka. Wammanga bwebubakabwe mubujjuvu Nga bwe mwawulidde, Omukulembeze w’Eggwanga yaddirizzaamu ku biragiro ebyateekebwa ku muggalo olwa ssenyiga Kolona. Emmotoka ez’obuyonjo kati zikkirizibwa okutambula naye nga tezikkiribwamu bantu basukka basatu. Olw’okuddirizaamu okwo, naffe twazzeemu okukola emirimu gy’obwakabaka mpola mpola nga tugendera ku nnambika etuweereddwa gavumenti ne minisitule ey’byobulamu okuva ku lunaku lwa jjo. Ba Minisita ba Kabaka n’abakozi abatonotono bagguddewo amakakkalabizo gaabwe nebatandika okuweereza. Mu ngeri yeemu, ba ssenkulu ne ba nnankulu ab’ebitongole by’Obwakabaka ng’ogyeko amasomero n’amatendekero ebitannakirizibwa kuddamu kukola, basaana okukola enteekateeka ensaamusaamu egendera ku nnambika ya gavumenti ne minisitule esobozesa emirimu okutandikibwako mpola mpola. Mu nteekateka eno, abaweereza abakozesa entambula ey’olukale n’abaweereza abatali mu bifo bya nkizo nnyo, bajja kusigala eka okutuuka embeera lwe neegenda ng’etereera. Mu mbeera gye tulimu tujja kuba tutandika okukola ku saawa 2:30 ez’okumakya ate amakakkalabizo gaggalibwe ku ssaawa 10 ez’olweggulo, kisobozese abantu okutuuka eka mu budde obwateekebwawo gavumenti era kafiyu abasange eka ku ssaawa 1:00 eyakawungeezi. Mu ngeri yeemu nsaba Abaami ba Kabaka Ab’amasaza, Abamagombolola, n’emitendera egiddako okukola enteekateeka ebasobozesa okubeera mu mbuga zammwe n’okusisinkana be mutwala mu ngeri gye mulaba esoboka mu mbeera mwetuli. Wabula kikulu nnyo Abaami bonna okuviira ddal ku ba Minisita n’abakulira ebitongole okubeera nga bawuliziganya n’abantu be batwala okubagumya n’okubazzaamu essuubi. Mu mbeera eno eyaleetebwa ssenyiga Kolona, ebikozesebwa n’ensimbi bitono ddala awonno, nsaba abavunaanyizibwa ku by’ensimbi wonnamu Bwakabaka okukwata obulungi obusente obuliwo nga tubugabana ne bannaffe bonna. Mu ngeri yeemu ebikozesebwa nabyo mbasaba mubikwate n’obwegendereza. Ate buli alinawo kyasobola okufissa akigabireko abo abali mu bwetaavu. Kikulu nnyo okwongera okwetangira obulwadde bwa ssenyinga kolona, era abantu mu Uganda basaana okumanya nti bukyaliwo. Ebiragiro ebituweebwa gavumenti n’abakugu mu by’obulammu bikaluubiriza naye byetaagisa. Ssaasabasajja Kabaka bwe yali ayogera eri Obuganda ku nsonga eno, yatugamba tugendere ku nnambika etuweebwa abakulembeze n’abasawo, bwentyo nkubiriza abantu bonna abatalina nsonga nkulu nnyo ebajja waka, basigaleyo, naddala abavubuka n’abaana abato; twongere okunaaba mu ngalo ne sabbuuni buli budde nga tutuuse awaka; nga tugenze mu butale oba mu maduuka; tukuume obuyonjo mu maka ne mu bifo gye tukolera; twewale okukwata mu maaso, ennyindo ne mu kamwa; ate twesibe obukookolo ku nyindo ne ku mimwa. Mmaliriza nga mbasaba okwekuumira mu bulamu obulungi n’okwewala obusambattuko mu maka nga Omutanda bwe yatukubiriza. Mukole dduyiro so ate era mwewale mukenenya. Mbasaba mwenna munyiikirire okukola mu mbeera eno enzibu gye tulimu, alina w’alima ateeketeeke bulungi ennimiro ye n’okulabirira ebirime. Abalina ebitone eby’enjawulo nga abayiiya b’emizannyo, amazina, ennyimba babikozese nga bayiiya ebinaabagasa nga ssenyiga Kolona awedde. Abali mu mirimu gy’emikono ng’ababazzi n’abazimbi, nabalala bwe batyo, abo bafeeyo nnyo ku mirimu gyabwe mu budde buno. Nneebaza nnyo abaweereza bonna ababadde ku mirimu okuva lwe twaggalawo emyezi ebiri emabega. Mu bano mulimu bannamawulire; ab’ebyokwerinda, n’abakuumi; abagoba b’ebidduka n’abo ababadde bakolera eka. Bwetunaagendera ku biragiro ne nnambika y’abakulembeze n’abasawo, ssenyiga kolona tujja kumulinnya ku nfeete obulamu bwaffe buddemu okutambula nga bwe bwali. Ssaabasajja Kabaka Awangaale…ng’Enkumbi ku Bbega.

headline: Bajeti ya Buganda ecamudde abavubuka
text: Masengere – Mmengo Abakulira abavubuka mu Buganda basanyukidde embalirira ya Buganda eyasomeddwa olunaku lw’eggulo eyalaze ng’essira bwe ligenda okuteekebwa ku kuyamba abavubuka okutandikawo emirimu n’okwegobako obwavu. Ssentebe w’ekibiina kya Buganda Youth Council (BYC), Omuk. Baker Ssejjengo n’omukwanaganya w’emirimu gy’abavubuka mu Bwakabaka, Owek. Hassan Kiyimba, be basoose okulaga essanyu ku mbalirira eno nga bagamba nti etadde abavubuka ku mwanjo. Bino bano babyogeredde ku Masengere olwaleero ku Lwokubiri nga boogerako ne bannamawulire. “Embalirira eno ya bavubuka kubanga ebitongole byonna tebisobola kituukiriza bigendererwa byabyo nga tebisoosowazza bavubuka okugeza mu byenjigiriza abavubuka be bajjuddeyo, ate ne mukuweereza mu bitongole ebirala, abavubuka beetaagisa nnyo.” Owek. Kiyimba bw’agambye. Ate ye Omuk. Baker Ssejjengo agambye nti eno y’essaawa abavubuka bakozese omukisa guno bakyuse embeera z’obulamu bwabwe nga batandikawo emirimu basobole okweggya mu bwavu. “Essaawa y’eno okukyusa endowooza z’abantu nga tubabuulira bwe tusobola okukozesa ebitwetoolodde ne twekulaakulanya. Okugeza omuntu asobola okukozesa ettaka ne bwe liba lya kitaawe oba jjajjaawe n’alimako emmwanyi mu nkola ya Mmwanyi Terimba okukkakkana nga afunyeemu ssente.” Omuk. Ssejjengo bw’agambye. Bano era basabye abavubuka okwenyigira mu nteekateeka z’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda, zonna bakyuse obulamu bwabwe kuba Obwakabaka bugenda kukwasizaako abavubuka abali mu bulimi nga bubanoonyeza akatale. Owek. Kiyimba era awadde abavubuka amagezi bulijjo okubeera n’ebiruubirirwa ebisoboka bwebaba baagala okugenda mu maaso era beewale okuyingiza eby’obufuzi mu nteekateeka za gavumenti ezigendereddwamu okubayamba. Mu mbalirira ya Buganda eyasomeddwa olunaku lw’eggulo, kyalambikiddwa nti Obwakabaka bugenda kukwatagana n’abavubuka abasukka 20000 babagulibwe ate abamu babakwatizeeko okulaba bwe basobola okwekulaakulanya nga bayita mu bibiina by’obwegassi bye bazze batandikawo.

headline: Poliisi eyungudde abawanvu n’abampi okukuuma Abalamazi e Namugongo
text: Omwogezi wa poliisi mu ggwanga, Fred Enanga ategeezezza nti bakwataganye n’ebitongole bye byokwerinda ebirala okukuuma abantu n’ebyabwe mu nnaku eziddirira olwa 3, June, 2022 awamu neku Lwokutaano nga eggwanga lijukira okuttibwa kw’Abajulizi. Olunaku lw’Abajulizi olw’omwaka guno lusuubirwa okubaamu abantu abawerera ddala oluvannyuma lw’eggwanga okuva ku muggalo gw’emyaka 2 nga bagenda kukung’aanira mu bifo 4, okuli ekiggwa ky’ Abakatoliki e Namugongo, e Nakiyanja mu bakulisitaayo awamu ne Mamra Prayer Centre ewa Fr. Kibuuka ate neku kiggwa ky’ abasiraamu e Namugongo. Bw’abadde ayogerako ne bannamawulire, Enanga ategeezezza nti tebalina kwekengera wadde okulabula kwebafunye ku bantu abayinza okwagala okulumbagana abalamazi wadde embeera eriwo mu ggwanga tenabeera ntebenkevu nnyo. “Basajja baffe bali mu bifo byonna ebina era buli lukya bongera okwetegekera embeera yonna eyinza okubalukawo okutaataaganya ebikujjuko bino,” Enanga bwe yagambye. Enanga yannyonnyodde nti bamaze dda okuzingako ebifo byonna ebiyinza okweyambisibwa abaagala okutabula ebikujjuko bino nasaba abantu okubatuukirira nga balina omuntu yenna gwebekengedde kuba balina abawanvu n’abampi, kadenge, Pikipiki awamu ne kkamera eziwera okunyweza eby’okwerinda mu kitundu kino. Ono yagasseeko nti obwengula bwa Namugongo bugenda kulondoolwa eggye ly’omubanga nga likolagana ne poliisi bwatyo nasaba abagenda okwetaba mu kulamaga ku mulundi guno okubeera obulindaala n’okwekengera ekintu kyonna kyebaba batategeera. Enanga abalamazi abasabye okutambula n’ebibogerako beewale okutaataaganyizibwa. Abasabye okwekeneenya embeera y’obulamu bwabwe nabawa amagezi baleme kwebonereza kisusse nga bagaana okulya, okunywa n’okuyimirira ekiseera ekiwanvu wamu n’okubeera mu mugotteko gw’abantu kuba byabulabe eri obulamu bwabwe.

headline: Aba NUP bawangudde ekibuga Masaka mu kalulu k’abavubuka
text: Masaka Abamu ku bavubuka abeetabye mukulonda Ekibiina ki National Unity Platform kiwangudde ebyalo ebisinga mukibuga Masaka mukulonda kw’abavubuka ku bukiiko bwabwe obw’oku byalo, okusinziira ku bivudde mu kulonda okwategekeddwa leero ku Lwokusooka. Abavubuka ba NUP bawangudde ebifo ebilonderwamu ebisinga obungi mu divizoni ebbiri ezikola ekibuga Masaka nga basinze ku bannabwe aba NRM wamu ne Democratic Party (DP). Ku kyalo Kimanya mu ggombolola ye Kabonera NUP yafunye obululu 43 neddirirwa NRM n’obululu 2 ate nga yo DP teyafunyewo. E Ssenya mu Kimanya era mu Kabonera NUP yafunye obululu 44, NRM 10 ate DP teyafunyewo kalulu. Wabula e Kyamulibwa ebintu byakyuseemu owa NRM yafunye obululu 77 nawangula owa NUP eyabadde n’obululu 28 ate nga yo DP teyafunyewo kalulu konna. Ate e Ssenyange mu Nyendo – Mukungwe divizioni NUP yafunye 46 ate nga DP ne NRM tebafunyewo kalulu. Nyendo ‘Parish’ NUP yakungaanyizza obululu 111 ate nga NRM ne DP baviriddemu awo. Okusinziira ku bavubuka mukitundu kino okulonda kwabadde kwa mirembe wadde nga e Kijjabwemi ne Kirumba amannya ga bawagizi ba NUP tegabadde ku nkalala z’abalonzi. Abavubuka beegudde mu malaka ekyawalirizza poliisi okukuba ttiyaggaasi okusobola okubagumbulula. Embeera yatabuse era okukkakana nga omubaka wa pulezidenti e Masaka Herman Ssentongo ayingidde mu nsonga okukakkanya abavubuka ababadde bataamye. “Tewali muntu yenna ali waggulu w’amateeka, kobeere nga oli mupoliisi kobeere nga oli w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda. Lipoota gye njagala ani atagoberedde mateeka, ani yakoze nsobi ki?” Ssentongo bweyategeezezza. Ono yasuubizza abawagizi ba NUP nga bwagenda okunoonya abasimudde amannya gabwe ku nkalala era bakolebweko kubanga kino kyabadde kikyamu.

headline: Abapoliisi bakutendekebwa ku nkwata y’abasibe abalina COVID-19
text: Kampala Oluvanyuma lw’abantu abakwatibwa ekirwadde ki ssennyiga Corona mu makomera n’obuduukulu bwa poliisi okweyongera, poliisi mu Kampala etandise okutendeka basajja baayo ku ngeri gyebalina okukwata n’okuggaliramu abasibe abalina ekirwadde kino. Abamu ku bapoliisi abali mu Kampala Kino kiddiridde okuggalwa kwa poliisi ye Kawempe ng’entabwe yava ku mulenzi ow’emyaka 15 eyali aggaliddwa ku misango egyekuusa ku kusobya ku mwana ow’emyaka 3 wabula oluvanyuma nazuulibwa nti yalina n’ekirwadde ki COVID-19.
