Bino bibadde mu bubaka bwatisse Omulangira Crispin Jjunju Kiweewa mu kutongoza okukung’aanya omusaayi mu Buganda ku mukolo oguyindidde e Bulange -Mmengo. “Bannayuganda bonna bakimanye nti buvunaanyizibwa bwabwe okugonjoola ensonga y’ebyobulamu mu ggwanga naddala bwekituuka ku kugaba omusaay. Ensonga eno esoboka bulungi singa abantu bonna basitukiramu okulaga obujjumbize.”  Omutanda asiimye bannaddiini abeenyigidde mu nteekateeka y’okugaba omusaayi olw’okukubiriza abalala awamu n’okwenyigiramu obutereevu nebawaayo okusobola okukola ng’eky’okulabirako eri abalala okukendeeza ku bbula lyagwo. Nnyinimu agamba nti obwetaavu bw’omusaayi tebugwangawo bwatyo nasaba abantu be bonna okwenyigira mu nteekateeka eno basobole okutaasa abalala. Oluvannyuma Omulangira Crispin Jjunju Kiweewa, Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II atongozza enteekateeka eno ey’omwaka 2023. Bw’abadde ayogera ku nteekateeka eno, Omumyuka asooka owa Katikkiro Owek. Dr. Twaha Kaawaase Kigongo akikaatiriza nti teri muntu agenda kukwatagana n’obwakabaka ayinza kwejjusa neyebaza abali mu nteekateeka eno yokukungaanya omusaayi. Owek. Kaawaase asabye abantu okwemanyiiza okugaba omusaayi kyokka naafalasira abagenda okugukungaanya okuba abeetegefu naddala ku bikozesebwa kuba abantu bannyinimu beetegefu.  Akiikiridde Minisita w’ebyobulamu, Owek. Hajji Amis Kakomo akunze abantu okugaba omusaayi wakati mukukozesa nokulya emmere esobola okukola obulungi mu mibiri okuwa abantu omusaayi mu bungi. Ssentebe wa bboodi y’ekitongole ki Uganda Red Cross Society, Dr. Khalid Kirunda agamba nti omwaka oguwedde bakungaanya unit emitwalo 11,5000 ez’omusaayi kyokka alaze obwenyamivu nti wakyaliwo eddibu ddene okuweza unit emitwalo 45 ezetaagibwa buli mwaka okuwewula ku kizibu kino. Ye akulira Uganda Blood Transfusion Services, Dr. Dorothy Byabazaire Kyeyune yeebazizza abantu abaawulira ekiragiro kya Kabaka nebawaayo omusaayi.  Ku nteekateeka y’omulundi guno, Ssenkulu wa Kabaka Foundation, Omuk. Edward Kaggwa Ndagala yeebazizza bannaddiini olwokwenyigira mu nteekateeka nasaba abantu okukola nga bwebakola omwaka oguwedde nokusingawo. Enteekateeka eno etandikidde mu Kyaddondo era omwami wa kabaka, Owek. Muhammad Magandaazi Musaazi akunze abantu obuteesulirayo gwanaggamba ku nsonga eno naye beenyigiremu. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako Omumyuka Asooka owa Katikkiro Owek. Dr. Twaha Kaawaase Kigongo, Ssaabawolereza wa Buganda, baminisita, ababaka ba paalamenti Busiro ne Kyaddondo, ba mmeeya, aba boodabooda, abatakisi awamu nabantu abalala.

headline: Bbaasi ya Palamenti ebadde etwala abalwadde ba COVID-19 ekutte omuliro
text: Kampala Bbaasi ya Palamenti ebadde esaabaza abalwadde ba ssennyiga Corona ekutte omuliro mu bitundu bye Gulu.  Emmotoka eno nnamba UG 0391H ebadde egenda mu disitulikiti ye Kitgum nga etisse abalwadde ba COVID-19 abawera 25 omuliro gugikwatiddwa ku kyalo Koro ku luguudo oluva e Gulu okudda e Kampala. Omukutu guno ogwa Gambuuze tegunakakasa balwadde bameka abafunye ebisago mu kabenje kano wabula kikakasiddwa nti, tewali afudde. Poliisi ya Bazinyamooto yamaze dda okutuuka mukifo kino era nga yatandise dda okulwana okuguziyiza wabula nga ekivuddeko omuliro guno tekinategeerekeka. Ebisingawo ku ggulire lino tubireeta.

headline: Ppaapa Benedict aziikiddwa, Obwakabaka busaasidde Ekleziya
text: Omutukuvu Ppaapa Benedict XVI aziikiddwa olwaleero ku Lwokuna wakati mu Nnamungi w’omuntu akungaanye ku Saint Peter’s Square okumuwerekera. Ebidde bikubiddwa wakati nga abamu ku bannaddiini n’abaweereza ababadde basitudde omulambo gwa Paapa okugufulumya Basilica wakati nga Bakalidinaali ababadde bambadde eminagiro emimyuufu batunula mu nnyike ey’amaanyi. Mu Uganda wabaddewo ekitambiro kya mmisa mu lutikko e Lubaga ekulembeddwamu omubaka wa Paapa mu Uganda Ssaabasumba Luigi Bianco nga yeetabiddwamu abantu ab’enjawulo okuli; Abeepisikoopi, bannaddiini, ababaka ba Palamenti awamu n’abantu ba bulijjo. Bw’abadde ayogerako eri abakkiriza, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga asaasidde Ekleziya Katolika olw’okufa kwa Ppaapa Benedict gw’ayogeddeko ng’omukulembeze omulungi eyakola ennyo okunyweza ennono Kleziya kweyimiridde. Mu bubaka bwe, Katikkiro atenderezza nnyo Ppaapa Benedict XVI, olw’obwetowaze n’obunyiikivu bwe yayolesa mu bukulembeze bwe, n’asaba abakulembeze abalala okumulabirako, babeere beetowaze, bawulirize abantu. Abakuutidde n’okuba abanyiikivu basobole okutuusa be bakulembera ku buwanguzi. Ye Ssaabasumba w’essaza ekkulu erya Kampala, Paul Ssemogerere ategeezezza nti omugenzi ye muntu eyali yekkiririzaamu mu buli kyakola era buli kyeyakola yali akulembeza Katonda. Ye Ssentebe w’Olukiiko lw ‘Abeepisikoopi mu, Omusumba Anthony Zziwa asaasidde nnyo Paapa Francis n’omubaka wa Paapa mu Uganda olw’okuvibwako mukwano gwe nayogera ku mugenzi ng’omuntu alwanye olutalo olulungi nga ajja kusigala nga ajjukirwa. Okusaba kwetabiddwako abakungu ab’enjawulo okuli; Omubaka wa Italy mu Uganda Massimiliano Mazante; Oweek Mulwanyammuli Ssemwogerere; Hon. Mathias Mpuuga, Oweek Mitimbo Gonzaga Kagumba, bannaddiini, Oweek Nakate Cotilda, bannabyabufuzi, abakungu, n’abakulembeze ku mitendera egy’enjawulo . Ppaapa Benedict XVI yafa nga 31 Decemba 2022 ku myaka 95 wabula ajjukirwako ekyafaayo ng’omu ku ba Ppaapa abatono abakalekulira obuvunaanyizibwa buno.

headline: Olukiiko lwa Buganda luyisizza ebiteeso 6 –  lwagala endagaano y’EmmwAanyi eya kampuni ya Vinci esazibwemu
text: Olukiiko lwa Buganda luyisizza ebiteeso mukaaga mu lutuula olw’okusatu olw’omwaka ogwa 29,nerusemba endagaano yeyakolebwa wakati wa gavumenti ne kampuni ya Vinci Coffee Co. Ltd esazibwemu mu bwangu. Mu lukiiko luno olubadde lukubirizibwa Sipiika Patrick Luwaga Mugumbule luyisizza ebiteeso lweyamidde ku ndagaano eno abakiise nebakuba ebituli ku Musigansimbi ono eyaleeteddwa okulaakulanya emmwanyi kyokka nga talina ssente, nebalabula gavumenti ku ndagaano ekika kino. Abakiise bakkaanyiza awatali kwekutulamu endagaano eno esazibwemu kuba terina kalungi kegenda kuleeta eri abalimi b’emmwaanyi mu Uganda ne Buganda. Olukiiko lusembye Katikkiro okulondoola ensonga y’okuteekawo ttabamiruka w’abalimi b’emmwanyi bonna mu Uganda,n’ekigendererwa eky’okutema empenda ez’okuyamba bannayuganda okusigala mu bulimi n’obusuubuzi bw’emmwaanyi. Mu ngeri yeemu Olukiiko luvumiridde abantu abatulugunya abavubi, abalunnyanja, nabalunzi b’ebyenyanja n’ekigendererwa ky’okwagala okubagoba mu nnyanja n’okubagoba mu mulimu gw’okulunda ebyenyanja nelusaba kino kibeereko ekkomo. Olukiiko lusembye Obwakabaka okuteekawo enkola enayamba okulambika abantu ku nsonga y’ennyimbe mu Buganda awamu n’okubabangula ku by’obusika, n’ebiteeso ebirala okusobola okutaasa obuwangwa n’ennono za Buganda. Olukiiko lusembye nti mu ngeri eyenjawulo luseewo amaanyi mu kugunjula n’okutendeka omwana ow’obulenzi mu Buganda.

headline: Buganda ettukizza okubanja Federo – Minisita Mpanga
text: Masengere Obwakabaka bwa Buganda buzzeemu nate okubanja enfuga ey’enkola ya Federo erudde ng’eyaayaanirwa wabula nga mpaawo kituukibwako, busobole okuyambako gavumenti ku mugugu gwe yeetisse ogw’okulabirira n’okulaakulanya abantu. Minisita wa Buganda ow’ensonga ez’enkizo, Daudi Mpanga y’abotodde ekyama kino bw’abadde mu Masengere olunaku lwaleero ku Lwokusatu. Owek. David Mpanga agambye nti ku luno essira balitadde ku kusomesa bannayuganda ebirungi ebiri mu nfuga eya Federo era bakimanye nti si ya Buganda yokka wabula ya Uganda yonna, era ng’akkiriza nga kino kijja kuyambako okugibanja mu bwangu. “Tugenda kumanyisa era twagazise abantu enkola eno eruubirirwamu okugabana obuyinza, bo bagibanje bannabyabufuzi.” Owek. Mpanga bw’annyonnyodde. Okusinziira ku Owek. Mpanga, ensonga eno tesobola kwawulwa ku byabufuzi kubanga obuyinza kwe butambulira. Ku biriwo, Owek. Mpanga agamba nti enkola ya Federo y’engeri yokka esobola okukkiriza abantu okukola emirimu awatali kwesojja nga bonna balulunkanira obuyinza obwawamu. Ono alaze nti abantu basaanye okukimanya nti Federo etumbula obumu n’enkulaakulana esobola okukuza ebitundu kubanga buli kitundu kya ggwanga kiba kiganyulwa mu bugagga bwakyo.  “Uganda okutebenkera n’okufuna emirembe gye tunoonya twetaaga Federo,” Bw’atyo bw’akkaatirizza. Kinajjukirwa nti Obwakabaka bwa Buganda buludde nga busaba enkola ey’okugabana obuyinza  era ng’ensonga eno yeemu ku biri mu nteekateeka Nnamutayiika y’Obwakabaka ezimanyiddwa nga Ssemasonga ettaano. Era okunnoonyereza okwasemba okukolebwa omulamuzi Benjamin Odoki, kwalaga nti abantu ebitundu 65 ku buli 100 mu bitundu bya Uganda bayaayaanira enfuga eno, wadde tekimanyiddwa lwaki n’okutuuka kati eno teweebwanga bannansi.

headline: Omubaka wa palamenti ya Bolivia yerangiridde ku bwa pulezidenti
text: Jeanine Anez  Amyuka akulira palamenti ya Bolivia ey’okuntikko [Senate] Jeanine Anez yerangiridde nti kati ye mukulembeze wa Bolivia omuggya, oluvanyuma lw’okulekulira kwa pulezidneti Evo Morales, omumyukawe Alvaro Garcia Linera, awamu n’akulira palamenti eyawaggulu [Senate] Adriana Salvatierra. Okusinziira ku ssemateeka wa Bolivia, omumyuka wa pulezidenti yateekeddwa okumuddira mu bigere, bwaba taliwo, omukubiriza wa palamenti yaddako. Kyokka banno bombi essawa eno tebaliyo oluvanyuma lw’okusindikirizibwa abeekalakaasi. Abekibiina kya Morales bagezezaako okulemesa Anez, ng’ono abadde kuludda oluvuganya gavumenti okutwala obukulembeze, oluvanyuma lw’okugaana okulabikako mu palamenti okusalawo nga bakuba akalulu. Morales wetwogerera bino nga mutaka mu ggwanga lya Mexico gyeyaweereddwa obubudamu olw’okutya okutuusibwako obulabe. Okwekalakaasa okutasalako kwawaliriza Morales okulekulira. Ono abadde amaze ku bwa pulezidenti emyaka 14. Ekyatanula okwekalakaasa mu Bolivia, ke kalulu akaakubwa ssabbiiti nga ssatu emabega akawangulwa Morales wabula nga ab’oludda oluvuganya bagamba ono yabba kabbe. Ebimu kubitongole ebyakuuma akalulu kano byategeeza nti bwebyatunuulira ebyava mu kalulu, byakizuula nti waliwo okukyusibwakyusibwa okwamanyi mubyava mu kulonda nebigamba nti mumbeera eyo, kizibu okumanya ani yawangula akalulu mubutuufu wakati wa Morales ne Carlos Mesa eyamuvuganya.

headline: Pulezidenti Museveni atadde omukono ku tteeka  erikkiriza abaterese ne NSSF okumala emyaka 10 okuweebwa ssente
text: Omukulembze w’eggwanga, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni atadde omukuno ku ku nnongoosereza mu tteeka ly’ekittavvu ky’abakozi  ekya National Social Security Fund (NSSF) erigenda okusobozesa abakozi abawezezza emyaka 45 nga baterekedde emyaka 10 okufuna ku nsimbi zaabwe ez’ebukadde 20%.  Kino kiwalirizza ababaka b’abakozi mu Palamenti okusaba NSSF etandike ku nteekateeka eno mu bbanga lya mwezi gumu abakozi basobole okufuna ku ssente zaabwe.  Okusinziira ku bubaka obuweerezeddwa omuwandiisi wa Pulezidenti ow’ensonga z’amawulire, Linda Nabusaayi ng’ayita ku mukutu gwe ogwa Twitter n’akakasa ng’omukulembeze bw’atadde omukono ku tteeka lino eryayisibwa Palamenti gye buvuddeko.  Kino kitegeeza nti abakozi ababadde batereka n’ekitongole  okumala emyaka 10, nabo abawezezza emyaka 45 baakufuna ebitundu 20 ku nsimbi zino ze babadde batereka.  Bo abaliko obulemu abawezezza emyaka 40 n’omusobyo bagenda kuweebwa ebitundu 50 ku buli 100 ku nsimbi zaabwe.  Era etteeka lino erikakasiddwa Pulezidenti Museveni zitaddewo ekibonerezo kya kusibwa myaka ettaano oba okutanzibwa amagoba ga bitundu 20 ku buli 100 ku nsimbi ze baba balina okuwaayo eri ekitongole kino.  Abamu ku  babaka  bagamba nti ensimbi zino zigenda kuyambako ku nnyota n’ebizibu by’ensimbi abakozi bye badde bayitamu olwa Ssennyiga Corona.

headline: Owek. Kyewalabye asabye ebitongole okunoonya ssente ezinaavujirira emirimu
text: Minisita w’ Obuwangwa, Ennono, Obulambuzi, Olulimi n’ Ebyokwerinda mu Buganda, Owek. David Kyewalabye Male asabye ebitongole ebiggwa mu minisitule gyatwala okunoonya ensimbi bisobole okuvujirira emirimu gyabyo mu mwaka gw’ebyensimbi omuggya. Okusaba kuno Owek. Kyewalabye akukoze alabiseeko mu kakiiko k’ebyobuwangwa, ennono, embiri ebyobulambuzi n’ebyokwerinda akakulirwa Owek. Kironde Kisuule ng’ alambulula ku bituukiddwako awamu n’ebigenda okukolebwa mu mwaka gw’ebyensimbi ogwa 2021/2022. Minisita Kyewalabye abuulidde akakiiko kano nga bwebataddewo enkola ekulaakulanya eby’obulambuzi mu mwaka gw’ebyensimbi oguwedde ogwa 2021/2022 omuli; okuddaabiriza Amasiro, embiri z’Omutanda, Okunyikiza ensonga z’ Ebika, okubbulula empisa y’okwabya ennyimbe, emikolo gy’okwanjula awamu n’enkozesa y’ olulimi Oluganda. Owek. Male ategeezezza akakiiko kano nti baliko n’ettaka lyebaawa Abataka b’Ebika era kati Minisitule kyeri mu kukola kwekulaba nti ebikolebwako bimatiza kuba bakizudde ng’ettaka ekika kino limaririza litundiddwa abayima nekikosa enkulaakulana. Ono abuulidde akakiiko kano ng’ ennyumba ya Muzibuazaalampanga esangibwa mu masiro e Kasubi bwegenda okumalirizibwa mu mwezi gw’e 12 omwaka guno era nakakasa nti omulimu ogukoleddwa gwa mutindo ogutuukana n’ekitiibwa kyaayo. Mu birala ebikoleddwa, Owek. Kyewalabye agamba mulimu okuzimba embiri omuli olwe Nkoni n’endala, okuzimba Bujjabukula, okussa ebibumbe by’ Ebika ku luguudo Kabakanjagala era wano wasabidde ebika ebitanaba kuteekako bibumbe okukikola mu bwangu. Owek. Kyewalabye akakasizza akakiiko kano ng’ebitundu 70 ku buli 100 ku katala eryaweebwa Minisitule ye bwebikoleddwa era akakasa nti ebitundu 30 ku buli 100 ebibulayo bigenda kukolwako omwaka guno. Kinajjukirwa nti mu nteekateeka y’okwongera okunnyikiza emirimu nga buyita mu mbalirira y’omwaka gw’ebyensimbi 2022/ 2023, obukiiko bw’olukiiko obw’enjawulo bwatandika okutunula mu mirimu gya Minisitule ez’enjawulo okwekeneenya ebikoleddwa, ebisuubirwa okukolebwa awamu n’empenda n’ebirowoozo eby’enjawulo ebinaayamba okutuukiriza bino.

headline: Oweek. Ssebuggwawo alondeddwa ku bwapulezidenti bwa FDC
text: Mmeeya wa divizoni ye Lubaga Oweek. Joyce Nabbosa Ssebuggwawo, alondeddwa okubeera pulezidenti w’ekibiina ki Forum for Democratic Change (FDC)oluvanyuma lwa pulezidenti Patrick Oboi Amuriat okugenda avuganye banaakwatira ekibiina bbendera ku bwapulezidenti. Mmeeya Nabbosa Ssebuggwawo Kino kilangiriddwa omumyuka w’omwogezi w’ekibiina ki FDC John Kikonyogo, bwabadde ku mukolo gw’okuzzaayo empapula okuva mwabo abagala okwesimbawo ku bwapulezidenti. Kikonyogo yategeezezza nti, nabadde ssentebe w’ekibiina Wasswa Biriggwa alagiddwa okudda ebbali asobole okwesimbawo mu kamyufu k’ekibiina. Bwabadde azzaayo empapula  ze, Amb. Wasswa Biriggwa yategeezezza nga bwalina essuubi nti bannakibiina bagenda kumulonda abakwatire bbendera mu kalulu ka 2021. Biriggwa  agamba yeetegese okukola singa bannayuganda banaaba bamulonze okubeera pulezidenti wabwe. Yasuubizza okutandikira ku kutumbula tekinologiya n’amagezi aga sayansi  era abikozese okuyamba abavubuka okwefuna emirimu,  kiyambe n’okulaakulanya eggwanga. Biriggwa yeeyamye mu nnaku ze ekikumi ezisooka okuwa buli maka ssente emitwalo 10 zibayambe okweyimirizaawo kubanga ebyenfuna olwa COVID-19 bwatyo nasuubizza n’okuwa abavubuka ssente z’entandikwa bakyuse obulamu bwabwe. “Bwenafuuka pulezidenti njakuba okulaba nga abayizi abatikkirwa bafuna emirimu. Abaana abamaze okusoma kati baddayo mu maka g’abazadde babwe bebabalabirira, ensi engagga nga Uganda eremwa etya okufunira abantu baayo emirimu?,” Birigwa bweyabuuzizza. Amb. Biriggwa yategeezezza nti agenda kutandikira ku kukyusa bya bulimi, alabe nga abantu balima ebintu ebimala ate abayambe okubifunira akatale wamu n’okuzzaawo ebibiina by’obwegassi gavumenti ya Museveni byeyajjawo. Ate yye Eng. Patrick Amuriat yagambye nti, alina ebisaanyizo byonna era nga taliko nziro yonna nasaba ekibiina kimwesige kubanga yasobola okuwa Uganda ebiseera eby’omumaaso ebyeyagaza. Yasuubizza okukyusa eby’enjigiriza kubanga obukugu abulina kuba omusomesa omutendeke.  Yagambye nti bwanawangula obwapulezidenti wakuwa buli muyizi wa sekendule ekyuma ki Kompyuta kubanga ensi kati etambulira ku magezi ga sayansi ne tekinologiya. Amuriat yagambye nti nebwanaaba tawangudde kalulu kano agenda kuwagira anabeera awangudde basobole okutwala eggwanga n’ekibiina mu maaso. Akulira akakiiko k’ebyokulonda mu FDC  Toterebuka Bamwenda yasabye bano bombi okukuuma ekifananyi ky’ekibiina mu byonna byebakola.

headline: Obutale bw’ Obwakakabaka bwakulaakulanyizibwa – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Lubaga Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga  Ekif. File Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga, agambye nti obutale bwonna obuli wansi w’ Obwakabaka bwakulaakulanyizibwa. Bino Kamalabyonna abyogeredde ku Terefayina ya Channel 44 mu pulogulaamu ya ‘Arise and Shine’ ekubirizibwa Paul Kizza leero ku Lwokubiri. “Twagala okukola akatale k’e Bwaise kabeere ka mutindo, abakolera wo ne bajja nebatubuuza nti mmwe mutugoba? Bajja ne Loodimeeya, Meeya we Kawempe n’omubaka  Mubaraka Munyagwa. Nababuuza nti akatale mwagala tukakulaakulanye nti ye, ne mbagamba  kale mumbuulire tunakazimba tutya nga abantu batuddewo wali, nga ate beetunuulira,” Mayiga bwanyonyodde. Katikkiro agambye nti akatale bwebaba bakaddamu kazimba abakoleramu balina okusooka nebavaamu naye bagenda kudda kubanga bebakakolera. “Minisita wa Kabaka yagenda okujja atuule ku midaala! Era abakozi ab’omu butale be bajja okukolerawo ebyo bizibu bibeerawo balina okubigumira ne Nnyanja ya Kabaka tugenda kugikulakulanya era abantu  nawo balina okusooka okuvaawo,” Oweek. Mayiga bwagambye. Oweek. Mayiga era asekeredde abalowooza nti abantu balina kubakuumira mu kutya okusobola okubafuga. Ono aludde abatta abantu okukimanya nti ensi tugilyako makoola era nasaba okwewala okutyoboola eddembe ly’abantu. ku Kirwadde ki sennyiga Corona, Katikkiro Mayiga asabye abantu okwekuuma ekirwadde kino era bakole buli kimu okubwetangira. Katikkiro anyonyodde nga okusoomoozebwa kwasinze okufuna, kwe kwebuuza obanga abavubuka balaba byagezaako okubalaga era n’okwebuuza oba abantu bamutegedde ku nteekateeka ez’enjawulo.

headline: Aba NUP balumirizza aba NRM okugulirira ababaka baabwe
text: Kampala Abakulembeze b’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP)  basonze olunwe mu bannaabwe aba National Resistance Movement (NRM) okugulirira ababaka  baabwe mu bitundu by’eggwanga ebyenjawulo. Bino we bijjidde ng’omwezi tegukyawera ababaka abalonde balayizibwe era batandika okukola emirimu gyabwe. Kyokka NUP egamba nti abantu baabwe babamazeeko emirembe nga babasuubiza ssente. Ssaabawandiisi wa NUP, David Lewis Rubongoya, ekyama kino yakibikkudde ku lunaku lwaggulo ku Lwokubiri bwe yabadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku kitebe ky’ekibiina e Kamwokya. “Ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza kifuba okwogereza bakkansala n’ababaka baffe buli wamu nga babasuubiza ssente. Okwemulugunya kuno tukufunye mu bungi.” Rubongoya bwe yagambye. “Tosobola nakkikiriza nti bano abatandise okugulirira abantu baffe ate be baali batuyita abayaaye.” Rubongoya yasabye abakulembeze okusigala nga bagumu era banywerere ku ddoboozi ly’abantu era beesambe okusendebwasendebwa aba NRM. Ssaabawandiisi yasinzidde wano n’ategeeza nga bwe bategese olusirika lw’ekibiina olw’ennaku ebiri okutandika ku Lwokutaano luno okusobola okwekubamu ttooci. Guno si gwe gusoose  nga aba NUP balumiriza aba NRM okugulirira abantu baabwe. Bwe twali tusemberera akalulu ka 2021, abamu ku bannakibiina kya NUP baava mu lwokaano ne balekera aba NRM.  Wabula bino akulira ebyamawulire mu NRM, Emmanuel Dombo, abiwakkanyizza n’ategeeza nti NRM erina omuwendo gwe yeetaaga okuyisaawo ebiteeso byayo nga tesobola kugulirira ba NUP.

headline: Ab’e Mawogola balambudde Pulojekiti z’essaza ne bakubiriza abantu okukola ennyo
text: Ssembabule Abakulira essaza lya Beene erya Mawogola n’Omumyuka wa Muteesa, Suzan Namukwaya, balambudde pulojekiti ez’enjawulo ezikolebwa ku ttaka ly’essaza okukuba ttooci we zituuse wamu n’okusoomoozebwa okuboolekedde. Amyuka Muteesa Suzan Namukwaya ne Noordin Ssesanga Bano abaakedde okulambula Pulojekiti zino wamu n’okuziteesaako ssabbiiti ewedde ku kitebe ky’essaza, baalaze okusoomoozebwa olw’abantu aboogera okwesenza ku ttaka lino n’okwonoona ezimu ku pulojekiti ze balinako. Omumyuka wa Muteesa, Suzan Namukwaya, yannyonnyodde nti ekizibu ky’abeesenza ku ttaka lino kinene era nga bayise abeesenzaako okulaba engeri gye bagonjoola ekizibu kino nga bali wamu. Oluvannyuma lw’okulambula pulojekiti zino, Namukwaya yagambye nti batunuulidde okwongera ku pulojekiti ze balina nga balima kasooli wamu n’ebijanjaalo, kibayambe okwongeza ku nnyingiza y’essaza. Alabirira pulojekiti z’essaza, Mutumba Deogratius yalaze ng’olusuku lwa yiika 15 lwe balina bwe luyambye era nga bafunamu ssente eza buli mwezi. Ono yagasseeko nti kuno baali bagasseeko emmwanyi wabula nezikosebwa omusana era nga bategeka kusimbamu ndala sizoni ejja. Mutumba yategeezezza nti olusuku luno luyambye nnyo abantu mu Ssembabule nga abasinga mwe bagula emmere awatali kugenda walala naye ng’ekizibu kye balina akadde kano bwe bubbi bw’emmere obuyitiridde mu kitundu kino. Ayabadde omukubiriza w’olukiiko luno, Ssesanga Noordin, yalaze obwetaavu bw’okwongera ku pulojekiti z’essaza. Mu birala bye bagenda okukola mulimu okulunda ente n’embuzi, kisobozese okugaziya ennyingiza y’essaza era kiyambe okuyimirizaawo ttiimu y’omupiira ey’essaza n’emirimu emirala.

headline: Obwakabaka bulonze olukiiko olugenda okwekenneenya amateeka g’omupiira gw’amasaza
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda, nga buyita mu minisitule y’abavubuka, ebyemizaanyo n’okwewummuza, bulonze olukiiko lw’abantu 8, okukola ennongoosereza mu mateeka agagenda okuddukanya empaka z’amasaza. Olukiiko olulondeddwa lukulirwa Bainamani Bernard, Omuwandiisi Festus Kirumira ate bammemba kuliko; Frank Kyazze, Haruna Kyobe, Ruth Nalwanga, Mwanje Dan, Richard Kirabira ne Simon Nsubuga “Tubasuubira okutuggyirayo amateeka agasobola okutuyamba okuzimba empaka zino nga mu kino balina okulaba nga ttiimu y’essaza esobola okweyimirizaawo, okufuba okulaba nti wabeerawo obwerufu mu kukung’aanya ensimbi n’okuzisaasaanya n’empuliziganya ku nsonga y’ensimbi. Tulowooza nti amateeka gano gajja kusikiriza bamusigansimbi ne bannamikago abasobola okuteeka ssente mu muzannyo gw’omupiira.” Omuk. Ssejjengo bw’agambye. Ono agamba nti ttiimu zino zibadde zisanga obuzibu bunene okweyimirizaawo wakati ng’abawagizi tebaliiyo mu bisaawe olw’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kyokka nga waliyo abavugirizi ne bannamikago abasobola okuzikwasizaako. Okusinziira ku ssentebe w’olukiiko oluddukanya empaka zino, Omuk. Sulaiman Ssejjengo guno gugenda kubeera mulundi gwakubiri nga bategeka empaka zino mu muggalo, era ku luno essira bagenda kuliteeka ku kugema abazannyi era olukiiko olulondeddwa lugenda kulung’amya ku kirina okukolebwa. Agenda okukulira olukiiko luno, Bernard Bainamani ategeezezza nti omulimu ogwabwe omukulu gwakukola nnongoosereza mu mateeka agaliwo naye ate si be balina obuyinza obusembayo ku nsonga eno. “Ogwaffe gwakukung’aanya birowoozo naffe tugattemu ebyaffe tubisindike eri akakiiko akateesiteesi ak’empaka z’amasaza. Batuwadde ebbanga lwa wiiki 2 okuva olwaleero era tutandikiddewo emirimu gyaffe era tetulowooza kusukka bbanga lituweereddwa.” Bainamani bw’ategeezezza. Kinajjukirwa nti empaka z’amasaza ze zimu ku zisinga obuganzi mu ggwanga lino wabula emyaka egiyise zibadde zitawaanyizibwa nnyo ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ekyateeka eggwanga ku muggalo.

headline: Kabuleta asuubizza okukyusa ebyenfuna bya Uganda
text: Kampala Omusumba era omu ku beegwanyiza obwapulezidenti bwa Uganda mu kalulu ka 2021, Joseph Kabuleta, ategeezezza nga bw’agenda okulaba ng’ateekawo obwenkanya mu byenfuna, bannansi basobole okubaako akasente ke bateeka mu nsawo. Kabuleta nga ayogerako eri bannamawulire Kabuleeta agambye nti ekimu ku bintu ebyamukase okwesimbawo kwe kuba nti ebyobugagga bya Uganda teganyula abantu balubatu so si bannansi bonna. Ono ategeezezza nti kyenkana bannayuganda baafuuka baddu era nga kino kye kimuleese okulaba ng’a banunula mu lutalo lw’ebyenfuna. “Omulamwa ng’enda kuguteeka ku bintu bya nsimbi, ebyenfuna n’ebintu ebiringa ebyo. Tuzze wano okulwanyisa bwavu era ng’eno y’ensonga lwaki tuli wano,” Kabuleta bw’annyonnyodde. Ono alaze nga bwekiri ekizibu okwawula okwenunula mu by’enfuna ku kununula eggwanga kubanga bino bitambulira wamu mu ngeri ya ggi n’enkoko. Omusumba Kabuleta annyonnyodde nti kigenderere gavumenti okukuumira abantu mu bwavu kubanga ekimanyi nti abantu abaavu, bangu okufuga. Kabuleta agamba nti eno y’ensonga lwaki omukulembeze aliko asobodde okubakulembera okumala emyaka 35 mu nfuga etali nnungi. Wabula bino munne bwe bakakasiddwa Fred Mwesigye, abiwakanyizza n’ategeeza nti embeera Uganda mw’eri Katonda yekka y’asobola okuginunula era ono n’asaba bannayuganda okwekwata Katonda okusobola okwetaasa ku mbeera.

headline: Golola aweze okuyimusa omutindo gwa Tooro United FC
text: Omutendesi wa kiraabu ya Tooro United omuggya Edward Golola, yeeyamye okukyusa ttiimu eno efuuke eky’okulabirako esobole okuzzaawo ettutumu lyaayo. Bweyabadde ayogerako eri akakiiko ak’ekikugu oluvanyuma lw’okumwanjula  ku Tavern Woods e Kabuusu ku Lwokusatu, Golola yasuubizza okuzzaayo ttiimu eno mu Uganda Premier League. “Twagala okufuula Tooro United FC eky’okulabirako naddala mu kuzuula ebitone ebipya era nga nkakasa nti ttiimu eno ejja kutuwa ekyo kyenyini kyetwagala, nze ndi muwanguzi era nkakasa tujja kuwangula buli mupiira, “ Golola bweyategeezezza. Abalala abagenda okuyambako Golola kuliko; Simon Ddungu amyuka omutendesi, Moses Oloya atendeka bakwasi ba ggoolo, Jamada Magaasi ne Fred Kasendeke owa ttiimu y’abato. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako omubaka wa Fort Portal mu palamenti Alex Ruhunda, ssenkulu wa ttiimu eno Richard Epieru ne pulezidenti waayo Alice Namatovu.

headline: Pulezidenti Museveni alagidde akalulu ka mmeeya w’ e Ntebe kaddemu okubalibwa
text: Kampala Omukulembeze w’eggwanga, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, ayingidde mu nsonga z’akalulu k’e Ntebe akaaviiriddeko omujaasi w’eggye erikuuma Pulezidenti erya ‘Special Forces Commabd (SFC), okukuba omuwagizi essasi eryamusse ate abalala babiri ne bagendera ku bisago. Abamu ku bawagizi nga beekalakaasa Eggulo ku Lwokubiri, Maj. Anthony Mbaziira okuva mu SFC yategeezezza abaabadde beekalakaasa nti Pulezidenti Museveni agenda kusisinkana abeesimbyewo aba NRM wamu n’owa Democratic Party (DP), abagamba nti babbiddwako obuwanguzi bwabwe. “Pulezidenti Museveni ayagala akalulu kaddemu okubalibwa era oyo yenna anaasangibwa nga ye yawangudde akalulu kano, y’agenda okulangirirwa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda. Agenda kusisinkana abaabadde beesimbyewo bonna, abasaba musigale nga muli bakkakkamu.” Maj. Mbaziira bwe yagambye. Akulira ebyokulonda mu Wakiso, ku Lwokubiri yalangiridde Fabrice Rulinda atalina kibiina nga mmeeya wa Munisipaali y’e Ntebe omulonde, ekintu ekyatabudde abawagizi ba NRM ne DP. Olwokaano luno lwabaddemu abeesimbyewo 6 okuli; Vincent Kayanja Depaul owa DP, Mohammad Kawuma atalina kibiina, Fabrice Rulinda atalina kibiina, Micheal Mutebi owa NRM ne Kenneth Ssimbwa owa ANT. Oluvannyuma lw’okulangirira Rulinda nti y’awangudde, abawagizi ba NRM ne DP batabuse nga bagamba nti tekisoboka kuba Rulinda yabadde akutte ekifo kyakusatu era wano baatandise okwekalakaasa amagye agakuuma omukulembeze w’eggwanga ne galeetebwa okukakkanya embeera. Wakati ng’abapoliisi bagobagana n’abeebyokwerinda, amasasi gaakutte ssentebe wa NRM owa Kitubulu – Katabi, Eric Kyeyune era n’afiirawo ate n’abalala babiri ne batwalibwa mu malwaliro nga bali bubi.

headline: Omusumba w’e Masaka alabudde abalemedde mu kweraguza
text: Omusumba w’essaza ly’Eklezia Katolika ery’e Masaka, Serverus Jjumba, atabukidde abantu abakyaleddemu ebikolwa eby’okweraguza ssaako okusamira mu kifo ky’okweyuna amasinzizo ne batendereza omutonzi. Omusumba Jjumba okwogera bino yasinzidde mu kigo ky’e Buyaga mu Disitulikiti y’e Masaka ku mukolo gw’okutema evvuunike okuzimba enju y’abasoserodooti esookedde ddala ku kigo kino ekikyali ekipya era nga ku mukolo guno kwabaddeko n’okusonda ssente ez’okudduukirira enteekateeka eno. Emikolo gino gyatandise n’ekitambiro ky’emmisa era Omusumba Jjumba yasinzidde wano n’asaba abakristu okudda eri Katonda kuba kino kye kibalemesezza okukulaakulana. Ono yasabye abazadde n’abaana okunnyikiza enkola y’okusoma Sappule nga beesingira ku Bikira Maria omuwolereza w’ekigo kino. Omusumba Jjumba era yawabudde abakrisitu okunyweza enkolagana ssaako n’okuyambagana kubanga kino kyokka kye kigenda okuyamba okusobola okunnyikiza obumu ssaako n’okukulaakulanya abantu ba Katonda Ye Ssaabakristu w’essaza ly’e Masaka, Regina Kitaka, yasabye abavubuka obuteesamba Klezia w’Omukama wamu n’okusaba abatuuze okukozesa ekigo kino obulungi. Rev. Fr. Nestus Mugisha bwannamukulu w’ekigo ky’e Buyaga yategeezezza nti abasoserodooti tebalina we basula, era nga batandise omulimo gw’okubazimbira ennyumba ku kigo kino kibasobozese okwanguyirwa obuweereza bw’Omukama. Ennyumba eno yaakuwemmenta obukadde 430 era nga ya kkalina myaliiro 2. Obukadde 24 bwe busondeddwa mu mpeke ssaako n’abasuubizza era ngomulimu guno nga guwedde baakutandika obuzimba Eklezia.

headline: KCCA Eyimirizza Empooza Yonna Ku Takisi
text: Betty Amongi Minisita atwala KCCA Ekitongole ekiddukanya ekibuga Kampala ekya KCCA olwaleero kiyimirizza essente ez’enjawulo ezijjibwa ku bagoba ba takisi. Mu ziggyiddwawo kuliko essente z’okuyingira mu paaka eziri wakati w’ennusu 1000-4500, ez’okutikka eziri wakati wa 3,000 ne 20,000 wamu n’ezikola ku mbeera z’abakozi eziri wakati wa 20,000 ne 50,000.Minisita akola ku nsonga za Kampala Betty Amongi yategeezezza nt ekiragiro kye kitandika enkya ku Lwokuna okukola. Ono yategeezezza nti bafunye okwemulugunya okuva mu bagoba ab’enjawulo nga bagamba nti essente ezibasabibwa nnyingi nnyo. Okuyimiriza kuno ku genda kumala omwezi gumu nga KCCA bweyeebuuza ku bekikwatako. Essente endala era eziyimiriziddwa kuliko obukadde obubiri obujjibwa ku mugoba ayeegasse ku siteegi mu ppaka. Ono era yalabudde abakulembeze ba takisi obutagezaako kujjayo ssente mu banka mu kaseera kano. Ono era yategeezezza nti baafunye okwemulugunya ku bannanyini ppaka abajjako abantu essente ennyingi. Amongi yategezezza nti bakkiriziganyizza ne bannanyini mmotoka obutajjako bavuzi ssente ezisukka mu 3500 olunaku. KCC yakaksa ppaka munaana nga kuzzo; Namayiba, Kisenyi ne Namirembe ziri ku ttaka ly’abantu baabulijjo. URN

headline: Omulamuzi Byabakama: Abawakanya ebyavudde mu kalulu k’Omoro bagende mu kkooti
text: Ssentebe w’Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda omulamuzi Simon Byabakama, awakanyizza ebyogerwa ab’oludda oluvuganya nga akalulu k’ Omoro bwekabadde Vvulugu n’okugulirira abalonzi nti bino si bituufu kuba ye yennyini yaliyo naye bweba balina obujulizi balumbe kkooti. Kino kiddiridde ebibiina ku ludda oluvuganya okuwakanya obuwanguzi bwa munnakibiina ki National Resistance Movement (NRM), Andrew Ojok eyawangula akalulu kano nadda mu kifo kya kitaawe eyali Sipiika Jacob Oulanyah. Omulamuzi Byabakama agamba nti yaliyo mu kalulu kano era amateeka agakwatagana n’akalulu gagobererwa bulungi. “Ekizibu kyetulina mu bigambo by’okugulirira abalonzi, ababyogera ate si beetegefu kuvaayo bawaabe ebikolwa bino eri ab’obuyinza wadde bakimanyi nti musango oguvunaanibwa mu mateeka g’ebyokulonda. Naye etteeka terisobola kuluma nga teriyambiddwako kuteekebwa mu nkola ate okuliteeka mu nkola walina okubaawo aloopa ku poliisi,” Byabakama bwe yagambye. Byabakama yannyonnyodde nti amateeka malambulukufu ku nsonga y’okugulirira abalonzi nasaba abalina obujulizi okugenda mu kkooti esazeemu akalulu kano. Ono yakkiriza nga akulira oludda oluvuganya mu Palamenti, Owek. Mathias Mpuuga bweyamukubira essimu namutegeeza nga bwewaliwo abantu ba NUP abaali bakwatiddwa era namusaba akwatagane ne Kamisona wa poliisi eyali adduumira eby’okwerinda. Okusinziira ku Byabakama, Kamisona wa poliisi yamutegeeza nti balina munnakibiina ki NUP gwebali bakutte oluvannyuma lw’okumwekengera nga ayinza okutabangula akalulu kano era byebyo byeyasobola okumutegeeza. Byabakama agamba nti mu kalulu kano abantu balina eddembe okutambula wonna kuba tewaliwo muntu yenna gwebaali bakugira kutambula.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga agamba Musigansimbi atalina nsimbi talina kyagenda kugatta ku Mmwaanyi
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga alaze obutali bumatiivu ku ndagaano y’emmwanyi gavumenti gyeyakola ne kampuni ya Uganda Vinci Coffee Company gyagamba nti tegenda kuganyula balimi okuggyako okufiiriza n’okugoba kampuni endala mu kusuubula emmwaanyi ekigenda okufiiriza gavumenti omusolo. Okwogera bino Katikkiro abadde mu lukiiko lwa Buganda olwa 29 olutuula olw’okusatu olutudde mu kisenge ky’Olukiiko nga lubadde lukubirizibwa Sipiika, Owek. Patrick Luwaga Mugumbule e Bulange Mmengo. “Tuwulidde ebintu bingi ebikwata ku mmwaanyi, waliwo n’endagaano gavumenti gyeyakola ne kampuni ya Vinci Coffee Company etalina wadde omuti ogw’emmwaanyi nga ekulirwa musigansimbi atalina wadde ekikumi. Bagamba Musigansimbi atalina nsimbi, endagaano eno yakolebwa 2015 era nezibwa obuggya mu 2015”, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga bw’ategezeza. Owek. Mayiga agamba nti wadde ono yaweebwa ettaka eriweza yiika 25 mu kibuga wakati naye talina kyeyali akoleddeko wabula ekikyasembyeyo okuwulirwa kwekuba nti musigansimbi ono ate ayagala kukozesa ttaka lino yeewolereko ssente. Kamalabyonna Mayiga alabudde gavumenti ku ndagaano eno nagamba nti singa enasukka okunyigiriza abalimi bajja kuddamu okukukusa emmwaanyi mu nkola eya magendo nga bwegwali ku mulembe gwa Pulezidenti Idi Amin Dada. “Mujjukire mu myaka gy’ensanvu, Amin bwebamuteekako nati eyebyenfuna, emmwanyi, wano nezigwa ebbeeyi ng’abantu tebasobola kuzitunda mu nsi z’ebweru n’olyekyo bazikukusanga, abantu bagenda kuddamu okukusa emmwanyi kubanga balemeseddwa okuzirima n’okuzitunda mu bwesimbu nga bwekibadde olw’endagaano eno”, Owek Mayiga bweyalambuludde. Katikkiro wano wasinzidde nalagira ababaka ba palamenti abava mu Buganda okubeera abasaale mu kuwakannya endagaano eno nga bayita mu kabondo ka Buganda mu Palamenti okulaba nti etereezebwa sinakindi ereme kutekeebwa mu nkola kubanga teraga ngeri gyegenda kuyambamu abalimi b’emmwanyi. Mu lukiiko lwerumu Katikkiro era awadde gavumenti amagezi ku bbeeyi y’ebintu eyekkanamye ennyo, erowooze Ku ky’okukendeeza Ku misolo gy’ebintu okusingira ddala amafuta kubanga kyekimu kubifuga obusuubuzi ku mitendera gyonna kiyambe bannayuganda kubanga bali bubi. Mayiga akakasizza Obuganda nti obwakabaka bwa Buganda butandiseewo woofiisi za bannanampala okuyambako abaami b’amasaza gonna okutumbula empeereza mu masaza ag’enjawulo era nga bano batandikiddewo emieimu Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, Obwakabaka bweyongera okugenda mu maaso, wadde nga wabaddewo ebisoomooza era nakakasa nti baminisita emirimu gyabwe bagitambuza bulungi ekireseewo enkulaakulana era nakakasa nti abantu bongedde okulima emmwaanyi mu Buganda era nabawa amagezi obutakoowa kuzirima.

headline: Minisita Ogwanga atabuse; akutte abakozi ba gavumenti 6 lwakudibaga mirimu
text: Minisita omubeezi avunaanyizibwa kukulondoola ebyenfuna by’eggwanga, Peter Ogwang alagidde abakozi ba gavumenti 6 mu disitulikiti y’e Bugiri bakwatibwe lwakukola mirimu gya gavumenti mu ngeri ya gadibe ngalye. Ogwanga ategeezezza nti bano bafiiriza gavumenti obulindo bwa ssente olw’okwagala okwekkusa kyokka nga zibeera ziweereddwayo kuganyula bannansi abawerako ate ng’abalala tebasobola kulondoola mirimu ng’obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe bwe bulambika. Bino we bijjidde nga Minisita Ogwanga ayingira wiiki eyookubiri ng’amakanda agasimbye mu bitundu by’e Busoga okulaba embeera Pulojekiti za gavumenti mweziri wabula nga bye yaakazuula mu disitulikiti okuli Bugiri ne Namutumba byennyamiza. Ono yeetondedde abatuuze ku bubbi bwa ssente z’omuwi w’omusolo mu kitundu kino naye n’abagumya okumanya nti gavumenti ekola buliekisoboka okukendeeza ekizibu kino era wano w’asinzidde n’alagira abakozi ba gavumenti 6 bakwatibwe basobole okubitebya. Ogwanga asuubizzaokumaliriza omulimu gw’olambula Pulojekiti za gavumenti mu bitundu bya Busoga olwaleero n’oluvannyuma yeeyongereyo mu bitundu by’eggwanga ebyenjawulo. Minisitaabatuuze baloopedde Minisita ku mbeera mwe bali n’amannya g’abanene ba gavumenti mu kitundu kino abeezibika ssente ezaalina okukola emirimu. Mu bakwatiddwa mulimu akulira poliisi y’e Lwemba James Kakaire ne bayinginiya ku mitendera egiwera okuli;Mugoya Samson, Ikaaba Fred, Isiko Kalifani, Kisamba Samuel ne Mariam Wanyanya nga kati bano bakuumirwa ku poliisi y’e Bugiri.

headline: COVID-19: Abayizi bandisigala ku masomero mu luwummula
text: Agamu ku masomero agalina abayizi abali mu bibiina ebimalako omutendera ogwakamalirizo gagenda kusigazaayo abayizi ku ssomero nga tebagenda kudda waka mu luwummula okugezaako okutangira ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona.  Abayizi bano okuli; aba P.7, S.4, S.6 n’abamaliriza emisomo ku matendekero aga waggulu, baddamu okusoma nga 15/October/2020 oluvannyuma lw’okumala emyezi egiwera mukaaga nga tebasoma olwa Ssennyiga Corona.Bano bagenda kuwummula nga December 18, 2020, wabula agamu ku masomero galaze okutya ku ky’abayizi okudda awaka mu mbeera eno eya Ssennyiga Corona. Omu ku bakulira amasomero gano, Mike Sekago, agambye nti balowooza ku ky’okusigaza abayizi ku ssomero olw’okwerinda ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kuba tebamanyi kiri waka.“Ekirwadde kino kyeyongedde era tetumanyi kiyinza kutuuka ku bayizi baffe naye ate bw’otunuulira ekiseera kye bagenda okuwummula kitono nnyo, kale nga kisingako okubasigaza ku ssomero.” Sekago bwe yategeezezza.Sekago yagambye nti bajja kusabayo abazadde akasente akatono akanaabayamba okulabirira abaana bano mu kaseera kano naye era kyakuyamba abaana okusigala nga bejjukanya ku bye basomye. Ono yawagiddwa akulira ebyensoma ku City Secondary School mu Wakiso, Lawrence Kalyango, eyategeezezza nti baagala Minisitule y’ebyenjigiriza ebakkirize okusigaza abayizi mu luwummula luno kuba bakwataganye n’abayizi ne bakkiriza. “Bw’eba gavumenti yagaana okugoba abaana ffiizi ng’etya nti ewaka bajja kufunirayo Corona ate lwaki bakkiriza okubasindika ewaka mu luwummula luno olumpi ate ng’ekirwadde kikyaliwo.” Kalyango bwe yannyonnyodde. Abakungu mu Minisitule y’ebyenjigiriza baategeezezza nga bwe bafunye ekirowoozo kino naye tebasobola kukyusa kalenda kwe batambulira.Dayirekita w’okusoma okutandikirwako ne ssekendule mu Minisitule, Ismail Mulindwa, yagambye nti okulambikibwa kujja kuva mu Minisitule y’ebyobulamu era nga yejja okubawa kye balina okuzzaako. Eky’abayizi okusigala ku ssomero abamu ku bazadde omuli Twaha Mukiibi, bakiwagidde naye ne basaba abasomesa obutasaba ssente ndala kuba baabasasuzza ssente nnyingi ate nga ttaamu ebadde nnyimpi. Omulala Paul Matovu, alina omwana mu P.7 yagambye nti ekirowoozo kirungi singa abasomesa tebaddamu kubaggyako ssente.Wadde nga ye Halima Shaban agamba nti muwala we ayagala kimu kudda waka kuwummula era y’ensonga enkulu ku ye essaawa eno. URN

headline: Ppaasita eyakozesa erinnya lya Museveni nafera obuwumbi 4, asibiddwa emyaka 2
text: Omulamuzi omukulu owa Kkooti esookerwako e Luweero asingisizza omusumba Sirajje Ssemanda ne Looya we Jimmy Arinaitwe omusango gw’obufere n’abasindika mu nkomyo bamaleyo emyaka 2 n’ekitundu. Bano era balagiddwa okusasula engasi ya bukadde 405. Kkooti eno ebadde ekuliddwamu omulamuzi Gladys Kamasanyu ensala eno yagiwadde ku Lwakubiri oluvannyuma lw’okuwuliriza obujulizi bwonna obuluma Ssemanda ne Arinaitwe olw’okufera bannanyini masomero, abazadde n’abaana obuwumbi obusoba mu 4. Oludda oluwaabi nga lukuliddwa Allan Musinguzi, lwategeezezza nti bano bakozeseza ekitongole kyabwe ekya ‘Hands Across the World Intiative’ nebafuna abantu abasoba mu 5000 nga babasuubiza okubatwala ebweru, okuwa abayizi Sikaala awamu n’okubayunga ku nteekateeka ya ‘Operation Wealth Creation’ nga byonna byali byabulimba. Musinguzi yategeezezza nti Semanda yeekobana n’ abalala 2 nebasuubizza abantu abawerako okubatwala ewa Pulezidenti Museveni akole ku bizibu byabwe. Era oludda oluwaabi lwategeezezza nti mu July wa 2017, abakwate bano bategeeza abantu nga bwebamanyiganye ne Pulezidenti Museveni awamu ne muganda we Gen. Salim Saleh nebategeka okutwala abantu ku lugendo e Yisirayiri. Bano babasasuza wakati w’ emitwalo 50 n’akakadde kamu n’ekitundu ku buli muntu okugenda ku lugendo luno. Abaali basasudde ssente bakanya kulinda nga olugendo terutuuka era bwebatuukirira Akakiiko akalwanyisa enguzi mu maka g’ Obwapulezidenti (State House Anti Corruption Unit), eyasitukiramu nekwata omusumba ne banne nebayimbulwa ku kakalu. Mu mwaka 2020, Semanda bamulondoola nebamusanga ku nsalo e Mutukula nga agezaako okuddukira e Tanzania era bweyaggyibwayo yatwalibwa butereevu mu kkooti nemusindika ku alimanda e Kitalya.

headline: Tujja kukolagana n’omuntu yenna bannakenya gwe banalonda – Museveni
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveniategeezezza nti Uganda nneetegefu okukolagana n’omukulembeze yenna bannakenya gwe banaalonda ku bwapulezidenti .”Yenna anaayitamu okubeera Pulezidenti w’e Kenya. Tujja kukolagana naye kasita anaabeera ng’alondeddwa bannansi.” Museveni bw’annyonnyodde. Akalulu mu ggwanga lya Kenya kasembedde nga kagenda kubibwa nga August 9, 2022 lwe bagenda okulondera ababaka mu lukiiko lw’e ggwanga, n’olukiiko oluddako awamu n’abakulembeze omuli ba Gavana awamu n’enkiiko eza wansi. BinoMuseveni yabyogedde asiibula abadde omubaka wa Kenya mu ggwanga, AmbasadaKiema Kilonzo. Kilonzo abadde amaze emyaka 3 mu kifo kino nga yasazeewo okuddayo mu Kenya asobole okuvuganya ku kifo kya Gavana we Kitui. Okusinziira ku Museveniomukwano wakati w’amawanga gano gombi gwe gusinga amakulu nga si nsonga ani abeera awangudde obwapulezidenti enkolagana ebeera erina okugenda mu maaso. AmbasadaKilonzo yeebazizza Pulezidenti Museveni olw’okumuteerawo embeera ennungi mu myaka 3 gy’amaze mu kifo ng’esobozesezza ebyensubulagana wakati Uganda ne Kenya wadde wabaddewo ekirwadde kya Corona. Ono era yeebazizza gavumenti ne bannayuganda olw’omukwano gwe bamulaze ekisobozesezza enkolagana wakati w’amawanga gombi okugenda mu maaso. “Nga nsiibula okuva wano, njagala okukiddamu nti bannayuganda bandaze omukwano era wano wafuuse waffe.” Kilonzo bw’agambye. Kilonzo yalondebwa Pulezidenti Uhuru Kenyatta mu 2018 in 2018, okubeera Ambasada wa Kenya e Uganda.

headline: Bobi Wine agobye obukuumi bw’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda, okutongoza Manifesto akututte Mbarara
text: Kampala Pulezidenti w’ekibiina kya National Unity Plaform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine, asazeewo okutongoza Manifesto ye akutwale mu kibuga ky’e Mbarara ku Lwokutaano lwa wiiki eno. Omubaka  Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu “Ku Lwokutaano lwa wiiki eno, tugenda kutongoza manifesito yaffe mu kibuga Mbarara. Era tujja kuggulawo woofiisi zaffe mu butongole ku lunaku lwe lumu. Twabadde tutegese okutongoza manifesito yaffe eggulo ku kitebe e Kamwokya naye ndowooza mwalabye ekyabaddewo engeri ab’ebyokwerinda gye batukubye ttiyaggaasi n’amasasi,” Rubongoya bw’ategeezezza bannamawulire leero e Kamwokya. Okusinziira ku Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina kino, Lewis Rubongoya, Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi, poliisi ekyamukuumira awaka nga temukkiriza kuvaayo naye akakasizza nti, baakusala amagezi gonna okulaba ng’ono atongoza manifesito ye mu kibuga kye Mbarara. Rubongoya agambye nti bagenda kukozesa akakisa kano okuggulawo ettabi ly’ekibiina ery’ekitundu ky’Ankole okusobola okukwasaganya ensonga z’ekibiina. Ono akakasizza nga Kyagulanyi bw’agobye obukuumi obwamuweereddwa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda oluvannyuma lw’okwewandiisa ng’agamba nti bano baalemeddwa okukola omulimu gwabwe. “Pulezidenti waffe agaanye obukuumi obwamuweereddwa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda. Abo abalina okumukuuma ate be baayambye bannaabwe ab’ebyokerinda okumukwata e Kyambogo oluvannyuma lw’okwewandiisa,” Rubongoya bw’annyonnyodde. Ab’ebyokwerinda ku Lwokubiri baalemesezza Bobi Wine okutongoza manifesito ye ku kitebe kye e Kamwokya oluvannyuma nebamusibira mu maka ge. Ab’ebyokwerinda baakubye amasasi ne ttiyaggaasi era ng’abamu ku bawagizi ba Bobi Wine baafunye ebisago era nga bali mu kujjanjabibwa mu malwaliro ag’enjawulo okwetooloola eggwanga.

headline: Abasawo b’e Mulago bayambako okubbayo abalwadde – Minisitule y’ebyobulamu
text: Kampala Abamu ku basawo b’eddwaliro ekkulu e Mulago basongeddwamu okubeera emabega w’omuzze gw’okubba abalwadde mu ddwaliro lino nebabatwala mu malwaliro g’obwannanyini. Kino kibotoddwa akulira eddwaliro lino  Dr Baterena Byarugaba  eggulo ku Lwokuna bweyabadde n’abakungu ba Minisitule y’ebyobulamu nga boogerako eri bannamawulire. Dr. Baterena agamba nti byebakazuulawo biraga nti waliwo bakayungirizi abalinda abalwadde mu bifo awasimba emmotoka  ku ddwaliro lino wamu n’abasawo ababuzaabuza abalwadde nebabatwala mu malwaliro agaliraanye Mulago. Ono yalaajanidde abakulu mu Minisitule okubaako kyebakolawo kuba omuzze guno gutadde obulamu bwa bannayuganda mu matigga. Dr. Baterena yawadde eky’okulabirako ky’omwana eyagyibwa e Mulago natwalibwa mu ddwaliro ly’obwannanyini kyokka nalongoosebwa bub inga kati ensonga ziri mu kkooti ekitatanye ekifananyi ky’eddwaliro lino. Bino webijidde nga Minisita omubeezi ow’ebyobulamu Robinah Nabbanja yatandikawo okulambula eddwaliro lino buli Lwakuna okusobola okutereeza emirimu wamu n’okutumbula obuweereza nga alwanyisa obulyi bw’enguzi. Kinajjukirwa nti mu mwaka 2019, Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni yalagira amalwaliro agatunda eddwaliro naddala mu ddwaliro lino okuggalawo nga agamba nti bano bali bawandikira abalwadde eddagala eriri mu malwaliro gaabwe olwo nebabasindikayo okuligula.

headline: Abeesimbyewo bakubiriziddwa okwewala okusiga obukyayi
text: Bulange Minisita w’Obwakabaka owa gavumenti ez’ebitundu era Ssaabawolereza w’Obwakabaka, Christopher Bwanika, asabye abeesimbyewo ku bifo ebyenjawulo okwewala ebyobufuzi ebisiga obukyayi era bagondere amateeka.  Owek. Bwanika okusaba kuno yakukoze ku Lwakubiri mu bimuli bya Bulange bwe yabadde atikkula oluwalo okuva mu masaza okuli; Kyaddondo, Kyaggwe, Busiro ne Bulemeezi, ku mukolo kwe yabadde akiikiridde Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga. “Tufube nnyo okwewala ebitutwala mu butakkaanya naye Obutakkaanya obwo nga bubaddewo tufube okubugonjoola mu nkola ey’obuntubulamu so si mu kukozesa lyanyi. Twewale okutwalira amateeka mu ngalo kuba si nkola ya bugunjufu era si nkola ya Buganda.” Owek. Bwanika bwe yategeezezza. Owek. Bwanika yagumizza abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka nga kaweefube w’Obwakabaka okufuna eddwaliro bw’atambula obukwakku era nga kabbineeti yamala dda okugiyisa. Minisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ez’ebitundu, Joseph Kawuki yasinzidde ku mukolo guno, n’asaba abazadde okwagazisa abaana emirimu gye bakola kibataase okugenda ku mawanga okubonaabona nga banoonya emirimu. Ate ye Katikkiro w’Ebyalo bya Ssaabasajja Kabaka, Omuk. Moses Luutu, yaloopedde Obuganda ensonga y’abaana okubanga tebakyaleetebwa ku mikolo, nga kino kisobola okusaanyaawo ezimu ku nkola ez’ebyobuwangwa. Abaami ba Ssaabasajja abaakiise e Mbuga baawozezza olutabaalo lwabwe ku ntambuza y’emirimu gy’Obwakabaka ne balaga n’ebyo ebisinga okubasoomooza mu bitundu byabwe. Eggombolola ya Mutuba IV Kawuga okuva e Kyaggwe, ye yalidde empanga ate abaasinze okuleeta Amakula baabadde ba ggombolola Ssaabawaali Bukyama okuva mu ssaza ly’e Bulemeezi. Obukadde obusoba mu 15 bwe bwaleeteddwa okuva mu masaza gano, ssaako Amantambutambu n’Amakula ga Katikkiro ne Beene.

headline: Emisango gy’obutemu egivunaanibwa Ffaaza tegiriimu byabufuzi – Poliisi
text: Poliisi ewakanyizza ebigambibwa nti Ffaaza w’ekigo ky’eBisanje mu Masaka eyateekeddwako emisango gy’obutemu, Rev Fr. Richard Mugisha girimu ebyobufuzi. Kino kiddiridde okuteekebwako emisango gy’obutemuoluvannyuma lw’omubbi eyakwatibwa ng’agezaako okubba emmotoka y’ekika kya Harrier okufiira mu kaduukulu ka poliisi. Bw’abadde ayogerako ne bannamawulire ku Mmande, omwogezi wa poliisi mu ggwanga, Fred Enanga ategeezezza nti ku lunaku olwogerwako, omuvubuka Ronald Kyeyune, 30, yakwatibwa ng’agezaako okubba emmotoka ya Ffaaza era n’akubibwa nga Ffaaza tannayita poliisi kutaasa mbeera. “Omuvubuka ono yakwatibwa ku ssaawa 5 ez’ekiro ng’abba emmotoka, wano abavubuka n’abatuuze baatandika okumukuba era wano Ffaaza we yayitira poliisi y’e Masaka n’ejja okumutaasa. Poliisi we yatuukira ku ssaawa 7 ez’ekiro n’emutwala ku poliisi e Masaka.” Enanga bw’agambye. Okusinziira ku Enanga, ku ssaawa 12:30 ng’obudde bukedde, abakuuma ekkomera baalaba omusibe ono nga tali mu mbeerannungi era ne bategeeza abaliwo asobole okutwalibwa mu ddwaliro nga mu kaseera kano we yafiira. Abamu ku batunuulizi b’ensonga, bavuddeyo ne bategeeza nga Ffaaza Mugisha bw’avunaanwa olw’ebigambo bye yayogera ng’eggwanga ligenda mu kulonda bwe yasaba abantu mu lwatu okulonda ekibiina kya NUP awamu ne Kyagulanyi Ssentamu ku bwapulezidenti. Oluvannyuma lw’amawulire g’okuteekebwako emisango gy’obutemu, bangi baavuddeyo ne bategeeza nti bino biva ku bigambo bye yayogera nga’awagira aba Opozisoni. Enanga agamba nti temuliimu byabufuzi era okunoonyereza kwonna kwe baliko kwekuusa ku ebyo ebyaliwo ku lunaku olwo, Kyeyune lwe yafa era baagala kulaba ng’amateeka gakola ku abo abaali emabega w’ekikolwa kino, basobole okuvunaanibwa so si lwa ndowooza za byabufuzi ng’abamu bwe babadde bagamba. Ono agamba nti nga poliisi bagenda kusigala nga banoonyereza ku nsonga eno wasobole okubaawo obwenkanya.

headline: Omuk. Baker Ssejjengo akunze bavubuka okulwanyisa Mukenenya
text: Kampala Ssentebe w’olukiiko lw’abavubuka mu Buganda olwa Buganda Youth Council, Omuk. Baker Ssejjengo akunze abavubuka okuteeka ekiragiro kya Kabaka mu nkola eky’okubeera abasaale mu kulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya. Ono agambye nti wadde ng’abavubuka basanyuka nnyo olwa Ssaabasajja okubakwasa omulembe gwe n’abasosoowaza ne mu kulwanyisa obulwadde bwa Mukenenya ng’abeetoololezaako omulamwa, singa abavubuka tebeenyigiramu mulimu gwabaweebwa, Omutanda ajja kuba nga yamenyekera bwereere. Bino Omuk. Ssejjengo abyogeredde mu Masengere nga alambulula ku nteekateeka z’amazaalibwa ga Kabaka ag’emyaka 66.  “Nsaba abavubuka bonna mu Buganda ne Uganda yonna okutwaliza awamu era n’abantu bonna okuba abasaale mu kulwanyisa Mukenenya kubanga ffenna kitukakatako.” Omuk. Ssejjengo bwe yategeezezza. Omuk. Ssejjengo era yakikkaatirizza nti singa abantu bajjumbira ekola z’okulwanyisa Mukenenya essatu omuli; okuba abeesimbu eri abaagalwa baabwe, okwekuuma naddala abo abatannaba kwetuuka wamu n’okukozesa obupiira, okufuna abalwadde ba Mukenenya abapya okusukka omwaka gwa 2030 kisobola okufuuka olufumo ng’ekigendererwa ky’ekitongole ky’ensi yonna bwekiri. Omuk. Baker Ssejjengo nga y’omu ku batuula ku kakiiko akategeka amazaalibwa ga Nnamunswa ag’omulundi guno, akubirizza abantu okwenyigira mu bikujjuko by’amazaalibwa ga  Kabaka ebyakulemberwamu okusabira Ccuucu mu masinzizo ag’enjawulo. Ku Lwomukaaga luno wagenda kubaawo okusaba mu Abadiventi wamu n’ebyoto mu masaza gonna okwetoloola Buganda. Okusinziira Ku mukungu Ssejjengo, ebyoto by’omulundi guno bigenda kukolebwa misana wakati w’essaawa 8 ne 12 okusobola okukuuma ekiragiro kya kafyu ekyateekebwawo omukulembeze w’eggwanga. Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi yasiima okubeera emmunyeenye y’ekitongole ky’amawanga amagatte mu kulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya mu Africa era omulamwa gw’amazaalibwa ge ag’omulundi guno ogw’enkaaga mu omukaaga gugamba nti, “Abavubula tube basaale mu kulwanyisa Mukenenya.”

headline: Museveni alabudde abategese okucankalanya okulonda
text: Kampala Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni alabudde abaagala okutaataaganya akalulu ka 2021 n’ategeeza nti gavumenti ye yeetegese okwambalagana n’omuntu yenna anaagezaako okutabula akalulu kano. Pulezidenti Museveni nga  alamusa ku bannakibiina  Okulabula kuno Museveni akukoze ku Mmande e Kyambogo ng’ayogerako ne bannamawulire oluvannyuma lw’okukakasibwa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda ng’omu ku bantu abagenda okuvuganya ku ntebe ennene mu kalulu ka 2021. Museveni agamba nti bafunye amawulire ng’abamu ku beesimbyewo bwe bategese okutaataaganya akalulu kano bw’anaaba anoonya okweddiza entebe eno omulundi ogw’omukaaga. “Nsaba Bannayuganda mukuume emirembe mu kalulu kano.” Pulezidenti Museveni bw’agambye. Ono annyonnyodde nti wadde yeesimbyewo naye era y’akyali Pulezidenti era ng’afunye amawulire ku bamu ku bantu abaagala okutaataaganya akalulu kano n’ategeeza nti tebagenda kubaganya kutabangula mirembe gy’abantu gye baalwanirira. “Tewali muntu atusinga bwe kituuka ku kulwana. Tuwulira abantu abali mu kukolagana n’amawanga g’ebweru. Tewali mugwira agenda kutabangula mirembe wano, mugenda kufiira bwereere awatali nsonga.” Museveni bw’annyonnyodde. Museveni agumizza abawagizi be obutakkiriza kutiisibwatiisibwa ba ludda luvuganya era n’abasaba baddukire mu b’obuyinza singa ebikolwa bino bibeerawo. Museveni akubirizza abantu okunyweza ebiragiro bya COVID-19 kubanga buli lukya kyeyongera ng’abantu 110 baamaze dda okulugulamu obulamu ate ng’abakwatiddwa ekirwadde kino banaatera okuwera emitwalo 2.

headline: Tulonde: Bobi Wine akubye oluyimba n’akunga abantu okumulonda
text: Kampala Alina kkaadi ya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine, afulumizza oluyimba n’asaba abalonzi okulonda mu bungi nga January 14, basobole okweggyako Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni. Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine Mu luyimba Kyagulanyi lw’atuumye “Tulonde” agamba nti eno y’engeri yokka esoboka mu kiseera kino okusobola okumamulako Pulezidenti Museveni afuze eggwanga lino emyaka egisoba mu 35. “Okuva mu Novemba omwaka oguwedde babadde batuyigga. Aba SFC baatandikirawo okutulumba nga twakeewandiisa era olugendo lwaffe lubadde lwa ttiyaggaasi n’amasasi. Bangi ku bannaffe bafudde Nubian Li ne balala bali mu kkomera, okumaliriza kino tulina kulonda.” Wine bwe yategeezezza mu luyimba. Kyagulanyi yagambye nti oluyimba buno bubaka eri buli muntu eyeewandiisa okugenda alonde kuba gavumenti ya Pulezidenti Museveni teyeetaaga kuwa mukisa mulala. “Omusana bwegwaka, mumanye Manvuuli w’eri, bw’etonnya Manvuuli w’eri era mulonde Manvuuli.” Kyagulanyi bwe yagasseeko. Manvuuli ke kabonero akatongole ak’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform ke bakozesa mu kalulu kano. Bwe yabadde ayogera ku luyimba luno, Kyagulanyi yagambye nti aluwaddeyo eri munywanyi we, Nubian Li awamu n’abalala abali mu makomera. Okuva lwe yalaga nti agenda kesimbawo avuganye Pulezidenti Museveni mu 2018, Kyagulanyi azze akunga bannayuganda okuvaayo mu bungi balonde era nga y’omu ku abaasaba bannayuganda okwewandiisa bafune endagamuntu ezinaabayamba okwetaba mu kalulu kano.

headline: Obwakabaka Busse Omukago N’ekibiina Ky’abantu Abaliko Obulemu Okulwanyisa Mukenenya
text: Apollo Mukasa ng’assa omukono ku ndagaano ku lwa UNAPD Obwakabaka bwa Buganda busse omukago n’ekibiina ekigatta abantu abaliko obulemu ku mubiri ekya Uganda National Action on Physical Disability [UNAPD] okulwanyisa akawuka ka mukenenya mu bantu abaliko obulemu. Bwabadde assa omukono ku ndagaano eno, Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku nkulaakulana y’abantu n’ebyobulamu, Oweek. Dr. Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma, yagambye nti Ssaabasajja Kabaka alina obuvunaanyizibwa bw’okulwanyisa mukenenya mu Buganda, Uganda ne mu Maserengeta ga Africa yonna. Oweek. Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma ng’assa omukono ku ndagaano “Omulimu guno munene naye agukutte kannabwala era ayagala kumalirawo ddala mukenenya mu bantube. Abantu bonnna Ssaabasajja Kabaka abaagala era talimu kusosola era atwala abantube bonna nga baamugaso,” Nankindu bweyagmbye. Yayongeddeko nit basanyufu olw’abantu abaliko obulemu okuvaayo okukolagana n’Obwakabaka okulwanyisa siriimu. “Nkakasa nti eddoboozi lya Ssaabasajja ku mukenenya lijja kutuuka kubantu bemukulembera mu Uganda,” Nankindu bweyagambye. Yagaseeko nti obubaka ku mukenenya tebusosola mu bantu oba baliko obulemu oba tebaliiko kubanga mukenenya tasosola ng’akwata. Kululwe, Apollo Mukasa eyataddeko omukono ku lwa UNAPD yagambye nti ebiseera ebisinga abantu abaliko obulemu batunuulirwa ng’abatasobola era ng’abateetaaga kuyambibwa, ekibaviirako okubonaabona. “Ekitongole ng’ekyaffe kivaayo okulaba nti abantu bano bayambibwa, batunuulirwe ng’abantu abalina byebasobola okukola,” Mukasa bweyagambye. Yayongeddeko nti bwebaawulira omulanga gwa Ssaabasajja Kabaka ogw’okulwanyisa akawuka ka sirimu baasalawo okumukwasizaako ng’abantu abalina obulemu. “Abantu abaliko obulemu naffe akawuka katukwata kubanga naffe tugenda mu bikolwa by’omukwano,”Mukasa bweyagambye. Endagaano eno egenda kukola ppaka 2024.

headline: Saagala kubeera Pulezidenti wa Uganda – Rebecca Kadaga
text: Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku nsonga za East Africa, Rebecca Alitwala Kadaga awakanyizza ebigambibwa nti ayagala kuvuganya ku ntebe y’obwapulezidenti mu mwaka 2026. Ekiwandiiko ekyafulumiziddwa omwogezi wa Minisitule eno, Samuel Bishop, Kadaga agamba nti eng’ambo zino eziyiting’ana ku mutimbagano zigendereddwamu okwawula mu ggwanga naye ye ng’omuntu talina kye yeetaaza kifo kino. “Wiiki ewedde, waliwo ebyabadde bitambuzibwa ku mutimbagano nga biraga ebifaananyi bya Kadaga ng’omu ku bagenda okuvuganya ku bwapulezidenti mu 2026. Ebifaananyi bino bye bimu byateekebwayo mu May wa 2021 era ensonga eno yamaze okuweebwa aba Uganda Communications Commissionn’ebyokwerinda mu ggwanga.” Ekiwandiiko bwe kisomye. Okusinziira ku Kadaga, ebifaananyi bino bijingirire ebigendereddwamu okutabula eggwanga era kati ayagala UCC ezuule abaabadde emabega w’okufulumya ebifaananyi bino era bavunaanibwe olw’okukozesa obubi omutimbagano. Kinajjukirwa nti bwe yali mu kalulu ng’anoonya ekifo ku kakiiko akafuzi ak’ekibiina akamanyiddwa nga CEC ng ‘omumyuka wa Ssentebe w’ekibiina, Kadaga yagamba ye yali ensonga lwaki Pulezidenti Museveni akyaliwo olw’okuggyawo ekkomo ku myaka nga singa teyali ye, Pulezidenti Museveni yandibadde Rwakitura mu nte ze. Wabula oluvannyuma lw’okusisinkana Pulezidenti Museveni, ebigambo bino yabyegaana. Mu nsisinkano eno eyamalira ddala essaawa 5 nnamba mu maka g’Obwapulezidenti, ensonda ezeesigika zigamba Museveni yeesemba ebya Kadaga okumuyisaawo naddamu okuvuganya. KatiKadaga yafuuse omunene owookubiri okwesamba okuvuganya ku bwapulezidenti mu gavumenti ya Museveni ng’eyasooka yalieyali Ssaabaminisita Ruhakana Rugunda. Oluvannyuma lw’akalulu ka 2021, n’okusuulibwa ku bwassaabaminisita, Rugunda yafuulibwa omubaka ow’enkizo mu woofiisi ya Pulezidenti.

headline: Museveni ayungudde amagye gatangire okwekalakaasa
text: Kampala Pulezidenti Museveni ategeezezza nga bw’ayungudde bakomando okuva mu UPDF okukola ku bwegugungo obuyinza okubaawo nga tugenda okulonda n’oluvannyuma lw’okulonda. Abamu ku bajaasi abalabikira ku nguudo za Kampala Bino Museveni yabitegeezezza bannayuganda eggulo bwe yabadde awa obubaka bwe obumalako omwaka gwa 2020 n’okwaniriza 2021. Museveni yagambye nti oluvannyuma lw’okwekalakaasa okwabalukawo mu kibuga nga Novemba 18 obwaleka nga abantu 50 bakufiiriddemu olw’okuwakanya okukwatibwa kwa Kyagulanyi, yasazeewo okuleeta bakomando bang’ange embeera. “Bino byonna byava ku kubulwa mpisa wamu n’ebikolwa by’obuzzi bw’emisango ebiri mu bantu b’oludda oluvuganya gavumenti ebyavaamu okwekalakaasa. Nayungula abajaasi baffe abatendeke obulungi ababadde e Somalia ne Congo nga balwanyisa ADF olw’obunafu obuli mu poliisi eyakkiriza ebintundu bya Kampala ebimu okuba nga tebikyayitikamu.” Museveni bwe yagambye. Ono yasiimye bannamagye bano abaateekebwa mu bitundu by’ekibuga b’agamba nti bakoze kinene okufuuza abazzi b’emisango. “Basobodde okukwata ku bazzi b’emisango ab’olulango abamanyiddwa era abasinga ku bano bakolaganye bulungi ne poliisi.” Museveni bwe yannyonnyodde. Ne ku mulundi guno, Museveni yakolokose abapoliisi bagamba nti baali balemeddwa okukola ku Kyagulanyi okutuusa lwe yayimbula amajgye era nga gano okutwaliza awamu gakoze omulimu mulungi. Museveni omwezi oguwedde yakola enkyukakyuka mu poliisi okwetaasa ku kawukuumi era eyali omumyuka wa Ssaabaduumizi wa poliisi, Maj. Gen Sabiiti Muzeeyi, n’amusikiza Maj. Gen. Paul Lokech. Sabiiti namusindika ku kitebe ky’amagye e Mbuya nga bw’alinda okuweebwa obuvunaanyizibwa obuggya. “Baali bafunyeemu kawukuumi n’enkola enkyukakyuka, nagamba poliisi nti sijja kugumiikiriza bunafu bwabwe wadde eddakiika, omuntu yenna atasobola kukuuma bannayuganda agenda ewaabwe alunde embuzi.” Museveni bwe yakangula ku ddoboozi gyebuvuddeko. Ku kulonda okubindabinda, Museveni yalabudde okukola ku muntu yenna ayagala okutabangula okulonda kwa 2021. “Njagala okuwa amagezi ab’oludda oluvuganya naddala abo abatiisatiisa nti tekijja kukola. Tewali muntu alina kutiisatiisa bannayuganda. Bw’oyagala nkwegatteko, nsikiriza. Kino tetugenda kigumiikiriza.” Museveni bwe yalabudde.

headline: Museveni alabudde aba KCCA, Kampala siwa bagagga bokka
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni alabudde abakulira n’okuteekerateekera ekibuga Kampala ku kugobaganya abanaku naddala mu butale okukikomya mu bwangu kuba Kampala siwa bagagga bokka. Okulabula kuno, Museveni akukoze asisinkanye ab’ekitongole ki Kampala Capital City Authority, abakulembeze b’obutale mu Kampala n’emirilaano mu maka g’Obwapulezidenti e Nakasero ku Lwokubiri. Pulezidenti Museveni yategeezezza nti abantu bamufuna mpola bebalina okubeera bannannyini butale buno awamu n’okubuddukanya kyokka kyewunyisa okulaba nga obumu butwaliddwa abagagga nebabuggya ku banaku. “ Abagagga basobola bulungi okufuna amaduuka ku Kampala Road, Ntinda n’ebifo byonna ebirala. Nga abakulembeze abalumirwa ensi yammwe, mulina okulowooza ku baavu,” Pulezidenti Museveni bwe yannyonnyodde. Ensisinkano eno eddiridde ekiragiro kya Pulezidenti ku kugonjoola ensonga eziruma abantu abaavu mu Kampala n’emirilaano. Museveni era alagidde KCCA okulaba nti buli Divizoni ye Kibuga ebeeramu obutale bubiri obwa gavumenti awamu ne ppaaka 2 nga bino birina kubeeramu baavu era bebalina okubiddukanya. “Abantu bemugoba ku nguudo babadde bagamba nti tebalina waakulaga, kati bwemubagoba nga temubategekedde banaalaga ludda wa?” Museveni bwe yabuuzizza. Okusobola okusalira ebizibu bamufuna mpola byebayitamu, Pulezidenti Museveni yalagidde Ssaabaminisita okutuula nabakwatibwako ensonga basalire wamu amagezi ku kirina okukolebwa. Ssaabaminisita, Robinah Nabbanja yeebazizza Pulezidenti Museveni olw’amaanyi gateekau okulwanirira omuntu wa bulijjo era neyeeyama okukolagana nabakwatibwako okuteereza embeera ya Mufunampola mu butale. Ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwamu minisita omubeezi owa Kampala, Kabuye Kyofatogabye, Minisita wa gavumenti ez’ebitundu , Raphael Magezi, Akulira KCCA Dorothy Kisaka, Omubaka wa Pulezidenti mu Kampala, Amina Lukanga ne Mmeeya Salim Uhuru.

headline: Bwoba toyagala Uganda nga nze, vva mu Poliisi-Museveni
text: Omukulembeze wa Uganda Yoweri Kaguta Museveni Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Museveni alagidde, Ssenkaggale wa Poliisi Martin Okoth Ochola agobe abasirikale bwonna beesuulirayo ogwannaggamba nebeerabira omulimu ogw’abakwasibwa ogw’okukuuma abantu n’ebintu byabwe. Bwabadde ayogerera ku kitebe kya Poliisi muggwanga kukasozi Naguru mu Kampala, ng’atongoza ekkunganyizo ly’ebikatibwa kamera z’okunguudo,Museveni agambye poliisi erina kusigaza basirikale abo bwokka abaagala kyebakola. “Oyo yenna atayagala Uganda ne Bannayuganda nga bwembaagala sifaayo oba bawanvu oba bampi, balungi oba babi; bwoba tolowooza bwotyo, baggobe mu poliisi, esigaze abo bwokka abatunuulira Uganda ng’abantu eb’enju emu,” Museveni bweyagambye. Okusalawo okuteeka kamera kunguudo, kyadirira okweyongera kw’obutemu obw’emmundu mu Kampala n’emirirwano nga buno bwafiiramu abantu ab’enjawulo bangi omuli eyali ayogerera poliisi mu Kampala, Andrew Felix Kaweesi, Omuduumizi wa Poliisi ye Buyende, Muhammad Kirumira, Maj Muhammad Kiggundu, abakulembeze babasiraamu, Hassan Kirya, Mustapha Bahiga, AbudurKarim Ssentamu, n’abalala bangi.

headline: Omuwendo gw’abalina Coronavirus mu Uganda gweyongedde
text: Minisita Jane Ruth Aceng   Ng’ekirwadde kya senyiga ekimanyiddwa nga Coronavirus kyongera okugoya abantu mu nsi yonna, minisita avunanyizibwa ku by’obulamu ategeezezza eggwanga nti Bannayuganda abalala munaana bazuuliddwa nga kyabayoola. Dr Jane Ruth Aceng, agambye nti olwaleero baakebedde abantu 35 kubbo munaana ne guzuulibwa nga gulina ekirwadde kya COVID-19. Bano bonna ekirwadde kiteeberezebwa nti baakijje Dubai gyebaabadde bava. Kino kitegeeza nti omuwendo gw’abantu abalina senyiga ono guweze mwenda.  Ku Lw’omukaaga sabbiiti ewedde, Uganda yalangirira nga bweyali ezudde omuntu omu okuba ne COVID-19.  Ono omutuuze w’e Kibuli ajjanjjabibwa mu ddwaliro Entebbe.  Aceng yasabye abantu bonna abaabaddeko e Dubai munnaku eziyise, okwewaayo mu mikono gy’ab’ebyobulamu bakeberebwe oba tebalina kirwadde kino.  Minisita era yagambye nti abantu 2661 bebabadde mu kalantiini oluvanyuma lw’okuva mu mawanga agalimu Coronavirus.  Kubano, 1305 ennaku za karantiini 14 baazimazeeko era nekizuulibwa nga tebalina Coronavirus.  Ekirwadde kya COVID-19 ekyabalukawo ku nkomerero y’omwaka oguwedde mu China kyakakwata abantu 379080 wamu n’okutta abasoba mu 16,000 mu nsi yonna.

headline: Minisita Ssekabembe asabye abazadde okuliza abaana mu ddiini
text: Bya Jesse Lwanga Buikwe – Kyaggwe Minisita w’abavubuka, okwewummuzamu n’okwesanyusa mu Bwakabaka bwa Buganda, Owekitiibwa Henry Moses Sekabembe Kiberu, asabye abazadde bulijjo okukuliza abaana baabwe mu mpisa n’eddiini, basobole okuba okubeera aboomugaso. Bino Owek. Ssekabembe asinzidde ku kyalo  Kimera mu ggombolola y’e Ssi Bukunja mu disitulikiti y’e Buikwe mu ssaza ly’e Kyaggwe ku mukolo gw’okugatta Kipala Fred  n’omwagala we, Nakintu, mu bufumbo obutukuvu.  Nga bano be bazadde ba Namboowa Morine ssentebe w’ekibiina kya Akeezimbira era akiikirira abaana abawala abaamasomero ku lukiiko lwa Buganda Youth Council. Minisita Ssekabembe akuutidde abantu okweyisa obulungi basobole okukola n’okukuuma amannya g’abantu baabwe. Owek. Ssekabembe mu ngeri y’emu abawadde obukodyo butaano mwe basobola okukuliza abaana ne bafuuka abensonga mu ggwanga omuli okubasomesa n’okubakuliza mu ddiini n’endala. Omwami wa Kabaka  atwala eggombolola ya Ssaabagabo Ngogwe, Livingstone Kisekka, amuloopedde ng’abantu b’eno wabali abawulize eri Nnamulondo nga n’omwaka oguwedde be baasinga okutwala aAmakula mu Buganda.

headline: Poliisi etandise okunoonyereza ku Simeo Nsubuga ku by’okutiisatiisa okutta omuntu
text: Ssaabaduumizi wa Poliisi ya Uganda, Martin Okoth Ochola, eragidde ekitongole ekinoonyereza ku buzzi bw’emisango okubuuliriza ku katambi akasaasaanidde emitimbagano ng’Omubaka Simeo Nsubuga aliko gw’atiisatiisa okumutta singa takomya kwogereza bamunoonyeza bululu ng’ayagala okubatwalira amuvuganya. Omubaka Simeo Nsubuga Okusinziira ku mwogezi wa poliisi alaze okutya olwa Nsubuga eyali omupoliisi, amanyi amateeka okulaba ate nga y’atandise okutiisatiisa abantu olwa kalulu. Kino kiddiridde Nsubuga okuwangulwa Micheal Muhumuza mu kamyufu ka NRM, era nategeeza nti agenda kwesimbawo ku lulwe kubanga akalulu ke kali kabbiddwa naye nga obuwangizi abulina wansi mu bantu. Akatambi akogerwako kalimu eddooboozi erigambibwa okubeera erya Simeo Nsubuga ng’alabula omuntu gw’ayita Ssonko. “ Nfunye amawulire okuva mu kitundu kyange nti okubira abanoonyeza akalulu ng’obagamba nti Muhumuza abaagala. Nkusaba nga muganda wange, okyali muvubuka muto ate nga n’abaana bo bakyali bato. Sirina gwe ntumye naye nkulabula weesonyiwe omuntu gwe bayita Simeo Nsubuga, togamba nti saakugamba. Eno ensonga ya bulamu na kufa, nkulabudde misana.” Nsubuga bw’agambibwa okulabula mu katambi era Ssonko amuddamu kimu nti, “Kale Ssebo.” Ennanga ategeeezza bannamawulire nti bayise Nsubuga ne Ssonko bannyonnyole ebiri mu katambi kano era n’alabula ne bannabyabufuzi abalala okunoonya akalulu mu mirembe. Ku nsonga y’omuliro ogwayoka ekizimbe ky’e Makerere, Ennanga agambye nti babadde baakufuna alipoota ekwata ku kyavaako omuliro guno ku Lwokusatu naye tekyasobose naye basuubira okugifuna mu bwangu ssabbiiti ejja era baakutegeeza ensi ku binaaba bizuuliddwa. Kinajjukirwa nti omwezi oguwedde nnabambula w’omuliro yakwata ekizimbe kya ‘Main Building’ negusaanyaawo woofiisi y’omumyuka wa Cansala, woofiisi enkulu ey’ebyensimbi awamu n’endala. Ennanga era ategeezezza bannamawulire nga bwetandise okunoonyereza ku nsonga y’omuyimbi Buchaman ku by’okutulugunya omuyimbi Rocky Giant era n’amutiisatiisa okumutta wamu n’abaana be.

headline: Museveni alonze Muruli Mukasa okubeera Minisita w’ebyamateeka
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni Tibuhaburwa alonze Minisita w’abakozi ba gavumenti, Muruuli Mukasa okubeera Minisita w’ebyamateeka n’obwenkanya ow’ekiseeranga kati ono agenda kuweereza mu Minisitule bbiri. Mu bbaluwa Pulezidenti Museveni gye yawandiikidde Ssaabaminisita Robinah Nabbanjanga 13, January 202, Museveni yategeezezza ntiMuruli agenda kugira aweereza mu kifo kino okumala ekiseera kya myaka ebiri. Bwe yali alonda baminisita mu June w’omwaka oguwedde, Pulezidenti Museveni ekifo kino yakireka kikalu oluvannyuma lw’okukyusa Minisita Ephraim Kamuntu eyakyalimu. “Okimanyi nti sirondanga Minisita w’ebyamateeka n’obwenkanya omujjuvu. Noolwekyo nga nkozesa obuyinza obumpeebwa nga Pulezidenti mu nnyingo nnamba 98 (1) ne 99 (1) eya Ssemateeka, nnonze Muruli Mukasa okubeera Minisita w’obwenkanya n’ensonga z’amateeka ng’obuvunaanyizibwa buno abugatta ku bwa Minisita w’abakozi.” Museveni bwe yagambye mu bbaluwa gye yawandiikidde Nabbanja. Wilson Muruli Mukasa abadde Minisita w’abakozi okuva mu mwaka gwa 2016 era yaliko Minisita w’ekikula ky’abantu mu mwaka gwa March 2015 okutuuka muJune 2016. Ono era yaliko Minisita w’ebyokwerinda okuva nga27 May, 2011 okutuuka nga 1 March, 2015.

headline: ‘Sisobola kudda ku kifo kya mumyuka wa Sipiika,’ Oualanyah alayidde
text: Kampala Omubaka wa Omoro mu Palamenti omulonde, Jacob Oulanyah, alayidde nga bw’atasobola kudda ku kifo kya mumyuka wa Sipiika nga kano ke kaseera naye atuuleko mu ntebe ennene ey’Obwasipiika.  Bino okubyogera, Oulanyah abadde awaayo woofiisi n’emmotoka gy’abadde atambuliramu ku mirimu emitongole oluvannyuma lw’ekisanja kye okuggwaako enkya ya leero. Oulanyah abadde anyumidde essuuti ya bbulu bw’amaze okuwaayo ebintu bino n’ayogerako eri bannamawulire mw’ategeerezza nti ekifo kya Sipiika kyokka kye yeetaaga mu kiseera kino.  “Bino bintu bya gavumenti era ekisanja kyange kiweddeko leero. Sisobola kusigaza bintu bya gavumenti ate nga si kyali mumyuka wa Sipiika.” Oulanya bw’ategeezezza n’alayira nti talabawo mukisa kuddamu kufuuka mumyuka wa Sipiika. Ono abadde ku kifo ky’omumyuka wa Sipiika okumala ebisanja bibiri okuli ekya 2011-2016 ne 2016 -2021. Bino we bijjidde ng’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda mu NRM eggulo kaasabye bammemba bonna abaagala okuvuganya ku bwasipiika n’omumyuka we mu Palamenti y’e 11, okuteekayo okusaba kwabwe mu butongole basobole okusunsulwamu. Oulanyah ali ku mbiranye ne mukama we Rebecca Kadaga ku ani anaaweebwa kkaadi ya NRM, basobole okuttunka n’abalala okuli omubaka Ibrahim Ssemujju Nganda ne Munna Democratic Party, Richard Ssebamala, abamala edda okulaga obwetaavu bw’okutwala ekifo kino. Ekirindiriddwa kwe kulaba ani akabondo ka NRM ak’ababaka abalonde gwe banaasalawo okukwatira ekibiina kyabwe bbendera okusobola okufuuka Sipiika. Oulanyah agamba nti bakkaanya ne Sipiika Kadaga ku kisanja ekyaggwa n’amulekera nga guno naye gwe mukisa gwe okutwala ekifo kino.

headline: Kyagulanyi waakuzimbira ab’e Bundibugyo amakolero ga Cocoa
text: Bundibugyo Eyeesimbyewo ku kkaadi ya National Unity Platform (NUP), ku bwapulezidenti Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, asuubizza abantu b’e Bundibugyo, okubazimbira amakolero ga Kokowa (Cocoa) mu kitundu kino singa anaafuuka Pulezidenti.  Ekisuubizo kino Kyagulanyi akikoze leero ku Lwokubiri bw’abadde asaba akalulu ku kisaawe ky’e Kirumya. “Abantu ba Bundibugyo bakola nnyo, n’agamba Nubian Li nti Singa ndi Pulezidenti singa wano waliwo ekkolero lya ‘Chocolate’ ebyo ebintu byonna bisoboka.” Kyagulanyi bw’asabye akalulu. Okusinziira ku bakulira ebibalo mu disitulikiti eno, ebitundu 85 ku buli 100 ku bantu abali mu kitundu kino beesigamye ku kirime kya Cocoa. Disitulikiti eno efuna ssente obuwumbi 150 okuva mu kirime kino buli mwaka. Kyagulanyi agambye nti wadde ekirime kya Cocoa kye kimu ku biwaniridde Uganda, naye ate gavumenti eno tefuddeyo ku balimi baakyo. Ono yeeyamye okudduukirira abantu abakosebwa amataba era abakolere ku kizibu ky’enguudo n’ebyobulamu singa banaamwesiga ne bamuwa akalulu kaabwe. Abamu ku bantu mu disitulikiti eno bategeezezza nti balina obwesige mu Kyagulanyi kubanga ebizibu byabwe abimanyi era nga basuubira nti singa ateekawo ekkolero lijja kusobola okuwa abavubuka emirimu. Kyagulanyi atabukidde poliisi mu kitundu kino olwokugezaako okumulemesa okukuba enkung’aana era nga talaba nsonga lwaki bamulemesa okwogera n’abantu abalina okumuwa akalulu. Okusooka ab’ebyokwerinda baggadde amakubo gonna agatuuka ku kisaawe kya Kirumya ne balagira n’abamu ku bantu okukyusa baddeyo, ekintu kye bagamba nti bakikoledde ku biragiro bya RDC mu kitundu kino.

headline: Museveni alabudde abaagala okwekalakaasa olw’okulonda
text: Entebbe Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni alabudde bannayuganda abategese okwekalakaasa nga bawakkanya ebyavudde mukulonda nti tagenda kubaganya.  Okulabula kuno Museveni akukoledde mu maka g’obwapulezidenti Entebe ku Lwokubiri bwabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga ku mikolo gy’okujaguza emyaka 35 bukya gavumenti ya NRM ejja mu buyinza. “Obwegugungo tujja ku bulinnya ku nfeete kubanga obusobozi tubulina, era bannayuganda mwenna mbasaba obutageezako kuloota kwegugunga kubanga tekijja kukola” Museveni bw’agambye . Museveni era asinzidde wano nayozaayoza bannayuganda olw’okulonda obulungi mu Mirembe wadde nga waliwo obubinja bw’abantu abaagala okutegeka obwegugungo nokutiisatiisa bannansi. Ebijaguzo bino byatandise nakusaba era nga kwakulembeddwa Msgr. Kasibante eyasabye enjuyi zonna ezabadde mu kalulu okutabagana kisobozese eggwanga okugenda mu maaso. Ku nsonga eno, Pulezidenti Museveni ategeezezza nti talina buzibu ku kutabagana naye nawa eky’okulabirako ky’abantu abaali mu gavumenti ya Amin ne Obote nti bano bamwegattako dda era bakolera wamu naye nakiggumiza nti tagenda kuganya muntu yenna kutabangula mirembe gya bannayuganda. Museveni yasabye bannayuganda obuteesiba ku njawukana za mawanga ne ddiini kuba tebisobola kutwala ggwanga mu maaso era nasaba bannayuganda okwagala ensi yaabwe nga bakulembeza ebigatta abantu okusinga amawanga gaabwe. Ono yaggumiza bannayuganda nti newankubadde ng’ekirwadde kya sennyiga Corona kikyaliwo naye ate ebyenfuna bikyatambula bulungi. Olunaku luno lukuzibwa buli mwaka nga January 26 naye nga ku mulundi guno lukuziddwa mu ngeri ya Sayansi olw’okutangira ekirwadde kya sennyiga Corona. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako omumyuka w’omukulembeze we ggwanga Edward Sekandi, omukubiriza w’olukiiko lw’eggwanga olukulu Rebecca Kadaga, ssabalamuzi Owiny Dollo, eyali Ssaabaminisita Amama Mbabazi, bannadiini, n’abakungu ab’enjawulo.

headline: Museveni yeweze okufaafagana n’abazigu ab’emmundu
text: Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni  Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni agambye nti agenda kuggyayo nag’omubuto okulaba nga atuula kunfeete obumenyi bwamateeka naddala obwokokozesa emmundu. Mubbaluwa ye gyawandiikidde Bannayuganda naddala abavubuka baayita abazukulu, Museveni yagambye nti ebibinja byababbi mumyezi mitono egyakayita bisse abantu 13 saako n’okulumya abalala babiri, n’okubba obukadde obuwera 24. Kyokka Museveni yagambye nti ebitongole byebyokwerinda era bisobodde okukwata abamu kubabbi bano 20, nga kubbo munaana batwaliddwa mukkooti, ate nga emmundu nnya nazo zinunuddwa nga kw’ogatta obukadde 10. “Akabondo k’ababba amasimu n’emmotoka nako tukafufugazza, era nga tukutte abantu 208 abateeeberezebwa okwenyigira mububbi buno. Amasimu agawera 2524, ppikipiki 141, ttivi 25 ne laptop 280 nabyo binnunuddwa,” Museveni bweyagambye. Yasabye abantu okwongera okuba kubwerinde wamu n’okutegeeza abebyokwerinda kubantu bwonna bebateebereza okuba abazzi b’ebimisango. Ettemu n’obubbi bisinze kweyolekera mu Kampala, Lyantonde, Ntungamo ne Entebbe.

headline: Bobi Wine agamba akalulu yakawangulira ku 54.19%, alangiridde ekiddako
text: Akulira ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine, alangiridde kye bagenda okuzzaako ng’ekibiina oluvannyuma lw’okulaga obukakafu nti ye yawangula akalulu. Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi gyebuvuddeko. Ekif: File “Ndi wano okulangirira nti kati tuli ku lwaffe. Omusango nguleese mu kkooti y’abantu era bano bagenda kugulamula.” Kyagulanyi bw’ategeezezza. Mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire olutudde leero e Kamwokya, Bobi Wine abalaze empapula ezimanyiddwa nga ‘DR Forms’ ezaaliko ebyava mu kulonda mu bitundu ebyenjawulo okukakasa obuwanguzi bwe. Kyagulanyi agamba nti mu myaka gya 1980, Museveni ng’alemeddwa okufuna obwenkanya mu kkooti z’ekiseera ekyo oluvannyuma lw’akalulu okubbibwa, yasalawo n’ayingira ensiko okununula eggwanga naye bo nga NUP tebagenda kukozesa butabanguko. “Ekyaffe kigenda kubeera kya mirembe naye nga tulemerako. Tukkiriza nti amaanyi g’abantu gasinga ag’abantu abali mu buyinza. Bannayuganda balina okusitukiramu okulemesa Gen. Museveni era kino tugenda kikola mu mirembe era mu mateeka.” Kyagulanyi bw’agambye. Bobi Wine abadde ayogera bino ng’ennyonyi ya poliisi eri mu bwengula bwa kitebe kya NUP e Kamwokya ng’erawuna. “Ssemateeka wa Uganda mu nnyingo ya 29 atuwa eddembe okwekalakaasa mu mirembe. Nkoowoola bannayuganda bonna okutambula nga mugenda ku woofiisi z’ebyokulonda mu bitundu byammwe okubanja obuwanguzi bwammwe.” Bobi Wine bw’agasseeko. Kyagulanyi awadde ensonga 4 kwe bagenda okusinziira okwekalakaasa nga muno mulimu; Okubbibwa kw’akalulu ke baawangula n’ebitundu 54.19% okusinziira ku DR ffoomu ze balina. Okusinziira ku byafulumizibwa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda byalaga nti Museveni akalulu akaakubwa yakawangula n’ebitundu 58.64 ku buli 100 ate nga ye Kyagulanyi yafuna ebitundu 34.83%. Ensonga endala Kyagulanyi gy’awadde be bawagizi be abazze bawambibwa mu bitundu ebyenjawulo ab’ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda okuli amagye ne poliisi nga bano agamba balina okuzza abawagizi nga balamu oba nga bafu. Kyagulanyi agamba ensonga y’okuggalira abantu mu makomera olw’ekyo kye bakkiririzaamu wamu n’obuwagizi bwe balina eri ekibiina kya NUP kye kimu ku bintu ebibasindise okwekalakaasa. Ekirala Kyagulanyi ategeezezza nti kikyamu okuwozesa abawagizi be mu kkooti y’amagye ate nga si bajaasi ky’agamba nti kityoboola eddembe lyabwe n’okubalemesa okufunayo obwenkanya. Bino we bijjidde nga poliisi yaakamala okulabula bannayuganda okwewala okwetaba mu by’okwekalakaasa okutegekebwa aba NUP nti tebagenda kubakkiriza.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asabye abavubuka okubaako bye batandika nga bakyali bato
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga Mayiga asabye abavubuka bulijjo okutandika emirimu nga bakyali bato okusobola okuleetawo enkulaakulana n’okubbulula ebyenfuna byabwe nga bwe bayimirizaawo gavumenti nga bagiwa omusolo awamu n’okutondawo emirimu. Entanda eno Katikkiro agiwadde asisinkanye omutandisi wa kkampuni ya Keith’s Dairy, Mw. Keith Tebandeke wamu ne banne bwe baddukanya kkampuni eno n’abaako by’abakuutira okugoberera basobole okuganyulwa wamu ne kkampuni yaabwe okuwangaala. Ensisinkano ebadde mu woofiisi ya Katikkiro ku Bulange enkya ya leero. Owek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti, “Nsanyuse okusisinkana Omulangira Tebadenke ne banne bwe baddukanya kkampuni ya Keith’s Dairy era mbasiimye nnyo okuba nti bafuna ekirowoozo ky’okutandika kkampuni eno ekola Yoghurt ku myaka ey’obuvubuka. Omuntu yenna bw’aba ayagala okwezimba atandika akyali muvubuka ate ekyo ky’aba atandise n’akyemalirako n’amagezi gonna.” Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga omulembe Omutebi Kabaka yagukwasa bavubuka nga kino kibawa obuvunaanyizibwa okumalirira mu bye bakola era beezimbe kuba kino kiyamba okuzza Buganda ku ntikko.    Bano Owek. Mayiga abasuubizza obuwagizi kuba okwolesebwa kwe bafuna kye kiragiro kya Kabaka Mutebi eri abavubuka okubaako emirimu gye batandika era babeere bayiiya era abamalirivu okwang’anga ebizibu bye basanga okusobola okuwangula. Akulira kkampuni eno, Keith Tebandeke ategeezezza nti bulijjo batwala okuwabula kwa Katikkiro Mayiga eri abavubuka ng’ekikulu era kulina bingi bye kubayambye okutuukiriza wakati nga batambuza emirimu gyabwe. Ono akunze abavubuka banne abatalina mirimu naddala abo abamaze okubangula mu matendekero aga waggulu okujja gyali abawe ku bukodyo basobole okwekulaakulanya.
