headline: FDC eyagala amasomero n’amasinzizo biggulwe
text: Ekibiina kya Forum For Democratic Change (FDC) kitegeezezza nti kisanyukidde eky’okuggulawo eggwanga naye kisaba amasinzizo awamu n’amasomero okuggulwawo kuba obutale bukung’aanya abantu bangi okusinga amasinzizo. Bino babiyisizza mu mwogezi w’ekibiina era omubaka wa Munisipaali ye Kira, Ibrahim Ssemujju Nganda, mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire lw’atuuzizza ku Mmande e Najjanankumbi. “Ffe tulowooza nti ebifo by’amasinzizo biggulwewo bigoberere amateeka ga COVID-19 ng’ebifo ebirala era tubikozese emirimu emirala ng’okuzzaamu abantu essuubi, tusobola n’okubikozesa okusomesezaamu abaana eri amasomero agatalina bibiina bimala.” Ssemujju bw’agambye. Ono era awadde amagezi gavumenti efube okulaba nti bannaddiini batuula ku bukiiko bwa disitulikiti obulwanyisa COVID-19, kuba abantu babawuliriramu era nga bamanyi n’abasobola okukwasizaako gavumenti, kuba bamanyi abagagga. Ssemujju Nganda agasseeko nti basuubira nti ekiseera ky’okuggula amasomero kituuse kuba mu kusooka eggwanga lyakola ensobi ne baggalawo wabula ng’ekirwadde kya Corona kijja mu kiseera kigere awatali kulabula. “Waliwo okutya nti singa gavumenti egaana okugaggulawo amasomero, eyinza ogaggulawo ng’ebula wiiki 2 oba 3 ekirwadde okuddamu ate ne wabeewo akasattiro okunonayo abaana.” Nganda bw’agambye. Aba FDC bawadde amagezi ensoma y’abaana ekyukemu mu kifo ky’emyezi esatu abaana basomera omwezi guno olwo baddeyo ewaka era abo abaali bamaze okusoma batuukire mu bibuuzo, kuba eby’okusooka okugema abaana gavumenti tejja kubisobola. Ssemujju agamba nti waliwo ekizibu ky’abantu abasuubula ebintu mu Kampala ate nga bikolebwa mu bitundu byabwe nga ssukaali, ennaanansi, n’ebirala. Ku kinoSsemujju egamba nti gavumenti esaanye etandikewo enkola ey’okukola obutale mu bitundu ebyenjawulo okwewala omujjuzo. Ono era agamba nti abakozi ba gavumenti COVID-19 baamufuula bbizineesi, naye walina okubaawo obwerufu baleme kuba ng’abakutte ttenda ey’okugaggawala. “Wabeerewo okunoonyereza, buli gwe tusanga nga yalya ekintu ekikwatagana ku COVID tulina okukibmusesemya.” Ssemujju bw’agasseeko.

headline: Obwakabaka busse omukago ne Housing Finance Bank, Henan Guoji okuyamba mu by’ensula
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda busse omukago ne kkampuni ya Housing Finance Bank wamu ne ya Henan Guoji, okusobozesa bannayuganda okwegulira ennyumba ezizimbiddwa ku mutindo ku bbeeyi eya wansi era ku kibanja mpola. Omuk. Simon Kaboggoza, Ssenkulu wa Housing Finance Bank, Michael Mugabi ne  Shen Windy owa  Henan Guoji group nga batta omukago Omukago guno gutongozeddwa Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga ku mukolo ogubadde mu Bulange e Mmengo leero ku Lwokuna, n’asaba abantu okujjumbira omukisa guno. Enteekateeka eno ekulembeddwamu Housing Finance Bank ne kkampuni ya Henan Guoji Group ng’eno y’ezimba ennyumba zino mu ‘Estate’ e Ssentema erondoolwe ekitongole kya Buganda Land Board. Owek. Mayiga agambye nti omutindo gw’enkulaakulana mu nsi yonna gulabikira mu byansula ate nga kino ky’ekimu ku bintu ebisoomooza ennyo bannayuganda. “Buli omu alina w’asula, naye w’osula wamatiza? tukolagana ne banaffe bano okusobola okuteerawo abantu ennyumba ez’omutindo ku ssente ensaamusaamu nga Ssaabasajja bwe yatulagira.” Mayiga bw’asabye. Owoomumbuga asoomoozezza gavumenti okuyamba Obwakabaka okusitula omutindo gw’ebyensula ng’ekola enguudo naddala mu bitundu ebirimu enteekateeka nga zino. “ Tugenda kuzimba ennyumba ezisukka mu 400 e Ssentema. Tusaba gavumenti ekole ebintu ng’enguudo, amasannyalaze, amazzi n’okukubiriza kkampuni z’amasimu okutereeza amayengo gaazo olwo nno nayo efunemu ssente.” Katikkiro bw’akkaatirizza. Omuk. Simon Kaboggoza y’ataddeko omukono ku lwa Buganda, Ssenkulu wa Housing Finance Bank, Michael Mugabi n’assaako ku lwa bbanka eyo, ate Shen Windy n’assaako ku lwa Henan Guoji group era nga kinajjukirwa nti kkampuni ya Henan y’ezimba ennyumba z’Obwakabaka mu Mirembe Villas e Kigo. Ono ategeezezza nga Ssaabasajja Kabaka bwe yayisa ekiragiro kino, bwe yali atongoza ennyumba ezaazimbibwa mu Mirembe Villas n’amulagira okuteerawo abantu be abatalina busobozi kugula nnyumba z’e Kigo omukisa nabo basobole okusula obulungi. Omukungu Kaboggoza ategeezezza nti ennyumba zino zaatandika dda okuzimbibwa era nga baakamalako ennyumba 7 ezigenda okukola ng’ekyokulabirako era zino Katikkiro waakuzirambula mu bwangu. Ennyumba ziri mu mitendera egy’enjawulo omuli ez’ekisenge ekimu, ebibiri n’ebisatu ng’omuntu asobola okugula okusinziira ku busobozi bwe. “Omugaso gw’okukolagana ne kkampuni y’ebyensimbi nga Housing finance bank, kwe kuteekawo embeera abantu mwe basobolera okwewola ssente nebagula ennyumba olwo ne basasula mu kibanja mpola ng’omuntu ennyumba emuweebwa ng’ebbanja liweddeyo.” Omuk. Kaboggoza bw’annyonnyodde. Ssenkulu Mugabi agambye nti, “Uganda ekyalina obwetaavu bw’ennyumba eziwerera ddala obukadde 2 n’ekitundu. Noolwekyo tuli basanyufu okubeera ekitundu ku pulojekiti eno nga tuyambako abantu okugula ennyumba ku kibanja mpola. Tukolaganye n’Obwakabaka mu pulojekiti ez’enjawulo ng’okuzimbira abaliko obulemu ennyumba, Kyapamungalo, LAFI ppaka ku Ssentema.” Omukolo gwetabiddwako abakungu okuva mu Bwakabaka bwa Buganda ne mu bitongole ebibiri ebisse omukago n’Obwakabaka.

headline: Bakutte akulira okugema Corona lwa kutunda kkaadi z’abagemeddwa
text: Aboobuyinza mu Ssembabule bakutte akulira okugema ekirwadde kya COVID-19 ku Ntuusi Healthy Centre IV nga kigambibwa nti ono abadde atunda kkaadi eziraga nti omuntu baamugema, ekintu ekitadde obulamu bw’abantu mu matigga. Omukwate ye musawo Kalemba Emmanuel ow’emyaka 35 nga y’akulira enteekateeka z’okugema ku ddwaliro lya Ntuusi era nga yakwatiddwa ku biragiro by’omubaka wa Pulezidenti mu Ssembabule, Walugembe Ramathan. Kigambibwa nti Kalemba kkaadi zino abadde ezitunda wakati w’emitwalo 8 ne 10 era kino abadde akikoledde akaseera. Mu kaseera kano ono akuumirwa mu kaduukulu ka poliisi y’e Ssembabule. Oluvannyuma lw’okukunyizibwa RDC Walugembe, Kalembe omusango yagukkiriza era ne yeetondera RDC. Kalembe annyonnyodde nga bwe yatuukirirwa omusajja Mwebaze Coleb n’amuwa kkaadi eno asobole okugenda e Kibaale okumwanjula kuba yali tasobola kutambula nga tagirina era oluvannyuma bakkiriziganya emitwalo 8 wadde yali tasoose kumusaba ssente. “Kituufu naguza Mwebaze Coleb kkaadi eraga nti bamugema Covid-19 ate nga yali simugeme naye mu kusooka saasooka kumusaba ssente wabula oluvannyuma twatuuka ne tukkiriziganya era emitwalo munaana (80000).” Bw’atyo Kalemba Emmanuel bw’annyonnyodde mu maziga. Okusinziira ku RDC Walugembe, baafuna okwemulugunya mu bantu nga waliwo abakola ebikolwa bino era naye kwe kusuula enkessi era bw’atyo n’akwata omusawo ono. Walugembe agamba nti kino kya bulabe nti era y’ensonga lwaki eng’ambo zibungeesebwa nti abagemwa bafa Covid so ng’abakola ebikolwa ng’ebyo be b’onoonye enteekateeka zino, n’awera okulwanyisa ebikolwa bino e Ssembabule. Ayongeddeko nti omusawo ono asobola n’okuwandiikira abantu kkaadi eziraga nti tebalina Siriimu ate ng’amuyina era ng’ebikolwa bino bigootaanya olutalo gavumenti lw’eriko olw’okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona, n’alabula bonna abakikola okukikomya.

headline: Omulamuzi agaanye okuddamu okubala obululu bwa Bukoto South
text: Masaka Omulamuzi wa kkooti esookerwako e Masaka, Charles Yeteise, agaanye okukkiriza obululu bwa munnakibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM), Abdu Kiyimba, eyabadde yeesimbyewo e Kalungu West okuddamu okubalibwa.  Kiyimba nga y’abadde mmeeya wa ttawuni kkanso y’e Nsangi yaddukiddw mu kkooti nga yeemulugunya ku ngeri obululu bwe gye bwagattibwamu, olwokuba nti kino kyakolebwa mu nzikiza ate nga n’embeekuulo yali nnyingi ng’abantu bajaganya olw’ebyali bivudde mu kalulu ka pulezidenti. Ono eyali ku kkaadi ya NRM, yafuna obululu 6,685 n’awangulwa munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Dr Twaha Kagabo n’obululu 8,883. Omulamuzi Yeteise ategeezezza nti omuwaabi alemeddwa okukuba ebituli mu byalangiriddwa naye yeesiba ku kimu nti obudde bwali buzibye ate nga n’abantu baleekaana. “Okuddamu okubala obululu si kya buwaze naye kisinziira ku bukakafu obubeera buteereddwa mu maaso ga kkooti. Nnemeddwa okulaba ensonga eyinza okuddisaamu akalulu kano okubalibwa.” Omulamuzi Yeteise bw’agambye. Ono agasseeko nti okuddamu okubala obululu tekikolebwa nga bagenda kuvuba naye walina okubaawo obululu bw’ekitundu ekimu, omuwaabi bwe yeesibako era olw’okubulwa kino, bw’atyo omusango n’agugoba era n’alagira Kiyimba aliyirire Kagabo. Munnamateeka wa Kiyimba, Steven Kalali, asoose kutegeeza kkooti nti obululu bwabalibwa mu nzikiza era ne bukyusibwa, ekintu ekyavaako omuntu we okufiirwa obuwanguzi. Kiyimba abadde awakanya obululu obwava ku muzikiti e Kinoni, Bugagamanyi, Masjid, Bugagamanyi, St Joseph Primary School, Nakalembe, ku kisaawe e Kasana, Bigando Primary School, Omuzikiti gw’e Degeya awamu n’awalala. Naye munnamateeka wa Kagabo, John Bagole, agambye nti ebirayiro ebibadde bireeteddwa ng’obujulizi bibadde bijudde obulimba kuba mu bifo ebisinga obululu bwabalibwa wakati wa ssaawa 10 n’ekitundu n’emu n’ekitundu. Dr. Kagabo ayanirizza ensala ya kkooti n’agamba nti ebadde ya bwenkanya era n’ewanirira okusalawo kw’abantu be Bukoto South, abaamulonze.

headline: Ssaabasumba Lwanga waakuziikibwa munda mu Lutikko e Lubaga
text: Kampala Akulira essaza Ekkulu ery’e Kampala mu kiseera kino, Msgr . Charles Kasibante, akakasizza nti Ssaabasumba Dr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga  agenda kuziikibwa mu Lutikko e Lubaga. Dr. Lwanga y’agenda okubeera Bisoopu owookusatu okuziikibwa mu Lutikko eno. Eyasooka yali Bisoopu  Edouard Michaud, ono yali munnansi wa  Canada era yali omu ku baminsane Ba-White Fathers’ era ye yali Vicar w’Eklezia ya Uganda okuva mu 1933 okutuuka mu 1945 we yafiira. Munda mu Lutikko eno mwe muli n’ebisigalira bya Bisoopu Joseph Kiwanuka eyali omuddugavu eyasooka okufuna ekitiibwa kya Bisoopu era ono yafa mu 1966 nga waakayita emyaka 5 oluvannyuma lw’okufuuka Ssaabasumba w’essaza ly’e Rubaga nga bwe lyali liyitibwa mu kiseera ekyo. Okusinziira  ku Msgr. Kasibante, ababiri bano baaziikibwa ku ludda olwa ddyo olw’Eklezia emabega w’ekifo Kkwaya w’eyimbira. Kasibante agamba nti ku Lwokuna, Ssaabasumba Lwanga agenda kuziikibwa mu makkati g’abakulu bano ababiri abaasooka okuziikibwayo. Eyali Vicar Genero, Gerald Kalumba annyonnyodde nti yafuuka mpisa okuziika ba Ssaabasumba  mu Lutikko gye bali baweerereza. Ono agambye nti naye kino olumu kisinziira kuba singa Ssaabasumba yenna abaako ekiraamo ky’alese nga kiraga w’ayagala okuziikibwa olwo ekiraamo kye kissibwamu ekitiibwa. Msgr. Kalumba awadde eky’okulabirako kya Kalidinaali Emmanuel Nsubuga eyaleka ekiraamo ng’asaba bamuziike mu maka ga bakateyamba ge yali atandiseewo. Okusinziira ku bimanyiddwa mu Eklezia, Lutikko ez’enjawulo zirina ebifo ebyenjawulo ebyateekebwamu okuziikamu ba Ssaabasumba. Ennono eno yatandikira mu biseera abasomi mwe baali bayiganyizibwa era nga bangi mu budde obwa baaziikibwa mu mpuku gye baali beekukumye era ennono eno n’abaliwo kati bakyagitwala mu maaso. Singa ekifo ekiziikibwamu abakulu bano kijjula, abakulira Lutikko basobole okufuna ekifo ekirala we babaziika naye era nga bagoberera akalombolombo ke kamu. Eky’okulabirako ekirungi, e Masaka ba Bisoopu babiri baaziikibwa munda mu Lutikko y’e Villa Maria eyasooka okuzimbibwa nga tennakyusibwa kuzzibwa Kitovu. Naye Bisoopu Kaggwa bwe yafa emabegako nga tewali we bayinza muziika, bwebatyo ne basalawo okumuzimba mu kkanisa esangibwa mu limbo ya Seminale y’e Bukalasa. Okusinziira ku lupapula lwa Observe, Cansala w’e Masak, Rev. Fr. Edward Ssekabanja, yagamba nti Eklezia eno  baagiteekawo okuziikamu Babisoopu b’e Masaka awamu ne Babisoopu abalala abatali mu Masaka naye nga badyagadde okuziikibwa mu kitundu kino.

headline: Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye okulabikako nga Buddu esamba Buweekula ku fayinolo
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II asiimye okulabikako eri abantu beku fayinolo y’omupiira gw’amasazanga Buddu esamba Buweekula okuzuula Nnantameggwa w’ekikopo kino ow’omwaka 2021 ng’ennaku z’omwezi 5 Ogwokusatu omwaka guno. Ekirangiriro kino kikoleddwa Minisita w’Obwakabaka avunaanyizibwa ku by’emizannyo, abavubuka n’okwewummuza, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire leero mu Bulange e Mmengo. “Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye okulabikako eri Obuganda ku kisaawe kya St. Mary’s e Kitende ng’ennaku z’omwezi 05/03/20221 ku ssaawa 9 ez’emisana ku mupiira ogwakamalirizo nga Bannabuweekula bakyaza Bannabuddu.” Owek. Ssekabembe bw’annyonnyodde. Owek. Ssekabembe ategeezezza nti ekikandaalirizafayinolo y’omulundi guno kwe. kuba nti baayagala okuwa bannabyamizannyo omukisa okubeera mu kisaawe ng’empaka ziggalawo oluvannyuma lw’okumala emyaka ebiri mirambanga tebakkirizibwa mu bisaawe. Okusinziira ku Ssekabembe, wajja kusookawo omupiira okuzuula essaza erigenda okukwata ekifo ekyokusatu wakati wa Mawokota ne Bulemeezi ku ssaawa 6 ez’omu ttuntu. Ono ategeezezza nti omupiiragw’akamalirizo guno gugenda kuba ku ssente emitwalo 2 n’emitwalo 5 era n’akunga abantu bonna okubaawo obugiriza Nnyinimu, wansi w’omulamwa,’ “Abasajja ffe basaale okulwanyisa Mukenenya tutaase abaana ab’obuwala.” Buddu yaakawangula ekikopo kimu kyokka eky’empaka zino mu mwaka gwa 2016 ate nga Buweekula tewangula nga ku kikopo kino. Ssentebe w’Olukiiko olutegesi olw’empaka z’amasaza, Sulaiman Ssejjengo ategeezezza nti omutindo gubadde gw’amaanyi nnyo mu mpaka zino era balonzeemu abazannyi 25 abagenda okukiikirira Buganda mu mpaka ezigenda okutegekebwa FUFA omwaka guno. Ekikopo kino kyatandika mu mwaka gwa 2004era Gomba y’ekyasinze okuwangula ekikopo kino emirundi emingi ng’ekirina emirundi ate nga ye yasembayo okukiwangula mu mwaka gwa 2020.

headline: Owek. Mpuuga:  Bannaluweero Museveni yabakozesa kutuukiriza bibye
text: Akulira oludda oluvuganya mu Palamenti, Owek. Mathias Mpuuga Nsamba asabye bannaluweero okukomya okusuubiriza mu gavumenti kuba olwamala okutuukiriza ebyayo ng’olutalo lwa 1986 luweddde n’ebasuulawo. Obubaka buno Mpuuga yabwogeredde mu kuziika Jjajja w’omubaka wa Baamunaanika, Robert Ssekitooleko mu Luweero. “Mukomye okusaba obuyambi okuva mu balwanyi abaali mu kitundu kino ne balya buli kimu omwali n’ebikoola by’emiti. Mukomye okwebuuza gye baabulira. Temubasuubira kudda gye muli. Mutandike bupya okuzimba ekitundu kyammwe, tebasobola kubajjukira.” Owek. Mpuuga bwe yannyonnyodde. Okusinziira ku Mpuuga, tekiraga buntu bulamu abalwanyi okwerabira abantu b’e Luweero ne bagaana okubatuusaako enkulaakulana wadde okuzzaawo ebyo bye bayonoona nga balwanirayo olutalo lw’ekiyeekera. Mpuuga asabye abantu b’e Baamunaanika n’e Luweero yonna okutwaliza awamu okwegatta ku kibiina kya NUP kuba kye kigenda okuteekawo obwenkanya. “Tulina okulwanirira ebiseera by’abaana baffe eby’omu maaso. Temutya kuyimirira ku mazima kuba ne bwotya era ojja kufa.” Mpuuga bwe yalambuludde.

headline: Obwakabaka busanyukidde eky’Omusumba Ssemogerere okufuuka Ssaabasumba
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bw’ozaayozezza omusumba w’e Kasana -Luweero, Paul Ssemogerere olwokulondedwa Ku bwa Ssaabasumba bw’essaza ekkulu ery’e Kampala. Obubaka buno buweeereddwa, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire leero ku Lwokutaano e Bulange- Mmengo. Owek. Mayiga ategeezezza Obwakabaka bwetegefu okukolagana ne Ssaabasumba Paul Ssemogerere okulaba ng’atambuza bulungi emirimu gye. Kino kiddiridde Ppaapa Francis okulonda abadde Omusumba w’essaza lya Kasana- Luweero, Omusumba Paul Ssemogerere ku bwa Ssaabasumba bw’essaza ekkulu erya Kampala n’adda mu bigere by’eyali Ssaabasumba w’essaza lino, Dr.Cyprian Kizito Lwanga nga yalangiriddwa. Kino kyalangiriddwaomubaka wa Ppaapamu Uganda, Ssaabasumba Luigi Bianco eggulo ku Lwokuna. Katikkiro akakasizza Ssaabasumba omuggya nti Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bwakukola naye okulaba ng’emirimu gye gitambula bulungi. Kamalabyona mu ngeri y’emu atenderezza emirimu egikoleddwa eyaliko minisita wa gavumenti ez’ebitundu kati omugezi, Owek. Jolly Lutaaya gy’agambye nti gitumbudde nnyo Obwakabaka. Owek. Mayiga agambye nti Owek. Jolly Lutaaya y’omu ku bantu abaatandikawo ebimu ku bitongole by’Obwakabaka okuli leediyo CBS n’ebirala era asitudde nnyo ebyemizannyo mu ggwanga.

headline: Katikkiro akubirizza abantu okujjumbira okugema kw’ekikungu.
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga. Katikkiro akoowodde abazadde okutwala abaana baabwe babageme olukusense, Rubella ne Polio. Katikkiro agambye nti, “Temusigalira mabega, abaana mubatwale babageme babeere balamu lwebajja okuzimba Buganda gyetwagala enetwegombesa ate ne Uganda enywevu gyetweyagaliramu ffenna awamu”. Katikkiro agambye nti ensonga ssemasonga ey’okuna (4) ey’okukola obutaweera etunuulidde abantu abalamu obulungi kubanga omuntu omulamu yasobola okukola, okuyingiza, n’okwebezaawo era yasobola okuzza Buganda ku ntikko.  Ategeezezza nti obulwadde bwa Rubella bukyali buggya mu ggwanga naye bwa bulabe nnyo era butta abaana wamu ne Polio, era omukisa bweguba guzze abantu basaanye bagweyambise. Era Katikkiro ategeezeza nti okugema tekutandise leero nti kuva dda abantu balinga bagemebwa endwadde ezitali zimu. Katikkiro okwogera bino abadde awayamu ne bannamawulire mu Butikkiro akawungeezi ka leero.

headline: Masaza Cup 2021: Gomba egudde maliri ne Buluuli, Ssingo eremaganye ne Kabula
text: Ttiimu y’essaza lya Ssingo eyongedde okuvumbeera mu mpaka z’emupiira gy’amasaza ez’omwaka guno bw’egudde amaliri ne ttiimu ya Kabula ku ggoolo 2-2 mu mipiira egizannyiddwa olwaleero ku FUFA Technical Centre e Njeru. Ggoolo za Kabula ziteebeddwa omuzannyi Valentino Odoi mu ddakiika eya 31 ne 38 ate nga eza Ssingo ziteebeddwa Bright Adoa ne Joseph Ssewaali. Mu ngeri yeemu Gomba nayo egudde maliri ne Buluuli mu kikopo kinonga guwedde buli ttiimu ebala ggoolo emu. Gomba eyawangula empaka z’omwaka oguwedde y’esooseewo, era ggoolo yaayo eteebeddwa omusambi Brian Aniku mu kitunduekisooka ate nga Abdul Malik y’ateebye ggoolo ya Buluuli mu kitundu ky’omuzannyo ekyokubiri. Mu mpaka zino, omuzannyi wa Buluuli, Derrick Kaija, Ddifiri HenryMusisi amuwadde kkaadi emyufu oluvannyuma lw’okuweebwa kkaadi za kyenvu ebbiri olw’okukola ebisobyo. Empaka zino zigenda kuddamu okuzannyibwa ku Lwomukaaga lwa ssabbiiti eno n’emipiira 2 wakati wa Buluuli ne Ssingo n’ogwa Kabula ng’ettunka ne Kyaddondo.

headline: Omuwanika Waggwa Nsibirwa ayanjudde alipoota ku nsimbi ezava mu Luwalo eziwera akawumbi kalamba
text: Minisita w’ebyenfuna era Omuwanika w’ eggwanika lya Buganda, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa ategeezezza nti abantu ba Buganda bongedde okujjumbira enteekateeka z’okulaakulanya Obuganda nga bawaayo ensimbi mu nteekateeka y’Oluwalo okusobola okuwagira enteekateeka za Beene. Alipoota omuwanika agiweeredde mu Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire olwetabiddwamu ne minisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ez’ ebitundu Joseph Kawuki. Owek. Waggwa Nsibirwa ategeezezza nti mu luwalo lw’omwaka 2022 basobola okukungaanya ensimbi eziwera akawumbi kamu n’emitwalo 90 wansi w’enteekateeka y’ Oluwalo lwaffe nga zino zakungaanyizibwa nezisengekebwa okusinziira ku masaza n’eggombolola eziri mu Buganda n’ebweru waayo. Okusinziira ku Owek. Waggwa Nsibirwa ensimbi zino zisaasanyiziddwa ku bintu ebyenjawulo mu bwakabaka era Katikkiro Mayiga bweyali aggalawo Oluwalo lw’ omwaka 2022 yalagira eggwanika okufulumya ensaasaanya y’ensimbi zino okusobola okunyweza ennyingo y’ obwerufu. Omuwanika agamba nti ensimbi zino zizze zirinnya mu myaka ag’enjawulo nga mu 2017 bakung’aanya obukadde 202, mu 2018 nebafuna obukade 414, 2019 obukadde 515, 2020 obukadde 352,2021 obukadde 654ne 2022 akawumbi kalamba n’emitwalo 90.  Owek. Nsibirwa annyonnyodde nti Obukadde 60 bwawagira okulwanyisa mukenenya mu bwakabaka, ate obukadde 100 nebusibwa ku mulimu gw’ okuzzaawo Muzibwazaalampanga. Ekitongole kya Beene ekya Kabaka Education Fund bakiteekamu obukadde 76 ate Emmwaanyi Terimba nebagiwa obukadde 283 n’emitwalo 72. Ono agasseeko nti omulimu gw’okuwa abantu amazzi amayonjo nga bayita mukusima enzizi baziteekako obukadde 39 nga zino zaava mu ssaza lya Rocky Mountains mu Amerika. Minisita Nsibirwa agamba nti emirimu gy’ Embuga bagiteekako obukadde 71 nemitwalo 41 mu 7000m so nga okusembeza abagenyi ba Nnyinimu mu Bulange kwatwala obukadde 210 n’emitwalo 56. Ensimbi obukadde 93 n’emitwalo 45 mu lukumi zazzibwaayo ku Ggombolola ate amasaza ga Beene omuli Ankole, Mbale, Busia Malaba Tororo ne Busoga gaweebwa obukadde 13 emitwalo 57 mu lukumi.. Owek. Waggwa agamba nti waliwo obubonero bungi obulaga nti abantu ba beene bongedde okusiima enteekateeka eno mu bikolwa kubanga ebisinga bibaganyula buteerevu nga mu nkola eno Obwakabaka bwakasima enzizi 671. Ye Minisita omubeezi owa Gavumenti ez’ ebitundu, Owek. Joseph Kawuki ategezezza nti oluwalo luyambye okuzimba obukulembeze n’okukola ennyo mu bantu ba Kabaka kubanga ku mitendera gyonna abantu balwetabamu butereevu.

headline: Aba DP baagala eby’okuggyawo okweyimirirwa bikubweko akalulu k’ekikungo
text: Ekibiina kya Democratic Party(DP) kisabye gavumenti eby’okuggyawo okweyimirirwa ku misango eminene by’eyagala okutuukako, bisindikibwe mu bantu bikubweko akalulu ak’ekikungo kuba kye kigenda okuyamba okutaasa Ssemateeka w’eggwanga. Enteekateeka zino zaayanjuddwa amyuka omuwabuzi w’ekibiina kino mu nsonga z’amateeka, Richard Lumu bwe yabdde ayogerako ne bannamawulire ku City House mu Kampala era n’akakasa nti, kino baakikkaanyako mu lukiiko lwa ‘National Executive Council (NEC),’ ng’erimu ku makubo mwe bayinza okuyita okukuuma ennyingo23 (6)a, b, ne c mu Ssemateeka. “Twawaddeyo ebbaluwa yaffe eri akakiiko k’ebyokulonda nga tusabaokuleeta ekiteeso bategeke akalulu k’ekikungo kuba eby’okuggyawo eddembe ly’okweyimirirwa, bikontana n’eddembe ly’obuntu.” Lumu bwe yagambye. Bannakibiina kino bakkiriza nti singa eddembe lino linaggyibwa ku bannansi, kiba kitegeeza nti omuntu omusango guba gumusinze nga tannaba na kuwozesebwa, ekintu ekikyamu. “Tukkiriza nti bannayuganda be bateekeddwa okusalawo oba eddembe ly’okweyimirirwa liggyibwawo, baleke bannayuganda beesalirewo ku nsonga eno.” Lumu bwe yagasseeko. Lumu era yannyonnyodde nga mu wiiki eziddako bwe bagenda okutalaaga eggwanga lyonna nga banoonya emikono gy’abalonzi obukadde 2, ng’amateeka bwe galagira okusobozesa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda okutegeka akalulu k’ekikungo ku nsonga y’okweyimirirwa. Ono agamba nti singa bafuna emikono gino basuubira kkooti okugaana Palamenti okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga eno kuba ebeera efuuse ya kalulu ka kikungo. Kino kiddiridde olukiiko lwa Kabineeti okwanjula ekiteeso ky’okukola ennongoosereza mu nnyingo 23 (6) (b) eya Ssemateeka, egaane abantu ababeerabazzizza emisango eminene obutaweebwa kweyimirirwa mu kkooti enkulu, n’ezo eziri wansi waayo okutuusa nga wayise ennaku 180 oba ng’omusango gutandise okuwulirwa oba ng’omuwaabi wa gavumenti omukulu omusango aguggyeeyo ng’ennaku ezo tezinnaggwaako. Ssentebe w’olukiiko lwa Kabineeti era Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni yasaba Ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti, Kiryowa Kiwanuka okulambika Kabineeti ku ngeri gye basobola okukolamu ennongoosereza zino. Wabula DP egamba nti nga bo abakkiririzamu mazima n’obwenkanya, bagenda kukola kyonna okulaba ng’eddembe lino teriggyibwa ku bannansi.

headline: Owek. Mpuuga: Tugenda kukomyawo ekkomo ku bisanja n’amagye gaggyibwe mu Palamenti
text: Akulira oludda oluvuganya mu Palameniti,Owek. Mathias Mpuuga yategeezezza nga gavumenti gy’akulembera bw’eyagala okulaba ng’ekkomo ku bisanja by’omukulembeze w’eggwanga biddawo era n’ababaka abakiikirira amagye baggyibwe mu Palamenti. Owek. Mpuuga bino yabitegeezezza bannabyabufuzi okusingira ddala ab’oludda oluvuganya ku Palamenti ku Lwokutaano, bwe yabadde ayanjula emiramwa kw’agenda okutambuliza gavumenti ey’ekisiikirize mu Palamenti. Ono yannyonnyodde nti baagala okuddamu okuleeta ennongoosereza mu Ssemateeka eza 2019 ezaali zireeteddwa omubaka Wilfred Niwagaba mu Palamenti ye 10. “Tugenda kukomyawo ennongooserezamu Ssemateeka eza 2019 ezaali zaagala okuzzaawo ekkomo ku bisanja, okuggya bannamagye mu Palamenti awamu n’okusala omuwendo gwa baminisita okudda ku 21 ssaako ebintu ebirala.” Owek. Mpuuga bwe yategezezeza. Ennongoosereza zino era zaalimu okukyusa erinnya lya poliisi y’eggwanga okuva ku Uganda Police Force okudda kuUganda Police Service era zaali zaagala n’okuggyawo ne woofiisi z’ababaka ba Pulezidenti abamanyiddwa nga ba RDC (Resident District Commissioners). Mpuuga mu kwogera kwe yagambye nti okuva mu mwaka 2014, eggwanga lisuubizibwa okuteekawo akakiiko akalina okuddamu okwekenneenya Ssemateeka naye kino tekituukiriranga. “Kye tufunye z’ennongoosereza mu mateeka agamu era ekivudde mu kino be bantu okulaba Ssemateeka ng’ekiwandiiko ekikozesebwa bannabyabufuzi okutuukiriza ebigendererwa byabwe.” Mpuuga bwe yakikkaatirizza. Owek. Mpuuga yagambye nti Ssemateeka alina kulaga ensonga abantu ze bakkaanyaako era alina okulaga ebiruubirirwa n’ebyo abantu abamukkaanyizzaako bye baagala okuziyiza. “Nsaba ab’oludda oluvuganya okufaayo era bakulembeze ennongoosereza mu mateeka g’ebyokulonda n’amateeka amalala ageetaaga okulongoosa bye tubeera tussaako essira.” Mpuuga bwe yagasseeko. Mpuuga agamba nti n’obuvunaanyizibwa bw’ebitongole by’okwerinda mu kalulu bulina okuddamu okutunuulwamu kuba baakola emivuyo mingi ekyaviirako akalulu obutabeera k’amazima n’obwenkanya.

headline: Kyaddondo ekubye Kkooki 2- 1  n’egiggya mu kibalo
text: Olwaleero mu mpaka z’ekikopo ky’amasaza eziyindira e Njeru, kyaddondo ekubye Kkooki ggoolo 2 ku 1 n’egiwandula mu kibinja Masengere. Amasaza gombi gayingidde ensiike nga buli limu linoonya buwanguzi bwalyo obusooka. Aba Kyaddondo nga bajaganya oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula Kkooki Ggoolo za Kyaddondo zombi ziteebeddwa Emayu Calvin Peter ne yeegatta ku bakyasinze okulengera akatimba mu mpaka z’omulundi guno ate ggoolo ya Kkooki eteebeddwa Ssekidde Anthony. Kkooki esigazzaayo omupiira gw’egenda okuttunkiramu ne Bugerere wabula nga tegulina kigenderwa kyonna ne bw’eguwangula. Bugerere tewangulangako ku mpaka zino wabula nga y’ekulembedde ekibinja kino n’omuwendo gwa ggoolo. Bugerere ettunka ne Mawokota ku ssaawa mwenda ez’olweggulo lwalweero era awangula yeesogga “Kwota fayinolo” ne yeegatte ku Busujju ne Busiro abattunka ku bbalaza.

headline: Lukwago agyeeyo empapula, akomawo ku bwa Loodimeeya
text: Omuloodi wa Kampala Ssaalongo Erias Lukwago, leero aggyeeyo empapula okuvuganye ku kifo ky’obwa looimeeya ku kaadi y’ekibiina ki Forum for Democratic Party (FDC). Lukwago yasembeddwa omubaka wa Nakawa mu palanenti Micheal Andrew Kabaziguruka ne Mubaraka Munyagwa awamu ne Dr. Stella Nyanzi. Akulira akakiiko k’ebyokulonda mu FDC Toterebuka Bamwenda, yakkiriza nga bwafunye empapula za Lukwago era nalaga nti ono asembeddwa okwetaba mu kamyufu k’ekibiina. Mukwogera kwe Lukwago, yeebazizza bakansala ba KCCA wamu n’abo abamusembye. Lukwago yegatta ku FDC omwezi oguwedde nga 28/07/2020 oluvanyuma lw’okwabulirira ekibiina ki Democratic Party (DP). Okusalawo kwa Lukwago kuggyeewo envuvumo nti bannakibiina ki FDC  babadde bamuleeta okuvuganya ku bwapulezidenti oluvanyuma lwa Dr. Kizza Besigye okulaga nga bwatagenda kuddamu kwesimbawo.

headline: Ab’omu Nyendo bakoze Bulungibwansi okutangira endwadde
text: Nyendo Abatuuze mu kibuga Masaka bakoze Bulungibwansi mu Kabuga k’e Nyendo okusobola okukendeeza ku bucaafu wamu n’okwongera okutangira endwadde.  Omubaka wa Masaka Juliet Kakande nga akola Bulungibwansi Bano nga bakulembeddwamu mmeeya omulonde owa Munisipaali ya Nyendo- Mukungwe Owek. Micheal Mulindwa Nakumusana awamu n’omubaka omulonde owa Masaka Juliet Kakande, bayonjeza emyala, okuyoola kasasiro mu butale wamu n’okwera enguudo. Mmeeya Nakumusana asinzidde wano n’ategeeza nti basazeewo okukola kino oluvannyuma lw’okulaba ng’abantu kasasiro abayitiriddeko ate ng’ekibuga tekirina ssente zimukung’aanya. Ono agamba nti singa obuyonjo tebwongerwamu maanyi abantu mu kibuga Masaka boolekedde okulumbibwa endwadde naddala mu kiseera ky’enkuba kuba emyala egisinga gyabadde gizibikidde. Ate ye omubaka omukyala omulonde Juliet Kakande agamba nti okukola bulungibwansi y’emu ku nkola gye baagala okuyitamu okuyonja ekibuga Masaka abantu bamanye nti buvunaanyizibwa bwabwe okukuuma obuyonjo we bakolera. Bo abamu ku batuuze abeetabye mu kukola bulungibwansi bagamba nti kibayambye nnyo okukendeeza ku bucaafu kubanga bubadde bususse mu Nyendo.

headline: Aba NUP baatuliddemu olukwe – Ssemujju, Nsibambi
text: Kampala Omubaka w’ekibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) mu Palamenti, Ibrahim Ssemujju Nganda, agamba nti bannaabwe ab’oludda oluvuganya naddala aba NUP baabaliddemu olukwe bwe baasazeewo okuwagira abadde Sipiika Rebecca Alitwala Kadaga mu kulonda Sipiika wa Palamenti y’e 11. Ssemujju eyabadde yeesimbyewo mu kalulu akaawanguddwa Jacob Oulanyah, yagambye nti bangi ku bannakibiina kya NUP baalabiddwako nga bakukuta ne munnakibiina kya NRM Rebecca Kadaga wadde nga bakimanyi bulungi nti ye mumyuka owookusatu owa ssentebe w’ekibiina kye baagala okuggya mu buyinza. “Bano baasazeewo okuwagira Kadaga kuba yabadde n’abantu, era ono bwe yasembeddwa okuvuganya aba NUP be baasinze okusanyuka . Bayinza batya okugenda n’omumyuka owookusatu owa ssentebe wa NRM? Ne batuuka n’okukaaba ng’awanguddwa?” Ssemujju bwe yeemulugunyizza. Ssemujju yategeezezza nti yawandiikira buli omu omuli n’akulira NUP, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, n’amusaba okumusisinkana kyokka teyamuddira wabula yagenda okuwulira nti Bobi Wine ayise ababaka be era n’abalagira okuwagira Kadaga. Ono agamba nti ensonga lwaki ab’oludda oluvuganya baalondeddwa lwakuba bannansi tebaagala NRM ne Museveni era n’asaba aba NUP okwetereeza mu bwangu. Ssemujju annyonnyodde nti NUP esaanye okwetondera oludda oluvuganya olw’okukolagana ne NRM ne balekawo abalala bwe bafaananya ebigendererwa. Ate ye eyavuganyizza ku kkaadi ya FDC, Yusufu Nsibambi, yeemulugunyizza ku kya bannakibiina kya NUP okuleeta katemba mu kalulu kano ne bamaliriza nga batabudde abantu. Nsibambi agamba nti waabaddewo n’obupapula obutambula nga busaba abantu okulonda Among owa NRM era obwedda buli akafuna afuluma. “Twabadde ku nsonga nkulu naye abamu ku bannaffe ku ludda oluvuganya ne bavaayo n’ebiteeso eby’ekiralu ekyalaze nti ebyabadde bigenda mu maaso tetwabiwadde makulu nga Opozisoni.” Nsibambi bw’agambye. Ku nsonga zino omubaka wa Nakawa West era omwogezi wa NUP , Joel Ssenyonyi, ategeezezza nti baabadde baagala okufuna sipiika ayinza okuyisa obulungi oludda oluvuganya era y’ensonga lwaki baasazeewo okulonda Kadaga.

headline: Bobi Wine: Gavumenti ekola buli kimu okunjavuwaza
text: Kampala Akulira ekibiina kya ‘National Unity Platform(NUP)’, Robert Kyagulanyi amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine agambye nti gavumenti y’eri emabega w’omukyala akaayanira ettaka okutunde ennyumba ye nti zirimu ebyobufuzi. Kyagulanyi bino abyogedde oluvannyuma lw’omukazi eyategeerekese nga Justine Nakamatte Namusisi, okuddukira mu kkooti asengule Bobi Wine wamu ne balirwana be abawera 2000 ng’agamba bano baasenga ku ttaka lye mu bukyamu. Bobi Wine alaze nga gavumenti bw’eri emabega w’okukyala ono era ng’eyagala kutwala buli kimu ky’alina kuba ettaka lino yaligula mu makubo matuufu era ng’alimazeeko emyaka egisoba mu 10. “Tewali kye batagenda kukola. Wadde mbadde n’ettaka e Magere, Kamwokya ne Busabaala okumala emyaka egisoba mu 10, namala kulangirira kuvuganya Museveni ne batandika okutwala emisango egitalina makulu mu kkooti nga baagala okutwala ebyobugagga byange.” Kyagulanyi bw’agambye.  Kyagulanyi annyonnyodde nti bano tebalina kye baagala kumulekera era kakodyo okubakuumira mu misango gino nga bwe bagenda mu maaso n’okunyaga eggwanga. Ono agasseeko nti ne bwe banaakola byonna tajja kuggwaamu maanyi era ku nkomerero bannayuganda bajja kumaliriza be bawanguzi. Guno si gwe mulundi ogusoose Kyagulanyi okutwalibwa mu kkooti ku nsonga z’ettaka nga mu 2018 yafuna obutakkaanya n’ekitongole kya Buganda Land Board ku ttaka ly’e Busaabala okuli One Love Beach.

headline: Abalina COVID-19 baweze 30
text: Abamu ku balwadde mu malwaliro e Italy  Ng’ekirwadde kya senyiga omukambwe amanyiddwa nga COVID-19 kigenda mumaaso n’okugoya ensi, wano mu Uganda omuwendo gw’abalwadde guweze 30. Minisitule ekola ku by’obulamu yalangiridde nati abantu abasoba mu 200 abaakeberebbwa ku Lwomukaaga nga musanvu kubbo, bebaasangiddwa n’akawuka kano.  Bano webagattibwa ku 23 abaabadde bamaze okukakasibwa munaku eziyise, kino kitwala omuwendo kwa 30. Eggulo minisita akola ku by’obusuubuzi Amelia Kyambadde yalagidde bannanyini bizimbe mu Kampala babiggala kubanga bikungaanirwamu abantu bangi. Mu nsi yonna, abantu abalina COVID-19 kati batuuse 664,292 ngate abaakafa baweze 30,890.  Eggwanga lya Italy ne Spain gagasinze okufiirwa abantu nga abantu kumpi 16,000 ekitundutundu ku bafu bali mu mawanga gano abiri. Ate yo Mu America, abalwadde gyebasinga, wosemera bino abantu  123,776  babaakayolebwa olumbulege ate 2229 bebaakafa.

headline: Balabudde okutega obutwa abapoliisi ababaliira eby’okulya nga bakwasisa kafyu
text: Abatuuze mu ggombolola y’eKamonkoli ne Mugitimu disitulikiti y’e Budaka , batiisizatiisiza okutega abapoliisi obutwa mu by’okulya singa tebakomya kubaliira byakulya byabwe buli lwe bagenda gye bakolera okukwasisa ebiragiro bya kafyu. Bano bagamba nti okuva Pulezidenti Museveni lwe yalangirira omuggalo ogw’ennaku 42 era n’akendeeza ne ku budde bwa kafyu okuva ku ssaawa 3 okudda ku ssaawaemu, bafunye ekizibu n’abapoliisi abateeka ebiragiro bino mu nkola. Abatuuze balumiriza nti abapoliisi abasindikibwa babanywera waragi gwe basanga mu maduuka wamu n’okulya capati zaabwe ze basanga ku midaala oluvannyuma lw’okubafubutula era kati batandise okulowooza ku ky’okubatega obutwa kuba bakooye okubafiiriza. Bino baabiyisizza mu amyuka sipiika w’eggombolola, Mohamad Mboizi era ono yabitegeezezzaabakulu abatuula ku kakiiko ka disitulikiti n’eggombolola akalwanyisa ekirwadde kino. Kinajjukirwa nti ku Mmande RDC wa disitulikiti y’e Budaka, Tom Chesol, yalonze abantu 20 n’abasindika mu ggombolola ez’enjawulo okuzuula engeri ebiragiro bya Ssenyiga Corona gye bikwatiddwamu era buli ttiimu n’agisaba ekole alipoota ku by’ezudde. Bwe baabadde banjula bye baazudde, bano RDC baamutegeezezza nga abapoliisi bwe bali ku mugano nga baggya ssente mu bantu nga beekwese mu kukwasisa ebiragiro bya Corona. Abapoliisi abatangira abantu okusala mu disitulikiti ez’enjawulo, baggya ssente ku balwadde, abatambuza ebigere wamu n’abalimi abagenda mu nnimiro kyokka mu bwebuziba abapoliisi ssente bazitwala ku mpaka era ne batiisatiisa abantu obutagezaako kuloopa ku poliisi. Kyategeerekese nti mu ggombolola y’e Nansanga, abapoliisi baamenye ne bayingira mu nnyumba ne babba ebidomola bya waragi emisana ttuku era oluvannyuma lwa nnyini byo okubatiisatiisa nga bw’agenda okubaloopa basazeewo babizze. Abatuuze bagamba nti ensonga zino baziroopye mu bakulu okuli; RDC, RPC, DPC,n’abakungu abalala naye ate embeera eyongera kutabuka. Bwe yabadde ayanukula ku bino, akulira poliisi y’e Budaka, ASP Edison Muvunye, yakkirizza ng’abamu ku batuuze bwe baabatwalidde emisango gino naye nti bano tebalina bujulizi bumala okusobola okwongerayo ensonga zino. RDC abatuuze yabalabudde obutatwalira mateeka mu ngalo era n’alabula n’okusiba abapoliisi singa banaalemwa okukola emirimu gyabwe n’obukugu.

headline: Alipoota ya CCEDU egamba okulonda kwa 2021 kwalimu emivuyo mingi
text: Kampala Ekibiina ekitakabanira enfuga eya demokulaasiya mu ggwanga eya Citizen’s Coalition for Electoral Democracy in Uganda (CCEDU), ku Lwokutaano lwa wiiki ewedde kyategeezezza nti obubbi obwali mu kalulu ka 2021 kwali tekubangawo. Ssentebe wa bboodi y’ekibiina kino, Miria Matembe, yategeezezza nti okulonda okuli okwa Pulezidenti, ababaka ba Palamenti wamu ne Sipiika waabwe kyali kuswaza eri enfuga ya demokulaasiya wamu ne bannayuganda. Okusinziira ku Miria Matembe essiga lya gavumenti lyeddiza okulonda era ye yasalawo ku ani alina okwesimbawo era n’obululu bw’alina okufuna. “Essiga lya gavumenti lyeddiza okulonda akulira essiga lya Palamenti mu kulonda alina okubeera Sipiika wa Palamenti y’e 11 era kino kyayongera okulaga nga gavumenti bwe yeddiza byonna ebikwata ku kulonda.” Matembe bwe yagambye. Matembe agamba nti mu kalulu akawedde amannya ga beesimbyewo gaatabulwa ku bukonge obulondebwawo ate ne baagenti b’abeesimbyewo bali batono era tewaali na kusomesa bantu ku kulonda. Omukwanaganya wa CCEDDU, Charity Ahimbisibwe, yalaze ng’omuwendo gw’abalonzi ogwali omutono bwe gwalaga nti abantu baali tebeesiga binaava mu kulonda kuno. Ahimbisibwe agamba nti effujjo n’okutulugunya ab’ebyokwerinda kwe bakola ku bannamawulire ng’akulira National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi, agenda ku kitebe ky’amawanga amagatte, byayongera okulaga engeri eddembe ly’obuntu gye lirinnyirirwa mu ggwanga. CCEDU yawadde amagezi wabeewo okusomesa n’okubangula abakungu b’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda okwewala ensobi ezaakolebwa okuddamu okubaawo. Bano era baasabye ab’ebyokwerinda okwewala okuyingira mu by’okulonda era ne basaba abalonzi okwewala okuweebwa enguzi nga babasaba akalulu.

headline: Buganda okubanja Federo tetunoonya kitiibwa – Owek. Kyewalabye Male
text: Minisita w’eby’obuwangwa, ennono, obulambuzi, embiri, olulimi n’ebyokwerinda mu Buganda, Owek. David Kyewalabye Maleagamba nti kaweefube wa Buganda okubanja Federo tenoonya kitiibwa, wabula eyagala kutuusa mpeereza ku bantu baayo. Okulambika kuno, Owek. Kyewalabye akukoledde mu bimuli bya Bulange ku Lwokubiri bw’abadde atikkula Oluwalo okuva mu bannakyaggwe,abasawo b’ekinnansi, ab’ekika ky’Empindi neMutuba VIII -Kikandwa okuva e Ssingo. “Okugema okwawedde mu Ssabbiiti emu nategedde nti twasusse omutwalo gumu n’ekkumi nnya mu bantu abagemeddwa. Kati alina ebintu byaffe abikutte nga Federo aba akyayagala ki? Okuggyako weema ze baalese wano tewali ssente ze baatuwadde kukola omulimu ogwo.Kitegeeza nti Buganda esobola okukola ku nsonga zaayo, bwetuba twogera ku Federo tetunoonya kitiibwa naye tunoonya okukola ku nsonga zaffe ezigenda okuggya abantu mu bwavu.” Owek. Kyewalabye bw’agambye. Okukkaatiriza kino, Minisita Kyewalabyeanokoddeyo okugaba omusaayi, emisinde gy’amazaalibwa ga Kabaka n’okugema okwekikungo, Emmwanyi Terimba ng’ebimu ku bintu ebitono Buganda by’ekoze n’eteekawo likodi ku mutendera gw’ensi yonna. Owek. Kyewalabye asabye abaami ba Kabaka okutwala enteekateeka za Buganda mu maaso kiyambe abantu be baweereza okweggya mu bwavu ne Buganda edde ku ntikko. Ono ajulizza ebyafaayo okukakasa Buganda n’okukola ebyafaayo nti n’abazungu bwe bajja kuno beewuunya enteekateeka eyaliwo kuba wadde baalowooza nti Afirika ekyali mabega baasanga Buganda esolooza, omusolo, ng’erina olukiiko n’omukulembeze Ssaabasajja Kabaka eyali aweebwa ekitiibwa. Owek. Kyewalabye agambye nti ennyumba Buganda yabangibwa mu bika bya Buganda ebiwerera ddala 55 era endagaano ya Ssekabaka Kato Kintu e Nnono ne bawaayo obumu ku buyinza bwabwe eri Ssaabataka, mwalimu okuyimirizaawo Ssaabatakanga kino kirambikira nnyo mu luwalo. Ye Minisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ez’ebitundu, Owek. Joseph Kawuki akubirizza abantu okwenyigira mu nteekateeka z’Obwakabaka zonna kuba zitegeddwa ku baganyula na kutumbula mbeera zaabwe. Omwami wa Kabaka akulembera essaza Kyaggwe, Ssekiboobo Elijah Boogereyeebazizza ab’ekika ky’Empindi okukulemberamu okuleeta Oluwalo luno era n’awera okuweerezaabantu ba Kabaka. Ate Ssentebe w’abasawo b’ekinnansi e Kyaggwe, Male Moses Byekwaso agamba nti ekibaleetedde okwenyigira mu nteekateeka eno kwe kubaako ettoffaali lye bazza eri Obaganda. Bano abakiise Embuga baleese Oluwalo lw’obukadde obukunukkiriza mu 12 era ne bawera okwongera okutambulira awamu ne Ssaabasajja Kabaka.

headline: Buganda ezzizza buggya omukago gwayo ne Airtel
text: Ekitongole ky’Obwakabaka eky’ebyempuliziganya ekya Airtel K2 ejjudde kizzizza buggya Omukago ne Airtel ogubaddegumaze emyaka esatu nga guyinda. Mu ndagaano eteereddwako omukono Ssenkulu wa K2 telecom, Arthur Mawanda ne Ssenkulu wa Airtel, Manoj Murali kitegeerekese nti kkampuni eno yaakwongera okunnyikiza obuweereza bwayo wansi mu byalo naddala mu Buganda okulaba ng’abantu ba Kabaka yonna gye bali baganyulwa mu mukago guno butereevu. Omukolo guno guyindidde ku mbuga enkulu e Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokutaano lwa wiiki eno. Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ng’abaddewo ng’omujulizing’endagaano eno ezzibwa obuggya, ategeezezza ntitekinologiya omuli neebyempuliziganya ntabiro nnene ey’enkulaakulanabuli omu gy’asaanye okwettanira.  Owek. Mayiga annyonnyoddenti omukago guno omuggya ogukoleddwaObwakabaka bwakugukuuma kuba nnamuziga y’amaanyimu kutumbula Buganda n’abantu ba Kabaka naddalamu byenfuna. Ate ye Omumyuka owookubiri owa Katikkiro, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa agambye nti omukago guno gwakuyambako okukyusa obulamu bw’abantu ba Kabaka kubanga gwa muwendo nnyo. Ye omukungu wa kkampuni ya Airtel, Remy Kisaakye ategeezezza nti okuva Airtel lwe yatta omukago n’Obwakabaka, eyongedde okuyitimuka mu mpeereza ne yeeyama okukuuma omukago guno. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako abakungu ba Kabaka ku mitendera egy’enjawulo.

headline: Katemba mu kulayira kwa bakkansala mu KCCA, Kataabu ajjidde ku njegere
text: Kampala Wabaddewo katemba ku kitebe kya KCCA ku mukolo gw’okulayiza bakkansala b’ekibuga, ekiwalirizza omulamuzi abadde akuliddemu omukolo guno okuguyimiriza. Katemba atandikidde ku kkansala wa Kampala Central, Moses Kataabu, ajjidde mu kakoofiira akamyufu okulayira era ng’asibiddwa mu njegere n’ekipande okuli obubaka obusaba Pulezidenti Museveni okuyimbula bannakibiina kyabwe. Omulamuzi Mariam Ayo asoose kulabula Kataabu ku ngeri gy’abadde ayambadde n’amusaba asooke abiggyemu kuba abadde ayambadde bubi. “Buli omu wano wa ddembe,” Omulamuzi Ayo bw’agambye era ne wabaawo okuwanyisiganya ebigambo ne Kataabu. “Kizibu ki ekiri ku ngeri gye nnyambadde? Ndi wano kulayira naye sirina buzibu bwonna. Bannayuganda bali mu buwambe, naffe tuli mu buwambe.” Kataabu bw’agambye. Omulamuizi alemeddeko n’agamba nti Kkansala Kataabu abadde tasobola kulayira ng’ayambadde enjegere. “Tetukukaka naye tusaba oggyeko enjegere. Okuggyako ng’oziggyeemu togenda kulayira.” Omulamuzi Ayo bw’alemeddeko. Poliisi eyingiddewo okukkakkanya embeera oluvannyuma lwa byonna okulema, omulamuzi asazeewo okwongezaayo omukolo guno era n’avaawo. Okuwanyisiganya ebigambo wakati wa poliisi ne bakkansala kugenze mu maaso era abamu ku bawagizi ne bakkansala ne batandika okuyimba oluyimba lwa Tuliyambala engule olwa Robert Kyagulanyi aka Bobi Wine akulira ekibiina kya NUP. Oluvannyuma Kataabu apondoose n’aggyako enjere era okulayira ne kugenda mu maaso wakati mu by’okwerinda ebibadde binywezeddwa.  Kinajjukirwa nti ekibiina kya Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu ekya National Unity Platform (NUP) kye kisinza bakkansala abangi mu lukiiko luno era nga kye kisuubirwa okuvaamu Sipiika.

headline: Ensaasaana Ya Covid-19 Mu Kampala Yeeraliikirizza Ab’ebyobulamu
text: Dr Ruth Aceng  Aba minisitule y’ebyobulamu beeraliikirivu olwensaasaana y’ekirwadde kya Covid-19 naddala mu Kampala ekiviiriddeko abantu babiri okutwalibwa mu kasenge k’abayi kayite Intesinve Care Unit.Newankubadde ng’eggwanga lirina abalwadde 1,140, ab’ebyobulamu batidde kubanga abalwadde abo ababiri basangiddwa mu bifo ebitabaddemu Covid-19 mu nga Kisenyi II mu Muluka gw’e Mengo wamu ne Lubaga. Minisita w’ebyobulamu Dr Jane Ruth Aceng yagambye batandise kaweefube w’okukebera abantu mu kitundu kino era nga woosomera bino nga abantu 75 abaasembererako abalwadde abo baamaze dda okuzuulibwa ekibinja ky’abakugu okuva mu minisitule wamu n’ekitongole ekiddukanya ekibuga Kampala ekya KCCA. Abakugu mu minisitule era balagaidde eddwaliro ly’e Lubaga ne Mengo abalwadde gyebaatwaliddwa mu busenge bwa bayi okubuggala.  Dr Henry Kajumbura, akulira okuziyiza eddwadde mu minisitule yagambye kino kyakoleddwa okusobola okuziyiza obulwadde okusaasaana. Wosomera bino nga abantu 54 bebazuuliddwamu obulwadde buno mu Kampala. Aba minisitule n’olwekyo bazzeemu okukuba omulanga eri abantu obuteerabira kunaaba mu ngalo, okwambala obukookolo, wamu nokwewala ebifo ebirimu abantu abangi. Dr Misaki Wayengera, omukugu mu nddwadde ezisiigibw ayagambye nti singa Bannayuganda tebeddako, Uganda egande kutuuka mu kaseera akakatyabaga ng’ekirwadde kisaasaanidde buli wamu.

headline: Ekiseera kituuse okukomya okuzaala abaana abalina Nalubiri- Nankindu
text: Oweek. Nankindu ng’abuuza ku Muwanga ku Bulange   Minisita avunanyizibwa ku nkulaakulana y’abantu Oweek. Dr Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma agambye nti ekiseera kituuse okukomya abaana abazaalibwa n’obulwadde bwa Sicklecells [Nalubiri] mu Uganda. Mu nsisinkano gyabaddemu n’akulira ekitongole kya Holly Foundation ekikola ku kulwanyisa obulwadde bwa Nalubiri, Mable Nakato Muwanga, Nankindu ategeezezza nti obulwadde buno buviiriddeko amaka mangi okutabanguka. “Tetusobola kwongera kuzaala baana abalina sickle cells olw’ebizibu ebingi bwebuleese omuli obwavu kubanga abazadde tebava mu malwaliro. Tetwagala muwendo gw’abaana abalina sickel cell kweyongera olwo lwetunaasobola okulwanyisa obulwadde buno,” Nankindu bwategeezezza. Ku lulwe, Muwanga ategeezezza nti okutandika Holly Foundation kyali kirooto kya muwalawe Holly eyaffa ekirwadde kya Nalubiri ng’alina emyaka 17. “Yali mu ddwaliro e Bungereza nagamba tusobola tutya okuyamba abantu, nemugamba tusooke tufe kuggwe tulyoke tufe ku bantu ba Uganda. Mu ddwaliro yamalayo emyezi esatu naye nga tanafa yatandika okusonda essente ayambe abantu abalina obulwadde buno. Yasiiga nga abantu enjala nga bamuwa pound emu era sente ezo nga aziweereza okuyamba abaana,” Muwanga bwagambye. Ekibiina kino kyatandika n’abaana musanvu. “Bweyafa nengamba nkole ntya, sisobola kusiiga enjala nga bwabadde akola. Naye bwennawulira nti Ssaabasajja Kabaka ayamba abantu abalina sicklecells nasanyuka nnyo. Namanya nti waliwo asobola okunkwatirako,” Muwanga bwagambye. Wetwogerera nga kati ekibiina kirabirira abantu abasukka mu 1000 mu bitundu bye Bamunaanika wamu ne Adjumani mu West Nile. Muwanga asabye abo bonna abasobola okubadduukirira babadduukirire basobole okugenda mu maaso n’okuyamba abantu bano.

headline: Sipiika asabye abakiise okubunyisa enjiri y’okwetangiramu Ekirwadde kya COVID-19
text: Omukubiriza w’Olukiiko lwa Buganda asabye abakiise b’olukiiko okusaasaanya engiri ku kwetangira Coronavirus eri abantu ba Kabaka. Oweek. Patrick Luwagga Mugumbule agambye abakiise b’olukiiko balina okugamba abantu biki byebalina okukola okwetangira ekirwadde kya Coronavirus. “Ssaabasajja Kabaka ayagala abantu abalamu kubanga amanyi g’eggwanga gabeera mu bantu abalamu,” Mugumbule bweyagambye. Agambye nti buvunaanyizibwa bw’abaami ba Kabaka okubeera abasaale mu kulwanyisa ekirwadde kino okusobola okukuuma abantu ba Beene nga balamu. Asabye abakiise okwekuuma era beewale okukyala wamu n’okukyaza abantu kubanga kino kiyinza okuviirako okusika obulwadde buno engeri gyebusaasaanyizibwa mu mpewo. Agasseeko nti Olukiiko lwa Buganda olwayimiriziddwa lubadde lwa njawulo kubanga obukiiko bw’olukiiko obw’enjawulo bubadde bugenda kwanjula enteekateeka zaabwo. Mu ngeri yeemu, Oweek Mugumbule akubirizza abazadde okufaayo ennyo ku Baana baabwe obutatambulatambula era bwekiba kisoboka babafunire ebintu ebiyinza okubakuumira awaka baleme kuwuubaala.

headline: Bakubaganyiza ebirowoozo ku mbalirira ya Buganda
text: Akakiiko k’olukiiko lwa Buganda akavunanyizibwa ku by’ensimbi katandise okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku mbalirira y’omwaka 2022/23. Embalirira eno esuubirwa okuba ey’obuwumbi 155 kyokka nga zisuubirwa okweyongerako yakukola ku bintu ebinaaba bigaanye mu mwaka gwebyensimbi 2021/22. Bwabadde abuulira olukiiko ebituukiddwako nebyetaaga okukolako wamu nokulambika puloojekiti ez’enjawulo Obwakabaka zebutuuseeko, Omumyuka Owokubiri owa Katikkiro era Omuwanika wa Buganda, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa ategezezza nti newankubadde nga basuubira obuwumbi 121 mu mwaka gwe by’ensimbi 2021/2022 gunaagenda okuggwako ng’obuwumbi 2 bweyongeddeko okuweza obuwumbi 123.   Owek. Nsibirwa annyonnyodde nti akakiiko kano biki Obwakabaka bwebusimbyeko essira mu mbalirira yebyensimbi eyomwaka 2021/2022 wakati mu kukulaakulana okweyongedde mu mirimu gyobwakabaka. Ono ategeezezza nti byonna bitambuliziddwa mu nsonga ssemasonga ettaano wakati mu kugoberera nnamutaayika eyabagibwa okutambulirako eyakamala emyaka 4 ngayatandika mu 2018. Abatuula ku kakiiko kano nga bakuliddwa Ssentebe waako, Prof. Umaru Kakumba n’Omumyuka we Kizito Mulwana basiimye Omuwanika olw’enteekateeka ennungi awamu n’emirimu egisobodde okukolebwa. Owek. Waggwa yebazizza bannamikago abakwatidde obwakabaka abeyongedde naddala okuva ebweru wa Buganda.   Embalirira eno egenda kusobozesa okumaliriza ennyumba Muzibuazaalampanga, okugulira ab’okubizinga bye Sese eryato, okwongera okugumizza ebyenjigiriza ebyobulamu, okuddaabiriza olubiri lwa Mujaguzo, okumaliriza ebizimbe byobwakabaka omugenda okuva ensimbi okubuwanirira n’ebirala. Akakiiko kakubiriziddwa Ssentebe waako Oweek Prof. Umar Kakembo era olutuula lwetabiddwamu Ssenkulu wa BICUL Omuk. Roland Ssebuufu, Ssenkulu wa Majestic Brands Omuk. Remmie Kisakye, Ssenkulu wa K2 telecom Omuk. Arthur Mawanda, Ssenkulu wa Namulondo Investments Omuk. Lilian Kaddu Bukirwa, Ssenkulu wa Weerinde Insurance Services Ltd Omuk. Jennifer Mirembe Ssensuwa.

headline: Ssaabalabirizi Mugalu akubirizza abantu okwagalana
text: Katikkiro ng’ali n’omusumba Mugalu Ssaabalabirizi w’ekkanisa ya Uganda omulonde Dr Steven Kazimba Mugalu, agambye Bannayuganda balina okwagalana n’ewankubadde nga baawukanya endowooza mu by’obufuzi n’amawanga. Bweyabadde ku mukolo gw’okuggulawo ekkanisa y’omutukuvu Lukka e Bulera Ssingo eyazimbiddwa munna Rotary era omukungu wa Kabaka Emmanuel Katongole, Kazimba yagambye nti eggwanga terisobola kugenda mumaaso nga abantu tebaagalana.“Uganda erimu abantu abalabika nti baagalana yadde babibiina byanjawulo. Abeesimbyewo mwagalane, abantu bebajja okuwa obululu bagambe nti ono yasinze nga naye mwe temwevumye. Nga Ssaabalabirizi omulonde, nsaba mwe abalonzi obutavuma bakulembeze.  Katikkiro nga aweebwa ekirabo Omulabirizi Kazimba Tulina ekizibu mu ggwanga lino nga n’abaana abato bavuma. Ensi bweggwamu ekitiibwa ng’eggwanga lifudde. Oba by’abufuzi oba by’amawanga tubisse kubbali okwagala kwa Katonda kukulembere byonna,” Kazimba bweyategeezezza. Yagasseeko nti Katonda yatonda abantu mu mawanga, mukikula, ne mu madiini ag’enjawulo basobole okwagalana. “Abantu tebakyayagala ggwanga lyabwe, bwolaba ebintu ebikolebwa, engeri abantu gyebalyamu enguzi biraga nti tebakyayagala ggwanga lyabwe. Omuntu yeefaako yekka nebamuwa ssente ezikola ku ddwaliro n’azeebulizaamu nga ne jjajjawe ajja kulwala.”  Omukungu Emmanuel Katongole ng’asimba omuti Omukolo guno era gwetabiddwamu Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga eyabadde omugenyi omukulu. Mu bubakabwe, Mayiga yasabye abantu batwale ekyokulabirako kya Katongole obuteerabira gyebaava. “Nkulisa Banna Bulera olw’okufuna ekkanisa eno ewundiddwa obulungi. Sikyabulijjo okufuna essinzizo nga lino mu bitundu ebye kyalo nga eno n’olwekyo muli baamukisa nti ekitundu kyammwe kivaamu abantu ab’obuvunanyizibwa ate abajjukira,” Mayiga bweyagambye. Wabula yabasabye omulimu guno bagutwale mumaaso baleme gulekera Katongole ne banne. “Yadde mufunye ababayambyeko okuzimba ekkanisa eno, musaana okumanya nti guno omulimu ggwammwe sigwa Katongole. Musaana okulabirira n’okukuza ekitundu kyammwe. Twafuna omuze mu Uganda ogwa Gavumenti etuyambe, n’omuntu kyasobola okwekolera alinda bamuyambe,” Mayiga bweyagambye. Omukolo gwetabiddwako; Minisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ez’ebitundu Owek Joseph Kawuki, abaami ba Kabaka ku mitendera egy’enjawulo, bannabyabufuzi, n’abantu abalala bangi.

headline: Buganda ekwataganye ne Budaaki okutumbula eby’obulimi
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bugenda kukwatagana n’eggwanga lya Budaaki nga buyita mu kitebe kyayo wano okusobola okutumbula ebyobulimi awamu n’enkolagana wakati w’amawanga gombi. Bino bituukiddako mu nsisinkano ebaddewo wakati wa Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga n’omubaka wa Budaaki kuno, Dr. Karen Bovin ku Lwokutaano mu mbuga enkulu e Bulange e Mmengo. “Ekitebe kya Budaaki kifaayo nnyo ku mbeera z’abantu ba Uganda era mubalabye nga beenyigira mu pulojekiti ezitwala ebyobulimi mu maaso kw’ossa n’ekikula ky’abantu awamu n’okukuuma obutonde bw’ensi. Ensisinkano eno ne Ambasada, yaakwongera nkolagana ku nsonga zino kuba ng’Obwakabaka tulina enteekateeka ng’emmwanyi Terimba, Bulungibwansi n’okusimba emiti mu kwanjula n’okwabya ennyimbe.” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye. Ono annyonnyodde nti enteekateeka zino nkulu mu Bwakabaka kuba, amaka agalina ssente ze gayingiza, gasobola bulungi okulabirira abantu baayo ng’okuweerera abaana n’okulabirira ebyobulamu bwabwe awamu n’okubaliisa obulungi.  Okusinziira ku Mayiga, singa obutonde bw’ensi bulabirirwa bulungi, Uganda ejja kuba esobola okwesigama ku ttaka kuba abasinga omulimu gwe bamanyi kwe kulima. Katikkiro Mayiga ategeezeza nti enkolagana y’Obwakabaka n’eggwanga lya Budaaki eruubiriddwamu okukulaakulanya abantu ba Buganda n’eggwanga okutwaliza awamu, okuyita mu bulimi n’Obulunzi kubanga Ssaabasajja ayagala abantu be nga bali mu bulamu obweyagaza. Owek. Mayigaagamba nti Budaaki yeemu ku nsi ezikulaakulanye okuyita mu bulimi n’Obulunzi ng’ebyokuliyigirako nkumu ng’okulimira awatano naddala mu kiseera kino ng’ettaka lyafuuka lya kulwanira. Omubaka wa Budaaki mu ggwanga Dr. Karen Bovin ategeezeza nti enkolagana yaabwe n’Obwakabaka esuubirwamu bingi era beeteefuteefu okukolaganira awamu okulaba ng’ekiruubirirwa kyayo kigguka. Oluvannyuma Dr. Karen, Katikkiro Mayiga amulambuzizza ebifo byenkizo mu mbuga okwongera okutegeera n’okuyiga ebifa ku Bwakabaka era amutonedde n’ebirabo ebiwerako.

headline: Kabaka adduukiridde abakoseddwa Kolona n’obukadde 100
text: Ssaabaminisita Dr Livingstone Ruhakana Rugunda ku kkono ate ku ddyo ye Mulangira David Wasajja Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi adduukiridde abantu abakoseddwa ekirwadde kya Coronavirus n’ebintu ebibalirirwamu obukadde 100.  Bwabadde akwasa ebintu bino omubadde sabbuuni, tanka z’amazzi aganaaba mu ngalo, ebikozesebwa abasawo, akawunga n’ebirala, Ssabaminisita wa Uganda Dr Livingstone Ruhakana Rugunda, Omulangira David Kintu Wasajja, ategeezezza nti Kabaka ali wamu n’abantu be mu mbeera eyakazigizigi. “Tusuubira bwetukwasaganyiza awamu, tujja kusobola okulwanyisa obulwadde buno. Ssaabasajja atukubirizza okugondera ebiragiro bya gavumenti okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino naddala obuyonjo,” Wasajja bwagambye.  Agambye nti eno yeentaandikwa bajja kugenda mu maaso ng’abakwatizaako gavumenti okulaba nti ekirwadde kino kituulwa ku nfeete.

headline: Kabaka Ayozaayozezza Abayisiraamu Okumalako Ekisiibo
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II ayozaayozezza Abayisiraamu mu Uganda olw’okumalako omwezi gwa Ramadhan, og’okusiiba wakati mu kusoomoozebwa kw’ekirwadde kya coronavirus. Mu bubakabwe obuwandiike, Kabaka ategeezezza nti ekisiibo ky’omwaka guno kibadde kizibu ddala naye n’asaba Abayisiraamu okugenda mu maaso nga bassa mu nkola ebiragiro bya gavumenti kukulwanyisa COVID-19. Obubaka mu bujjuvu Tukulisa nnyo bannaffe Abayisiraamu olw’okuyita mu mwezi omutukuvu ogwa Ramadhan era tubaagalaiza okusaala obulungi Eid el Fitri. Tutuuse mu kiseera kino ng’ensonga enkulu eriwo munsi yonna ye y’obulwadde bwa COVID-19 obwalumba ensi mu myezi mitono egiyise kyokka nga kati busaasaanidde amawanga agasinga obungi era nga bukosezza n’ebyokusinza nga kati Abakkiriza basinziza mu maka gaabwe ekiraze nti mu buli mbeera tulina kutambulira ku biragiro bya Allah. Wano mu Uganda tusaasira n’okusabira abantu baffe abazuuliddwamu obulwadde buno. Tikkiriza nti obujjanjabi bwe bafuna okuva eri abasawo bujja kubayamba okussuuka. Tusaasira nnyo enganda z’abantu baffe Bannayuganda abafudde obulwadde bwa COVID-19 mu nsi yonna. Tusabira n’abo abakyali mu mbeera embi ennyo mu mawanga ago bassuuke. Okusiiba y’emu kumpagi enkulu ez’obuyisiraamu, Abayisriraamu mwe beeweerayo ddala eri Omukama nga beerekereza ebimu ku bintu ebikulu mu bulamu era nga beebaza Katonda olw’obutonzi n’ebirungi by’awa abaddube wamu n’okumwegayirira okuwa ekisonyiwo eri ebyo ebitagenze bulungi mu maaso g’Omukama. Mukiseera kino eky’okusoomoozebwa, twongere okunyweza ebiragiro by’abasawo ne’bya gavumenti nga bwetulambikiddwa okwekuuma Ssenyiga wa COVID-19. Tukuume eddembe, okusonyiwagana n’okudduukirira abantu ba Katonda abali mu mbeera embi. Tubaagaliza okuyita obulungi mu kujaguza Eid el fitri. Allah abakuume.

headline: Museveni akungubagidde eyali omukulembeze wa Kenya Moi
text: Museveni ne Daniel arap Moi   Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni akungubagidde eyali omukulembeze w’eggwanga lya Kenya, Daniel arap Moi, eyafudde enkya ya leero ku myaka 95. Ng’ayogerako n’omukutu gwa TV y’e Kenya KTN, Museveni agambye nti Moi yali ayagala nnyo eggwanga ly’e Kenya wamu n’omukago ogugatta amawanga g’obuvanjuba bwa Africa.  Museveni yategeezezza nti ga bali wamu n’eyali omukulembeze wa Tanzania, Hassan Mwinyi, Moi bazzaawo omukago guno ogwali gwa sasika mu 1976 olw’obutakkanya wakati w’omukulembeze wa Uganda obudde obo Idi Amin Dada nemunne owa Tanzania, Julius Nyerere.  “Kale tetujja kugamba nti twawangudde kikumi ku kikumi naye lwakiri tufunayo ataano kubanga kati omukago gwaddawo,” Museveni bweyagambye.  Moi yafuga Kenya okuva 1978 oluvanyuma lw’okufa kweyali mukamaawe gwe yali amyuka, Jommo Kenyatta okutuusa mu 2002 bweyawaayo obuyinza oluvanyuma lw’ekibiina kye okuwangulwa omukago gw’ebibiina ogwali gukulirwa eyali pulezidenti Mwai Kibaki.  Tekinategeerekeka ddi Moi lwanaazikibwa wabula omukulembeze wa Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta yalangiridde ebbanga ey’okukungubaga okutuuka nga Moi aziikiddwa.  Kenyatta era yalangiridde nti bendera ya Kenya yakwewuubira wakati mu mirongooti okutuusa nga Moi aziikiddwa.

headline: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda butegese okugaba omusaayi
text: Abantu bajjumbidde okugaba omusaayi ku Bulange Abamu ku bantu abenyigidde mu kugaba omusaayi mu bimuli bya Bulange Okugaba omusaayi kuno kwategekeddwa Obwakabaka bwa Buganda nga buyita mu kitongole kyabwo ekya Kabaka Foundation nga bakolera wamu ne Minisitule y’ebyobulamu mu bwa Kabaka bwa Buganda era nga kwakumala enaku bbiri.  Omumyuka wa Katikkiro asooka era Minisita w’eby’emirimu n’obuyiiya, Prof Twaha Kigongo Kaawaase, wamu n’omulangira Cryspin Jjunju Kiwewa, bakulembeddemu abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka okugaba omusaayi mu nteekateeka egenda mu maaso ku Bulange eyennaku ebbiri. Omumyuka wa Katikkiro asooka Hajji Twaha Kawaase nga agaba omusaayi.Omulangira Cryspin Jjunju Kiweewa nga agaba omusaayi. Owek Kaawaase asabye abantu ba Kabaka awamu ne banna Ugnanda bonna okujjumbira enteekateeka eno kubanga endwadde nnyingi eziruma abantu nga neezimu kwezo zetaaga omusaayi oguwerako. Omulangira Cryspin Jjunju ategeezezza nti buvunaanyizibwa bwa buli muntu okufaayo okulwanirira obulamu bwabo abali  mu bwetaavu naddala abalwadde. Okusinziira ku ba National Blood Bank, eggwanga lyetaaga unit z’omusaayi ezisukka mu mitwalo asatu mwetaano (350,000), n’olwekyo obwetaavu bw’omusaayi bwamaanyi okusobola okutaasa obulamu bw’abantu.

headline: Buganda esse omukago naba Co-operative Alliance okutumbula obweggasi
text: Obwakabaka butadde omukono ku ndagaano y’okukolaganira awamu n’ekitongole ekitwala ebibiina by’obwegassi mu Uganda n’ekigendererwa eky’okutumbula obwegassi mu Buganda. Minisita Omubeezi ow’obulimi n’Obwegassi Oweek Hajji Amisi Kakomo yataddeko omukono kulw’obwakabaka, ate Ssaabawandiisi wa Uganda Cooperative Alliance Ivan Asiimwe nassaako omukono kulwa UCA.  Omukolo guno gubadde mu Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokuna era abakulu basinzidde wano nebasaba abantu okwettanira enteekateeka eno nga Ssaabawolereza Christopher Bwanika yabaddewo ng’ omujulizi kulw’ Omumyuka wa Katikkiro Asooka Owek. Twaha Kaawaase Kigongo. Owek. Bwanika asinzidde wano nasaba abantu ba Kabaka okwenyigira mu bweggasi kiyambeko ensi okulaakulana n’okweggya mu bwavu. Ono annyonnyodde nti obwakabaka bwetegefu okukolagana ne kitongole kino obweggasi okukunga abavubuka okukola emirimu kiyambeko okutumbula embeera zabwe. Owek. Bwanika agamba nti kino kyakuyambako okumalawo okusoomezebwa kwebasanga nga Buganda okutuusa empeereza eno ku bantu ba Kabaka era nasaba gavumenti ezzeewo bbanka y’Obweggasi mu ggwanga.  Ye Ssaabawandisi w’ekitongole ki Uganda Co-operative Alliance Ltd, Ivan Asiimwe ategezezza nga obweggasi bwe bwatandikira mu Buganda nalaga obukulu bw’okukwatagana ne Buganda okukyuusa endowooza z’abantu ku bweggasi. Asiimwe era ayongerako nti enteekateeka eno yeetaaga okusomesa abaana b’amasomero ku nteekateeka eno kuba esobola bulungi okubayamba okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byabwe. Ssentebe w’ekitongole ki Uganda Co-operative Alliance, Kimbowa Peter, ategeezezza nti kati ekitongole kino kifulumya kontayini z’emmwaanyi 200 buli mwaka bwatyo nakubiriza abantu okwenyigira by’ Obweggasi.

headline: Kabaka asiimye omutindo gw’empaka z’amasaza
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II asiimye nnyo minisitule y’ebyemizannyo e Mmengo olw’omutindo ogwa waggulu gwetegekerako empaka z’emipiira gy’amasaza. Bwabadde ku mukolo ogw’okuyozaayoza tiimu y’essaza lye Bulemeezi olw’okuwangula ekikopo ky’emipiira gy’amasaza egya 2019, e Bamunaanika ku kisaawe, Omutanda agambye nti emipiira gino gigenda kukozesebwa ng’erimu ku makubo ag’okugatta abantu.  Kabaka ng’alamusa ku bantu  “Twebaza ekitongole ky’e Mmengo ekivunanyizibwa ku mizannyo olw’entegeka y’emipiira ennungi. Twebaza abazannyi, abakulembeze ba tiimu, abakulembeze b’essaza n’abo bonna abaakwatira ku tiimu y’essaza. Obuwanguzi bwemwatuukako fenna tubwenyumirizaamu era tusanyuka nnyo okulaba nga buli mwaka omutindo gw’empaka zino gweyongera bweyongezi,” Kabaka bwagambye.  Katikkiro ng’abuuza ku Bannadiini Agasseeko nti empaka zino bazitunuulira ng’erimu ku makubo ag’okugatta abantu, n’olwekyo n’asaba abazannyi ettutumu lye bafuna balikozese okutuusa obubaka ku nsonga enkulu ez’obulamu bw’abantu omuli n’okulwanyisa obulwadde bwa siriimu mu bavubuka. Kabaka era ayozaayozezza amassaza gonna agaavuganya mu mpaka za 2019. Yeebazizza nnyo eb’eBulemeezi olw’okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu mpaka zayayogeddeko nti zaalimu okuvuganya okwamannyi.  Kabaka ng’alamusa ku bazannyi ba tiimi ya Bulemeezi Ku mukolo gwegumu, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga, asiimye nnyo Ssaabasajja Kabaka olw’okukkiriza n’agabula banna Bulemeezi ekijjulo olw’okuwangula ekikopo. “Okuva empaka lwezaatandika mu 1964, ate n’okuva lwe zazzibwawo mu 2004, wabadde tewannabaawo mulundi Omuteregga lweyagabula essaza eriba liwangudde muyogeeyoge,” Mayiga bwagambye. Asabye ab’eBulemeezi okukuuma ennyo Namulondo kubanga mu ssaza lyabwe Kabaka alinamu Olubiri wamu n’ettaka. “Aba Nkuluze bwebabayita nti muggye mutereeze obusenze bwammwe ku ttaka nga musitukiramu kubanga Kabaka mubeera naye, ye Nnamunswa,” Mayiga bwagambye. Ayongeddeko nti newankubadde banna Bulemeezi bawanguzi era babasanyukirako, wabula balina okulaga nti bbo Kabaka baasiimye mungeri ey’enjawulo si baakuzannya. “Kijja kuba kya kitiibwa nga muzzeemu okusitukira mukikopo kino 2020, era bwetunaategeera nti okuwangula mu 2019 terwali lukisakisa,” Mayiga bwagambye. Katikkiro era ategeezezza nti obuwanguzi mu mizannyo bwetaaga empisa mu bazannyi, abatendesi n’abakugu, abalamuzi, wamu n’abaguddukanya. “Bwemunaabinyweza osanga ne kuluno mu naawangula.”  Kabaka ngatuuka ku kisaawe e Bamunaanika Atwala essaza lino Kkangaawo, Ronald Mulondo yebazizza nnyo Ssaabasajja Kabaka olw’okusiima Bulemeezi okubeera essaza erisoose mu byafaayo okusiimibwa olw’okuwangula ekikopo ekya masaza. “Tukusuubiza Beene nti abamasaza amalala enaaba ntaanya okututwalako ekikopo. Tukusuubiza okukikuuma ebbanga lyonna,” Mulondo bwagambye. Bulemeezi yakuba Busiro ggoolo 1:0 mumpaka ez’akamalirizo ezaali mu kisaawe maasogalikwoleka, e Namboole.

headline: Sseggirinya ayimbuddwa ku kakalu kkooti
text: Jinja Omulamuzi wa kkooti esookerwako e Jinja, Annie Kyomuhangi, ayimbudde eyeesimbyewo ku bubaka bwa Kawempe North mu Palamenti, Muhammad Sseggirinya ku kakalu ka kkooti.  Sseggirinya yakwatibwa wiiki ewedde e Nalufenya mu Jinja bwe yali aweereza butereevu obubaka ku mukutu gwe ogwa Facebook, ab’obuyinza bwe bagamba nti bwali bukuma mu bantu omuliro. Ono yavunaanibwa okukuma mu bantu omuliro wamu n’okukuba olukung’aana olumenya amateeka era n’asindikibwa mu kkomera e Kirinnya gy’abadde akuumirwa okutuuka olwaleero. Munnamateeka wa Sseggirinya, Shamim Malende, asabye kkooti okukkiriza omuntu we okweyimirirwa kubanga omusango ogumuvunaanibwa gumu ku ejjo egikkirizibwa okweyimirirwa. Omulamuzi alagidde Sseggirinya okuwaayo akakalu ka kakadde kalamba akatali ka buliwo ate abamweyimiridde okuli; Andrew Muwanguzi akulira NUP mu Busoga ne Molson Bizitu Sipiika w’ekibuga ky’e Jinja buli omu okusasula akakadde kamu akatali kabuliwo. Kyomuhangi alagidde Sseggirinya okudda mu kkooti nga 15/ December/2020 okuddamu okuwulira omusango ogumuvunaanwa. Munnamateeka Malembe asabye kkooti eragire poliisi okuddiza Ssegirinya essimu ze zirumamyo ebbiri, paasipooti, endagamuntu wamu n’emmotoka ye ebyatwalibwa poliisi ng’akwatibwa. Malende era ategeezezza kkooti ng’ekiseera Sseggirinya kye yamaze ng’aggaliddwa ku poliisi e Nalufenya, bwe yagaanibwa okulabibwako abooluganda lwe ne bannamateeka be, ekintu ekimenya amateeka.

headline: Omulamuzi Bamugemereirwe asabye abazadde okwagazisa abaana ennyimba z’amaloboozi
text: Omulamuzi wa kkooti ejulirwamu, Catherine Bamugemereire asabye abazadde okwagazisa abaana abalina ekitone ky’okuyimba okwettanira ennyimba z’amaloboozi kuba zirimu eby’okuyiga bingi okusinga ez’ensi. Bino abyogeredde mu kibbiitu ky’omwaka eky’ennyimba z’amaloboozi aba Gospel Crescendo Elite Choir kyebategese mu kisaawe kya Mengo Senior School akawungeezi k’eggulo gyeyabadde omugenyi omukulu. Omulamuzi Bamugemereirwe agamba nti kino kijja kubayamba okukuza ebitone byabwe ate basigale nga bampisa era banguyire obulamu kuba bajja kukula nga balina ekigendererwa.  Ono bwatyo asabye abantu obutagwamu ssuubi mu mbeera eno enyigiriza omutali nsimbi endwadde ezisomooza nebizibu ebirala bwatyo nasaba abantu okwegendereza ngabayingira omwaka 2023. Akulira ebyenjiri mu bulabirizi bwe Namirembe, Rev. Samuel Muwonge yeebazizza abategesi olwokutegeka ekivvulu ekitaliimu byesitaza wakati mukuzza abantu eri katonda n’okubawa essanyu ly’ ebikujjuko bya Sekukkulu. Ye Pulezidenti wa ‘Gospel Crescendo Elite Choir’, Ronald Keeya Ssenabulya ategeezezza nti Choir eno kati eri mu myaka 20 ngasinga tebayingiza bavubuka yandisanaawo kyokka ng’enjiri y’Omutonzi erina okubuulirirwa mu nnyimba. Ekibbiitu kino kigenda kuberangawo buli mwaka choir ezenjawulo mwezegattira ku Gospel Cresecendo Elite Choir okukoloobya enyimba ezitendereza Omutonzi.

headline: Omubaka Lukwago owa Kyotera avunaaniddwa  ogw’okusaasaanya Corona
text: Kyotera – Buddu Omubaka omulonde ow’essaza ly’e Kyotera mu Palamenti, Lukwago John Paul Mpalanyi, yasimbiddwa mu kkooti esookerwako e Kaliisizo n’avunaanibwa emisango Ssennyiga Corona. Okusinziira ku mulamuzi w’eddaala erisooka mu kkooti eno, Mufitundinda George, omubaka ono yakuba enkung’aana e Nakatoogo mu ggombolola ye Nabigasa olwali lumenya amateeka. Kinajjukirwa nti olukung’aana luno lwafiiramu omuwagizi wa Mpalanyi Richard Kayabula, poliisi eyali edduumirwa DPC w’e Kyotera, Judith Akello, bwe yali egezaako okugumbulula olukung’aana. Omuwaabi wa gavumenti, Tukwasibwe Alex, yalumirizza Omubaka Mpalanyi okulemerako n’akuba olukung’aana luno nga Decemba 4 wadde nga yali akimanyi bulungi nti lumenya mateeka. Ono era agasseeko nga Mpalanyi bwe yakuba olukung’aana olulala mu Ttawuni kkanso y’e Kyotera mu October 16 ekyali kimenya ebiragiro bya gavumenti. Mpalanyi emisango gyonna  egimusomeddwa agyegaanye  n’agamba nti bino byonna bikolebwa Minisita Haruna Kasolo bwe baali bavuganya. Ono yannyonnyodde kkooti nti olukung’aana lwa Decemba 4 lwaliko abantu batono era baali bagoberedde ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona. Ye munnamateeka wa  Mpalanyi , Alexander Lule owa Xander &  Co. Advocates agamba nti emisango egiteekeddwa ku muntu waabwe mijweteke era mu bwangu kkooti ejja kumwejjeereza. Mu ngeri y’emu Ssentebe wa disitulikiti  y’e Kyotera, Patrick Kintu Kisekulo, yalumirizza Minisita Kasolo okuwa ebiragiro ebyavaako omuwagizi waabwe okufa nga yeekwese mu Ssennyiga Corona wadde baali bagoberedde amateeka. Oluvannyuma omulamuzi Mufitundinda George akirizza Omubaka Mpalanyi okweyimirirwa ku bukadde 4 ezitali zaabuliwo ku misango 2 egimuvunaanibwa wamu n’abamweyimiridde bana (4) ku bukadde 4 buli muntu akakadde kamu akatali kaabuliwo. Era omusango guno gwakuddamu okuwulirwa nga 13 omwezi ogujja.

headline: Kkooti egobye Omusango Kidandala gwe yawaabira Ssegiriinya
text: Kkooti enkulu mu Kampala egobye omusango gwa Sulaiman Kidandala gwe yali yatwalayo ng’awakanya okulondebwa kwa Muhammad Ssegiriinya ku bubaka bwa Kawempe North ng’agamba nti talina buyigirize bumusobozesa kufuuka mubaka wa Palamenti. Kidandala nga yakwata kyakubiri mu kalulu k’omubaka wa Kawempe North aka 2021 n’obululu7,512, yali yawaabira Ssegiriinya eyawangula ekifo kino n’obululu 41,197 olw’empapula z’obuyigirize ezitali zize. Wabula akakiiko k’ebyokulonda nga nako Kidandala yali yakawaabira, kaasaba kkooti egobe omusango guno kuba omuwawaabirwa asooka Muhammad Ssegiriinya yali teyategeezebwako nti bamuwaabidde ng’etteeka bwerigamba. Bannamateeka ba Kidandala baalemerakonga bagamba nti Ssegiriinya baamutwalira ebbaluwa eraga nti bamuwaabidde mu kkomera e Kitalya wabula n’agaana okugikwata nga yeekwasa nti munnamateeka we taliiwo. Ku Lwokubiri, Omulamuzi Henrietta Wolayoomusango yagugobye ng’agamba nti bannamateeka ba Kidandala tebalina bukakafu bwonna bukakasa nti Ssegiriinya baamuwa ekiwandiiko ekiraga nti baamuwaabira ng’etteeka bwe linnyonnyola. “Akulira ekkomera ly’e Kitalya yalina okukwata ekiwandiiko kino ku lwa Ssegiriinya.” Omulamuzi Wolayo bw’ategeezezza mu nsala ye esomeddwaamyuka omuwandiisi wa kkooti eno, Agnes Alum. Omulamuzi annyonnyodde nti ekiragiro ky’okuwa Ssegiriinya ebbaluwa emutegeeza nti baamuwabira kyali kirina kukolebwa ng’ebbaluwa bagiwa Ssegiriinya mu kkomera gye yali oba nga bayita mu akulira ekkomera lino eyalina okubawa lisiiti ekakasa ntiagifunye eran’agitimba ne ku ‘Notice Board’ y’ekkomera. Wolayo agamba nti wadde ebbaluwa eno baagitimba ku kkooti naye ate Ssegiriinya eyali mu kkomera tebaagimuwa. “Kino kitegeeza nti ebbaluwa Ssegiriinya teyamutuukako. Omusango tegusobola kugenda mu maaso kuba omuwawaabirwa teyategeezebwa era ngugobye.” Omulamuzi Wolayo bw’ategeezezza. Kino kitegeeza nti Ssegiriinya ye mubaka omujjuvu owa Kawempe North mu Palamenti nga singa Kidandala anaaba tajulidde ajja kuba alina okulinda omwaka gwa 2026 okuddamu okuvuganya asobole okusuuza Ssegiriinya entebe eno.

headline: Kasule Lumumba :  Bobi Wine okuggyayo omusango yakikoze kwonoona kifaananyi kya kkooti
text: Kampala Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM), Justine Kasule Lumumba, alabudde bannabyabufuzi okukomya okweyagaliza n’ebigendererwa ebikyamu mu kifo ky’okwonoona ekifaananyi kya kkooti z’eggwanga. Ssaabawandiisi wa NRM, Kasule Lumumba  Kino kiddiridde munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) era Pulezidenti waakyo Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine okulagira bannamateeka be okuggyayo omusango mw’abadde awakanyiza obuwanguzi bwa Museveni ng’agamba nti kkooti yazeefuga. Lumumba yalumirizza Kyagulanyi nti okusooka yali agaanye okugenda mu kkooti kyokka n’amala ne yeekyusa, ekiraga nti yalina ebigendererwa bye. “Ensonga ya Mw. Kyagulanyi okugamba nti Ssaabalamuzi Owiny-Dollo n’Omulamuzi Mike Chibita okuva mu musango olw’okuba baakolaganako ne Museveni ky’abadde kyakwekwasa.” Lumumba bwe yagambye. Okusinziira Ku Lumumba, Pulezidenti Museveni abadde mu by’obufuzi n’obukulembeze okumala emyaka 50 nga kizibu okusanga omuntu atakolaganyeeko naye mu banene abali mu ggwanga. Lumumba yeewuunyizza lwaki Kyagulanyi yakyukidde ekitongole ekiramuzi ate nga mu 2020 omulamuzi Ssekaana yawa ensala ye, Kyagulanyi n’awangula omusango ku kuwandiisibwa kw’ekibiina kye. “Mw. Kyagulanyi ne banne baali basanyufu nga bawangudde omusango naye kati olw’okuba kkooti ensukkulumu yagaanye okubakkiriza okukola ennongoosereza mu mpaaba yaabwe era ne baweebwa amagezi ku kye balina okukola naye kati kkooti azivumirira.” Lumumba bwe yakkaatiriza. Lumumba yasabye Kyagulanyi okutawa bawagizi be ssuubi litaliiwo era bakomye okukkiririza mu bulimba obutambulira ku mutimbagano omuli n’emmeeri ya Amerika eyagobye e Mombasa.

headline: Katikkiro asabye bannabizineensi okusiga ssente mu Masaka
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga, asabye abagagga abalina akakwata ku kibuga Masaka okulabira kw’ abadde nannyini wa Mariaflo, Antanansius Bazzekuketta, eyasalawo okusiga ssente gyazaalwa okusobola okuleetawo enkulaakulana. Bweyabadde akungubagira Bazekuketta ow’emyaka 79 eyasangiddwa nga afiiridde mu buliri mu bimu ku bisenge bya wooteri ye wiiki ewedde. Bweyali tanadda Masaka mu 1987, Bazzekuketta yali musuubuzi mu Kampala. Bweyabadde akiikiridde Katikkiro Mayiga mu kuziika omugenzi ku kyalo Bulando ku Lwokutaano, Ppookino Jude Muleke yagambye nti ebintu byonna ebikulaakulanye biyambiddwako abantu bakwo bennyini Katonda beyasitula mu byenfuna. “Mzee Antanansi yalaga eky’okulabirko bweyakomawo e Masaka nateekawo wooteri kwokomya amaaso. Bannabizineensi bangi abazaalibwa e Masaka nga bawangaalira Kampala basobola okumulabirako nebakulaakulanya ekibuga Masaka,” Ppookino bwe yagambye kulwa Katikkiro Mayiga. Ono ayogedde ku mugenzi ng’omuntu abadde ayagala buli muntu era omukozi. Eyakulembeddemu okusabira omugenzi era Vicar General w’essaza lye Masaka, Msgr Dominic Ssengoba yasabye abantu okuzza obuggya enkolagana yabwe ne Katonda nga tebanaba kumusisinkana. Minisita w’ebyokwerinda, Vincent Ssempijja, yategeezezza nga Mzee Antanansi bw’alese omukululo nasaba abaana be okugukuuma. Muwala w’omugenzi, Harriet Nabakoza Musoke, yayogedde ku kitaawe ng’omuntu abadde ayagala abantu era Muzzanganda. Musoke agamba nti kitaabwe yasalawo okwesimira entaana mwarizikibwa okusobola okubaziyiza okusaasaanya ensimbi mu maziika ge. Yeebazizza Bannamasaka olw’omukwano gwebalina eri kitaabwe era nabasaba enkolagana egende mu maaso ne famire y’omugenzi. Nannyini Brovad Hotel, Sarah Kiyimba kulwa basuubuzi mu Masaka asabye abaana b’omugenzi okukola buli kisoboka bakuume ekitiibwa kya kitaabwe.

headline: Minisita Kiyimba asabye abayizi okwegatta ku kulwanyisa Mukenenya
text: Minisita wa Buganda avunaanyizibwa ku nsonga z’Olukiiko, Kkabineeti era omwogezi w’ Obwakabaka Owek. Noah Kiyimba asabye abayizi okusitukiramu beegatte ku lutalo lw’okulwanyisa akawuka ka Mukenenya. Okwogera bino Minisita Kiyimba abadde Mityana ku ssomero lya MUMSA High School mu mpaka ezitegekeddwa okubangula abayizi ku ngeri gyebasobola okwogerera mu bantu (Public Speaking) awatali kwetya. Owek. Kiyimba agamba nti okunoonyereza okukyasembyeyo okukolebwa kulaze nti okusinga akawuka kano kali nnyo mu bavubuka nga bwekityo basaanye okwenyigiramu butereevu okukalwanyisa.  Ono abayizi era abakuutidde okukozesa obulungi ebiseera byebalina mu ssomero nga bafuna obukugu naddala obukwatagana nebyo byebasobola okweyambisa mu bulamu obwabulijjo era obudde beewale okubumalira mu bitabo byokka. Owek. Kiyimba yasabye abayizi obutagayalirira kitone ky’akwogera mubantu kubanga kyankizo mukusalawo ensonga era n’okugulira omuntu emikisa. Ono yabeebazizza olw’okuvaayo nebawagira emirimu gy’Obwakabaka nga bagula Ssatifikeeti okusinziira mu nnyumba ez’enjawulo mwebegattira okuli; Jjunju n’ ensimbi 2,012,500, Kimera n’essente 1,305,000, Kintu ne ssente 1,059,000 ate Bemba nesemba n’emitwalo 66.  Ye omutandisi w’essomero lino era minisita omubeezi avunaanyizibwa ku gavumenti ez’ebitundu mu Buganda, Owek. Joseph Kawuki yeebazizza Obwakabaka olw’okubeera eky’okulabirako kuba kyekimu ku bintu ebyamuwaliriza okutandika essomero lino. Owek. Kawuki agamba nti ensangi zino bantu abasinga tebamanyi kwogera mu bantu nga kigwanidde okubangula abayizi mu nteekateeka eno kuba bano bebakulembeze ab’enkya.

headline: Mao asuubizza okumalawo ekibbattaka mu Kayunga
text: Kayunga Akawatidde ekibiina kya Democratic Party omumuli ku bwapulezidenti bwa Uganda mu kalulu ka 2021, Nobert Mao, asuubizza okugoba ekibbattaka mu bitundu by’e Kayunga singa anaalondebwa ku bwapulezidenti. Ssenkaggale Nobert Mao nga anoonya akalulu “Tulina enteekateeka y’okulaba nti mweddiza ettaka lyammwe eribanyagiddwako, tugenda kuteekawo obukiiko bw’abalamuzi obunaatunula mu nsonga z’ettaka era bwe kinaazuulibwa nti kituufu ettaka lino liryo nga likuddira, ettaka libeera lya bannyini lyo, ettaka lye Kayunga lya bannakayunga,” Mao bwe yagambye ng’anoonya akalulu mu kitundu kino eggulo ku Lwomukaaga. Mao wano era we yayanjulidde akutte bbendera ku kifo ky’omubaka omukyala Lydia Wabuza era n’asuubiza okukola ku bizibu ebyenjawulo bye basanga omuli amalwaliro n’ebyenjigiriza ebibi. Abamu ku batuuze okuli John Ssentamu ne Peter Kiryowa, baasuubizza Mao obuwagizi era ne bamusaba bw’atuuka mu ntebe atandikire ku kizibu ky’amazzi amayonjo wamu n’okutereeza enguudo zaabwe okulaba nti zibanguyiza okutuusa ebirime byabwe ku katale. Mao wadde yabadde alina okunoonya akalulu e Mukono ne Buikwe, olwamaze okunoonya akalulu e Kayunga nayolekera ku butaka e Gulu okusobola okwetaba mu kuziika ow’oluganda lwe.

headline: Mulonde abalina emiramwa egitugasa nga Buganda – Owek. Mayiga
text: Bulange- Mmengo Kamalabyonna wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, asabye abalonzi okulonda abakulembeze abafaayo ku byenfuna, eddembe ly’obuntu wamu n’Obulamu bw’abantu be bakulembera mu kalulu kano aka 2021. Owek. Mayiga nga akwasa Ssentebe wa Masaka, Jude Mbabali omujoozi gweyaguze Okwogera bino Kamalabyonna abadde atikkula Oluwalo olw’obukadde obusobye mu 40 okuva mu Busiro wamu ne bannabyabufuzi abakyadde embuga olunaku lwaleero ku Lwokubiri mu bimuli bya Bulange. Mu Luwalo lwaleero, eggombolola ya Nsangi y’enywedde akendo n’eddirirwa ab’e Kikandwa. “Mulonde abantu abo abalina emiramwa egitugasa nga Buganda, mulonde abo abalina emiramwa egikomyawo ekitiibwa kya Uganda okuyitibwa ekkula lya Africa.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agambye. Ow’eggombola nga afuna ekiwandiiko okuva ewa Katikkiro Mayiga Katikkiro Mayiga annyonnyodde nti Buganda erina omugabo munene mu Uganda era n’alabula abakola obuzannyo ku masaza agali mu Buganda nga baagala okugawula nti, tebajja kubakkiriza. Ono agambye nti kasita omuntu assa ekitiibwa mu nnono ya Buganda tebabeera na nsonga lwaki tebatambula naye. Owek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti kikyamu okulowooza nti ebyobufuzi kazannyo kuba tebisobola kubeera kazannyo ne bizza Buganda ku ntikko wadde okukuza Uganda, kubanga kino kirina kuva mu bukulembeze. Asabye abantu okwerinda ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kuba gyekiri era baleme kubuzaabuzibwa byabufuzi, wabula n’avumirira ekya gavumenti okutta abantu ng’erwanyisa Ssennyiga Corona. Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga ategeezezza nti enkola y’Oluwalo eyamba okutaba Oluganda kubanga Buganda erimu amawanga mangi era n’ebiti by’abantu bingi era ng’okuva edda Buganda erimu ebintu ebirimu ebibaawula. Minisita wa gavumenti ez’ebitundu era Ssaabawolereza w’Obwakabaka, Christopher Bwanika, ategeezezza nti Oluwalo nkola ya nnono era ne yeebaza abaluleese. Ono era y’ayanjudde omugenyi wa Katikkiro ow’enjawulo, Omulangira Namuyonjo okuva e Bugerere ng’ono yazze ne ttiimu gy’akola nayo era nga bano baguze emijoozi okusobola okwetaba mu nteekateeka y’emisinde gya Kabaka. Ssebwana Kiberu Charles Kisiriiza, asiimye obuwulize bw’abaami b’amasaza n’amagombolola. Ono era yeebazizza bannabyabufuzi abakiise embuga olw’okukkiriza okukyala embuga. Omubaka Medard Ssegona ategeezezza nti ekyabatwala mu Palamenti kwe kukendeeza ku bifunfugu ebikasukirwa Ssaabasajja Kabaka n’Obuganda, okulaba nti babikwata. Ono asabye Mukuumaddamula abagambire ku balina emmundu bakomye okutugumbula abantu kubanga kiyitiridde. Mmeeya wa ttawuni y’e Nsangi, Hajji Abdul Kiyimba, asiimye Katikkiro Mayiga olw’okukolerera Obuganda era n’amusaba amuwaddeko eddusu asobole okuwangula akalulu.
