Abalala abeetabye ku mukolo guno kubaddeko Minisita w’ebyettaka era ng’omugenyi ow’enjawulo abadde Omulangira Namuyonjo aguze emijoozi okwenyigira mu nteekateeka y’emisinde gy’Amazaalibwa.

headline: Omukulembeze tatya bantu bye boogera naye afa ku byakola – Owek. Mayiga
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga ategeezezza bannabyabufuzi abalonde abavudde e Kassanda obutatya bantu bye boogera naye bafeeyo okukola ennyo kuba wano olupimo weluri. Okwogera bino Katikkiro abadde asisinkanye abakulembeze abalonde aba disitulikiti  ye Kassanda era ensisinkano ebadde ku Bulange Mmengo leero ku Lwokutaano . “Mujja kusanga ebibasomooza bingi era omukulembeze tadding’ana bizibu, bajja kwogerera ebituufu n’ebitali bituufu, naye omukulembeze ekimutaasa byebyo byakola so ssi ebyo ebyogerwa abantu,” Mayiga bw’ababangudde. Abasabye okumalirira okuweereza abantu bakole ku nsonga zaabwe ezibaluma kuba ebizibu byabwe tebyawula mu byabufuzi wadde eddiini kuba alemwa okuweereza abantu nebyebamukonjera abantu bajja kubikkiriza. “Wadde abantu babalondedde mu langi ez’enjawulo naye mujjukire nti ebiruma abantu tebikyuuka. Ssentebe Kasirye ayogedde ku bwavu, ebyenjigiriza ezo z’ensonga ezitakyuuka,”Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye. Owek. Mayiga abakuutidde obuteerabira nti Kassanda ali mu ssaza lya Kabaka erye Ssingo  n’olwekyo balina okunyweza ensonga za Buganda Ssemasonga 5 kuba zeziwumbawumba Obwakabaka bye bwettanira. Kamalabyonna Mayiga  agamba nti ekimu ku bizibu ebiremesezza Afirika okukula bye by’obufuzi ebitaggwa kuba basigala bawalagana nebalemwa okwegatta bayambe abantu. Katikkiro Mayiga bano abakulisizza akalulu era nabasiima olw’okujja embuga kuba buno bwe butaka bw’abantu ba Buganda awatali kwawula mu ddiini wadde endowooza z’ebyobufuzi. Minisita w’Obuwangwa Ennono n’Obulambuzi, Owek David Kyewalabye Male, alabudde abaganda ku bikolwa ebyokwoleka ebizibu byabwe ate nga balina kukolera wamu okulaba nga bavvunuka obuzibu buno. Owek. Kyewalabye asinzidde wano nalabula abamu ku bakulembeze abalonde abatandise okufulumya obutambi nga bagamba nti tebakyetaaga Buganda ekintu ekikyamu kuba Buganda lwazi.  Eyakulembeddemu abakulembeze bano era ssentebe wa disitulikiti y’e Kassanda, Kasirye Zimula Fred yeebazizza Kamalabyonna olw’emirimu gy’akolera Obuganda era n’asuubiza ku lwa banne okutambulira awamu ne Buganda. “Ekirooto kyaffe nga abakulembeze ba Kassanda abapya kwekukolayo disitulikiti mu ggwanga lino ey’enjawulo era tulabye nga ekyo tetusobola kukikola nga tuli fekka. Tujja kukikola ne gavumenti eyawakati naye okusinga ennyo ne Mmengo kubanga wetuva,” Ssentebe Zimula bw’asuubizza Bano baguze Satifikeeti ya 2,620,000/= okuwagira emirimu gy’Obwakabaka.

headline: Temutukaka kukomyawo LDU ekwasise ebiragiro bya COVID-19 – UPDF
text: Eggye lya Uganda Peoples Defence Forces (UPDF) lirabudde bannayuganda okugondera ebiragiro eby’okulwanyisa COVID-19 oba ssi kyo bajja kukomyawo aba LDU ku nguudo bayambeko okubikwasisa. Aba LDU nga balawuna Kampala Okulabula kuno kukoleddwa omwogezi wa UPDF, Brig Flavia Byekwaso ku Lwokuna bwabadde ayogerako ne bannamawulire mu Kampala nategeeza nga obulwadde bwa Corona bwebweyongedde olw’ abantu okutafaayo kukuuma biragiro bino ebibutangira. Yagasseeko nti singa embeera eyongera okubeera bweti, UPDF tegenda kusibamu kukomya aba LDU. Byekwaso yagambye nti, “Bwetutambula mu bantu olaba nga abantu tebakyafaayo ku biragiro bitangira COVID-19, singa kisigala bwekiti tugenda kuba tetulina kyakusalawo okujjako omukomyawo aba LDU. Ono yanyonyodde nti wadde aba LDU baddamu okubatendeka, bannansi balina okulaba nga bagondera ebiragiro bya Minisitule y’ebyobulamu. “Kituufu aba LDU twazzeemu okubalaga engeri gyebalina okukwatamu abantu nga bakola emirimu gyabwe netubayigiriza amateeka n’ebintu ebirala bingi,” Byekwaso bweyalambuludde. Byekwaso ayongedde okulabula abantu abayingira Uganda ku nsalo ez’enjawulo mu bubba nga bakolagana n’abebyokwerinda nti bajja kuvunaanibwa. Bannayuganda mu bitundu eby’enjawulo bavaayo nebalaajanira Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni aggye aba LDU ku nguudo olw’okutulugunya abantu era nga waliwo nabalugulamu obulamu. Pulezidenti yalagira aba LDU nebaggyibwa ku nguudo era nebatwalibwa okuddamu okutendekebwa ku ngeri gyebasobola okukolaganamu n’abantu nga bakola emirimu gyabwe.

headline: Abeesimbyewo basabiddwa okuloopa ba RDC ababalemesa okukuba enkung’aana
text: Kampala Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda mu ggwanga kasabye abeesimbyewo naddala ku bwapulezidenti okuloopa ab’ebyokwerinda ne ba RDC ababalemesa okukuba enkung’aana n’okunoonya akalulu mu butali bwenkanya. Ezimu ku mmotoka ezisindikiddwa okusomesa abantu ku kulonda Bino byogeddwa omwogezi w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda, Paul Bukenya, n’ategeeza nti kibabeerera kizibu ng’akakiiko okuyingira mu nsonga zino nga tebafunye kwemulugunya mu butongole. “Tetumanyi lukung’aana lwonna lwagaaniddwa okuggyako ezimu ku b’ebyokwerinda ze balemesezza olw’obutagondera mateeka, naye singa wabaawo obutali bwenkanya, batutuukirire tusobole okuyamba,” Bukenya bwe yagambye. Bukenya yannyonnyodde nti wadde kirungi okutegeeza abamawulire nga waliwo alemeseddwa okukuba enkung’aana, naye ate tewaba kyamaanyi bannamawulire kye bayinza kuyamba. Okusaba kwa Bukenya kuddiridde abeesimbyewo ab’enjawulo okuli owa National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, n’owa FDC Patrick Amuriat Oboi, okulemesebwa okukuba enkung’aana mu bitundu ebyenjawulo. Bukenya agamba nti singa omuntu abeera agoberedde bulungi amateeka agamuweebwa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda ne Minisitule y’ebyobulamu tewali nsonga lwaki alemesebwa. Ekizibu ekirala kye kya bannannyini leediyo mu bitundu by’obukiika kkono okugaana bannabyabufuzi okuli Kyagulanyi ne Amuriat okwogerera ku leediyo zaabwe. Kinajjukirwa nti gyebuvuddeko Amuriat yamala eddakiika asatu nga ayogerera ku leediyo etaliiko, wadde nga yali asasudde obukadde 30. Ku nsonga zino Bukenya yategeezezza nti bali muteeseganya n’ekitongole kya Uganda Communications Commission ekirung’amya ebyempuliziganya okulaba nga bagonjoola ebizibu bino, kubanga oluvannyuma lw’okuwera enkung’aana z’abantu abangi, okuyitira ku mikutu gy’amawulire y’engeri yokka gye basobola okutuuka ku bantu abangi. Mu ngeri yeemu akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kasindise abakugu n’ebimotoka okuli emizindaalo mu bitundu ebyenjawulo okusomesa abantu ku nsonga z’ebyokulonda.

headline: Musajja wa Kayihura, Agasiirwe ayimbuddwa ku kakalu ka kkooti y’amagye
text: Kkooti y’amagye e Makindye ekkiriza eyali musajja wa Gen. Kale Kayihura, SSP Nixon Agasiirwe eyali aduumira ebikwekweto ebyenjawulo mu poliisi oluvannyuma lw’okumala emyaka 4 ng’ali ku alimanda mu kkomera. Agasiirwe yali mukono gwa ddyo eri eyali Ssaabaduumizi wa poliisi, Gen. Kale Kayihura nga yakwatibwa mu mwaka gwa 2018 n’aggalirwa mu kkomera ly’amagye e Makindye. Ono azze asaba emirundi egiwerako okweyimirirwa naye nga gigwa butaka okutuuka olunaku lwaleero ku Mmande kkooti bw’ekkirizza okweyimirirwa. “Kkooti eno ekizudde ng’okusaba kwe kulimu eggumba era okusaba kwe nkukkirizza.” Lt Gen Andrew Gutti . Wabula Ssentebe wa kkooti eno, Gutti ono amutaddeko obukwakkulizo obuzibu nga singa amenyako wadde akamu okweyimirirwa kwe kujja kusazibwamu. Gen Gutti ono amulagidde obutasukka Kampala ne Wakiso ate yeeyanjule eri kkooti emirundi 2 buli mwezi nga asuubirwa buli luvannyuma lwa wiiki 2. Kuno bagasseeko obukadde 30 ezitali zaabuliwo okuva eri buli amweyimiridde ate naye Agasiirwe n’asabibwa obukadde 50 ezitali zaabuliwo. “Agasiirwe alina okuwaayo ebiwandiiko kwatambulira omuli Paasipooti ye eri omuwandiisi wa kkooti, singa kimulema okweyimirira kwe kujja kusazibwamu.” Lt Gen Gutti bw’alabudde. Bw’a abadde asaba okweyimirirwa, Agasiirwe ategeezezza kkooti nti alina eddembe nga munnayuganda okusaba okweyimirirwa kuba amaze ekiseera kiwanvu ku alimanda nga yeetaaga okuyimbulwa ku kakalu ka kkooti. Abamweyimiridde kubaddeko muganda we Aloysius Muhangi n’omukungu wa poliisi eyawummula Laban Muhabwe. Agasiirwe abadde avunaanibwa emisango okuli ogw’okuwamba eyali omukuumi wa Pulezidenti Kagame, Lt. Joel Mutabazi mu 2013 n’amuzzaayo e Rwanda nga kino yakikola ali n’abapoliisi abalala 8 wadde bo baayimbulwa dda ku kakalu ka kkooti. Oludda oluwaabi lulumiriza nti nga 25 October, 2013 e Kammengo, mu disitulikiti y’e Mpigi ku luguudo lw’e Masaka, Agasiirwe ne banne baakozesa baasitoola ne bbomu z’omu ngalo okuwamba Lt. Joel Mutabaazi ne Jackson Kalemera ne babazza mu Rwanda nga tebakimanyiiko, ekintu ekimenya amateeka. Ono kigambibwa nti okuwamba bano yali akolagana ne Gen Kale Kayihura, Col. Ndahura Atwooki, Herbert Muhangi, Patrick Muramira, Jonas Ayebaza, Joel Aguma, James Magada, Benon Atwebembeire, Abel Tumukunde ne Faisal Katende Amon Kwarisiima , munnansi wa Rwanda Rene Rutagungira ne munnansi wa Congo Pacifique Mugenga Bahati .

headline: Ababaka baagala abasawo abafa nga bajjanjaba aba COVID-19 baliyirirwe
text: Abamu ku babaka basabye gavumenti erowooze ku ky’okuliyiriraabasawo bonna abafiira ku mirimu mu kaseera kano aka COVID-19. Ababaka bano bagamba nti kino kijja kuzzaamu abalala amaanyi bafeeyo okutaasa obulamu bwa bannayuganda. Bano baabyogeredde mu lukung’aana olw’awamu lwe baatuuzizza ku Palamenti ne basaba abeng’anda baweebwe obukadde 100 singa owooluganda lwabwe omusawo afa nga agezaako okutaasa obulamu bwa munnansi. Kimanyiddwa nti okuva ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona lwe kyalumba eggwanga, abajjanjabi bagaanibwa mu malwaliro era nga buli kimu ku mulwadde abasawo be bakikola. Okusinziira ku bakugu, kino kyakolebwa okugezaako okukendeeza omuwendo gw’abakwatibwa ekirwadde kino. Omubaka wa Kibuku,Herbert Kinobere, agamba nti kino kyayongera abasawo emirimu ate era ne kyongera ne ku mikisa gyabwe okukwatibwa ekirwadde kino. Era okugezaako okukakasa kino, bano bannyonnyodde ng’ebibalo bya Minisitule y’ebyobulamu bwe biraga nti abasawo 50 be baamaze edda okuttibwa ekirwadde kino. Kati Kinobere ayagala banne bamwegatteko basabe gavumenti eriyirire abasawo abafiira ku mirimu. Ono n’ababaka abalala era basabye bannayuganda baleme kutabukira basawo wamu n’okuboogerera mu kiseera kino ekya COVID-19 kubanga eggwanga libeetaaga nnyo. Abamu ku bantu nga bayita ku mutimbagano babadde batandise okwambalira abasawo olw’obutafa ku bantunaddala abaavu mu kiseera kino eky’omuggalo, ekivuddeko abamu ku balwadde okufiirwa obulamu bwabwe.

headline: Ssaabapoliisi Ochola alabudde Bobi Wine ku by’okukuma mu bantu omuliro
text: Kampala Ab’ebyokwerinda balabudde Pulezidenti w’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine) ne bannabyabufuzi abalala abaawanguddwa mu kalulu ka 2021, okukomya okukozesa olulimi olukuma mu bantu omuliro. IGP Martin Okoth Ochola “Wadde okwekengera kwe twalina okw’obutabanguko oluvannyuma lw’okulonda kugenda kukendeera, naye waliwo abaavuganya ku bwapulezidenti abakuma mu bantu omuliro nga bagamba nti akalulu kaalimu emivuyo n’okubbira.” Ochola bw’agambye. Bino Ochola abyogedde leero ku Lwokusatu ng’abeebyokwerinda boogerako eri bannamawulire mu Kampala mu lukung’aaana olwetabiddwamu Minisita w’ensonga z’omunda mu ggwanga Jeje Odongo awamu n’abanene abalala. Ono agambye nti ebigambo bano bye basaasaanya babikola mu bugenderevu nga baagala okutabula abantu basobole okwekalakaasa. “Ng’abeebyokwerinda, ebigambo bino ebitaliko bujulizi, tubirabamu abakabi nti bisobola okutabula abantu mu bitundu ebyenjawulo. Bano tubalabula ku bigambo bino era ne tubasaba baddukire mu kkooti bwe baba nga beemulugunya.” Ochola bw’annyonnyodde. Okulabula kwa Ochola kuzze nga waakayita olunaku lumu nga Kyagulanyi ategeezezza eggwanga nti yawangula akalulu wabula ne kabbibwa era ng’obuwanguzi buno waakubununula. Okusinziira ku kakiiko k’ebyokulonda, Pulezidenti Museveni yawangula banne abalala abawera 10 n’ebitundu 58 % era n’abawa amagezi yenna atamatidde ng’alina obujulizi, okuddukira mu kkooti. Okuva ku Ssabbiiti eyaddirira okulonda, abakuumaddembe mu langi ez’enjawulo baayiibwa ku nguudo za Kampala n’ebintundu ebirala okunyweza eby’okwerinda era nga Ssaabaduumizi wa poliisi Ochola agamba nti bano ku nguudo bakyaliko. Ochola atenderezza bannayuganda olw’okukuuma emirembe mu kulonda n’ategeeza nti akalulu ka 2021 kaagenze mu byafaayo ng’akakyasinze okubeeramu emirembe bukya okulonda kubaawo mu Uganda. Ono agamba nti wadde waaliwo abaali beeweze okubeera n’entegeka za ‘Plan B’ awamu ne bannabyabufuzi abasiga obukyayi, naye bannayuganda baasigala bakuumye emirembe. Ategeezezza nti mu kulonda bapulezidenti mu ggwanga lyonna, baafuna emisango 250 gyokka egyekuusa ku kulonda, ekintu ekitabangawo.

headline: Munnakatemba Ssenkubuge Siasa ayagala Bwaloodimmeeya
text: Munnakatemba Charles James Ssenkubuge Siasa yeewandiisizza okuvuganya ku bwaloodimmeeya bw’ekibuga Kampala, ekifo ekirimu Omuloodi Erias Lukwago, mu kalulu ka bonna aka 2021. Ono ajjidde ku kkaadi ya Democratic Party (DP). Munnakatemba  Charles Ssenkubuge Kino kiddiridde munnakibiina kya Democratic Party, Beatrice Kayanja okugaanibwa okwewandiisa Ssabbiiti ewedde olw’obutabeera mulonzi mu Kampala. Leero Ssenkubuge akedde ku kitebe kya DP ku Balintuma ng’awerekerwako Andrew Benon Kibuuka ne bannakibiina abalala, w’avudde okugenda okwendiisa. Omwogezi w’ekibiina kino, Fred Mwesigwa, asinzidde wano n’ategeeza nga bw’ekyali entandikwa nga ku luno DP ezze na nkola mpya. Mwesigwa agambye nti Ssenkubuge muntu wa linnya era ng’alina obuwagizi okuva mu bantu ab’enjawulo era nga balina essuubi nti ajja kubaleetera obuwanguzi. Bannakatemba mu kalulu kati baweze basatu ng’abalala mulimu; muyimbi Joseph Mayanja (Jose Chameleone) atalina kibiina ne Daniel Kazibwe (Raggae Dee) owa NRM. Bano bagenda kuttunka ne Munna FDC, Erias Lukwago wamu ne Munna NUP, Nabilah Naggayi Ssempala. Bannamateeka abalala bategeezezza nga Ssenkubuge bw’ali omuntu omutuufu okutwala obukulembeze bw’ekibuga era nga y’ajja okuweereza obulungi bannakampala. Wadde okwewandiisa okusooka kwali kulina kukoma nga 1/10/2020 eri abaagala ebifo mu gavumenti ez’ebitundu, naye kwayongezebwayo okutuuka olwa leero nga 5/10/2020 olw’omujjuzo gw’abantu abaagala ebifo okubeera omungi. Kinajjukirwa nti Ssenkubuge mu myaka egiyise, yali yeegwanyizaako okuvuganya ku bwapulezidenti wabula gye byaggweera ng’olwokaano aluvuddemu.

headline: Ttiimu y’Obwakabaka yakuzannya Uganda Cranes
text: Ttiimu y’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda eyalondeddwa okuva mu Masaza ag’enjawulo egenda kuttunka ne ttiimu y’eggwanga eya Uganda Cranes ku kisaawe kya Wakisha ku Lwokutaano ng’ennaku z’omwezi 15/04/2022 okwongera okutumbula omuzannyo gw’omupiira mu Ggwanga. Kino kirangiriddwa Minisita w’Ebyemizannyo n’Okwewummuzaamu mu Bwakabaka Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu bwabadde atongoza ttiimu eno mu Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri. “Waliwo enteekateeka y’okulaba nti Obwakabaka buvaayo ne ttiimu yaabwo entongole. waliwo ekibuuzo ekigamba nti bwemumala empaka z’amasaza ez’akamalirizo kiki ekiddako? Mu nteekateeka eno tukolagana n’atwala omupiira mu Ggwanga obutavuganya nabo naye okuyambako okujjuliriza amaanyi gebateekamu,” Minisita Ssekabembe bw’agambye. Mu nteekateeka eno Obwakabaka bugenda kuleeta ttiimu ya bantu 25, abatendesi 2, ne Maneja wa ttiimu omu esobole okufuna omukisa oguzannya omupiira ogw’omukwano ne ttiimu y’Eggwanga eya Uganda Cranes. Okusinziira ku Minisita Ssekabembe, omupiira guno gugenda guzannyibwa ku Lwokutaano ku ssaawa 10 ez’olweggulo ku Kisaawe kya Wakisha. Ono annyonnyodde nti ttiimu ya Buganda yamala dda okulondebwa era eteekeddwateekeddwa bulungi nga yaakuyingira enkambi olunaku lw’enkya. Owek. Ssekabembe agamba nti abawagizi baweereddwa omukisa ogw’enjawulo okulaba omupiira guno ku bwerere okusobola okuzza obuganzi bwa ttiimu y’Eggwanga n’asaba abantu okuvaayo mu bungi okugiwagira. Ono alaze nti waliwo n’enteekateeka endala ey’okusamba ttiimu z’obukulembeze bw’ennono obulala okusobola okuggyayo ebitone. Eyalondeddwa okubeera Maneja wa ttiimu eno, Sulaiman Kiwanuka ategeezezza nti guno omukisa gwa maanyi ogumuweereddwa,era ajja kukola kyonna ekisoboka okulaba nti abazannyi bano 25 bakomawo n’obuwanguzi era basuubira okusula mu nkambi okumala ennaku 3 nnamba. Ate omutendesi omukulu owa ttiimu eno, Richard Malinga agamba ebikolwa bye n’obukambwe bye biri nnyo mu mupiira era wakukola kyonna okulaba nti ttiimu y’Omutanda ewangula. Abamu ku bazannyi abali mu ttiimu eno kuliko; abakwasi ba Ggoolo okuli Isaac Kwizera okuva e Buweekula, Mike Lutaaya okuva e Buddu, Tonny Atugonza owa Bulemeezi. Abazibizi kuliko Gideon Odong, Harunah Lukwago, Abdallah Ssentongo nga bonna b’e Buddu. Abalala ye Kenneth Sekkoolya owa Bugerere, Godfrey Anjole ow’e Bulemeezi n’abazannyi abalala okuva e Kyaggwe, Mawokota ne Busiro.

headline: Akakiiko k’omupiira gw’ebika katandise emirimu
text: Akakiiko akaateekebwawo okutumbula emipiira gw’ebigere ogw’ebika wamu n’okulaba ng’abawagizi badda mu kisaawe kino, katudde enkya ya leero okutema empenda, emipiira gino gisobole okutinta. Ssentebe w’akakiiko, Julius Kabugo  Enkya ya leero akakiiko kano katudde mu Bulange e Mmengo okulaba engeri gye kagenda okukolamu emirimu gyako.Ssentebe w’akakiiko kano, Julius Kabugo, ategeezezza nti emipiira gino baagala okulaba nga giganyula nnyo abavubuka nga bagyenyigiramu butereevu era basobole n’okutwala obukulembeze bw’omuzannyo guno yonna gye bali. Abamu ku bakiise abalina okutumbula omupiira gw’ebika “Tutuunulidde bye tulina okukola okulaba nti kkampuni zikomawo zongere okutuwagira. Twagala okulaba ng’emipiira gino gisobola okuganyula abavubuka kubanga be baba n’amaanyi n’ebiseera okwenyigira mu muzannyo guno.” Ssentebe Kabugo bw’annyonnyodde. Okusinziira ku Kabugo, bagenda kwogerezeganya n’abakulu b’ebika basobole okubayamba okukunga bazzukulu baabwe okwettanira okuzannyo guno. Kabugo agamba nti bakkaanyizza okutuukirira kkampuni z’amawulire ez’enjawulo zibayambe okwongera okuzza ettutumu wamu n’ekitiibwa ky’empaka zino mu Buganda ne Uganda. Ono agamba nti abantu bonna abali ku kakiiko kano abeesiga era akakasizza ng’omulimu guno bwe bagenda okugukolera mu budde obwabaweebwa Kino kiddiridde Minisita w’Obwakabaka ow’abavubuka n’emizannyo, Henry Ssekabembe, okutongoza akakiiko kano Ssabbiiti ewedde n’akakwasa omulimu gw’okulaba nga kazza ekitiibwa ky’emipiira gy’ebika. Akakiiko kano ak’abantu 9 nga kakulemberwa Julius Kabugo katandise emirimu gyako mu butongole era mu bbanga lya mwezi gumu kaakwanjula alipoota ku bye kazudde eri Minisita Ssekabembe. Empaka z’ebika by’Abaganda zeetabwamu ttiimu okuva mu bika 52 ebya Buganda era zaatandika okuzannyibwa mu mwaka gwa 1950.

headline: Abakozi mu Bwakabaka babanguddwa ku ndwadde z’omutima
text: Abakozi mu Bwakabaka basabiddwa bulijjookwekuuma endwadde z’omutima nga beekebeza buli luvannyuma lw’ebbanga eggere, kibayamba okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa obwabaweebwa Ssaabasajja Kabaka. Obubaka buno baabufunidde mu musomo gw’ebyobulamu ogwayindidde ku mbuga enkulu e Bulange-Mmengo nga gwategekeddwa aba Healthy Heart Foundation n’Obwakabaka. Enteekateeka eno y’omu ku kaweefube akulembedde okwefumiitiriza ku lunaku lw’obulwadde bw’omutima mu nsi yonna olukuzibwa buli 29/ September. Era abaweereza baabanguddwa ne ku ndwadde endala ez’omutawaana omuli okusannyalala, kkookolo, ssukaali awamu n’endala. Akulira ekitongole kya Healthy Heart Foundation, Owek. Rita Namyalo yategeezezza ntiemirundi mingi bannayugandabangibafiirwa obulamu olw’obutamanya era kino kye balwanako. Owek. Namyalo yanokoddeyo kamunguluze, obukoowunga obubonero obusinga okwolekaomuntu ayolekedde okufunaobulwadde bw’Omutima oba okufuna obulwadde bw’okusannyalala (Stroke) nga kya nsonga omuntubuno obutabubuusa maaso. Abeetabye mu musomo yabasabye okukyaliranga abasawo oba abakugu mu by’obulamu singa bafuna enkenyera yonna. Owek. Namyalo abawadde yabasabye okujjumbira okukola dduyiro awamu n’okulya obulungi kibayambe okwegobako endwadde. Omumyuka w’Omuwandiisi ow’enkalakkalira, Peter Zaake yannyonnyodde ntiebyobulamu gye gimuku mirimu Obwakabakakwe bussa essirang’enteekateeka enoeyambako okutumbula ebyobulamu by’abakozi ba Ssaabasajjakibasobozese okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa obwabaweebwa Beene. Okwongera okukakasa ensonga eno, abakozi ba Ssaabasajja oluvannyuma lw’okubangulwa baakebeddwaendwadde ez’enjawulo okuli; Puleesa, Omutima, Ssukaali n’endala.

headline: AKALULU 2021: FDC egobye Ingrid Turinaawe n’abalala 2 mu kibiina
text: Ekibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) kinaabidde mu maaso bannakibiina basatu nga bavunaanibwa olw’okwesimbawo ku lwabwe oluvannyuma lw’okumeggebwa mu kamyufu. Ingrid Turinawe eyagobeddwa mu kibiina kya FDC Abagobeddwa kuliko eyali Ssaabakunzi w’ekibiina mu ggwanga lyonna, Ingrid Turinawe Kamateneti, Darius Tweyambe ne Winne Babihuga. Bano beetaba mu kamyufu wabula olwawangulwa mu kamyufu k’ekibiina mu kisaawe kya Rukungiri Munisipal Stadium, ne bagaana okukkiriza ebyakavaamu era ne basalawo okwesimbawo ku lwabwe nga bagamba nti mwalimu okubba akalulu, ekintu ekyatabula abakulu mu kibiina. Turinaawe yavuganya ku bbendera y’ekibiina era n’awangulwa Dr. Warren Nuwagaba Tumwiine ku kifo ky’alina okukwata bbendera ku bubaka bw’ekibuga ky’e Rukungiri. Ate Babihuga yawangulwa Betty Bamukwasa Muzanira ku kifo ky’omubaka omukyala ate Tweyambe n’awangulwa Charles Makuru ku bbendera ya ssentebe wa disitulikiti y’e Rukungiri. Oluvannyuma Tweyambe yeekubira enduulu ng’alumiriza Makuru okubba akalulu wabula akakiiko k’ekibiina akaatunula mu nsonga za kamyufu kaasalawo nti tekyali kituufu. Tweyambe era yalumiriza akakiiko olw’okubeera ne kyekubiira mu nsala yaako era n’awera okwesimbawo ku lulwe. Ng’ennaku z’omwezi 7 December 2020, Ssaabawandiisi wa FDC, Nathan Nandala Mafabi, yawandiise ebbaluwa egoba abasatu bano mu kibiina. Nandala agamba nti bano baamenye etteeka nnamba 12(d) erya Ssemateeka w’ekibiina erigamba nti singa mmemba w’ekibiina agenda mu kibiina ekirala oba ne yeesimbawo ku lulwe, abeera avudde mu kibiina. Ebbaluwa ya Nandala era erabula bannakibiina okwewala okuwagira omuntu eyeesimbyewo ku lulwe kuba bandigobwa mu kibiina. Akulira ekibiina kya FDC e Rukungiri, Virgina Kyarugahe, yakakasizza okugobwa kw’abantu bano mu kibiina era n’alabula abantu abalala abayisa olugaayu mu kusalawo kw’ekibiina. Kaweefube waffe okufuna Turinawe, Tweyambe ne Babihuga okutangaaza ku nsonga eno, yagudde butaka oluvannyuma lw’essimu zaabwe ezimanyiddwa obutabaako.

headline: Beti Kamya agudde mubintu; Museveni amulonze ku bwa Kaliisoliiso
text: Kampala Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni alonze abadde Minisita w’ebyettaka Beti Olive Namisango Kamya okubeera Kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti omuggya. Kino kyalangiriddwa ku Lwokuna akawungeezi nga ezimu ku nkyukakyuka ezaakoleddwa mu bifo by’obukulembeze obwenjawulo era Anne Muhairwe nalondebwa okubeera omumyuka we . Beti Kamya yazze mu bigere bya Irene Mulyagonja eyawummula obukulu buno oluvannyuma lw’ekisanja kye okuggwako mu July wa 2020. Era Pulezidenti Museveni mu kifo kino abadde talonderangamu muntu era abamu ku balafubanira obwerufu babadde bamuteeka ku nninga buli kadde nga bamusaba okujjuza ekifo kino. Wabula omu ku batunuulizi b’ebyobufuzi, Charles Rwomushana akubye ebituli mu kulondebwa kwa Kamya nategeeza nti ono talina kyamanyi kyagenda kutuukako mukulwanyisa obulyake n’obukenuzi nti kuba ensonga emuleesezza byabufuzi n’okumufunira omulimu so si bukugu. Kinajjukirwa nti ono abadde yakamala okuvuganya mu kalulu k’omubaka wa Lubaga North mu Palamenti wabula gyebyagweredde nga munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform, Abubaker Kawalya amuwangudde. Kalisoliiso wa gavumenti yavunaanyizibwa ku kulwanyisa enguzi n’obukenuzi wamu n’okulinnya ku nfeete abakozi ba gavumenti abakozesa obubi ebifo ne woofiisi zabwe.

headline: Omubaka  Mapenduzi alemeddeko ayagala Zaake abonerezebwe
text: Omubaka akiikirira abantu ba divizoni y’eBardege-Layibi mu Palamenti Ojara Mapenduzi alabiseeko mu kakiiko ka Palamenti akakwasisa empisa leero ku Lwokusatu n’agezaako okukamatiza lwaki alowooza nti mubaka munne owa Munisipaali y’e Mityana, Francis Zaake agwana okubonereza olw’okuvvoola ekitiibwa kya Palamenti n’ekyomumyuka wa Sipiika gyebuvuddeko. Kino kiddiridde Ojara okwanjula ekiteeso ng’ayagala Zaake agobwe ku bwakamisono ng’agamba nti yakozesa olulimi oluweebuula ku amyuka Sipiika Anita Among ng’ayita ku mutimbagano gwe ogwa Twitter. Mapenduzi anokoddeyo etteeka nnamba 84 ne 85 erirambika engeri ababakaba Palamenti gye balina okweyisaamu. “ Wiiki ewedde ku Lwokubiri, nnawaayo okwemulugunya kwange ku ngeri omubaka Zaake gye yatyoboolamu ekitiibwa kya Palamenti n’amyuka Sipiika. Waliwo engeri ezimanyiddwa omuntu z’ayitamu singa abeera si mumativu n’ebyo Sipiika by’ayogedde.” Mapenduzi bw’ategeezezza akakiiko olwa leero. Ono ategeezezza akakiiko nti mwetegefu okukola buli ekisoboka Zaake agobwe ku bwakamisona bwa Palamenti. Wabula Ssentebe w’akakiiko Abdu Katuntu ono amuwabudde nga bw’atasaanye kugenda mu ebyo kati kuba kye baagala okuzuula kwe kuba oba nga ddala kituufu omubaka Zaake yamenya amateeka ga Palamenti. Okusinziira ku mubaka Katuntu akakiiko kano tekagenda kwenyigira mu byakunoonya mikono ebigenda mu maaso okusobola okusuuza Zaake ekifo kye era n’alagira omuntu yenna abadde mu nteekateeka y’okunoonya emikono okuva ku kakiiko kano okusobola okuleetawo obwenkanya. Ensonga za Mapenduzi ziwagiddwa omubaka wa Soroti West, Jonathan Ebwalu n’owa Munisipaali ya Busia, Godffrey Macho nga bagamba nti ebigambo Zaake bye yakozesa byali biweebuula ekitiibwa ky’abakyala mu ggwanga lino.

headline: Luyirika owa NUP awangudde obwasipiika bwa KCCA
text: Ekibiina ki NUP kiwangude ekifo kya Sipiika wa Kampala Capital City Authority ne kimegga NRM ebadde esimbyewo kkansala w’abavubuka ku kifo kino. Olukiiko lwa KCCA olukulu olwaleero lulonze sipiika agenda okuddukanya emirimu mu kisanja kino ng’embiranyi ey’amaanyi ebadde wakati w’ekibiina kya NUP ne NRM era gye biggweeredde nga KCCA ekyetisse era n’ewangula eggombolola 3 ku ggombolola 5 ezikola ekibuga Kampala. Ku ssaawa 5 ezenkya ssenkulu wa KCCA, Dorothy Kisaka n’omulamuzi Ayo Mirriam Okello, batuuzizza olukiiko olusoose era okulonda ne kutandika. Akalulu kano akabadde akeekyama kabadde wakati wa munnakibiina kya NUP, Zahara Luyirika nga ye kkansala wa Makindye ng’attunse ne munnakibiina kya NRM, Shamim Namukasa. Gye biggweeredde nga Luyirika awangudde n’obululu 43 ate NRM n’efuna obululu 8. Oluvannyuma omumyuka wa Sipiika wa KCCA alondeddwa era okukkakkana nga Nasur Masaaba owa National Unity Platform (NUP) akalulu akawangudde bw’afunye obululu 12 ate Allan Mwesige owa NRM n’afuna obululu 9 bwokka. Omuloodi Lukwago oluvannyuma lw’okufuna amawulire ku Sipiika alondeddwa, amuyozaayozezza era n’asuubiza okukolagana n’abakulembeze abaggya era ng’abasabye buli ludda luwe lunnaalwo ekitiibwa. Ono agamba nti Kampala alina okusoomoozebwa okw’amaanyi nga kye kiseera bagatte amaanyi okuweereza abantu. Ate okulonda basipiika b’eggombolola 5 ezikola ekibuga Kampala kwetobeseemu emivuyo egy’amaanyi era mu ggombolola ezimu okulonda kuggweeredde mu kusika muguwa era awamu eng’uumi zinyoose. E Makindye n’e Lubaga, okulonda sipiika kuzzeemu omukoosi; bakkansala bwe batandise okulwana era bangi bavuddeyo n’ebisago abalala bakaabye ate abamu ne bazirika. Kabadde kaseera ka kusoomoozebwa nga munna NRM , Musa Mbaziira awangula munna NUP, Rehema Ffuge, ekitabudde bakkansala ba NUP kubanga be basinga obungi ku lukiiko luno. Bano batandise okwerangira okulya enguzi ne batunda ekibiina era ekiddiridde kwe kukubagana ebikonde, embeera eyongedde okutabuka okutuusa poliisi bw’etuuse era embeera n’edda mu nteeko.

headline: Omulabirizi Luwalira asiimye Obwakabaka ku Emmwanyi Terimba
text: Omulabirizi w’ Obulabirizi bwe Namirembe Rt. Rev. Wilberforce Kityo Luwalira asiimye enteekateeka y’Obwakabaka ey’ Emmwanyi Terimba gyagamba nti ebayambye okukuuma ettaka ly’ Obulabirizi nebasobola okuligobako abasaatuusi. Bino Omulabirizi abifuuye Minisita omubeezi avunaanyizibwa obutereevu ku Emmwanyi Terimba, obulimi, obulunzi n’obweggasi Owek. Hajji Amis Kakomo bwabadde amulambuza ennimiro mwebasa Emmwanyi zebafuna mu nteekateeka y’Emmwanyi Terimba nebasimba ku kyalo Ssempya e Masuliita mu Namayumba mu ssaza lye Busiro. Kinajjukirwa nti emyaka ebiri egiyise , Buganda yatta omukago ne kkanisa ya Uganda okutumbula ekirime ky’ Emmwanyi nekigendererwa ky’okuggya abantu mu bwavu nga Obulabirizi buno bwafuna endokwa eziwera omutwalo gumu. Omulabirizi Kityo Luwalira yakulembeddemu ngaliwamu ne Rev. Can. Henry Ssegawa omuwandiisi wobulabirizi nakwasaganya pulojekiti eno, Rev. George Wilson Nkonge era nga ye musumba w’obusumba bwe Masuulita balambudde endokwa zino okulaba wezituuse era alaze okusomoozebwa kwebasanze. Kyokka bano Minisita aliko amagezi gabawadde naddala mu kuziweta nga gwe mutendera kwezizaalira abaana nawa gyezirina okutunula ekikola ekinene ku muwendo n’omutindo gwazo. Minisita Kakomo aliko ettaka eddala lya yiika 8 ery’ Obulabirizi buno lyebagenda okuteekako emmwanyi mu nteekateeka yeemu. Rt. Rev. Wilberforce Kityo Luwalira yebazizza nnyo Ssaabasajja olw’okufaayo ennyo ku bantu be okubazibula amaaso nokutukiza ekirime kino kinansangwa eky’emmwanyi kyagambye nti kibayambyeko okukozesa ettaka lino. Asiimye omulimu ogukoleddwa obulabirizi nagamba nti obwakabaka bwakusigala nga bukwatagana bulungi n’Obulabirizi bwe Namirembe okusobola okuggya abantu mu bwavu. Obulabirizi bwe Namirembe bulina obussaabadinkoni musanvu okuli Natete, Kazo, Ntebe, Gayaza, Mengo, Lutikko Dinary n’Obusumba 63.

headline: Bizzeemu; Kibalama ayagala Bobi Wine amuddize ekibiina kye
text: Kampala Omutandisi w’ekibiina kya National Unity, Reconcilliation and Development Party (NURP) ekyafuuka National Unity Platform (NUP), azzeemu okutabukira obukulembeze bwa NUP obukulirwa Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine n’amusaba amuddize ekibiina kye. Kibalama ne banne okuli; Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina kino Ssimbwa Paul Kagombe, Kigozi Winston ne William Odinga Balikuddembe nga bayita mu bannamateeka baabwe aba MS Mugabi Shyaka & CO. Advocates, baawandiikidde Ssaabawandiisi wa NUP aliko David Lewis Rubongoya nga basaba okuddamu okwekenneenya endagaano gye baakola omwaka oguweddde n’akulira ekisinde kya People Power Movement, Robert Kyagulanyi. “Otegeezebwa nti akatundu nnamba 5 ak’endagaano gye twakola kalina okuddamu okwetegerezebwa era omuntu waffe yatutegeezezza nti okuva lwe mwassa emikono ku ndagaano eno byonna ebyakkaanyizibwako byasuulibwa mu kasero era n’ebifo ebyalina okuteekebwawo tebyateekebwawo.” Ebbaluwa gye baasindikidde Rubongoya bw’esoma. Kibalama agamba nti Kyagulanyi ne banne baabalimba era kati baagala endagaano gye baakola eddemu yeetegerezebwe. Okusinziira ku Kibalama era yakizudde nti ekisinde kya People Power Movement kye baakola nakyo endagaano tekyali kiwandiise mu mateeka nga noolwekyo kyali tekikkirizibwa mu mateeka kukola ndagaano yonna kuba si kiwandiise. Kati ono annyonnyola nti mwetegefu okweddiza ekibiina kya National Unity Platform singa obukulembeze obuliwo bugaana okumusisinkana. “Singa mulemwa okutuuza olukiiko luno nga bwemusabiddwa, mu kitwale nti endagaano gye twakola nga July 11, 2020 ejja kuba esaziddwamu era mujja kuba mulina okuwaayo byonna ebikwata ku kibiina eri omuntu waffe.” Ebbaluwa ya bannamateeka bw’esoma. Kibalama yategeeza bannamawulire gye buvuddeko nti si musanyufu n’engeri abakulira NUP mu kiseera kino gye babasudde ebbali nga buli kimu bakikola awatali ku beebuuzaako. NUP emwanukudde Ssaabawandiisi wa NUP, Lewis Rubongoya yakakasizza okufuna ebbaluwa eno naye n’ategeeza nti ng’ekibiina kya NUP, kijja kufulumyawo ekiwandiiko ekitongole ku nsonga eno. Ate ye Omwogezi wa NUP, Joel Ssenyonyi agamba nti tewali ngeri yonna gye bandikoze ndagaano ya kika kino ne Kibalama ng’eraga nti mu bbanga lya mwaka erina okwekenneenyezebwa. Ssenyonyi yagasseeko nti bo nga NUP bajja kusigala nga bagoberera Ssemateeka w’ekibiina ky’agamba era n’awakanya ebyogerwa nti tewali kukwatagana ne Kibalama.

headline: Beti Kamya : Ndeeta bukodyo bupya okulwanyisa enguzi
text: Kampala Kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti omuggya, Beti Olive Namisango Kamya, ategeezezza nti alina obukodyo obupya bw’aleese okulwanyisa enguzi mu ggwanga era akakase abo abakyamubuusabuusa ku busobozi bwe mu kifo kino. Pulezidenti Museveni yalonda Beti Kamya okubeera Kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti ng’adda mu bigere by’Omulamuzi Irene Mulyagonja. Wano abamu ku batunuulizi b’ensonga baamukubyemu ebituli nga bagamba nti si ye muntu omutuufu alina okutuula mu woofiisi eno. Kino kyaddiridde ekisanja kya Irene Mulyagonja okuggwaako nga July 5, 2020 wabula omwaka gwonna gwaggwaako nga Museveni talondeddemu muntu. Eggulo ku Ssande, Beti Kamya yatuuzizza olukung’aana lwa bannamawulire n’ategeeza nti okusoomooza okumwolekedde nga Kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti akumanyi bulungi. Kamya agamba nti mu bukodyo bw’atandika nabwo kwe kuyigiriza abantu obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe mu kulwanyisa enguzi nga bakwatagana naye. Ono yagasseeko nti yeetegese ekimala era n’asaba bannayuganda okumwegattako basobole okulwanyisa enguzi ekyalemesezza ensi okukulaakulana. “Nneebaza Pulezidenti olw’okunneesiga n’anyongera obuvunaanyizibwa. Nze muntu omutuufu era nkakasa nja kubutuukiriza kuba ebisaanyizo mbirina. Abo abanjogerera mbakwatibwa ekisa kuba ng’enda kubaswaza.” Beti Kamya bwe yagambye. Kamya yannyonnyodde nti Ssemateeka n’etteeka eriteekawo woofiisi ya Kaliisoliiso, bimuwa obuyinza okukola emirimu gye awatali kuyingirirwa muntu yenna era asuubira okutumbula woofiisi eno. Ono agamba nti amaanyi ge gagenda kuba mu kukunga bannayuganda n’abakozi ba gavumenti basobole okumuwa obuwagizi asobole okulwanyisa enguzi mu ggwanga nga. Kinajjukirwa nti mu 2018, Pulezidenti Museveni yatabukira eyali Kaliisoliiso Irene Mulyagonja olw’okulemwa okulwanyisa enguzi mu woofiisi za gavumenti era gye byaggweera ng’ataddewo akakiiko mu maka g’Obwapulezidenti okulwanyisa enguzi era kano kakulirwa Lt. Col. Edith Nakalema. Wabula wadde yakatondawo, enguzi ekyalemeddewo ekiraga nti omulimu ogwolekedde Beti Kamya munene okusinga bw’alowooza.

headline: Obuganda bukungubagidde Fr. Joseph Tamale
text: Kalungu-Buddu Abakkiriza wamu n’abantu ab’enjawulo beeyiye e Bukalakasa mu Kalungu olunaku lw’eggulo okuziika Fr. Joseph Tamale, 29 eyafudde wiiki ewedde ekirwadde kya Puleesa n’ensigo. Omukolo gw’okuziika gwatandise n’ekitambiro ky’emmisa ekyakulembeddwamu Omusumba w’essaza lya Eklezia ery’e Masaka, Serverus Jjumba. Omusumba Jjumba yasinzidde wano n’agamba nti okufa kwa Fr. Tamale kutadde EKlezia mu muyaga, bw’atyo n’asaba abakrisitu okwongera okwewonga eri omutonzi abataase ku ndwadde ez’enjawulo. Mu ngeri y’emu yennyamidde olw’ekizibu ekiri mu Bannayuganda ng’abantu tebakyesiga bannaabwe nga buli omu aba mu kweraliikirira munne era nga kye kivuddeko n’abantu okubuusabuusa eddagala erigema Corona. “Kati abantu batuuse n’okulowooza nti buli muntu alwala abeera  aweereddwa butwa. Nsaba kino kive mu mitima gy’abantu nti kubanga bwe banaagenda n’embeera eno mu maaso, obunkenke bwakweyongera,” Omusumba Jjumba bwe yategeezeza. Mu bubaka bwe bwe yatisse Ppookino Jude Muleke, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga yatenderezza nnyo emirimu egikoleddwa omugenzi kubanga abadde Father ayagala ennyo Obwakabaka n’eddini ye. Owek. Mayiga yagambye nti Fr. Tamale akoze kinene nnyo mu kutumbula olulimi Oluganda ng’ayita mu kuyimba n’okukumaakuma abavubuka kyasabye abantu abalala bakitwale nga kikulu.  Ye Omubaka wa Kalungu West, Joseph Gonzaga Ssewungu,  yeekokkodde embeera y’ebyobulamu eri mu ggwanga tematiza era nga bangi bafa bagezaako kutwalibwa bweru. Ye Bwannamukulu w’ekigo ky’e Villa Maria mu disitulikiti y’e Kalungu, Omugenzi Fr  Joseph Tamale, gy’amaze omwaka gumu ng’aweereza, Fr Michael Ssewakiryanga, yayunguse amaziga n’ategeezezza nti  Fr. Tamale  ekirwadde ky’ensigo kye kyamusse nti kyokka yagenze okukibategeezaako ng’obudde buyise. Fr.  Joseph Tamale yafuna Obwafaaza mu mwaka gwa 2012 ng’abadde abumazeemu emyaka 9 era abadde ayimba ennyimba  z’eddiini n’okutendeka abayimbi.

headline: Pulezidenti Museveni alabudde abaddukira mu basawo b’ekinnansi okujjanjaba Ebola
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni alabudde abasawo b’ekinnaansi okukomya okukkiriza okujjanjaba abalwadde ba Ebola era nasaba n’abantu ababeera bafunye ekirwadde kino okwewala okunoonya obujjanjabi mu basawo bano. Bweyabadde ayogerako eri abantu ku Lwokusatu, Pulezidenti Museveni yagambye nti abantu abawerako e Mubende baddukidde mu masabo nabatabuzi b’eddagala bwebafuna obubonero bwa Ebola nabalabula nti kino kigenda kwongera kusaasaanya kirwadde kino. “Njagala okulagira abasawo b’ekinnansi bonna natabula eddagala obutakkiriza bantu ba kirwadde kino mu masabo gabwe nga baagala okujjanjabwa. Mubawabule bagenda mu malwaliro amazungu,” Museveni bwe yagambye. Ebigambo bya Museveni biddiridde ebigambibwa nti waliwo omusajja Twagiira Yezu Ndahiiro ow’emyaka 45 eyaliko neyafa ebola wabula nadduka ku kyalo gyeyali abeera Kanseera e Mubende nagenda mu basawo b’ekinnansi okusobola okujjanjabwa. Wabula ono embeera ye yeyongera okubeera embi natwalibwa mu ddwaliro e Kiruddu mu Kampala gyeyafiiridde wiiki ewedde. Museveni agamba nti kyabulabe abasawo b’ekinnaansi okujjanjaba ekirwadde kya Ebola kuba tebalina bukugu kwang’anga birwadde nga bino nabakuutira bwebafuna omulwadde yenna alina obubonero bwa Ebola okuyita abakugu ba Minisitule y’ebyobulamu. Pulezidenti Museveni annyonnyodde nti obubonero nga omusujja, okulumwa omutwe, omubiri okubeera omunafu, obulumi mu kifuba, Okuddukana, okusesema, okuva omusaayi mu matu, mu kamwa, emabega n’amaaso bafune obujjanjabi mu malwaliro agaliraanyewo nga bakozesa Ambyulensi so si ntambula ya lukale omuli takisi ne booda booda. Ono asabye ab’evbyokwerinda abayambako Minisitule y’ebyobulamu mu disitulikiti ez’enjawulo okubeera obulindaala naddala mu bifo abalwadde bano gyebajjanjabirwa okulaba nti tebatolokayo. Okusinziira ku pulezidenti Museveni, tewanabaawo muntu yenna afa kirwadde kya Ebola mu Kampala ng’ono eyafiiridde e Kiruddu yali yatoloka Mubende nalaga mu basawo b’ekinnaansi. Okuva ekirwadde kino lwekyabalukawo omwezi oguwedde, abantu 54 bebakakasiddwa nti bakirina, 19 bafudde ate 20 omuli nabasawo 5 basiibuddwa oluvannyuma lw’okuwona ekirwadde kino.

headline: Covid-19: Gavumenti Yaakugulira Bannayuganda Bonna Mask
text: Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni  Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni akawungeezi ka leero alangiridde nti gavumenti ye yakugulira Bannayuganda bonna abalina emyaka mukaaga n’okwambuka obukookolo bw’okumaaso oba buyite mask mu kaweefube w’okutangira okusaasaana kw’ekirwadde kya coronavirus. Mu bubakabwe ng’asinziira mu maka g’obwapulezidneti e Nakasero, Museveni yategeezezza nti okwambala mask gavumenti ye kwegenda okusinga okussa essira nga bwegezaako okuggya eggwanga ku muggalo ogumaze emyezi ebiri. “Tufunye okwemulugunya nti abantu bangi tebasobola kugula mask kyetuva tusazeewo nti okusobozesa buli muntu okwambala mask gavumenti egenda kuzigaba okuva ku byalo mu sabbiiti bbiri,” Museveni bwyegaambye. Bulyomu bwanaamala okufuna mask ng’olwo emmotoka ezoolukale zikkirizibwa okudda ku luguudo. Kyokka zino zaakubeerangamu abantu kitundu kyabo abalina okuzitambuliramu okusobola okussa munkola enkola ya tonsemberera. Emmotoka z’obuyonjo nazo zikkiriziddwa okudda ku luguudo naye nga zirimu abantu basatu bokka. Kyokka nabano balina okwambala obukookolo. Abayizi b’amasomero abali mu bibiina eby’akamalirizo nga P7, S4, S6 wamu n’ababali mu mwaka gwabwe ogusemba mu matendkero agaawaggulu nabo bakkiriziddwa okuddamu okusoma. Abeebibiina ebirala Musevni abagambye bagira baba bagumiikiriza kubanga embeera tennadda mu nteeko. At abavuzi ba boda boda bbo baakulindamu okuddamu okuweeka abantu kubanga kizibu okwawula omuvuzi ku musaabaze. Aba saluuni, amabaala, ebiduula n’ebirala bbyo byekusigala nga biggale okumala ennaku 21. Kafiyu naye alekeddwawo era nga bulijjo wakutandika ssaawa emu eyakawungeezi nakoma essaawa kumu nabbiri ez’okumakya. Obukwakkulizo obulala bonna obwassibwawo bongezeddwayo okumala ennaku endala 21.

headline: Aba Masaka Union badduukiridde ttiimu y’essaza
text: Ebula ennaku mbale empaka z’ekikopo z’amasaza ga Buganda zikomekerezebwe mu kisaawe kya St. Mary’s Kitende ng’essaza Buddu ne Gomba be batuuka kufayinolo. Ppookino nga akwasibwa ettu okuva mu Masaka Union Bannabuddu bangi beesunga buwanguzi era nga bongedde ebbugumu mu kuvujjirira ttiimu yaabwe mu nnaku zino ezisembayo, esobole okuwangula ttiimu ya Gomba.  Ekibiina ky’obwegassi ekya Masaka Union ekirima endokwa z’emiti ez’ebika ebyenjawulo ate n’okutunda eddagala ly’ebirime ery’omutindo ssaako okuwola ssente n’okugula emmwanyi, kivuddeyo ne kikwasa Ppookino Jude Muleke ensimbi emitwalo 50 ne bbokisi z’amazzi 20 okudduukirira ttiimu y’essaza mu nkambi. Aba Masaka Union obuyambi buno babututte ku mbuga y’essaza Buddu nga babukwasizza Omwami wa Kabaka atwala essaza Buddu, Ppookino Jude Muleke awamu n’olukiiko era ng’aba Masaka Union baakulembeddwamu Hillary Kasozi.  Mu kwogera kwe, Hillary Kasozi ategeezezza nti nga bannabuddu era abakolera emirimu gyabwe mu ssaza lino, kibakwatako nnyo n’asaba Ppookino okukola ekisoboka okuwangula Gomba. Ppookino Jude Muleke asinzidde wano ne yeebaza aba Masaka Union okuvaayo ne bakwatizaako okusobola okulaba nga ttiimu yaabwe tejula n’abasaba beeteeketeeke okutandika okussa ssente mu ttiimu eno nga be bavujjirizi abakulu.  Ono era akunze bannabuddu kuwagira aba Masaka Union olw’okuba baagala nnyo ebintu by’Obwakabaka era n’akakana bannabuddu nti bagenda kuleeta obuwanguzi.

headline: Oguvunaanibwa  Mufti Mubajje  okutunda ettaka ly’e Ssembabule gutandise okuwulirwa
text: Masaka – Buddu Omusango oguvunaanibwa Mufti Shiekh Shaban Mubajje ne banne  ku by’okutunda ettaka ly’Obuyisiraamu e Ssembabule, gwatandise okuwulirwa olunaku lw’eggulo mu kkooti e Masaka. Ettaka eryogerwako liweza mayiro 2 nga lisangibwa ku block 31A ku kyalo Bukiragyi mu disitulikiti y’e Ssembabule. Abayisiraamu nga bakulembeddwamu Hajji Yasin Lubowa, Sheikh Mutazindwa , Sheikh Juma Mukiibi ne bannaabwe abalala be baatwala Mufti Ramathan Mubajje, Mugalu Ramathan, Kayanja Arthur eyagula ettaka lino awamu ne Uganda Muslim Supreme Council mu kkooti nga babavunaana okutunda ettaka ly’Obusiraamu mu makwetu. Mubajje ne banne bwe bavunaanibwa wadde baabadde basuubira mu kkooti eno naye tebaalabiseeko era ekyaddiridde be bapuliida okusaba omulamuzi abakkirize ensonga bazimalire wabweru wa kkooti. Munnamateeka w’oludda oluwaabi, Lukawa Bashir, yategeezezza kkooti nti abawawaabirwa bonna baaweebwa empapula ezibayita mu kkooti awatali kwe bulankanya. Lukawa yayongedde n’asaba omulamuzi asooke alambule ettaka lino eryogerwako era alagire n’abawawaabirwa baweeyo ekyapa ky’ettaka lino mu kkooti. Ono yagambye nti bakkiriziganyizza okuteekawo omwaganya beegeyeemu ku nsonga zino wabweru wa kkooti. Wabula munnamateeka w’abawawaabirwa, Sam Ssekyewa, wadde yakkiriza eky’okutabagana wabweru wa kkooti naye yagaanye eky’okuwaayo ekyapa mu kkooti. Wano Omuwandiisi wa kkooti enkulu, Agnes Nkonge, we yategeerezza nti kkooti egenda kutegeka fayiro y’omusango guno egiwe omutabaganya era singa bano banaalemwa okukkaanya ku kuwaayo ekyapa n’okulambula ettaka omulamuzi ajja kusalawo eky’enkomeredde ku nsonga eno. Abayisiraamu ab’enjawulo nga bakulembeddwamu Sheikh Siraje Mudde akulira akakiiko akakola kukunulula emmaali y’Obuyisiraamu, boogedde ku nsonga eno ne bategeeza nti bo ekigendererwa kyabwe si kyakuwaabira Mubajje wabula baagala kunnunula bintu bya Busiraamu ebyatundibwa mu mancooro kye bavudde bawagira enteeseganya. Bano beewuunyizza engeri ettaka lino gye lyatundibwa nga ate baali balinako omupangisa nga n’ekiseera kye kyali kikyaliko. Kati bagamba nti kye kiseera bannunule ettaka lyabwe basobole okulyekulaakulanyiza. Omulamuzi omusango yagwongeddeyo okutuuka nga  10/6/2021.

headline: Ab’e Kikooza beekalakaasizza lwa masannyalaze
text: Bya Jesse Lwanga Mukono Abatuuze wamu n’abasuubuzi b’e Kikooza mu kibuga Mukono, baggadde oluguudo oluva ku katale ka Kame Valley akamanyiddwa nga Kikko okudda e Wantoni, ng’entabwe evudde ku kumala Ssabbiiti nnamba nga tebalina masannyalaze. Abatuuze nga bakumye  omuliro mu  kkubo Bano okuli; abookya ebyuma, abatunda amata, ab’ebyokunywa, aba Saluuni n’abakola Ice, bategeezezza nti bafiiriddwa obukadde n’obukadde bwa ssente ate nga nazo si zaabwe kubanga baali baazeewola mu bibiina era nga kati tebamanyi kyakukola. Abatuuze bano bawadde ekitongole kya UMEME nsalessale ya lunaku lumu era nga lwe lwaleero okuzzaako a masannyalaze gaabwe oba si ekyo baakukolawo ekisinga ku kino. Balumirizza nti ng’oggyeeko eky’ebintu bye bakozesa okwonooneka, naye n’ebintu ebikozesa amasannyalaze omuli Fridge, Radio, ne TV kubanga buli lwe gabaddenga agaagala okudda nga gamyansa negookya ebintu byabwe. Embeera yeeyongedde okubeera ey’obunkenke okutuusa aduumira ebikwekweto ku poliisi y’e Mukono, ASP Michael Wadulu, bw’atuuse okukkakkanya abatuuze era n’azikiza omuliro ogubadde gukumiddwa. Abasabye okukomya okukuma omuliro mu nguudo kuba kyonoona kkolaasi. Wadulu abasuubizza okukwatagana n’aba UMEME okulaba ng’ekizibu kino kikolebwako mu bwangu. We tukoledde eggulire lino nga poliisi ekyagumbye mu kifo kino okutangira abasuubuzi okuddamu okuziba ekkubo lino. Kaweefube waffe okwogerako n’omwogezi w’ekitongole kya UMEME oluvannyuma lw’obutakwata ssimu ze ezimanyiddwa, agudde butaka.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga akuutidde abalima emmwaanyi okuzigattako omutindo
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abalimi naddala ab’emmwanyi okukola ekisoboka bagatte omutindo ku kirime kino basobole okukifunamu era bakulaakulande. Mukuumaddamula entanda eno agiweeredde ku kyalo Nkuke mu Buddu ku ffaamu ya Kamaama eya Fred Mukasa Luzinda ku Lwokusatu gy’abadde omugenyi ow’enjawulo ate Nampala wa gavumenti mu Palamenti, Hamson Obua nabeera omugenyi omukulu nga bakuza olunaku lw’ emmwaanyi mu ggwanga. Owek. Mayiga akubirizza abantu bonna, n’okusingira ddala abavubuka okuba abajagujagu, beenyigire mu kulima emmwanyi era bazirabirire bulungi okusobola okuzifunamu kuba zino zisobolwa buli muntu.  Katikkiro abakuutidde okukuuma n’okulinnyisa omutindo gwazo ku mitendera egy’enjawulo era nasaba bannayuganda okuyiga okunywa kaawa, kigaziye akatale k’emmwanyi olwo enkulaakulana esobole okweyongera. Mu kwogera kwe, Hon. Denis Hamson Obua, alagidde aba UCDA, okwongera amaanyi mu kubunyisa enjiri y’okulima emmwanyi, olw’obukulu bw’azo mu nkulaakulana y’abantu bonna awatali kusosolamu bamu. Ate ye Ssentebe wa Uganda Coffee Federation, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa, agambye nti olunaku luno luyamba nnyo okukungaanya n’okusisinkanya abo abatambulira mu mulimu ogw’emmwanyi okusobola okunyweza obusuubuzi bwazo; okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa by’emmwanyi ate n’okwezzaamu amaanyi.  Owek. Waggwa agumizza bannayuganda nti bbo nga Uganda Coffee Federation, bajja kwongera okussa ensimbi mu kugula emmwaanyi awamu n’okulinnyisa omutindo gwa tekinologiya azisunsula. Kulwa Uganda Coffee Development Authority, Dr. Emmanuel Lyamulemye, atenderezza omukago gwe balina n’Obwakabaka gw’agambye nti guvuddemu ebibala era abavubuka bajjumbidde okulima emmwanyi n’okunywa kaawa.  Ye Nannyini ffaamu ya Kamaama, Fred Mukasa Luzinda, agambye nti waliwo obwetaavu obw’okulinnyisa omutindo gwe mmwanyi, nga bakozesa tekinologiiya ali kumulembe naddala ow’ebyuma ebizongerako omutindo okuviira ddala ku kunsunsula. Asuubizza okubangula abantu ku nsunsula y’emmwaanyi entuufu okusobola okukuuma omutindo.

headline: Bobi Wine Atonedde Abataka Ebya Eid
text: Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, omubaka akiikirira Kyaddondo East mu palamenti olwaleero atonedde Abataka Abakulu Ab’obusolya ettu lya Eid. Bwabadde aleese ettu lino ku Bulange e Mmengo omubadde amatooke n’enkoko, Kyagulanyi ayagala okwesimba ku pulezidenti Museveni okuvuganya ku ntebe y’obukulembeze bweggwanga, yagambye nti balowoozezza ku Bataka mu mbeera eno eyakazigizigi nga buli muntu ali kululwe.  “Bajjajjaffe Abataka Abakulu Ab’obusolya ani abalowoozaako? Kano kabonero tusazeewo tukakole bakimanye nti batubeera ku mwoyo. Tubalowoozaako era tubaagala era tusaba bonna abazzukulu ba Buganda gyebali nti bajjaja bwe babeerayo nga bakakakkalabye emirimu, ffetulina okubalabirira era tusaba Mukama abatukuumire,” Kyagulanyi bweyagambye. Ono era yategeezezza nti omuntu atamanyi gyava aba tamanyi gyagenda era abanga omuti ogutalina mirandira. “Nzize ne mutabani wange ob’olyawo naye anaayiga nti tuli Baganda abalina bajjajja abatulungamya,” Kyagulanyi bweyagambye. Ono era yayagalizza Abasiraamu Eid ennungi egenda okukuzibwa enkya oluvanyuma lw’okumalako ekisiibo.

headline: Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda ne Museveni bagaanye ebya Kyagulanyi okutereeza empaaba, tewali budde
text: Kampala Pulezidenti Museveni, akakiiko k’ebyokulonda awamu ne Ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti, bawakanyizza okusaba kwa Munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform, Robert Kyagulanyi, mw’ayagalira okukola ennongoosereza mu mpaaba. Kyagulanyi awakanya okulondebwa kwa Pulezidenti Museveni mu kalulu 2021. Pulezidenti Museveni awakanya okusaba kwa Kyagulanyi Bano basabye kkooti egobe okusaba kuno kuba tewali budde. Kyagulanyi ng’ayita mu bannamateeka abakuliddwa Medard Sseggona, basabye kkooti ebakkirize okukola ennongoosereza mu mpaaba yaabwe era baleete obujulizi obupya okuwakanya okulondebwa kwa Pulezidenti Museveni mu kalulu akaakubwa nga January 14. Sseggona agamba nti Kyagulanyi yasibirwa ewaka ekyamulemesa okukung’aanya obujulizi mu budde obulagirwa ssemateeka obw’ennaku 15. Wabula Museveni ng’ayitira mu bannamateeka be abakuliddwa Ebert Byenkya, bategeezezza abalamuzi omwenda abakuliddwamu Ssaabalamuzi Alfonse Owiny Dollo, nti amateeka tegabakkiriza kukkiriza kusaba kuno kuba waliwo obudde obulagiddwa mu mateeka nga buno bwayiseeko. “Omuwawaabirwa asooka (Museveni) awakanya okukola ennongoosereza mu musango guno era ng’alina ensonga ez’enjawulo. Okusooka omusango g’obwapulezidenti tegulina kukolebwamu nnongoosereza.” Byenkya bw’agambye. Byenkya asabye kkooti okugoba okusaba kuno kuba kwayise mu nnaku 15 eziragirwa mu mateeka. Ssaabalamuzi Owiny-Dollo bw’abuuzizza Byenkya ku kutataaganyizibwa kwa Kyagulanyi ng’asibirwa mu nnyumba, ono ategeezezza nti kino kya kwekwasa kuba bannamateeka be baali basobola bulungi okuteekateeka empaaba ye bw’aba ye yali musibe. N’akuliddemu bannamateeka b’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda, Joseph Matsiko, ategeezezza nti nabo tebakkiriza nnongoosereza mu mpaaba kuba obudde obulagirwa mu mateeka bwayitako. “ Tekikkirizibwa kuleeta nsonga mpya wabweru w’ekiseera ekiragiddwa mu Ssemateeka, n’olwekyo okusaba kwabwe tekulina kukkirizibwa.” Matsiko bw’asabye. Mu mpaaba, Kyagulanyi gy’ayagala okukolamu ennongoosereza, avunaana Museveni emisango 15 okuli n’okugulirira abalonzi. Matsiko agambye nti omusango gwa Amama Mbabazi Kyagulanyi kwe yeesigamye okusaba akole ennongoosereza, okukyusaamu okwakolebwa kwali tekulimu bujulizi bupya bw’atyo n’asaba omusango gugobwe era Kyagulanyi abaliyirire. Ate ye Ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti, William Byaruhanga, naye asabye kkooti okugoba omusango guno kuba omuwaabi yasoose kusoma kwewozaako kwe n’alyoka ayagala okutereeza mu mpaaba ye. We tukoledde eggulire lino ng’omusango gukyagenda mu maaso, era tujja bikutuusaako buli ebigenda mu maaso.

headline: RDC Bamwine ayimirizza abazimba akatale, Mmeeya Namayanja n’awera
text: Omubaka wa Pulezidenti e Masaka, Fred Bamwine, ayimirizza abasuubuzi ababadde bazimba akatale e Kijjabwemi ku luguudo lwa Mbarara By- Pass ng’entabwe eva ku nkaayana za ttaka eziri ku ttaka lino. Bamwine agamba nti akatale kano kabadde kazimbibwa mu bukyamu olw’okuba nti kkanso teyisanga kiteeso kiteekawo katale kano era nga ttawuni Kkiraaka n’ateekerateekera ekibuga Masaka babadde tebamanyi.   Mmeeya Florence Namayanja ategeezezza nti ye yawadde abantu bano ekifo ekyo wabula ate wavuddeyo abagamba nti ekifo ekyo baakigula. Ettaka erikaayanirwa liri ku Bbulooko ya Mbarara By-Pass ku poloti nnamba 10 nga liwera obugazi bwa yiika 3 era ng’ekifo kino ekimanyiddwa nga Trans- Park Yard. Okusinziira ku RDC Bamwine, akatale kano kabadde kazimbibwa nga tewali pulaani ate naye nga RDC nga talina ky’amanyi kyokka mu kiseera kye kimu waliwo abakaayanira ettaka lino. “Omuntu yenna abadde akolera wano, abadde azimba wano okuva essaawa eno ayamukewo. Ng’enda kunoonya Ttawuni kkanso ne Namayanja tutuule tunoonye ekyokubakolera. Naye kye mubadde mukola wano kimenya mateeka.” Bamwine bw’atyo bw’agobye abasuubuzi mu kifo kino. Ssentebe w’akatale kano, Kasibante John, agamba nti tewali kikyamu kye bakoze kuba Mmeeya Namayanja ye yabawa olukkusa okuzimba mu kifo kino. Mmeeya Namayanja ku nsonga eno bw’atuukiriddwa ategeezezza nti kituufu ye yakkirizza abantu bano okuteekawo emidaala ng’amanyi nti kifo kya kibuga kino. “Bwe twamala okugamba abantu babeerewo, waliwo omukulu omu eyajja n’ang’amba awo alinawo ekyapa. Ekyapa kino kyafuluma mu mannya ga John Bosco Kisekka ne Pascal Nzareba P.o Box 248 Masaka nga 24/5/2017 nga ba joint tenants. Ate ekyapa kye kimu ne kikyusibwa mu mannya ga City Oil nga 2/1/2021, ekitegeeza baali baakifuna ne bakiwa City Oil ng’ennaku z’omwezi zidda mabega.” Mmeeya Namayanja bw’alambuludde. Ate ye Ttawuni kkiraaka John Bahangaana annyonnyodde nti we yayingirira mu woofiisi mu 2019 yasanga ettaka lino lyatundibwa wadde nga okusooka lyali lya kkanso.

headline: Kitalo! Sipiika Jacob Oulanyah afiiridde mu Amerika, abanene bamukungubagidde
text: Abadde Sipiika wa Palamenti Jacob Oulanyah afiiridde mu ggwanga lya Amerika gy’abadde yatwalibwa okufuna obujjanjabi obwenjawulo. Bino bikakasiddwa Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni ng’ayita ku mutimbagano n’ategeeza nti amawulire gano yagafuna ku maliri ga leero. Museveni ategeezezza nti okufa kwa Oulanyah ddibu ddene nnyo eri eggwanga n’ekibiina kya NRM. Eyaliko Sipiika Rebecca Kadaga ategeezezza nti Kano akaseera kazibu nnyo eri maama w’omugenzi, mukyala we n’abaana be awamu ne Palamenti yonna. Oulanyah kati omugenzi yabadde omubaka wa disitulikiti ye Omoro mu Palamenti era yafuuka Sipiika oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula Rebecca Kadaga. Oulanyah ye yali amyuuka Kadaga okuva mu mwaka gwa 2011 okutuula mu 2021. Akulira oludda oluwabula gavumenti mu Palamenti, Owek. Mathias Mpuuga Nsamba naye afulumizzaawo ekiwandiko era n’akubagiza ab’enju ye n’alaga nti ono abadde muntu wa njawulo mu ngeri gy’abadde akubirizaamu Palamenti.

headline: Ppookino asibiridde ttiimu ya Buddu entanda nga yeetegekera Gomba
text: Omwami wa Kabaka atwala essaza lya Buddu, Ppookino Jude Muleke asinzidde mu nsisinkano n’akuutira abazannyi be okunyweza empisa era boolese omutindo nga bwe bazze bakola basobole okuwangula ekikopo ky’omwaka guno. Ppookino Jude Muleke nga atongoza omujoozi gwa ttiimu ya Buddu Entanda eno Owek. Muleke yagiwadde abazannyi wamu n’abawagizi ba ttiimu y’essaza lya Buddu wakati nga beetegekera okuttunka ne Gomba ku fayinolo y’ekikopo ky’amasaza enkya ku Lwomukaaga ku St. Mary’s stadium Kitende, bwe baabadde ku ky’eggulo eky’okusonderako ssente  ku Maple Leaf Hotel mu Masaka. “Emabega eri wabaddewo enkalu ng’abazannyi batufuukira ekirala, ng’abazannyi beefuula ab’ekitalo. Temuli ba kitalo. Njagala okubasaba bavubuka mwe empisa ze mwolesezza omulundi guno muzitwalire ddala mu maaso.” Bw’atyo Ppookino Jude Muleke bw’asabye. Ppookino Muleke yasabye bannamasaka okwekwatakwata basonde ssente, ttiimu eno esobole okugulirwa emmotoka enaagitambuza n’okugidduukirira kuba ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kyakosa nnyo ebyenfuna ku mitendera gyonna. Muleke yakirambise ng’essaza bwe litalina nnyigiza olwebintu byayo ebyandivuddemu ssente okuba nga tebinnabadizibwa era ng’okuyimirizaawo essaza liyambibwako bannabuddu. Ku mukolo guno Ppookino atongozza omujoozi gwe banaazannyiramu era nga bannakyotera nga bakulembeddwamu ssentebe Kintu Kisekulo ne bannamasaka nga bakuliddwamu omubaka omukyala Juliet Nakabuye Kakande, basonze ssente eziweze obukadde 6.

headline: Vipers ereese Omucongo Manzoki Cesar aginyeenyeze obutimba
text: Ttiimu y’omupiira eya Vipers SC ereese Omucongo Manzoki Cesar Loki agiyambeko okuginyeenyeza obutimba esobole okutwala liigi ya sizoni ejja eya 2020/2021. Manzoki nga ayanjulwa eri abawagizi Manzoki olwakkiriziddwa FIFA okuteeka omukono ku ndagaano y’emyaka ebiri ku Lwokuna akawungeezi, n’awera nti waakukozesa omukisa guno okwongera okutumbula ekitone kye. “Ndi musanyufu okubeera wano,” Bw’atyo Manzoki bwe yategeezezza omutimbagano gwa Vipers. Manzoki yagambye nti agenda kusinziira ku Vipers okutuukiriza ebirooto bye era ng’asuubira nti ajja kuweebwa omukisa okutandikirawo asobole okuyambako ttiimu eno okuwangula ebikopo nga agiteebera ggoolo. Manzoki ow’emyaka 24, omupiira yagutandikira kkiraabu ya Dauphin Noir de Goma mu ggwanga lya Congo mu mwaka 2012, yeegatta ku TP Mazembe mu 2016 era nga bano yabazannyira sizoni ttaano nnamba. Oluvannyuma yeegatta ku AS Vita Club eya Congo, n’abateebera ggoolo 38 mu mipiira 58. Manzoki ye muzannyi owoomukaaga eyeggase ku Vipers ng’abalala kuliko; Joseph Dhata, David Bagoole, Ibrahim Orit, Disan Galiwango ne Jamil Kaliisa.

headline: Eklezia erabudde poliisi n’amagye ku kalulu ka 2021
text: Kampala Abasumba b’Eklezia mu ggwanga balabudde poliisi ku kuyingiza amagye mu kalulu ka 2021 akagenda okukubwa ssabbiiti ejja we kiteetaagisa nti, kino kisobola okuvaako obutabanguko mu ggwanga. Bisoopu Joseph Antony Zziwa Wakati nga January 14, eggwanga ligenda okulonda Pulezidenti n’ababaka ba palamenti, ssentebe w’olukiiko olutaba abasumba b’Eklezia olwa ‘Uganda Episcopal Conference,’ Bisoopu Joseph Antony Zziwa, alabudde akakiiko k’ebyokulonda okukwata ensonga z’ebyokulonda mu ngeri y’obwenkanya. “Tusaba poliisi n’ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda ebiri mu kalulu kano, okukozesa obulungi obuyinza bwabyo era byeyise mu ngeri ey’obuvunaanyizibwa. Mu bye tusaba twagala poliisi ng’ekola emirimu gyayo ereme kulaga kyekubiira era yeewale okuyingizibwa mu ntalo z’ebyobufuzi, erina okulabibwa ng’ekola ku lw’abantu so si bannabyabufuzi.” Bisoopu Zziwa bw’agambye. Omusumba Zziwa awadde poliisi amagezi okweddiza obuvunaanyizibwa bwayo mu kulonda kuno era ekimanye nti y’erina okuvunaanibwa ku ebyo ebinaaba bitagenze bulungi n’okulinyirira eddembe ly’obuntu. Asabye poliisi okwewala okutataaganya kkampeyini n’enkung’aana za bannabyabufuzi ezibeera zikkiriziddwa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda, kuba kiraga kyekubiira. “Ekya poliisi okuyita amagye, kye kirina okusembayo ng’ebirala byonna biremereddwa kuba poliisi y’erina obukugu n’obumanyi okukolagana n’abantu kuba abajaasi batendekebwa kwang’anga lutalo so si beekalakaasa.” Omusumba Zziwa bw’annyonnyodde. Ono alaze okutya olw’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda akakulirwa Omulamuzi Byabakama, okulabika nti balemeddwa okukwata obulungi ensonga z’okulonda ng’okusinziira ku biriwo, eggwanga lisobola okudda mu mivuyo egyayita egyava ku kukwata obubi ensonga eno.

headline: Minisita Aceng asabye ab’ebyokwerinda okwongera amaanyi mu kukwasisa ebiragiro bya COVID-19
text: Minisita w’ebyobulamu, Dr. Jane Ruth Aceng, asabye ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda mu ggwanga okunyweza ebiragiro ebitangira ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. Okusaba kuno, Minisita Aceng akukoze ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku Lwokubiri wano mu Kampala. “Okukwasisa ebiragiro kulina okugobererwa obukiiko bwa disitulikiti obulwanyisa COVID-19. Bannansi basabiddwa okwambala obukookolo akadde konna nga bali mu lukale, bafube okulaba nga waliwo ebifo we banaabira engalo.” Aceng bw’annyonnyodde. Dr. Aceng ayagala ab’ebyokwerinda bakwatagane n’obukiiko obwateekebwawo okulwanyisa Ssennyiga Corona ku disitulikiti ez’enjawulo balabe ng’abantu bagobererera ebiragiro okuli okwambala masiki, okunaaba mu ngalo awamu n’okwewala okukung’aana. Ono agamba nti eno y’engeri yokka, bannansi gye basobola okulwanyisaamu ekirwadde kino ne bava ku muggalo. Minisita Aceng asabye bannabyabufuzi bakomye okukung’aanya abantu nga babagabira emmere kuba wadde emmere bagyetaaga naye ate kisobola okuvaako okusaasaana kw’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. Aceng era ategeezezza nti gavumenti yalagidde ebitebe byayo mu mawanga g’ebweru okutandika okunoonya eddagala erisobola okugema ekirwadde kino, kiyambeko okwanguya kaweefube gavumenti gw’eriko ow’okulaba nga bannansi bagemebwa. Mu ngeri yeemu, Aceng ayambalidde abantu abaasudde ssanduuke y’abafu nga beemulugunya ku muteesiteesi omukulu owa Minisitule y’ebyobulamu, Dr. Diana Atwine, gwe bagamba nti akutte bubi ssente z’okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino ne zitakola kyaziweesaayo. Bano Aceng abasabye nti bwe baba baagala mbalirira n’ensaasaanya ya ssente ze baaweebwa, bagisabe mu kifo ky’okusuula ssanduuke z’abafu n’okusaba Atwine alekulire, kuba ebikolwa byabwe tebirina gwe bigenda kutiisatiisa. Bino we bijjidde ng’eggwanga lirindirira okwogera kwa Pulezidenti Museveni ku Lwomukaaga okulaba oba eggwanga linaggulwawo oluvannyuma lw’omuggalo ogw’ennaku 42 ogwalangirirwa gye buvuddeko.

headline: Kaliisoliiso Beti Kamya avudde mu by’okunoonyereza ku bukadde 40 ezaweebwa ababaka
text: Kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti, Beti Kamya ategeezezza nga bwavudde mu kunoonyereza ku nsimbi obukadde 40 ezigambibwa okuweebwa buli mubaka wa Palamenti nga agamba nti abatwalayo omusango baguggyeeyo. Bino Kaliisoliiso Kamya abyogeredde mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire olutudde mu Kampala bw’abadde alambulula ku nteekateeka z’okukuza olunaku lw’okukaza abakozi bagavumenti okuwa abantu empeereza egwanidde. Kamya annyonnyodde nti nga Kaliisoliiso talina buyinza kusigala nga anoonyereza ku nsonga eno ate nga bannanyini yo abagitwalayo bagiggyeeyo era neyetonda mu lukiiko lwe ggwanga olukulu. Ono agasseeko nti bannayuganda balina okufuna empeereza esinga okuva mu bakozi ba gavumenti era tebakkiriza okubuzibwabuzibwa awamu n’okumalirwa obudde okuva mu bunafu n’enkola y’emirimu ey’ekibogwe okuva mu bakozi ba gavumenti. “Enguzi tekoma ku kulyanguzi oba okuwa emirimu abantu abatalina bisaanyizo oba okubulankanya ssente naye n’omuntu alemwa okukola kyateekeddwa okukola nga ate asasulwa abeera alidde enguzi,” Beti Kamya bw’agambye. Ono agamba nti enkola y’okumala gakola mu bakozi bagavumenti efiiriza gavumenti ssente nnyingi era esobola okugoba bamusigansimbi nga batya okuteeka kuno ensimbi zabwe nga abantu emirimu bagikola mu ngeri ya neemalidde. Kamya asabye bannamawulire n’abantu ba bulijjo okuyambako okwanika abo bonna abakola ebikolwa by’obuli bw’enguzi nga batuuka ekikeerezi awamu n’okwebulankanya ku mirimu. Okusinziira ku alipoota ya kalisoliiso, wofiisi ezisinze okutunulirwa mwemuli woofisi z’ebyettaka, abakozi ba gavumenti mu gavumenti ezebitundu saako abasawo n’ebitongole ebirala. Ekitongole kino kigamba nti kifunye emisango 320 okuva mu July omwaka oguwedde era egisinga gitandise okulondolwa. Ye akulira okukung’aanya emisango gino, Justus Kareebe ategeezezza nti emisango egisinga gyekuusa nyo ku bulyazamanya abakozi ba gavumenti, obutakanya mu bakozi saako emivuyo mu bukiiko obugaba emirimu gya gavumenti. Abakulu bano era balabudde ebitongole byonna ebya gavumenti ku kwerimbika mu woofiisi esembayo waggulu okusobola okukola ebitali ku mateeka nti bubakeeredde kuba amateeka gaba obuyinza okunoonyereza ku woofiisi zonna mu ggwanga nga oggyeeko eya Pulezidenti.

headline: Poliisi eyise Ssegiriinya ne Ssewanyana ku by’ettemu ly’e Masaka
text: Poliisi y’e Masaka eyise ababaka okuli owa Makindye West, Allan Ssewanyana ne Muhammad Ssegiriinya owa Kawempe North, beeyanjule gy’eri basobola okubaako bye babuuzibwa ku bigambo bye baayogera nga bikwatagana ku ttemu ly’e Masaka. Okusinziira ku bbaluwa eno poliisi gy’ewandikidde ababaka bano nga3/09/2021, egamba nti abakulu bano bombi baliko ebigambo ebyensimattu bye baayogera ku ttemu ly’e Masaka mu mwezi gwa July ne August 2021. Kati bano bayitiddwa okweyanjula ku poliisi nga 6/09/2021 bakole siteetimentiokuyambako ku poliisi mu kunoonyereza kw’eriko. Oluvannyuma lw’ebibaluwa bino okufuluma, bannabyabufuzi ab’enjawulo okuva ku ludda oluvuganya bategeezezza nga kino poliisi ky’ekola kwe kugezaako okuteeka abantu baabwe mu katego, okulaga nti balina kye bamanyi ku ttemu ly’ebijambiya erigenda mu maasomu bitundu by’e Masaka. “Minisita Baryomunsi bwe yavuddeyo n’ategeeza nti aba Opozisoni balina kye bamanyi ku ttemu ly’e Masaka, yawulikise ng’asaaga. Naye nga bwe bagamba buli kimu mu Uganda kisoboka, basobola okukola buli kimu okutuukiriza ebigendererwa byabwe.” Pulezidenti w’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP),Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu bw’agambye. Kyagulanyi alabudde gavumenti okwesonyiwa ekkubo ly’ekutte ng’ebayingiza mu ttemu ly’e Masaka kuba tekigenda kubaggya ku mulamwa gwa kulwanirira bantu n’okununula eggwanga. Omuloodi wa Kampala, Erias Lukwago ategeezezza nti mu kifo kya poliisi okunoonya abatemu abamalawo bannabuddu ate kati etandise kwekwasa na kunoonya w’ebuukira mu nsonga zino. Mu ngeri yeemu omwogezi w’ekibiina kya NUP, Joel Ssenyonyi annyonnyodde nti poliisi egezaako nkweyambisa bukodyo bwaGen. Kale Kayihura eyapangisa abavubuka okulaga nti be baali batemula abantu, kyokka ssente bwe zitaabaweebwa, ne babuulira bannamawulire olukwe lwonna. Ssenyonyi era alabudde nti ne Minisita Baryomunsi yabadde agezaako kutegeka bannayuganda. Bino we bijjidde ng’abatemu ab’ebijambiya bakyagenda mu maaso n’okulumba ebyalo mu Buddu n’okutemula abantu, nga bangi battiddwa ate abalala bapooca na bisago. Wabula ekyewuunyisa abatemu bano baasooka kulabula ate bwe balumba tebalina kintu kyonna kye batwala!

headline: Gambia : Pulezidenti Barrow alayiziddwa  bw’awangudde omusango
text: Pulezidentu Adama Barrow alayiziddwa ku bukulembeze bw’eggwanga lya Gambia oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula omusango gw’ebyokulonda ogwali gumuloopeddwa mu kkooti ensukkulumu ey’eggwanga eryo. Barrow kati atandise ekisanja kye ekyokubiri nga Pulezidenti w’eggwanga lino nga byonna abifunye ayita mu kalulu era obutambi busaasaanidde omutimbagano nga bulaga omukulu ono ng’akuba ebirayiro okunyweza Ssemateeka n’okukulembera obulungi abantu be. Kino kiddiridde kkooti ensukkulumu okugoba omusango ogwatwalibwayo ekibiina ekivuganya ekyaUnited Democratic Party (UDP) nga bawakanya ebyava mu kalulu akaakubwa nga Desemba 4 akalaga nti Barrow yawangula n’ebitundu 53 ku buli 100. AbaUDPkino baakiwakanya nga bagamba nti vvulugu eyalabikira mu kulonda kuno yali y’aludde okulabikako nga tekali kaamazima na bwenkanya nga Ssemateeka bw’agamba. Ku Mmande ya wiiki eno, kkooti ensukkulumuyagoba omusango ng’egamba nti obujulizi obwali buleeteddwa bwali bunafu. Kinajjukirwa nti Barrow nga tannayingira byabufuzi yalina bbizinensi z’ebyettaka era yaliko ng’omukuumi owa Securiko mu kibuga London ekya Bungereza wabula yeewuunyisa ensi bwe yeesimbawo mu 2017 n’awangula Pulezidenti eyaliko Yahya Jammeh mu kalulu ak’ebyafaayo.

headline: Omuzibizi Wa Vipers Jacob Okao  Musanyufu Olw’okuzannyirako Mu Liigi Ya UPL
text: Jacob Okao ow’emyaka 19, azanye era nawangula omupiira gwe ogusoose mu ‘Uganda Premier League; [UPL] Omuvubuka ono muyizi okuva mu ssomero erimu ku gasibukamu omupiira erya st Mary’s ss Kitende, era Okao musanyufu nnyo okuweebwa omukisa okuzanyirako mu league ya bannantameggwa ey’eggwanga Uganda. “Ndi musanyufu nnyo okuwebwa omukisa okuzanyirako mu UPL omulundi gwange ogusoose ng’omuzanyi akyasinze obuto era ndijjukira akaseera Kano obulamu bwange bwonna” Jacob Okao bweyategezezza banna mawulire ba Gambuuze. Ku mipiira 25 Viper’s gyezannye, Okao azanyeko emipiira munaana gyokka omuli ogwa Kyetume FC, Sports Club Villa, Onduparaoa, Mbarara city, proline ne Jinja based bulL. Jacob Okao abaddeko ku team y’abazannyi 18 ku mipiira nga bameggana ne Uganda Revenue Authority (URA), Maroons, ne Kampala capital city Authority (KCCA). Okao era eyatwara St. Mary’s SS kitende mu mpaka 2019 copa coca cola championship e Jinja ne mu East African football munDodoma mu Tanzania, akiriza nti omukisa guno ogwamuweebwa ajja gukozesa bulungi okutumbula ekitone kye. “Era njagala okukozesa omukisa guno ng’ejjinja oly’okulinyako mubulamu bwange era ntunuulidde ekyokubeera omuzibizi asinga mu UPL era neegatte ne ku team y’eggwanga enkulu,” Okao bweyagambye. Abazanyi abamubereddewo Mungeri eyenjawulo, Okao asiimye nnyo omulimu ogwettendo abazanyi ba Viper’s gwebakoze ku bulamu bwe era nga mu bbo mwemuli; Hamid Lwaliwa, Geoffrey Waswa, Siraje Sentamu, Brian Nkuubi, Ngugwa Abraham ne Fahad Bayo okumuwa ebigambo ebizzaamu essuubi ku kitone kye eky’omupiira wamu n’batendesi n’abawagizi be. Jacob Okao asuubirwa okwegatta ku bazibizi banne aba Viper’s omuli Halid Lwaliwa, Geoffrey Waswa, Bashir Asku wamu ne Ahmed Amayo okwo kwogatta Livingston Mulondo agenda okukomawo mu sizoni ejja oluvannyuma lwokusubwa season ewedde yona olw’obuvune.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga atenderezza aba Wells of Life olw’okubunyisa amazzi amayonjo
text: Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga atendereza ekitongole ki Wells of Life olw’okutuusa amazzi amayonjo ku bantu ba Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka nga bayita mu nteekateeka y’okusima Nayikondo. Okwebaza kuno, Owek. Mayiga akukoledde mu nsisinkano gyabaddemu n’ab’ekibiina ki ‘Wells Of Life’ ku Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri nebateesa ku ngeri ez’enjawulo gyebasobola okwongera okutumbula enkolagana wakati w’ekitongole n’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda . Owek. Mayiga agamba nti wadde Uganda erina ennyanja n’emigga bingi abantu mwebasobola okuggya amazzi amayonjo naye batawaanyizibwa nnyo n’ekizibu ky’okubunyisa amazzi kino bwatyo neyeebaza bannamikago bano olw’obuyambi buno. “Abagenyi bano bava mu kitongole ki Wells of Life naye omulimu gwabwe gwakunoonya nsimbi nebasima Nayikondo mu bitundu eby’enjawulo era mu Buganda twakasima Nayikondo eziwera 628 nga omwaka guno twakasima 21, oguwedde twasima 91 ate emabega ko 42, 2019Nayikondo 105 ate 2018 75,” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’ategeezezza. Akuliddemu aba Wells of Life, Charlie Hedges, ategeezezza nti baasalawo okukolagana ne Buganda olw’obulambulukufu era nategeeza nti omwaka guno bagenda kusima Nayikondo 820 era baddaabirize Nayikondo 180 nga awamu ze Nayikondo lukumi lulamba mu Buganda okutuusa ku bantu ba Kabaka amazzi amayonjo. Hedges annyonnyodde nti amazzi kirabo ekyaweebwayo Katonda nga bo kyebakola kwekugezaako okugatuusa ku bantu abagetaaga era nakakasa nti bakwongera okutumbula obuyonjo mu bantu ba Kabaka nga bayita mu nteekateeka ez’enjawulo. Kinajjukirwa nti aba Wells of Life, batta omukago n’Obwakabaka okubunyisa amazzi mu byalo mu masaza ga Buganda 18 era wetwogerera kati enzizi za Nayikondo 628 zezaakasimibwa okwetoloola Buganda.

headline: Katikkiro asabye gavumenti eyambe ku banoonyereza eddagala lya COVID-19
text: Kampala  Katikkiro wa Buganda, Owek. Charles Peter Mayiga, asabye gavumenti eyambeko ku bantu abeenyigira mu kunoonyereza ku bintu ebitali bimu naye naddala mu ddagala erisobola okutaasa eggwanga ku kirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. Bino Kamalabyonna abyogedde aggulawo olukung’aana lwa Buganda olwategekeddwa akakiiko k’Obwakabaka aka COVID-19 akakulirwa Prof. Twaha Kaawaase Kigongo, ku Lwokutaano ng’ayita ku mutimbagano za ZOOM. “Okunoonyereza kwetaagisa ebintu bingi okusobola okuvaamu ebibabala noolwekyo abanoonyereza basaana okuyambibwako. Mu bintu ebingi bye beetaaga mulimu ebikozesebwa, ensimbi n’ebirala. Walina okubaawo enteekateeka okuva mu gavumenti ng’erung’amya amatendekero agavuddeyo okunoonyereza.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agambye. Ono annyonnyodde nti abazungu abavumbula eddagala si banjawulo nnyo naffe wabula n’asaba obuwagizi buno buleme kubeera bwa byabufuzi nakukola mawulire. Kamalabyonna era asabye gavumenti okulaba nti eddagala lyonna eribeera lizuuliddwa ligoberera emitendera egy’okugezesebwa nga terinnagezesebwa ku bantu era likeberwe ku mutendera gw’ensi yonna bwe tuba baakubaako kye tutuukako. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro, ebivumbule ebisinga naddala eby’ekinnassayansi ng’eddagala, biyinza okuba eby’obulabe eri obulamu bw’abantu singa babikozesa ng’abakugu tebabikakasizza. Mu lukung’aana luno Katikkiro mw’asabidde abavubuka okukozesa omutimbagano mu ngeri ez’enjawulo ezigasa obulamu bwabwe okusinga okumalirako obudde nga bajeregerera wamu n’okuvuma abantu abatutumufu. Ono era asabye abantuokukendeeza ku kutya kwe balina ku kirwadde kya COVID-19 ekireseewo abamu okusosola abo abakifunako awamu n’abalala okutandika okukyejjanjaba awatali kusooka kukeberwa. Kinajjukirwa nti oluvannyuma lw’okubalukawo kw’ekirwadde kya Covid-19, Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bwassaawo akakiiko aka Buganda Covid-19 Task Force n’ekigendererwa ky’okuyambeko ku bantu abali obubi basobole okufuna kyebalya. Ono akuutidde abavubuka okufuba okukozesa obulungi omutimbagano mu kifo ky’okumalirako obudde nga bakola ebitagasa. Ate ye minisita w’ebyobulamu mu Bwakabaka Dr. Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma akubirizza abantu okusigala ku bwerinde era banywerere ku biragiro bya Minisitule y’ebyobulamu okusobola okutangira ekirwadde kino. Olukung’aana luno lwetabiddwamu abakugu mu nsonga z’ebyobulamu mu Buganda, baminisita ba Buganda abakwatibwako obutereevu era ng’ebinaava mu lukung’aana luno byakuteekebwa mu nkola, okutaasa abantu olumbulege lwa Ssennyiga Corona.

headline: Twetaaga Federo okutaasa obutonde bw’ensi – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Kamalabyonna wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, ategeezeza nti Buganda yeetaaga enfuga eya Federo efune obuyinza okukuuma eggwanga ng’eyita mu kulwanirira obutonde bw’ensi kiyambe Uganda obutafuuka ddungu. Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga nga ayogerako eri Obuganda Owek. Mayiga annyonnyodde nti kumpi buli lunaku waliwo abantu abazimba amakolero mu ntobazzi, abasaanyizzaawo ebibira wamu n’okusima omusenyu mu nnyanja n’ebikolwa ebirala ebityoboola obutonde bw’ensi. “Mukama wange abantu bonna abampandiikira amabaluwa ku nsonga eno, bang’amba nti baako ky’okola naye tetulina buyinza kubonereza abo abatyoboola obutonde bw’ensi. Kye tuva tukidding’ana nti twetaaga enfuga eya Federo.” Owek. Mayiga bw’ategeezezza ku mukolo gw’okujaguza  Ameefuga ga Buganda aga 58 mu Lubiri e Mmengo, leero ku Lwokuna.Mayiga agasseeko nti abantu abasaanyaawo obutonde bw’ensi beegiriisa  awatali abagambako ate nga ne Buganda eyandibakomyeko terina buyinza era n’ayaniriza omugenyi wa Kabaka okuva mu Adhola Josephat Oketcho Chombo. Ono asiimye bannamikago olw’okukwatira awamu ne bategeka omukolo guno. Mayiga agambye nti ku lunaku lwa 8/10, Omulangira wa Bungereza, Kent lwe yazza endagaano zonna Bungereza ze yakola ne Buganda era enkeera waalwo Uganda n’efuna obwetwaze. Katikkiro annyonnyodde nti omukolo gwa bulungi bwansi ne gavumenti ez’ebitundu ezaagattibwa zirimu emiramwa mingi naye ng’ekisinga obukulu kwe kujjukira Ameefuga ga Buganda. Asabye abantu ba Buganda okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe era baleme kukkiriza ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kubalemesa kubutuukiriza. Katikkiro yeebazizza bannamawokota olw’okuwangula engabo y’essaza erisinze era n’akuutira amasaza amalala okulikoppa. Ate ye Ssaabawolereza wa Buganda, Owek. Christopher Bwanika, awozezza Olutabaalo mu maaso g’Empologoma n’ategeeza nti omutindo gw’obuweereza bw’amasaza eri abantu ba Beene gulinnye olw’ekirabo ky’essaza erisinze, okuteekebwawo. Ono oluvannyuma ayise Kayima okugenda mu maaso g’Empologoma asobole okukwasibwa ebirabo. Minisita w’obulimu n’obutonde mu Buganda, Owek. Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo, ategeezezza nti baalonze omulamwa gwa ‘Abaami n’obutonde’ omwaka guno okusobozesa abaami ba Kabaka okufaayo ku butonde era babulwanirire. Ayanjulidde Nnyinimu abamu ku bannamikago abayambyeko mu lutalo lw’okutaasa obutonde era nga bano mulimu; Naturing Uganda, Save the Planet n’abalala. Owek. Mayanja agamba nti ku mulundi guno essira balitadde ku kusimba emiti ginnansangwa. Kayima Gabriel Kabonge agambye nti ekyama kyabwe kibadde mu kukolera wamu n’abamyuka be era neyeebaza Beene olw’okusiima n’abawa obuvunaanyizibwa okulabirira essaza lye ery’e Mawokota. Omukolo gwetabiddwako abagenyi ab’enjawulo okubadde; Omulangira Joseph Kintu Wasajja, omumyuka wa Katikkiro asooka Owek. Twaha Kaawaase Kigongo, Omumyuka owookubiri owa Katikkiro Owek. Waggwa Nsibirwa, Omukubiriza w’Olukiiko lwa Buganda, Owek. Patrick Luwagga, Minisita w’amawulire Noah Kiyimba, Minisita Joseph Kawuki. Abalala kuliko; bannabyabufuzi okuli Loodimmeeya Erias Lukwago, Omubaka Muyanja Ssenyonga, Ma awamu n’abakulembeze mu gavumenti ez’ebitundu.

headline: Nnaabagereka Nagginda abaagala obufumbo abasabye okubwetegekera
text: Maama Nnaabagereka Sylvia Nagginda asabye abo bonna abaagala okuyingira obufumbo okuwaayo ebiseera babutegeere era babwetegekere kiyambe ekitiibwa ky’obufumbo okuddawo era n’abaana abakulira mu maka gabwe okubaamu empeke. Bino Nnaabagereka abyogeredde Bulange e Mmengo bw’abadde atongoza enteekateeka y’abakulembeze b’ekibiina ky’abakyala ba ‘Mother’s Union’ mu Buganda ey’okusomesa abafumbo ku ngeri gyebalina okutambuzaamu amaka. “Ffe aba Mother’s Union kitukakatako okulaba nti enteekateeka y’okubuulira abaana abagenda mu bufumbo tugiteekamu amaanyi mangi ddala abaana basobole okutegeera, okwetegereza era n’okweteekerateekera ekyo kyebagendamu,. ” Nnaabagereka Nagginda bw’annyonnyodde. Nnaabagereka agamba nti ensangi zino abaagalana bangi bagenda mu bufumbo nga tebamaze kweteekateeka bulungi nga balowooza nti omukwano gwebalina gumala nebeerabira ensonga enkulu ezitambulirako obufumbo n’amaka. Maama Nnaabagereka Nagginda alaze okutya ku budde obusomesebwamu abafumbo mu kkanisa nagamba nti akadde katono nasaba kongezebweko okusobozesa abeetegekera obufumbo okwefumintiriza era baggumire mwekyo kyebagendamu kiyambe okunyweza ekitiibwa ky’obufumbo. Nnaabagereka Nagginda era simusanyufu olw’amaka agatabanguka buli lukya olw’abazadde ne bannaddiini okulemererwa okubuulirira abaana abalenzi n’abawala nga tebanaba kuyingira bufumbo kyagamba nti kyekivuddeko ekitiibwa ky’obufumbo okufa. Nnaabagereka abakyala abasibiridde entanda bulijjo okwekwata ku ssaala nga baliko okusomoozebwa kwebasanze nasanyukira enkola y’okuzza obuggya okubuulirira abafumbo ababeera bagenda okufumbirigana. Ye Owek. Nankindu agambye nti abakyala bano aba Mother’s Union bakoze emirimu egigasa ensi naddala bwekituuka ku ntambuza y’amaka wakati mu bugumiikiriza obutagambika ekiyambye okutwala eggwanga mu maaso. Minisita Nankindu agasseeko nti obwegendereza n’okwagala ebiri mu bakyala ba Mother’s Union bukoze kinene okunyweza amaka muggwanga nga balambika bannabwe ku ngeri gyebasaanye okukwatamu obufumbo ekitadde ettofaali mu nteekateeka za Buganda ez’enjawulo nga okulwanyisa akawuka ka Mukenenya. Okusinziira ku Minisita Nankindu waliwo Ttabamiruka w’ Abakyala ng’ennaku z’omwezi 13/ 05/2022 nga wakuyindira ku Imperial Royale era Nnaabagereka Sylvia Nagginda yagenda okubeera omugenyi omukulu. Omukolo guno gwatandise nakubuulira okwakulembeddwamu Faith Nakitende Luwalira ng’ono asabye abakyala okusitukiramu bakole buli kisoboka bazze eggwanga ku mulamwa kuba buli kimu kirabika nga kisobye. Nakitende era abasabye okutumbula ennono n’obuwangwa kuba bino bikola kinene okunyweza amaka n’obufumbo ebiyita mukugezesebwa akaseera kano. Akulira ekibiina kya Mother’s Union mu Buganda, Josephine Nakijoba Kasaato agamba nti baliwamu ne Nnaabagereka era bakukola buli kimu okutumbula embeera z’abakyala n’abaana okulaba nga batumbula amaka.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga atongozza eng’oma Ggwangamujje okulwanyisa COVID-19
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayigaatongozzaeng’oma Ggwangamujje egenda okukubwa Abaami ba Kabakamu nteekateeka y’okukunga abantu ba Beene wonna mu Buganda okusitukiramu balwanyise ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona era n’asaba Abaami okukulemberamu olutalo luno. Enteekateeka eno ebadde mu Bulange- Mmengo ku Lwokusatu era Mukuumaddamula asinzidde wano n’asaba abantu okumanya akabi akali mu bulwadde buno obwa Lumiimamawuggwe. “Kambabuulire empologoma eyatulumba ye Lumiimamawuggwe, etusensera, etulya tetulaba era tetutegedde kuba ffenna abali wano tusobola okuba nga tulina obulwadde nga tetumanyi, ayinza okuba mu ngalo, leka kwekwata mu nnyindo, mu maaso, mu mimwa. Akabi kajja tulina okutegeeza ensi nti empologoma ezze naye bwe weerwanako ogiwona naye bwe weekwata ku maaso ekulya.” Kamalabyonna Mayiga agamba nti mu buli mbeera, eggwanga lirina okusoosowaza ebyobulamu era n’asaba Abaami ba Kabaka okukulemberamu olutalo ku Lumiimamawuggwe nga Beene bwe yalagira.
