Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, ekisinga okutta bantu mu bulwadde buno kwe kuba nti obulwadde buno bwetooloddwa obutamanya era abantu n’ebintu ebyandibayambye babyesammula nga balowooza nti birimu akabi. Mayiga asiimye aba Dreamline Products olw’obuyiiya mu kusaasaanya amawulire agakwata ku Sennyiga Corona kuba okuva edda obuyiiya bw’eng’oma omwali Saagalaagalamidde, Ggwangamujje n’endala, zaayambanga nnyo okutumbula embeera z’abantu n’okubakuuma. “Mu Mirembe egyayita abalya ensi baali abo abalina ffeeza ne zzaabu, ekiseera ne kijja ng’abalina amatwale nga Bungereza. Ekiseera ne kituuka nga abalina amafuta be baliwo naye batugamba nti, oyo agenda okulya ensi mu biseera eby’omu maaso y’oyo ategedde ebyempuliziganya era atambula n’okumanya.” Owek. Mayiga bw’alambuludde. Mu ngeri yeemu ku mukolo guno, Obwakabaka buyingidde mu ndagaano n’aba Dreamline Products nga ku lwa Buganda, Owek.Hajji Amisi Kakomo y’ataddeko omukono ate Kenneth Mulondo n’assaako ku lwa Dreamline Products. Minisita omubeeziow’ebyamawulire ne tekinologiya mu gavumenti eyaawakati,Owek.Joyce Nabbosa Ssebuggwawo asinzidde wano n’asaba abasomesa beegemese kisobozese okwanguyizagavumenti okukola enteekateeka z’okuggulawo amasomeroera n’asaba abantu okwekuuma ekirwadde kino. Omukungu wa Dreamline Products,Mw. Kenneth Mulondoategeezezza nti basinzidde ku bukulu bw’eng’oma ne bakkiriza nti esobola okukunga abantu okusobola okulwanyisa Ssenyiga Corona. Mu nteekateeka eno, eng’oma eno yaakukubibwa okukubiriza abantu okukola, okuteeka mu nkola ebiragiro by’abasawo ku kulwanyisa Ssenyiga coronanga mu binokuliko; okunaaba mu ngalo, okwambala obukookolo, okwewa amabanga n’ebirala.

headline: Kkooti ejulirwamu egobye okusaba kwa Ssegiriinya ne Ssewanyana okweyimirirwa, Bannamateeka babwe ensonga bazitutte mu kkooti etaputa Ssemateeka
text: Kkooti ejulirwamu egobye okusaba okwassibwayo ababaka Muhammad Ssegirinya owa Kawempe North ne Allan Ssewanyana owa Makindye West, nga bawakanya ensala yómulamuzi wa kooti enkulu e Masaka, Lawrence Tweyanze, eyagaana okubayimbula ku kakalu ka kkooti. Omulamuzi Tweyanze yali yategeeza nti emisango egibavunaanibwa gya Nnaggomola era nga ababaka bano basobola okubaako engeri gyebataataaganya okunoonyereza okugenda mu maaso ku misango gino singa bayimbulwa. Abalamuzi ba kkooti ejulirwamu nga bakulembeddwamu Cheborion Barishaki bategeezezza nti abasibe bano tebaalina ddembe lya kujulira ku kugaanibwa okweyimirirwa wabula baalina kuddayo mu kkooti eyabama okweyimirirwa nebalaba oba bakkirizibwa so si kugenda mu kkooti ejulirwamu kuba tewali musango gwonna gwali gusaliddwa. Abalamuzi bano basabye oludda oluwaabi okwanguya okunnoonyereza mu musango guno bano basobole okutandika okwewozaako. Munnamateeka wa bano, Samuel Muyizzi ategeezezza nti tebagenda kupondooka okutuusa nga amateeka gateekeddwamu ekitiibwa negakola ekyo kyennyini ekyagateekesaawo kuba abali mu gavumenti bakozesa kkooti okulinyirira Ssemateeka. “Tulabye kkooti nga zikozesa amateeka agakolebwa Palamenti n’amateeka amalala okukugira eddembe ly’obuntu ery’obwebange kyokka nga lino lyamuwendo okwenkana obulamu bw’omuntu bwennyini awamu n’eddembe ly’okuwozesebwa mu bwangu era mu bwenkanya nga Ssemateeka bw’alagira,” Munnamateeka Muyizzi bw’agambye. Muyizzi ategeezezza nti kati bakuddukira mu kkooti etaputa Ssemateeka basobole okutaasa ennyingo 23 ne 28 eziwa abantu eddembe lyabwe kuba kkooti zitandise okuwuliriza bannabyabufuzi. Munnamateeka Muyizzi annyonnyodde nti ensala ya kkooti ejulirwamu gyekoze olwa leero eraze nti kiri mu mateeka era kkooti zikkirizibwa okukuumira abantu mu makomera ebbanga lyeyagala ku biragiro bya gavumenti era nawera nti kino bakukiwakanya era balage kkooti ekituufu. Ono agamba nti kati kkooti erina obuyinza okuggyako abantu eddembe lyabwe okweyimirirwa kyagamba nti si kyekyali ekigendererwa kya abantu ababaga Ssemateeka era nategeeza nti buvunaanyizibwa bwabwe okulaba nti abasibe bano abagenda okuweza omwaka mu nkomyo bafuna eddembe lyabwe eribaweebwa Ssemateeka. Mu ngeri yeemu kkooti ewozesa Bakalintalo e Kololo egaanye okukkiriza okusaba kwabwe okweyimirirwa mu mateeka oluvannyuma lw’okuddamu okukwatibwa nga bayimbuddwa, kkooti eno etegeezezza nti wadde bakwatibwa bubi naye ate mu kkomera baliyo mu mateeka.

headline: NUP: Tetulina kwekalakaasa kwe tutegese nga poliisi bw’egamba
text: Ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) kiwakanyizza ebya poliisi okugambanti baliko okwekalakaasa kwe bategese okuwakanya obukulembeze bwa Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni. Bino byayogeddwa omwogezi w’ekibiina kino, Joel Ssenyonyi mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire olwatudde ku kitebe ky’ekibiina e Kamwokya oluvannyuma lw’omwogezi wa poliisi, Fred Enanga okutegeeza nti baagala kutabangula ggwanga nga bayita mu kwekalakaasa. “Tewali kintu kyonna kye tukola nga kiri wabweru w’amateeka, buli kye tukola kiri mu mateeka, tukiteeka mu lwatu kuba kibeera kiri mu mateeka.” Ssenyonyi bwe yagambye. Okusinziira ku Ssenyonyi, bino babikoze kulaba nga bongerwa ku ssente z’embalirira wadde nga poliisi egamba nti amawulire gano baagafunye okuva mu nsonda zaabwe ezisinga okwesigika. “Ffe endowooza yaffe egamba nti abakulu mu poliisi n’ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda obwavu bubaluma era baliko akasente ke baagala kufuna okuva mu gavumenti naye balina okubaako ensonga gye bawaayo okufunirako ssente zino.” Ssenyonyi bwe yagasseeko. NUP egamba nti baakusigala nga basaba gavumenti eyimbule abawagizi baabwe abakyakuumirwa mu makomera nga n’abamu bakyagenda mu maaso n’okukwatibwa. “Twategedde nti bano babavunaana kulya mu nsi lukwe awamu n’emisango egyekuusa ku butakkaanya bw’ebyobufuzi. Bannamateeka baffe baatandise dda okugoberera ensonga eno.” Ssenyonyi bwe yannyonnyodde. Bano baasabidde bannaabwe abaafiiridde mu butabanguko bw’ebyobufuzi ngakyasembyeyo ye Twaha Kigozi eyafudde oluvannyuma lw’okutomerwa emmotoka. Ssenyonyiagamba nti baakusigala nga bayimiridde wamu ne famire z’abantu bano era basaba Katonda abanyige ebiwundu.

headline: Lwaki Mbidde aleseewo Mao n’awagira Kyagulanyi
text: Masaka Omumyuka wa Democratic Party (DP) mu ggwanga lyonna, Fred Mukasa Mbidde, yalangiridde mu lwattu eggulo ku Mmande nti, waakuwagira Munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu wadde nga ne Ssenkaggale wa DP, Nobert Mao mu lwokaano mw’ali. Omubaka Fred Mukasa Mbidde Mbidde nga mu kaseera kano mubaka wa Uganda mu palamenti ya East Africa, okulangirira kino, yabadde atongoza kampeyini ze, okuvuganya ku bubaka bwa Nyendo -Mukungwe mu kibuga Masaka. Ono agamba nti batudde ne mukama we Nobert Mao n’amukkiriza awangire Kyagulanyi. “Nayogedde ne mukama wange, Nobert Mao ne musaba anzikirize noonyeze Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu akalulu era n’akkiriza.” Mbidde bwe yategeezezza. Wabula abatunuulizi b’ensonga bagamba nti kino kigenda kukosa ekibiina kya DP n’amaanyi gaakyo mu Masaka, kubanga Mbidde ky’ekikonge ekyokubiri okusuulawo Mao ne kigenda okuwagira Kyagulanyi. Eyasooka ye muwanika w’ekibiina era omubaka Mary Babirye Kabanda, naye eyavaayo n’alangirira okuwagira Kyagulanyi ku kifo ky’obwapulezidenti, kuba bannamasaka gwe baagala. Mbidde eyajjidde ku kkaadi ya DP era yategeezezza abawagizi be nti, Mao yamukkiriza okukozesa akabonero ka ‘People Power’ ku bipande bye ng’obukakafu nti ono ajja kunoonyeza Kyagulanyi akalulu. Ono avuganya Omubaka Mathias Mpuuga eyaakasala eddiiro okuva mu DP n’adda mu NUP era nga ye mumyuka wa Pulezidenti w’ekibiina mu Buganda, nga mu kadde kano y’akiikirira ekibuga Masaka. Tekimanyise oba nga Mbidde ne Kabanda banaayaniriza Ssenkaggale Mao ng’atuuse mu Buganda naddala mu Masaka oba era banaasigala ku Kyagulanyi nga bwe beeyamye. Abamu ku bawagizi b’ekibiina kino bagamba nti kino kyandyongera okunafuya ekibiina kino mu Buganda.

headline: Masaza Cup 2022  | Buddu, Ssingo, Buweekula n’abalala bayiseewo  okuzannya ‘Quarter Finals’
text: Nnantameggwa w’empaka z’ekikopo ky’ Amasaza eky’omwaka 2021 erya Buddu, liyiseewo okugenda ku luzannya lwa ‘Quarter Finals’, abalala kuliko Buweekula, Gomba Mawokota, Ssingo, Busiro awamu ne Kyaggwe. Ttiimu zino eziwera omunaana zayiseewo oluvannyuma lw’okumala ennaku 10 namba nga zizannya mu bibinja n’ebisaawe eby’enjawulo. Ekibinja Bulange Mu kibinja kya Bulange; Buweekula yekikulembedde n’obubonero 22 oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula Butambala ggoolo 2-1. Butambala ye yasoose okuteeba ggoolo yaayo ng’eyita mu Hassan Mubiru era wano omutendesi wa Buwekula Frank Mulindwa, yaleese Shaifik Kakande okukyuusa omuzannyo. Sharafah Mukiibi yasobodde okuteeba ggoolo 2 Buwekula newangula. Ate ku kisaawe kya Kabulasoke PTC Core, aba Gomba bawangudde Kabula ggoolo 2-0 nebafuna obubonero 21 olwo nebayitawo nga bakutte kyakubiri emabega wa Buweekula. Sam Lukoye yeyateebedde Gomba Lions etendekebwa Emuron Recoba. Mu kikopo kino Kooki yawanguddwa Mawokota ggoolo 2-0. Zino zaateebeddwa Abubaker Mayanja ne Stuart Kezaala. Ekibinja Muganzirwazza  Muno mwavuddemu Busiro, Bulemeezi ne Kyaggwe okusobola okugenda ku luzannya oluddako. Busiro yasoose kuwangula Bulemeezi ggoolo 1-0 mu mupiira ogwayindidde ku kisaawe e Ssentema. Ate yo Bugerere yawanguddwa Kyaggwe 1-0 mu mupiira ogwayindidde e Luweero nga Anthony Male yeyateebedde Kyaggwe. Wabula omupiira wakati wa Busujju ne Ssese tegwazanyiddwa oluvannyuma lwa Busujju obutalabikako. Ekibinja Masengere Mu kibinja kino , Mawogola eyabadde ewaka yakubiddwa ggoolo 0-3 bannantameggwa b’ekikopo kino aba Buddu. Abateebedde Buddu kuliko Bruno Bunyaga, Ibrahim Kirya me Reagan Kirumira. Kyaddondo yalemeddwa okugenda ku mutendera oguddako oluvannyuma lw’okukubwa Ssingo ggoolo 2-1. Abateebedde Ssingo kuliko Amuli Mukasa ne Godfrey Ssemanda. E Nakasongola , Buluuli ne Buvuma bagudde maliri ggoolo 1-1. Obululu bw’ omutendera oguddako ogwa ‘Quarter Finals’ bugenda kukwatibwa nga September 7, 2022 e Bulange Mmengo.

headline: Poliisi eyagala kuziikula Frank Ssenteza, erumiriza  aba Bobi Wine okulemesa okukebera omulambo
text: Kampala Poliisi ya Uganda egenze mu kkooti okutandika ku kaweefube w’okufuna olukkusa okuziikula omulambo gwa Frank Kalibbala Ssenteza abadde omukuumi w’alina bbendera ya National Unity Platform (NUP) ku bwapulezidenti, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine). Omugenzi Frank Kalibbala Ssenteza nga bwabadde afaanana Ssenteza yafiiridde mu kabenje e Busega olunaku lw’eggulo wabula ng’aba NUP nga bakulembeddwamu Bobi Wine balumiriza emmotoka y’amagye okumukoona wadde nga poliisi egamba nti ono yagudde wansi bwe yabadde abuuka ku mmotoka kwe yabadde okudda ku ndala ng’etambula. Olwaleero ku Mmande Ssenteza aziikiddwa e Masaka wakati mu miranga n’ebiwoobe wabula kati poliisi eyagala kuziikulayo mulambo gwe singa kkooti ebawa olukkusa. Mu kiwandiiko ky’efulumizza, poliisi etegeezezza nti bannakibiina kya NUP baalemesezza abasawo baayo okwekebejja omulambo okufuna ekituufu. “Nga ekitundu ku kunoonyereza ku nfa ya Frank Ssenteza abadde omukuumi wa Robert Kyagulanyi, ttiimu yaffe esanze okusoomoozebwa oluvannyuma lw’omulambo gwa Ssenteza okuziikibwa ku luguudo lwe Villa nga poliisi teyeekebezze mulambo,” Ekiwandiiko ekivudde mu poliisi bwe kisomye. “Eggulo nga 27/12/2020, eddwaliro lye Lubaga lyawaddewo alipoota ekwata ku nfa y’omugenzi eri abooluganda ne bannakibiina kya NUP okubitwala e Mulago, basobole okuzuula ekyamusse. Ebyembi bano baagenze bugenzi ku kitebe kyabwe e Kamwokya we baakumye olumbe oluvannyuma omulambo ne gutwalibwa ku butaka okuziikibwa.” Ekiwandiiko bwe kiraze. “Twayogerezeganyizza n’abenganda okuli Maj.Gen Elly Kayanja ne batuwa olukkusa okukebera omulambo e Masaka. Abakugu baffe ne balinnya ennyonyi okusobola okutuuka e Masaka mu budde beekebejje omulambo n’abasawo bafamire okuzuula ekituufu ekyamusse wamu n’ebisago bye yafunye,” Poliisi bw’erumiriza. Poliisi egamba nti wadde famire y’omugenzi yabadde ekkiriza, bannakibiina kya NUP baagaanye ne babalemesa okukebera omulambo era ne bagenda mu maaso n’okuguziika. Bano bagamba nti enneeyisa y’abawagizi ba NUP yabadde mbi era nga olw’ensonga batandise kaweefube w’okufuna ekiragiro kya kkooti ebakkirize okuziikula omugenzi bazuule ekituufu ekyamusse. Poliisi egamba nti wano abakugu baayo bajja kuba bafunye omukisa okumaliriza okunoonyereza kwe/baliko mu nsonga eno .

headline: Bobi Wine aggyeeyo omusango mu kkooti ensukkulumu
text: Kamwokya Akulira ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Mr Robert Kyagulanyi aka Bobi Wine, awadde bannamateeka be ekiragiro okuggyayo omusango mu kkooti ensukkulumu gwe yali awaabye ng’awakanya obuwanguzi bwa pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni mu kalulu akaakubwa nga January 14, 2021. Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu “ Tuggyeeyo omusango mu kkooti naye ate tetugenda kukozesa bikolwa byaffujjo. Tusazeewo okuggyayo omusango mu kkooti ya Mw. Owiny Dollo.” Bw’atyo Kyagulanyi bw’ategezeezezza bannamawulire bakung’aanidde ku kitebe ky’ekibiina e Kamwokya. Kino kiddiridde abawawaabirwa okuli; Pulezidenti Yoweri Musevenim akakiiko k’ebyokulonda wamu ne Ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti, okuteekayo okwewozaako kwabwe mu bujulizi obuwerera ddala 185 okwanukula ensonga 53 Kyagulanyi ze yali asinziddeko okuwakanya obuwanguzi bwa Museveni. Bannamateeka ba National Resistance Movement (NRM) baavuddeyo ne balabula Kyagulanyi obutaggyayo musango nga bwanaakikola ajja kubaliyirira ssente eziwerera ddala. Akulira eby’amateeka mu NRM, Oscar Kihika, yagambye nti bajja kusaba Kyagulanyi okusasula ssente zonna ezisaasaanyiziddwa mu musango wamu n’obudde bwabwe. “Kansuubire bannamateeka ba Kyagulanyi banaawa omuntu waabwe amagezi obutaggyayo musango. Kuba waliwo ebintu ebirina okukigoberera. Bwe biba nga bye yayogedde abitegeeza, alina okukimanya nti si kintu kyangu.” Bw’atyo Kihika bwe yagambye. Kihika yannyonnyodde nti singa aggyayo omusango alina okukimanya nti alina okuliyirira bannamateeka baffe olw’obudde n’okubamalira ebiseera. Kino kizzeewo oluvannyuma lwa Ssaabalamuzi n’abalamuzi abalala babiri okugaana okuva mu musango guno nga Kyagulanyi bwe yali asabye. Munnamateeka wa Kyagulanyi, Anthony Wameli, akakasizza nga Kyagulanyi bw’ali omwetegefu okusasula singa omusango anaaba aguggyeeyo. Wabula ye Kyagulanyi ategeezezza bannamawulire nti mwetegefu n’okusinga aba NRM kye balowooza kuba baasasula dda ekisingako ng’okuva akalulu lwe kaatandika, abantu be bazze battibwa era teri muwendo guyinza kusinga bulamu bw’abantu.

headline: Kamalabyona Mayiga asabye abakulembeze okutambulira ku mateeka
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga, asabyeabakulembeze bulijjo okugoberera enfuga y’amateeka bw’eba baagala abantu okubeesiga era kiyambe n’ensi okukulaakulana. Bino Kamalabyonna Mayiga abyogeredde mu nsisinkano gy’abaddemu n’omubaka wa Pulezidenti mu Kampala, Hudu Hussein awamu n’abamyuka be mu divizoni y’e Lubaga, Makindye ne Kawempe ku Lwokusatu mu Bulange e Mmengo. Owek. Mayiga abasabye babeere benkanya eri abantu bonna be bakoleramu awatali kusosola mu ddiini, mawanga oba ekibiina ky’ebyobufuzikubanga ebyobufuzi byanguwa nnyo okutabangula abantu. Abakulu bano, Katikkiro Mayiga abasabye okusitula obukugu bw’abasirikale batandike emirimu okugikola mu bukugu, kiyambe okutereeza enkolagana yaabwe n’abantu kuba bano be bakolereramu ebbanga lyonna era kino kyakuyamba okunyweza obutebekevu mu ggwanga. Ono era alaze ng’Obwakabaka bwe bwetegese okukola enteekateeka etwaliramu abavubuka abali ku nguudo bafunirwe eky’okukola, baleme kufuuka bamutawaana olw’okubulwa kye bakola kuba kizuuliddwa nga bano basinga mu bitundu bya Buganda. Mu kwogera kwe,RCC wa Kampala, Hudu Hussein asabye Obwakabaka okubaako enteekateeka z’enkulaakulana okukumaakuma abavubuka naddala abo abatalina mirimu kiyambeko okukendeeza ku bikolwa by’obumenyi bw’amateeka. Ate ye RCC wa Lubaga, AndersonBulola ategeezezza nti nga gavumenti yaawakati beetefuteefu okukulaganira wamu n’Obwakabaka mu buli nteekateeka era wano asabye abakulembeze mu gavumenti ya Beene okukolaganira wamu nabo okulaba nga Buganda edda ku ntikko n’eggwanga okutwaliza awamu. Abakulembezeabalala abakiise embuga beebazizza Obwakabaka olw’enteekateeka ze buteekawo okutumbula embeera z’abantu okuli ebyobulamu ebyenjigiriza n’ebintu ebirala. Ensisinkano yeetabiddwamu Ssaabawolereza w’Obwakabaka, Owek. Christopher Bwanika.

headline: Akakiiko akategeka emipiira gy’Amasaza katandise okulambula ebisaawe
text: Olukiiko oluddukanya eza Masaza ga Buganda, enkya ya leero lutandiise okulambula ebisaawe, ebigenda okweyambisibwa sizoni eno, nga lutandikidde mu kisaawe kya Masaka Recreation Ground e Buddu. Abakulu nga bakulembeddwamu, Ssentebe Sulaiman Ssejjengo, bagamba nti kino kikoleddwa okusobola okukuuma omutindo gw’empaka zino era mukulambula kuno lubadde wamu n’abakulira eby’okwerinda mu Buganda n’ebitongole ebikwatibwako okuli Majestic Brands. “Enkya ya leero tutandise okulambula ebisaawe era tutandikidde Buddu ewagenda okuggulibwawo empaka era tujja kulambula ebisaawe 18 era tusuubira okusanga ebisaawe ebiteeketeeke obulungi nga bijja mu mutindo gw’empaka zino,” Omuk. Sulaiman Ssejjengo bw’agambye. Ono annyonnyodde nti basuubira okusanga ebisaawe bino nga birina webigenda okutuuza abawagizi mu mitendera egy’enjawulo era baagala okulaba ng’ebyokwerinda ku bisaawe bino nabyo biteereddwako omulaka okusobola okuzannya emipiira gino mu mirembe.  Bano era bakulambula abazannyi b’Amasaza webasuzibwa okusobola okulaba nti wakwatagana n’embeera erwanyisa ekirwadde ki COVID-19 era buli kisaawe kisuubirwa okubaako ekifo abazze okulaba omupiira webayinza okukyamira. Okusinziira ku Mukungu Ssejjengo emipiira egigenda okuzannyirwa ku buli kisaawe gyeyongeddeko nga kati balina okulaba nga ttiimu ez’enjawulo zirina ebisaawe ebisobola okumaakuma abawagizi awamu n’abazannyi. Ekikopo ky’omwaka guno kisuubirwa okuggulwawo nga 25 omwezi ogwa June 2022 ku kisaawe kya Masaka Recreational Grounds era nga Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II yasuubirwa okuziggulawo.

headline: Bannabuddu baweze okulwanyisa Mukenenya
text: Buddu Abantu ba Kabaka mu ssaza ly’e Buddu baweze okukola buli kisoboka basobole okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya mu kitundu kyabwe. Bano kino baakikoze wakati ng’Obuganda bwetegekera amazaalibwa ga Kabaka age 66 nga 13/4/2021, era wano abavubuka baasomeseddwa ku kirwadde kino ku byoto ebyenjawulo abyakumiddwa okwetoloola amagombolola 29 agakola essaza Buddu. Abakugu ab’enjawulo baasomeseddwa ensonga eziviirako okusaasaana kw’ekirwadde kya Siriimu nga beesigama ku mulamwa gw’okulwanyisa Siriimu ng’abasajja be basaale. Mu Mutuba 6 Katwe -Buddu, olunaku lw’eggulo nga 10/4/2021 bakojja ne bassenga nga bakulembeddwamu Walukagga Joseph  Ssaabawaali Mutuba 6, baasomesezza ku nsonga nnyingi omuli abantu obutabeera bagunjufu nga bwe kittattanye empisa mu bantu naddala abasomyeko. Abamu ku bavubuka abeetabye ku kyoto kino baakubaganyizza ebirowoozo ku ngeri abazadde we balina okukwatamu abaana naddala ku nkozesa y’essimu, baleme kwonooneka, nga bwekiba tekikoleddwa abaana bayingira mu bikolwa ebiviirako bo okusaasaana kwa Ssiriimu. Ye eyakiikiridde Ppookino Jude Muleke nga ye Ssempira Levicatus atwala ebyenjigiriza mu Buddu, yakuutidde abakyali abato okwekuuma ate abakuze okuba abeesigwa oba okukozesa obupiira basobole okwewala Mukenenya. Yo mu Mutuba 10 e Kyamuliibwa-Kalungu, abantu bangi abaasomesezza omuli n’abasawo okuva mu Medical Research Centre (MRC) wabula ng’eno abavubuka abalenzi tebajjumbidde.  Omumyuka wa Ppookino II, Painento Yiga, yasinzidde eno n’asaba abazadde obutapeeka baana kufumbirwa nakuwasa nga bamaze okusoma ate nga mu nnono za Buganda, abazadde be bayina okulabira abaana, bannaabwe. Era ng’abazadde bwe batayambako baana mu nsonga zino, abaana bajja kutomera.

headline: Museveni: Eyatandise okwekalaasa ajja tubendegera
text: Kampala Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni alabudde abantu abeekalakaasa nga bawakanya okukwatibwa kw’Omubaka era eyeesimbyewo ku kkaadi y’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi ssentamu (Bobi Wine), nti tebagenda kubaganya.  Kino kiddiridde Poliisi okukwata n’eggalira Kyagulanyi e Nalufenya mu Jinja ku bigambibwa nti yamenye ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona. Oluvannyuma lw’amawulire okuwulira nti yabadde akwatiddwa abantu mu bitundu by’eggwanga ebyenjawulo naddala mu bibuga batandise okwekalakaasa era okukkakkana ng’abantu abawera 7 we butuukidde olwaleero nga bafiiridde mu buvuyo buno, obuyingidde olunaku olwokubiri. Bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannakibiina kye ekya National Resistance Movement (NRM) mu Kotido olwaleero, Museveni agambye nti gavumenti ye tegenda kukkiriza beekalakaasa mu ngeri y’ekiyaaye n’ategeeza nti bajja kukolwako. “Batandise okutulwanyisa naye ate okulwana tukumanyi bulungi. Oyo yenna eyatandise kino agenda kukyejjusa. Obumu ku bubinja buno bukozesebwa abagwira abatayagala mirembe giri mu Uganda naye bajja kufuna kye banoonya.” Museveni abadde tasalikako musale bw’agambye. Museveni annyonnyodde nti waliwo abalabiddwako nga batulugunya abantu ababadde mu langi za NRM naye mu bwangu bagenda kukimanya nti bannakibiina kino tebazanyirwako. Ono agamba nti ebiragiro byateekebwawo okusobola okutaasa abantu ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona era n’ategeeza nti kibeera kya busiru abamu ku bannayuganda okubiziimuula. Obukambwe obuli mu bigambo bya Pulezidenti era nga ye muduumizi w’ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda eby’oku ntikko, bulaga nti gavumenti yaakukola buli kimu okulaba ng’ezza embeera mu nteeko. Bino we bijjidde ng’abamu ku bannakibiina kya NUP abaakwatiddwa awamu ne Kyagulanyi, baamaze dda okusimbibwa mu kkooti e Iganga okuwerennemba n’emisango egibagguddwako.

headline: Bannayuganda basabiddwa okwettanira okugaba omusaayi
text: Bannayuganda basabiddwa okwettanira enteekateeka zonna ezigendereddwamu okukung’aanya omusaayi kisobozese okutaasa obulamu bwabo abagwetaaga. Okusaba kuno kukoleddwa Ssenkulu wa Kabaka Foundation Omuk. Eddie Kaggwa Ndaggala e Ssentema Busiro bw’abadde n’ab’ekitongole kya Redcross ne Uganda Blood Transfusion Services mu kubangula abaami ba Kabaka ku nteekateeka y’okugaba omusaayi mu ssaza lino. Omuk. Ndaggala agamba nti nga omukulembeze Kabaka gweyakwasa obuvunanyizibwa ku kujjanjaba n’okulondoola obulamu bw’ abantube afunye okutya nti singa bannayuganda naddala mu Buganda tebavaayo kuwaayo musaayi omuwendo gw’abantu abafa olw’omusaayi gwandyeyonera bwatyo nabasaba okujJumbira enteekateeka y’okuwaayo omusaayi. Omuk. Ndagala annyonnyodde nti omuwendo gw’abantu abagaba omusaayi bakenderedde ddala ekyongedde omuwendo gw’abantu abafa olw’ebbula ly’omusaayi. Ono asinzidde wano nayanjulira abantu b’Omutanda enteekateeka ya Beene egendereddwamu okutumbula eby’obulamu nga muno mulimu okuzimbira abantu b’omumugotteko amalwaliro n’amasomero kiyambe okutumbula embeera zaabwe. Omukungu okuva mu Redcross, Esther Namayanja alambuliridde abaami ba Kabaka ebisaanyizo by’omuntu alina omugaba omusaayi era nebyo byalina okugoberera. Omumyuka wa Ssebwana Vincent Kayongo yeeyamye okukunga abantu ba Kabaka mu kitundu kino bajjumbire enteekateeka eno basobole okutaasa obulamu. Ate omukungu w’ekitongole kya Uganda Blood Transfusion Services Sam Wante yeebazizza Obwakabaka olw’okufaayo ennyo okutumbula eby’obulamu nga bayita mu nteekateeka ez’enjawulo. Enteekateeka yo’kukunganya omusaayi egenda kubuna amasaza gonna agakola Obwakabaka bwa Buganda nga yakutandikira mu ssaza Buddu nga ennaku z’omweezi 6 omwezi ogujja omwaka guno nga eno egenda kumalirayo ddala sabiiti namba.

headline: Omuntu bw’alwa mu buyinza aba takyalaba bikyamu – Owek. Mugumbule
text: Omukubiriza w’Olukiiko lwa Buganda, Owek. Patrick Luwaga Mugumbule, ategeezezza nti ekimu ku bintu ebivuddeko ebikolwa by’okuwamba abantu, okubatulugunya n’okulinnyirira eddembe ly’abantu, be bakulembeze abalemera mu buyinza ne batayagala kuwaayo. Owek. Patrick Luwaga Mugumbule “Janan ekyamuttisa kuba Amin yayagala okulemera mu bukulembeze, kwe kugamba gye weeyongera, ebibi bingi bibeerawo, abalala ne babisongako ate nga ggwe tokyabiraba. Ggwe bw’oba tokyalaba kibi ekyo vvaawo omulala addewo kuba kitegeeza nti oluddewo.” Omukubiriza Mugumbule bw’annyonnyodde. Okuwabula bino, Owek. Mugumbule akuwadde asinziira ku mukutu gwa BBS Terefayina bw’abadde alambika ku buvunaanyizibwa n’obukulu bw’Olukiiko lwa Buganda wamu n’obulamu bwa Janan Luwum ku makya ga leero. Ono awadde eky’okulabirako ky’eggwanga lya Kenya nga bano olwatereeza ekizibu ky’okukyusa obukulembeze, basobodde okutandika okukulaakulana. Owek. Mugumbule agamba nti ensonga eno terina kukoma kuwandiikibwa mu Ssemateeka nga bwekiri e Uganda naye alina okugobererwa wamu n’okussibwamu ekitiibwa okukendeeza ku bizibu ebiri mu ggwanga. “Singa wabaawo omukulembeze ajja n’agamba nti emyaka giigino etaano bwe ginaawera nze nga nvaawo omulala ng’addawo, tewali nsonga lwaki abalala bandiyaayaanye okuggyako omukulembeze aliko.” Owek. Mugumbule bw’alabudde. Owek. Luwaga agambye wadde entebe ewooma ng’eyali Pulezidenti Godfrey Binaisa bwe yagamba, naye entebe y’emu esobola okutung’ununa singa omuntu agiremerako. “Singa omukulembeze abeera ow’enjawulo n’ajja mu nsi yattu Uganda, yandibadde atereeza ensonga y’okukyusa obukulembeze. Obuzibu obuli mu Uganda tewali bulala singa wabaawo omukulembeze azze n’agamba nti emyaka giigino ettaano bwe ginaawera nga nvaawo, tewandibadde bamusindiikiriza.Owek. Mugambule bw’akkaatirizza Owek. Mugumbule agamba nti obuzibu bw’ebiriwo buva kukulemererwa kukyusa bukulembeze okuva ku mukulembeze omu okudda ku mulala Ono alambuludde ku buvunaanyizibwa kw’Omukubiriza w’Olukiiko okuviira ddala ku mulembe gwa Kabaka Kintu era nga gwesigamiziddwa ku nnono wamu n’enkulaakulana era ebisalibwawo byonna mu nsi Buganda okuva edda bitambulira ku lukiiko luno. Okusinziira ku Owek. Mugumbule agamba nti olukiiko lwa Buganda terulina ludda luwakanya era obuvunaanyizibwa bw’Omukubiriza w’Olukiiko kwe kulambika ku nteesa y’abakiise ab’enjawulo ku nsonga enkulu era balina amateeka amawandiike agagobererwa era lulina obukiiko obw’enjawulo obumulungula ensonga. Ono agasseeko nti oluvannyuma lw’okuteesa, ebirowoozo byonna biweerezebwa ewa Ssaabasajja Kabaka n’ayongera okulung’amya ku nsonga ez’enjawulo.

headline: Eby’okuwamba abantu mubiggyeemu eby’obufuzi, mubayimbule – Kkangaawo Mulondo
text: Bya Ssemakula Bulemeezi Omwami wa Ssaabasajja Kabaka atwala essaza Bulemeezi, Kkangaawo Ronald Mulondo, asabye gavumenti okuggya eby’obufuzi mu nsonga z’abantu abawambibwa wasobole okubaawo obwenkanya eri abantu bano. Abamu ku bakulembeze abeetabye mu nsisinkano eno Kkangaawo Mulondo ayagala abakwate basimbibwe mu kkooti eziragirwa mu mateeka mu kifo ky’okubakuumira mu bifo ebitamanyiddwa ekirinnyirira eddembe lyabwe. “Tetuwakanya muntu mumenyi w’amateeka kukwatibwa naye tugamba nti omuntu bwakwatibwa ng’alina etteeka ly’amenya, atwalibwe avunaanibwe mu kifo ekimanyiddwa obulungi era aweebwe ekibonerezo ng’amateeka bwegalagira.” Kkangaawo Mulondo bwe yasabye. Kkangaawo yagasseeko nti akadde katuuse bakolere wamu nga bannabulemeezi era babeeko ekintu eky’enkizo kye bamanyibwako, okusobola okutwala essaza lino mu maaso. Kkangaawo Ronald Mulondo Okusinziira ku Kkangaawo Mulondo, mu nsisinkano eno bakubaganyizza ebirowoozo ku by’obulamu, ebyenjigiriza n’ensonga endala zonna n’ekigendererwa ky’okukyusa embeera z’abantu ba Kabaka mu kitundu kino. Ono yabasabye okwegattira awamu awatali kusososola mu nzikiriza za byabufuzi, basobole okukyusa ekitundu kyabwe era bakkaatirize eddoboozi eryawamu. Bo abeetabye mu nsisinkano eno okuli; Omubaka Ssekabira Dennis owa Katikamu North n’owa Katikamu South Hassan Kirumira, bagambye nti ebikolobero bingi ebigenda maaso mu ggwanga nga byonna byetaaga okulwanyisibwa awatali kubiyingizaamu byabufuzi. Ate ye omubaka omulonde owa Nakaseke Central, Allan Mayanja Ssebunnya, yategeezezza nti ekiseera kino kyakusitula abantu b’e Bulemeezi abasembayo wansi awatali kusosola. Abakulembeze bano era baasiimye Kkangaawo olw’ensisinkano eno bwebatyo ne beeyama okutwala Bulemeezi ku ntikko.

headline: Mmeeya Namayanja alonze omumyuka we nebagenda okukola nabo
text: Mmeeya omulonde owa Masaka City, Florence Namayanja alonze omumyuka we wamu n’olukiiko lwagenda okutambuza nalwo emirimu okusobola okutumbula eby’enkulaakulana mu Masaka. Olukiiko luno alulondedde mu lutuula lwa kkanso olusoose olutudde ku Maria Flo Hotel mu Masaka era wano alaze nga bwebatandise edda okusomoozebwa olw’obutabeera nakitebe webalina kukolera mirimu wabula n’agumya bannamasaka nti bajja kubaweereza mu mbeera yonna. Mmeeya Namayanja alonze akakiiko k’abantu bataano bagenda okukola nabo emirimu n’omumyuka we era nebeyama obutajuza bannamasaka. Ku balondeddwa kuliko; Kkansala Achilles Mawanda owa NUP akikirira Mukungwe yeyalondeddwa Namayanja ku ky’omumyuka wa Mmeeya, Nansubuga Rossette owa NRM akikirira abavubuka yeyalondeddwa ku kifo ky’ ekikula ky’abantu, Tom Luyombya owa NUP akikirira Nyendo yeyalondeddwa ku kifo ky’ebyensimbi ate Nabukenya Jane Francis owa NUP akikirira Kabonera yeyalondeddwa kuky’okukulira eby’enkulakulana Mmeeya Namayanja ategeezezza nti ekifo ky’akulira akakiiko akalina okulondoola eby’emirimu mu kibuga asoose ku gyesigaliza nga bwalondoola empeereza y’olukiiko luno lwalonze. Namayanja ategezezezza nti mu kiseera kino tebalina webakolera mirimu kuba kkanso webadde etuula wakayanirwa omuntu omu agamba nti yagulawo. “Nasanga mmeeya bamugobye mu woofiisi era ekiwandiko nkirina era nti ekizimbe tulina okukivaamu nesaagala kugenda kunsika ngoye nga nwana byesitegera. Mukiseera kino nkolera waka era njagala city elowooze ku kuzimba ekitebe wabula nsoose okusaba ttawuni Kkiraaka anoonye ekifo eky’enkalakkalirira kyetusobola okupangisa,” Mmeeya Namayanja bw’agambye. Kkansala Mawanda kulwa banne asabye abalondeddwa okukola ennyo baweereze bannamasaka era bakwatagane ne mmeeya okusobola okutuusa Masaka ku ntikko.

headline: KCCA esattuludde obukulembeze bw’obutale
text: Kampala Minisita wa Kampala n’emiriraano, asazizzaamu obukulembeze bw’obutale ne Lufula bwonna mu kibuga Kampala obuli wansi w’ekitongole kya Kampala Capital City Authority (KCCA). Minisita Amongi nga ayogerako eri bannamawulire Ekiragiro kino kiweereddwa Minisita wa Kampala, Betty Amongi, leero ku Mmande, bw’abadde ayogerako ne bannamawulire. Okusinziira ku Minisita Amongi kino bakikoze okuteeka mu nkola ekiragiro kya Pulezidenti Museveni kye yafulumya nga 25/09/2020, mwe yalagira obukulembeze bw’obutale bwonna okusuulibwa ku bigambibwa nti buno bwali bubba abasuubuzi. Yalagira era wategekebwewo okulonda okuggya mu butale bwonna obwa gavumenti obuli mu Kampala. Minisita Amongi agambye nti kino kyaddirira abasuubuzi abakolera mu butale ne Lufula okwekubira enduulu ewa Pulezidenti nga bagamba nti ensimbi ezaali zibasoloozebwako zaali nnyingi, ekintu ekibafiiriza n’okubaleetera okukolera mu mabanja kuba basasula amasannyalaze, eza kaabuyonjo wamu n’ensimbi endala. “Obukulembeze bw’ebibiina ebyenjawulo bwawamba obukulembeze bw’obutale nebutandika okunyigiriza abasuubuzi ate ng’obutale buno bwaweebwa abasuubuzi bonna mu butale buno.” Minisita Amongi bw’ategeezezza. Obukulembeze bw’abasuubuzi obukadde bugambibwa okunyunyunta abasuubuzi wamu n’okulemwa okutegeka okulonda okw’amazima. Minisita Amongi agasseeko nti bataddewo akakiiko akataba minisitule ez’enjawulo okuli; Minisitule y’ebyobusuubuzi, Minisitule ya Kampala, ne Minisitule ya gavumenti ez’ebitundu, okulaba nga balung’amya obukulembeze bw’obutale. Mu kiragiro ekipya, KCCA yeddiza obukulembeze bw’obutale era ng’egenda kuteekayo ttiimu ezigenda okuddukanya obutale buno. Ttiimu zino zigenda kubeera n’enkalala z’abasuubuzi bonna abakolera mu butale ne Lufula era basasule ensimbi z’amazzi n’amasannyalaze awamu ne Kasasiro abasuubuzi, basobole okweyagalira mu butale bwabwe. Bano era baweereddwa omulimu okukung’aanya ssente ezaateekebwawo mu mateeka abasuubuzi ze bateekeddwa okusasula.

headline: Basabye Palamenti erowooze ku nsimbi eziteekebwa mu by’obulamu
text: Abantu ab’enjawulo abeetabye mu nteekateeka y’okugaba omusaayi eyindira mu ssaza lye Bulemeezi mu ggombolola ye Butuntumula, Mumyukansege, Katikamu n’awalala basabye ababaka mu lukiiko lw’eggwanga olukulu okufaayo ku nsimbi eziteekebwa mu by’obulamu okusobola okubitereeza. Bano nga bakulembeddwamu Ssenkulu wa Kabaka Foundation, Omuk. Eddie Kaggwa Ndagala bategeezezza nti ensimbi eziyisibwa mu mbalirira y’eggwanga zikyali ntono era tezirina kyamanyi kyezisobola kukola kutereeza byabulamu.  “Bajeti bwetuuka nebagamba nti Minisitule y’ebyobulamu bagisaze ssente, ey’ebyenjigiriza bagisaze, ey’ebyobulamu n’ebyobulimi bagisaze, wabula ey’ebyokwerinda bagyongedde ssente n’enguudo zetutalaba zikolebwa. Obukuumi tubwetaaga naye onakuuma otya abantu abatali balamu,” Omuk. Ndagala bwe yategeezezza Eyakuliddemu okugaba omusaayi e Bulemeezi, Msgr Francis Xavier Mpanga akuuma entebe y’ ow’essaza lya Ekleziya erya Kasana Luweero yeebazizza Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi olw’okulengera ewala natandika enteekateeka eno okusobola okutaasa abantu be. Enteekateeka eno, yajjumbiddwa ababaka ab’enjawulo okuli omukyala ow’ekitundu kino Brenda Nabukenya, owa Katikamu North Dennis Ssekabira nowa Bamunaanika Robert Ssekitoleko.  Bano bategeezezza nti bagenda nti bakukunga bannabwe okulaba nti ensimbi eziteekebwa mu by’obulamu zongerwako. Omwami wa Kabaka atwala e Ssaza Bulemeezi Kkangaawo Omulangira Ronald Mulondo yasinzidde wano nasaba Bannabulemeezi okuvaayo mu bungi bawagira enteekateeka eno bateekewo okuvuganya okwamanyi okusobola okunywa mu mu masaza amalala akendo. Omukungu okuva mu kitongole kya Uganda Blood Transfusion Services, Samuel Wante ne Sarah Mutegombwa owa Red Cross baweze okutwala enteekateeka eno mu maaso. Enteekateeka eno yakayindira mu masaza 5 okuli; Buddu, Busiro, Singo, Kyaddondo ne Kyaggwe nga yakutambula okutuuka ku Lwokutaano lwa sabiiti eno nga 25 April.

headline: Ssaabalabirizi omulonde asisinkanye Katikkiro wa Buganda
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda nga ali wamu ne Ssaabalabirizi omulonde ow’Ekkanisa ya Uganda Rt. Rev.Dr. Stephen Kazimba Mugalu ku Bulange.  Ssaabalabirizi w’ekkanisa ya Uganda omulonde, Rt. Rev.Dr. Stephen Kazimba Mugalu asisinkanye Katikkiro wamu ne Kabineeti ya Ssaabasajja Kabaka ku Bulange.Ensonga y’ensisinkano eno kwekukomawo ku butaka okulaba nga anyweza enkolagana y’Ekkanisa n’obwakabaka mu buvunaanyizibwa bwe obuggya obwamukwasiddwa nga Ssaabalabirizi wa Kanisa ya Uganda.Ssaabalabirizi Kazimba agamba abadde ateekwa okudda embuga kubanga enjiri gyebasomesa abantu yatandikira ku Ssekabaka Muteesa 1 bweyateeka omukono ku bbaluwaeyakkiriza abaminsane okujja okubuulira enjiri yaabwe. Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga munsisinkano eno yebaziza nnyo Ssaabalabirizi olw’obuteerabira nsibuko ye era nagamba nti kisanyusa era kiwa essuubi okulaba nga eddiini n’obwakabaka gyebikoma okutambulira awamu gyebijja okukoma okudda ku ntiko.Katikkiro agasseeko nti Ssaabalabirizi Kazimba ye mukuristo atuukiridde kuba nga alina okwagala eri abantu, ayagala Ekika kye ekye Mpindi, era yenyingira mu nteekateeka z’obwakabaka. Ensisinkano eno yetabiddwamu ba minisita ba Kabaka okuli Omumyuka wa Katikkiro ow’okubiri era Minisita w’ebyensimbi Owek Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa, Omukubiriza w’olukiiko lwa Buganda Owek Patrick Luwagga Mugumbule, Minisita w’amawulire, Lukiiko, Kabineeti,Abagenyi Era Omwogezi w’obwakabaka Owek Noah Kiyimba, Minisita w’abavubuka emizannyo n’okwewummuzaamu Owek Henry Sekabembe Kiberu, Minisita omubeezi ow’ebyobulimi n’obwegassi Owek Hajji Amis Kakomo Ssaabalabirizi awerekeddwako, Omuwandiisi wobulabirizi Rev. Canon Rocky James Ssendegeya, Omukubiriza wabakuristaayo mu bulabirizi Norah Mbabazi, n’omukungu John Fred Kiyimba Freeman.  kinajjukirwa nti nga 28th August 2019, Rt. Rev.Dr. Stephen Kazimba Mugalu yalondebwa ku bwa Ssaabalabirizi w’Ekanisa ya Uganda ow’omwenda (9) era nga agenda kuddira Ssaabalabirizi Stanley Ntagali mu bigere. Rt. Rev.Dr. Stephen Kazimba Mugalu abadde Bishop owa Mityana Diocese era asuubirwa okutuuzibwa nga Ssaabalabirizi omujjuvu nga 1st March 2020.

headline: Museveni alagidde  Kadaga ne Oulanyah bayimirize kkampeyini z’Obwasipiika
text: Kampala Ssentebe w’ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM), Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, alagidde bannakibiina abavuganya ku kifo ky’Obwasipiika bwa Palamenti okuyimiriza kkampeyini zaabwe kuba zitaatagana ekifaananyi ky’ekibiina.  Sipiika Kadaga n’Omumyuka we Jacob Oulanyah Pulezidenti Museveni ekiragiro kino yakiyisizza olunaku lw’eggulo bwe yabadde asisinkanye abavuganya okuli Sipiika Jacob Oulanyah ne Rebecca Kadaga mu maka g’Obwapulezidenti.  Kino kyaddiridde enkambi zombi okwemetta enziro wamu n’okweyogerera amafuukule. Ensisinkano eno era yeetabiddwamu abavuganya ku bumyuka bwa Sipiika okuli; Robina Rwakoojo, Anita Among, Oboth Oboth ne Thomas Tayeebwa. Kigambibwa nti oluvannyuma lwa Sipiika Kadaga ne Oulanyah buli omu okuwaayo ensonga ze, Pulezidenti Museveni yabasabye okuyimiriza kkampeyini. Bano bakkiriziganyiza okugoberera amateeka agalambika ennonda ya Sipiika kuba kkampeyini babadde bazikedde era nga tezeetaagisa. Okusinziira ku mateeka agafuga ennonda ya Sipiika, omubaka avaayo n’abaako gw’asemba okufuuka Sipiika era n’annyonnyola ebitontono ebikwata ku yeesimbyewo. Kinajjukirwa nti nga 10 March, 202, omubaka James Kakooza, yeemulugunya ku bantu abali mu lwokaano lwa Sipiika ng’agamba nti bano baali bakozesa olulimi oluweebuula ekitiibwa kya Palamenti. Sipiika Rebecca Kadaga naye yavaayo ne yeemulugunya ku kkampeyini omwali okukubisa ebipande ne ssaati ng’agamba nti kakuyege w’Obwasipiika si bw’abeera. Ono yategeezezza nti waliwo n’ababaka abalonde ababadde batandise okwenyigira mu kkampeyini zino, ekintu ekiweebula ekitiibwa kya Palamenti. Enkambi zibadde zeeyogerera ebisongovu nga Kadaga alumiriza nti Oulanyah yatya ekiteeso ekiggya ekkomo ku myaka gy’Obwapulezidenti n’akimulekera.

headline: AKALULU 2021: Amuriat awangudde bbendera ya FDC, Biriggwa bw’avudde mu lwokaano
text: Ssentebe w’ekibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) avudde mu lwokaano lw’okukwatira FDC bbendera ku bwapulezidenti bw’atyo abadde Pulezidenti waakyo, Patrick Oboi Amuriat n’awangula bbendera y’ekibiina. Amuriat  nga ali n’abawagizi be Kino kitegeeza nti Amuriat afunye bbendera ya FDC nga tavuganyiziddwa okwesogga akalulu ka 2021. Biriggwa ategeezezza bannakibiina leero e Najjanankumbinti, yalabye nga Amuriat y’ajja okusobola okuwa Pulezidenti Museveni akaseera akazibu n’asalawo obutayonoona budde. Ono yavaayo n’alaga nti mwetegefu okuggya Pulezidenti Museveni mu ntebe oluvannyuma lwa Dr. Kizza Besigye okulaga nti tagenda kuvuganya mu kalulu ka 2021. Biriggwa agambye nti asazeewo ateeke ekibuga mu njogera y’ekibiina eya ‘One Uganda One People’ era kiyambe n’okunyweza obumu mu kibiina. “ Njagala Amuriat olugendo luno alutwale mu maaso, ndabye nga w’amaanyi ajja okusobola okuvuganya Museveni.” Biriggwa bw’agambye wakati mu mizira egibadde gimukubirwa. Kino kiwalirizza Amuriat okwoza ku mmunye n’ategeeza nti mu kusooka yali teyeesiga Biriggwa era ng’alowooza nti ayinza okukwata ekibiina n’akiwa Museveni, naye akizudde yali mukyamu ku nsonga eno.Bannakibiina bangi baali basuubira Dr. Kizza Besigye okuddamu avuganye okutuuka mu mwezi Gwomunaana, bwe yakabatema banoonye omuntu omulala era FDC n’etandika omuyiggo. Wabula ag’omu nkuubo galaga nti FDC eyogerezeganya n’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) okugatta amaanyi baleete omuntu omu avuganye Pulezidenti Museveni era bamuggye mu ntebe.

headline: Empaka z’omuzannyo gwa volleyball ez’amazaalibwa ga Kabaka zitongozeddwa
text: Oweek. Patrick Luwaga Mugumbule sipiika w’olukiiko  Empaka z’omuzannyo gwa Volleyball okujaguza amazaalibwa ga Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II olwaleero zitongozeddwa mu Bulange e Mmengo.  Omukolo guno gukoleddwa Oweek. Patrick Luwaga Mugumbule, sipiika w’Olukiiko lwa Buganda ng’ono yakiikiridde Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga abadde alina emirimu emirala emitongole gy’agenzeeko.  Okuva kuddyo, Abeebitiibwa, Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu, Patrick Luwaga Mugumbule, Daudi Mpanga, ne Noah Kiyimba Oweek. Mugumbule agambye nti omuzannyo gwa volleyball mulungi kubanga gwetaaga amaanyi mangi era oyo yenna aguzannya abeera mulamu bulungi. “Omuzannyo guno kizzaamu amaanyi nti gukula era tusuubira nti gujja kuba gw’amaanyi nnyo. Nkubiriza abantu bonna okwenyigira mumuzannyo guno era kisanyusa nti kati gutwaliddwa mumasomero abaana baffe abato baguzanye,” Mugumbule bweyagambye.  Yayongeddeko nti bwegugenda mu masomero kitegeeza gugenda kubeerawo ebbanga lyonna.  “Twebaza nnyo abo bonna abagawagira mu ngeri ez’enjawulo,” Mugumbule bweyagambye.  Ate Oweek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu, minisita akola ku nsonga z’abavubuka, emizannyo, n’okwewumuza, yagambye nti alina essuubi nti mu bbanga eritali ddene, volleyball gugenda kuba ogumu ku mizannyo egy’ogerwako.  “Tetwetaaga kulinda kuba banene okusobola okutandika, kijja kusoboka okuzimba omuzannyo guno okugutuusa kuddaala ly’emizannyo emirala gyonna. Sirina kubuusabuusa nti guno gw’emuzannyo ogukyasinga okukulira ku sipiidi ennene mumizannyo gyonna gyetulina,” Ssekabembe bweyagambye.   Ku lulwe, Eddi Okira, ssentebe w’empaka za Kabaka birthday tournament, yagambye nti balina essanyu Kabaka okusiima emizannyo gino gibeere egimu kwegyo egigenda okuzannyibwa nga akuza amaaalibwage.  “Twagala okumanya gyetuvudde ng’abantu era tusuubira nti abantu baffe bajja kwemanya nga bayita mu mizannyo gino. Twagala emirembe mu ggwanga lyaffe nga tetufudde ku bulyomu ggwanga lyavaamu,” Okira bweyagambye.  Ku lulwe, Oweek. Daudi Mpanga minisita akola kunsonga ez’enkizo era nga ye ssentebe w’akakiiko akateekateeka amazaalibwa ga Kabaka yagambye nti omuzannyo gwa volleyball mulungi era guweesezza ddala Obwakabak ekitiibwa.  “Nina essanyu lyansusso okulaba nga n’omulundi guno empaka zino zigenda kubaawo,” Mpanga bweyagambye.  Empaka zino zigenda kubaawo omwezi g’okusatu okuva nga 27 okutuuka nga 29.

headline: Buganda egaziyizza ennyingiza, obuwumbi 70 ze zifunise mu myezi 6 egiyise
text: Omuwanika wa Buganda era Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku byensimbi, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa ayanjulidde Olukiiko lwa Buganda nga bwe basobodde okukung’aanya obuwumbi bwa ssiringi obuwerera ddala 70 mu myezi 6 egiyise wadde baali basuubira kufuna obuwumbi 60 mu mbalirira gye baakola. Owek. Waggwa bino abyogeredde mu Lukiiko lwa Buganda olwa 29, olutuula olusoose olutudde e Bulange -Mmengo ku Mmande n’alaga nti Buganda esobodde okukola amagoba ga bitundu 16% wadde nga wabaddewo okusoomooza kwa Covid-19 mu ggwanga. “Ssennyiga Corona atukoseza nnyo nga Buganda naye nnina essanyu Owek. Sipiika okubategeeza nti wakati mu bulwadde buno tukoledde ddala bulungi nnyo mu byensimbi mu myezi 6 egisoose era nga bw’ogamba nti twandifunye obuwumbi 60 naye tusinzizzaamu ebitundu 16 ku buli 100. Tuyingizza obuwumbi 70 n’obukadde 54,” Owek. Nsibirwa bw’annyonnyodde.  Okusinziira ku Minisita Nsibirwa bino byonna bituukiddwako olw’okukola obutaweera awamu n’obwerufu obwoleseddwa ebitongole ebyenjawulo mu Bwakabaka. Ono agamba nti ensimbi zino zivudde mu makubo amakulu 4 omuli; abanywanyi ne Bannamikago b’Obwakabaka ssaako gavumenti eyaawakati, Oluwalo oluleetebwa abantu ba Beene awamu n’amalala. Omuwanika era amenyeddemenyedde abakiise mu bimu ku bintu ebikoleddwa mu mwaka gw’ebyensimbi guno nga bakozesa ensimbi zino nga byonna bibadde byetoloolera ku kusitula mbeera z’abantu ba Kabaka awamu n’okutumbula enkulaakulana n’okusembereza abantu obuweereza obw’enjawulo. Mu bino mu baddemu okuyooyoota Olubiri lw’e Nkoni ne Baamunaanika, ebyayongera okunyweza Nnamulondo nga bayita mu kitongole kya Nkuluze. Okunyweza n’okuwagira obukulembeze mu bika okuyita mu kuwandiisa abayima. Ebika 12 byamaliriza eddimu lino, 16 bikyali mu kaweefube ate ebika 11 byo tebinnaba. Abataka baafuna entambula ebayambako, Amasiro g’e Kasubi kaweefube w’okugazzaawo akyatambulira ddala naddala ennyumba ya muzibwazaalampanga enaatera okuggibwako engalo. Owek. Waggwa Nsibirwa alaze nti mu mwaka gumu gwokka Buganda esomesezza abantu abasukka mu kawumbi akalamba ku nsonga z’ettaka naddala mayiro awamu n’emisomo emirala. Minisita Nsibirwa ayongedde okulambululira Olukiiko ensaasaanya n’ennyingiza, n’alaga nti omwaka guno Obwakabaka bulina enteekateeka etumbula obuweereza mu gavumenti ez’ebitundu, omuli okuwa abeggombolola obugaali Maanyigakifuba ate n’abaami b’amasaza e 18, Omutanda yasiima ne baweebwa kapyata z’emmotoka ekika kya Harrier zibanguyize okutuuka ku bantu be bakulembera n’okukola emirimo. Wano ssentebe w’olukiiko olukulembera abaami b’amasaza, Ppookino Jude Muleke asabye Olukiiko luveeyo n’ekiteeso ekisiima Empologoma olw’enteekateeka eno.  Ng’oggyeeko ebyentambula, Obwakabaka butambuza ebyemizannyo wadde wabaddewo okusoomooza kwa Covid-19. Emisinde gyamazaalibwa ga Kabaka ssaako emipiira gy’Amasaza gibaddewo omwaka guno nga kuno kugattiddwako okusoosowaza ebyenjigiriza omubadde okugaba bbasale omutwalo mulamba eri abayizi ku mitendera egy’enjawulo. Ebyobulimi, Obulunzi, Bulungibwansi n’ebyobusuubuzi bitumbuddwa ssaako okunyweza ebyempuliziganya mu Leediyo CBS ne Terefayina wamu n’ebirala. Ku by’obulamu, Minisita Nsibirwa agamba nti abantu ba Buganda bagaba omusaayi obutabangawo mu ggwanga nga liita z’omusaayi emitwalo 8 zafunibwa okuva mu masaza 4, Buddu, Kyaddondo, Busiro ne Ssingo. Ono agasseeko nti okwongera okutumbula ebyobulamu, Omutanda yasiimye amalwaliro 2 gazimbiddwa mu mbalirira eno, omuli Nsangi mu Busiro ne Kalasa mu Bulemeezi. Kisuubirwa amalwaliro gano gajja kutuusa obuweereza eri abantu abasukka 10,000 buli mwezi kubanga bakaaba olwebyobulamu. Abakiise mu Lukiiko lwa Buganda basiimye obwerufu obwoleseddwa eggwanika lya Buganda ne gavumenti ya Beene okulwana okukyusa obulamu bw’abantu mu Buganda.

headline: Tukyasobola okuwangula Museveni mu kalulu nga bwekyabadde mu Buganda – Gen. Tumukunde
text: Kampala Munnakisinde kya ‘Renewed Uganda’ era munnamagye eyawummula Lt. Gen. Henry Tumukunde asabye bannayuganda obutaggwamu ssuubi kuba pulezidenti Museveni bakyasobola okumuwangula nga bayise mu kalulu. Gen. Tumukunde Bino Tumukunde abyogeredde ku kkooti ya City Hall bwabadde agenze okulabikako mu maaso g’omulamuzi ku misango egyekuusa ku kulya mu nsi olukwe nga ono yali yasaba kkooti eno esindike omusango gwe mu kkooti enkulu. Tumukunde yagambye nti bannayuganda bwebaba baagala okuwangula gavumenti ya Museveni balina okwemanyika obutasikirizibwa ssente za Museveni bonna boogeze eddoboozi limu. “Buganda yalaze nti esobola okunaabira Museveni mu maaso era nga kati omulimu gusigalidde bannayuganda balala okumma abantu bano akalulu, era kisoboka okubawangula,” Tumukunde bwe yagambye. Tumukunde era yeekokodde gavumenti gyagamba nti yamutulugunyiza nnyo nemulemesa okukunga bannayuganda okumuwagira nga eno y’emu ku nsonga lwaki yafuna obululu butono ddala. Ono yaggulwako omusango guno mu mwezi gwa October oluvannyuma lw’okusangibwa n’emmundu etali mpandiise ku woofiisi ze ezisangibwa e Kololo era nga oludda oluwaabi lulumiriza nti ono bweyali ku Ttivi emu mu Kampala yagamba nti ajja kuyambako abagwira abaagala okuggyako Museveni.

headline: Aba Opozisoni baagala ssente za COVID-19 zifuuke emitwalo 20
text: Kampala Kabineeti y’ekisiikirize mu Palamenti, egugumbudde gavumenti olw’okuwamba emirimu gya Palamenti n’esalawo egabire abantu ssente abakosebwa omuggalo nga tefunye lukusa kuva mu Palamenti. Bano kati baagala Palamenti eyitibwe etandike okuteesa ku nsonga enkulu eziyamba eggwanga era ne ssente zino zirinnyisibwe okuva mu mitwalo 10 okutuuka ku mitwalo 20. “Tulowooza nti ssente zino zikubisibwemu nga beeyambisa ssente ezaaweebwa State House kuba ensangi zino Pulezidenti Museveni takyatambula nnyo.” Omubaka omukyala owa Mityana Joyce Baagala bwe yategeezezza. Kabineeti eno bino yabisazeewo ku Lwokuna era n’esaba SipiikaJacob Oulanyah ayite Palamenti ekole obuvunaanyizibwa obugiweebwa Ssemateekaey’okugabana n’okulondoola embeera y’eggwanga n’abantu ku mulundi guno ogwokubiri ng’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kirumbye eggwanga. Okusinziira ku mubaka omukyala owa Mityana era Minisita w’ebyamawulire mu kabineeti eno, Joyce Baagala, Palamenti obutatuula kireetedde gavumenti okweddiza emirimu gyayo n’egaba ssente za COVID-19. “Gavumenti ensonga eno yalina okugireeta ekubaganyizibweko ebirowoozo. Gavumenti terina buyinza mu mbeera yonna kugabanya ssente zino nga Palamenti tesoose ziteesaako.” Baagala bwe yategeezezza. Wano omubaka Gilbert Oulanyah yasabye amasiga ga gavumenti gonna galekebwe okukola emirimu gyago. Wabula Minisita w’amawulire mu gavumenti eyaawakati, Chris Baryomunsi, bwe yatuukiriddwa yannyonnyodde nti gavumenti ky’ekola kwe kuteeka embalirira mu nkola so si kugabanya ssente nga aba Opozisoni bwe baategeezezza. Ono era yabasabye okukomya okuwakanya buli nteekateeka yonna gavumenti gyereeta.

headline: Abakulembeze abalyi b’enguzi era abaluvu be boonoonye Uganda – Gen. Muntu
text: Akulira ekibiina kyaAlliance for National Transformation-(ANT), Maj Gen (Rtd) Mugisha Muntu agamba nti ekizibu kya Uganda ekikulu be bakulembeze ab’oku ntikko abaliwo nga bano bagatta omululu n’obulyake. Bino Gen. Muntu yabyogeredde ayita ku mutimbagano mu kanyomero ke akamanyiddwa nga #AskMugishaMuntubwe yabadde awayaamu ne munnamawulire Charles Odongtho. Muntu yagambye nti ye amanyi ekirwadde ekirya Uganda okugimalawo mu myaka 20 agayise era kino yakimanya we okuva we yabeerera mu gavumenti ng’omuduumizi w’amagye. Ono agamba nti abakulu bonna mu gavumenti beegaggawaza nga tebamanyi bungi bwa ssente bwe balina kuba ezisinga baziggye mu kulya nguzi nga bakozesa ebifo byabwe. “Mmaze ekiseera nga ndaba enguzi emalawo abakulembeze abali mu bifo ebyamaanyi era nnakimanya nti bano bagenda kukola ensobi eziwerako, nze nalina okubeesamba kuba namanya nti singa ebintu bitambula bubi kijja kuba kizibu okunnyonnyola.” Gen. Muntu bwe yagasseeko. Gen. Muntu nga yavuganyaako ku bwapulezidenti agamba nti ye ne bwebamuggya mu tulo asobola bulungi okunnyonnyola gya yeggya obugagga bwe kuba talinaamu bwa nsobi. Ono abali mu buyinza abawadde amagezi okumanya nti obuyinza bwe balina si bwabwe wabula abantu era babukozese bulungi n’obwegendereza. “Tulina obwesige bwabannayuganda. Ffe ngaANT tugamba nti amaanyi gonna tugamalire mu kukyusa ngeri gye tusobola okutambuzaamu eggwanga obulungi so si byabufuzi budde bwonna. Naye twagala okukaka abali mu buyinza mu buli kye bakola bakulembeze abantu.” Muntu bwe yannyonnyodde.

headline: Tetugenda kukkiriza bantu kusigalawo nga bamaze okulonda – Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda
text: Kampala Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kakasizza nga bwe katagenda kukkiriza balonzi kusigala ku bifo bironderwamu oluvannyuma lw’okukuba akalulu kaabwe. Abantu nga bakungaanye okwetegereza embala y’akalulu Omulamuzi Byabakama agambye nti okuleka abantu mu bifo awalonderwa ne balinda okutuusa ng’akalulu kabaliddwa kikontana n’ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona kuba kino kisobola okuvaako okusaasaana kw’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. Kino we kijjidde ng’avuganya ku kkaadi ya National Unity Platform, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine, akunga abawagizi be okulonda mu bungi era basigalewo okukuuma akalulu kaabwe okutuusa nga kamaze okubalibwa. “Mugende n’endagamuntu zammwe era mukakase nti mulonda, oluvannyuma lw’okulonda temuvaawo okutuusa ng’akalulu kabaliddwa.” Bobi Wine bwe yategeezezza abawagizi be gye buvuddeko. Kyagulanyi ne ttiimu ye babadde baakatongoza omukutu gw’omutimbagano ogwa U VOTE kwe banaayita okukuuma n’okulondoola ebinaava mu kalulu kano akanaabeerawo nga 14/Jan/2021. Mu ngeri y’emu ab’oludda oluvuganya mu bibiina ebyenjawulo bataddewo ekifo kimu we bagenda okubalira obululu bwa beesimbyewo bonna abavuganya gavumenti wamu n’abo abeesimbyewo ku lwabwe. Okusinziira ku kiwandiiko ekyawamu ekyafulumiziddwa ebibiina ebyenjawulo okuli; FDC, Jeema, NUP, DP, ANT, ne munnamagye Lt. Gen. Henry Tumukunde, bonna bakkiriziganyizza okukolera awamu bakuume akalulu kaabwe. Bano bagenda kweyambisa tekinologiya owa wamu wamu n’okukolera awamu mu bintu by’ensimbi okusobola okuteekawo obwerufu, mu kukuuma n’okubala akalulu kano aka Vvaawo Mpitewo.

headline: Ababaka baagala omwenge gutandike okutundibwa ssaawa 6 ez’emisana, bw’obigaana osibwa myaka 10
text: Palamenti ekkiriza omubala omukyala owa disitulikiti ye Tororo Sarah Opendi atandike okubaga ku tteeka erigaana amabaala okutunda omwenge nga ssaawa 6 ez’emisana tezinawera awamu n’obutasukka ssaawa 12 ez’okumakya nga bakyagutunda. Ebbago lino lituumiddwa ‘ Alcoholic Drinks Control Bill 2022,’ nga singa linafuuka etteeka, omuntu yenna anaasangibwa nga atunda omwenge wansi w’essaawa 6 ez’omutuntu oba 12 ez’okumakya ajja kusibwa emyaka 10 oba okuwa engasi ya bukadde 20 oba byombi. “Omuntu takkirizibwe kutunda wansi wa ssaawa 6 ez’okumakya wadde okugutunda okusukka ssaawa 12 ez’okumakya. Omuntu anaasangibwa nga amenye etteeka lino ajja kuba azizza omusango era asibwe emyaka 10 oba asasule obukadde 20 oba byombi,” Ebbago bwerisoma. Opendi bweyabadde asaba olukusa okugenda okuteekaka ebbago lino yagambye nti waliwo obwetaavu okukoma ku budde abantu bwebanyweramu omwenge era kiyambe okukendeeza ebbula bikolwa. Okusinziira ku Opendi endwadde ezimu eziriwo kati ziva ku mwenge ogw’obulabe so nga n’engeri abantu gyebanywamu omwenge ereetedde obutabanguko mu maka okweyongera. Mu tteeka lino. tekkirizibwa kuguza musirikale oba mujaasi ali mu byambalo omwenge oba okugutundira mu mmotoka wadde okuguguza abaaana abali wansi w’emyaka 18 wadde okutunda omwenge gw’obuveera. Opendi agamba nti wadde wabaddewo amateeka nga ‘The Enguli (Manufacture and Licensing) Act, the Portable Spirits Act cap.97 ne Liquor Act’ gano gakolebwa mabega nnyo nga kati ebiseera bikyuuse nga omwenge omupya oguli ku katale tegwogerwako. Kinajjukirwa nti alipoota y’ ekitongole ky’ensi yonna eky’obulamu ki World Health Organisation (WHO) eya 2018 yalaga nti Uganda yeemu ku nsi ezisinga okunywa omwenge mu Africa.

headline: Ssaabakunzi wa NRM Sseninde asabye abavubuka obutekwasa Museveni ku bwavu obubaluma
text: Akulira kakuyege n’okunoonyeza ekibiina ki National Resistance Movement (NRM) obuwagizi, Rosemary Nansubuga Sseninde alabudde abavubuka okukomya okwekwasa Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni ku bwavu obubagoya. Okulabula kuno Sseninde yakukoledde mu katale e Bugoloobi bweyabadde ayogerako n’abasuubuzi ku Lwokubiri nga abalambula okuzuula ebizibu byebasanga nga bakola emirimu gyabwe. “ Obwavu obusanga mu Bayibuli ne Kuraani ebyaliwo nga ne gavumenti ya NRM tenajja mu buyinza. Temutwala bannabyabufuzi bye babagamba, Ebiwandiikibwa ku mutimbagano si bituufu. Omuntu bwaba alina ssente nazisaasaanyiza mu zzaala talina kunenya Museveni, ekizibu kiri ku ye, ” Ssenninde bwe yategeezezza. Okusinziira ku Sseninde okuvuunuka ekizibu ky’obwavu kubeera kwerwanako ng’omuntu n’okyuusa endowooza yo okuleetawo enkyukakyuka. Ono agamba nti wadde gavumenti erina obuvunaanyizibwa okulaba nti abantu baayo bali bulungi naye yo kyekomako kwe kuteekawo embeera esobozesa abantu baayo okunoonya ssente beggye mu bwavu. Sseninde, abasuubuzi abasabye okweyambisa enteekateeka ez’enjawulo nga Entandikwa, Emyooga, Parish Development Fund, ekitavvu ky’abavubuka n’abakyala ekyateekebwawo gavumenti beeyimusa bave mu by’okwekwasa gavumenti. Ono agamba nti gavumenti tesobola kuwa buli omu ssente naye esobola okuziteeka mu SACCO nebazeewola n’oluvannyuma nebazizza. Sseninde yalaze nga bwagenda okwanjula ebizibu byonna byasanze mu basuubuzi bano eri bekikwatako mu gavumenti basobole okubisalira amagezi, enkulaakulana esobole okubatuukako.

headline: Biibino ebiragiro ebikambwe Museveni bye yayisizza ku Corona
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni ayisizza ebiragiro ebikambwe era n’abaako ebintu ebyenjawulo by’aggadde okusobola okutangira ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. Bino we bijjidde ng’omuwendo gy’abafudde Ssennyiga Corona gulinnya buli lunaku. Eggulo ku Ssande abakwatiddwa ekirwadde kino batuuse ku bantu 1,200 be bafunise ng’abasinga ku bano bavubuka. Kino kyawalirizza Pulezidenti Museveni okunyweza mu biragiro ng’agamba nti bannayuganda basusse obutafaayo n’okulagajjalira ekirwadde kino ekikambwe. Mu kwogerako eri eggwanga olunaku lw’eggulo, Pulezidenti Tibuhaburwa Museveni yalagidde amasomero gonna gaggalewo ku mitendera gyonna okutuuka ku yunivaasite. Amasomero n’amatendekero aga waggulu gagenda kuggalwa okumala ennaku 42, era bwe ganaaba gakuddamu abasomesa bonna baakusooka kugemebwa. Museveni alabudde abo bonna abaneesisigiriza ne bagaana okugemebwa nti tebajja kukkirizibwa kulinnya mu kibiina. Bino we bijjidde ng’abayizi abamu babadde bagenda kuddayo buzzi okuli abali mu bibiina ebya wansi okuli aba P1 okutuuka mu P3. Ono era alagidde abayizi batandike okuggyibwa ku masomero nga bano era okusobozesa kino takisi zikkirizibwa okubatambuza okutuuka nga June 10. Oluvannyuma zijja kukolera munda mu disitulikiti zino awatali kusala kugenda mu ndala. Kino nakyo kigenda kukola okumala ennaku 42, ate nga mu mbeera yeemu n’amasinzizo gaggadde. Emmotoka ezisaabaza ebyamaguzi zigenda kusigala nga zikola, wabula ziteekeddwa okubeeramu abantu 2 bokka era zo zaakukkirizibwa okutambula okuva mu disitulikiti emu okudda mu ndala. Omukulembeze era ayongedde okukakasa nti bagenda kulwanyisa obumenyi bw’amateeka bwonna. Museveni okunyweza kino agamba nti abapoliisi ba tulafiki balina okuweebwa emmundu okusobola okukwata obulungi abanaamenya ebiragiro. Kino wabula tayogedde kigenda kutandika ddi okukola. Kati mu ngeri yeemu, alagidde akulira ekitongole kya bambega, Grace Akullo, okunnyonnyola eggwanga okunoonyereza kwabwe we kutuuse ku butemu obwenjawulo obuzze bukolebwa ku bantu abagundiivu mu ggwanga. Mu birala, enkung’aana zonna okuli emikolo, embaga n’ebirala byakugenda mu maaso wabula nga kuliko abantu 20 bokka era nakino kyakumala ennaku 42. Ate amasiga ga gavumenti, gaakusigala nga gakola nga muno mulimu; olukiiko lwa baminisita, Palamenti n’essiga eddamuzi. Bwo obudde bwa kafyu busigadde ku ssaawa 3 ez’ekiro okutuukira ddala ku 11 n’ekitundu ng’obudde bukya ate nga boodabooda ziteekeddwa okukoma okukola ku ssaawa 12, ez’akawungeezi. Okusinziira ku biragiro, obutale bw’omubuulo buyimiriziddwa wabula bwo obw’emmere bwakusigala nga bukola, alabudde nti abanaamenya ebiragiro baakuwa engassi. Ebiragiro ebiyisiddwa; 1.Amasomero gaggaddwa ennaku 42 2. Amasinzizo gaggaddwa ennaku 42 3. Embaga zikkiriziddwako abantu 20 bokka. 4. Okuziika kukkiriziddwako abantu 20 5. Obutale bw’omubuulo buggaddwa 6. Entambula z’olukale zigaaniddwa okusala mu disitulikiti. 7. Entambula ezikkiriziddwa za munda mu disitulikiti mwokka. 8. Emmotoka ez’obuyonjo zikkiriziddwamu abantu 3. 9. Entambula ezisala mu disitulikiti ziwereddwa. 10. Ebizimbe by’obusuubuzi birabuddwa. 11. Ebbaala zisigadde ku muggalo. 12. Amakolero gakkiriziddwa okusigala nga gakola. 13. Abazimbi bakkiriziddwa okusigala nga bakola. 14. Aba boodabooda bakkiriziddwa okusaabaza omuntu omu 15. Abamenya ebiragiro bagenda kutaanzibwa ssente.

headline: Endagaano y’Emmwaanyi tesobola kusazibwamu, terina tteeka lyemenya – Ssaabawolereza Kiryowa
text: Ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti, Kiwanuka Kiryowa, ne Minisita w’ebyensimbi, Matia Kasaija, balwaanye bwezizingirire okumatiza ababaka ba Palamenti ng’ endagaano eyakolebwa ne musigansimbi Omuyitale ng’emuwa obuyinza okuvunaanyizibwa ku mmwaanyi mu ggwanga nga bwetalina kizibu ekintu ababaka kyebagaanye. Bano bwe baalabiseeko eri akakiiko akakola ku by’obusuubuzi, obulambuzi awamu n’ amakolero, akakubirizibwa omubaka wa Mbarara City South, Mwine Mpaka bategeezezza nti endagaano eno yakolebwa mu mateeka era ntuufu. “ Nakebera kkampuni eno weeyimiridde mu nsonga z’amateeka nematikira nti terina buzibu bwonna n’olwekyo endagaano gyetwakola terina tteeka lyonna lyemenya. Njagala okubakakasa nti nekeneenya amateeka gonna nendaba nga kkampuni eno ekkirizibwa mu mateeka gaffe okukola emirimu gyaayo,” Kiwanuka bwe yannyonnyodde. Kino kyatabudde omubaka wa Kalungu West, Joseph Ssewungu namutabukira nga agamba nti kyabadde kimalamu amaanyi Ssaabawolereza w’eggwanga okulaba nti endagaano eno terina wegenda kukoseza bannayuganda. Kinajjukirwa nti nga 10 February 2022, Minisita w’ebyensimbi Matia Kasaija kulwa gavumenti ya Uganda yateeka omukono ku ndagaano ne kampuni ya ‘Uganda Vinci Coffee Company Limited (UVCC)’ eya munnansi wa Yitale, Enrica Pinetti, nemuwa obuvunaanyizibwa okugula emmwaanyi zonna mu Uganda era nebamugattirako ettaka ery’obwerere e Namanve nga liwerako yiika 27, okumukolera ekkubo erituuka ku ttaka lino, nebamusalira ku mazzi n’amasanyalaze awamu n’okumusonyiwa omusolo okumala emyaka 10 miramba. Mu kiwandiiko kyeyafulumizza Minisita Kasaija agamba nti si kituufu nti endagaano eno eganyula musigansimbi yekka naye ne bannayuganda bafunamu nnyo. “ Endagaano eno tegaana bantu balala kwenyigira mu kugattako mutindo ku mmwaanyi, UVCC kyegamba okuyambako Uganda kwekusobola okufunamu ennyo mu mmwaanyi okuyimusa omutindo n’okugulwa ssente ezeegasa,” Kasaija bwe yagambye. Omubaka wa Bwamba, Richard Gafabusa, yabuuzizza bano lwaki tebasooka kwebuuza ku bannansi nga tebanateeka mukono ku ndagaano eno era nasaba bannyonnyole lwaki endagaano eno terina welagira nti esobola okusazibwamu kubibeera bitagenze bulungi. Omubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti ye Amuria, Suzan Amero, yanenyeza Minisita olw’okulemwa okwebuuza ku balimi ku nsonga eno nasalawo okuwaayo emmwaanyi zebalimira mu bugubi nga tasoose ku beebuuzaako. Gyebyagweredde nga ababaka tebamatidde ku ndagaano eno, nga bagamba nti waliwo ebiwandiiko ebikulu ebitamanyiddwa gyebiri naye babyetaaga okusobola okunnyonnyoka ensonga eno.

headline: Mao akutudde ddiiru ne Museveni, bagenda kukolera wamu
text: Ssenkaggale w’ekibiina ki Democratic Party,  Nobert Mao aliko ddiiru gyakutudde ne ssentebe w’ekibiina ki National Resistance Movementi (NRM) era Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni okukolera awamu basobole okutambuza eggwanga. Bano enzikiriziganya bagituuseeko mu nsisinkano gyebabaddemu oluvannyuma lw’okuteeka omukono ku ndagaano egenda okulung’amya omukago gwabwe mu maka g’Obwapulezidenti Entebbe. “Wadde DP eri ku ludda oluvuganya naye si babi nnyo, tebakolokota nakuwakanya mu ngeri etazimba naye bakulaga ekirina okukolebwa,” Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni bw’agambye nakakasa nti omukago guno gubadde gwalwawo.. Pulezidenti Museveni yataddeko omukono kulwa NRM ate Mao nateekako kulwa DP ate Ssaabawandiisi wa NRM, Richard Todwong ne Ssaabawandiisi wa DP, Gerald Siranda nebajulira endagaano eno. Okusinziira ku Pulezidenti Museveni DP erina obukulembeze obulungi era abeesimbu nga bakolaganika nabo. Bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku mukago guno, Mao yeebazizza olw’okukaanya kuno era nategeeza nti olugendo luno lwatandika dda nga n’abamu ku bannakibiina tebanazaalibwa. Mao asabye Pulezidenti Museveni okukozesa omukisa guno okukung’aanya bannakibiina abeesudde mu bitundu by’ eggwanga eby’enjawulo n’ebibiina gyebaddukira. Ssenkaggale Mao agamba nti bakussa ekitiibwa mwebyo ebikkiriziganyiziddwako kuba bikoleddwa mu bwerufu era endagaano eno eraga nti obutakkanya obubaddewo bukoleddwako. Ono yeebazizza Pulezidenti Museveni olw’obukugu bw’alaze nga akulembera eggwanga nasaba bannayuganda okwongera okumusabira.

headline: Abataka abakulu ab’obusolya basitukiddemu okulwanyisa Mukenenya
text: Kampala Bajjajja abataka abakulu ab’obusolya basitukiddemu okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya nga kino baakukikola nga basisinkana bazzukulu baabwe, babangule ku kirwadde kino kiyambe eggwanga okufuna abantu abalamu obulungi nga Beene bwe yalagira. Bino Abataka baabyogeredde mu nsisinkano gye baabaddemu okulaba engeri gye bayinza okukwasiza ku Ssaabasajja okulwanyisa Mukenenya akendeerere ddala nga omwaka 2030 tegunnatuuka nga baasinzidde Kyaddondo ku Lwokusatu. Ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyobulamu mu masaza era akulira ebyobulamu mu ssaza Kyaddondo, Dr. Phiona Kalinda agamba nti abazzukulu bawulirira nnyo mu bataka bano era singa abataka batandika okubasomesa ku kirwadde kino, obubaka bwabwe bajja kubutwala nga bukulu era kiyambe okukendeeza ku nsaasaanya ya Mukenenya. “Tumanyi nti bajjajja era abataka bonna baami era abazzukulu bajja kubawulira bulungi era tukkiriza nti enjiri eno bagenda kugisaasaanya bulungi mu masiga, mu nyiriri, okutuukira ddala wansi mu maka agasembayo.” Dr. Kalinda bwe yannyonnyodde. Dr. Kalinda yasabye abasawo b’ekinnansi okulwanyisa abafere abeerimbika mu mulimu gwabwe abeefuula abajjanjaba mu ngeri etyoboola ne bafundikira nga babasiize abalwadde akawuka.  Omwami wa Ssaabasajja akulembera essaza Kyaddondo, Kaggo Agnes Nakibirige Ssempa nga yagguddewo omusomo guno yeekokkodde bassenga ne bakojja abamokkola ebigambon’ensonga z’ekyamamu lujjudde nti, be basinze okudobonkanya omulembe guno. KaggoSsempa era yasabye abakulu b’ebika bano okwongerayo ekiragiro kya Kabaka ngabalwanyisa Mukenenya n’amaanyi gaabwe, Buganda esobole okufuna abantu abalamu obulungi. Abataka basabye abazzukulu abeetaba mu mikolo gy’Obuwangwa egikolebwa mu budde obwekiro, obutagikozesa kutamiira kuba bangi omwenge gubawaliriza okwetaba mu bikolwa ebyensonyi, ekyongera okutambuza akawuka kano. Bano bannyonnyodde nti ekiseera kituuse okuzzaawo ebitawuluzi, okutumbula obuyonjo n’okuyimusa ebyenfuna okusobola okuggusa olutalo luno. Omutaka Muteesaasira agamba nti bagenda kuddayo ku nnono ezaalekebwawo bajjajjaffe kuba ze zitusobozesezza okubeerawo essaawa ya leero era singa zinaakwatibwa bulungi, zisobola okulung’amya Buganda ey’enkya.  Bano baaweze okukola buli kimu okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino kisobozese bazzukulu baabwe okutambuza obulungi emirimu gyabwe ne Buganda esobole okudda ku ntikko. Kinajjukirwa nti mu kaweefube w’okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino, ekitongole ky’ensi yonna ekya UNAIDS kyalonda Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II mu mwaka gwa 2017okubeera emmunyeenyeso mu kulwanyisa akawuka kano ku lukalu lwa Afirika. Okutuukiriza kino, Beene yasiima emisinde gy’amazaalibwa ge eg’emyaka ebiri egiyisegitambulira ku kulwanyisa akawuka ka Mukenenya era kumpi buli kimu kikoleddwa okutuukiriza kino.

headline: Museveni bamuwere okuddamu okwesimbawo – Bobi Wine
text: Kampala Omukulembeze w’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, agamba nti kkooti mu ggwanga ziri ku kigezo era ayagala ewere Mwami Museveni obutaddamu kwesimbawo kuba aludde ng’abba akalulu. Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu “Kkooti esazeemu okulonda kuno ne Mwami Museveni bamuwere okwesimbawo bw’ebanga kkooti esala mazima.” Kyagulanyi bw’ategeezezza bannakibiina abaawangulwa mu kalulu ka 2021 b’agamba nti abamu babbibwa. Kyagulanyi agamba nti kkooti eri ku kigezo nga bwe kyali ku kakiiko k’ebyokulonda akakulirwa Omulamuzi Simon Mugenyi Byabakama, kuba bannayuganda bagoberera buli kimu. “Kkooti eri ku kigezo okulaga nti oba ekolera bannayuganda oba esala mazima n’obwenkanya,” Kyagulanyi bw’agasseeko. Ono annyonnyodde nti balina obujulizi bwonna kkooti kw’erina okuyimirira okusazaamu okulonda kuno bw’eba ng’egoberera mazima nga bwe kirina okubeera. Kyagulanyi yeekokkodde ekiwenda kya ‘Pandagaali’ ng’abawagizi baabwe ab’enjawulo bakwatibwa ne basibibwa mu makomera ag’enjawulo gye bali mukutulugunyizibwa ate waliwo n’abaawambibwa n’okutuusa kati nga tewali amanyi gye bali. Ku by’okulumba ogumu ku mikutu gy’amawulire, Kyagulanyi agamba nti bakikoze wakati mu mukwano okulaga obutali bumativu era takyejjusa. Era alowooza nti buli kitongole kyonna ekibeera kikoze ensobi kirina okugambibwako kuba tewali bali waggulu w’amateeka. Ate Ssaabawandiisi wa NUP, Lewis Lubongoya agambye nti bannayuganda balina okusigala n’essuubi kuba kkooti esobola okusala amazima. Lubongoya ategeezezza nti abawagizi baabwe abasoba mu 3000 baawambibwa ate n’abalala tebamanyise wa gye bali nga n’abakulu mu kibiina bali mu kutiisibwatiisibwa. Bano bataddewo ennamba abantu abaawambibwako abaabwe kwe balina okukuba ne babawa ebibakwatako.

headline: Rev. Can. Kagodo alondeddwa ku bulabirizi bwe Mukono
text: Olukiiko lw’ Abalabirizi mu Kkanisa ya Uganda ku Lwokusatu lwalonze Rev Canon Enos Kagodo Kitto nga Omulabirizi omuggya ow’ Obulabirizi bwe Mukono. Kagodo azze mu bigere by’ Omulabirizi James Ssebaggala agenda okuwummula emirimu gy’ Obulabirizi. Rev. Kitto yabadde omuwandiisi w’Obulabirizi bwe Mukono era nga agenda kutuuzibwa nga omulabirizi ow’okutaano mu February w’omwaka guno. Ebitongole n’abantu Ssekinoomu batandise dda okuvaayo n’obubaka obuyozaayoza Kagodo olw’okutuuka ku kkula lino. Kagodo olwokaano alubaddemu ne Rev Godfrey Ssengendo era gyebigweredde nga amuwangudde. Rev. Canon Kagodo yazaalibwa mu 1968 era asuubirwa okutwala mu maaso ebimu ku bintu ebibadde bituukiddwako mu bukulembeze bwa Rt Rev James Ssebaggala. Kagodo mufumbo eri Catherine Namuddu era nga Katonda yabawa ezadde ly’ abaana 7. Mungeri yeemu olukiiko lw’Abalabirizi era lulonze Rev Onesimus Asiimwe ng’ omulabirizi wa North Kigezi era nga nowa Karamoja naye alondedwa olwa leero.

headline: Atalaba Birungi NRM by’ekoze, abeera muzibe – Museveni
text: Gulu Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni ategeezezza nti gavumenti gy’akulembera eya NRM eriko ebintu ebikulu by’ekoze mu myaka 35 gy’ebadde mu buyinza era nga kubeera kwefuula muzibe singa omuntu atandika okubuuza gavumenti ye ky’ekoze. Pulezidenti Museveni mu bitundu bye Gulu “Twalina ebbula lya ssukaali, ssabbuuni, bbiya, sooda, sseminti n’ebintu ebirala ebyetaagibwa. Leero byonna tubirina era okusoomooza kwe tulina kati kwakubifunira katale. Oyinza otya okugamba nti NRM terina ky’ekoze ng’amaduuka gonna gajjudde ebintu ebikoleddwa wano?” Bw’atyo Museveni bwe yategeezezza abakulembeze ba NRM mu bitundu bya Acholi eggulo ku Mmande mu kibuga Gulu. Museveni yagambye nti abawakana, balabire ku bintu Uganda byekola nebitunda ku muliraano era nga kano kabonero akalaga nti Uganda eyongedde okukula mu byenfuna. “Ayagala okulaba NRM bw’ekoze, tunuulira South Sudan nga yaakafuna obwetwaze nga tebannalwana, Juba yali ejjudde ebintu ebikolebwa wano. Waliwo n’omukungu wa South Sudan eyang’amba nti akatale kaabwe kajjudde byamaguzi bya Uganda okusinga Kenya,” Museveni bwe yannyonnyodde. Ono yategeezezza nti NRM w’etuuse esobola okukola buli kimu naye ekizibu kiri ku nguzi era n’asaba bannakibiina okulonkooma abagirya kuba kizing’amya emirimu n’okuvumaganya ekibiina. Abakulembeze mu bitundu bya Acholi baamusabye bintu ebyenjawulo omwabadde okukola ku kizibu ky’amasannyalaze wamu n’okulwana ku bbula ly’emirimu eriri mu bavubuka mu kitundu kino. Omubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti y’e Omoro, Catherine Lamwaka yasabye Pulezidenti Museveni abayambe ku nsonga y’okwongera omutindo ku by’abakola n’okulima era abakolere n’oluguudo lwa Omoro- Moroto basobole okutambuza obulungi ebyamaguzi byabwe. Museveni anoonya akalulu k’obwapulezidenti aka 2021 mu ngeri eya ssaayansi akyagenda mu maaso n’okusisinkana abakulembeze b’ekibiina mu bitundu ebyenjawulo era nga bano be balina okutuuka wansi mu bantu okunoonyaayo akalulu. Ono enkya ku Lwokubiri agenda kubeera mu disitulikiti y’e Kitgum ng’afundikira kampeyini mu kitundu kya Acholi. Ebitundu bya Acholi bye bimu ku byasinga okutawaanya Museveni nga yafunayo obululu ebitundu 40 ku buli 100 era ng’ekibuga Gulu buli mulundi kizze kimuwa obuzibu.

headline: Gav’t enoonya obuwumbi 630 okuwummuza Sejusa ne banne awamu nokwongeza abajaasi emisaala
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni alagidde Minisitule y’ebyensimbi okuwaayo obuwumbi 630 eza silingi za Uganda okusobola okukola enteekateeka y’okwongera abajaasi omusaala awamu n’okuwummuza abamu ku bakulu mu ggye lya UPDF nakasiima akeegasa. Abajaasi abagenda okuwummula bawera 34 nga bano bali ku ddaala lya Genero nga mu bano mulimu Gen David Sejusa, Gen Elly Tumwine awamu ne Lt Gen Proscovia Nalweyiso. Abalala kuliko; Lt Gen John Mugume, Lt Gen Andrew Gutti, Maj Gen Stephen Kashaka, Maj Gen Phinehas Katirima, Maj Gen Elly Kayanja, Maj Gen Michael Ondoga, Maj Gen Gavas Mugyenyi, Brig Stephen Kwiringira awamu n’abalala. Kino kiddiridde olukiiko olukulu olw’ amagye okutuula nga lukubirizibwa omuduumizi ow’okuntikko era Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni nebakkaanya okusiibula abamu ku bajaasi n’okulinyisa omusaala nga batandikira ku bakulu kuba ennamba yabwe ntono. Ensonda mu magye zigamba nti Pulezidenti Museveni yannyonnyodde nti bagenero bano baweereza eggwanga okumala akaseera nga beetaaga okusiibulwa obulungi kuba webagira mu buyinza eggwanga teryalina ssente era babadde babeerawo ku busente butono n’omwoyo gwe ggwanga lyabwe. “ Bano batono nnyo, era baweereza eggwanga lyabwe akadde konna, tewali nsonga lwaki tetubasiibula bulungi,” Museveni bw’agambibwa okutegeeza. Okusinziira ku byavudde mu lukiiko abajaasi bagenda kwongezebwa ebitundu 100 ku 100 nga kati Genero ajja kuba afuna omusaala gwa bukadde 15 ate Brigadier afune obukadde 10. Omwogezi w’amagye, Brig. Felix Kulayigye yayise mu kiwandiiko ku Lwokubiri nakakasa nti beetaaga obuwumbi 630 okusobola okuggusa enteekateeka zino. Brig Kulayigye agamba nti bataddewo akakiiko okuva mu Minisitule y’ebyokwerinda nga kakulirwa Omuwandiisi ow’enkalakalira naba Minisitule y’abakozi okutunula mu nsimbi ezirina okwongera ku musaala gw’ abajaasi. “Olukiiko lwasemba eky’okwongera abajaasi omusaala n’ebitundu 100 ku 100 nga lutandika n’abajaasi abakulu kuba bano batono era baluddewo nga baweereza era abamu ku bano bagenda kuwummula mu mwaka gw’ebyensimbi guno ogwa 2022/2023,” Kulayigye bwe yagasseeko. Ono alaze nti beetaaga obuwumbi 517.9 okukola ku kwongeza omusaala ate obwumbi 116.8 kusiibula abakulu abagenda okuwummula nga mu mwaka guno gwonna beetaaga obuwumbi 634.8 okuggusa enteekateeka y’okwongeza abajaasi omusaala n’okuwummuza abanene. Kulayigye yalambise nti enteekateeka eno eyinza okubaawo omwaka gw’ebyensimbi okujja kuba embalirira y’omwaka guno yamala dda okuyisibwa ng’enteekateeka eno teriimu. Ono era yakakasizza nga abajaasi bonna abali ku ddaala lya Kapiteeni ababadde basuubirwa okuwummula bwebayimiriddwa okutuuka nga enteekateeka eno eteekeddwa mu nkola mu mwaka gw’ebyensimbi ogujja ogwa 2023/2024. Kulayigye agamba nti era singa ensimbi ezirina okusiibula abakulu abayogeddwako waggulu zinaabula bajja kwongerayo enteekateeka eno okutuusa omwaka ogujja.

headline: Buganda esse omukago n’aba Healthy Hearts okulwanyisa ekirwadde ky’omutima
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda nga buyita mu kitongole kyabwe ekikwanaganya bannamikago ekya Buganda Investments and Cultural Undertakings, busse omukago n’ekitongole kya Healthy Hearts Foundation n’ekigendererwa eky’okulwanyisa obulwadde bw’omutima. Minisita Nankindu nga atongozza omukago guno Bw’abadde atongoza omukago guno ku mbuga y’Obwakabaka enkulu e Bulange, Mmengo, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga akubirizza abantu ba Buganda okusoosowaza eby’obulamu kibasobozese okutuukiriza ebigendererwa byabwe. Abasabye okukuuma obulamu nga bulamu bakiteeke ku lukalala lw’ebigendererwa byabwe. Mukuumaddamula ategeezezza nti abantu basaanidde okukola ebyo ebisobozesa emitima gyabwe okusigala nga miramu ng’okwewala okulya ebisiike mu bungi n’ennyama ensava, okunywa omwenge oguyitiridde ne ssigala ate bakole dduyiro kubanga omutima gwamugaso nnyo eri obulamu. “Omutima si ky’ekintu kyokka ekyomugaso mu mubiri naye ate bwegutaba mulamu ebitundu by’omubiri ebirala bifeeba.” Katikkiro bwe yategeezezza. Owoomumbuga yeebazizza ekitongole kya Healthy Hearts Foundation olw’okulafuubana okulaba ng’abantu bawangaala n’emitima emiramu ate ne kiwa n’abantu amagezi agakisobozesa okutuukirira era n’asaba abantu bagagoberere. Katikkiro akikkaatirizza nti singa abantu babeera balamu bajja kusobola okuzza Buganda ku ntikko kubanga ensonga Ssemasonga ey’okukola obutaweera bajja kuba basobola okugikwata kannabwala. Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku by’obulamu mu Bwakabaka bwa Buganda, Owek. Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma, y’ataddeko omukono ku ndagaano eno ku lw’Obwakabaka, ate Owek. Ritah Namyalo era nga ye Ssenkulu wa Healthy Hearts Foundation n’assaako ku lw’ekitongole ekyo.

headline: Katikkiro n’omukyala nabo bawandiise ennyiriri mu Bayibuli
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga n’omukyala Margret Mayiga begasse ku Ssabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II ne Maama Nnabagereka Sylvia Nagginda mukuwandiika ennyiriri mu Bayibuli empandiike n’engalo esoose mu Uganda. Aba Bible Society of Uganda, nga bakulembeddwamu omulabirizi we Mukono Rev William James Ssebaggala bakedde ku Butikkiro, amaka amatongole ag’obwakatikkiro okusobozesa Mayiga, omukyala wamu ne Ssabawolereza wa Buganda Oweek. Christopher Bwanika okuwandiika ennyiriri zaabwe. Kabaka yeyasookera ddala okuwandiika ennyiriri ttaano mu suula y’okubikkulirwa [Genesis] munteekateeka eno. Katikkiro awandiise ennyiriri ssatu naye mu ssuula y’okubikkulirwa, ate ye Oweek. Bwanika nawandiika ennyiriri bbiri. Mayiga ategeezezza nti kyetaagisa okuddaabiriza ebintu byaffe ebiba byonoonese tuddemu okubikozesa.   “Ssekabaka Muteesa 1, bweyawandiikira Nnabakyala wa Bungereza ebbaluwa, yalina Katikkiro ne Kabaka aliwo ng’omulimu guno gugenda mumaaso naye alina Katikkiro n’endowooza nti amakage amatongole gaba malungi okukolebwamu omulimu ogwo,” Mayiga bwagambye. Omulabirizi Ssebaggala agambye nti beebaza Katonda olw’okubawa omwaganya okuteekawo ebyafaayo mu Uganda. “Nga tujjukira Muteesa I, waaliwo okwolesebwa eri aba Bible Society abaagamba oluvanyuma lw’emyaka 50 nga bazze mu Uganda batekewo ekyafaayo eky’okuwandiika Bayibuli ng’ewandiikiddwa mumikono gya Bannayuganda, ensi ntono nnyo ezisobodde okukola ekintu kino,” Ssebaggala bwategeezezza. Asiimye nnyo Ssabasajja Kabaka olw’okukkiriza okubeera omuntu eyasooka okuwandiika ennyiriri ezisooka mu Bayibuli okuva ku lusooka okutuuka ku lw’okutaano. Yayongeddeko nti baagala abantu ba Buganda be baba bawandiika essuula y’okubikkulirwa yonna. Buli ayagala, alina eddembe okuwandiika oluvanyuma lw’okuwaayo emitwalo kkumi nga zino zigenda kweyambisibwa mukuzimba ekitebe ekiggya kya Bible Society mu Uganda.

headline: Eddwaliro lye Mmengo lisiimye Obwakabaka olw’okuliyambako okutumbula empeereza
text: Eddwaliro lya Mengo Hospital lisiimye Obwakabaka bwa Buganda awamu n’ebitongole byabwo olw’okuliyambako okutuusa empeereza y’obujjanjabi egwanidde ku bantu. Abakulira eddwaliro lino bawaddeyo ejjinja ery’omuwendo eri Obwakabaka nga babusiima olw’okukola enteekateeka y’okuleeta kuno eddiini awamu n’okuwaayo ettaka okwazimbibwa eddwaliro lino era nebasiima ne Terefayina y’Obwakabaka eya BBS olw’enkolagana ennungi. Bino byonna bibadde ku mukolo oguyindidde ku Hotel Africana ku Lwokutaano nga guno gwegukomekkereza ebijjaguzo by’emyaka 125 bukya eddwaliro lino litandikibwawo.  Ejjinja lino liweereddwa Minisitaw’Abavubuka, emizannyo, n’okwewummuza Oweek. Henry Sekabembe Kiberu kulwa Buganda era aba Mengo Hospital nebasiima okwolesebwa kwa Ssekabaka Muteesa I kweyalina nga ayita abazungu okujja basomese abantu be. Kinajjukirwa nti Obwakabaka era bwali busaale mukuwaayo ettaka era Dr. Sr. Albert Ruskin Cook kweyazimba eddwaliro ly’e Mengo, neriggulwawo mu 1897. Mu bubaka bwe, Oweek. Sekabembe ategeezeza nti eddwaliro ly’e Mengo libadde ssaale nnyo mu kuwagira enteekateeka z’Obwakabaka, n’anokolayo okugaba omusaayi; okuleeta Oluwalo, n’okugema obulwadde bwa COVID. Abadde omugenyi omukulu ku mukolo guno, Omuk. Emmanuel Katongole yeebazizza nnyo Obwakabaka okuwayo ettaka okwazimbibwa eddwaliro, erijjanjabye abantu okumala emyaka 125 ate n’okukuuma omutindo gw’obujjanjabi. Agambye nti eddwaliro ly’atandikawo n’ettendekero ly’abasawo ab’omutindo mu Afirika, terisosola mu ddini, nga bajjanjaba abantu, okukola emikaggo egizimba n’anokolayo ogwa Rotary Uganda ogwavamu etterekero ly’omusaayi ku ddwaliro lino.  Oluvannyuma Omuk. Katongole, atongooza enteekateeka Nnamutayiika ey’eddwaliro, era neyeeyama okuwongera okubakwasizaako mu by’ensimbi. Akulira eddwaliro lino, Dr. Rose Mutumba, awadde Omuk. Emmanuel Katongole ebbaluwa emusiima olw’obuwagizi bwe eri enteekateeka zonna ez’eddwaliro lino. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako; Omuk. Patrick Ssembajjo – Ssenkulu wa BBS Terefayina, abakiise ku lukiiko olufuzi olwa Mengo Hospital, abasaawo, n’abaweereza mu bitongole by’Obwakabaka eby’enjawulo.

headline: Emisinde gya Kabaka 2020 gitongozeddwa n’omulamwa gwa kulwanyisa siriimu
