text: Emisinde mubuna byalo, egitegekebwa buli mwaka okujaguza amazaalibwa ga Ssabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi, gitongozeddwa olwaleero mu Bulange. Omulamwa gw’emisinde gino guli, “Abasajja tulwanyise mukenenya tutaase abaana ab’obuwala”. Ng’atongoza emisinde gino ku Mbuga enkulu e Bulange Mmengo, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga yagambye nti Kabaka afaayo nnyo kubulamu bw’abantube, kyava akola buli kisaanidde okulaba nga babeera balamu. “Bwetwatandika emisinde gino twali mu lutalo lwa kulwanyisa okuttonya mu bakyala (Fistula) naddala abawala abato abataneetuuka. Kaweefube twamumalako emyaka esatu ppaka 2016, era twawaayo obukadde 270. Mu 2017 obwanga twabutunuuliza Nalubiri era obukadde 550 twabuwaayo okumala emyaka esatu,”Mayiga bweyagambye. Ku mulundi guno, Kamalabyonna yagambye Ssabasajja yasiimye essira lissibwe ku mukenenya kubanga okunoonyereza kulaga nti akyegiriisa nnyo naddala wano mu Buganda. Abantu 1000 bakwatibwa ate abalala 500 bafa siriimu buli wiiki mu Uganda yonna. Ssabasajja yalondebwa okukwata omumuli gw’okulwanyisa siriimu naddala mubaami ku lukalu lwa Africa. Katikkiro yategeezezza nti emirundi egisinga obungi, abasajja beebasinga okusasanya akuwuka. “Mwemukwana abawala, naye ekyo bwekiggwa, bwemutuuka mukisenge ebintu bitambulira mumikono gyammwe. N’olwekyo, kikulu nnyo abasajja okutaasa obulamu bwa bakyala bammwe n’abaana,” Mayiga bweyakubirizza. Mu kukuza amazaalibwa ga Ssabasajja, Mayiga yagambye nti guno gwegumu kumikolo emikulu ennyo mu Buganda kubanga obulamu katonda bwawa Kabaka bunyweza ennono n’obuwangwa bwa Baganda. “Kabaka kyekitikkiro ky’ebyo ebitufuula eggwanga erimu. Buli mwaka oguyitawo, Ssabasajja Kabaka tumukulisa ng’omuntu ate n’Obuganda bujaguza kubanga ng’omulembe Omutebi gubeera gwongera okugundiira,” Mayiga bweyagambye. Yagaseeko nti emisinde mubuna byalo yeemu kungeri Obuganda gyebujaguzaamu olw’obulamu Katonda bwaba awadde Kabaka. “Twagala emitwalo mukaaga omwaka guno era twagala gibeere emisinde egisinga okudddukibwa ku lukalu lwa Africa,” Mayiga bweyagambye. Ate yye, akulira ekitongole kya UNAIDS mu Uganda Dr Karusa Kiragu yategeezezza nti Kabaka akoze omulimu gwamanyi nga ambasada w’okulwanyisa siriimu. “Tulina abantu bangi omuli ba pulezidenti n’ebakyala baabwe, abayimbi n’abantu abalala bangi naye Kabaka wa Buganda bonna abakubya ssubi mukukuliramu kaweefube w’okulwanyisa siriimu,” Kiragu bweyagambye. Yasanyukidde omukago gwebagenzeemu ne Airtel nagamba nti alina essuubi nti siriimu wakutuulwa ku nfeete. Kululwe, VG Somasekhar, akulira Airtel mu Uganda yagambye nti tebali muggwanga kuweereza bantu mubyampuliziganya kyokka, wabula n’okuyamba abantu okumanyagana n’okutumbula eby’obuwangwa byabwe. “Ebyempuliziganya tubyetaaga okutumbula embeera z’abantu. Tulina okufuba okulaba nti nga bwetutumbula tekinologiya, tetuteekeddwa kusanyawo mpisa n’abulombolombo bw’abantu,” Somasekharbweyagambye.

headline: Kkooti Ensukkulumu eyongezaayo ogwa Bobi Wine okutuusa enkya
text: Kampala Bannamateeka ba Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu nga bakuliddwamu Medard Lubega Sseggona balagiddwa okusooka okuzza obuggya Ssatifikeeti zaabwe ezibakkiriza okuwoza emisango nga Ssaabalamuzi tannawa nsala ye mu kusaba kwa Kyagulanyi mw’ayagalira okuggyayo omusango gwe mw’awakanyiza obuwanguzi bwa Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni mu kalulu ka 2021. Kyagulanyi yavaayo n’ategeeza olukung’aana lwa bannamawulire mu Kampala, omwezi oguwedde nti yalagidde bannamateeka be okuggyayo omusango kuba yabadde alemeddwa okufunayo obwenkanya. Bannamateeka ba Kyagulanyi nga bali wabweru wa kkooti ensukkulumu Olwaleero kkooti Ensukkulumu eyongezaayo okuwulira okusaba kwa Kyagulanyi eyakwata ekyokubiri mu kalulu akaakubwa nga January 14. Ssaabalamuzi Alfonse Owiny – Dollo awaliriziddwa okwongezaayo omusango guno okutuusa enkya ku ssaawa 3 ez’okumakya, asobozese bannamateeka ba Kyagulanyi okuzza obuggya Ssatifikeeti zaabwe ezibakkiriza okukola emirimu nga bannamateeka oluvannyuma lw’okuggwako nga 1 March 2021. Kino kiddiridde bannamateeka ba Kyagulanyi okusaba okuwabulwa kkooti kuba Ssatifikeeti zaabwe ziweddeko ate ng’ekyokufuna empya kwabadde kukeereye. Mu kwanukula omu ku bawawaabirwa era Ssaabawolereza , William Byaruhanga, ategeezezza nti talina ttabbu ku kya Sseggona kweyongerayo ng’awoza wadde layisinsi ye yabadde eweddeko olw’okuba nti tewali budde era obudde obwaweebwayo okuwulira omusango guno bwabadde buggwaayo. “Tusaba nti singa kkooti ekkiriza, ffe tetulina kuwakanya kwonna ku kwongezaayo musango tusobozese Sseggona ne banne okumaliriza okufuna Ssatifikeeti zaabwe.” Byaruhanga bw’annyonnyodde kkooti. Ssaabalamuzi Owiny-Dollo ku nsonga eno agambye nti, “Tubawadde okutuuka olw’eggulo lwaleero ku ssaawa 11 okumaliriza ensonga ya Ssatifikeeti ne Ssaabawandiisi w’ekitongole ekiramuzi. Bwekiba kyakulwawo musobola okuweebwa Ssatifeeketi ez’ekiseera eziggwako nga March 18.” Kkooti Ensukkulumu ebadde ezzeemu okutuula amakya ga leero okuwulira okusaba kwa Kyagulanyi mw’ayagalira okuggyayo omusango gwe ogw’ebyokulonda.

headline: Beene ayagala bwenkanya ku bantu abattibwa mu kwekalakaasa olwa Bobi Wine
text: Bulange -Mmengo Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi, azzeemu okusaba wabeewo okunoonyereza ku kittabantu ekyaliwo mu mwezi gwa Museenene nga 18 ne 19, oluvannyuma lw’okukwatibwa kwa Bobi Wine e Luuka.  Nnyinimu yategeezezza nti abantu bangi baafiirwako abaabwe naye n’okutuusa kati bano tebafunanga bwenkanya era n’alaga nti akaseera eggwanga lye kigendamu kigenda kubeera kizibu era n’asaba abantu be okwegayirira Katonda asobole okubalaga ekkubo. Okwogera bino Omutanda yabadde mu bimuli bya Bulange ku mukolo gw’ennyimba za Ssekukkulu eziyimbibwa kkwaya ez’enjawulo, wamu n’okusiimirako abakozi abasukkulumye ku bannaabwe mu bitongole bya Buganda. “Ebyafaayo ebyo bye njogeddeko ebyaliwo mu Novemba, bannayuganda ddala bangi abaafiirwa abantu baabwe era bangi bakyali mu maziga, beetaaga okumanya abatta abantu baabwe.” Omutanda bwe yasabye. Kinajjukirwa nti olwaleero guweze omwezi mulamba bukyanga abantu abasoba mu 50 battibwa mu kwekalakaasa okwaliwo mu Museenene nga beekalakaasa olw’okukwatibwa kwa Bobi Wine bwe yali anoonya akalulu e Luuka. Ssaabasajja era yasinzidde wano n’asiima abakozi be mu bitongole ebyenjawulo olw’okukola obutaweera okulaba nga bakulaakulanya Obuganda. Ku mukolo guno, Empologoma esiimye okusanyusibwamu n’ennyimba z’amazaalibwa ga Yesu Kuristo 2020, omukolo ogukolebwa ebitongole by’Obwakabaka n’okusiimirako abaweerezza obulungi mu bitongole bino. Ate ye Kamalabyonna wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, ku mukolo guno kwe yasinzidde neyeebaza abakozi mu Bwakabaka abakoze emirimu gy’Embuga wakati mu kusoomoozebwa kw’ekirwadde kya Covid-19. Yaloopedde Omutanda emirimu egitaasobose kukolebwa olwa Ssennyiga Corona. Katikkiro yasiimye abantu ba Buganda abasobodde okujjumbira emirimu n’enteekateeka z’Embuga wakati mu kusoomoozebwa kwa nnawookeera omukambwe. Ku mukolo guno, Kamalabyonna yakwasizza abakozi b’omwaka 2020 okuva mu bitongole by’Obwakabaka, engule eyabanjuliddwa Omuk. Anthony Wamala omukubiriza w’olukiiko lw’abakulira ebitongole by’Obwakabaka. Abalabirizi okuli ow’e Namirembe, Wilberforce Kityo Luwalira n’Omulabirizi wa West Buganda, Henry Katumba Tamale, baasabye abeetabye ku mukolo guno okwerinda ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona era bafube okukuuma eddembe n’okuteekawo obwenkanya mu kiseera ky’ebyokulonda kye tugendamu. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako Nnaabagereka Sylvia Nagginda, Nnamasole Margaret Ssiwoza, abamyuka ba Katikkiro, baminisita okuva mu Bwakabaka wamu n’abakulira ebitongole by’Obwakabaka ebyenjawulo. Oluvannyuma Omutanda yasiimye n’akoleeza omumuli gwa Ssekukkulu. Abaasiimiddwa kuliko; Victoria Babirye Kakooza owa Majestic Brands, Robert Kamoga owa BBS Terefayina, Nabatanzi Yudayah owa Buganda Heritage and Tourism Board, Namuyimba Henry Brian okuva mu Buganda Land Board n’abalala.

headline: Ssaabalamuzi alagidde Bobi Wine eby’okuggyayo omusango abifulumye mu kyapa gavumenti
text: Kampala Pulezidenti w’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine, ng’ayita mu bannamateeka be ku Lwokusatu awadde kkooti ensonga mukaaga lwaki asazeewo okuggyayo omusango gwe yawaabira Museveni ng’awakanya ebyava mu kalulu k’Obwapulezidenti aka 2021. Ssaabalamuzi Alfonse Owiny Dollo  Okusookera ddala Kyagulanyi ategeezezza kkooti nti okusalawo kuno akukoze awatali kugulirirwa oba okubaako okutegeeragana kwonna kwatuukako wakati we n’abo be yawaabira okuli Pulezidenti Museveni, akakiiko k’ebyokulonda wadde Ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti. “Okusalawo kw’omuwaabi tekulina gye kwekuusaamu ku kugulirirwa oba enteeseganya zonna okuva mu bawawaabirwa oba omuntu yenna omulala.” Ekiwandiiko ekisaba okuggyayo omusango bwe kisomye. Kyagulanyi eyali omuyimbi n’ayingira eby’obufuzi, ekirala agamba nti abajulizi be bayigganyizibwa ab’ebyokwerinda ng’abamu bawambiddwa ate abalala ne batulugunyizibwa ku biragiro by’abantu abakolera Museveni ne Ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti. Bobi Wine alumiriza ebitongole okuli poliisi ne NIRA okumalako abawagizi be n’abajulizi b’alina emirembe nga babanoonyerezaako n’okubatambulirako. Kyagulanyi annyonnyodde nti amateeka agafuga empaaba y’omusango gw’okulonda ogukwata ku Pulezidenti gamulemesa okukola ennongoosereza mu mpaaba ye olw’obudde, ekintu ekyataataganyizza omusango gwe. Ensonga endala gy’awadde kwe kuba nti amagye ne poliisi baazingako ekitebe ky’ekibiina kye ku biragiro bya Pulezidenti Museveni ne Ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti, ekyamulemesa okukung’aanya obujulizi mu budde. Bobi Wine agamba nti akadde ke yamala ng’aggaliddwa mu maka ge, kaamufiiriza obudde okunoonya obujulizi kyokka ate kkooti ensukkulumu eremedde ku ky’okugaana okumwongera obudde, ekintu ekifudde omusango gwe omuzibu. Ezo waggulu ze zimu ku nsonga kwe yeesigamizza okusaba kwe n’agamba nti taguliriddwa wadde okubaako enteeseganya zonna ze yeenyigiramu n’abo be yawaabira. Oluvannyuma lw’okuwuliriza ensonga za Kyagulanyi ezisengekeddwa bannamateeka be abakuliddwa Medard Sseggona, Ssaabalamuzi Alfonse Owiny Dollo, ategeezezza nti okusaba kuno kulina okutimbibwa era kukubibwe mu kyapa kya gavumenti nga tekunnawulirwa. Ssaabalamuzi asabye Sseggona okuleeta ekirayiro ky’omuwaabi ekikakasa nti aggyeeyo omusango ng’olwaleero terunnaziba.

headline: Kidandala asigale ku mirimu gy’ekibiina, talina kyanona mu Palamenti – Sseggiriinya
text: Bya Gladys NanyombiKawempe Olutalo lwa ani atwala kkaadi y’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) mu kitundu kya Kawempe North, lulanze ng’abantu ababiri abalusigaddemu buli omu alaga nga bw’asinza ku munne enkizo mu by’obufuzi.  Embiranye kati eri wakati wa kkansala wa Kawempe North ku lukiiko lwa KCCA n’akulira okuteekerateekera ekibiina kya NUP, Sulaiman Kidandala oluvannyuma lw’Omubaka Latif Ssebaggala okusalawo okwesimba ku bwa Loodimmeeya wa Kampala mu kalulu ka 2021. Kkansala Sseggiriinya yategeezezza nti, abantu b’e Kawempe beetaaga omuntu anaasobola okutuusa ensonga zaabwe mu Palamenti n’okutereeza ebyo byonna ebyasoba. “Bonna be ng’enda okuvuganya nabo mbasinga obukugu mu by’obufuzi kubanga abantu b’e Kawempe mbaluddemu era nze mmanyi kye beetaaga. kino kitegeeza nti nze omuntu omutuufu asobola okutuula mu kifo kino kubanga n’akoze dda okwebuuza okuva mu balonzi nebansuubiza okumpa obululu,” Sseggiriinya bweyategeezezza. Sseggiriinya yannyonnyodde nti, Kidandala alina bingi by’akwasaganya bingi naddala emirimu gy’ekibiina ng’okujja mu lwokaano luno abeera agattise emirimu mingi. “Kidandala asooke atuukirize ensonga z’ekibiina ez’okufuula Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi Pulezidenti w’eggwanga naye bw’alemerako simugaana kwesimbawo kubanga ddembe lye ate simutya kubanga munafu.” Sseggiriinya bwe yagambye. Yannyonnyodde nti, abadde tamanyi nti waliwo abantu abalala abeesimbyewo ku kifo kino nga bali ku kkaadi ya NUP era eno y’ensonga lwaki yakubisa n’ebipande nga kuliko akabonero ka manvuuli. Wabula Kidandala yategeezezza nti, yali kkansala era abantu b’e Kawempe North omuntu gwe bandyagadde addire Latif Ssebaggala si mulala wabula Kidandala kubanga y’ategeera ensonga. Kidandala yannyonnyodde nti, wadde ekibiina ki NUP tekinnasalawo ani agenda kukwata bbendera naye mwetegefu okugendera ku kusalawo kw’ekibiina era kyonna ekinaava mu kamyufu ky’agenda okugenderako. “ Sijja kulekulira kibiina singa mba mpanguddwa mu kamyufu olw’ensonga nti mbadde mu by’obufuzi okumala emyaka etaano era ekyo tekijja kummalamu mmanyi”, Kidandala bwe yategeezezza. Kidandala yawabudde Sseggiriinya akimanye nti si y’amusalirawo era akimanye nti abantu abakwasanya ebintu ebingi be basinga okubaamu omugaso era nti omuntu omunafu nebwabeera ebintu ebitono bimulema okukwasaganya. Ekibiina kya NUP kikyasanze okusoomoozebwa olwa bantu abangi abaagala kkaadi ku bifo eby’enjawulo era nga waliwo n’abavuddeyo nebeekubira enduulu nga bwe waliwo abatandise okukanda abantu ssente babawe kkaadi. Akulira ekibiina kino, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu yavaayo n’alabula akakiiko akasunsula abeesimbyewo obutagezaako kulya nguzi ku muntu yenna kubanga kino kitattana ekifaananyi ky’ekibiina. Kati abalonzi b’ekitundu kya Kawempe North balinze kuwulira kiva mu kibiina ku ani anaaba alondeddwa okukwatira ekibiina bbendera wakati wa Sseggiriinya ne Kidandala.

headline: Omulangira Wasajja asabye abavubuka okunnyikiza emirimu egizza Buganda ku ntikko
text: Omulangira David Kintu Wasajja asabye abavubuka wonna mu Buganda okunnyikira okukola emirimu egisobola okuzza Buganda ku ntikko awamu n’okutumbula embeera z’abantu ba Kabaka. Obubaka buno bubaweereddwa omulangira David Kintu Wasajja wabadde asisinkanye olukiiko olufuzi olw’ abavubuka mu Buganda olwa Buganda Youth Council ku Lwokubiri mu Masengere e Mmengo. “Ekitiibwa kya Buganda kiri mu bantu ba Ssaabasajja, tetuyinza kwenyumiriza mu bizimbe byetulaba wano nga abantu baffe tebali bulungi, tulina okubazimba mu bulamu bwabwe, okubeera obulungi. Mwebale ensonga za Buganda butazisuula muguluka kubanga emyaka gyammwe waliwo bingi ebyandibabuziza,” Omulangira bwe yagambye. Ono abeebazizza olw’ obumu bwebolesa mu buweereza okutwala abavubuka ba Buganda mu maaso kyokka nabasaba okwewala ebisomoozo okubaggya ku mulamwa wabula nga abakulembeze bateme empenda engeri y’okubivuunuka okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa obwabakwasibwa. Ssentebe w’Abavubuka mu Buganda Baker Ssejjengo amwanjulidde Alipoota omuli ebituukiddwako era nalambulula nebyo ebyokusibwako essira omwaka guno okulaba nga Abavubuka bongera okuyitimuka wonna mu Buganda.

headline: Dr.  Kawanga Ssemogerere aziikiddwa,  bamutendereza olw’obwesimbu
text: Abakungubazi ab’enjawulo okuva mu Gavumenti eyawakati neya Ssaabasajja Kabaka omubadde bannabyabufuzi ne bannaddiini baakedde Nattale e Nkumba mu Busiro okuwerekera eyaliko Ssenkaggale wa Democratic Party (DP), Dr. Paul Kawanga Ssemogerere eyafa ku nkomerero ya wiiki ewedde. Obubaka bwa pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni busomeddwa Ssaabaminista Rt. Hon. Robinah Nabbanja, era amwebazizza olw’okukkiriza n’aweereza ne gavumenti eno eriko mu biseera nga kye baggye bajje mu obuyinza ne wankubadde nga ye yali wa Democratic Party. Museveni asaasidde nnyo Nnamwandu n’abenju olw’okufiirwa Dr. Ssemwogerere. Ku lw’Obwakabaka, Katikkiro, Owek. Charles Peter Mayiga, atenderezza nnyo omugenzi Dr. Paul Kawanga Ssemwogerere olw’okubeera munnabyabufuzi omuntumulamu era omwesimbu. Mukuumaddamula Mayiga annyonnyodde nti ennaku zino, sikyangu okusanga munnabyabufuzi nga muntumulamu, mwetoowaze, mwesimbu, ate ng’agatta abantu, nga Ssemwogerere bw’abadde.  “Bannabyabufuzi bangi bye boogera si bye batambulirako, abamu banoonya bitiibwa na buyinza, nebeerabira obuvunaanyizibwa obubijjirako ate kiri mu gavumenti nabaagala okutwala obuyinza,” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye. Ono asabye bannabyabufuzi okufuba okunyweza obuntubulamu kuba webutali wabaawo bwannakigwanyizi; buluvu; kkabyo, n’emize emirala mingi egizingamya eggwanga lyaffe.  Abakuutidde okukimanya n’okutegeera nti eby’obufuzi si kazannyo, wabula buvunaanyizibwa. Kuba bwe bikwatibwa obubi, bitwaliramu obulamu bw’abantu, so ng’ate bwe bikwatibwa obulungi, bikulaakulanya eggwanga. Katikkiro Mayiga yeebazizza nnyo omugenzi olw’amaanyi geyassa mu kaweefube ow’okuzzaawo Obwakabaka, naddala mu kiseera nga Omutanda akyali Ssaabataka.  Ye omukulu w’ekika ky’Olugave, Omutaka Grace Musoke Ssemakula, yeebazizza nnyo omugenzi olw’engeri gy’abadde awagiramu ekika, ate ng’abadde omu ku beebuuzibwako eby’ennono ebikwata ku kika eky’olugave. Oweek. Joseph Mulwanyammuli Ssemwogerere, ow’essiga lya Ggere mu kika ky’Olugave e Ssese, omugenzi mw’abadde asibuka, atenderezza nnyo omugenzi olw’obwetoowaze bwe, obweyolekedde ennyo mu mukiibwa ky’abadde amuwa ng’owessiga, newankubadde nga yali kitaawe. Agambye nti bajja kumusaalirwa nnyo kuba gwegubadde omuzinga gwabwe ogw’emirembe; ogw’obuntubulamu; ogw’obukulembeze, ate omutabaganya.  Dr. Ssemogerere akubiddwa emizinga 17 okusiima emirimu gyakoledde eggwanga okusobola okunyikiza Demokulaasiya n’enfuga ey’ amateeka. Omukolo gwetabiddwako Ssaabaminisita Rt. Hon. Robbina Nabbanja; Katikkiro wa Buganda; Bakatikkiro Abaawummula; Baminisita okuva mu Gavumenti eyawakati n’ey’e Mengo, Bannabyabufuzi ab’enjawaulo; Bannaddini; abakungu n’abantu abalala bangi nnyo.

headline: Buganda yaakuddamu okugema abantu COVID-19 – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ategeezezza nti Obwakabaka bugenda kuddamu okugema abantu ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona (COVID-19) okuyambako okukuuma abantu nga balamu wakati ng’eggwanga ligguddwamu.  Okwongera bino Katikkiro Mayiga abadde atongoza kaweefube w’okukyusa  endowooza y’abantu eri ensoma y’abaana mu Uganda mu bimuli bya Bulange ku Lwokubiri.  “Obwakabaka buteeseteese okugema nga kwe twalina omwaka oguwedde. Ku mulundi guno okugema kugenda kutwalibwa mu masaza ag’enjawulo, kyemuva mulaba nga Minisita wa gavumenti ez’ebitundu tuli naye wano.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’ategeezezza.  Enteekateeka eno yaakubaawo nga 29 ne 30 Gatonnya 2022 mu masaza gonna aga Buganda. Owek. Mayiga akubiriza abantu bonna abatannaba kwegemesa okujjumbira enteekateeka eno naddala abasomesa n’abakola mu masomero gano awamu n’abayizi abasusizza emyaka 18.  Ku nsonga y’amasomero agagguddwawo, Katikkiro Mayiga asabye abazadde okuggyamu abaana endowooza ya bw’ofuna ssente tekikwetaagisa kuddayo kusoma.  Era abayizi abasabye okumanya nti okugenda ku ssomero tekuba kunoonya  bugagga naye okumanya n’obugunjufu, era buvunaanyizibwa bw’abazadde okumanya ensonga zino ne bazikolako.  Agasseeko nti obuyigirize nabwo bufuna ate osobola n’okusuubula ng’oli muyigirize.  Mukuumaddamula asabye abazadde okubuulirira abaana, babazzeemu essuubi kuba bamaze akaseera akawera nga tebali ku ssomero.  Owek. Mayiga asabye abantu okusigala nga beerinda ekirwadde kya Corona wakati ng’eggwanga ligguddwawo era beewale okukung’aana era banyikire okwegemesa mu bwangu.  Ate Ssentebe wa bboodi y’ebyenjigiriza mu Buganda, Deborah Zawedde ategeezezza nti Corona akosezza nnyo ebyenjigiriza okumalirira ddala emyaka 2.     Zawedde naye asabye abasomesa okufuba okwegemesa kuba eddagala gyeriri era n’asaba abazadde okukwatagana n’amasomero kibayambe  okuwa emibiri gyabwe amaanyi okulwanyisa endwadde.  Omukolo gwetabiddwako Omukubiriza w’olukiiko lwa Buganda, Owek Patrick Luwaga Mugumbule, Ssaabawolereza w’Obwakabaka Christopher Bwanika nga y’akiikiridde Minisita w’ebyenjigiriza, Owek Dr. Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma, Ssentebe wa Bboodi; Muky. Deborah Zawedde, Owek Kiwuka Viola, ne bannabyanjigiriza okuva mu bitongole by’Obwakabaka ebyenjawulo.

headline: Mutwale nga Musa wa Bayibuli agenda okutuusa bannayuganda mu nsi ensubize – Nobert Mao ku ddiiru gyeyakoze ne Museveni
text: Ssenkaggale w’ekibiina ki Democratic Party (DP), Nobert Mao ategeezezza bannayuganda nti ensi ensubize eri kumpi era ye Musa ayogerwako mu Bayibuli agenda okubatuusaayo nasaba bamunywerereko ayambeko okukyuusa obuyinza mu ddembe. Bino Mao abyogeredde mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire lwatuuzizza ku City House mu Kampala okwogera ku ndagaano gyeyakoze ne Pulezidenti Museveni okukolaganira awamu mwebamulondedde okubeera Minisita wa Ssemateeka n’ekitongole ekiramuzi. “Uganda eri mukwetegekera kukyuusa buyinza kino tukitandiseeko. Ffe nga DP tuyambako kwanguya ku nsonga eno. Ekibuuzo oba naasobola okubeera Pulezidenti ekyo sikyenfaako. Mukkirize mbeere Musa anabatwala mu nsi ensuubize wadde nze sijja kutuukayo,” Ssenkaggale Mao bw’agambye. Okusinziira ku Mao, agenda kusigala ku ludda oluvuganya asobole okutwala bannayuganda mu nsi ensubize era ogwo gwemulimu gwange. Mao agamba nti kyafa sikubeera Pulezidenti wa Uganda naye ajja kufiirawo okulaba nti Uganda eva mu busibe bwemazeemu emyaka 40 nga tagenda kwonoona kadde konna. Mao agamba nti mu byaliko kwekulaba nti obuyinza bukyuuka mu mirembe era DP erina omukisa okuddamu okuwandiika ebyafaayo ng’ekibiina ekyayamba Uganda okukyuusa obuyinza mu mirembe era eno yemu ku nsonga lwaki yagattiddwa ku gavumenti. Ono annyonnyodde nti nga Opozisoni bamaze obudde bungi nga basaba obuyinza bukyuuke naye buli lwebabadde bagezaako nga tewali kyamaanyi kivaayo nalowooza nti ekiseera kituuse okukyuusa ku bukodyo. Mao akizeemu nti DP ekyaliwo era terina gyelaga era nakakasa nti ajja kusigala nga ye Pulezidenti wa DP naye nga ku luno bakweyambisa ne gavumenti okutuukiriza ebigendererwa by’ekibiina. Ono abotodde ebyama ng’ endagaano eno eyateereddwako omukono ne Pulezidenti Museveni bw’amaze omwaka mulamba nokusoba nga ekitegeeza akakiiko akakiiko akatambuza ekibiina nga kano kekakola omulimu ku lw’olukiiko olufuzi olw’ekibiina olwa ‘NEC.’ “ Nali mwesimbu era nabagamba nti njogerezeganya ne Pulezidenti Museveni. Ndi musanyufu n’ekibiina ekitambuza ekibiina kuba okutuuka leero tewali kyama kyonna kyasomolwa, ” Mao bw’alambuludde. Bino webijjidde nga Pulezidenti Mao alindiridde oluyazibwa olunaku lw’enkya mu maka g’Obwapulezidenti Entebbe nga tanatandika mirimu nga Minisita wa Ssemateeka n’ekitongole ekiramuzi.

headline: Obwakabaka bukungubagidde Ssaabasumba Yonah Lwanga
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bukungubagidde Ssaabasumba w’Abasodokisi mu ggwanga, Yonah Lwanga eyafiiridde mu ggwanga lya Buyonaani (Greece) ku Ssande. Katikkiro Mayiga bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku Mmande mu Bulange Mmengo, ategeezezza nti ono abadde ddoboozi ly’abo abanyigirizibwa era ayagala ennyo Kabaka we n’ensi ye Buganda. “Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde omukulembeze w’eddiini asoosowaza obulungi bw’abantu. Abadde alwanirira eddembe ly’obuntu, enfuga entambulira ku mateeka, enkulaakulana n’okutabagana.” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye. Owek. Mayiga agasseeko nga Ssaabasumba Lwanga bw’abadde musajja eyeeyagalira mu nnono n’obuwangwa bwa Buganda kyokka ate nga yeeyagalira bulungi mu nsi Uganda. Mu ngeri yeemu bannabyabufuzi batenderezza abadde Ssaabasumba w’Eklesia y’Abasodokisi mu Uganda, Yonah Lwanga ng’omusajja abadde omumalirivu era eddoboozi ly’abo abanyigirizibwa era ne basaba bannayuganda okumulabirako. Lwanga yafudde ku Ssande ku myaka 76 wabula ng’ebisingawo ku kyavuddeko okufa kwe tekinnategeerekeka. Ayavuganyaako ku bwapulezidenti, Dr. Kizza Besigye amwogeddeko ng’omusajja ateerya ntama era abadde omukulembeze omulungi akadde konna. Okusinziira ku Besigye, Lwanga abadde mumalirivu, eyekkiririzaamu era abadde akola ennyo okulaba nga Uganda ekulaakulana era bw’atyo n’ategeeza nti Uganda efiiriddwa nnyo. Ate Nnampala wa gavumenti, Thomas Tayebwa amwogeddeko ng’omusajja ow’amazima awaddeyo amaanyi ge gonna okuweereza abantu ba Katonda. Omuloodi Erias Lukwago amwogeddeko ng’omusajja awaniridde obwenkanya akadde ke konna. Lwanga yazaalibwa mu 1945 ng’enzikiriza y’Abasodokisi yaakamala okutongozebwa mu Uganda wadde nga yali ebaddewo okuva mu 1900.

headline: Ssaabaminisita Nabbanja atongozza okugabira abantu ssente za COVID
text: Kampala  SsaabaminisitaRobinah Nabbanja atongozza kaweefube wa gavumenti ow’okugabasente eri bannansi abaakosebwa omuggalo, era n’agamba nti we bunaazibira ng’abasinga ssente zino nga zibali mu ngalo. ” Enteekateeka y’okuweereza ssente eri abantu abali mu bwetaavu ngitongozza era nkakasizza nti zijja kutuuka kubanga baziweereza ku ssimu ne nkirabako nti omuntuazifuna bulungi.Tutandise n’ebitundu ebyasobodde okukozesa obwangu mu kuwandiisa abantu kubanga tetusobola kubalinza mbu balinda abo abaakozesa akasoobo.” Ssaabaminisita Nabbanja bw’ategeezezza bannamawulire ku Lwokuna mu Kampala. Okusinziira ku Ssaabaminisita Nabbanja, olwaleero abantu 50 ku 100 ku abo abasunsuddwa bagenda kusula nga ssente bazifunye era bajja kwongerako okusingala ku bwangu abasunsula bwe bagenda okukozesa. Nabbanja ategeezezza nti enkola ya ssente baagipimapiima n’eyokugaba emmere ne kikakasibwa nti okugaba ssente kye kisinga era n’asaba abantu babeere bagumu kubanga tewali muntu ali mu bwetaavu gwe bagenda kuleka bbali. Mu kutongoza kaweefube ono, kirambikiddwa nti nti tewali muntu asobola kusubwa mukisa gwa ssente ng’agwa mu kiti ky’abo abateekeddwa okuzifuna kubanga emiwaatwa gyonna egiyinza okukozesebwa abaagala okuzibba mizibe. Ono asiimye gavumenti n’akakiiko akaateekebwawo okulwanyisa nnawookera w’ekirwadde kya Coronaera n’asaba bannayuganda obutaddiriza mu kugoberera ebiragiro by’abasawo eby’ateekebwawo okulwanyisa obulwadde buno. Mu kutongoza enteekateeka eno, Ssaabaminisitaawerekeddwako abakungu ba gavumenti omuli; omumyuka we owookubiri, Gen. Moses Ali, Minisita w’ebyamawulire Chris Balyomunsi awamu n’abalala.

headline: Minisita Rukutana alina okuvunaanibwa – Pulezidenti Museveni
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni ategeezezza nga Minisita w’abakozi Mwesigwa Rukutana, bwalina okuvunaanibwa olw’okujjirayo abantu emmundu bwebabadde mu kulonda akamyufu ka NRM ku Lwokutaano. Minisita Mwesigwa Rukutana Museveni bino yabitadde ku mukutu gwe ogw’omutimbagano gwa Twitter yanyonyodde nga efujjo n’obuvuyo awamu n’okubba obululu ebyeyolekedde mu kamyufu byonna bigenda kunoonyerezebwako nasuubiza nga bino bwebikomye. Pulezidenti Museveni yategeezezza nti, “Abo abakuba abantu e Bukono bonna bali munda ate abalala badduse. Minisita Rukutana ali mu kkomera era ono n’abalala abenyigidde mu fujjo bagenda kuvunaanibwa; okukuba abantu, okugezaako okutta omuntu n’okutta omuntu n’emirala.” Rukutana yakwatiddwa mu ttuntu ku Lwomukaaga okuva mu makaage e Rushenyi era nga Polly Namaye yategeezezza nga Rukutana n’abakuumi be basatu bwebagenda okuvunaanibwa omusango gw’okugezaako okutta omuntu n’emisango emirala. Minisita Rukutana agambibwa okwetaba mu buvuyo obwaliwo nga bannakibiina e Rushenyi balonda anabakikkirira mu palamenti, okukakkana nga Dan Rwiburingi omuwagizi wa Noame Kabasharira eyali avuganya Rukutana afunye ebisago ebyamanyi ku mutwe natwalibwa mu ddwaliro e Mbarara nga ali mu mbeera mbi. Rukutana nga n’okutuusa kati akyali munda asuubirwa okuleetebwa mu kkooti leero ku Mmande era avunaanibwe wamu n’abakuumi be. Ku Lwomukaaga Rukutana yavaayo nategeeza nga bwatanakuba ku muntu ssasi naye waliwo akatambi akakyatambula ku mitimbagano nga kamulaga nga asika ku mukuumi we emmundu nga bwawera nga gwaliko gwagenda okukuba.

headline: Ssaabalabirizi alabudde bannabyafuzi abajeemedde ebiragiro bya Corona
text: Kampala Ssaabalabirizi w’ekkanisa ya Uganda, Stephen Kazimba Mugalu, alaze okutya ku bannabyabufuzi abasazeewo okujeemera ebiragiro by’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda ne Minisitule y’ebyobulamu, nebasalawo okusisinkana abantu kyere mu mbeera eno eya Ssennyiga Corona. Ssaabalabirizi Kazimba Mugalu nga akwasibwa ebyawereddwayo Bino Kazimba yabyogeredde ku mukolo ng’akwasibwa ebyeyambisibwa mu kutangira Corona okuli; obuuma obupima ebbugumu, eddagala eritta akawuka n’ebirala okuva mu ‘Protestant Medical Bureau’. “Ekirwadde kya Corona kya ddala, si byabufuzi, si bigambo bya bannaddiini era tukirwanyise nga twambala obukookolo naye n’okutuusa kati olaba bannabyabufuzi nga bakuba enkung’aana awatali kwambala bukookolo.” Ssaabalabirizi Kazimba bw’agambye. Ssaabalamuzi Kazimba ategeeezezza nti bannabyabufuzi balemeddwa okuteekawo enkung’aana, okwambala masiki n’okunaaba mu ngalo nga bakuba enkung’aana. Ssaabalabirizi Kazimba yeebazizza olw’ettu lino era ne yeebaza gavumenti olw’okwongera ku muwendo gw’abantu abalina okubeera mu masinzizo okutuuka ku bantu 200. Omukungu wa Protestant Medical Bureau, James Mwesigwa, ategeezezza nti balabye obwetaavu bw’okuwaayo ebintu bino okuyambako ku kkanisa ku mulimu gw’okukuuma abakkiriza nga balamu. Ebikyasembyewo okufulumizibwa Minisitule y’ebyobulamu biraga nti abantu 14, 704 be baakakwatibwa ate ng’abantu 133 bo entamu ezaabwe zawedde dda okufunikibwa ate 7836 basimbuddwa oluvannyuma lw’okussuuka.

headline: Enkwe n’ Emivuyo mu NRM bingobye mu by’obufuzi – Godfrey Nyakana
text: Abadde Ssentebe wa NRM mu Kampala Godfrey Nyakana Kampala Abadde Ssentebe w’ekibiina ki National Resistance Movement (NRM) mu Kampala Godfrey Nyakana, agamba nti enkwe n’emivuyo egiri mu NRM gimugobye mukulonda era tagenda kuddamu kwesimbawo. Nyakana nga abadde yeegwanyizza kifo kya Loodimeeya wa Kampala, bino yabitegeezezza omusasi wa Gambuuze ku Lwokusatu mu mboozi eyakafubo. Nyakana yagambye nti,“Nakalulu akaggwa aka CEC mwalimu katemba mungi nnyo, nali mpangula okuva ssaawa nga 4 ez’okumakya mpaka 11, bwezatuuka 3 ez’ekiro nebikyuka. Ensonga eri emu nti sigenda kwesimbawo mu kalulu akajja era ndowooza mpereza ekimala okuva mu 1998.” Ono alumiriza abakulu abatuula ku kakiiko k’ebyokulonda mu NRM akakulirwa Dr. Tanga Odoi okukulembeza ssente mu buli kyebakola nga tebakyagoberera mateeka ate nga tewali ayinza kubagambako. Wabula ono yakiggumiza nga bwasigadde mu kibiina ki NRM era nga wakukinoonyeza obululu nga omuntu wa bulijjo kiwe abalala omukisa okuwereza. Kinajjukirwa nti Nyakana abadde yakamala okuwangulwa Singh Katongole ku kukikirira Kampala ku lukiiko lwa CEC, akalulu kagamba nti kaalimu ebirumira. Nyakana yalabudde nga eryanyi ly’emmundu erisusse mu NRM bwerigenda okusanyaawo ekibiina singa abakulu mukyo tebabaako kyebakolawo mu bwangu. Wabula omwogezi wa NRM Rogers Mulindwa yaggumiza abawagizi b’ekibiina mu Kampala nga ekya Nyakana okunyuka eby’obufuzi bwekitalina ddibu lye kigenda kuteekawo mukibiina. Mulindwa yanyonyodde nti, “Nyakana aleme kwekwasa kubanga akamyufu tugenda kukalonda ku Lwakutaano kati y’ emivuyo agirabye atya, ekyo aleme kyekwasa. Wewuunye ne CEC bamuwangula ate nga yeyali mukifo kino. ” Ensonga za Nyakana ziwagiddwa Capt. Francis Babu nga ono yasoose nakusekamu nategeeza nga egimu ku mivuyo egibadde mu Kampala Nyakana bwagibaddemu. Babu yagambye nti abakola emivuyo bakozesa ssente, okutiisatiisa n‘okubba wabula nga abantu bano batono naye nga ebigendererwa byabwe bya kusuubulira mukibiina ekigenda okukinafuya. Ekya Nyakana okuva mu by’obufuzi kitadde ekibiina ki NRM naddala mu Kampala mu kattu wakati nga akamyufu kabulako ssaawa busaawa, olwokaano lwa Loodimeeya lusigaddemu John Ssebaana n’Omuyimbi Moses Kazibwe amanyiddwa nga Ragga Dee

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga atongozza ekitundu ky’omwaka B eky’ Emmwaanyi Terimba, abakuutidde ku mutindo
text: Mukuumaddamula Charles Peter Mayiga azzeemu okukuutira abalimi b’eggwanga mu ggwanga okufaayo ku mutindo gwazo nga batandikira ku ndokwa zebafuna okusimba bweba bakufuna mu mulimu guno. Okwogera bino Katikkiro Mayiga abadde ku bizinga by’e Ssese ku Lwokubiri nga alambula abalimi baayo, okuggulawo ekyuma ekisunsula emmwaanyi ekya Ssese Coffee Centre awamu nokutongoza omwaka B ogw’ Emmwaanyi Terimba. Mu kulambula kuno Owek. Mayiga asookedde wa Mw. Ssemanda Paul alima nokulunda ku kyalo Mirembe mu ggombolola ye Buyindi ku bizinga bye Kalangala mu Ssese.  “Ayagala okwongera omutindo ku mmwaanyi sibya kusiika kkaawa eyo gyebigwera. Emmwaanyi twagala zamutindo abalimi basobole okufunamu naye kitandikira ku ndokwa zokozesa. Bwoba olowooza eby’ omutindo sookera ku ndokwa okakasa nti zentuufu,” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’alambuludde. Ono era abakuutidde okufaayo ku nnima y’emmwaanyi kuba eno ekwatagana bulungi n’omutindo gw’emmwaanyi kuba ebigimusa nabalimisa abalina obukugu kitegeeza kufuna mu kirime kino. Oluvannyuma Mukuumaddamula yeyongeddeyo okuggulawo ekyuma ekisunsula emmwaanyi ku kyalo Buligo nga lino nalyo lya Ssemanda era ng’ono ataddewo n’emmeresezo y’ Emmwaanyi okusobola okuzituusa kwabo abazeetaaga. Mw. Paul Ssemanda nnanyini nnimiro agamba nti ekyamutandisa ennimiro kusomesa bantu abeeno ababadde ennyo mu kirime eky’ ebinanzi. Katikkiro Mayiga bw’atuuse ku kyalo Kalugulu ewali omuvuzi wa boodabooda Kyeswa Kizza nga naye alima emmwaanyi n’okulunda era abaayo naddala abavubuka ba booda booda abasabye okwettanira ekirime kino.  Bw’abadde ayogerako eri abavubuka be Ssese, Minisita w’Abavubuka, emizannyo n’okwewummuza, Owek Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu asabye abavubuka obutalinda bidde okutandika ku nteekateeka y’okweggya mu bwavu. Mu kwongera okutalaaga ebizinga, alambudde ennimiro y’omwami wa Kabaka ow’eggombolola ya Mutuba II Kalangala ku kyalo Mwena Eugen Kitaatire alina yiika 8 kyokka nga wano wakati mu binazi agamba yassaawo yakusomesezaako bantu yiika emu. Wano Owek. Hajji Amis Kakomo ategeezeza nti obwakabaka bwakwongera okussaawo abalimisa okuyambako abalimi okunyikira mu mmwanyi nga kati Buganda erina abalimisa abasoba mu 600 nga bano bonna balina kulaba nti omutindo gw’ emmwaanyi ezirimibwa mu Buganda gutumbuka. Oluvannyuma lw’okulambula abalimi abawerako, Kamalabyonna Mayiga akubye olukungaana ku mbuga y’essaza era wano watongolezza ekitundu ky’ Emmwaanyi Terimba B nasaba okunyiikira okukola.  Ye omwami w’essaza, Kweeba Augustine Kasirye ayanjulidde Katikkiro alipoota ku mmwanyi namutegeeza nti newankubadde nga ekyuma ekyaaliwo kyasaanawo baasigala balima era basanyufu nti mwami Ssemanda yabateereddewo ekyuma ekisunsula emmwanyi. Mu balala abawerekeddeko Katikkiro Mayiga mu kulambula kuno kuliko; Minisita wamawulire era omwogezi wa Buganda Owek. Noah Kiyimba, Owek. Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo Nassejje awamu n’abakungu abalala.

headline: Omubaka Luttamaguzi asuze mu Kkomera e Kasangati
text: Omubaka wa Nakaseke South mu Palamenti Luttamaguzi Ssemakula n’abawagizi be 22, ku Lwokuna basindikiddwa mu kkomera lye Kasangati mu Wakiso okutuusa nga Septmber 3, lwe banadda okusaba  okusaba okweyimirirwa. Omubaka Luttamaguzi Ssemakula Luttamaguzi  ne banne bakwatiddwa ku Lwokusatu bweyabadde ku kyalo Wakasanke ku luguudo oluva e Matugga okudda e Semuto nga agenda okukola Bulungibwansi mu ttawuni kkanso ye Semuto. Oluvanyuma yatwaliddwa ku poliisi ye Butalangu okutuusa ku Lwokuna bwasimbiddwa mu maaso g’omulamuzi wa kkooti ento e Nakaseke navunaanibwa okukola ebikolwa ebiyinza okuvaako okusaasaana kw’ekirwadde ki COVID-19. Luttamaguzi avunaaniddwa okukuba olukungaana olumenya amateeka wamu n’okweyisa nga ekitagasa mu bantu. Munnamateeka we Richard Lumu, yategeezezza nga kaweefube wabwe okumweyimirira  ku kakalu ka kkooti bwaggudde obutaka olwo omulamuzi obutabakkiriza kuteekamu kusaba kuno. Ddereva wa Luttamaguzi ayitibwa Samuel Kintu, yanyonyodde nga Omubaka bweyagezezzaako okubuuza poliisi eyabadde emukwata omusango gweyabadde azizza wabula nebatamunyega. Wano abawagizi ba Luttamaguzi bagezezzaako okulemesa poliisi okumukwata, ekyawalirizza poliisi eyabadde eddumirwa Afande Sulait Kitaka okulagira nebabakubamu ttiyaggaasi era nebasaasaana. Omwogezi wa poliisi mukitundu kya Savannah Isah Ssemwogerere, yategezezza nga bwebakutte Luttamaguzi okumulemesa okukuba olukungaana kubanga kyabadde kimenya ebiragiro bya COVID19

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga: Gavumenti tesaana kumenya mateeka nga yeekwasa Ssennyiga  Corona
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda buvumiridde ebikolwa by’ettemu wamu n’okutulugunya abeesimbyewo ekintu ekivuddeko n’abantu abamu okulugulamu obulamu n’esaba bino bikome. Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga asinzidde wano n’agamba nti gavumenti tesaana kumenya mateeka nga yeekwese mu kirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. “Kizibu okukkiriza nti omuwendo ogulina okusasulwa olw’okwewala Ssennyiga 19 kwe kutta abantu oba okubakutulako amagulu nga bwe twalabye oba okubasiba mu makomera n’okubatulugunya.” Owek. Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, bw’alambise bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku mbeera egenda mu maaso mu ggwanga leero ku Lwokuna mu Bulange Mmengo. Owek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti, “Gavumenti egamba nti egezaako kutangira kirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona, ekyamazima obulwadde bwa Ssennyiga Corona bwa mutawaana nnyo naye tekitegeeza nti abo bonna abatagendera ku mateeka ga kisawo balina kuyisibwa nga nsolo za ku ttale,” Mayiga bw’agambye. Katikkiro Mayiga asabye ebikolwa ebimalawo abantu eddembe lyabwe okukomezebwa wadde nga abakuumaddembe balina obuyinza okukwasisa amateeka. “Ffe ng’Obwakabaka twagala ddembe, twagala mirembe mu Uganda naye tetusobola kuba na ddembe nga tulaba ttemu, ttiyaggaasi n’ebikolwa eby’obukambwe.” Kamalabyonna agambye nti ebikolwa eby’obukambwe byongera kutabangula ggwanga era nga tebiritereeza bw’atyo n’asaba gavumenti okulaba nga bikomekezebwa mu bwangu. Avumiridde ebikolwa by’okukuba abantu abatalina kissi kyonna amasasi kubanga bino ebikolwa bya butemu. Owek. Mayiga agamba nti waliwo abantu abaalabiddwako mu Arua ne Gulu nga bayisa ebivvulu kyokka ate ab’e Luuka ne bayisibwa obubi. Asabye wabeewo obwenkanya ku njuyi zombi.

headline: Omulangira Wasajja atabukidde  gavumenti ku kulagajjalira ebyobulamu
text: Kampala – Kyaddondo Omulangira David Kintu Wassajja akyomedde  Gavumenti olwo butasoosowaza byabulamu ng’ezimba amalwaliro  kyokka ssente n’ezimalira mu bintu ebigasa ekitono ng’okugulira ababaka emmotoka ez’obuwanana. “Ensi ezikulaakulanye ozirambira mu kulabirira bantu baayo kuba ggwe bw’oba oli awo naye ng’ekikulu gy’oli kugula mmotoka mpya okusinga eddwaliro mu ndaba eyange ebintu oba obiraba kifulanenge, ne bw’onoofuna emmotoka ey’obukadde 600 naawe osobola okugwa ku kabenje ate ne bakuddusa mu ddwaliro omutali kantu.” Omulangira Wassajja bwe yagambye. Bino Omulangira yabyogeredde mu Kampala  ku mukolo gw’okusonda ensimbi ezigenda okuzimba eddwaliro erigenda okujjanjaba abagudde ku bubenje ku luguudo lw’e Masaka eggulo ku Lwokubiri, ne yennyamira olwa gavumenti okulemwa okuteeka amalwaliro agajjanjaba obukugu ku nguudo ennene ezifuluma ebibuga. Wassajja yannyonnyodde nti enteekateeka eno yaakujuna buli omu era nga esaanye okwenyigirwamu abantu abawera naddala abakozesa oluguudo luno, baleme kukirekera Eklezia Katolika ne banna Rotary. Musinyoori Charles Kasibante Vicar General w’essaza ekkulu erya Kampala yayanjudde enteekateeka n’agamba nti  omulimu gw’eddwaliro lino gwetaaga ensimbi eziri mu buwumbi 8 n’okusoba kyokka nga baakafunako obukadde 750 zokka. Kino kye kyawaliriza abanoonya ssente zino okutegeka emisinde gimubunabyalo era buli anagyetabamu ajja kusasula emitwalo 2 era bannalotale wamu n’abakulu mu Eklezia, wano we basinzidde ne babakunga okwetabamu basobole okuzimba eddwaliro lino. Ye Omwogezi wa Poliisi y’ebidduka mu  ggwanga, Charles Ssebambulidde,  yategeezezza nti abantu abasinga okufa olw’obubenje bafa lwa kubulwa bujjanjabi bwa mulembe mu bwangu kuba wano eddwaliro eririwo lya Gombe Hospital kyokka nga nalyo liri wala. Emisinde gino gyakubaawo ku Lwomukaaga nga 3/07/2021 wali e Kayabwe mu kkooti era ensimbi ezinaavaamu zaakugattibwe ku ezo ezaakafunikawo okuzimba eddwaliro.

headline: Sipiika Kadaga alagidde ekkomera  ly’e Kitalya linoonyerezebweko
text: Kampala Sipiika wa Palamenti, Rebecca Kadaga, alagidde akakiiko akakola ku ddembe ly’obuntu okugenda e Kitalya okunoonyereza ku bigambibwa nti abasibe bangi batulugunyizibwa mu kkomera lino era baleete alipoota ku basibe abaliyo n’embeera mwe bali. Kino kiddiridde omubaka w’ekibuga kya Mityana, Francis Zzaake, okutegeeza Palamenti nti abamu ku bawagizi b’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform abaggalirwa mu kkomera eryo bali mu mbeera mbi nga bangi ku bano bagaanibwa okulaba abasawo okubekebejja. Bino we bijjidde ng’Omubaka omulonde owa Kawempe North, Muhammad Sseggirinya, yaakamala okuddusibwa e Nairobi mu Kenya nga kigambibwa nti ono yatulugunyizibwa byansusso bwe yali mu kkomera e Kitalya. Omubaka Zaake yannyonnyodde nti bwe yagenyiwaddeko mu kkomera e Kitalya okulaba abasibe baabwe, yabasanze mu mbeera mbi era nga beetaaga obujjanjabi obwamangu. “Oluvannyuma lw’okumala akaseera ng’angaaniddwa  okukyala e Kitalya, banzikirizza naye nasanze abawagizi baffe bali mu mbeera mbi nga balumizibwa mu lubuto, baweebwa akawunga akatayidde ate nga n’ebyobuyonjo biri mu mbeera mbi.” Zaake bwe yategeezezza palamenti ku Mmande. Okusinziira ku Zaake, abasibe bwe balwala baweebwa Panadol nga tebafuddeyo ku kituufu ekibaluma. Wano Sipiika Kadaga we yasinzidde n’alagira akakiiko k’eddembe ly’obuntu okugendayo badde ne alipoota. “Twagala alipoota mu bwangu. Njagala okulagira akakiiko k’eddembe ly’obuntu okutunula mu nsonga eno.” Sipiika Kadaga bwe yannyonnyodde.

headline: Tugenda kugondera ekiragiro kya kkooti naye Bobi Wine tujja mukuumirako amaaso – Poliisi
text: Kampala Poliisi y’eggwanga etegeezezza nti egenda kussa ekitiibwa mu kiragiro kya kkooti ekigiragira okuva mu maka g’omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi (Bobi Wine) naye n’etegeeza nti egenda kusigala ng’emukketta n’okumutambulizaako amaaso.  Kino kiddiridde kkooti enkulu mu Kampala okuwa ensala yaayo leero ku Mmande ng’eragira abakuumaddembe okuva mu maka ga Bobi Wine mu bwangu era ono bw’aba alina omusango gwe yazza atwalibwe mu kkooti avunaanibwe. Kyagulanyi yali yasibirwa ewaka we oluvannyuma lw’okulonda era ng’abakuuma ddembe okuli poliisi n’amagye ababadde tebakkiriza muntu yenna ekyawaliriza bannamateeka be okuddukira mu kkooti era nayo n’eyisa ekiragiro. Bw’abadde ayogera ku nsala eno, omwogezi wa poliisi, Fred Enanga, ategeezezza nti wadde tebannafuna kiragiro kino naye bajja kukiteeka mu nkola era bave mu maka ga Kyagulanyi. “Wadde tetunnafuna nsala eno naye ng’ekitongole ekiteeka ekitiibwa mu kkooti era ekikuuma amateeka, tujja kugiteekamu ekitiibwa, ab’ebyokwerinda bajja kuva mu maka g’Omubaka Kyagulanyi.” Enanga bw’agambye. Oludda oluwaabi lwabadde lutegeezezza kkooti ng’okusibira Kyagulanyi ewaka we bwe kyabadde kikoleddwa okumulemesa okukunga abantu okwekalakaasa era n’okumutangira okumenya amateeka kuba atera okukuba enkung’aana ezisobola okutambuza ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. Wabula bino omulamuzi yabigaanye n’ategeeza nti tewali bukakafu ku nsonga eno era bwe baba balina obukakafu bamutwale mu kkooti. Poliisi egamba nti tegenda kuwakanya nsala eno wadde nga bajja kusigala nga balondoola Omubaka Kyagulanyi okusobola okukuuma emirembe. “Tugenda kusigala tututunuulira okukakasa nti tamenya mateeka. Tulina okulaba nti emirembe gikuumibwa kuba gwe mulimu gwaffe okutangira okuzza emisango.” Enanga bw’annyonnyodde. Okusinziira ku Enanga eby’okumulondoola bakikoze okulaba ng’ono tatambangula mirembe gya bannansi era ono asabye Kyagulanyi okugondera ekiragiro kya kkooti agondere ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona.

headline: Minisita Ssekabembe agamba beetaaga ssente nnyingi okutegeka emizannyo
text: Minisita w’abavubuka, emizannyo n’okwewummuza mu Bwakabaka, Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu, ategeezezza nga bwe beetaaga ssente empitirivu okutegeka emizannyo mu Buganda ate ezitaliiwo. Ssekabembe yagambye nti buli mwaka Obwakabaka butegeka emizannyo egiwerako nga ku gino kubaako, emipiira gy’amasaza, ‘Volleyball’, emisinde, amaato n’emirala wabula nga ku murundi guno embeera y’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ezibuwazizza ebintu era nga bagenda kutegekako mitono. Minisita Ssekabambe yannyonnyodde nti olw’obuzibu bw’ensimbi ku mulundi guno bagenda kunokolayo emizannyo esatu gyokka nga gye bagenda okukola. Bino Minisita yabyogeredde mu woofiisi ye ku Bulange e Mmengo bwe yabadde awayaamu n’olupapula lwa Gambuuze. “Teebereza okutegeka omupira e Kabula nga tewagenda kubeera bawagizi mu kisaawe, weetaaga obukuumi obunaatangira abantu obutawaguza kuyingira kisaawe ekijja okwetaagisa ssente ennyingi ate ezitaliiwo.” Ssekabembe bwe yakkaatirizza. Omukulembeze w’eggwanga bwe yabadde akkiriza eby’emizannyo ebizannyirwa mu bifo ng’ebisaawe yategeezezza nti  basobola okuddamu okuzannya naye mu bisaawe temulina kubaamu bawagizi.  Era nga n’abazannyi balina okukeberwa Ssennyiga Corona buli luvannyuma lwa nnaku 14 ekintu bannabyamizannyo kye bagamba nti kya bbeeyi. Minisita yalagidde abazannyi bonna abeetaba mu mizannyo egy’enjawulo egitegekebwa Obwakabaka okutandika okutendekebwa nga bwe basala amagezi okulumba engeri empaka zino nga ez’amasaza bwe zinaatambula. “Tukyali mu kuteesa ku mpaka ezinaazanyibwa omwaka guno, osanga wiiki ejja tunaavaayo n’enteekateeka ku misinde mubunabyalo era mu bwangu akakiiko akavunaanyizibwa ku by’emizannyo mu Bwakabaka kajja kutuula okulaba bwe tunaagoberera ebiragiro bya COVID-19,” Ssekabembe bwe yagasseeko. Gibadde giweze emyezi mukaaga miramba bukya Pulezidenti Museveni aggala eby’emizannyo ng’aziyiza abantu okukung’aana kibayambe okwetaasa ku Ssennyiga Corona.

headline: COVID-19: Museveni aweze entambula y’olukale
text: Omukulembeze eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni   Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni aweze entambula y’olukale yonna mu ggwanga okusobola okulemesa okusaasaana kw’ekirwadde kya COVID-19.  Museveni abadde ayogerako eri eggwanga agambye nti entambula y’okukale omuli takisi, baasi, boda boda eggali y’omukka byabulabe nnyo eri abantu kubanga bigatta abantu abatemanyi.  Museveni agambye anti emmotoka zokka ezigenda okukirizibwa zeezo ezitambuza emmere, ebyamaguzi, emmotoka ezitwala abalwadde, emmotoka z’ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda wamu nezimu ku mmotoka za gavumenti. “Emmotoka zokka ezikkirizibwa zeezo ez’obwannayini naye nga nazo teziteekeddwa kusussa bantu basatu okuli ne dereeva,” Museveni bweyagambye.  Mu birala era Museveni agambye okuva nereero, abasuubuzi mu butale abatatunda byakulya nabo bawereddwa. Museveni agambye newankubadde ng’obutale bubadde bugezezzaako okukuuma obuyonjo n’gokunaaba mungalo bulina abantu bangi. “Musigale ewaka mmwe abatatunda mmere kubanga twagala kukeendeeza mujjuzo mu butale,” Museveni bweyagambye. Omukulembeze w’eggwanga era yategeezezza nti woofiisi za gavumenti zonna eziteetaagisa nnyo nazo zaakuggalwa okujjako abantu abo bokka abeetaagisa ennyo. Mu baayogeddeko kuliko ekitongole ekiwooza ky’emisolo ekya Uganda Revenue Authority. “Ebyamaguzi bikyajja mu Uganda twagala abantu abanaakola ku bantu bano wamu n’okukungaanya emisolo,” Museveni bweyagambye.  Olwaleero abantu abalala bataano balangiriddwa nti bakwatiddwa ekiradde kya Coronavirus.  Abataano bawezezza omuwendo gw’abantu 14 kati abalina COVID-19.

headline: Omwenge gwa Ngule gukomyewo ku katale, Katikkiro Mayiga abasabye obutatamiirukuka
text: Katikkiro Mayiga akakasizza abali baguza kampuni esogola omwenge gwa Ngule muwogo awamu nabo abaali bagutunda nga bwekomyewo mu kibalo kya bizineensi oluvannyuma lwaguno okuddamu okusogolebwa. Obubaka buno Katikkiro Mayiga abubaweeredde mu Bulange e Mengo ku Lwokusatu bw’abadde azza obuggya endagaano naba Uganda Breweries Ltd. okuddamu okusogola omwenge guno. “Kati tukomyewo, tugenda kubatuusaako Ngule yonna gye muli. Kyokka ate, tetwagala munywe kutamiirukuka, wabula okunywako ekisaanidde. Mu Ngule, bangi baganyulwa; abalimi ba muwogo; abamusuubula, ab’ebbaala; n’abaana abaweereza mu mabbaala, bafuna ensimbi ne bakola ku nsonga zaabwe ez’enjawulo. Awonno mutuwagire,” Owek. Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde.  Kamalabyonna Mayiga agamba nti waliwo okusomoozebwa okw’enjawulo emabegako kwebasanga nebayimiriza okutunda Ngule naye kati buli kimu kiteredde era gukomyeewo ku katale. Owek. Mayiga asabye abantu okwettanira okunywa Ngule, n’okumukozesa mu mikolo egy’enjawulo naye nabeewaza okutamiirukuka wabula bakozese ekisaanidde. Ye Omumyuka wa Katikkiro Owookubiri, era Omuwanika wa Buganda, Oweek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa, annyonnyodde nti baafuna ebisomoozo bingi omwali; omusolo omungi, ssaako ne Covid19 nebasalawo okuyimirizaamu. Owek. Wagwa aggumiza abantu ng’ omutindo bweguli omulungi ate nga enteekateeka zonna ziwedde bulungi Ngule asobole okutuuka ku bantu yonna gyebali.  Okusinziira ku Nsibirwa, eno yengeri y’okuwagiramu Obwakabaka nga bagugula ku silingi 2500 zokka. Ssenkulu wa Majestic Brands Limited, Muky. Remmy Kisakye, agambye nti Ngule yabula lwa covid19, era akomyewo ng’alongooseddwamu n’okumulinnyisa omutindo. Ku lwa Uganda Breweries Limited, Omuk. Eunice Waweru, akulira eby’ensimbi, agumizza Obwakabaka, ku ngeri gye bagenda okutundamu Ngule, nga beeyambisa ebirowoozo eby’enjawulo bye bafunye ku nsonga eyo. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako, Ssentebe wa Bboodi ya Majestic Brands Omuk. Robert Nsereko, n’abakungu okuva mu Uganda Breweries Ltd.

headline: Biibino by’obadde tomanyi ku Ssaabasumba Jeronymos Muzeeyi ow’Abasodokisi
text: Ssaabasumba omuggya ow’Eklesia y’Abasodokisi, His Eminence Metropolitan Jeronymos Muzeeyi, yatikkiddwa olunaku lw’eggulo ku Ssande era bino bye bimu ku bitonotono ebimukwatako. Ssaabasumba Jeronymos Muzeeyi yazaalibwa nga 18 March 1962 ku kyalo Bulopa mu disitulikiti y’e Kamuli mu maka g’Omwami Augustinos Kakombe n’Omukyala Agnes Biribawa era nga ye mwana omuberyeberye mu baana 4. Ono okusoma kwe yakutandikira ku Kisaka Primary School gye yava ne yeeyunga ku Chwa II Memorial College e Kololo ng’eno gye yamalira secondary wakati w’omwaka 1969 ne 1984. Mu 1985 yagenda ku ssomero lya Seminario yaba Orthodox mu ggwanga lya Kenya era ng’eno yakolako ng’omutegesi w’ebitabo. Mu 1986 yagenda mu ssetendekero wa Anthens mu Buyonani n’akuguka mu by’eddiini era n’abikonolamu ddiguli mu 1995. Ng’avuddeyo yatikkirwa Obudyankoni era wakati w’omwaka 1996 ne 1997 n’alondebwa okubera Vicar General w’essaza ly’Ekeresia ery’e Kampala ne Uganda yonna era oluvannyuma lw’omwaka gumu n’alondebwa okubeera Vicar General wa Bukoba e Tanzania. Nga 24 November 1999 yalondebwa ku kifo ky’obwabisopu era n’atikkirwa nga 11 December 1999 okuweereza mu ssaza ly’Eklesia erya Bukobamu Tanzania okutuusa mu 2007. Eno gye yalinnyisibwa okutuuka ku kifo ky’obwa Metropolitan okuweerezae Mwanza n’obugwanjuba bwa Tanzania ng’eno gye yalondeddwa olukiiko lwa Holy Synod ya Alexandria ne Africa yonna okubeera Ssaabasumba w’essaza ly’Eklesia eya Kampala nga 12 January 2022. Mu buweereza bwe e Tanzania, Ssaabasumba Muzeeyi alina by’atuuseeko omuli okuggulawo Eklesia empya, okubatiza abakkiriza abapya abasoba mu mitwalo 3, okutikkira abasumba, okuzimba Eklesia ezisoba mu 100 ssaako okulabirira abali mu bwetaavu omuli bamulekwa, bannamwandu n’abakadde. Ono era asobodde okuzimba amalwaliro e Bukoba, okuzimba amasomero n’okuweerera abaana, okuzimba amazzi ag’omulembe ssaako okuzimba ekkakkalabizo ly’emirimu eriweza obugazi bwa ssikweya mmita 2000. Metopolitan Jeronymos Muzeeyi era mukugu mu nnimi eziwerera ddala 5 okuli; Oluyonani, Oluzungu, oOluswayiri, Olugandan’Olusoga.

headline: Siri Munyarwanda, naye nebwembeera – Pulezidenti Museveni
text: Kampala Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni avuddeyo nawakkanya ebyogerwa abantu ku mutimbagano nga bwali enzaalwa ye Rwanda. Museveni bweyabadde nga ayanukula Mwoyo gwa Ggwanga ku mutimbagano muttuntu ku Lwokuna yagambye nti ye Munnayuganda Omunyankole era tabeerangako Munyarwanda.  “Ekisooka, Siri Munyarwanda. Ndi Musiita era mmange ye Mweene Rukaari era nebwokebera emabega yonna okuviira ddala ku ntandikwa y’ensi tosobola kunsangamu kasaayi Kanyarwanda,” Museveni bweyategeezezza Ggwanga. Kino kyaddiridde abantu abenjawulo ku wiiki ewedde, okutambuza ebiwandiiko ebigambibwa okulaga obuzaale bwa Gen. Muhoozi Kainerugaba nga biraga nga Kitaawe Museveni bwazaalibwa e Rwanda. Museveni yanyonyodde nti, naye nebwekyandibadde ekituufu nga Munyarwanda tekirina makulu ga njawulo gekikola kubanga NRM etunuulira Africa so ssi amawanga amatono wadde Uganda yokka. “Naye nze nga omuntu, nina ab’enganda bangi abanyarwanda era nga bano baava mu kuwasangana,” Museveni bweyalambudde. Museveni yakakasizza nga Abanyarwanda bwebali abamu ku mawanga ganaansangwa agakola Uganda eyawamu, kubanga ekitundu kye Kisoro okusooka kyali Rwanda wadde nga abafuzi b’amatwale bakiteeka Uganda nga batondawo ensalo za Uganda. Yagasseeko nti n’ebitundu nga Mpororo, Omutara nabyo byateekebwa e Rwanda naye nga byali birina kubeera Uganda. “Bingi ku bika bya Bahororo byava mu Omutara; Abagina okuva e Kichwamba, Bakimbiri okuva e Rutuungu n’abalala. Abalala kuliko ebika bya Bakurungu, Baturungu, Baturagara n’ebirala abagmbibwa okuva mu Omutara, nakatundu ke Katuna kun nsalo y’e Rwanda ne Uganda kajjudde Bakiga,” Museveni bweyalambuludde. Museveni yanyonyodde nti okuviira ddala ku ntandikwa abantu mu bitundu bino babadde bakolagana wadde nga abakulembeze b’ensikirano ababeerangawo bateekangawo entalo wakati waabwe.

headline: Dubai  ekkiriza ennyonyi eziva mu Uganda
text: Eggwanga lyaUnited Arab Emirates (UAE) lirangiriddenga bwe likkiriza ennyonyi eziva e Uganda okutandika ne Mmande, January 10, 2022. Mu kiwandiiko ekifulumiziddwa eri abasaabaze abakozesa ennyonyi za Fly Dubai era obwateereddwa ku mutimbagano gwa kkampuni eno, waliwo enkyukakyuka ezikoleddwa okukkiriza entambula eziva e Uganda. “Tuzzeemu okukola eng’endo zaffe okulaga e Dubai era tukola kyonna okukakasa nti singa otambula naffe ojja kubeera bulungi. Okutandika ne Mmande January nga 10 eng’endo zaffe eziva e Ntebe zigenda kuddamu.” Ekiwandiiko bwe kisomye. Eng’endo eziva e Dubai okugenda e Dubai zaali zayimirizibwa nga Desemba 2021 ekyaleka abatambuzenga basobeddwa. Okusinziira ku bukkwakulizoobupya obuleeteddwa eri abasaabaze abagenda e Dubai balina okubeera ne kkaadi eraga nti bakebereddwa ne batasangibwamu kirwadde kino okuva mu gamu ku malwaliro ageesigika mu bbanga eritasukka 48 mwe baagala okutambulira awamu n’obukwakkulizo obulala. Bano olutuuka e Dubai baakuddamu okukeberebwa era singa banaasangibwamu ekirwadde baakwetwala mu kalatiini okutuusa nga bazzeemu okukeberebwa ne kizuulibwa nti balamu. Ebiragiro bino tebikwata ku bannansi ba UAE abava mu Uganda era eggwanga lino lyakakasizza nti amawanga amalala agaali gakaligiddwa envumbo ekyaliwo. Ku mawanga gano kuliko; Angola, Botswana, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, the Republic of the Congo, Eswatini, Ethiopia, Ghana, Guinea, Kenya, Lesotho, Mozambique, Namibia, Nigeria, Rwanda, South Africa, Tanzania ne Zimbabwe.

headline: Poliisi ekutte boda  291 mu Kampala lwakujeemera biragiro bya Museveni
text: Omwogezi wa Poliisi Fred Enanga Poliisi mu Kampala ekutte boda boda 291 lwakujeemera biragiro by’omukulembeze w’eggwanga.  Kulw’okusatu, Museveni yawera boda boda okutambula nga zisusse essaawa munaana ez’emisana. Omwogezi wa poliisi mu ggwanga, Fred Enanga yategeezezza nti  bano bajjiddwa mu bitundu by’e Kampala n’emirirwano. Enanga yagambye nti tebagenda kuttira muntu yenna ku liiso ng’abassa ekiragiro kya Museveni mu nkola. “Buli boda boda gyetukwata, tugenda kulwawo okugibaddiza kubanga bajja kuddamu okuzikozesa mu kumenya amateeka,” Enanga bweyagambye. Museveni ayisizza ebiragiro ebye’njawulo ebisukka mu 33 okusobola okutangira ensaasaana ya kawuka ka Coronavirus.

headline: Mao aweze okuteekawo enkola y’okwogerezanya okulwanyisa okutyoboola eddembe ly’obuntu
text: Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku ssiga eddamuzi n’ensonga za Ssemateeka, Norbert Mao ategeezezza nti wakukola kyonna okuteekawo enkola y’okuwuliziganya okusobola okulwanyisa ebikola ebityoboola eddembe ly’ obuntu mu ggwanga. Mao bino abituuseeko bw’abadde ayogera ku alipoota y’akakiiko ka Palamenti ak’ eddembe ly’obuntu eya 2020 – 2022 eraga eddembe ly’obuntu bweriyimiridde mu ggwanga. Kinajjukirwa nti alipoota eno yayisibwa Palamenti eyawamu ku Lwokuna nga 18, August 2022 nga yali eraga okulinyirira eddembe ly’obuntu wekutuuse mu ggwanga. Ekimu ku bikolwa ebinokoddwayo alipoota eno kwekulumbibwa awamu n’okukwatibwa kw’omukulembeze w’Obusinga bwa Rwenzururu okwaliwo mu 2016 okwakolebwa aba UPDF awamu ne Poliisi. Mao agamba nti ku nsonga nga zino eggwanga lyetaaga okuwonya kuba ebiwundu bingi ebyasigala ku mitima gy’ abantu. “Bwetuba twagala okumalawo ensibuko y’ebikolwa bino tulina okusukka ku magezi agatuweebwa ab’ akakiiko abakola alipoota eno. Tulina okwogera ne bannayuganda, tulina okutuukira ddala ku kizibu era kino tekigenda kukolebwa bannabyabufuzi. Minisitule eriko enteekateeka gyekolako okuwonya ebiwundu bino ebyava ku kutulugunnyizibwa,” Mao bw’agambye. Mao era avumiridde ebikolwa by’okutulugunya abasibe awamu nokubasibira mu bifo ebitamanyiddwa kyagamba nti ennyingo nnamba 24 eya Ssemateeka w’eggwanga ekigaana. Ono asabye bannayuganda okukolera awamu okulaba nti ebikolwa bino bikomezebwa mu bwangu era nasaba Palamenti ekulemberemu ku nsonga eno. Ku nsonga y’emisango egikandaalira, Mao annyonnyodde nga bwebali mu nteekateeka y’okwongera ku balamuzi okulwanyisa ekizibu kino. Omu ku batuula ku kakiiko kano, omubaka wa Munisipaali ye Bugiri, Asuman Basalirwa olunwe alusimbye mu bitongole by’ebyokwerinda nga bino bikozesebwa abanene mu ggwanga okutyoboola eddembe lya bannansi. Ye omubaka wa Busiki mu Palamenti, Paul Akamba annyonnyodde nti emisinde eddembe ly’obuntu kwerityobolerwa mu ggwanga eraga akabi akoolekedde bannansi.

headline: Buluuli ekubye Kabula Ggoolo 5-2
text: Ttiimu y’essaza Buluuli yatandise bulungi empaka z’amasaza ga Buganda ez’omwaka guno bwe yakubye Kabula goolo 5 – 2 mu mupiira ogwazannyiddwa eggulo ku Ssande. Omupiira guno ogwabadde guweerezebwa obutereevu ku BBS Terefayina, gwazannyiddwa ku kisaawe ekya FUFA Technical Centre e Njeru. Ggoolo za Buluuli zaateebeddwa abasambi okuli; John Paul Ndembe yateebye ggoolo 2, Ibrahim Farid Ssekyanzi nga naye yateebye goolo 2 ne Johnson Ssenyongo eyateebye ggoolo endala. Ate ggoolo za Kabula zaateebeddwa omuzannyi Martin Sseguya mu ddakiika eye 81 n’eye 90 . Buluuli kati y’ekulembedde ekibinja Masengere ng’erina obubonero 3 ne ggoolo 4, Kyaddondo n’eddako nga nayo erina obubonero 3 ne goolo 2 olwo n’endala ne zigoberera. Empaka zino kati zigenda kuddamu okuzannyibwa ku Lwokubiri lya ssabbiiti ejja era Ssingo egenda kuttunka ne Kyaddondo n’ogwa Kabula ng’ettunka ne Gomba.

headline: AKALULU 2021: Nkunyingi Muwada asabye ebiwandiiko bya Museveni
text: Kampala Munnamateeka era munnakibiina ki ‘National Unity Platform (NUP)’ Muwada Nkunyingi,  awandiikidde akakiiko k’ebyokulonda nasaba aweebwe ebiwandiiko ebiraga obuyigirize bwa Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni byayakozesa okwesimbawo mu kalulu ka 2016. Museveni nga anoonya akalulu  ka 2016 Mukiwandiiko kyawaddeyo eri akakiiko k’ebyokulonda eya nga August 24, Muwada agamba nti munnayuganda omulonzi era nga alina eddembe okumanya ebikwata  bonna abaagala entebe y’obwapulezidenti. “Akatundu 4(3)(c) aka ‘Parliamentary Elections Act, 2005′ kalaga nti omuntu okufuuka omubaka wa Palamenti alina okuba yayita siniya ey’omukaaga (S.6) oba nga alina obuyigirize obugyenkana” ekiwandiiko kya Muwada bwekisoma. Muwada yanokoddeyo Akawaayiro nnamba 41 aka Ssemateeka wa 1995 ne tteeka lya ‘Access to Information Act’ erya 2012, eriwa  omuntu olukusa okuweebwa amawulire oba ebiwandiiko ebikwata kwekyo kyagala okumanya. Ono ayagala akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kamuwe empapula zekasinzirako okukkiriza Pulezidenti Museveni okwesimbawo mu kalulu ka 2016. Kino kiddiridde akakiiko k’ebyokulonda okufulumya empapula za Robert Kyagulanyi aka Bobi Wine eri munnamateeka omu eyazisaba. Nkunyingi ku kiwandiiko kyatutte mu kakiiko ataddeko obukakafu obulaga nti asasudde ssente emitwalo 2 egilagirwa mu mateeka okusobola okufuna ebiwandiiko bino. Kati ekirindiriddwa kwekulaba oba empapula za Pulezidnti Museveni zinaamuweebwa.

headline: Owek. Mpuuga alondeddwa okukulira oludda oluvuganya
text: Kampala Munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Mathias Mpuuga alondeddwa okukulira oludda oluvuganya mu Palamenti y’e 11. Owek. Mpuuga asikidde munnakibiina kya FDC, Betty Aol Achan, abadde mu kifo kino olw’okusinza ababaka abangi ku ludda oluvuganya nga kati kizzeemu kibiina kya NUP. Okusinziira ku kibiina kya NUP, abalala abalondeddwa kuliko omubaka wa Manjiya mu Palamenti John Baptist Nambeshe addidde omubaka Ssemujju Nganda mu bigere ku kifo kino. Mu balala abalondeddwa ye mubaka Medard Ssegona aweereddwa okukulira akakiiko akalondoola ssente z’omuwi w’omusolo akamanyiddwa nga PAC ng’ono amyukibwa munnakibiina kya JEEME, Asuman Basalirwa. Omubaka Francis Zaake alondeddwa nga Kamisona wa Palamenti okudda mu kifo kya Francis Mwijukye owa FDC ate ye omubaka omulonde owa Nakawa West, Joel Ssenyonyi n’aweebwa okulira COSASE (Committee on Commissions, Statutory Authorities and State Enterprises) ekifo ekibaddemu Mubarak Munyagwa. Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina kya NUP, David Rubongoya, ategeezezza bannamawulire abakung’aanidde ku kitebe ky’ekibiina nti obudde bubadde bubaweddeko ne basalawo okufulumya olukalala luno. Mu balala abafunye ebifo kuliko; omubaka Betty Nambooze, Joseph Ssewungu, Luttamaguzi, Lucy Akello, Flavia Nabagabe, Aisha Kabanda Ojara Martin awamu n’abalala.

headline: Eyapangisa aba NUP agamba bamutiisatiisa ab’ebyokwerinda
text: Nnannyini nnyumba ab’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) kwe baali baapangisa okuteeka woofiisi zaabwe, abaddiza ssente zaabwe ng’alumiriza nti akooye ab’ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda okumutiisatiisa.  Kigambibwa nti aba NUP mu kibuga ky’e Kitgum mu divizoni ya Pandwong baali baasasula emitwalo 40 eri Bosco Oloya Oboni mu mwezi Gwomunaana nga zino zaali za myezi esatu. Okusinziira ku bakulu mu kibiina kya NUP, woofiisi zino babadde bagenda kuzikozesa okutumbula ekibiina mu bitundu by’e Kitgum, Lamwo, Pader ne Agago wakati nga beetegera akalulu ka 2021. Olunaku woofiisi zino lwe zaalina okuggulwawo tekyasoboka era nga ab’ebyokwerinda baaziteekako ekkufulu n’okutuusa essaawa ya leero nga bagamba nti aba NUP baali tebasabye lukkusa. Landiroodi Oboni yategeezezza omukutu gwa URN, nti yawaliriziddwa okuzzaayo ssente ng’abeebyokwerinda basusse okumutiisatiisa. “Mbaddiza ssente zaabwe kubanga ab’ebyokwerinda baagaana okuggulawo ennyumba zange ate nze ng’omuntu wa wansi sisobola kusika muguwa n’abeebyokwerinda ku nsonga eno,” Oboni bw’agambye. Oboni agambye nti ku lw’obulamu bwe asazeewo ekizimbe tajja kukipangisa kibiina kyonna era ng’agenda kuddamu okusinga ekizimbe kye akiggyeko langi ya NUP. Ono era alumiriza abakulira Munisipaali ye Kitgum okumuteekako akazito nga bagamba nti ekizimbe yabadde akikozeseza mu ngeri etakkaanyizibwako. Omukwanaganya wa NUP mu kitundu kino, Samuel Obedgui, agambye nti kituufu kubanga bakyalemeddwa okufuna we bateeka woofiisi zaabwe kuba buli we batuuka abantu babajuliza babyakwerinda. Bino ttawuni kiraaka w’e Kitgum Emmanuel Banya ategeezezza URN nti bino awulira bipya. Wadde yakkiriza nti kituufu aba Munisipo Kkanso batera okuwandiikira bannannyini bizimbe nga babalambika ku nkozesa yaabyo. Agasseeko nti Oboni y’omu ku bantu abalina ebizimbe nga babikozesa wabula nga tebannafuna pamiti zaabyo. Okusinziira ku tteeka erirambika enkozesa y’ebizimbe erya ‘Building Control (fees) Regulations 2020,’ liraga nti omuntu yenna nga tannakozesa kizimbe alina okusooka okufuna pamiti eraga ky’alina okukoleramu. Omubaka wa Pulezidenti mu kitundu kino, William Komakech agambye nti Oboni tannatiisibwatiisibwako era nga tewali nsonga lwaki bamutiisatiisa.

headline: Omusumba w’e South Afirika asisinkanye  Owek. Kaawaase
text: Omusumba w’obusumba bwa Aliwal mu ggwanga lya South Africa,Omusumba Joseph Kizitoagenyiwaddeko ku mbuga y’Obwakabaka e Bulange -Mmengo n’asisinkanaOmumyuka Asooka owa Katikkiro era Minisita w’obuyiiya n’enzirukanya y’emirimu, Assoc. Prof. Oweek Twaha Kigongo Kaawaase. Omusumba Kizito agamba nti agenda n’asuubiza nga bw’agenda okwagasiza abantu ba Kabaka abali South Africa Obwakabaka bwabwe ne yeebaza Kamalabyona olw’emirimu gy’akolera Obuganda era n’okutumbula embeera z’abantu ba Kabaka. Omusumba Joseph Mary Kizito yalondebwa okubeera omusumba w’obusumba bwe Aliwal mu ggwanga lya South Africa mu mwaka gwa 2019 era ono akulembeddwa, abataka mu kika ky’effumbe mwava. Ono agambye nti ekimuleese e Mmengo kwebaza Ssaabasajja Kabaka olwokulembera obulungi abantu be awamu n’okubakulaakulanya. Omusumba Kizito aweze okufuuka olutindo olugatta bannayuganda abali mu ggwanga lya South Africa n’Obwakabaka kyongere amaanyi mu nteekateeka z’Obwakabaka. Omumyuka wa Katikkiro asooka ,owek. Prof.Twaha Kaawaase Kigongo yeebazizza Omusumba Joseph Kizito olw’okwagala gyava n’akakasa nti Obwakabaka bwetegefu okukolagana ne bannaddiini ab’enjawulo okulaba ng’abantu bakulaakulana. Ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwamu minisita avunaanyizibwa ku nkulaakulana y’abantu, Owek. Dr. Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma ne Minisita w’ensonga za Buganda ebweru, Owek. Joseph Kawuki.

headline: FDC etabuse egenda kugoba abeesimbawo ku bwannamunigina n’abo abaava mu kibiina
text: Kampala  Ekibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) kirangiridde nga bwe kigenda okukola ku bannakibiina abaajeemera ssemateeka waakyo ne beesimbawo ku bwannamunigina mu kalulu akawedde aka 2021 awamu n’abo abaakivaamu ne bagenda mu bibiina ebirala. Kino kirangiriddwa Pulezidenti w’ekibiina kino, Patrick Oboi Amuriat, n’agamba nti abamu abalina ebifo mu kibiina naye nga baayimirirawo ku bwannamunigina awamu n’abo abeegasse ku bibiina ebirala bagenda kubasikiza abalala. “FDC, tewali muntu gwe tutasobola kusikiza kuba twakizimbira ku ntuuyo n’omusaayi gwa bannayuganda abaagala enkyukakyuka. Tuli kibiina ekiremera ku nsonga tetwalagala bituwugula. Mu lugendo luno obeera naffe oba n’otweyawulako naye tewali agenda kutulemesa kutambula.” Amuriat bwe yagambye. Kino kiddiridde abamu ku bannakibiina okulondebwa ebibiina ebirala mu buvunaanyizibwa obwenjawulo mu gavumenti ey’ekisiikirize awamu n’Owek. Joyce Nabbosa Ssebuggwawo okulondebwa nga Minisita omubeezi ow’ebyamawulire ne Tekinologiya. Ono yannyonnyodde nti ekibiina kikooye abantu abatakigasa nga kino kye kiseera okukizza obuggya nga balekamu abo bokka abali ku mulamwa. Ku nsonga y’abo abaalondebwa mu gavumenti eyeekisikirize mu Palamenti, Oboi agamba nti baalina okwebuuzibwako ng’ekibiina era n’alabula abaalondeddwa kukkiriza ebifo bino. Pulezidenti Amuriat era yasabye gavumenti okwongera ku muwendo gw’abantu abalina okufuna ssente z’obuyambi olwa COVID-19 kuba ssente ntononnyo ate ng’abantu balina ebizibu ebiwerako.

headline: Obwakabaka bugabidde abalimi ensigo
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bwongedde amaanyi mu kaweefube w’okutumbula ebyobulimi nga bugabira abalimi mu masaza ag’enjawulo ensigo ez’omutindo, basobole okwongera ku bungi bw’amakungula awamu n’amagoba ge bafuna. Enteekateeka eno etandikidde mu masaza okuli Busujju ne Ssingo naye nga yaakubuna amasaza gonna. Abalimi e Busujju n’e Ssingo baweereddwa ttani za kasooli eziwera 2 era nga zibaweereddwa Minisita omubeezi ow’empuliziganya ne tekinologiya,Owek. Joyce Juliet Nabbosa Ssebuggwaawo. Bw’abadde akwasa abaami ba b’amasaza ensigo zino okuzibunyisa mu bitundu ebyenjawulo, minisita w’ettaka, obulimi n’obwegassi, Owek. Mariam Nkalubo Mayanja agambye nti kaweefube aliwo kwe kusobozesa abantu ba Beene okukola ennyo, bafune emmere emala awamu n’okwekulaakulanya. Ate ye Owek .Hajji Hamis Kakomo asinzidde wano n’asaba abalimi okulabirira obulungi ensigo zino ekigendererwa kya Kabaka eky’okutumbula embeera zaabwe kisobole okutuukirira. Ku lwa Abaami ba Kabaka abaweereddwa ensingo zino, Amyuka Kasujju, Christopher Nsimbe ategeezezza nti baakukola ekisoboka okulondoola ensigo zino gye banaaba bazigabye zisobole okuvaamu amakungula amalungi.

headline: Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye okulabikako ku Fayinolo y’Amasaza
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka wa Buganda, Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II, asiimye okulabikako eri obuganda ng’aggalawo empaka z’emipiira gy’amasaza ez’omwaka guno. Minisita Ssekabembe nga atongoza fayinolo y’Amasaza Minisita w’abavubuka, ebyemizannyo n’okwewummuzaamu, Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu, ategeezezza nti Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye okubaawo ku ntandikwa y’omwezi gw’Ogwokusatu, ttiimu y’essaza Buddu ng’ettunka ne Ggomba, okulondako omuwanguzi waazo. Bino Owek. Ssekabembe abyogeredde mu bimuli bya Bulange ku Lwokubiri bw’abadde atongoza fayinolo y’empaka z’omwaka guno.  “Njagala okutegeeza Obuganda bwonna nti Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye omupiira ogw’akamalirizo ogw’omwaka guno wakati wa bannaffe bannagomba nga basamba ne bannabuddu, gubeerewo ng’ennaku z’omwezi 6 March, 2021 ku ssaawa 9 zennyini ez’akawungeezi.” Okusinziira ku Minisita Ssekabembe, omupiira guno gujja kuzannyirwa mu kisaawe kya St. Marys Stadiium e Kitende era wajja kusookawo okulwanira ekifo ekyokusatu wakati wa Bulemeezi ne Busiro.  Minisita Ssekabembe annyonnyodde nti bali mu kwogerezeganya ne Fufa awamu ne Minisitule y’ebyobulamu, basobole okukkirizaayo abantu abasaamusaamu era mu bwangu bajja kutegeeza Obuganda kye banaggyayo. Owek. Ssekabembe agambye nti ensonga lwaki baasalawo okwongezaayo fayinolo y’empaka zino kyali lwakuba abazannyi baafuna obuvune obuwerako kuba emipiira gyali gya kumukumu, kwe kusaba akadde okusobola okujjanjaba abazannyi baabwe. Owek. Ssekabembe asiimye obumalirivu n’omukwano ogwoleseddwa mu kutegeka empaka zino mu kadde ng’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kifunze ekyonga mu ggwanga.  Agasseeko nti byonna bisobose olw’okwesigama ku kkampuni ezivugirira empaka zino okuli; Airtel, Centenary Bbanka, UNAIDS ne Kkampuni z’amawulire. Ate ye Omuk. Remmy Kisakye okuva mu Airtel agambye nti kye baayagala okukola kwe kuddiza abantu nga bayitira mu mizannyo era ku luno baasalawo okwekwata amasaza kuba gakung’aanya abantu okuva mu nsonda ez’enjawulo. Ono annyonnyodde nti amasaza gasobodde okukuza n’okuzuula ebitone ebipya ku mutendera gwa ttiimu y’eggwanga awamu n’abasambi okufuna ttiimu ennene mu nsi ez’enjawulo.Asiimye Obwakabaka bwa Buganda olw’enkolagana ennungi n’okutuukiriza obweyamo bwabwo obw’enjawulo. Akulira akakiiko akategesi ak’amasaza, Omuk. Sulaiman Ssejjengo, agambye nti okusobola okukuuma abantu nga balamu mu mpaka zino, bakebedde abantu abawerera ddala 540 omuli abazannyi n’abakungu ba ttiimu ez’enjawulo era abo be basanze nga balwadde babadde tebakkirizibwa kwetaba na balala. Ye Ssenkulu wa Majestic Brand, Omuk. Ronald Kawaddwa, yeebazizza abavujjirizi ab’enjawulo okuli; Airtel, Centenary bbanka, UNAIDS, UNDP ne Nnaabagereka Development Foundation n’olw’okukwatizaako Obwakabaka okulaba ng’empaka zino zitambula bulungi. Kinajjukirwa nti awangula empaka zino asitukira mu kikopo n’obukadde 12 n’emidaali egya Zzaabu, akwata ekyokubiri afuna obukadde 9 n’emidaali egya siliva ate owookusatu n’afuna obukadde 7 n’emiddaali egya Bronze olwo ate owookuna afuna obukadde 5.

headline: Buganda yakubangula abavubuka ku bugagga obw’ensibo
text: Minisita w’abavubuka, ebyemizannyo n’okwewummuzaamu, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe atongozza akakiiko akagenda okusomesa abavubuka okwetooloola Obwakabaka bwa Buganda. Minisita Ssekabembe nga akwasa Mw. Damascus Ssali ekimu ku biwandiiko  “Omuvubuka bwe tumutandikira ku myaka 13 ng’ayingira Ssekendule.” Okusinziira ku Minisita Ssekabembe, entegeka zino zitandikidde ku myaka 13 wadde ng’omuvubuka mu Buganda atwalibwa okuba ng’ali mu myaka 18. Owek. Ssekabembe atongozza akakiiko akagenda okukola ebbago erinaalung’amya emikolo gy’ebyoto mu Buganda. Akakiiko kakulirwa Mw. Ssali Damascus, amyukibwa Owek. Nantumbwe Rose. Abalala abali ku kakiiko; Ddamba Andrew, Namazzi Windfred Birabwa ne Masembe Edward. Owek. Ssekabembe agambye nti abasomeseza ku byoto basomesa bye basanze naddala ebyobufumbo mu kisenge ate nga nabyo tebabituukiridde bulungi. Eyaweereddwa obuvunaanyizibwa okulira akakiiko kano, Ssali Damascus yeeyamye ku lwa banne okukola kyonna ekisoboka okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa buno era neyeebaza Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka olw’okubalengera. Akakiiko kaweereddwa omwezi gumu okumaliriza ebbago oluvannyuma Minisita w’Abavubuka, Emizannyo n’Okwewummuza, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu alyanjule mu Lukiiko lwa Buganda likubaganyizibweko ebirowoozo.

headline: Mwewale enjawukana olw’eby’obufuzi-Kabaka
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka wakati, omumyuka asooka owa Katikkiro Twaha Kigongo Kaawase, ku kkono ne Maama Nabagereka Sylvia Nagginda bwebadde ku nnyimba z’amazaalibwa ku Bulange ku Lwokutaano   Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II, agambye nga eggwanga lyolekera okulonda kwa bonna okwa 2021, abantu basaanidde bakimanye nti baluganda abatateekeddwa kwawulwayawulwa lwa byabufuzi. Mu bubakabwe obwa Ssekukkulu n’omwaka omuggya, Omutanda ategeezezza nti akalulu kaggya nekagenda naye abantu basigalawo. “Ettemu, enge n’obukyayi ebyeyongera bisaanidde okukoma naddala nga tusemberera okulonda. Abantu bakimanye nti enjawukana mu by’obufuzi tebibafuula balabe kuba basigala baluganda,”Kabaka bwategeezezza mu kiwandiiko ekifulumiziddwa woofiisi ye nga ye kennyini akitaddeko omukono.  Kabaka era asabye abantu okwongera okwekuuma obulwadde bwa siriimu n’ategeeza nti ajja kugenda mu maaso ne kaweefube ow’okumulwanyisa. “Obulamu kikulu nnyo n’olwekyo abantu baffe basaanidde okwongera okwekuuma siriimu ate n’okwekebeza n’okufuna obujjanjjabi n’okubudaabudibwa,” Kabaka bwagambye.  Obubaka bwa Kabaka mubujjuvu  Twebaza omutonzi olw’okututuusa ku nnaku enkulu nga tumalako omwaka guno ogwa 2019.  Tuyozaayoza abo abafuniddemu ebirungi ate ne tusaasira abantu baffe abafiiriddwa abantu babwe n’abafuniddemu ebizibu ebitali bimu.  Omwaka guno tulambudde Amasaza agawerako era twebaza nnyo abantu bonna abatwanirizza mu ssanyu eringi buli bwetubadde mukulambula kwaffe. Abaami b’amasaza gyetulambudde omwaka guno bakoze kinene ddala. Twebaza nnyo Ssebwana ne banna Busiro olw’okutwaniriza enfunda ezisukka mu gumu. Mwebale nnyo mwebalire ddala.  Omwaka guno twasalawo okutandika okulambula Obutaka bw’Ebika byaffe. Nneebaza Abataka ab’obusolya gyetumaze okulambula olw’enteekateeka ze bakoze ku Butaka bwabwe era nkakasa eyo gyetutannatuuka nti tuggya kubatuukako. Omwaka guno twogedde ku nsonga nyingi enkulu nga mwemuli, ezo ezikwata ku bulamu, n’obuli bw’enguzi. Njagala nfundikire omwaka nga nzikaatiriza ensonga ze nalambise nga nsisinkanye Abataka mu Lubiri e Mmengo.  Obulamu kikulu nnyo n’olwekyo abantu baffe basaanidde okwongera okwekuuma siriimu ate n’okwekebeza n’okufuna obujjanjjabi n’okubudaabudibwa.Kati emyaka ebiri nga twogera ku nsonga eno era tujja kwongera okugyogerako.  Okukuuma Obutonde bw’ensi nakyo kikulu ddala Nga bwetulabye ennaku zino amataba n’ekyeya bitandise okututeganya olw’embeera ezireetebwa obutakuuma butonde bwansi.  Ettemu, enge n’obukyayi ebyeyongera bisaanidde okukoma naddala nga tusemberera okulonda. Abantu bakimanye nti enjawukana mu by’obufuzi tebibafuula balabe kuba basigala baluganda. Ettaka ye Nnyaffe n’olwekyo likuumibwe butiribiri, kuba awatali ttaka, abantu bafuuka momboze. Tubaagalaiza okuyita mu nnaku enkulu mu mirembe n’omwaka omuggya gubeere gwassanyu n’emirembe.

headline: Aba NUP  bagenda mu kkooti okweddiza obuwanguzi bwabwe
text: Ekibiina kyaNational Unity Platform (NUP), kigamba nti kigenda kuddukira mu kkooti okuzza obuwanguzi bwa Harriet Nakweede ku bwa ssentebe bwa disitulikiti y’e Kayunga oluvannyuma lw’akakiiko okulangiriramu Munnakibiina kya NRM, Andrew Muwonge. Banna NUP bategeezezza bannamawulire e Kamwokya mu Kampala nti ekyabadde e Kayunga bwabadde bubbi bwennyini kuba akalulu kano babadde bakawangudde kyokka akakiiko k’ebyokulonda ne kalangirira muntu mulala. Omwogezi w’ekibiina kya NUP, Joel Ssenyonyi agamba akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kaagaana okubawa empapula okwagattirwa ebyava mu kalulu k’e Kayunga kubanga baali bakimanyi nti bye baakola byali byakifere. Ono agattako nti kati tebasaba busabi wabula babalagira babawe empapula ezo mu bwangu. “Omuntu waffe atutegeezezza nti agenda kuddukira mu kkooti okuwakanya ebyavudde mu kalulu era tujja kumuwagira. Twagala okulaba oba ‘kaliculeeta’ za kkooti zo ziyinza okubala ebituufu okusinga Byabakama nga nayo bwe binaagaana tujja kubaanika lumu ne ne mukama waabwe.” Ssenyonyi bw’ategeezezza. Ate ye eyavuganyizza ku bwa ssentebe bwa Kayunga,Harriet Nakweede Kafeero agamba nti akakiiko k’ebyokulonda ka ddembe okubayita nekamulangirira ng’omuwanguzi nga basobola okwekwasakompyuta zaabweokuba nti zaafunyeemu obuzibu, ensi ejja kukitegeera. Kinajjukirwa nti akulira eby’okulonda e Kayunga, Jennifer Kyobutungi yalangiridde Muwonge okubeera kubuwanguzi n’obululu 31,830 ateNakweede n’afuna31,380 ng’enjawulo yabadde ya bululu 450 bwokka. Aba NUP bagamba nti ekituufu n’aba NRM bakimanyi nti akalulu kano tebaakawangula era y’ensonga lwaki ab’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda tebaagala kubawa mpapula ziraga byavudde mu kulonda nga kati baakugenda mu kkooti balabe oba eneeyimirira ku mazima.

headline: Ebifaananyi by’emisinde gy’amazaalibwa ga Kabaka bye wasubiddwa,
text: Akulira Uganda Aids Commission Dr. Musoba nga akwasa Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka ekirabo ky’okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Siriimu. Omutanda nga agenda okusimbula abaddusi b’emisinde gy’amazaalibwa. Ekif. Gerald Mulindwa Minisita Ssekabembe, Katikkiro Mayiga ne Owek. Prof. Twaha Kaawaase ku mukolo Katikkiro Mayiga nga akulembeddemu okukola dduyiro ku misinde gy’ amazaalibwa Sipiika Patrick Mugumbule naye yeetabye mu misinde gy’ amazaalibwa Akulira Airtel Uganda nga akwasa Beene omujoozi gw’omwaka guno Ssaabasajja Kabaka, Katikkiro Mayiga, akulira UNAIDS mu Uganda  Kiragu n’abalala nga bafuna ekifananyi. Abamu ku beetabye mu misinde gino nga bakola dduyiro mu Lubiri e Mmengo

headline: Buganda eyisizza embalirira ya buwumbi 121
text: Obw’akabaka bwa Buganda nga buyita mu Minisitule yaabwo ey’ebyensiimbi, buyisizza embalirira ya buwumbi 121. Eno y’egenda okutambulirwako wakati wa 2021 ne 2022 era minisita wa Kabaka ow’ebyensimbi ate nga ye mumyuka wa Katikkiro owookubiri, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa, y’agisomedde Olukiiko lwa Buganda olukulu olwaleero ku Mmande. Bw’abadde asoma embalirira eno, Owek. Nsibirwa, asonze ku bintu bina ebisinze okusosoowazibwa mu mbalirira eno. “Ebyenkizo mu mbalirira eno mulimu; okunyweza n’okutumbuula obwegassi, okugaziya ebyenfuna by’Obwakabaka, okukulaakulanya amasaza ga Buganda n’okutwala omulimu g’Amasiro g’e Kasubi mu maaso.” Owek. Nsibirwa bw’ategeezezza. Mu birala ebikulu byamenye mulimu; okwongera okuwagira ekkakkalabizo ly’abajjajja aboobusolya nga bano bagenda kuweebwa emmotoka zibayambeko mu buweereza, okufuna abaweereza abakugu nga bakola ng’abakwanaganya b’emirimu gy’Obwakabaka ku mbuga z’amasaza zonna wamu n’amagombolola agataafuna bugaali okulaba nga bugaweebwa. Obwakabaka era bugenda kuwa amagombolola 20 entambula ya Ppikipiki. Nga gano ge gazze gawangula gannaago mu mpaka z’okuvuganya mu kutambuza emirimu gya Kabaka obulungi. Okusinziira ku Owek. Nsibirwa, kino kijja kubayamba okwongera okugonza ku ntambuza y’emirimu. Okusinziira ku Waggawa Nsibirwa, abavubuka bateereddwa nnyo ku mwanjo mu mbalirira y’omulundi guno. Bagenda kufuba okulaba nti waakiri abavubuka 10,000 okuva mu masaza eg’enjawulo balambuzibwa era ne bayigirizibwa emirimu egy’ekikugu egy’enjawulo kyokka nga tegyetaagisa maanyi mangi okugeza okulundira awafunda, okulima enva endiirwa n’obutiko, kibayambe okutandikawo emirimu nga bwe balinda gye baasomerera. Abavubuka bagenda kubangulwa ku ngeri y’ekikugu ey’okuweereza wamu n’okuteekebwa mu bibiina ebyenjawulo okwaguyirwa okukwatirwako. Minisita Nsibirwa ayanjudde ebituukiddwako okuva mu mbalirira y’omwaka oguwedde nga muno mubaddemu amakampuni g’Obwakabaka agatandikiddwawo omuli; Mmwanyi Terimba Limited, Buganda Law Chambers, Weerinde Insurance n’Olupapula lw’Obwakabaka olwa Gambuuze online publication. Mu birala ebituukiddwako mulimu okutandika ebizimbe by’Obwakabaka omuli; Ndiwulira ku mbuga e Makindye, ennyumba Buddukiro ey’essaza Buddu eddaabiriziddwa ate nga waliwo ennyumba ezizimbiddwa e Kigo ne Ssentema okusobola okugaziya ku nnyingiza y’Obwakabaka. Obwakabaka era busobodde okuddaabiriza Olubiri lw’e Baamunaanika n’olwe Nkoni, kw’ossa okuvujjirira emirimu gyaTwekobe ne Butikkiro era nga kati bikozesebwa bulungi. Owek. Nsibirwa ategeezezza nti ebyenfuna byakosebwa nnyo ekirwadde kya kolona era nga kuno kwe kusoomooza okusinze okufunibwa, wabula n’ategeeza nti kino tekijja kulobera mirimu kutambula. Ye yazzizza abo bonna abawagira emirimu gy’Obwakabaka naddala abo abawangaalira emitala w’amayanja olw’okutambulira awamu n’Obwakabaka nga babuvujjiririra n’ensimbi. Omulamwa gw’embalirira eno eya 2021/2022 gugamba nti, “Okutuusa obuweereza obukulaakulanya abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka.”
