headline: Buganda yakusitula ebyenfuna by’abantu, esomye embalirira ya buwumbi 157
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bwakwongera okutumbula ebyenfuna bya bantu nga buyita mu bibiina by’obweggasi okusobola okubakulaakulanya n’okulwanyisa obwavu obubeesibyeeko. Bino byogeddwa Omuwanika wa Buganda era Omumyuka ow’okubiri owa Katikkiro, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa bw’abadde ayanjulirira abakiise b’Olukiiko embalirira y’omwaka guno ogwa 2022/2023 nga luno lubadde lukubiriziddwa Sipiika Patrick Luwaga Mugumbule . Embalirira eno egenda kutambulira wansi w’omulamwa ogugamba nti ‘Okunyikiza obuwereza eri abntu nga tuli bumu’. Minisita Nsibirwa ategeezezza nti wadde embeera y’ebyenfuna yakosebwa nnyo ekirwadde ki Corona naye Obwakabaka busobodde okukola obulungi era y’ensonga lwaki embalirira y’omwaka guno esinze kwewedde n’obuwumbi obusoba mu 33. Emablirira y’omwaka 2022/ 2023 esomeddwa ya buwumbi 31 n’obukadde 781 obutegekeddwa mu nteekateeka eno mu mbalirira eyobuwumbi 157 obukadde 849 n’emitwalo 26134 ng’eno erinnye ebitundu 27 ku buli 100. Owek. Waggwa asoose kulaga ebituukiddwako mu mbalirira eyomwaka gw’ebyenismbi oguwedde 2021/22 era byasukako mu byebateekateeka okukola nga bitambulira mu Ssemasonga ettaano nalaga ensonga ez’omuzinzi ezireetedde embalirira eno okulinnya. Okusinziira ku mbalirira, Obuwumbi 31 n’obukadde 781 buteereddwamu okusitula ebyenfuna mu bantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka nga bino byakukolebwa nga bayita mu bibiina by’Obweggasi ebyenjawulo. Ate obuwumbi 22 n’obukadde 65, ziteereddwa mu kusiga ensimbi n’obusuubuzi nga bazimba ebizimbe ebiggya awamu n’okumaliriza ebyo ebyatandikibwako omwaka oguwedde okusobola okugaziya ennyingiza mu Bwakabaka. Minisita Waggwa Nsibirwa agamba nti eby’enjigiriza nabyo babitaddemu amaanyi nga kuluno babitaddemu obuwumbi obuwera 20 okusobola okutendeka abaana b’Omutanda ku lwebiseera eby’omu maaso. Mu mbalirira eno eby’obulamu byongeddwamu amaanyi nga ku luno bifunye obuwumbi 4 n’obukadde 275 nga zino zakuyamba okulwanyisa Mukenenya mu bitundu nga Kyotera, Wakiso, Kalangala n’ebirala.  Owek. Nsibirwa annyonnyodde nti okwongera okulwanyisa obwavu n’ebbula ly’emirimu mu Buganda bagenda kukugaanya abantu abalina obukugu basobole okubakwasaganya nababeetaaga nga kino bakuyisa ku mutendera gw’Amasaza. Okusinziira ku Minisita Nsibirwa bakufuba okutumbula empeereza mu Pulojekiti z’Obwakabaka zonna era kino bakukikola nga bakolagana n’ekitongole ki Directorate of Industrial Training (DIT). Owek. Nsibirwa era alaze nga Buganda bwetegese, okwagazisa abavubuka okwettanira ebyobulimi nga bayita mu nteekateeka ezituumiddwa Muvubuka Tolannama ne Muvubuka Ttolera Ngalo, Boda Fix ngeno etunuulidde nnyo abawala wakati mu kukwatagana ne bannamikago okutumbula ebyenfuna byabwe. Ensonga y’okubbulula Obutondebwensi eweereddwa obuwumbi 3 n’obukadde 182 ate nga abavubuka n’ebyemizannyo baweereddwa obuwumbi 2 n’obukadde 29. Eby’obulimi biweereddwa obuwumbi 2 n’obukadde 2 okwongera okwagazisa abavubuka omulimu gw’okulima era bagutwale nga gwankizo. Minisita Nsibirwa agamba nti batadde obuwumbi 7 n’obukadde 344 mu bukulembeze n’emirimu era nakakasa nti bakugulira abantu abawangaalira mu bizinga bye Buvuma eryato okugonza entambula. Ku luno abakiise tebakubaganyiza birowoozo nga bwegutera okuba naye ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyensimbi mu Lukiiko luno, Owek. Prof Umaru Kakumba ayisiza ekiteeso okuyisa embalira eno era nekiwagirwa. Eno yembalirira ekyasinze okuba enene bukyanga Obwakabaka buzibwawo mu mwaka gwa 1993 era Olukiiko luno lwetabiddwamu Omulangira David Kintu Wasajja, Ssentebe wakabondo ka Buganda Caucus Muwanga Kivumbi, Apostle Joseph Sserwadda, Anderson Burora RCC wa Lubaga nga waliwo nabalwetabyeko nga bayita ku nkola ya Zoom.  .

headline: Museveni asiimye  Onyango n’emmotoka kapyata
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni asiimye  Denis Masinde Onyango abadde Kaputeeni wa ttiimu y’omupiira gw’ebigere eya Uganda Cranes, n’emmotoka kapyata ey’ekika kya Pajero. Onyango abadde awerekeddwako maama we, Musoke Olivia Onyango n’abakulu ba FUFA ku bugenyi buno obubadde obutongole era nga yayitiddwa Pulezidenti Museveni ne mukyala we Janet Museveni. Pulezidenti Museveni Onyango amusiimye olw’okwewaayo n’ebirungi by’akoze ng’azannyira ttiimu ya Cranes. Onyango nga ye mukuumi wa ggoolo ya Mamelodi Sundowns mu South Africa, omwezi oguwedde yalangiridde nga bw’annyuse okuzannyira Uganda Cranes ku myaka 35. Masinde yatandika okuzannyira Cranes mu 2005 mu mpaka z’okusunsulamu abanaazannya  ekikopo ky’ensi yonna bwe baali bazannya Cape Verde. Okuva ku olwo Onyango azze  akola bulungi naddala mu kukuuma ggoolo era yayamba ttiimu eno okugenda mu mpaka za Africa Cup of Nations eza 2017 ezaali e Gabon n’eza 2019 ezaali mu Misiri. Ttiimu y’eggwanga agizannyidde emipiira 75. Bino we bijjidde nga ne Palamenti y’eggwanga etegeka okusiima Onyango olw’obuweereza bw’akoze ku ttiimu y’eggwanga okumala emyaka 15.

headline: South Sudan ewangudde Uganda 1-0
text: Ttiimu ya South Sudan ey’omupiira gw’ebigere eya Bright Stars, ewangudde Uganda Cranes, ggoolo 1-0 mu mupiira oguyindidde mu kisaawe kya Nyayo Stadium mu kibuga kya Kenya -Nairobi.  Uganda Cranes yayingidde omupiira guno ng’eyagala buwanguzi okusobola okukiika mu mpaka za AFCON, wabula peneti ekubiddwa Tito Okello ewadde South Sudan obuwanguzi obusookedde ddala mu mpaka zino. Wiiki eweddde Uganda Cranes yakubye South Sudan mu kisaawe kya St. Marys Stadium e Kitende, naye nga Uganda okukubwa South Sudan olwaleero ku Mmande, kigitadde mu mbeera enzibu. Mu mupiira gwa leero, omusambi Khalid Aucho aweereddwa kkaadi emyufu mu ddakiika ya 32 oluvannyuma lw’okusika omusambi wa South Sudan. Mu ddakiika endala 5 wabaddewo ekisobyo ekikoleddwa era ne kivaamu penati eteebeddwa Okello. Wadde Uganda Cranes yakoze enkyukakyuka bw’eggyeeyo Emmanuel Okwi n’ereeta Farouk Miya naye abasudani baggyeeyo n’agomu buto. Mu ddakiika ye 80, Omusambi wa Sudan, Abdallah Asad Musa, afunye kkaadi emyufu, bw’etyo Uganda Cranes n’ekozesa omukisa guno okunoonya ggoolo naye nebigaana. Emipiira emirala egisambiddwa mu kibinja B, Burkina Faso eremaganye ne Malawi nga tewali alabye katimba ka munne. Burkina Faso y’ekulembedde ekibinja n’obubonero 8, Uganda Cranes erina 7, Malawi 4 ne South Sudan 3. Uganda yeetaaga okufuna obubonero 4 mu mipiira 2 egisigaddewo bw’eba yaakukiika mu AFCON, Uganda ezzaako Burkina Faso ekulembedde ekibinja mu Gwokuatu nga 22 omwaka ogujja ate era esembyeyo Malawi nga 30 Gwokusatu.

headline: Obwakabaka bukoze Kkaawa ‘Mpologoma’ okuwa abalimi b’Emmwaanyi akatale
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bukoze kkaawa atuumiddwa Mpologoma okuva mu kirime ky’ Emmwaanyi ng’omu ku kaweefube w’okwagazisa abantu okumunywa awamu n’okufunira emmwaanyi akatale. Omukolo gukoleddwa Omumyuka wa Katikkiro Owookubiri, era Omuwanika wa Buganda, Oweek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa, n’akubiriza abantu okumunywa mu ngeri ey’okuwagira Obwakabaka. “Ekimu ku nsonga lwaki Obwakabaka bwenyigidde mu kusiika emmwaanyi kwekulaba nti abantu bamanya era balinyise omutindo nga banoga ezo ezengedde kubanga bwebanoga eza kiragala kkaawa abeera agenda kukaawa ate teri ayagala bikaawa. Era twagadde okufunira abantu emirimu basobole okubaako byebakola,” Owek. Waggwa Nsibirwa bw’agambye. Ono annyonnyodde nti baagala okubeera akatale akasookerwako munda mu ggwanga nga bwekiri mu Ethiopia oba nga bwekiri ku matooke agalina akatale munda mu ggwanga nasaba abantu okwettanira kkaawa Mpologoma kuba alina eddekende.  Owek. Nsibirwa bano abawadde entanda okunywa kkaawa kuba azuuliddwamu okutangira endwadde z’ekibumba n’akalulwe ate era nga ayamba abantu obutasumagira nebasobola okukola emirimu obulungi era nga agumya bulungi amaka eri abaami. Waggwa agambye nti mu myaka gino 6 nga batadde essira ku kireme ky’ Emmwaanyi ebikoleddwawo birabwa nga bangi bettanidde okuzirima, bazongeddeko omutindo, era kino kirabikira bulungi mu bibalo bya Uganda Coffee Development Authority kuba obungi bwezo ezirimwa mu Buganda bweyongedde n’ebitundu 50 ku buli 100. Okusinziira ku muwanika Nsibirwa, ebibalo bya UBOS biraga bulungi nti ekirime ky’ Emmwaanyi n’amatooke kiyambe okulaakulanya abantu mu Buganda n’okugoba obwavu. Ono annyonnyodde nti kampuni y’ Emmwaanyi Terimba Ltd. yawandiisibwa mu mateeka era neweebwa olukusa okutunda emmwaanyi wabweru w’eggwanga nga kuno bw’ogattako kkaawa ya Mpologoma kiraga nti kampuni eno gyeraga balabayo. Omuwanika agambye okufuna kaawa kuba kwongera omutindo ku mmwanyi ate n’ebbeeyi yeyongera. Asabye olukiiko okufulumya ensonga ez’enjawulo ezinnyonnyola emiganyulo gy’okunywa kaawa. Ye minisita avunaanyizibwa ku bwegassi, eby’obulimi, obulunzi ,ebyettaka ne bulungibwansi, Owek. Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo Nasejje, wamu ne minisita omubeezi oweby’obusuubuzi owek Hajj Amiisi Kakomo bategeezezza nti, basanyufu okulaba nti mu myaka 6 gyokka ebibala by’Emmwaanyi bitandise okubuna mu bantu ba Kabaka.  Akulira olukiiko olufuzi olwa kampuni y’Emmwaanyi Terimba Limited, omuk. Daniel Ddamulira yeebazizza Beene olwokusobozesa ekitongole kino okugatta ettofaali ku nkulaakulana y’abantu ba Kabaka. Kkaawa ono asookerwako wa mpeke nga eteereddwa ku nkumi 2 zokka ate owa gram 50 agule enkumi 3, owa kakaaga, omutwalo gumu bbiri n’omulala ow’emitwalo 2 okutuuka kw’ ena. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako abagenyi abenjawulo okuli Owek. Patrick Luwaga Mugumbule, Jjajja Nnamwama Augustine Mutumba neba ssenkulu b’ebitongole byonna eby’obwakabaka nga bakulembeddwamu ssenkulu wa BBS Terefayina omuk Patrick Ssembajjo, Abaami b’ Amasaza n’abakungu ba Beene.

headline: Bobi Wine atabukidde ab’oludda oluvuganya abanenya NUP ku muyizi wa UCU eyafiira e Makerere
text: Omukulembeze w’ekibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine atabukidde ab’oludda oluvuganya olw’okusonga mu kibiina kye okuvunaanyizibwa obutereevu ku nfa y’omuyizi wa Uganda Christian University (UCU), Betungura Bewatte. Bewatte eyali asoma mu mwaka gwe ogw’okubiri ku UCU, yafumitiddwa ekiso nga abawagizi beyeesimbye ku kkaadi ya NUP bwebaali balemesa munnakibiina ki Forum for Democratic Change (FDC), Justus Tukamushaba okuyingira mu kisaawe kya Makerere Rugby Grounds. Abakulembeze mu bibiina eby’enjawulo ku ludda oluvuganya omuli ne Justice Forum(JEEMA) bakyanenya NUP olw’okulemwa okukoma ku bawagizi baakyo. Kyagulanyi agamba nti kyansonyi okulaba nti bannabwe ku ludda oluvuganya babanenya ku kino kyokka nga bakimanyi nti gavumenti esobola bulungi okubeera emabega w’olukwe luno. “Ekisinga okumalamu amaanyi kwekuba nti abantu abali ku ludda olumu naffe ate batunenya olw’okufa kw’omwana ono nga tewali kunoonyereza kwonna kwali kukoleddwa,” Kyagulanyi bw’agambye. Okusinziira ku Bobi Wine emu yeemu ku ngeri gavumenti gyeyagala okuteekawo enjawukana mu bagivuganya awamu nokwonoona erinnya lya NUP nga ebalaga nga abantu abaagala obuvuyo. Kyagulanyi yasabye bannayuganda okusigala nga amaaso gabwe bagakuumira ku mulabe gwebalina kuba ali omu nga eby’okwetematemamu nga abavuganya tebirina gwebigenda kuyamba kuwangula Pulezidenti Museveni. Bobi Wine agamba nti gavumenti ekyaleeta obutego bungi okulaba nti eyongera okwawula mu bantu abagivuganya esobole okwenywereza mu buyinza. Ono yakubagiza abafamire awamu n’ ettendekero lya UCU era nasaba abakwatibwako okukola kyonna ekisoboka ebikolwa bwebiti bireme kuddamu kulabikira mu bayizi.

headline: Besigye azzeemu okwekalakaasa nga abatambuza ebigere lwa bbeeyi ya bintu
text: Eyaliko Pulezidenti w’ekibiina ki Forum for Democratic (FDC) era eyavuganyako ku bwapulezidenti Rtd. Col Dr. Kizza Besigye azzeemu okutambuza ebigere nga awakanya gavumenti obutakola kimala ku bbeeyi y’ebintu eyongera okulinnya buli ddakiika. Besigye bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire mu makaage e Kasangati agambye nti akaseera katuuse bannayuganda basitukiremu bawakanya ebbeeyi y’ebintu eyeekanamye, okutulugunyizibwa awamu n’olukwe lwaPulezidenti Museveni okuleeta mutabani we Gen. Muhoozi Kainerugaba ng’omusika we ku bwapulezidenti. Dr. Kizza Besigye agamba nti akattu k’ebyenfuna eggwanga mweriri kivudde ku gavumenti okusaasaanyiza ssente ku bintu ebitalimu makulu. “Tulina abakozi ba gavumenti bangi nga bonna bakola omulimu gwe gumu kati laba RDC ne CAO, amagye ge ggwanga gali Congo ezo zonna ssen te zamuwi wa musolo,” Besigye bw’ annyonnyodde. Besigye asabye bannayuganda awatali kwekutulamu balemese Pulezidenti Museveni okuleeta mutabani we Muhoozi Kainerugaba ku bwapulezidenti. “Tulina okulwana obuyinza bukyuuke so si kuleeta musika. Tulina okuggya obukulembeze bw’eggwanga lino mu lulyo lwa Pulezidenti Museveni kuba beefuze buli kimu, tulina okutaasa eggwanga lino,” Besigye bw’annyonnyodde. Okusinziira ku Besigye, gavumenti egenda kuggyayo amaanyi gonna okulemesa obuyinza okukyuuka naye singa bannansi banaaba beteeseteese bulungi bajja kugiwangula. Oluvannyuma Besigye afulumye mu makaage okwolekera ekibuga Kampala okwekalakaasa wabula poliisi temuganyiza nemuzza mu makaage era wetukoledde eggulire lino nga eby’okwerinda binywezeddwa okwetoloola amaka ga Besigye.

headline: FDC etandise ku nteekateeka z’okulonda Pulezidenti omuggya
text: Ekibiina ki FDC kitandise okunoonya Pulezidenti w’ekibiina omuggya anadda mu bigere bya Eng. Patrick Oboi Amuriat oluvannyuma lw’ ekisanja kye okuggwako mu mwaka gwa 2020. Okusinziira ku bakulu mu kibiina kino, ekisanja kya Oboi Amuriat ekisooka eky’emyaka 3 kyaggwako mu 2020 wabula olw’embeera ya COVID-19 tebasobola kutegeka kulonda wabula ono alina omukisa okuddamu navuganya. Kinajjukirwa nti Amuriat yalondebwa mu mwezi gwe 11 mu 2017 oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula Gen Mugisha Muntu mu kulonda okwayindira mu kisaawe e Namboole. Omwogezi w’ekibiina kino, Ibrahim Ssemujju Nganda akakasizza nti ebbanga eryayongerwa Amuriat lyava ku kirwadde kya COVID-19 okusobola okutwala ekibiina kino mu maaso. Ssemujju agumizza bannakibiina kino obuteeraliikirira kuba enteekateeka zonna zigenda mu maaso okutegeka akalulu bannakibiina basalewo oba Amuriat bamwongera ekisanja oba nedda. Kinajjukirwa nti okuva ekibiina kino lwekyatandikibwawo kyakafuna abakulembeze basatu nga eyasooka ye Rtd.Col Dr. Kizza Besigye ne Gen.Mugisha Muntu awamu ne Patrick Oboi Amuriat eyamazeeko ekisanja kye ekisooka.

headline: Owa NUP Katabaazi azzeemu okuwangula Minisita Ssempijja, eby’okubala obululu kkooti ebigaanye
text: Masaka Omulamuzi wa kkooti esookerwako e Masaka, Charles Yeteise, leero ku Lwokubiri akakasizza munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Francis Katabaazi, ng’omubaka omulonde owa Kalungu East mu palamenti. Minisita Ssempijja Kino kiddiridde omulamuzi ono okulagira obululu buddemu okubalibwa wabula ne buleetebwa nga ‘Seal’ zaabwe ezimu zamenyeddwa ate nga langi z’endala zawukana. Minisita w’ebyobulimi, Vincent Ssempijja, ku Mmande yaddukidde mu kkooti e Masaka ng’asaba obululu buddemu okubalibwa ng’agamba nti baagenti be bagobebwa mu bifo ewaali walonderwa ebiwerera ddala 25, ekyawa Katabaazi omukisa okubba obululu era n’alangirirwa ng’omuwanguzi. Katabaazi yasoose kutya era n’akeera mu kkooti leero ku makya ng’asaba okugaana obululu okuddamu okubalibwa, wabula omulamuzi okusaba kwe n’akugoba ng’agamba nti obululu bulina okubalibwa olwaleero. Wabula wakati nga buli ludda lwetegese okuddamu okubala akalulu ku ssomero lya Jude Primary School mu ttawuni kkanso y’e Lukaya, obumu ku bubookisi busangiddwa nga bwasanukuddwa. ‘Seal’ ezirina okuteekebwa ku bubookisi buno zaabadde zaamenyeddwa era nga ab’ebyokwerinda ababadde babukuuma n’ababulese buli omu alemeddwa okunnyonnyola engeri gye bwamenyeseemu. Wano omulamuzi w’asinzidde n’asazaamu eby’okuddamu okubala obululu buno, ekiwadde Katabaazi obuwanguzi. Minisita Ssempijja agambye nti talina ky’amaanyi ky’asobola kwogera ku nsonga eno kuba ye azze mu kkooti ng’anoonya bwenkanya era ng’abadde tamanyi nti obubookisi bubadde bwamenyeddwa era nga basoose kubukebera nga babuleeta era nga bulamu.

headline: Bobi Wine anywezezza emitendera gyabalina okufuna Kkaadi ya NUP
text: Kampala Akulira ekibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP) Robert Kyagulanyi aka Bobi Wine, anywezezza emitenderaomuntu gyalina okuyitamu okuweebwa kkaadi y’ekibiina kiyambe okwewala empurunguse. Okusinziira ku nsonda ku kitebe ky’ekibiina, Kyagulanyi ataddewo obukiiko obwenjawulo okuziyiza abaagala okukozesa ssente bafune kkaadi y’ekibiina obutafuna mukisa.  Ensonda zategeezezza nga Kyagulanyi bweyamyumyudde emitendera oluvanyuma lw’okukimanya nga bwewaliwo abantu abafunye ssente mu gavumenti nga bategeka okuzikozesa okuwangula kkaadi. Bwebabadde batandika okusunsulamu abaagala okwesimbirawo ku kkaadi ya NUP eggulo Ssaabawandiisi w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda mu NUP Jeremiah Mwanje yakakasizza nga bwewaliwo obukiiko obuwerako obutereddwawo okulaba nga wabaawo amazima. Okusinziira ku Mwanje akakiiko akaali ku kitebe nga kagenda kukola ku babaka ba palamenti, bameeya neba ssentebe ba zi disitulikiti bwekamala okukusoya ebibuuzo n’okukebera obusobozi bwo ate oba oba olina okulinda akakiiko akasindikiddwa ku kifo ky’oyagala okuzuula oba kituufu olinayo obuwagizi. Kitegeeza nti omuntu okuweebwa kkaadi alina okuba nga asembeddwa obukiiko obutereddwawo. Akulira ekibiina kino Robert Kyagulanyi yavaayo nalabula obutattira muntu ku liiso singa anakwatirwa mu bikolwa eby’okulya enguzi era nategeeza nga ekibiina kino bwekirina okulaga enjawulo n’essuubi eri bannayuganda. Kyagulanyi yategeeza nga bwebakkiriza nti abantu bonna benkana nga tebali kufa ku kitibwa, kusoma, ddiini oba ssente za muntu yenna nga bawa bannakibiina kkaadi. Ensonda zitegeezezza nga bwewaliwo abantu abasindikiddwa okuva ku kitebe okugenda begatte ku bukiiko bwa NUP mu disitulikiti ez’enjawulo n’ebiragiro ebikambwe okulaba nga abantu abalondebwa beebo benyini abasaanidde era abalina omutima gw’ekibiina. Leero luweze olunaku olwokubiri nga akakiikon kasunsulamu abaagala bbendera ya NUP era oluvanyuma lw’ebbanga lya Sabiiti bbiri kagenda kuvaayo n’olukalala ku bagenda okukwatira ekibiina bbendera ku mitendera egy’enjawulo okwetoloola eggwang.

headline: NUP egamba bali ebintu ebikulu eby’okukola, Mao si y’omu ku byo
text: Ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) kitegeezezza nti balina ensonga enkulu ez’okukolako naye mu zo temuli yaakwanukula Ssenkaggale wa DP, Nobert Mao ku ebyo by’azze abalangira n’okubalumiriza nga bwe bakolagana ne Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni.  Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina kino, Lewis Rubongoya agamba  nti amaanyi gonna bagamalidde ku kyakulaba nti Pulezidenti Museveni bamuggya mu buyinza nga tebajja kwanukula buli gwe basanze. Bw’atyo bwe yategeezezza bannamawulire.  “ Ekiruubirirwa kya ffe (NUP) si kwanukula  Norbert Mao ku ebyo by’atwogerako. Tufa ku kimu kyakuleetawo nkyukakyuka era kino kye tutaddeko amaaso.” Rubongoya bw’agambye.  Okusinziira ku Rubongoya, NUP ne DP balina ebigendererwa bya njawulo oluvannyuma lwa mutabani wa Pulezidenti Museveni era munnamagye, Lt. Gen. Muhoozi Kainerugaba okuvaayo n’asuutasuuta Ssenkaggale w’ekibiina kya DP.  Bino we bijjidde nga Mao yaakamala okutegeeza nti bannakibiina kya NUP abalanga kimu kubeera bankwe n’akukozesa mutimbagano kuvvoola bantu balala abalina endowooza ey’enjawulo.  Mao ebisembyeyo yategeezezza nti bagenda kukkiriza  NUP kutondawo nnakyemalira ku ludda oluvuganya mu Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu nga ono gyebali tasobya wadde okwogerwako ekintu ekitagenda kukola wadde eddakiika emu.  Ku kino Rubongoya agamba nti kikyamu kuba Kyagulanyi akkiriza okuwabulwa nemu kibiina kyabwe waliwo bingi ebikyusiddwa oluvannyuma lw’okumuwabula.  Rubongoya agattako nti ebiwandiiko Mao bwasasaanya bo bennyini aba NUP bebafulumya nga talina kyanjawulo kyategeeza nsi era tasaana kumalirako budde.  “Bannayuganda balina ensonga enkulu ez’okukolako, ebintu birinnye, akalulu kaabwe baakabba bakyanoonya eby’okuddamu ku ebyo nga ate omuntu n’aleetawo ekibooziboozi okubaggya ku mulamwa,” Rubongoya bw’ategeezza.

headline: Bannabuddu banjulidde Katikkiro Mayiga ekikopo kyebawangula mu Masaza Cup 2021
text: Abakulembera ttiimu y’essaza lya Buddu nga bakulembeddwamu Pookino Jude Muleke banjulidde Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ekikopo kyebawangula mu mpaka z’omupiira gw’ Amasaza ez’omwaka oguwedde bwebakuba Buweekula 2-0 mu kisaawe kya St. Mary’s e Kitende. Omukolo guno guyindidde mu Butikkiro e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri era Kamalabyonna Mayiga asinzidde wano nabasiima olw’ekikolwa ky’obuzira kuba ekikopo kyebawangula kya muwendo nga emirundi egiwera babadde batuuka ku fayinolo naye nebalemererwa okukiwangula. “Abasambi mwatukola bulungi era mwebale ekikopo kyatuwa essanyu. Nkulisa nnyo Ppookino ne Bannabuddu mwenna, n’olukiiko lwonna n’omutendesi simuleseeyo naye n’abazannyi. Ekikopo ky’Amasaza kya kitiibwa nnyo era kyekisinga okuyaayaanirwa mukitundu ky’ Obuvanjuba nga oggyeeko e Congo,” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye.  Owek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti ebitone ebyayolesebwa byonna biraga obukulu n’amaanyi g’omuzannyo guno. Katikkiro Mayiga alaze obukulu bw’ensimbi mu muzannyo gw’omupiira okusobola okuwaayo ebikozesebwa n’ensako y’abazannyi nasiima abavujjirizi abayimirira wamu ne Buddu nesobola okutwala ekikopo. Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku by’emizannyo n’okwewummuza mu Bwakabaka, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu ayozaayozezza Buddu olw’ okutuuka ku buwanguzi buno. Yeebazizza obuwagizi obwayolesebwa Bannabuddu n’obumalirivu obwayolesebwa e Kitende wakati mu ttiimu eyali ennungi n’obukulembeze obumaliridde okuwangula. Owek. Ssekabembe agamba nti ekiseera kituuse Buganda efune ekisaawe eky’ obwannannyini okusobola okulaakulanya omuzannyo guno mu Buganda ne Uganda era nalaga nga Buganda bwegenda okukola ekikopo ky’Amasaza nga kyefaanana kyokka mu nsi yonna okusobola okwolesa amaanyi n’obukulu bwa Buganda.   Omwami w’essaza Buddu, Ppookino Jude Muleke ategeezezza nti emipiira gino gyongedde okubagatta n’okubakuumira awamu era nasaba ebitaataaganya omuzannyo guno okugyibwamu omuzannyo gusobole okugenda mu maaso. Ye Muleke asiimye abasuubuzi bannamasaka abawangaalira e Kampala ne Masaka olw’omulimu amakula gwebakoze okulaba nga bavujjirira ttiimu y’essaza lino nesobola okusitukira mu kikopo kino. Avunaanyizibwa ku ttiimu eno, Nalubowa yeebazizza Katikkiro Mayiga olw’okwagala Buddu nokugiwa obuwangizi mu buli ngeri yonna esoboka.

headline: Twitter eggadde ebibanja by’abawagira Muhoozi
text: Abaddukanya omutimbagano gwa Twitter baggadde ebibanja by ‘abawagizi b’ Omudduumizi w’eggye ly’okuttaka mu UPDF,Lt Gen Muhoozi Kainerugaba. Gyebukeeredde ku Lwokubiri nga bangi ku bano tebasobola kuyingira munda mu bibanja byabwe ku mutimbagano guno ekibaleetedde okutegeeza nga bwebayiganyizibwa olw’endowooza z’ ebyobufuzi zebalina. Wadde ekituufu ku nsonga lwaki emikutu gino gigaddwa tekinamanyika wabula bategeezezza nti bwebalwanye okugezaako okugiyingiramu bategeezeddwa nga bwebamenye agamu ku mateeka agafuga omutimbagano guno. Twitter yategeezezza nti bano baziimudde agamu ku mateeka naye nesuuubiza okukwatagana ne bannanyini bibanja bino abalowooza nti ekyakoleddwa kyabadde kikyamu era bwezinazuulwa nti yabadde nsobi bakugibaddiza. “Ekibanja ky’omuntu bwekikozesebwa okuvuma omulala oba okutiisatiisa tusobola okukiggala okumala akaseera oba okukiggalira ddala,” Twitter bwe yannyonnyodde. Bano bagamba nti era kisoboka okuggala ekibanja ky’omuntu singa wabaawo abagezaako okukikikitanya okukiyingiramu nga kino kikolebwa okutaasa nnyini kyo. Kinajjukirwa nti omwezi oguwedde, Gen. Muhoozi yawannulayo ekibanja kye ku mutimbagano gwa Twitter ku nsonga ezaali zitamanyiddwa wabula oluvannyuma yategeeza nti yalina okusalawo kweyalina okusooka okukola. Muhoozi azze agumya abawagizi be okubeera abanywevu era oluvannyuma lw’akaseera ono ekibanja kye yakizzaayo ku Twitter negyebuli kati agukozesa wadde abantu abenjawulo mu ggwanga bazze bamukolokota nti agukozesa okuzannya eby’obufuzi ebyawula mu bantu ate nga munene mu maggye.

headline: Bobi Wine  ayaniriza eby’omukago gwa Bulaaya okugaana okuwa Uganda ssente z’okusima amafuta, agamba baali baalwawo
text: Akulira ekibiina ki Forum for Democratic Change (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine), asanyukidde eky’omukago gwa Bulaaya okugaana ensi yonna okuwa Uganda ssente z’okusima n’okuzimba omudumu gw’ Amafuta. Bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku Lwokusatu ku kitebe e Kamwokya, Kyagulanyi agambye nti kino kyali kyalwawo kuba ebibuuzo omukago guno byegulina nabo ng’ ekibiina byebalina. “Tuli basanyufu nti baasobodde okunokolayo ensonga y’okulinyirira eddembe ly’obuntu, Obutonde bwensi awamu n’endala. Okumala ekiseera tubadde tusaba amawanga g’ebweri okukomya okuvujjirira gavumenti ya Museveni,” Kyagulanyi bw’ategeezezza. Bobi Wine yeebazizza bannayuganda bawangaalira mu mawanga g’ebweru olw’okulemera ku nsonga kuba Museveni amafuta agatwala nga agage ag’obwannannyini. Ono agamba nti wadde kino bakisanyukira naye baagala omukago gwa Bulaaya gwongere okuluma kuba Pulezidenti Museveni ne banne bayitiridde okulinyirira eddembe ly’obuntu. Kino kiddiridde, Palamenti y’omukago gwa Bulaaya ku Lwokusatu lwa wiiki ewedde okugaana okuteeka ssente mu nteekateeka y’okusima amafuta nga bagamba nti kino kijja kwongera okulinyirira eddembe ly’obuntu. Bano nga bali wamu basaba kampuni ya TotalEnergies okwongezaayo enteekateeka eno, basobole okukola okunoonyereza okuzuula engeri amafuta gano gyegasobola okusimibwamu nga tegonoonya butonde awamu n’ennyanja eziri mu Uganda ne Tanzania. Oluvannyuma lwakino waliwo bannayuganda abalumbye ekitebe ky’omukago gwa Bulaaya mu Kampala ku Lwokubiri ne beekalakaasa ku kyasaliddwawo Palamenti ya Bulaaya. Wabula Pulezidenti Museveni yakakasizza bannayuganda nga kino bwekitagenda kukosa mulimu kwebaliko era enteekateeka y’okusima amafuta ejja kugenda mu maaso nga bwerina okutambula.

headline: Ebya Kyagulanyi okuggyayo omusango bifulumye mu kyapa kya gavumenti
text: Kampala Okusaba kwa munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu kwe yakola mu kkooti Ensukkulumu ng’asaba okuggyayo omusango kufulumidde mu kyaba kya gavumenti nga kkooti bweyalagira ng’awakanya okulondebwa ku Museveni. Ssaabalamuzi Alfonse Owiny Dollo Mu kyapa ekimanyiddwa nga ‘Uganda Gazette’ ekifulumye leero ku Mmande kirangirira ku bwetaavu bwa Kyagulanyi okuggyayo omusango mu kkooti Ensukkulumu. “Kuno kutegeeza nti okusaba okwateekebwa mu kkooti Ensukkulumu nga Kyagulanyi Ssentamu ayagala okuggyayo omusango ogwekuusa ku kulondebwa kwa Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni Tibuhaburwa Kaguta,” Ekirango kya Gazette bwe kisomye. Ssaabalamuzi, Alfonse Owiny Dollo wiiki ewedde yategeeza nti okusaba kwa Kyagulanyi okuggyayo omusango kw’alina okusooka okufulumira mu kyapa, kkooti eryoke eguwulire. Mu kusaba kwe okuggyayo omusango guno, Kyagulanyi yagamba nti kkooti yalina kyekubiira, abajulizi be bonna bawambibwa, batulugunyizibwa awamu n’okutiisatiisibwa ab’ebyokwerinda ate abalala banoonyerezebwako. “Omuwaabi yafiirwa obudde bungi ng’asibiddwa mu maka ge naye kkooti eno efaayo nnyo eri obudde obwateekebwawo ekintu ekyakosa omuwaabi ate ne kikolera abawawaabirwa. Kyagulanyi bwe yategeeza. “Oluvannyuma lw’okwekenneenya ku ebyo ebigenda mu maaso, n’asazeewo nti eky’okuggyayo omusango guno kye kituufu ekirina okukolebwa kuba kkooti eno eraze kyekubiira.” Kyagulanyi bwe yannyonnyodde. Mu kwanukula, abawawaabirwa abasatu okuli; Pulezidenti Museveni, akakiiko k’ebyokulonda ne Ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti nti bakkaanya n’ekyokuggyayo omusango wadde ng’ensonga tebakkaanya nazo. Bano bagamba nti Kyagulanyi aliko bye yalimbye mu nsonga ze yawaddeyo ng’aggyayo omusango guno ogw’akalulu ka 2021.

headline: Kyagulanyi eri Byabakama: Koma ku b’ebyokwerinda oba olekulire
text: Kampala Akwatidde ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) bbendera ku bwapulezidenti mu kalulu ka 2021, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine), asabye ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda Omulamuzi Simon Byabakama, alekulire bw’aba tasobola kugamba ku b’ebyokwerinda okweddako.  Bino Kyagulanyi abyogeredde mu nsisinkano gy’abaddemu ne Byabakama ku kitebe ky’akakiiko mu Kampala oluvannyuma lw’okuyimiriza okunoonya akalulu eggulo ng’agamba nti ab’ebyokwerinda basusse okumukolako n’abantu be obukambwe. “Tubasabye bategeke akalulu kano oba si ekyo balekulire. Tubasabye bakome ku b’ebyokwerinda era balagire amagye gave mu kalulu kano era balagire poliisi ekomye okutuggalira amakubo,” Kyagulanyi bw’agambye. Kyagulanyi agenze n’obujulizi bwe bimu ku ebyo ebituuse ku bawagizi be mu bitundu ebyenjawulo ng’anoonya akalulu ng’abamu bakubiddwa amasasi ate abalala bakubiddwa obukebe bwa ttiyaggaasi. Ebifaananyi Kyagulanyi by’alaze Byabakama kuliko ebyo eby’emmotoka ye eyakubiddwa amasasi eggulo mu Jinja wamu n’engeri poliisi gy’ezze emulemesaaamu okukozesa enguudo ez’enjawulo. Omubaka Kyagulanyi oluvannyuma lw’ensisinkano eno ategeezezza bannamawulire nti tagenze kuba asuubira omulamuzi Byabakama okubaako ky’akolawo mu bwangu wabula ayagadde ateeke okwemulugunya kwe mu lwattu. Bobi Wine yavaayo n’ategeeza nti wakati nga poliisi emutulugunya n’okumukolako obulabe, akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kabadde kasirise. Kyagulanyi alumiriza nti waliwo abantu abatambulira mu ngoye za bulijjo abawa abapoliisi ebiragiro by’okumugaana okweyongerayo. Ono asuubirwa okuddamu okukuba enkung’aana ze enkya era ng’agenda kutandikira mu disitulikiti y’e Namutumba. We tukoledde eggulire lino ng’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kategeka okufulumyawo ekiwandiiko ku nsisinkano yaabwe ne Kyagulanyi.

headline: Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye n’agemebwa ekirwadde kya COVID-19
text: Kireka – Kyaddondo Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II, asiimye n’agemebwa ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona awamu ne Maama Nnaabagereka Sylvia Nagginda. Kabaka abakugu bamusanze mu Lubiri lwe  e Kireka enkya ya leero ku Lwokutaano. Kino kikakasiddwa Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ng’ayita ku mukutu gwe ogwa Twitter. Abakugu bano bakuliddwa Dr. Simon Luzige owa Nakasero Hospital erisangibwa wano mu Kampala. Kino kiddiridde Beene okulabikako eri Obuganda ku lunaku lw’okujaguza amazaalibwa ge mu Lubiri e Mmengo. Maama Nnaabagereka Sylvia Nagginda ategeezezza nti basazeewo okwegemesa Ssennyiga Corona kibayambe okwekuuma obulungi singa akawuka kabatuukako. “Oluvannyuma lw’okwetegereza ensonga zonna ezeetoolodde akayiso kano n’eddagala lino, twasazeewo nti naffe tukafune.” Bw’atyo Nnaabagereka Nagginda bw’ategeezezza oluvannyuma lw’okugemwa. Nnaabagereka Nagginda akunze abantu okweyunira okugemebwa kiyambe omubiri gwabwe okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino singa kibeera kibakutte. Kinajjukirwa nti Beene bwe yabadde ku mazaalibwa ge ag’emyaka 66 mu Lubiri e Mmengo, yalagidde okwewala ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kuba kikyali kingi mu bantu.

headline: Ab’e Kyaggwe bafunye endokwa okutandika emmeresezo
text: Ekitongole kya Buganda ekivunaanyizibwa ku bulimi ekya BUCADEF leero ku Lwokutaano kiwadde e ssaza ly’e Kyaggwe endokwa z’emmwanyi lukumi okusobola okutandikawo emereresezo ly’emmwanyi mu ssaza lino. Kino kikoleddwa mu nteekateeka y’okuyambako okutumbula ekirime ky’emmwanyi mu bantu ba Beene basobole okwegobako obwavu. Emmeresezo eno eteereddwa ku mbuga y’essaza e Ggulu mu kibuga Mukono nga yakuyambako okutuusa ekirime ky’emmwanyi mu bantu abazeetaaga awamu nokuzagazisa abantu. Omukwanaganya w’emirimu mu kitongole kya BUCADEF, Samuel Muwanga ategeezezza nti ekigendererwa kya kwongera ku bungi bw’emmwanyi obulimibwa mu ssaza lino ne Buganda. Omwami akulembera essaza lino, Ssekiboobo Elijah Bogere Lubanga Mulembya agamba bagenda kufuba okulaba nga batumbula emmwanyi okuddamu okubeera ekirime ekyettunzi nga bwekyali edda. Ye akulira eby’obulimi mu ssaza lino Philly Lubega yeebazizza Ssaabasajja kabaka olw’okulonda Kyaggwe okutandikiramu enteekateeka eno ey’emereresezo kuba kigenda kuyambako okuggya abantu b’Omutanda mu bwavu. Lubega annyonnyodde nti mu bbanga lya myezi mukaaga bagya kutandika okugabira abalimi endokwa z’emmwanyi

headline: Bobi Wine, Amuriat, Muntu basabye abantu balonde  bakuume akalulu
text: Kampala Abeesimbyewo ku bwapulezidenti okuli; Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine), Patrick Oboi Amuriat ne Mugisha Muntu, basabye bannayuganda okulonda mu bungi era bakuume akalulu kaabwe oluvannyuma lw’okulonda ku Lwokuna. Mugisha Muntu, Oboi Amuriat ne Bobi Wine Bano okusaba kuno bakukoledde mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire lwe batuuzizza ku Hotel Africana olwaleero ku Lwokubiri. Kyagulanyi ne banne basabye bannayuganda okukuuma akalulu k’omulundi guno nga tebafuddeyo ku kibiina kya byabufuzi oli mw’ali naye balwanirire obuwanguzi bwa bannayuganda. Bino we bijjidde ng’ebbula ennaku bbiri zokka eggwanga ligenda mu kulonda era ng’abooludda oluvuganya baluubirira okuwangula Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni, amaze emyaka 35 mu ntebe. Bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire, alina kkaadi ya FDC, Patrick Oboi Amuriat, ategeezezza nti omulimu omunene gusigalidde kakiiko ka byakulonda okulaba ng’okulonda kubeera kw’amazima kuba bo beegasse okwanika ebirumira ebinaakubeeramu. “Njagala okutegeeza akakiiko k’ebyokulonda nti bwe baba tebasobola kutegeka kalulu kalimu mazima n’obwenkanya, babeera tebalina mugaso ng’ekitongole.” Amuriat bw’agambye. Ate ye alina bbendera ya Alliance for National Transformation (ANT), Mugisha Muntu, agambye nti bo ng’abavuganya omulimu gwabwe bagukoze nga kati kiri eri bannayuganda okumaliriza ekkatala lino. Muntu agambye nti bannayuganda abawerako balaze nga bwe batagenda kulonda olw’emivuyo egibadde mu kunoonya akalulu. Wabula ono abasabye okuvaayo balonde, olutalo lusobole okuwangulwa. Ye Kyagulanyi Ssentamu nga yeesimbyewo ku kkaadi ya NUP, yennyamidde olw’okutulugunyizibwa ab’ebyokwerinda era nga bano baamutandikirawo nga yaakamala okwewandiisa. Bobi Wine annyonnyodde nti mu Uganda gwafuuka musango okuvuganya Pulezidenti Museveni. Kyagulanyi asabye bannayuganda okuvaayo okulonda mu bungi era bakuume akalulu kaabwe era baleme kugendera ku bigambo bya ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda,Simon Byabakama, eyabalagidde okudda eka. “ Temugendera ku bigambo bya Byabakama kubanga bimenya amateeka, temulina tteeka lyonna lye mubeera mumenye okusigala ku bifo awalonderwa okukuuma akalulu kammwe.” Bobi Wine bw’agambye. Ono asabye abantu okukozesa essimu zaabwe okukwata buvidiyo n’ebifaananyi singa balaba ebitagenda bulungi mu kalulu era beeyambise omutimbagano ku Uvote. Mu nsisinkano eno, eyavuganyako ku bwapulezidenti, Dr. Kiiza Besigye, yeewuunyizza ku butabanguko obubadde mu kkampeyini z’omulundi guno nga wadde yavuganyako emirundi egisoba mu ena, naye tabulabangako.

headline: Katikkiro Akuutidde Bannayuganda Obutassa Mukono Kukulwanyisa Kirwadde Kya Coronavirus
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abantu ba Uganda obutasuula nnanga mu kulwanyisa ekirwadde kya coronavirus. Bwabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga mu maka g’obwakatikkiro, mu Butikkiro e Mmengo, Mayiga agambye nti abantu bangi kati beerabidde nti tebalina kukwata bantu mungalo, obuteekwata mu nnyindo, akamwa n’amaaso, okwambala obukookolo wamu n’okussa mu nkola enkola ya tonsemberera. Oweek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti ssenyiga kolona tannafuna ddagala. “Ng’ojjeeko ennambika etuweebwa ab’ebyobulamu tulina okusigala nga tutambulira ku nnambika etuweebwa gavumenti; tulina okubitambulirako; era ekimu ku bbyo kwekusigala ewaka eri abo abatalina nnyo nsonga ebajjayo. Abaana mubakuumire awaka ate abazadde mufube okulaba nga beewala emize,” Mayiga bwagambye. Asabye abaana okufuba okusomera awaka era n’abazadde okufuba okulaba ng’abaana bagoberera byebalaba ku terefaayina. Mu birala, Mayiga asabye abantu okukomya okukungaana ku mikolo egy’enjawulo kubanga gyebakoma okukungaana abangi, gyebakomya okutambuza akawuka kolona. “Ensi tejja kusaanawo nga tokoze mukolo naye bwekiba kyakufa nakuwona, mu kikole nga mu kungaana batono. Ebiragiro bino byonna bikaluubiriza naye bitaasa bulamu bwaffe kubanga kyekyokulwanyisa kyokka kyetulinawo,” Mayiga bwagambye. Agasseeko nti Pulezidenti Museveni bweyatoowolokosa ku mateeka g’omuggalo abantu abamu baalowooza kolona aweddeyo. “Twagala abantu bakole basobole okweyimirizaawo, balabirire abantu baabwe, bakulaakulane badde ku ntikko, twagala Buganda ngeri ku ntikko mu byenfuna ne mu mbeera z’abantu naye twagala abantu basooke bataase obulamu,” Mayiga bwagambye. Woosomera bino ng’omuwendo gw’abantu abaakazuulwamu kolona guweze 724 mu Uganda.

headline: AKALULU 2021: Bobi Wine Kkooti emuyise ku by’obuyigirize
text: Wakiso Omulamuzi omukulu owa Kkooti ento e Wakiso, afulumizza ekibaluwa ki bakuntumye eri omubaka era akulira ekibiina ki ‘National Unity Platform (NUP)’ Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine), nga kimuyita okwewozaako ku misango gy’okujingirira ebiwandiiko.  Okusinziira ku kiwandiiko Kyagulanyi mu kkooti alina kulabikayo nga 16/09/2020 ku ssaawa 4 ez’okumakya. Munnamateeka Male Mabirizi, yeyakubye Kyagulanyi mu kkooti nga agamba nti ebimu ku biwandiiko byeyawaayo kuliko; ebifu, ebimu bijingiririre ate nga n’ebirala yabikyuusakyusa ekikontana n’amateeka. Ekibaluwa kino ekifulumiziddwa olwaleero ku Lwokubiri nga 1/09/2020 kiraga nti Kyagulanyiyewandisiza ku biwandiiko bikyamu bweyali yeesimbyewo ku bubaka bwa Palamenti obwa Kyaddondo East.  Bino webigidde nga Kyagulanyi yakamala okulambulula kyeyayise ensobi ezaakolebwa era nga eky’emyaka gye okubeera nga gikyukakyuka kyava ku kyakukola bibuuzo bya P.7 nga ali mu P.6 olw’obuzibu kitaawe bweyalina mu by’ensimbi. Kyagulanyi yalambuludde nga kano bwekali akakodyo ka Pulezidenti Museveni kubanga azze akakola ku bantu ab’enjawulo nga n’Omubaka Kizige mu 2006 yatwala Dr. Kizza Besigye mu kkooti nga agamba nti yajingirira ebiwandiiko naye era tekyakola. Mabirizi azze yewera okulemesa Robert Kyagulanyi okwesimbawo mukulonda kwa bonna okwa 2021 nga agamba nti ono ssi mwesimbu kuvuganya ku bwapulezidenti bwaba aliko akabuuza ku buyigirize n’emyaka gye. Abakulira ekibiina ki NUP bavuddeyo nebalaga okutya olw’abantu bebayise ba Mafia abongedde okusensera ekibiina kyabwe wamu n’okusomola ebyama nga wetwogerera waliwo bannakibiina abamaze edda okulaga nga bwebagenda okusala eddiiro badde mu NRM. Abakulu kino bagamba nti bamaze dda okuteekawo akakiiko kanoonyereze ensibuko yaakyo era nebagumya ne bannakibiina okwongera okukyesiga.

headline: Aba BUCADEF babangudde bannakyaggwe mu kulunda enkoko
text: Ekitongole kya Ssaabasajja Kabaka ekivunaanyizibwa ku bulunzi n’obulimi ekya BUCADEF, kitegekedde bannakyaggwe omusomo ne kibabangula mu ngeri gye basobola okulundamu enkoko ne bakuuma n’omutindo. Omusomo guno gwayindidde ku mbuga ya Mituba IV Kauga mu disitulikiti y’e Mukono mu ssaza ly’e Kyaggwe eggulo ku Lwokuna. Dr. Steven Lule Kibuuse ng’asomesa abalunzi e Kyaggwe. Akulira eby’obulunzi mu BUCADEF, Gerald Kisawuzi, yannyonnyodde nti omulunzi yenna bw’aba tannatandika kulunda nkoko alina by’alina okusooka okwetegereza wamu n’okugoberera okusobola okuzifunamu. Abakugu abaaleeteddwa ekitongole kino baalabudde abalunzi ku ddagala ettuufu lye balina okukozesa wamu n’emmere gye balina okugiwa kuba singa abantu balya enkoko oba amagi agataali ga mutindo, kisobola okukosa obulamu bwabwe. Omusawo w’ebisolo, Dr. Steven Lule Kibuuse, yasabye abalunzi bulijjo okusooka okwekenneenya amaduuka wamu n’eddagala lye bagula, bwe baba baagala okufuna mu mulimu guno. Yabalabudde ku kabi akali mu kuliisa enkoko kasooli akukudde kuba ono aba yamaze dda okufuuka obutwa eri ebinyonyi bino n’ebisolo, ekisobola n’okukosa obulamu bw’abantu. Dr. Lule, abalunzi yabawadde amagezi bafeeyo okulabirira obulungi enkoko zaabwe bwe baba baagala okuzifunamu amagoba. Ye Ssekiboobo Elijah Bogere Lubanga Mulembye, yategezezza nti essaza ly’e Kyaggwe limaze okulaba nga buli ggombolola libeera ne kye lyesibako okukola, okusobola okuggyamu ensimbi. Ye amyuka akulira abakozi ba gavumenti eyaawakati mu disitulikiti y’e Mukono, Jessica Ndagire, yasabye abalunzi okulaba nga buli kimu kye bakola bassaamu amaanyi gaabwe gonna ng’awo we bajja okusobola okufunamu. Ndagire yabategeezezza nti gavumenti yaawakati ng’eyita mu disitulikiti y’e Mukono, egenda okugulira essaza ly’e Kyaggwe ekyuma ekyaluza obukoko.

headline: Sipiika Kadaga ayise Minisita w’ensonga z’omunda ku by’okukuba ab’Embogo ttiyaggaasi
text: Kampala Sipiika wa Palamenti, Rebecca Kadaga, ayise Minisita w’ensonga z’omunda mu ggwanga atangaaze ku nsonga z’okukuba ttiyaggaasi mu b’ekika ky’Embogo.  Ono alagidde Minisita w’ensonga z’omunda, Gen. Jeje Odongo, alabikeko mu palamenti annyonnyole eggwanga ekituufu ekyavaako okulumba abataka n’okubakubamu ttiyaggaasi wakati nga bali mu kitambiro kya Mmisa ku butaka bwabwe. Ekiragiro kino Sipiika akiyisizza leero ku Lwokubiri oluvannyuma lw’omubaka w’ekibuga ky’e Mityana, Francis Zaake okusaba palamenti eyingire mu nsonga eno kubanga aduumira Poliisi y’e Mityana, Alex Mwine Mukono, assusizza okulinnyirira eddembe lya bannansi mu kitundu kino. “Twabadde twambadde obukookolo era nga tugoberedde bulungi amateeka, abantu abaabaddewo baabadde waka waabwe, era kyabadde tekyetaagisa. Kyensaba Owek. Sipiika, ye Minisita w’ensonga z’omunda mu ggwanga okwetonda olwekyo kye baakola era awummuze ne DPC Alex Mukono Mwine kubanga ebikolwa nga bino azze abikola naye nga takubwa ku mukono,” Omubaka Zaake bw’asabye. Ab’Embogo baabadde bakung’aanye okwebaza Katonda olw’obuvunaanyizibwa bwa Jjajja Kayiira Gajuule Kasibante ng’omukubiriza w’abataka okumala ebbanga lya myaka musanvu era nga Mmisa yabadde ekulembeddwa Omusumba wa Masaka eyawummula, John Baptist Kaggwa wabula nga bano poliisi yabakubyemu ttiyaggaasi olw’ebigambibwa nti Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi naye yabadde waakugwetabako. Eggulo poliisi yavuddeyo ne yeetondera ab’ekika ky’Embogo awamu n’Eklezia Katolika olwebyo ebyaliwo naye n’etegeeza nti entabwe yavudde ku bategesi butasooka kutegeezaako poliisi. Omwogezi wa Poliisi Ennanga yagambye nti, bafunye amawulire nti bannabyabufuzi okuli David Kalwanga ne Francis Zaake, baabadde baakwetaba mu nteekateeka eno era nga wakati nga baziyiza abavubuka abaabadde baagala okwegatta ku mukolo guno, ekizibu we kyavudde ttiyaggaasi n’asasaanira abakulu. Ate ku Ssande Mukuumaddamula Charles Peter Mayiga yategeezezza nti ekikolwa kino kyabadde kikyamu kubanga obutaka bw’ebika bulinga masinzizo nga tebuboola mu ndowooza za byabufuzi.

headline: Abamerika basiimye Ssaabasajja Kabaka n’engule
text: Ekitongole ekivunaanyizibwa ku kukung’aanya omusaayi mu ggwanga lya Amerika ki International Divisions of America’s Blood Centre, kiwadde Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi, engule olw’okulwanirira obulamu bw’abantu nga ayita mu kubakunga n’okukung’aanya omusaayi mu masaza ge ag’enjawulo. Engule eno ekwasiddwa Ssenkulu w’ekitongole kya Kabaka Foundation Omuk. Eddie Kaggwa Ndagala ku mukolo ogubadde mu ssaza lya Arizona mu Amerika eggulo ku Lwokusatu. Omuk. Kaggwa Ndagala yasinzidde wano neyeebaza Ssaabasajja Kabaka olw’okuvaayo n’enteekateeka ez’enjawulo eziyambye okutumbula eby’obulamu mu Buganda ne Uganda. Ono era asiimye bannamikago ab’enjawulo abayambyeko okuteeka ekiragiro kya Kabaka mu nkola era nawera nti Amasaza ga Nnyinimu gonna bakugatuukamu akadde konna. Ate abaami ba Kabaka abakulembera abaganda mu kitundu kino ekya Arizona nga bakulembeddwamu Owek. Samuel Kalulu ne batendereza Beene olw’okubeera omukulembeze alumirirwa abantu be. Mukiseera kino kawefube w’okugaba omusaayi yakatalaaga amasaza mukaaga okuli Kyadondo,Busiro,Kyagwe,Ssingo,Bulemeezi,Buddu era Yuniti z’omusaayi ezisoba mu 9 zakungaanyizibwa. Okusobola okutumbula enteekateeka eno, Omutanda yasiima essaza eribeera lisinze okukung’aanya omusaayi buli mwaka okuweebwa ekirabo ky’eddwaliro awamu n’engabo. Enteekateeka y’okugaba omusaayi ekyataaga amasaza gono agakola obwakabaka bwa buganda okutaasa abantu bakabaka abaffa olw’ebbula ly’omusaayi.

headline: Minisita Kyewalabye Male asabye gavumenti eyongere ssente mu by’Obulambuzi
text: Minisita w’Obuwangwa, Obulambuzi n’Embiri, Oweek. David Kyewalabye Male, asabye gavumenti eyongere ssente mukutumbula eby’obulambuzi kubanga byebimu ku biwaniridde eggwanika ly’ eggwanga. Okusaba kuno Owek. Kyewalabye akukoledde ku kabaga akaategekeddwa ekitongole ky’Obwakabaka eky’Ebyobulambuzi (BHTB), nga bali wamu ne Miss Tourism Uganda, okuyozaayoza Nnalulungi w’Ebyobulambuzi mu ggwanga, Sydney Nabulya Kavuma olw’okuwangula obukulu buno ku biyiriro bye Kalagala mu Bugerere. Owek. Male yeebazizza nnyo Nabulya olwa kaweefube gwe yateekamu okutuuka ku buwanguzi era n’amukuutira okukuuma omutindo, akiikirire bulungi Obwakabaka mu mpaka z’ensi yonna zaagenda okwetabamu. Minisita Kyewalabye yeebazizza nnyo ne Maama Nnaabagereka olwa kaweefube gw’atadde ku nkulaakulana y’omwana omuwala mu Buganda. Ye Nnalulungi Nabulya Sydney Kavuma, yeebazizza nnyo Gavumenti ya Beene, ekitongole eky’obulambuzi ne Obuganda bwonna olw’obuwagizi obw’omuggundu. Yasuubizza okukiirira bulungi Buganda ne Uganda mu mpaka z’ensi yonna z’agendamu ssabbiiti ejja e Malaysia. Akabaga keetabiddwako Mugerere, Oweek. James Ssempigga, Omumyuka we Hajj Bashir Ziraba, Abaami ba Ssaabasajja ku mitendera egy’enjawulo, Omuk. Busuulwa Farooq eyakiikiridde Ssentebe wa BHTB, Ssenkulu wa BHTB Omuk. Victoria Kayaga Kiggundu, Omw. Luggya owa Miss Tourism Uganda.

headline: Nnamungi w’omuntu yeeyiye mu Bulange okwegemesa
text: Nnamungi w’omuntu yakedde kweyiwa ku mbuga enkulu e Bulange e Mmengo okwegemesa ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ku bwereere mu nteekateeka ewagiddwa Obwakabaka awamu ne bannamikago okuli Uganda Breweries, PSFU n’abalala. Bano baasimbye ennyiriri okuva ku Wankaaki okutuukira ddala ku mulyango oguyingira mu kizimbe kya Masengere wabula eky’enjawulo zino zibadde zitambula wakati mu kukuuma ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona era ekitongole kya Red Cross kibadde kiyambako okulung’amya abantu okusobola okwegemesa mu budde. Akulira bakitunzi mu kkampuni ya Uganda Breweries, Jackie Tahakanizibwa yategeezezza ng’abantu bwe baawulidde ekiragiro kya Ssaabasajja Kabaka nga zaagenze okuwera essaawa 7 ez’emisana ng’abantu abawera 3500 be bamaze okugemebwa. Ate ye akulira okwegemesa ekirwadde kino mu ggwanga, Dr. Daniel Kyabayinze yasinzidde wano n’asiima Obwakabaka ne bannamikago olw’okukunga abantu mu bungi ate ne bajja kuba kino kyongedde ku muwendo gw’abantu abagemeddwa.  Wabula Dr. Kyabayinze omukwanaganya w’okugema Covid 19 mu kitongole ky’ebyobulamu mu gavumenti eyaawakati yalabudde abagemeddwa omulundi gwabwe ogusooka okwekenneenya eddagala lye babakubye kibayambe mu kufuna akayiso akookubiri obutatabiikiriza kika kya ddagala. Kinajjukirwa nti Minisitule y’ebyobulamu ezze esiitaana n’okukunga abantu okwegemesa wabula okuva Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi ne Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga lwe basitukiramu, embeera eno egenze ekyukamu naddala wano mu Buganda. Abamu ku baganyuddwa mu nteekateeka eno bategeezezza nti bulijjo balinze ekiva embuga okusobola okwettanira enteekateeka eno era ne basaba Omutanda asiimye okugema kuno kutwalibwe mu masaza ga Buganda kuba bangi ku baliyo tebannaba kugemebwa.

headline: Basabye gavumenti ebongere obukookolo
text: Abamu ku bakulemebeze b’ebitundu nga bafuna masiki  Kampala Abakulembeze mu Kampala basabye gavumenti eyongere okugabira abantu obukookolo (Masiki ) kubanga abantu abasinga tebafunye. Gyebuvuddeko gavumenti yali yatongozza okugaba masiki mu bitundu bya Kampala eri abantu okuva ku myaka 16 n’okudda waggulu mu kaweefube w’okugezaako okubatangira ekirwadde ki COVID19. Okugaba masiki kuno kwatandikira ku disitulikiti eziri ku nsalo z’eggwanga mu mwezi gw’omukaaga n’oluvanyuma nebagattako ebitundu ebirala. era nga mu Kampala ekitongole ki KCCA kyaweebwa masiki 2, 067,500 zekyalina okugaba. Ssentebe wa zooni wa Budonian mu Kisenyi ku kyalo Mengo Moses Kawuma, yagambye nti yawereddwa masiki 1000 era nalugaba neluggwawo wabula nga bangi ku batuuze tebafunye abamu nebatuuka n’okumunyigira. Ate ye Israel Musaazi Ssentebe wa Kifumbira Zzooni e Kamwokya yagambye nti yawereddwa masiki 8000 wadde nga abatuuze balina basoba mu mutwalo omulamba. E Gogonya zooni II mu divizoni ye Makindye, kansala w’ekitundu kino Jane Namukasa, yakukkulumye nti bawereddwa masiki 1300 zokka wadde nga kiriko abantu abasoba mu 9000. Ate bbo abamu ku batuuze abawereddwa masiki zino bategeezezza nga bweziri entono ennyo nga n’omutindo gwazo mubi nnyo. “Ki masiki kigumu nnyo omuntu abeera tasobola nakusa nezaffe zetwegulira zizisinga,” Catherine Akech bweyategeezezza. Kinajjukirwa nti omulimu guno gwaweebwa kkampuni mukaaga era kuzino kuliko; Lida Packaging Products Limited, Southern Range Nyanza Limited (Nytil) Evergreen Safaris Limited, Jude Color Solutions Limited, Winfred Fashion designers Limited ne Fine Spinners Limited wadde nga ekitongole ky’omutindo kyali kyakkiriza kkampuni 49.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asisinkanye abakungu okuva mu FIFA
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, asisinkanye abakungu okuva mu kibiina ekitwala omupiira mu nsi yonna ekya FIFA ne Fufa, okumulagaenteekateeka y’okuzimba ekisaawe ku ttaka Buganda lye yawaayo e Lugazi, w’etuuse. Abakungu bano abaabadde bakulembeddwa Abigail Lemma ne Pulezidenti wa FUFA, Eng. Moses Magog, beebazizza Obwakabaka olw’okuwaayo ettaka lino okunaateekebwa ekisaawe ekituuza abantu abawera emitwalo 2. Katikkiro agamba nti engeri aba FIFA gye baasiimye ekifo ekyaweebwayo,FUFA erina okulaba nti tezannyisa mukisa guno. “Bwe tufuna omukisa okukolagana ne FUFA era ne FIFAne tuzimba ekisaawe e Lugazi, kijja kuyamba nnyo omupiira mu Uganda.” Owek. Mayiga bwe yagasseeko. Owek. Mayiga yasinzidde wano n’alabula abavubuka abafunye omukisa okuzuula ebitone byabwe naddala abasamba omupiira, omukisa guno okugukozesa obulungi nga batereka ssente ate n’okwewala emize. Mu nsisinkano eno, Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga yategeezeza nti Buganda erina entegeka okuzimba ebisaawe mu buli ssaza era nga basuubira nti enkolagana eno yaakuyambako okutuukiriza ekiruubirirwa kino. Kinajjukirwa nti mu 2018, Obwakabaka bwawaayo yiika 10 e Lugazi okuzimbako ekisaawe ekigendaokutuuza abantu emitwalo ebiri ng’ensimbi ezigenda okukizimba zigenda kuva mu kibiina ekiddukanya omuzannyo gw’omupiira mu nsi yonna ekya FIFA. Pulezidenti wa FUFA, Moses Magogo yagambyenti ekireese abakulu ba FIFA kwe kulambula emirimu egikolebwa FUFA nga mw’otadde n’ettaka ly’e Lugazi, Buganda lye yawaayo okuzimbako ekisaawe. Akulira eby’emirimu mu FUFA, Edgar Watson yannyonnyodde nti ekifo kino kirambulwa buli kadde era ngenteekateeka ezisooka zitambula bulungi, wadde nga bakyalina okusoomoozebwa kw’ensimbi kuba be balina okukuba pulaani y’ekisaawe.

headline: Omulangira Nakibinge alabudde ab’ebyokwerinda ku lyanyi eriyitiridde
text: Jjajja w’Obusiraamu, Omulangira Kasim Nakibinge, atabukidde ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda olwokukozesa eryanyi eriyitiridde nga bagumbulula bannabyabufuzi ku ludda oluvuganya. Omulangira Nakibinge nga alabula abapoliisi ku kutulugunya bannansi Okulabula kuno Omulangira akukoledde Kibuli olwaleero ku Lwokuna mu kusaalira Omugenzi Dr. Anas Kariisa eyafudde mu kiro ky’eggulo n’atendereza emirimu gy’akoledde Obusiraamu n’okuyamba abanaku. “Sijja kukoowa kugamba bitongole ebikuumaddembe, nammwe mukuume amateeka, musussizza obukambwe, musussizza okutulugunya abantu. Simanyi abagamba kintu kino nti olina kukozesa maanyi ku muntu.” Omulangira Nakibinge bw’annyonnyodde. Omulangira annyonnyodde nti eryanyi terisobola kwagaza bantu kye baakyawa, baagala kye baagala, n’asaba wabeewo obwenkanya era bannansi basobole okubeera mu mirembe. Asabye bannayuganda okukuuma empisa, amateeka n’obuntubulamu mu nnaku 90 ez’ebyokulonda n’abakuutira bawulirize abeesimbyewo olwo basalewo ekinaayamba eggwanga. Nakibinge ategeezezza nti wadde Dr. Kariisa afudde, naye kirungi nti afudde mu ngeri etegeerekeka kuba bangi ku basiraamu bafudde mu nfa etategeerekeka. Mu bubaka bwa Katikkiro wa Buganda obusomeddwa omumyuka wa Katikkiro asooka, Owek. Hajji Twaha Kawaase Kigongo, Omugenzi ayogeddwako ng’omusajja ayagadde katonda we era abadde akolagana obulungi n’Obwakabaka. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako; Supreme Mufti Sheikh Siliman Kasule Ndirangwa, Lt. Col Edith Nakalema, Omumyuka wa Katikkiro Asooka, Prof. Twaha Kaawaase n’abalala. Abeegwanyiza obwapulezidenti okuli; Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, Maj Gen Mugisha Muntu ne Lt. Gen. Henry Tumukunde era nga bonna boogeddeko eri abakungubazi. Bano omwogezi w’e Kibuli, Sheikh Noor Muzata Batte, abambalidde obutagezaako kusaba kalulu nga tebalina nteekateeka nnambulukufu eri abasiraamu naddala ku nsonga y’okuteekawo obwenkanya. Omu ku beegwanyiza Obwapulezidenti, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, ategeezezza nga bw’agenda okulwana okulaba ng’abasiraamu bafuna obwenkanya era n’okulaba ng’ayimbula abo abakyakuumirwa mu makomera singa abeere aweereddwa obuyinza. Oluvudde wano, omubiri gw’omugenzi negutwalibwa ku muzikiti gw’e Wandegeya okugusaalira era ng’oluvannyuma gutwaliddwa e Ruhaama gy’agenda okuziikibwa ku enkya ku Lwokutaano.

headline: Gavumenti eragidde kkampuni z’essimu okuggyako Yintaneeti ku lunaku lw’okulonda nga 14
text: Kampala Okulonda kwa 2021 nga kubulako nnaku bunaku kutuuke, ebyakafuluma biraga nti gavumenti eragidde kkampuni z’essimu ne kkampuni ezisaasaanya Yintaneeti okugiggyako ku lunaku lw’okulonda olwa 14 January 2021.  Okusinziira ku nsonda ez’ekyama mu kitongole kya ‘Uganda Communications Commission (UCC)’ ekirung’amya kkampuni n’emikutu gy’empuliziganya, waliwo entegeka z’okuggyako emikutu gy’omutimbagano egimanyiddwa nga mukwanirawala okuli; Facebook, Whatsapp, Twitter n’emirala. Kinajjukirwa nti ne mu kulonda okuwedde okwa 2016, emikutu gino era gyaggyibwako era nga wali tosobola kufuna bubaka wadde okubusindika ku lunaku lw’okulonda. Ate okusinziira ku mukutu gw’amawulire gwa PML Daily ekiragiro ky’okuggyako empeereza eno kyavudde mu bitongole by’ebyokwerinda ne UCC okulagira kkampuni zino n’ekigendererwa eky’okukendeeza ku nsaasaanya y’amawulire n’obubaka ku lunaku lw’okulonda. Kigambibwa nti enkola ya Mobile Money, okugula data wamu n’okukuba essimu awamu n’okuweereza obubaka (SMS) byonna bigenda kuyimirizibwa ku lunaku olwo. Abamu ku bakulu mu by’okwerinda bategeezezza nti kino kikoleddwa okusobola okuziyiza obutabanguko wamu n’obuvuyo ku lunaku lw’okulonda. Oluvannyuma lw’akalulu ka 2016, Pulezidenti Museveni yategeeza bannamawulire lwaki emikutu gimugattabantu gyali giggyiddwako. “Walina okubaawo ekikolebwa ku lw’ebyokwerinda okusobola okutaasa abangi okugwa mu buzibu. Kino kya kaseera buseera kubanga abantu abamu bakozesa emiwaatwa egyo okwogera eby’obulimba.” Pulezidenti bwe yategeeza. Ebikolwa bino eby’okuggyako yintaneeti bicaase nnyo mu mawanga agakyakula era ng’abalwanirizi b’eddembe ly’obuntu babivumiridde nga bagamba nti biziyiza abantu okuwa endowooza zaabwe, n’okukola emirimu. Bino we bijjidde ng’akulira ekibiina kya National Unity Platform, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, yaakamala okutongoza omukutu kw’agenda okuyita okulondoola akalulu ke ogumanyiddwa nga U Vote era n’alabula abawagizi be okufuna enkola ya VPN okusigala ku mutimbagano kuba yabadde akitegeddeko nti gavumenti egenda kuggyako emikutu gimukwanirawa.

headline: Museveni alonze omuko Rwabwogo ne Nakiwala Kiyingi okumuwabula
text: Kampala  Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni alonze omuko Odrek Rwabwogo awamu n’ababadde baminisita babiri nabagatta ku ttiimu y’abawabuzi be ku nsonga ez’enjawulo. Zino zeezimu ku nkyukakyuka ezalangiriddwa ku Lwokuna ezigambibwa nti zigendereddwamu okwongera okunyikiza empeereza mu bantu. Bwatyo Museveni nga akozesa obuyinza obumuweebwa Ssemateeka mu nnyingo eya 99 (i) ne 177 yalangiridde abadde minisita omubeezi ow’abavubuka n’ensonga z’abaana Nakiwala Kiying,i okumuwabula ku nsonga z’ekikula ky’abantu n’abavubuka. Nakiwala abadde yakegatta ku NRM okuva mu kibiina kya DP era yali yavuganya ku kifo ky’ omubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti ye Bukomansimbi wabula omuyaga gw’ekibiina kya NUP ogwayita gwamuleka awanguddwa munnakibiina kya NUP Veronica Nanyondo. Mu ngeri yeemu Mary Karooro Okurut abadde Minisita atalina mulimu gwa nkalakalirira alondeddwa okubeera omuwabuzi ku kifananyi kya gavumenti. Ate omuko w’ embuga Odrek Rwabwogo nalondebwa okuwabula Pulezidenti Museveni ku nsonga ez’enkizo. Era abadde omuwandiisi wa kabineeti era akulira abakozi ba gavumenti, Dr. John Mitala alondeddwa okuwabula Pulezidenti ku bakozi ba gavumenti ate Dr. Adonia naddzibwayo mu kibiina ky’amawanga amagatte nga omukiise era ambasada wa Uganda. Okusinziira ku bakugu, okulondebwa kw’ abamu ku bannabyabufuzi mu bifo ebyenjawulo kibadde kikubagizo oluvannyuma lw’okulemererwa okuwangula akalulu kyokka nga n’ebifo byebalimu mu kabineeti nabyo babivuddemu.

headline: Omuwagizi wa Sodo bamukubidde essasi mu bbaala
text: Ssembabule Omuwagizi wa munnabyabufuzi e Mawogola, Sodo Aine Kaguta ng’ono muganda wa Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni yakubiddwa essasi mu kugulu n’addusibwa mu ddwaliro ng’apooca n’ebisago. Kashieza eyakubiddwa essasi Eyakubiddwa essasi ye Hannington Kasheiza ow’emyaka 28 nga mutuuze w’e Lugusuulu mu Ssembabule era nga kigambibwa nti ono yakubiddwa Ninsiima Robert gwe yabadde naye mu bbaala ya Mercy nga banywamu. Okusinziira ku beerabiddeko, zaabadde ssaawa nga ttaano ez’ekiro bano ne batandika okukaayana ku by’obufuzi wakati w’abantu bano abaabadde mu bbaala era nga nannyini bbaala, poliisi yamukutte dda agiyambeko mu kunoonyereza. Kino kiwalirizza abawagizi ba Sodo mu kitundu kino ekya Mawogola North, George William, Tumuzigu enock, Namale Gorret, Robert Tumuhairwe n’abalala, okutuuza olukiiko lwa bannamawulire ne bavumirira effujjo eribakolebwako ne basaba Pulezidenti Museveni ayingire mu nsonga eno. Bano bategeezezza nti bawadde poliisi nsalessale wa nnaku 2 okubaawo ekikolebwa kubanga balina obukakafu bw’abantu baabwe abazze batulugunyizibwa oba si ekyo bagenda kwekalakaasa. Owooluganda lwa Kasheiza, Mesach Katana annyonnyodde nti mu kiseera kino basobeddwa kubanga ne muganda waabwe eyakubiddwa essasi tebamanyi w’ali kubanga yabuziddwawo. Aba kkampu ya Sodo bagamba nti bazze batiisibwatiisibwa era kati bali mu kutya nga tebamanyi kiddako. Akulira okunoonyereza ku buzzi bw’emisango ku poliisi e Ssembabule, Tindyebwa Peter, yakakasizza okukubwa kw’omuntu essasi wabula n’ategeeza ng’ensonga eno bw’etabaddemu byabufuzi newankubadde babadde babinyumyako. Tindyebwa yagambye nti bano bubakeeredde kubanga essaawa ze baalwaniddemu zaabadde za Kafyu era n’ategeeza nti baliko be bakutte era ng’oluvannyuma lw’okunoonyereza bagenda kutwalibwa mu kkooti babitebye.

headline: Dennis Masinde Onyango alondeddwa ng’omukwasi wa ggoolo asinze mu myaka 10
text: Eyaliko omuzannyi wa ttiimu y’eggwanga eya Uganda Cranes omukwasi wa goolo, Dennis Masinde Onyango, alondeddwa ng’omukwasi wa ggoolo esinze mu myaka 10 egiyise, nateekebwa ku ttiimu y’empaka za CAF Champions League. Ttiimu eno erimu abazannyi 11 abasinze okucanga omupiira mu Afirika okuva mu mwaka gwa 2010 okutuuka mu 2020 era obwedda abantu basinziira ku mutimbagano nebalonda abazannyi ab’enjawulo. Ekimu ku biwadde Onyango enkizo kwekuyambako ttiimu ya Mamelodi Sundowns okuwangula ekikopo kya CAF Champions League mu 2016 era wano afuniddewo obubonero bungi ddala. Kinajjukirwa nti mu mwaka guno gwe gumu Onyango yalondebwa nga omukwasi wa ggoolo eyali asinze mu Afirika.  Abazannyi babiri bokka bebasobodde okuva mukitundu kya East Afrika nga omulala we Mutanzania owa kiraabu ya TP Mazembe eya Congo nga ono naye yakola nnyo okugisobozesa okuwangula ekikopo kya CAF Champions League. Ekitundu kya North Afirika kyerisiza nkuuli mukuleeta abazannyi abangi nga mu bano kuliko; Wael Gomma, Ahmed Fatty, Hossam Ghaly, Hossam Ashour, Ali Maaloul ne Walid Soliman. Abalala abalondeddwa ku ttiimu eno ye munnansi wa South Afirika Percy Tau nowa Zimbabwe Khama Billiat.

headline: Buganda yakutta omukago naba National Drug Authority
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ategeezezza nti Buganda yakukola omukago n’ekitongole ekivunaanyizibwa ku kulondoola eddagala mu ggwanga ki National Drug Authority okwongera okuteereza ensonga z’ebyobulamu mu Buganda ne Uganda. Ekirangiriro kino Owek. Mayiga akikoledde mu Bulange Mmengo bw’abadde asisinkanye abakungu ba National Drug Authority abakulembeddwa Dr. David Nahamya nagamba nti ekiseera kituuse abakola eddagala ly’obutonde bakwatagane n’ekitongole kino okusobola okutambulira mu bulambulukufu. Owek. Mayiga annyonnyodde nti Obwakabaka bufaayo nnyo ku bantu babwo era bukola buli kimu okulaba nti abantu babwo babeera balamu okusobola okuzza Buganda ku ntikko. Mayiga ategeezezza nti eddagala ly’obutonde lisobola okukola bulungi naye walina okubaawo enkolagana n’okuwuliziganya wakati w’ekitongole ki NDA awamu n’abantu ab’enjawulo abanoonyereza ku ddagala ly’ ekinnansi n’obutonde. Ono agasseeko nti kati Buganda egenda kukwatagana n’ekitongole kino okulaba engeri abasawo abali mu ddagala ly’obutonde gyebasobola okulambikibwa wakati mu kugoberera ebbago eririwo ku nsonga eno. Ye Minisita w’Ekikula kyabantu, ebyobulamu, ebyenjigiriza era avunaanyizibwa ku woofiisi ya Nnabagereka, Owek. Dr. Prosperous Nankindu, ategeezezza nti Buganda erina enteekateeka ez’enjawulo okutumbula eby’obulamu kuba Kabaka ayagala abantu be nga balamu. Ekitongole kino kyatandika mu 1993 era nga kivunanyizibwa okulaba ng’abantu bafuna eddagala etuufu ery’omutindo ate nga sirabuseere. Akulira ekitongole kino, Dr. David Nahamya agambye asanyukidde eky’okukwatagana ne Buganda era nategeeza nti baliko kaweefube gwebatandise okulaba nti balwanyisa okukozesa ebiragalalagala mu baana abato okusobola okutaasa ebiseera byabwe eby’omu maaso.

headline: Eggwanga lyetaaga okutabagana mu bwangu – Bannaddiini
text: Bannaddiini abeegattira mu kibiina kya IRCU  Kampala Akakiiko akataba enzikiriza mu ggwanga aka ‘Inter-Religious Council of Uganda (IRCU)’ basabye wategekebwewo okutabagana ng’eggwanga kuba embeera eriwo mu ggwanga naddala mu by’obufuzi yeetaaga kusonyiwagana. Bino babyogeredde mu nsisinkano mwe basiibulidde abadde akulira oludda oluvuganya mu Palamenti. Ye ssentebe wa IRCU, Sheikh Shaban Ramadhan Mubajje ategeezezza nti waliwo ensonga enkulu ezeetaaga okwogerwako era wabeewo okukkaanya. “Ng’embeera ya Ssennyiga Corona bw’etereera, waliwo obwetaavu tutuule nga bannayuganda, tewali kubuusabuusa nti ebintu ebiriwo mu ggwanga byetaaga okwogerako kuba we twaviiridde mu kalulu nga tweyawudde ng’eggwanga.” Mubajje bw’annyonnyodde. Ye Ochan asabye bannaddiini okukulemberamu ensonga kuba ensonga ezirina okwogerako tezirina kulekerwa bannabyabufuzi bokka. “Tuwagira enteesegenya eziri ku mulamwa nga bwe mulaze era zibeere za mugaso kuba waliwo enteeseganya eziriwo naye ate ne zitavaamu makulu.” Ochan bw’agambye Bino we bijjidde ng’ekibiina Ochan mw’ava kyakamala okuzira okwetaba olukung’aana lwa IPOD olugenda okukubirizibwa ssentebe wa NRM era Pulezidenti Museveni ku Lwokutaano lwa wiiki eno. Bwe yabadde ayogerako ne bannamawulire, omwogezi wa FDC, Omubaka Ibrahim Ssemujju (FDC, Kira Municipality), yategeezezza nti ensisinkano ya IPOD terina kya makulu kigenda givaamu. Ochan ategeezezza bannaddiini nti ensonga ezirina okuteesebwako bwe bukambwe obususse mu b’ebyokwerinda, emivuyo egyali mu kalulu awamu n’ensonga endala enkulu. “Ettemu, ttiyaggaasi, obukambwe ku bannansi byonna tebyetaagisa, ekigambo akakiiko k’ebyokulonda aketengeredde tekirina kukoma mu bigambo.” Ochan bw’agasseeko. Ye omubaka Emmanuel Ongiertho (FDC, Jonam) alabudde bannabyabufuzi okulekayo okwemanya essajja nga bajja muteeseganya zino bwe ziba zaakuvaamu akalungi. Akulira enzikiriza ya abasodokisi mu ggwanga, Omusumba Jonah Lwanga, ategeezezza nti eggwanga ligezaako okudduka n’okwewala amazima nga walina okubaawo ekikolebwa kati. “Tetusobola kutambula ng’eggwanga nga tetufuddeyo ku mazima, tulina okutandika okwogerezeganya nga tusookera ku kumanya ekituufu.” Lwanga bw’annyonnyodde. Ochan yabadde awerekeddwako omubaka Santa Alum (UPC, Oyam) ne Betty Bamukwatsa (FDC, Rukungiri).

headline: Twadiddamu okuyimiriza entambula y’olukale – Minisita Katumba Wamala
text: Kampala Abamu ku bavuzi ba takisi nga omuggalo tegunabaawo. Ekif. File Minisita w’ebyentambula mu ggwanga Gen. Katumba Wamala ategeezezza ku Mmande nti bayinza okuddamu okuyimirizza entambula y’olukale okugezaako okutangira okusaasaana kw’ ekirwadde ki COVID19. “Bannayuganda bannange, tukizudde nga abamu ku bavuzi ba takisi ne bodaboda tebakyagoberera biragiro bitangira COVID19 nga bwebali balagiddwa,“ Minisita Katumba Wamala byeyanyonyodde. Katumba yagasseeko nti olw’okuba buli lukya abakwatibwa obulwadde buno beeyongera ekiyinza okubawaliriza okuyimirizza entambula ey’olukale mu ngeri y’okuziyizza ekirwadde okutambuzibwa. Ono yategeezezza nti abavuzi ba takisi batikka abantu abasoba mu munaana abali bakkirizibwa ekintu ekiteeka obulamu bwa abasaabaze mu bulabe. Kinajjukirwa nti, abavuzi ba takisi balagirwa okwambala obukookolo era basabe abasaabaze okwewa amabanga n’okukuozesa eddagala eritta akawuka  n’okunaaba mu ngalo nga bayingira ekintu kyebatafuddeko. Webutuukidde olwa leero nga abalina ekirwadde kino baweze 1500 oluvanyuma lw’okuzuulayo abalwadde abalala 66 kwabo abaakebeddwa nga 15/08/2020

headline: Balabudde UPDF ku kweyingiza mu by’obufuzi ebyekubiira
text: Kampala Ebibiina by’obwannakyewa ebiruubirira okunnyikiza demokulaasiya mu Uganda, birabudde abajaasi ba UPDF ne Poliisi, okukomya okweyingiza mu by’obufuzi wamu n’okufulumya ebigambo ebisobola okutabangula emirembe naddala mu kaseera kano ak’okulonda. Senkulu wa FHRI, Dr. Livingstone Ssewanyana Ssenkulu w’ekitongole kya Foundation for Human Rights Initiative (FHRI), Dr. Livingstone Ssewanyana, yategeezezza omukutu gwa URN mu mboozi eyakafubo nti, ebigambo bya bannamagye ebigamba nti, “Tetusobola kuwaayo buyinza eri omuntu atali munnamagye,” tebisaanidde mu kaseera kano ak’okulonda. Kino kiddiridde omuduumizi w’enkambi y’amagye e Kasajjagirwa mu Masaka, Brig. Deus Sande, okusinziira ku mukolo ogwali gutegekeddwa bannakibiina kya NRM okusiima emirimu gy’ amajje nategeeza nti nga amajje tebasobola kuwaayo buyinza eri omuntu atali munnamagye. Mu ngeri y’emu ne Nnampala wa gavumenti, Ruth Nankabirwa, yalabikidde ku katambi ng’agamba abantu b’e Kiboga nga Pulezidenti Museveni bw’atasobola kuwaayo buyinza kulekawo mafuta ge. Bano Dr. Ssewanyana abalabudde nti balina okumanya nti obuyinza bw’abantu ate nga be balonzi era nga singa basalawo ne balonda omuntu omulala yenna, amagye galina kukola kimu kya kugondera biragiro bye. Omukwanaganya w’ekitongole ekirondoola ensonga z’okulonda ‘Citizens Coalition on Electoral Democracy’ -CCEDU, Charity Ahimbisibwe, yannyonnyodde nti Minisita asobola okusonyiyibwa ku bigambo ‘Tetusobola kuwaayo buyinza,’ naye si baduumizi b’amagye abaalayira okuweereza bannayuganda. Ahimbisibwe yagasseeko nti munnamagye oba omupoliisi eyagoera ebigambo ebiweebuula enteekateeka y’okulonda, agezaako kukuma mu bantu muliro era n’asaba bano bavunaanibwe mu bwangu, abalala babalabireko. Omutunuulizi w’ensonga z’ebyokwerinda, Fred Egesa, agamba nti ebigambo bino bigenderere ng’ababyogera bagezaako kumalamu bavuganya gavumenti maanyi. Ono alabudde nti singa abantu banaggwaamu essuubi ly’okukozesa akalulu okukyusa obuyinza, bayinza okwagala okukozesa amakubo amalala.

headline: Abalina akawuka ka COVID-19 baweze 52
text: Akawuka ka kolona nga bwekafaanana mu kyuma ekigezza  Buli lukya omuwendo gw’abalina akawuka ka senyiga omukambwe owa COVID-19 mu Uganda gweyongera kulinnya nga woosomera bino baweze 52.  Olwaleero abantu abalala bana baasangiddwa n’akawuka kano kwabo abasoba mu 400 abaakebereddwa. Bano abana okwegatta ku 48 ababadde baakakasibwa okuba n’akawuka baweze omwuendo gwa 52. Uganda mu East Africa siyeeyokka omuwnedo gw’abalina COVID-19 gyegweyongera.  E Rwanda, abalwadde baweze 104 ate e Kenya bali 142.  Eggwanga lya South Sudan eritabdde namulwadde yenna kati nabo baazuddeyo alina COVID-19 omu.  Ate yo e Burundi nga nayo yalwawo okufuna abalwadde, abalina senyiga baweze basatu nga yo mu Tanzania bali 22. Mu nsi yonna abalwadde basinga mu America ng’eno bali 336,851, ng’ate 9,620 baamaze dda okulugulamu obulamu.  Bw’ogatta abalina obulwadde buno kati baweze 1,276,117, ng’ata 69,509 ezaabwe zaamaladda okuvuunikibwa.

headline: Okulamaga e Namugongo kuyimiriziddwa lwa coronavirus
text: Essaza ly’e Masaka eribadde litegeka okulamaga e Namugongo omwaka guno ligambye olw’ekirwadde kya coronavirus ekigenda mu maaso nga kyeriisa enkuuli mu nsi yonna livudde mu nteekateeka eno. Okusinziira ku bbaluwa eyawandiikiddwa Omusumba w’e Mityana Anthony Zziwa, akulira olukiiko lw’abasumba olumanyiddwa nga Uganda Episcopal Conference, Omusumba w’e Masaka Serverus Jjumba yamutegeezezza nti Uganda nebwekkiriza abantu okuddamu okukungaana, tekikyasoboka kuba na kulamaga omwaka guno kubanga obudde obusigaddeyo tebumala. Jjumba yategeezezza nti okutegeka okulamaga kitwala obudde wamu n’esimbi nnyingi nnyo ddala ng’era kyetaagisa enkiiko ez’enjawulo wakati w’ab’ebyokwerinda wamu n’olukiiko olutegesi. Buli nga June 3, abagoberezi ba Kurisito beeyiwa e Namugongo okujaguza okuttibwa kw’abajuluzi.  Bano battibwa ku biragiro bya Ssekabaka Daniel Mwanga, olw’okumujeemera.  Guno gwegunda okuba omulundi ogusoose obutabaayo kulamaga bukyanga June 3 lukuzibwa ng’olunaku lw’okujjukira abajuluz mu Uganda.

headline: Omusomesa w’eddiini bamusse mu bukambwe
text: Ekikangabwa kibuutikidde abatuuze ku kyalo Kyabbogo mu muluka gwe Nkoni muggombolola ye Kkingo mu disitulikiti ye Lwengo, Omusomesa w’eddiini ow’emyaka 61 bwakubiddwa omuyini ku mutwe nafiirawo. Eyatiddwa ye Richard Mbaziira myaka 61 ng’abadde musomesa wa Ddiini mu kisomesa Kya Kkingo mu Lwengo. Kigambibwa nti ono yatemuddwa mu kiro ekyakeesezza ku Lwokubiri era abatuuze bagamba nti okusinziira ku kyebalabye, abatemu olwamaze okumutta nebamusuula mu lusuku era nga bamuziiseeko ekitundu ekya waggulu. Ssentebe wa ggombolola ye Kkingo, Aloysious Kibira agamba nti basula kutebuukye kuba ettemu lizzeemu mu kitundu kyabwe nasaba poliisi ekole okunnoonyereza ku bikolwa bino ebyeyongera buli lukya. Ate ye Ssentebe w’ekyalo Kyabbogo, Kabi Ssenkatuuka, yategeezezza nti omugenzi tabadde muntu w’amasanyu era ng’okufa kwe kubakubye wala bwatyo nakuutira abantu okwongera okwekuuma. Wabula adduumira poliisi mu bendo-bendo lye Masaka Paul Nkore yasabye abantu okwewala okugenda mu mabaala ekiro era nabakunga okukwatagana ne poliisi okumalawo obutemu buno. Ye adduumira poliisi ye Lwengo Francis Okongo yasabye abatuuze okwewala okunywa ennyo omwenge. Oluvannyuma poliisi etutte omulambo gwa Mbaziira mu ddwaliro e Masaka okwongera okugwekebejja.

headline: Bakutte abawerako ku ky’okubika Pulezidenti Museveni
text: Kampala  Poliisi mu ggwanga etegeezezza nga bw’eriko abantu abawera b’ekutte olw’okutambuza amawulire ag’obulimba ku mutimbagano nga babika Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni. Omwogezi w’ekitongoleekinoonyereza ku buzzi bw’emisango mu poliisi, Charles Twine, yategeezezza ku Mmande nti oluvannyuma lw’okukwata Peter Ssekyondwa okuva e Luweero Ssabbiiti ewedde, ab’ebyokwerindabaliko abantu abalala be bakutte okubayambako okwongera okunnoonyereza ku nsonga eno. “Tubadde tunoonyereza era ku Lwokuna twakutte omuntu omu(Ssekyondwa)eyawandiika obubaka ng’ayongereza ku obwo obwali buwandiikiddwa abali ebunaayira era ono be yabuweereza nabo bwebatyo babwongera.” Atwine bw’agambye. Kinajjukirwa nti omutimbagano omwezi oguwedde gwasaasaanirako amawulire ag’obulimba agaali galaga nga Pulezidenti Museveni bwe yali afudde oluvannyuma lw’okuddusibwa mu ddwaliro lya Aga Khanmu Kenyagye yali atwaliddwa ng’ali bubi. Okusinziira ku b’obuyinza, amawulire gano gaatandikira ku bavubuka abamanyiddwa ng’aba ‘Bloggers’ ababeera ebweru w’eggwanga wadde ng’oluvannyuma Pulezidenti Museveni yalabibwako e Munyonyo ng’alina olukung’aana lw’alimu. Twine alabudde abantu b’omutimbagano okwewala okusaasaanya amawulire agatali makakafu kuba gano gajja kubasuula mu mikono gy’aboobuyinza bavunaanibwe. “Mu buwangwa bwaffe tosobola kubika muntu nga toli wa famire ye, musawo we oba ekitongole ky’abadde akolera, era gwe akikola ensi ekulaba ng’ atalina mpisa. Ate eri ffe abakuumaddembe, obeera ozzizza omusango era ojja kuvunaanibwa.” Twine bw’agasseeko. Okusinziira ku Twine, abamu ku bantu abaatandika okubunyisa amawulire gano bagezaako kufuna bubudamu mu mawanga g’ebweru nga beesigama ku ky’okuba nti ab’ebyokwerinda babanoonya okubakwata naye nti bano tebajja kubaganya. Twine agamba nti bagenda kukwataganan’emikago egy’enjawulo awamu n’ebitongole by’amawanga bano gye basinziira basobole okukwatibwa. Okusinziira ku kawaayiro nnamba 25 ak’etteekaerifuga enkozesa ya kompyuta erya ‘Computer Misuse Act’ omuntu yenna akozesa emikutu gino mu ngeri ekkakkanya omulala awatali nsonga ntuufu abeera azzizza omusango era ajja kuvunaanibwa. Kinajjukirwa nti Pulezidenti Museveni wiiki ewedde yalagidde ab’ebyokwerinda okuvunaana abo bonna abaasaasaanya amawulire agamubika. Era kimanyiddwa nti wadde emikutu emirala gavumenti yagiggula naye omutimbagano gwa Facebook gwasigala muggale era okusobola okugukozesa omuntu alina kukozesa VPN.

headline: Yiino alipooota ku mpaka z’ Amasaza, n’ebigenda okukolebwa
text: Akakiiko akateekebwa Obwakabaka okunoonyereza ku mivuyo egiri mu mipiira gy’ Amasaza kanjudde alipoota ku byekazudde awamu nekyo ekirina okukolebwa okukuuma empaka zino ku lukalu lw’ Afirika n’ensi yonna. Akakiiko kano akakulirwa Sabiiti Muwanga kaalondebwa mu April 2020,nga besigama ku mivuyo egyaliwo mu mpaka za 2019 omwafiira n’omuwagizi mulamba. Kinajjukirwa nti mu 2019 nga Buddu esamba Mawokota ku kisaawe e Mpigi gwalimu emivuyo era gyebyagwera ng’ omuwagizi aluguzeemu obulamu, era wano akakiiko akakulembera omuzannyo guno kateekawo akakiiko ak’enjawulo okunoonyereza ku mivuyo egilabikira mu mpaka zino nekiyinza okukolebwa okutaasa ekifaananyi kyazo. Mu byanjuddwa mu alipoota eno ng’ebisoomooza kwekuli; ennamula y’omupiira ey’ekiboggwe, okubulankanya ssente mu masaza ag’enjawulo. Okuyingiza eby’obufuzi ebyawula mu nzirukanya ya ttiimu z’amasaza, abazannyi okugulirirwa, abakulembeze obuteewa kitiibwa awamu n’ebirala. Alipoota erumiriza abamu ku baweereza b’ebitongole mu Bwakabaka okweyisa mu ngeri etasaanidde nga kino kituukira ddala wansi ku masaza ag’enjawulo. Wabula ssentebe w’ akakiiko kano Muwanga ategeezezza nti ensonga zonna nga bwezivuddeyo zisobola bulungi okufunirwa eddagala okusobola okutaasa omuzannyo guno n’okukuza ebitone. Bw’abadde ayaniriza alipoota eno Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku by’emizannyo n’okwewummuza Mu Buganda, Owek Henry Moses Ssekabembe Kiberu, yeebaziza olukiiko ku kunoonyereza kuno n’omulimu gwonna kuba gwakolebwa mu budde bwa COVID-19. Owek. Ssekabembe annyonnyodde nti ensonga zino zigenda kwongera okulondoolwa era zakukwatibwa n’obwegendereza okusobola okukuuma omutindo gw’ empaka zino.

headline: Abapoliisi 3 bakwatiddwa lwa kufutyanka musango gw’obuliisa maanyi oguvunaanibwa Paasita  Twahirwa
text: Poliisi ekutte basajja baayo 3 abakola ogw’okunoonyereza ku misango gy’okudibaga omusango gwa munnansi wa Latvia Saulite Anda mwalumiririza Paasita Joseph Collins Twahirwa okumukaka omukwano awamu n’okumubbako ssente ze. Abakwate kuliko; Sgt Doreen Oyera, Cpl Judith Akite ne constable Joyce Ayereget, nga bonna bakolera ku poliisi ya Jinja Road police. Anda agamba Omusumba Joseph Collins Twahirwa ow’ekkanisa ya Epikaizo Ministries International esangibwa e Bugoloobi mu Kampala yamukaka omukwano. Mu musango Anda gweyaguddewo ku kitebe ekinoonyereza ku buzzi bw’ emisango yategeezezza nti Twahirwa yamuyita ajje e Uganda era yatuukira mu makaage e Bugoloobi nga Decemba 12, 2022 era olwali okutuuka nawamba Paasipoot ye nnamba LV4336528. Kuno yagattako okumubbako ssente ze ddoola 300 awamu ne Euro 400 (€400) wabula oluvannyuma yaweebwa amagezi aggulewo omusango ku poliisi ya Jinja Road era kyeyakola. Bweyali ku poliisi ya Jinja Road, kigambibwa nti abapoliisi bakwatagana ne Twahirwa ne bamuddiza Paasipooti ye era nebamukaka okuteeka omukono ku mpapula ezaali ziraga nti ssente ze azimuddizza era nebamukaka okuggalawo omusango. Akulira ekitongole ekinoonyereza ku buzzi bw’emisango e Kibuli, Maj Tom Magamba yalagidde bano bakwatibwe era kati bali munda. Era kyazuuliddwa nti abakwate beekobaana ne Twahirwa bakake Anda okufuluma Uganda mubwangu kuba Visa ye yali eggwaako nga January 16. Oluvannyuma lw’okuyita mu bino byonna Maj. Magambo yasabye ekitongole ekiwa abagwira olukusa okubeera mu Uganda okwongera Anda ebbanga asobole okufuna obwenkanya era asobole okuwaayo obujulizi mu kkooti. Amyuka omwogezi w’ekitebe kya bambega e Kibuli, Claire Nabakka akakasizza okukwatibwa kw’ abapoliisi bano nategeeza nti bakuvunaanibwa nga amateeka bwegalagira. Nabakka agamba nti Paasita n’ abapoliisi bano bonna kati bali mabega wa mitayimbwa era mubwangu bagenda kubitebya.

headline: Obululu bw’empiira gy’Ebika bukwatiddwa
text: Obululu bw’ekikopo ky’ omupiira gw’ebika bya Buganda bukwatiddwa era nga ttiimu ez’enjawulo zaawuddwamu ebibinja 8 era minisita w’ebyemizannyo n’okwewummuzaamu, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu alaze obukulu bw’empaka zino. “Ekisinga ddala obukulu kwekuba nti abantu ba Buganda bamanya era nebakkiriza nti olutabaalo lw’okuzza emipiira gy’Ebika luli ku ggwe, mu makaago, mu nnyumba mwova, mu lunyiriri lwo, mu mutuba gwo, okutuukira ddala mu kasolya ko,” Owek. Ssekabembe bw’agambye. Ono asabye abantu ba Kabaka okukomya okubuuliza ewaka emipiira bwegiwedde naye bafeeyo okudda mu kisaawe okusobola okuzza ekitiibwa ky’empaka zino. EKIBINJA A  Mpindi Butiko Musu Kasimba Kiwere Lukato   EKIBINJA B  Nkima Balangira Ntalaganya Kakoboza Kinyomo Nvuma  EKIBINJA Ç  Ffumbe Nkerebwe Musagi Nkula Ndiisa Ndiga  EKIBINJA D  Nsenene Gabunga Ngonge Nsambya Kisasi Kasanke   EKIBINJA E  Mbogo Njovu Njobe Nvubu Nkejje Nyunga  EKIBINJAF  Nakinsige Mpeewo Lugave Ngali Kibe Muyanja  EKIBINJA G  Nte Nkusu Njaza Nsuma Mbwa Nyange   EKIBINJA H  Kkobe Ngo Ngeye Namungona Mpologoma Kayozi

headline: Bakutte abalongoosa n’abasawo ku by’okubba eddagala mu ddwaliro ly’e Kawempe
text: Kampala Akakiiko akalwanyisa obulyi bw’enguzi mu maka g’Obwapulezidenti, akawungeezi k’eggulo baliko abasawo 3 n’abalongoosa 2, be baakutte ku by’okubba eddagala eririna okuweebwa abalwadde ku bwereere mu ddwaliro lino. Kino kiddiridde abalwadde abawerako okwemulugunyiza akulira eddwaliro lino nga bwetafuna ddagala. Ku ddagala bano lye baabakutte nalyo kuliko erikkakkanya ku bulumi wamu n’eddagala eriyisibwa mu mpiso nga lino lirwanyisa obuwuka era lino lyonna lisinga kukozesebwa ku balwadde ababeera balongooseddwa. Eddagala lino libaddeko obulambe obulaga nti lya gavumenti ya Uganda era nti teririna kutundibwa naye ate bano babadde balibbayo ne baliguza abantu mu bulwaliro obutonotono. Okusinziira ku bakungu b’akakiiko abaakutte abantu bano bagamba nti abalwadde babadde babasindika mu bulwaliro obuliraanyeewo okugula eddagala lino ku nsimbi ennyingi era ng’obulwaliro buno obusinga bw’abasawo ba gavumenti. Omu ku baddukanya eddwaliro lino, Grace Lubaale, ategeezezza nti okwemulugunya kubadde kususse era n’asuubiza okukola buli kimu okulaba ng’embeera eno teddamu kubaawo. Lubaale agamba nti abasawo basatu n’abalongoosa babiri be babadde mu kikolwa kino era eddagala babadde balitereka mu bisenge gye bakyusiza wamu ne mu kaabuyonjo, ekintu ekyongera okuteeka obulamu bw’abantu mu matigga. Oluvannyuma lw’okulondoola ensonga eno, Poliisi n’akakiiko k’amaka g’Obwapulezidenti, abasawo bano yabakutte era n’esobolaokununula eddagala lino lyonna.

headline: Bobi Wine azizza omuliro ku by’obutafuna kibiina ki NUP mu Mateeka
text: Omubaka Kyagulanyi ne banne nga batongoza kaadi y’ekibiina  Omubaka wa Kyaddondo mu palamenti Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine) avuddeyo nategeeza nga gavumenti bwekola buli kimu okulaba nga emusuula mu by’obufuzi. Mu bubaka bwatadde ku mikutu gye ku mutimbagano Kyagulanyi agambye nti, “Bagezaako okutulemesa nekitakola, kati balaba abantu bangi abajja ku woofiisi zaffe okwewandiisa nekibatiisa. Olwokuba Kyagulanyi ye pulezidenti w’ekibiina kino era nga balaba afuna obuwagizi okuva mu bitundu eby’enjawulo bajja kukozesa abantu ab’ebika byonna n’okuwaaba ebisangosango naye ffe tetujja kuva ku mulamwa”. Bobi Wine bweyategezezza. Kino kiddiridde munnamateeka James Byamukama okutegeeza nga akakiiko k’ebyokulonda nga Kyagulanyi bweyafuna ekibiina kino mu bukyamu.
