Byamukama yalaze nti waliwo ensobi ezakolebwa Kyagulanyi nga akyuusa ekibiina ki ‘National Unity, Reconcilliation and Development Party’ NURP okukifuula ‘National Unity Platform’ NUP kubanga teyagoberera mateeka. Ono agamba nti Ttabamiruka w’ekibiina eyalina okubeeramu abantu 400, kw’olwo yalimu abantu 51 bokka ate nga abasinga tebabamanyi. Byamukama era awakkanya engeri ekibiina bwekyava ku linnya lya ‘NURP’ nekifuuka ‘NUP’ n’okukyusa obubonero ne langi kubanga tebyali mu mateeka. Ono agamba nti singa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kalemwa okutereeza ensobi eno mu bwangu, agenda kuddukira mu kkooti yeba esalawo eky’ enkomeredde.

headline: Buganda ekwataganye ne Rotary okuzimba eddwaliro
text: Nansana – Kyaddondo Obwakabaka buwaddeyo ettaka okuzimbako eddwaliro okujjanjaba abantu ba Kabaka mu bitundu bya Munisipaali y’e Nansana n’emiriraano. Ekyama kino kibikkuddwa omumyuka Owookubiri owa Katikkiro, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa, bw’abadde atema evvuunike ku lwa Katikkiro Mayiga mu kifo awagenda okuzimbibwa eddwaliro lino. Owek. Waggwa era yabadde omujulizi ku ndagaano eteekeddwako omukono wakati wa Buganda ekiikiriddwa Ssenkulu wa Buganda Land Board, Simon Kaboggoza.  “Ssaabasajja Kabaka yasiimye n’awaayo ettaka eri Rotary y’e Nansana Ttawuni kkanso bazimbeko eddwaliro. Era mu kusiima okwo yasiimye Buganda Land Board egguse ensonga eno.” Owek. Waggwa Nsibirwa bw’agambye. Owek. Nsibirwa agambye nti ettaka lino liriko akakwakkulizo kakuzimbako ddwaliro era singa bakyusa ne bateekako ekintu ekirala, Beene ettaka ajja kulyeddiza. Ono yeebazizza aba Rotary olw’okubeera n’omutima omuyambi wadde nga si bagagga nnyo. Ssentebe wa disitulikiti y’e Wakiso, Matia Lwanga Bwanika, alaze okutya ku ngeri ebyobulamu by’abantu abasasula omusolo gye bikwatiddwamu n’asuubiza okukwatizaako bannalotale bano. Ate ye Pulezidenti wa Rotary e Nansana, Geoffrey Hairora, atenderezza Obwabakaba bwa Buganda olwokulumirirwa abantu ne buwaayo ettaka okugenda eddwaliro amakula. Okusinziira ku bakungu mu Bwakabaka, ettaka eriweereddwayo libalirirwamu obukadde bwa ssiringi 400 naye olw’okusiima kwa Beene,  bano bafunye lya liizi ku bwereere, lisobole okugasa abantu ba Kabaka. Eddwaliro lino lyakumalawo obuwumbi obusoba mu 4.

headline: Akamyufu e Bukono kayimiridde lwa kuttibwa kwa Agenti wa Namuganza
text: Akulira okulonda mukibiina ki National Resistance Movement (NRM) ayimirizza okulonda kw’akamyufu k’omubaka wa Bukono mu palamenti  olw’okutemula agenti wa Namuganza. Minisita Persis Namuganza Odoi bino yabyogedde ku Lwakutaano, nategeeza nga Agenti wa Namuganza bweyattiddwa abantu abatanaba kutegeerekeka.  Ono yagaanye okwasanguza ammanya g’omugenzi naye nakakasa nga bwabadde Agenti wa Minisita omubeezi ow’ebyettaka Persis Namuganza. Namuganza akyalwana okulaba nga yeddiza bbendera y’ekibiina oluvanyuma lw’okumalako ekisanja kino nga talina kibiina. Odoi yanyonyodde nti, “Tusindise poliisi ekwate omuntu yenna eyenyigidde mu ttemu lino.” Dr. Odoi kati ali e Bushenyi yategeezezza nti okutwaliza awamu okulonda kubadde kwa mirembe mu bifo ebisinga newabadde wasuubirwa obutabanguko. Ku makya ga leero, Odoi yakadde kwongezaayo okulonda kwa kamyufu k’omubaka omukyala n’okwa Mawogola North olw’okulwanagana mu bawagizi.

headline: Eyali Ssaabalabirizi Ntagali awummuziddwa olw’ebyekuusa ku bwenzi
text: Kampala Eyali Ssaabalabirizi w’Ekkanisa ya Uganda, Stanely Ntagali, awummuziddwa ku bigambibwa nti yaganza omukazi omufumbo.  Okusinziira ku mukutu gwa Uganda Radio Network, kino kyalangiriddwa Ssaabalabirizi Kaziimba Mugalu mu bbaluwa eyafulumye nga January 13, 2021. Ebbaluwa eno erumiriza nti Ntagali aliko muka omusajja gw’abadde yaganza era nga’ensonga eno ne Ntagali akkiriza nti aliko ky’agimanyiko. “Obwenzi musango munene ku ddaala lyonna. Eyali Ssaabalabirizi Ntagali yalidde mu mukyala we, obufumbo bwe ne Yesu Kristo olukwe ne bannayuganda ababadde bamutunuulira ng’ekyokulabirako.” Ebbaluwa eri abeepisikoopi bwe yagambye. Kaziimba yagasseeko nti Ekkanisa ya Uganda erina abagoberezi abawera obukadde 13 era nga bano bonna bakemeddwa era ne bonoona naye nga Bbayibuli bw’egamba mu kitabo kya Abaroma 2:23, ekkanisa erina okuteeka abakulembeze baayo ku nninga baleme kuva ku mulamwa. Ono yannyonnyodde nti yamaze dda okutegeeza Ntagali ku nsonga eno era nga yayimiriziddwa okukola obuweereza bw’ekkanisa ku mutendera gwonna wadde okugaba amasakaremento oba okukiikirira ekkanisa. Kaziimba yasabye abakkiriza okusigala nga basabira abafumbo ku njuyi zombi basobole okwenenya era basonyiwagane. “Kano akadde si kakuzunza lugambo. Kadde ka kwetonda, kadde ka kusaba era n’okwekubamu ttooci era twenenye era akadde ak’okutereeza obufumbo bwaffe mu maaso ga Katonda,” Kaziimba bwe yagasseeko. Kaziimba agamba nti Ekkanisa tegenda kuttira muntu yenna ku liiso era nga baakunyweza ekirabo ky’obufumbo era nga bakkiriza nti obufumbo bwa kitiibwa era nga bulina kubaawo wakati w’omwami omu n’omukazi omu. “Tewali muntu ali waggulu w’amateeka ga Katonda. Tuyita abo bonna abamenye etteeka lino, mugende mu maaso ga Katonda mwenenye era musabe ekisonyiwo eri abo be musobezza.” Kaziimba bwe yagambye. Kinajjukirwa nti Ntagali, 65, ye Ssaabalabirizi w’Ekkanisa ya Uganda ey’omunaana era nga yawaayo yafeesi eri Stephen Kaziimba Mugalu nga 01/ 03/2020 oluvannyuma lw’okutuuka ku myaka egiwummula.

headline: Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda ne Poliisi baakusisinkana Bobi Wine enkya
text: Omwogezi w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda Jotham Taremwa URN Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda akakulirwa omulamuzi Simon Byabakama enkya ku ssaawa ttaano kaakusisinkana munnakisinde ky’ebyobufuzi ekya People Power era omubaka wa Kyaddondo ey’obuvanjuba Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu amanyiddwa ennyo nga Bobi Wine. Ng’ayogerako ne URN, omwogezi w’akakiiko kano Jotham Taremwa yategeezezza nti bakizudde nti waliwo obwetaavu okusisinkana Bobi Wine nga bali wamu ne Poliisi basobole okukkanya ku nkiiko za Bobi Wine ez’okwebuuza ku bantu ku nteekateekaye ey’okwesimbawo okuvuganya ku ntebe y’omukulembeze w’eggwanga mu kulonda kwabonna okunaabaawo omwaka ogujja. Poliisi nga yeesigama ku nsonga ez’enjawulo, ennaku ssatu eziyise eremesezza Bobi Wine okukuba enkungaanaze ng’egamba nti yabadde tagoberedde buwaayiro bonna obuli mu tteeka erifuga enkugaana erya Public Order Management Act. Olukungaana lwe olwasooka yalina okulukuba e Gayaza wabula Poliisi yalusattulula era n’emuggalira wamu nebanne abaawerako mu buduukulu bwayo e Kasangati ne Naggalama. Eggulo Bobi Wine yasazizzamu olukungaana lwe e Gulu wamu ne Lira olw’ensonga ezeekuusa kukulemesebwa Poliisi. Taremwa yagambye olukiiko era lwakwetabwamu abaagala okwesimbawo kubwa pulezidenti abalala basatu okuli Nkwagabwa John Herbert, Mwesigye Fred ne Mwambazi Joseph.

headline: Bannayuganda basabiddwa okwekwata obulimi n’obulunzi
text: Bananayuganda basabiddwa okwettanira obulimi n’obulunzi kibayambe okulaakulana n’okwegobako obwavu naddala nga balima emmwaanyi n’okuziriikiriza. Okusaba kuno kukoleddwa Minisita omubeezi Ow’ebyobulimi, Ow’ obusuubuzi n’Obweggasi mu Buganda, Owek. Hajji Amis Kakomo bw’abadde atikkula Amakula okuva mu Bannakyaggwe ne Bulemeezi mu Lubiri e Mmengo ku Mmande. Minisita Kakomo agamba nti ekiseera kituuse obulimi n’obulunzi abantu babitwale ng’emirimu gy’obuvunaanyizibwa era bagwenyigiremu era beegatte okusobola okulaakulanira awamu nga benyigira mu nteekateeka ez’enjawulo Buganda zereeta. Katikkiro w’ebyalo bya Kabaka, Omukungu Moses Luutu, asabye abazadde okwongera amaanyi mu kugunjula abaana ab’obuwala ekyokuyambako okukendeeza ku mpisa ezisebengeredde kwossa nenyambala etasaanidde mu baana. Abàami b’eggombolola banjudde alipoota omuli ebibasoomoza nebituukiddwako era nebawera okusigala nga batwala emirimu egyabakwasibwa mu maaso. Abaleese Amakula muli eggombolola ya Mutuba VII Kawolo okuva e kyaggwe ne Mumyuka Nsege Butuntumula era mubireeteddwa mulimu emmere, ebisolo , ebibalala nebintu ebirala.

headline: Beene awaddeyo ettaka bazimbireko ab’e Nansana eddwaliro
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi ii asiimye naawa banna Rotary be Nansana awamu ne Munisipaali ye Nansana ettaka bazimbeko eddwaliro eriri ku mutendera gwa Health Centre IV kiyambe okutumbula eby’obulamu mu kitundu kino. Ekyapa ky’ettaka lino kibakwasiddwa Omumyuka ow’okubiri owa Katikkiro era Omuwanika wa Buganda, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa kulwa Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga, ku mukolo ogubadde mu Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokusatu. “Nina essanyu okubategeeza nti nga tuyita mu Buganda Land Board enteekateeka yonna yawedde era ekyapa nga bwekyetaagisa mu mateeka nti gavumenti okutongoza eddwaliro lino wadde ligenda kuzimbibwa Rotary kirina kuba mu mannya ga Nansana Municipal Council era kyamaze okukolebwa nekizzibwa mu mannya go era olwa leero ngenda kukibakwasa,” Owek. Nsibirwa bw’agambye. Owek. Nsibirwa ategeezezza nti wadde ettaka lino liri mu kifo ky’ennono ky’embuga ya Nakuule naye embuga eno yasigaddewo ate nga ne woofiisi za Buganda Landa Board zisigaddewo ku mbuga eno Ono annyonnyodde nti abantu beeyongedde mu Nansana ate n’enkulaakulana nayo ebadde ezze nga Buganda ebadde erina okukwatizaako gavumenti okutumbula embeera z’abantu mu by’obulamu n’ebyenfuna. Owek. Nsibiirwa agamba nti Buganda erina omukago ne Rotary nga wakati mu bwesimbu n’okubeera nti tebasosola mu bantu kyali kyangu okukwatagana nabo okuteekawo enteekateeka eno era nalabula nti singa likozesebwa ku nsonga endala lyakuddira Obwakabaka. Owek. Nsibirwa era annyonyodde nti Beene yagenderera kutuusa bujanjabi obutuukiridde era obwomutindo ku bantu be Nansana nebitundu ebiriranyeewo abali mu bwetaavu bwabwo . Ye Pulezidenti wa Rotary y’e Nansana, Rebecca Namirembe annyonnyodde nti ensonga eno etuukira bulungi ku misingi Rotary kweyazimbibwa nti bakukola ekisoboka okuggusa omulimu guno kubanga gwakuyamba bangi . Ettaka eriweereddwayo lisangibwa Nakuule mu munisipaali ye Nansana nga lisuubirwa okumalawo obuwumbi 5 billion era lisuubirwa okumala emyaka 5 nga lizimbibwa.

headline: Kkooti enkulu esazizzaamu ekibonerezo ekyaweebwa omusomesa w’e Makerere Dr Stella Nyanzi
text: Dr Stella Nyanzi ayambadde gaalubindi ng’ali wamu n’akulira oludda oluwakanya gavumenti mu palamenti Betty Awol   Kkooti enkulu mu Kampala esazizzaamu ekibonerezo kya kkooti ento eyali yasingisizzaa omusomesa w’e Makerere Dr Stella Nyanzi omusango gw’okumalako omukulembeze w’eggwanga eddembe nga yeyambisa emikutu gya yintaneeti. Omulamuzi wa kkooti enkulu Henry Peter Adonyo yagambye nti kkooti ya Buganda Road teyalina buyinza buwozesa Nyanzi era n’eragira ayimbulwe bunnambiro okuva mu kkomera e Luzira gyamaze ebbanga ly’myezi 16. Ono yali yakaligibwa ku kibonerezo kya myezi 18.  Nyanzi yakwatibwa olw’okuwandiika ekitontome ku mukutu gwe ogwa Facebook mbu nga kivvoola omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni wamu ne maamawe omugenzi Esteeri Kukondeka.   Kyokka Nyanzi teyamatira na nsalawo ya Kkooti eyali ekulemberwa omulamuzi Gladys Kamasanyu era bwatyo kwekujulira ng’ayita mumunnamateekawe, Isaac Ssemakadde.   Omulamuzi yakirizza nti ddala eddembe lya Nyanzi lyalinyirirwa oluvanyuma lwa kkooti ento okugaana okumuwuliriza. Kyokka wabaddewo akasambatukko nga Nyanzi ateebwa oluvanyuma lw’abasirikale b’amakomera okuddamu ne bamukwata okumuzaayo e Luzira mbu okusobola okussa omukono ku mpapaula ezimuta. Poliisi yakubye amasasi wamu ne tiyagaasi okusobola okugumbulula abawagizi ba Nyanzi ababadde beesomye okumutwala.

headline: Bannabusujju babanguddwa ku bweggasi
text: Mityana Abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka bakungaanidde ku mbuga y’eggombolola ya Ssabagabo Kakindu mu Busujju okubangulwa ku birungi ebiri mu bweggasi. Owek. Mayanja Nkalubo nga abangula ab’e Busujju Omusomo guno ogwetabiddwako Minisita w’Ettaka Obulimi obutonde bw’ensi n’obweggasi mu Bwakabaka Owek. Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo, abakulembeze mu Mityana n’abantu abalala mu kaweefube w’okusitula embeera z’abantu ba Kabaka. Bano Minisita Mayanja abasabye okujjumbira obweggasi era nga kino kijja kubayamba okuganyulwa mu nteekateeka z’Obwakabaka nga beetegese bulungi. Minisita asabye abakulira ebibiina byobwegasi ebyenjawulo okubeera abeelufu ku nsonga y’ensimbi kisobole okunyweza obumu mu bantu bebakulembera. Ate ye Omwami wa Kabaka atwala essaza lino Kasujju, Mark Jjingo Kaberenge mu bubaka bwatise omumyukawe Christopher Nsimbe yeebaziza Ssaabasajja kabaka olwokusosowaza essaza Busujju. Akulira okutumbula embeera zabantu mudisitulikiti ye Mityana, Herbert Sserwanga abasabye obutatwalirizibwa muyaga gwa kufuna okw’amangu wabula beeyune ebibiina by’obwegassi kibayambe okukulakulana nga bali wamu kitole. Abamu  ku beetabye mu musomo guno Abeetabye mu musomo guno basiimye Obwakabaka olw’omusomo guno wabula nasaba bwongere okubakwatizaako basobole okwekulaakulanya.

headline: Aba NUP bagenda kwekalakaasa olw’okuwamba abawagizi babwe okweyongedde
text: Bannakibiina ki National Unity Party (NUP) balabudde nga bwebagenda okwekalakaasa olw’abebyokwerinda okugenda mu maaso n’okuwamba abawagizi babwe nga kati baweze 137 abagambibwa okutwalibwa bamukwatamundu. Bano era balaze ab’enganda abalumiriza ab’ebyokwerinda okuwamba abantu babwe nga balaajana nti embeera mwebali nzibu kuba abantu babwe abawambiddwa ab’ebyokwerinda bebabadde babalabirira. Abakulembeze mu kibiina kino nga bakuliddwa Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu ategeezezza bannamawulire e Kamawokya nti abawagizi babwe abawera 137 bebatamanyiddwako mayitire. “Pulezidenti yakakasa nti bebalina abantu baffe, Minisita w’ensonga ez’omunda naye nategeeza Palamenti nti balina abawagizi baffe bebakwata naye ekyo kyetwasemba okuwulira, twagala bakomyewo abantu baffe,” Kyagulanyi bw’agambye. Kyagulanyi asabye abo bonna abakwatirwa abantu babwe okwekalakaasa mu mirembe bababanje kuba tebalina musango. Ono era alaajanidde amawanga g’ebweru okuvaayo bataase embeera kuba ekiri mu ggwanga kati kisinga ekyaliwo ku mirembe gya Idi Amin kuba obukulembeze bwa Pulezidenti Museveni buyitiridde okulinyirira eddembe ly’obuntu. Oluvannyuma lw’okuwambibwa kw’ abawagizi be okuddamu, Kyagulanyi yazeemu buto okubanja abawagizi be nga ayita ku mutimbagano. Kinajjukirwa nti okusooka ekibiina kyafulumya olukalala lwa bantu 243 mu mwaka gwa 2021 abaali bawambiddwa wabula ekibiina kyategeeza nti abaali bawambibwa baali basoba mu 458 era nebateekawo ekitabo ku kitebe kyabwe ab’enganda mwebaali bawandiika ebikwata ku bantu babwe nelwebasemba okubalaba. Ku nsonga y’ekiwambabantu okuddamu, minisita w’ensonga z’amawulire Chris Baryomunsi wiiki ewedde yasabye aba NUP okutegeeza poliisi n’ebitongole by’ ebyokwerinda bwekiba nga kituufu nga abantu babwe babuzibwawo.

headline: Akulira Uganda Airlines talabiseeko mu COSASE, basaba eby’okubasoya ebibuuzo biggyibwemu amawulire
text: Ssenkulu w’ekitongole ky’ennyonyi mu ggwanga ki ‘Uganda Airlines’ talabiseeko mu kakiiko akabuuliriza ku nkozesa y’ensimbi mu bitongole bya gavumenti aka COSASE nga agamba aliko emirimu egitalinda gyalina okukwasaganya. Ssenkulu Jennifer Bamuturaki asabye akakiiko kano kongezeeyo ensisinkano yabwe okutuuka mu wiiki ey’okubiri eya September era obubaka buno abutadde mu bbaluwa gyatisse akulira eby’omutindo mu kitongole kino, Michael Kaliisa. Abatwala kampuni eno era baagala eby’okubanoonyerezaako biggyibwe mu mawulire kuba gyebikoma okugenda mu maaso by’onoona ekitiibwa kya kampuni eno. Bino webijjidde nga Ssenkulu w’ekitongole kino asisinkanye Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina ekitaba kampuni z’ennyonyi mu Afirika General, Abderahmane Berthé mu Kampala. Okusinziira ku bakulira Uganda Airlines, ensisinkano eno egenda kwongera enkolagana era kitumbule entambula y’ennyonnyi okusobola okuganyulwa mu katale k’ensi yonna. Wabula bino bitabudde Ssentebe wa COSASE, Joel Ssenyonyi nategeeza nti aba Uganda Airlines batandise okusaagira mu nsonga eno nga tekisoboka kusaba esazibwemu ku lunaku lwennyini lwebabadde basuubira. Era ono amuwandiikidde ebbaluwa emusaba okweyanjula eri akakiiko kano olunaku lw’enkya oba sikyo ensonga bajja kuzikwasa poliisi yeeba emunoonya. Bino webijidde nga akakiiko ka COSASE kakyagenda mu maaso n’okunoonyereza ku kitongole kino oluvannyuma lwa alipoota ya Ssaababalirizi w’ebitabo bya gavumenti olw’emivuyo emingi egiri mu ntambuza yaayo ey’emirimu awamu n’ebisaanyizo byabo abagikulembera.

headline: Bakutte ppikipiki 700 n’aba boodabooda 250 lwa kujeemera biragiro bya Kafyu
text: Poliisi mu Kampala etegeezezza nti abavuzi ba boodabooda 250 be baakwatiddwa ne ppikipiki 712 mu Kampala ku poliisi ez’enjawulo oluvannyuma lw’okujeemera ebiragiro bya kafyu ebyateekebwawo okutangira ekirwadde kya COVID-19. Okusinziira ku amyuka omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala n’emiriraano, Luke Owoyesigire, baasinze kukwata abo abaasangiddwa nga bamenye ebiragiro bya COVID-19. “Ppikipiki 712, emmotoka 174 ze zaakwatiddwa ate abantu bali 250 be baakwatiddwa ne baggalirwa ku poliisi ez’enjawulo.” Owoyesigire bwe yagambye. Ono yannyonnyodde nti bano bagenda kuyimbulwa ku kakalu ka kkooti oluvannyuma lw’okutanzibwa engassi ku ppikipiki zaabwe n’emmotoka. Owoyesigire ategeezezza nti, “Bajja kusooka kusasula ngassi okubaddiza emmotoka zaabwe ne ppikipiki.”

headline: Akulira oludda oluvuganya ayagala Palamenti eve mu luwummula eteese ku bbeeyi y’amafuta
text: Akulira oludda oluvuganya mu Palamenti, Owek. Mathias Mpuuga awandiikidde Sipiika wa Palamenti ng’amusaba atuuze olukiiko lw’eggwanga mu bwangu luteese ku kizibu ky’amafuta mu ggwanga ekitadde eggwanga ku bunkenke. Ebbeeyi y’amafuta yeekanamye mu ngeri etabangawo mu byafaayo by’eggwanga nga kati liita emu eya Petulooli egula wakati w’omutwalo 1 n’ekitundu mu bimu ku bitundu eby’enjawulo e Hoima. Mu kampala liita egula wakati wa 5000 ne 7000ekintu ekireese emiwendo gy’ebintu ebyenjawulo mu ggwanga okulinnya. Ebbaluwa eno eyawandiikiddwa nga 19 January, 2022 Owek. Mpuuga agamba nti alina okutya nti eggwanga liyinza okugwa mu buzibu nga walina okubaawo ekikolebwa mu bwangu. Mpuuugaasabye Sipiika akozese obuyinza obumuweebwa Ssemateeka Palamenti eyitibwe okuva mu luwummula gyeri etuule mu bwangu kuba ensonga eno nkulu nnyo mu kaseera kano. Ku ntandikiwa ya wiiki eno kkiraaka wa Palamenti yali yalaga nti Palamenti ejja kuddamu okutuula ku Lwokuna lwa wiiki ejja wabula Mpuuga agamba nti eno wala nnyo. Bino we bijjidde nga gavumenti yaakamala okutegeeza nga bwe yaggyeewo okukebera baddereeva ku nsalo e Malaba ne Busia okukendeeza ku kalippagano k’ebidduka era kisobozese amafuta okutuuka mu bitundu by’eggwanga eby’enjawulo. Mu ngeri yeemu gavumenti yalaze nga bwe yeddizza obuvunaanyizibwa bwonna ku materekero g’amafuta agasangibwa ku luguudo Mutiibwa mu Jinja ng’egamba nti kkampuni gye yali ewadde omulimu gwagirema era ttanka zino ezitereka obungi bwa liita obukadde 30 temuli wadde ettondo.

headline: Abasawo batiisizatiisiza okwekalakaasa olw’embeera embi mwebakolera
text: Abasawo abali mukugezesebwa mu by’eddagala, bannansi awamu n’abazaalisa bawadde gavumenti nsalesale wa nnaku 72 okusalira ebizibu byabwe amagezi oba sikyo bakuwummuza ebikola. Bano baagala Minisitule y’ebyobulamu okuteeka mu nkola ekiragiro kya Pulezidenti kyeyawa nga alagira bano baweebwe ensimbi obukadde 2.5 buli mwezi. Nga bayita mu kiwandiiko akulira ekibiina ekitaba abasawo bano ki Federation of Uganda Medical Intern (FUMI), Dr. Musa Lumumba agamba nti tebafunanga ssente za mwezi gwa September ne October, wadde aba Minisitule y’ebyensimbi babategeeza nti ensimbi baaziweereza. “Tuli mu mbeera nzibu, ssente ezo zezituyamba okufuna ebintu nga emmere, wetusula awamu n’okwambala naye kati tetulina wadde ekikumi,” Dr Lumumba bwe yagambye. Lumumba yagasseeko nti embeera eno tebasobozesa kutambuza bulungi mirimu gyabwe n’obukugu nga bwekiteekeddwa okubeera. Kinajjukirwa nti nga June 1, 2021 Pulezidenti Museveni yasisinkana aba Uganda Medical Association ne Elders Forum nalaga okunyolwa ku mbeera y’abasawo abali mukugezesebwa mwebawangaalira. Museveni wano yalagira bano baweebwe ekitundu ky’ensimbi eziweebwa abasawo ababeera bamaze okukakasibwa okusobola okutumbula embeera zabwe. Lumumba agamba nti bakulu babwe abakakasibwa ku mirimu bafuna okuva ku bukadde 5.4 okutuuka ku bukadde 4.8 okusinzira ku mirimu egy’enjawulo egy’ekisawo. Okusinziira ku Lumumba kino kitegeeza nti abagezesebwa balina kufuna makati naye kinyiza okulaba nti waliwo abafuna akakadde kamu n’ekitundu nga kuno kuliko n’omusolo gwa bitundu 30 ku buli 100 nebasigaza kumpi akakadde kamu akatasobola kubatambuza.

headline: Kalembe asuubizza okutereeza ebyentambula
text: Eyeesimbyewo okuvuganya ku bwapulezidenti mu kalulu ka 2021, Nancy Linda Kalembe, asuubizza okuteteeza ebyentambula singa anaalondebwa ku bwapulezidenti 2021. Avuganya Nancy Linda Kalembe Kalembe yategeezezza nti agenda kukulaakulanya entambula ku mazzi, eggaaliyoomukka n’enguudo kubanga enguudo eziriwo zaayungibwa ku bifo byokka ebirimu eby’obugagga, ebifo ebirala ne birekebwa ebbali Kalembe annyonnyodde nti enteekateeka ye okusinga egenda kwetooloolera ku bantu, kisobozese abantu n’ebitundu okufuna mu bukulembeze bwe. Ono yalaze nti wansi w’omulamwa ogw’okutambulira awamu waakulaba ng’ebyentambula biyamba okutereeza ebyenfuna bya Uganda. Omu ku bawagizi be, Juma Bwambale yategeezezza nti enteekateeka y’okutereeza ebyentambula erina okutwaliramu Boodabooda era bateekebweko amateeka baleme kugobaganyizibwa kubanga nabo mwe baggya eky’okulya. Bwambale yawadde amagezi okukozesa eggaaliyoomukka kikendeeze ku kalippagano k’ebidduka naddala mu kibuga Kampala. Omutuuze w’e Muyenga, Oliver Nakyeyune, yategeezezza nti ebyentambula mu Kampala bisobola okutereezebwa singa wabaawo enteekateeka ennung’amu. Nakyeyune yagambye nti abeesimbyewo balina okulowooza ku kizibu ky’ettaka okulina okukolerwa enkulaakulana kuba ebiseera ebisinga gavumenti yeesanga ng’erina okusaasaanya ssente eziwera okuliyirira bannanyini ttaka. Okusinziira ku mbalirira y’eggwanga eya 2020/2021 ey’obuse 45, obuse 5.8 bwaweebwa Minisitule y’ebyentambula nga bino by’ebitundu 13 ku buli 100.

headline: Lwesibawa yesunga kuwangulira Express FC bikopo
text: Ttiimu ya Express FC yefunze akatale k’abazannyi ku murundi guno nga egula abasambi abawerako esobole okuvuganya obulungi mu Liigi y’eggwanga sizoni ejja. Omusambi Godfrey Lwesibawa Ku Lwokubiri yaguze omusambi Godfrey Lwesibawa, oluvanyuma lw’endagaano ye ne ttiimu ya Tooro United okuggwako. Ono kati awezezza omuwendo gw’abasimbi abaguliddwa ku basambi Mukaaga. Lwesibawa yaliko mu ttiimu eno, ku luno awereddwa endagaano ya myaka 2 okutuuka mu mwaka gwa 2022. Omuwuwuttanyi Lwesibawa yalaze nga bwesunze okuwangulira ttiimu ya Express ebikopo naddala ekya liigi. Lwesibawa tazzeemu kwegatta ku Express kyokka wabula asanze omutendesi Wasswa Bbosa gwaludde nga asambira mu ttiimu ez’enjawulo okuli; SC Villa ne Tooro United. Weyabeerera mu Express mu 2014 ne 2016, Lwesibawa yateeba ggoolo munaana (8) ate nayambako ggoolo endala 25 okunywa. Lwesibawa yeyunze ku basambi ; Cryspus Kusiima , Denis Otim ,Richard Bbosa, Abel Eturude ne Kiragga Mustafa. Sizoni ewedde, Express yamalira mukifo kya Mwenda (9) n’obubonero 31 okuva mu nzannya 25.

headline: RDC Njuki alabudde abajeemera ebiragiro bya Corona
text: Bya Rachael Namuli Ntebe Omubaka wa Pulezidenti mu kitundu ky’e Ntebe, Hajji Njuki Mbabali, asisinkanye bassentebe b’eggombolola n’ebyalo n’abawa ebiragiro ebiggya ebirina okugobererwa n’ensonga kwe bagabira ebipapula ebikkiriza abantu okutambula. Mbabali asinzidde wano n’ayongera okulabula abantu abamenya ebiragiro bya Minisitule y’ebyobulamu ne Pulezidenti Museveni ebyateekebwawo okukendeeza ku nsaasaana y’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ekizinzeeko eggwanga. Njuki agambye nti ensonga ezimu ezaaleetera Pulezidenti Museveni okuddamu okuteeka eggwanga ku muggalo, be bantu abajeemu nga aba boodabooda abaatikkanga abantu babiri ssaako amabaala agaali gakola nga gakuumibwa abapoliisi. Ono awaddeebiragiro bassentebe ku byalo n’eggombolola, ebbaluwa z’eddwaliro okuziwa abalwadde abo bokka abagenda ku mutendera gwa Health Centre III era ng’ebbaluwa zino zirina kubeera za bwereere, n’alabula okukwata oyo yenna anaggya ku bantu ssente. Mu birala, RDC Njuki alabudde bannannyini mayumba ne balandiroodi bonna obutagezaako kugoba bantu mu mayumba okutuusa ng’ennaku 42 ezaalangirirwa Pulezidenti Yoweriziweddeko kuba abantu bali waka nga n’abakola tebitambula bulungi. Ono era alabudde abakung’aanira ku mizannyo nga; Ludo, Matatu wamu n’abakozesa ebiragalalagala, nti bagenda kukwatibwa bavunaanibwe.

headline: Omusumba Paul Ssemwogerere alondeddwa ku bwa Ssaabasumba w’essaza ekkulu ery’e Kampala
text: Kampala Omusumba w’essaza ly’e Kasana – Luweero, Paul Ssemwogerere alondeddwa Ppaapa Francis XVI ku bwa Ssaabasumba bw’essaza ekkulu ery’e Kampala okudda mu bigere bya Ssaabasumba Cyprian Kizito Lwanga eyafa gyebuvuddeko. Kino kirangiriddwa mu lukiiko lwa bannamawulire olutudde ku Lutikko e Lubaga ku Lwokuna. Oluvannyuma lw’okufa kwa Ssaabasumba Lwanga, Omusumba Ssemwogerere yalondebwa okubeera omukuumi w’essaza lino okutuusa lw’alondeddwa okumuddira mu bigere. Omusumba Ssemwogerere y’ani Paul Ssemwogerere yazaalibwa ngaJune 30, 1956 e Kisubi,ku luguudo oludda e Ntebe. Emisomo yagitandikira ku ssomero lya Kigero Primary School nga tannatwalibwa ku Kisubi Boys. Oluvannyuma yeegatta ku ssomero lya St. Maria Gorreti Senior Secondary School- Katende, gye yamalira ssiniya eyookuna. Mu 1976, Ssemwogerere n’abalala 7 be bayizi abaasooka okusomera mu St. Mbaaga Seminarye Ggaba. Eryatandikibwawo okubangula abasajja mu bwa Faaza. Mu mwaka gwa 1978, Kalidinaali Emmanuel Kiwanuka Nsubuga yaweereza Ssemwogerereku Ssettendekero waSaint Francis de Sales Seminary e Milwaukee, Wisconsin, mu Amerika n’atikkirwa ddiguli y’eddiini mu 1982. Ng’ennaku z’omwezi 21 Novemba, 1981 ono yaweebwa obuseminariyo Ssaabasumba Rembert George Weakland,eyali akulira essaza lya Milwaukee. YafuukaFaaza nga June 3, 1983 e Kampala nga buno bwamuweebwa Kalidinaali Nsubuga. Ono yatandika okuweereza nga Faaza e Kampala okutuusa mu 2008 lwe yalondebwa okubeera Omusumba w’essaza lya Kasana – Luweero. E Luweero, Ssemwogerere yatuuzibwa Ssaabasumba Lwanga eyaliayambibwako Kalidinaali Emmanuel Wamala, Ssaabasumba w’e Sant’Ugo, Paul Tschang In-Nam, Titular Archbishop ow’e Amantian’omubaka wa Ppaapa eyali mu ggwanga ekiseera ekyo.

headline: Bannabyabufuzi kitundu ku ttemu ly’ebijambiya – Minisita Otafiire
text: Minisita w’ensonga z’omunda mu ggwanga, Gen. Kahinda otafiire ategeezezza nti bannabyabufuzi bwe bali ekitundu ku ttemu eriri mu kitundu ky’e Masaka eryakatta abantu abasoba mu 30. Bino Minisita abyogeredde mu kafubo kabaddemu n’ababaka abava mu bitundu bya Buganda wakati nga beetegekera okulambula ebitundu bye Masaka. “Ebiri e Masaka mulimu bannabyabufuzi, mulimu n’abatemu naye nze mpise bannabyabufuzi beenaazeeko ekko. Njagala okutegeeza bannamasaka nti nga gavumenti tukola buli kisoboka okuzza embeera mu nteeko. Siraba muntu munnabyafuzi agenda okwagalwa abantu ng’ayita mu kubatemula.” Minisita Otafiire bw’agambye. Minisita Otafiire abantu abasabye okwenyigiramu bakolagane ne gavumenti kuba obutebenkenvu tebuyawula mu ddiini, kibiina wadde amawanga era buli omu abwetaaga. Wabula bino ababaka babadde nabo mu kafubo babiwakanyizza nga bagamba nti tabawadde nsonga lwaki alowooza nti bannabyabufuzi babirinamu omukono. Omubaka wa Kalungu East, Francis Katabaazi ategeezezza nti singa nabo baba baakutwala buufu gavumenti bw’etutte, bandigambye nti gavumenti y’ebatemula olw’ensonga nti bannabuddu tebaagikombya ku kalulu. Ate Omubaka wa Kakuuto, Geoffrey Lutaaya agamba nti Minisita Otafiire ayogeza bulagajjavu ng’ensonga ne bw’ebeera nnene agitwala nga yaakusaaga wabula n’amusaba obuteeyibaala kuba tannamanya gye kigenda kuggweera. Ssentebe wa Kabondo ka Buganda, Muhammad Muwanga Kivumbi ategeezezza nti Minisita Otafiire bamuwadde amannya g’abantu abamu abali emabega w’ebikolwa bino abali mu bitongole bya gavumenti. “Abaagala omuzannyo ogwo bagutwale ewalala kuba nabo balina gye bava. Bwe twagala okulwanyisa gavumenti tetukola ebyo tusimbawo omu ku ffe n’avuganya nga bwe twakola mu kalulu akawedde.” Omubaka Kivumbi bw’ategeezezza. Ono aweze nti bagenda kukunga abantu mu bitundu byabwe basobole okulwanyise ettemu lino erimazeeko bannamasaka emirembe.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asabye abalimi okulabirira emmwanyi ng’omwana
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga atongozza kaweefube w’okulabirira emmwanyi ezibadde zisimbibwa munkola ya Emmwanyi Terimba ey’omwaka gwa 2020 e Bulemeezi mu Luweero. Katikkiro Mayiga yagambye nti, “ Kaweefube ono wakuddabulula emmwanyi, ekintu kyonna bwokikola nga okusimba emmwanyi, olina okuziddaabiriza kubanga oluusi zifuna obulwadde” Oweek. Mayiga yategeezezza nti okulima emmwanyi tekikoma ku kulima bulimi naye n’okufaayo ennyo okuzilabirira. “Batugamba ntino tulina okunyumya n’emmwanyi, tulina okunyumya nazo emboozi. Okunyumya emboozi n’emmwanyi kwe kubeera nga tuzilambula nolaba obuzibu bweziba zifunye.” Katikkiro Mayiga bweyagambye Mayiga yanyonyodde nti ebiseera ebimu emmwanyi zibeera zikuze nga zeetaaga okusalako gulyoke guleete emituunsi emiggya. Kaweefube ono Katikkiro Mayiga yamutongorezza ew’omulimi w’emmwanyi Nathan Kaggwa, ku kyalo Kyevunze mu gombolola ye Butuntumula. Mu ngeri yeemu Katikkiro agguddewo omusomo gw’abalimisa b’emmwanyi mu Buganda.

headline: Abakulembeze ba Balokole mu Uganda bakyaliddeko Katikkiro wa Buganda.
text: Abakulembeze b’ekibiina Kya National Fellowship Of Born Again Pentecostal Churches in Uganda bakyaliddeko Katikkiro ku Bulange nebabaako byeboogera. Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga nga ali n’Abakulembeze ba Balokole nga basoma essaala. Bamwanjulidde enteekateeka zaabwe omuli, okutumbula empisa n’obuntubulamu mu bavubuka, okuwuliziganya ne bannabyabufuzi, (National Dialogue), era bawaddeyo entereeza yabwe ng’abalokole.Katikkiro abeebazizza okujja nebawa enteekateeka yabwe, abasabye okutambulira wamu n’enteekateeka z’obwakabaka.

headline: KCCA egenda kubonereza bannyini bizimbe abakkirizza abatembeeyi ku mbalaza zabwe
text: Ekitongole kya Kampala Capital City Authority (KCCA)kifulumizza ebiragiro ebikulu musanvu eri bannanyini bizimbe mu Kampala omuli okubisiiga, okubigobako abatembeeyi abakolera ku bbalaza zaabyo. Okusobola okulaba nti bino bituukirira, waliwo engassi eziteekeddwawo omuli n’okuggala ebizimbe bino singa binaasangibwa nga bigaanye okugondera ensonga zino. Ebiragiro bino bifulumiziddwa omubaka wa Pulezidenti mu Kampala, Hudu Hussein leero ku Lwokubiri ku Media Centre mu Kampala. Okusinziira ku Hudu, bino byonna bigendereddwamu okukyusa endabika y’ekibuga Kampala kituukane ku mutindo gw’ebibuga ebirala mu nsi yonna nga Dubai. Mu biragiro bino, Amaduuka, Akeedi, bannyini bizimbe n’abavunaanyizibwa ku bizimbe awamu ne bannyini ttaka balina obuvunaanyizibwa okugoba abatembeeyi ababikolerako nga bakolagana ne poliisi awamu ne KCCA. Hussein agasseeko nti batandise dda okukola ku ky’okuggya abaana abasabiriza ku nguudo era bali mu nteeseganya ku kye balina okukolera ababuulira enjiri ku nguudo kuba abasinga abantu bazze babeemulugunyaako enfunda eziwera. Mu birala, KCCA eyagala bannyini bizimbe bayambeko okugoba enzikiza ku bizimbe n’enguudo za Kampala nga bateeka amataala ne kkamera z’ekika kya CCTV ku bizimbe byabwe okusobola okunyweza eby’okwerinda. Hudu agamba nti amataala bano balina okugateeko nga akabonero ak’okuddiza eri ekibuga ku nsimbi obuwanana ze bayoola okuva mu bapangisa ebizimbe bino era n’alabula ne bannyini bizimbe abatafaayo kubiddaabiriza. Ono alaze ebimu ku bizimbe ebiri mu mbeera embi nga ku bino kuliko; Cham Towers, MTN Towers ne NSSF Towers by’agamba nti byetaagako langi empya bituukane n’omutindo. Mu ngeri yeemu ebizimbe byonna birina okuteekebwako amannya ne nnamba mu bwangu ddala. Ku nsonga ya Boodabooda, Hudu annyonnyodde nti bali mu kwebuuza okulaba engeri gye basobola okubawa obukooti obuliko ennamba z’ekika kya QR era bawandiisibwe okusinziira ku ssiteegi zaabwe era bano bakutendekebwa era abo bokka abanaatuukiriza ebisaanyizo be bagenda okukkiriza okukolera mu Kampala. KCCA yaakwongera okusimba omuddo n’emiti mu kibuga wakati mu nteekateeka y’okulabang’ekibuga kyongera okufaanana obulungi.

headline: Salamu Musumba aggyeeyo omusango gweyawaabira Kadaga
text: Munnakibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC), Proscovia Salaamu Musumba, aggyeeyo omusango gweyali yawaaba nga awakanya okulondebwa kw’ eyali Sipiika Rebecca Kadaga ku kubeera omubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti y’e Kamuli mu Palamenti. Musumba yali yaddukira mu kkooti enkulu e Jinja nga alumirizza munnakibiina kya NRM, Rebecca Kadaga okumenya amateeka g’ebyokulonda wakati nga akalulu tekanatuuka neku lunaku lwennyini olw’okulonda. Ono yagattako nti akulira eby’okulonda mu Kamuli awatali kugoberera mateeka yalangirira Kadaga mu bukyamu ekintu ekyali ekikyamu. Kadaga nga kati ye mumyuka wa Ssaabaminisita ow’okusatu era nga ye Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku nsonga z’amawanga ga East Afirika, Musumba yali amulumiriza okutoola ku bululu bwe nabweyongera ekintu ekyamunyagako obuwanguzi bwe. Wetukoledde eggulire lino ng’omusango gukyagenda mu maaso era nga guwulirwa omulamuzi Isa Sserunkuma era nga Musumba alabiddwako ku kkooti eno.

headline: Poliisi ye Kawempe eggaddwa, Omusibe bamusanze ne COVID-19
text: Kawempe Poliisi ye Kawempe eggaddwa oluvanyuma lw’okuzuula omu ku basibe abadde akuumirwa ku poliisi eno okusangibwa n’ekirwadde ki COVID-19. Omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala Patrick Onyango Omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala Patrick Onyango, yategeezezza nga kino bwebakizudde ku Lwokusatu oluvanyuma lw’okuggalira omulenzi ow’emyaka 15 avunaanibwa omusango gw’okusobya ku mwana ow’emyaka 3. “Oluvanyuma lw’okukola okunoonyereza omulenzi twamututte ku kkooti y’e Nabweru era nasindikibwa mu kkomera lya baana e Naguru. Abatwala ekkomera lino bagaanye okumugatta mu banne nga tetusoose balaga Satifikeeti eziraga nti talina ssennyiga corona. Wano poliisi yamututte okumukebera netukizuula nga alina ekirwadde ki COVID-19,” Onyango bweyanyonyodde. Onyango yagasseeko nti ono mu kaseera kano poliisi ekola enteekateeka okumutwala mu ddwaliro lya Entebbe Grade B asobole okufuna obujjanjabi. Ono yagambye nti abakugu ba Minisitule y’ebyobulamu bamaze edda okuggya Sampolo ku bapoliisi bonna ku poliisi eno, famire zaabwe n’abasibe bonna abali ku poliisi eno. Mu bwangu bakutandika okunoonya abantu abaaliko n’omulenzi ono. “Poliisi ne Baalakisi biggaddwa bisobole okufuuyirwa. Akadde kano tetulina musango gwonna gwetuwandika era tukola ku bigwa bitalaze byokka. Tusaba abantu abaagala okuggulawo emisango okweyambisa poliisi endala ezibarilaanye nga zikolagana butereevu ne poliisi ye Kawempe,” Onyango bweyanyonyodde. Ku Lwokusatu, Minisitule y’ebyobulamu yategeezezza nga bwebazudde abantu abalala 201 nga bakwatiddwa ekirwadde kino mu ggwanga. Kati abantu abalina ekirwadde kino mu Uganda bali 4,101 nga ku bano abasiibuddwa bali 1,876 ate nga 46 bamaze dda okulugulamu obulamu.

headline: Museveni akomezaawo emisanvu ku nguudo Mwasanjala
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni azzeemu nalagira ab’ebyokwerinda okuzza emisanvu ku nguudo zi Mwasanjala eziyingira n’okufuluma ebibuga eby’enjawulo wonna okwetoloola eggwanga. Mu mwezi gwa October, Pulezidenti Museveni yalagira emisanvu gyonna egyali giteekeddwa ku kkubo okugibwako oluvannyuma lw’okufuna okwemulugunya okuva mu bannabizineensi, bamusigansimbi n’abasuubuzi ku kasoobo kebasanga mu kkubo nga kava ku misanvu gino. Oluvannyuma lwe myezi ebiri nga ekiragiro kiyise ate Pulezidenti Museveni akkiriza abapoliisi okuzzaawo emisanvu gino. “ Ssaabaduumizi wa poliisi alagidde abakulira ebikwekweto okuvaawo emisanvu. Kino kitandikiddewo era essira tulitadde ku bifo ebisinga okuba eby’obulabe nebyo ebisingamu obubenje,” Omwogezi wa poliisi, Fred Enanga bw’ategeezezza. Okusinziira ku Enanga, emisanvu gino bwegyagyibwao, walabikawo omuwaatwa olwo abazzi b’emisango nebatandika okwegiriisa n’okukusa ebintu omuli n’ebiragalalagala. Ekiragiro kya Ochola kiragira abapoliisi okufuba okulaba nti enguudo zi Mwasanjala ziriko obukuumi era bakozese emisanvu gino okukwata abazzi b’emisango awamu n’abantu abamenya amateeka g’ebidduka. Ono asabye abantu bonna okugondera poliisi era bayimirire singa babeera bakubiddwa omukono kuba abapoliisi baweereddwa ebiragiro okwerwanako singa babeera balumbiddwa. Enanga agamba nti emisanvu gino gigenda kuyambibwako emmotoka za poliisi ennawunyi awamu n’ abasajja babwe abateereddwa ku bulindaala okudduukirira embeera yonna ebeera eguddewo. Afande Enanga akakasizza nti bino byonna babikoze balungamizibwa ekiragiro ky’ omukulembeze w’eggwanga nasaba abantu okukolagana obulungi ne poliisi kuba eriwo kuyambo bo.

headline: Ng’enda kufufuggaza bamafiya – Ssaabaminisita Nabbanja
text: Ssaabaminisita Robinah Nabbanja yeeweze okufufuggaza bamafiya abeesomye okubba ssente z’omuwi w’omusolo. Nabbanja yategeezezza nti ye muntu wa bikolwa era tewali muntu yenna agenda kumutiisatiisa wadde okuyimirira mu kkubo lye wakati ng’aweereza bannayuganda. Bino Nabbanja abyogedde aweza ennaku 100 mu woofiisi bukya alondebwa okubeera Ssaabaminisita w’eggwanga nga zino zaaweze ku Ssande ewedde. “Njagala okubakakasa nti tewali muntu yenna agenda kututiisa. Ekitiiyo nja kukiyita kitiiyo n’ekijiiko nkiyite kijiiko, temusangisa Ssaabaminisita.” Nabbanja bwe yeesomye. Nabbanja yagasseeko nti ye atunuulira ekintu kimu nga ge mazima era mukozi era eyagwanira ekifo kino. Bw’atyo yeebazizza Pulezidenti Museveni olw’okumuteekamu obwesigwa n’amulonda aweereze eggwanga. Ono yategeezezza bannamawulire nti mu nnaku 100 z’abadde mu woofiisi, bwe buba bubonero ku ebyo by’akoze afuna 90 ku 100 kuba ebiragiro bya Mukama we era Pulezidenti abitadde bulungi mu nkola. Mu bimu ku by’atuuseeko, Nabbanja ategeezezza nti akoze omulimu omulungi okuteeka ebiteeso n’ebirowoozo bya gavumenti mu Palamenti era bino abikoledde mu budde. Wabula Nabbanja yeesambye eby’emivuyo gya ssente za COVID-19 n’ategeeza nti ye yakoma ku kimu kya kutondawo kakiiko naye okuteeka mu nkola tegwali mulimu ggwe. Kinajjukirwa nti Palamenti ebadde yaakamala okuzuula nti omuntu eyasookera ddala okufuna ssente za COVID-19 yeefuula omuvuzi wa boodabooda, ekitali kituufu. “Nze nzennyini nze natwala amawulire g’abantu abaali baganyuddwa mu ssente za COVID-19 mu Palamenti era ne nsaba ababaka okunoonyereza balabe oba ssente zaaweereddwa abantu abatuufu.” Nabbanja bwe yannyonnyodde. Ono agamba nti eky’okwekenneenya obutuufu bw’amannya agaafuna ssente tegwali gugwe nga ye kye yakola kwali kulonda linnya mu lukalala olwali lumuweereddwa.

headline: FUFA egobye omutendesi wa Cranes  McKinstry
text: Kampala Ekibiina ekitwala omupiira mu Uganda ekya  Federation of Uganda Football Association (FUFA), kigobye omutendesi wa ttiimu y’eggwanga,  Johnathan McKinstry. Okusinziira ku kiwandiiko ekifulumizibwa FUFA, kinnyonnyola nti baatuuse ku nzikiriziganya ne McKinstry okusazaamu endagaano ye gy’abadde atambuddeko emyezi  18 mw’awangulidde emipiira egiwera 12.  Ono we bamukwatidde ku nkoona ng’emipiira 2 ku 3 egizannyiddwa agiwangudde era nga kitegeeza nti alese likodi ya buwanguzi bwa bitundu 67%. Mu mipiira  18 egizannyiddwa, awanguddeko 12, 3 gabadde maliri ate n’akubwa emipiira 3 gyokka. McKinstry  ajja kujjukirwa olw’okuyamba ttiimu ya Cranes n’ewangula  CECAFA Challenge Cup eya 2019, era mu mpaka zino Uganda yawangula emipiira gyonna era nga guno gwali mulundi gwakubiri mu byafaayo. FUFA esiimye McKinstry olw’obukugu bw’atadde mu Uganda Cranes mu kiseera w’abeeredde mu mitambo bya ttiimu eno. Endagaano ya McKinstry ey’emyaka 3, yatandika mu 2019 era ebadde ebulako emyezi 17.  Okumugoba kitegeeza nti FUFA erina okumuliyirira n’obukadde 900 okusinziira ku ndagaano gye baakola.

headline: Kkooti Eragidde Gavumenti Yewozeeko ku Kakadde Akatagenda Kulonda
text: Kampala Kkooti enkulu etawulula enkayana ewadde gavumenti wiiki bbiri zokka nga etaddemu okwewozaako ku by’okulemesa bannayuganda abakaweza emyaka 18 okulonda. Abamu ku bantu nga beetaba mukulonda      Kino yakikola nga eggalawookuwandiika abantu mu nkalala z’ebyokulonda mu mwezi gwa December wa 2019 ekintu ekibalemesa okwetaba mu kalulu ka 2021 akabindabinda. Omulamuzi Musa Ssekaana ali mu musango guno ogwatwalibwayo bannamateeka ba Network of Public Interest Lawyers nga bakuliddwamu Nagami Gloria Linda yalagidde gavumenti okuteekamu okwewozaako. Bannamateeka bano baagala kkooti elangirire nti ekikolwa ky’okulemesa abavubuka bano okwetaba mukulonda kibajjako eddembe lyabwe eribaweebwa Ssemateeka. Basaba era kkooti elagire ab’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda balindeko okutuusa nga wabulayo emyezi mukaaga (6) okulonda kutuuke balyoke baggalewo kisobozese abavubuka bonna abagenda okuweza emyaka 18 okulonda kubanga ddembe lyabwe. Omusango guno leero gubadde gulina okuwulirwa naye omuwolereza wa gavumenti Mark Muwonge nategeeza nti Ssaabawolereza yagutegedde buyise natasobola kuteekamu kwewozaako ekyawalirizza Omulamuzi Ssekaana okugwongerayo okutuuka nga 14 September.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asabye bannayuganda okwegattira awamu ku nsonga z’ebyobulamu
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga asabye bannayuganda bonna okubeera obumu naddala ku nsonga z’ebyobulamu kuba zino zibanyigira wamu awatali kusosola era balwane okuzitereeza. Okwogera bino Kamalabyonna Mayiga abadde yeetabye mu nteekateeka y’ okugaba omusaayi ku kisaawe ky’ essomero lya Old Kampala mu Kyaddondo ku Lwokubiri. “Mbasaba tubeeere bumu bwekituuka ku by’obulamu. Tubeere bumu tusoosowaze eby’obulamu, gavumenti nabuli muntu yenna asse eby’obulamu ku mwanjo. Amalwaliro gazimbibwe, gateekebwemu eddagala, ebyuma ebikebera abalwadde, abasawo abamala batendekebwe era basasulwe bulungi,” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’ategeezezza. Owek. Mayiga asabye abantu okumanya nti ebyobulamu tebisosola mu ddiini, ebyobufuzi wadde amawanga kubanga abantu bonna balwala era bafa. Ono asabye amaterekero g’omusaayi gateekebwe mu bitundu ebyenjawulo okwetoloola eggwanga kisobozese okwanguyiza abagwetaaga. Mukuumaddamula Mayiga annyonnyodde nti wadde kaweefube w’okuzza Buganda ku ntikko agenda mu maaso naye tasobola kutuukirira nga abantu ba Beene si balamu bwatyo nasaba abasajja okujjumbira okugaba omusaayi.  Ono yeeyamye okukolagana ne Gavumenti eyawakati nakakasa nti wadde balina bye babanja nga Federo n’ebirala naye ku nsonga z’ ebyobulamu bakusitukiramu balwanire wamu. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga abasabye okudduukirira abakyala abagenda okuzaala, ab’ obubenje, abalina Nnalubiri (Sickle Cells) basobole okutaasibwa. Ye Omuteesiteesi omukulu owa Minisitule y’ ebyobulamu, Dr. Diana Atwiine yeebazizza Katikkiro Mayiga olw’ obuteeganya nawaayo kyonna okutumbula embeera z’ abantu si eri Baganda bokka naye n’abalala. Dr. Atwiine asabye abantu obutakoowa kuwaayo kuba buli lukya babeera beetaaga omusaayi kuba tegusobola kuwangaala kusukka myezi 3 kyokka ate tegulina kkolero.  Loodimmeeya wa Kampala Erias Lukwago yeebazizza Beene olw’ enteekateeka eno n’okulengerera ewala bwatyo nasaba gavumenti okuvaayo ekwasizeeko Obwakabaka ku nteekateeka nga zino. Omuloodi Lukwago yennyamidde olw’obubenje obususse okwetoloola ekibuga kuba ku buli mitwalo 10 egyabantu abafuna obubenje mu Kampala, 10 ku bano tebalutonda.  Ono akunze aba booda booda okwettanira enteekateeka eno kuba bebasinga okugwetaaga oluvannyuma lw’okunoonyereza okulaga nti bebasinga okufuna obubenje. Enteekateeka ya leero yeetabiddwamu; Omukubirizi w’Olukiiko lwa Buganda, Owek. Patrick Luwaga Mugumbule; Baminisita, Owek. Noah Kiyimba, Owek. David Kyewalabye Male, Owek. Joseph Kawuki n’abalala. Enteekateeka eno ewagirwa ekitongole ki Kabaka Foundation ne bannamikago okuli; Uganda Red Cross Society , Uganda Blood Transfusion Services , Radio ya CBS FM ne BBS Terefayina.

headline: Museveni awolerezza eby’okuzimba enguudo e Congo
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni atabukidde abakulembeze abavuddeyo okuvumirira ekya Uganda okuzimba enguudo mu munda mu ggwanga lya Congo. Pulezidenti Museveni ne Tshisekedi  Ono abadde yeetabye mu bikujjuko by’okukuza ameefuga ga Uganda aga 58, agakwatiddwa mu nkola ya ssaayansi. Agambye nti enguudo zino zigenda kusinga kuganyula Uganda. Museveni yeewuunyizza engeri ababaka mu Palamenti gye babadde bawakanyaamu ensonga eno nga bagamba nti ne Uganda nayo erina enguudo embi. “Bwetuba twagala okuzimba enguudo embi ze tulina, twetaaga okusuubuligana ne Congo wamu ne South Sudan, tetugenda ku kyogerako bwogezi. Enguudo zino ze tugenda okuzimba e Congo zaakutuyamba kusuubuligana tufune ssente ezinaakola enguudo zaffe embi.” Museveni bw’agambye. Kino kiddiridde kabbineeti okukkiriza Uganda ezimbe enguudo okuli; oluva e Kasindi okutuuka e Beni nga zino ziwerako kilomita 80.Olugendo olulala lwe lwa Beni-Butembo lwa kkiromita 54 n’olulala oluva e Bunagana e Kisoro okugenda e Goma nga luwerako kkiromita 89. Pulezidenti Museveni era ategeezezza nti tawagira kyakuzza buggya endagaano y’ekitongole kya UMEME ey’emwaka 25, eggwaako mu 2025 kubanga bayitiridde okunyunyuta bannansi. Museveni agasseeko nti kikyamu amakampuni amanene mu ggwanga okukozesa eggaaliyoomukka n’amasannyalaze okufunamu amagoba amangi. Ono annyonnyodde nti olw’okuba abaddukanya UMEME baagala okuwa amagoba agawera eri bannannyini migabo mu kitongole kino. Ono ategeezezza nga bamusigansimbi bwebatunuulira ennyo okukola amagoba era nga baagala mangi si matono nga tebafaayo ku muntu gwe bagaggyako.

headline: Busiro North: Kkooti egaanye eyavunya owa NUP Paul Nsubuga okwongera ku bujulizi
text: Omulamuzi wa kkooti enkulu mu Kampala, Dr. Winfred Nabisinde agaanye okusaba kw’eyavuganya mu kalulu ka Busiro North aka 2021, Edgar Lubadde mwe yali ayagalira okuwaayo obujulizi obupya obwoleka nga munnakibiina kya NUP,Paul Nsubuga bw’atasaanidde kubeera mubaka wa kitundu kino. Kino kiddiridde bannamateeka ba Lubadde okuleeta ensonga empya ezira ng’omubaka omulonde owa Busiro North bwe yajingirira emikono gy’abantu be yakozesa okumusemba, asobole okwesimba ku kifo kino. Bannamateeka bano baategeezezzakkooti nti balina obujulizi obupya omwabadde n’ebbaluwa y’omukugu wa poliisi eyakola okunoonyereza n’akizuula nti emikono gino gyali mijingirire era nga baali baagala kkooti ebakkirize babugatte ku bwe baamala edda okuwa kkooti. Kino kkooti ekigaanye ng’egamba nti ensonga ezibadde zinokoddwayo zibadde zireetawo ensonga empya ezitaali mu mpaaba yaabwe eyasooka. Dr.Nabisinde annyonnyodde nti obudde bw’abadde buweddeyo nga noolwekyo abadde tasobola kukkiriza kusaba kwa bano. Lubadde eyafuna obululu 199 ate Nsubuga n’afuna obululu 21400 ayagala kkooti esazeemu obuwanguzi bwa Nsubuga ng’amulanga okujingirira empapula z’obuyigirize ze yawa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda ng’agenda okwewandiisa. Ono alumirizzanti amannya g’omubaka ono amatuufu ye Mukalazi Peternga mutabani wa Mathias Kibuuka ne Agnes Nabawanuka ab’e Kakooge Ssentema, mu ggombolola y’e Kakiri mu Wakiso so si Paul Nsubuga nga bw’ayagala okulimba ensi.

headline: FDC ewakkanyizza ssente z’okukebera Corona
text: Najjanankumbi Bannakibiina ki Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) bawakkanyizza ssente gavumenti zeyataddewo okusasuza abantu abaagala okubakebera COVID-19 nti tekiraga kufaayo ku bannansi. Omubaka Hassang Fungaroo Amyuka omukunzi w’ekibiina ki FDC Hassan Kaps Fungaroo bino yategeezezza bannamawulire leero ku Mmande wali ku kitebe e Najjanankumbi. Eggulo Minisitule y’ebyobulamu yalangiridde nti, okutandika nga 1 September 2020 buli muntu anaakeberwa ekirwadde ki COVID-19 agenda kusasula emitwalo 24 mu bitaano (240500) zino ze ddoola z’ Amerika 65 buli kwekebeza. Minisitule egamba kino bakikoze okukendeeza ku kazito kebalina mu by’ensimbi kubanga buli lunaku abaagala okubakebera beeyongera. Fungaroo yategeezezza nti zino ssente nyingi nnyo ku bantu naddala mu mbeera eno nga abasinga babadde tebakyakola. “Abantu abeekebeza ssi bebafunamu wabula bakikola lwa bulungi bwa ffenna. Bwaba Museveni asobola okufuna ssente ezigulira ba ssentebe ba NRM obuggaali, lwaki takozesa ezimu ku ssente zino nawaayo okugula ebikozesebwa okukebera ffenna netufunamu,” Bwatyo Fungaroo bweyemulugunyizza. Wabula Minisitule y’ebyobulamu yavuddeyo netangaaza olunaku lw’eggulo nga bwejja okusimala nga ekebera ku bwerere abantu abanaaba basangiddwa n’obubonero bwa COVID-19, ababaddeko n’abalwadde wamu naabo abali ku mwanjo nga abasawo abajjanjaba ekirwadde kino. Mu ngeri yeemu Fungaroo yasinzidde mu lukungaana luno natabukira gavumenti n’ebitongole bye by’okwerinda olw’okulemesa Opozisoni okukuba enkungaana kyokka nga akalulu ka 2021 katuuse. Fungaroo yagambye nti, “Munnaffe Omubaka wa Nakaseke South mu Palamenti Luttamaguzi Ssemakula ali mu komera lwa kumenya biragiro bya COVID-19 naye ate tulina baminisita n’abakungu ba gavumenti abakuba enkungaana n’okuyisa ebivvulu nga tewali abakomako.”

headline: Bobi Wine alabudde bannakenya ku by’okuggyawo ekkomo ku bisanja
text: Pulezidenti w’ekibiina ki National Unity Platform(NUP) Robert Kyagulanyi amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine asabye bannakenya okwewala okukopa abakulembeze ba Uganda kyebakola nebaggyawo ebisanja mu Ssemateeka. Kino kiddiridde abamu ku ababaka ba Palamenti e Kenya okutandika okutema empenda z’okukola ennongoosereza mu ssemateeka nga baagala okuggyawo ebisanja omuntu byalina okukulembera nga Pulezidenti. Bano nga bakuliddwamu omubaka wa Fafi, Salah Yakuba ng’ono wa kibiina kya Pulezidenti aliko , William Ruto ekya United Democratic Alliance bagamba nti omuziziko guno gulemesa abakulembeze abalungi okweyongerayo. Mu kulabula Kyagulanyi agambye nti essaawa eno bannakenya abamu bayinza okukiraba ng’ekyobulalu naye singa tebatandika kigaanirawo, tebeewunya nga abakulembeze babwe bakitadde mu nkola. “Bannakenya mubeere bulindaala. Mutaase ensi yammwe ku nkola efaanana eya Museveni. Bwatyo ne Museveni bweyatandika wano naggyawo ekkomo ku bisanja awamu n’emyaka. Mutaase Ssemateeka wammwe nga tanafuuka munafu kubalwanirira,” Kyagulanyi bw’ alambuludde. Ennyingo nnamba 142(2) eya Ssemateeka wa Kenya ekugira omuntu yenna okwesimbawo okusukka ebisanja ebibiri nga buli kimu kibeera kibeera kya myaka ettaano. Kati abamu ku babaka bagamba nti ekkomo ku bisanja liveewo bateekewo ekkomo ku myaka egyali gyagyibwawo mu 2004 era gibeere 75. Singa kino kinatuukirira kibeera kitegeeza nti omukulembeze aliko William Ruto ow’emyaka 55 abeera asobola okukulembera kenya ebisanja byonna byayagala okutuuka nga awezezza emyaka 75. Wadde bino biri bityo Kenya yeemu ku nsi ezibadde zitunuuliddwa ennyo mu Africa ku nkulaakulana ya Demokulaasiya olw’engeri gyebabadde bakyuusamu obuyinza

headline: Abalyowa emyoyo basabye Kyagulanyi ayimbulwe
text: Bya Musaso Waffe Kampala Bannaddiini abeegattira mu kibiina ekitaba enzikiriza ekya Inter-Religious Council of Uganda (IRCU), basabye gavumenti eyimbule Munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu n’abalala abakwatiddwa olw’okumenya ebiragiro ebitangira Ssennyiga Corona.  Ssentebe w’ekibiina kino, Mufti Sheikh Shaban Ramathan Mubajje, agambye nti Bobi Wine ne Patrick Oboi Amuriat bwe baba nga bazzizza omusango gwonna, batwalibwe mu kkooti ebavunaane era amateeka galekebwe okukola ogwago. Basabye akakiiko k’ebyokulonda wamu n’ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda, okussa ekitiibwa mu ddembe ly’obuntu nga bwe birambikibwa mu Ssemateeka w’eggwanga. Bagamba nti Uganda Police Force nayo yamenye ebiragiro (SOPs) ebya COVID-19 ebiri mu kawayiro aka 21(3) akagamba nti, Poliisi ejja kulumirirwa eggwanga, bajja kukozesa obukugu n’ebirala. Bakubirizza abasirikale okugoberera Ssemateeka wa Yuganda nga bakola emirimu gyabwe era bakozese obwenkanya nga balamula Bannayuganda, nga tebafuddeyo ku kibiina kye bawagira. Bino we bijjidde nga Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, yaakamala okulabula ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda ku kutulugunya bannansi n’abeesimbyewo ku bifo ebyenjawulo, nga beekwesa mu Ssenyiga Corona, era n’abasaba okussa ekitiibwa mu ddembe ly’obuntu.

headline: Ab’e Luweero Museveni yabalyamu olukwe – Bobi Wine
text: Luweero Alina bbendera y’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) mu lutabaalo lw’obwapulezidenti, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine), yasabye bannaluweero okukulemberamu okuggyako Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni nga balonda Kyagulanyi mu kalulu ka 2021. Kyagulanyi nga anoonya akalulu mu Luweero ne Nakaseke Kyagulanyi okusaba kuno yakukoledde ku kisaawe ky’e Ngogoro mu Luweero ne ku ssomero lya Kamuli Church of Uganda Primary school e Nakaseke ku Lwokutaano, bwe yabadde anoonya obululu. “Mmwe mutambulira ku malaalo buli kaseera, ebiwundu ebyo tebinnakala tebinnava ku mwoyo, Museveni yali abategeezezza nti ebyo byonna yali ssaddaaka okufuna Uganda empya. Amazima amatuufu singa yali ayogera mazima singa Nakaseke, Luweero ne Bulemeezi, singa ebintundu byanjawulo.” Kyagulanyi bwe yagambye. Kyagulanyi yannyonyodde nti wadde nga Luweero ne Nakaseke be baaleeta gavumenti eno mu buyinza era nga batambulira ku buwanga bw’abafu, naye y’esingamu ekibbattaka ate nga n’abaafiirwa ebyabwe tebayirirwanga ate nga n’enguudo mu kitundu kino mbi nnyo. Omubaka wa Nakaseke South mu Palamenti yategeezeza nti Museveni akolera mu kutya naye n’asaba abantu okubeegattako kubanga eno y’essaawa y’okununula Uganda. Ate ye Allan Mayanja akwatidde aba NUP bbendera ku bubaka bwa Nakaseke Central yalaze nti yonna mu byalo abantu beetegefu okumma Museveni akalulu kubanga abalimbidde ebbanga. Disitulikiti y’e Luweero ne Nakaseke ze zaali entabiro y’olutalo olwaleeta Pulezidenti Museveni mu buyinza wakati wa 1981- 1986, era okuva olwa Pulezidenti Museveni azze awangulira waggulu mu bitundu bino. Mu kalulu akasembyewo aka 2016, Museveni yafuna ebitundu 76.2%, Kizza Besigye’s 21.2 % ku bululu 64,557 obwakubibwa mu Nakaseke yonna. E Luweero Museveni yafuna obululu 71,382 by’ebitundu 55.78 ku 100 ate Besigye n’afuna obululu 53804 ebitundu 41.1 ku buli 100.

headline: AKAMYUFU KA NRM: Aka  Muganda wa Museveni ne muwala wa Kuteesa kongezeddwayo
text: Ssembabule Muganda wa Museveni, Aine Kaguta Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda mu NRM akakulirwa Dr. Tanga Odoi kalangiridde olwaleero ku Lwokutaano nga bwekayimiriza okulonda kw’ akamyufu mu Mawogola North oluvanyuma lw’obukubagano n’okulwanagana mu bawagizi ba beesimbyewo okweyongera. Mu kalulu kano muwala wa Minisita w’ensonga z’ebweru Sam Kuteesa Shartsi Musherure, ali ku mbiranye ne muganda wa Museveni Godfrey Aine Kaguta Sodo nga buli omu ayagala kukwata bbendera asobole okukiika mu palamenti mu kalulu ka 2021. Mawogola West ke kamyufu ak’okubiri okwongezebwayo mu Ssembabule nga akasoose kabaddi ka Mawogola West akalimu omubaka Joseph Ssekabiito gyali mukuttunka ne Anifa Kawooya. Abawagizi ba babiri bano bazze balwanagana era nga Kawooya alumiziddwa ekintu kyagamba nti Ssekabiito akirinamu omukono. Eggulo ababiri bano bayitiddwa Dr. Tanga Odoi okukakkanya embeera wabula Ssekabiito yalabudde nga bwewaliwo ekkobaane okuyisaawo Kawooya era nalabula okwesimbawo nga omuntu singa tafuna bwenkanya. Ku kifo ky’omubaka we Lwemiyaga, Joy Kabatsi ne Theodore Ssekikubo nabo abawagizi babwe batadde ekitundu ku bunkenke. Embeera eno yewalirizza amyuka Ssaabadduumizi wa poliisi Maj. Gen. Sabiiti Muzeeyi okugumba mukitundu kino okulaba nga aziyiza embeera okusajjuka. Okuyimiriza okulonda kwa Mawogola West, kiddiridde abawagizi mu nkambi ya Musherure ne Kaguta okulwanira mu lukiiko ku kitebe ky’ eggombolola ye Lugusuulu nga buli ludda lulumiriza lunaalwo okwagala okucankalanya enkalala z’abalonzi. Omuwandiisi w’ekibiina Godfrey Katokozi lweyayita enjuyi zonna zikaanye ensonga zamulemerera era abawagizi ba beesimbyewo tebalinda lukiiko kuggwa nebalwanagana oluvanyuma lwa Musherule okutegeeza nga Kaguta bweyatandise edda okwagala okubba akalulu kano. Embeera yatabukira ddala Kaguta bweyatuuka nga olukiiko lugenda mu maaso nalumiriza Omuwandiisi obutamuyita mu luikiiko luno ate nga naye yesimbyewo. Poliisi abawagizi bagisinza amaanyi era tewali kyamanyi kyeyakola olw’okuba abamu ku beesimbyewo baali bakumibwa eggye erikuuma omukulembeze w’eggwanga. Ssentebe w’ekibiina kino e Ssembabule Sam Kuteesa yategeezezza nga efujjo lino bweriva ku Kaguta alemeddwa okunoonya akalulu kanadda kulagira abawagizi be okukola efujjo.

headline: Abantu beeyongedde okugula emijoozi gya Kabaka Birthday Run
text: Abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi, boogedde amaanyi mu nteekateeka y’emisinde gya Kabaka egiddukibwa okujjukira amazaalibwa ge bwe baguze emijoozi kumpi kugimalawo. Leero ku Lwokuna abayizi b’e Kyambogo bazze mu bungi okugula emijoozi gino nga bakulembeddwamu akulira abayizi ku Ssettendekero ono, Mbaziira Jude era ono yeeyamye okukunga bayizi banne okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino e Kyambogo. Obweyamo buno Mbaziira abukoledde mu maaso ga Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku byobulamu mu Buganda, Owek. Dr. Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma era n’abakwasa emijoozi gya mitwalo 60. Owek. Nankindu bano abasabye okumanya nti abavubuka ge maanyi ga Buganda kw’eyimiridde n’abasaba okukola kyonna okwerinda ekirwadde kino era bafube okudduka emisinde gino n’ekigendererwa ekirina kye kigatta ku bulamu bwabwe Amyuka ssentebe wa NRM mu Buganda, Godfrey Kiwanda Ssuubi naye yeetabye mu nteekateeka eno era n’aweraokwegatta ku Ssaabasajja Kabaka okulwanyisa Mukenenya naddala mu Buganda era okuwera kuno akukoledde wano ku BBS Terefayina ng’agula emijoozi. Mu ngeri yeemu n’Omubaka wa Lubaga South, Aloysius Mukasa naye aguze emijoozi era n’asaba abakulembeze bonna abalala yonna gye bali okwettanira ebyobulamu nga bakwasizaako Omutanda era omukwano gwe balina gy’ali baguteeke mu bikolwa. Era n’abazannya omuzannyo gw’ensero aba ‘Federation of Uganda Basketball’ nga bakulembeddwamu Pulezidenti w’ekibiina kino, Nasser Sserunjogi wamu n’eyaliko omubaka wa Mukono South, Johnson Muyanja Ssenyonga nabo baguze emijoozi okwongera okuwagira enteekateeka eno. Aba Kam Property Consultants abagula n’okutunda ettaka nabo baguze emijoozi so nga n’ekitongole ky’Obwakabaka abatereka n’okuwola ensimbi ekya Ssuubi lyo Zambogo SAACObagulidde bannakibiina kyabwe emijoozi nabo basobole okwetaba mu misinde gya amazaalibwa ga Beene. Tutuuseeko e Makindye mu bavubuka era nabo ne bagula emijoozi gyabwe egiwerera ddala era ng’akuliddemu abavubuka bano, Musiri David, agamba nti omulembe Nnyinimu yaguwa bavubuka nga noolwekyo babadde balina okwetaba mu misinde gino butereevu okumalawo nnawookera wa Mukenenya. E Bukomansimbi, omubaka omukyala owaayo Veronica Nanyondo alaze okutya olw’omuwendo gwa baana abawala abafunye embuto nga tebanneetuuka e Bukomansimbi era nga bino abyogeredde mu Town Council y’e Misanvu mu ggombolola y’e Kibinge bw’abadde atwalidde abantu be emijoozi mwe bagenda okuddukira emisinde gy’amazaalibwa ga Ssebuufubwango ku Ssande eno. Amyuka Ppookino owookusatu, Muwalimu Kato Abdallah, agamba nti kyannaku okulaba nga Mukenenya yeegiriisiza mu kitundu kye era n’asaba abantu bonna okujjumbira okwekebeza. Ate okuvaako e Ssingo, Omwami wa Kabaka amulamulirako essaza lye ery’e Ssingo, Mukwenda David Nantajja akwasizza Bishop Tomusange emijoozi gya mitwalo egisoba mu 22 okwetegekera emisinde gya Maasomoogi Ku Ssande eno. Yo mu Busujju, Omubakaomukyala Joyce Bagala agulidde bakansala bonna emijoozi nga gino gimukwasiddwa omwami w’essaza lino, Kasujju Mark Jjingo Byekwaso Kaberenge. Okugula n’okutonda emijoozi kukyagendera ddala mu maaso nga BBS Terefayina eri wamu ne bannamikago okuli Leediyo ya CBS, Airtel, UNAIDS, Majestic brands, DFCU bank n’abalala.

headline: Beene awadde ab’e Katabi obujjanjabi ku bwereere
text: Bya Racheal Namuli Busiro – Wakiso Abantu ab’enjawulo mu ggombolola y’e Katabi mu disitulikiti y’e Wakiso babukeerezza nkokola okufuna obujjanjabi obw’obwerere nga egimu ku mikolo egikulembeddemu amazaalibwa ga Beene mu nkola etuumiddwa ekyoto. Ku byoto bino ebiyindidde mu ggombolola ez’enjawulo, abantu basomeseddwa ku ndwadde ya Mukenenya n’engeri ez’enjawulo mwe basobola okugyekuuma. Akiikiridde Minisita w’eby’obulamu, Dr. Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma ku mukolo guno, Kiwuka Viola ategeezezza nti obulwadde bwa Siriimu bwegirisiriza nnyo mu bitundu bya Buganda nga noolwekyo abantu bonna balina okusitukiramu okubulwanyisa. Ono alaze okutya olw’okuba nti ekirwadde kino kisinga mu baana bawala, abavubi ne banneekolera gyange bw’atyo n’asaba abaami okulowooza ennyo ku bulamu bw’abaana abawala bweba basazeewo okwetaba mu bikolwa by’omukwano. Omwami wa Kabaka owoomuluka gw’e Nalugala nga ye  Ssaabaddu  Tonny Bukenya asinzidde wano n’akalaatira abavubuka obutakebeza maaso na kutebereza wabula bajjumbire okwekebeza wamu n’okukozesa obupiira obugabiddwa. Ono abasabye n’okusoosowaza olulimi Oluganda nti kubanga abavubuka bagenda balutyoboola ate nga lyeggwanga eryenkya, ekintu ekiteeka ebiseera bya Buganda ebijja mu katyabaga.

headline: FDC etabukidde  Museveni ku by’okuddamu n’alonda Byabashaija okukulira makomero
text: Ekibiina kya Forum forDemocratic Change (FDC) kitabukidde Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni olw’okuddamu n’alondaDr. Johnson Byabashaija ng’akulira amakomera mu ggwanga. Kino kiddiridde Byabashaija okulondebwa ku kontulakiti ya myaka ebiri ku nkomerero ya wiiki ewedde. Bwe yabadde ayogerako ne bannamawulire mu lukung’aana lwabwe olwa buli wiiki, omwogezi wa FDC, Ibrahim Ssemjju Nganda yagambye nti kino kikyamu era n’asaba Palamenti ereme kusunsula mukulu ono kuba akuze mu myaka. “Byabashaijaakuze era asussa emyaka 60 era tasaana kukulira makomera wadde okuweereza mu kitongole ekyo. Okulondebwa kwe kuli mu bukyamu.” Ssemujju bwe yagambye. Okusinziira ku Ssemujju , Pulezidenti Museveni amanyi kimu kya ‘kufiira mu buyinza’ era endowooza emu yeetaaga kukysa bweriba eggwanga lyakutambula. “Eno y’ensonga lwakiyaleka (Museveni)yaleka Emmaneul Tumusiime Mutebile okusigala mu woofiisi ng’emyaka gigenze naye ku Byabashaija tetugenda kukkiriza. Mujjukira Museveni yali agaanye ne Benjamin Odoki okulekulira nga Ssaabalamuzi.” Ssemujju bwe yagasseeko. FDC esabye Palamenti okukola omulimu gwayo ejjukize Pulezidenti Museveni nti Byabashaija tagwanira kubeera mu woofiisi eno kuba yasussa dda emyaka egiragirwa. Etteeka erifuga abakozi ba gavumenti erya ‘Uganda Public Service Standing Orders (2010)’ likugira omuntu yenna awezezza emyaka 60 omuntu aba asigaza omukisa gumu gwakuweereza ku kontulakiti era ebbanga linaabeera lya myaka ebiri. Mu mwaka 2020, Pulezidenti Museveni yalonda Dr. Byabashaija okuddamu okuweereza mu kifo kye kimu okumala emyaka ebiri egyaweddeko ne kiwaliriza Pulezidenti Museveni okuddamu okumulonda. Gye buvuddeko Pulezidenti Museveni yasiimaDr. Byabashaija olw’okukyusa ekifaananyi ky’amakomera ekiraze nti ebintu erudda eyo bitambula bulungi. Dr. Byabashaija, yeegatta ku kitongole ky’amakomera mu1983n’afuukaagakulira mu2005, era emabegako yategeeza nti tannakakasa nti omulembe omupya ogw’emyaka gya 90 gusobola okutambuza obulungi ebintu n’alaga nti yeetaagayo emyaka ebiri okubateekateeka.

headline: Beene asiimye okuggulawo empaka z’Ebika, Buganda etaddemu obukadde 130
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga ategeezezza nti Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II asiimye okulabikako eri Obuganda nga aggulawo empaka z’Ebika bya Baganda e Luweero mu Bulemeezi. Bino Katikkiro Mayiga abyanjulidde bannamawulire e Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri bw’abadde atongoza empaka z’Ebika ez’omwaka guno nasaba buli kika okuzeetabamu kuba enteekateeka bagitaddemu obukadde obuwera 130.. “Engabo egenda okulwanira okutandika nga June 11, omwaka guno e Kasana Luweero mu Bulemeezi. Nina essanyu lingi nnyo okulangirira nti emipiira gy’ebika 2022 ngitongozza era ekika eky’Engo kyekigenda okuggulawo n’Embwa,” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye,” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Okusinziira ku bululu obwakwatiddwa bazzukulu ba Muteesaasira ab’Engo bebagenda okuggulawo naba Mutasingwa ab’eddira Embwa e Luweero mu Bulemeezi nga July 11, 2022.  Kinajjukirwa nti emyaka giweze 68 ng’emapaka zino zikuumakuma Abaganda nokutumbula ebitone wabula emyaka 2 egiyise, tezasobola kubaawo olw’ekirwadde kya COVID-19 Owek. Mayiga asabye ebika eby’enjawulo okujjumbira emipiira gino baleme kulinda kumanyagana mu nnyimbe n’Okwanjula. Minisita avunanyizibwa ku by’emizannyo mu Buganda Owek. Henry Kiberu Ssekabembe ategeezezza nti ekiriwo Kati kiraga obukulu bw’ebika nasaba buli omu akwatibwako akole omulimu gwe kiyitimuse omutindo n’okukuuma ekitiibwa ky’empaka zino. Ye Omukubiriza w’Olukiiko lw’Abataka, Nnamwama Augustine Kizito Mutumba ebazizza nnyo abo bonna abaliko byebakoze okukuuma emipiira gino nasaba Ebika eby’enjawulo okuvaayo babugirize Omutanda ku lunaku olwo. Engabo eyawakanirwa mu kiseera kino eri mu mikono gy’Ekika ky’ Olugave kyekibadde nayo era ekomezeddwawo nekwasibwa Kamalabyonna nga akabonero akeetegekera olutabaalo oluggya. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako Minisita omubeezi ow’ebyobulimi Owek. Amis Kakomo, bajjajja abakulu bebika, abaami b’ Amasaza n’abantu abalala.

headline: Federo tetegeeza byabufuzi byokka –  Katikkiro Kaawaase
text: Oweek. Kaawaase ne boodi ya Emmwaanyi Terimba eyatongozeddwa   Omumyuka Asooka owa Katikkiro wa Buganda Owek Prof. Twaha Kigongo Kaawaase, ategeezezza nti abantu abamu balowooza nti mukusaba Federo Buganda eyagala bukulembeze n’obufuzi  ekintu ekitali kituufu. “Mu Federo twagala okukola ebintu ebinayganyula omuntu wa bulijjo ate nga ffe tubirondoola kubanga tuli kumpi nnyo n’omuntu wa bulijjo,” Oweek. Kaawaase bweyanyonyodde.   Bino Oweek. Kaawaase yabyogeredde  ku Bulange e Mmengo ku mukolo gw’okutongoza  boodi ya ‘Emmwaanyi Terimba ku Lwokubiri lwa wiiki eno.  Kaawaase yasabye ebitundu eby’enjawulo birekebwe okukola ku nsonga zaabyo  era nakakasa nga Buganda bwetajja kugenda ku ntikko okujjako nga etambulidde wamu n’abantu baayo nga ekyusa eby’enfuna byabwe n’okubaggya mu bwavu. Oweek. Kaawaase ne Ssentebe wa boodi  Dan Damulira Mukwogera kwe,  Minisita w’ettaka, obulimi n’obutondebwensi Owek Hajjat Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo, yakigumizza nga bwebalina eddimu okulaba nga basitula eby’enfuna by’abantu nga bayita mukulima emmwaanyi era nga y’ensonga lwaki abakugu baleeteddwa. Ate ye Minisita omubeezi ow’ebyobulimi Owek Hajji Amis Kakomo, yategeezezza nga Ssaabasajja Kabaka bwayagala abantu  be okudda ku mirimu ginnansangwa nga muno mwemuli n’okulima emmwaanyi. “Obuganda buyiriddwamu endokwa z’emmwaanyi obukadde 10 nga zibaliriddwamu obuwumbi 4 n’ekitundu, abantu ba Buganda basomeseddwa okulima emmwanyi okuva ku kuziteeka mu kinnya okutuuka lwezigenda ku katale,” Minisita Kakomo bweyagasseeko. Kakomo yalaze nga ebitundu  ebirima emmwaanyi mu Buganda bwebyeyongedde nga kino kyonna kivudde ku kaweefube wa Mmwanyi Terimba. Ono yanyonyodde nga Buganda bweyawandiisa kkampuni egula emmwaanyi okusobola okutaasa abalimi ku kubabadondola wamu n’okulaba nga eyambako okusitula  omutindo gwazo Abakugu abalondeddwa okutuula ku boodi eno kuliko; Mw. Dan Damulira nga ye Ssentebe, Dr. Ssebaggala Godfrey Lusiba mumyuka wa ssentebe, ate nga ku bammemba ye; Muky. Remmie Kisakye, Muky. Harriet Nsubuga Mpanga, Mw. Fred Luzinda Mukasa ne Mw. Isaac Ssambwa Kakyama. Ssentebe wa boodi eno Dan Damulira, yeebazizza olwa Beene okumuwa obukulu buno era neyeyama ku lwa banne okutuukirizza obuvunanyizibwa buno kubanga okuva edda mu Buganda nga emmwanyi yeesomesa abaana. Damulira yanyonyodde nga Buganda bweri ekimu ku bitundu ebisinga okuvaamu emmwanyi mu ggwanga era nasuubizza omulimu guno okugutambuliza ku bwenkanya n’okulaba nga abalimi bafuna ekisaanidde.

headline: Ab’oluganda lwa bakwatiddwa mu kwelakaasa , baagala poliisi ebayimbule
text: Kampala Ab’enganda z’abamu ku bantu abaakwatiddwa mu kwekalakaasa okwabalukawo oluvannyuma lw’okukwata Munnakibiina kya NUP, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine), batabukidde poliisi ne basaba eyimbule abantu baayo kubanga ebaggalidde okusukka essaawa 48 eziragirwa mu mateeka. Abamu ku bantu mu Kampala nga beekalaakasa oluvannyuma lw’okukwata Kyagulanyi Ku bano kuliko abooluganda lw’omusuubuzi mu katale k’ewa Kisekka John Ddamulira, ng’ono aggaliddwa ennaku eziwera kati. Ddamulira awamu n’abalala baakwatibwa ku bigambibwa nti beetaba mu kwekalakaasa okwaliwo wiiki ewedde era ng’ono ne banne balumirizza poliisi okubatulugunya nga bali mu buduukulu bwayo. Abamu ku bakwatibwa ne Ddamulira bayimbuddwa bagmba nti baakubwa bubi nnyo ab’ebyokwerinda era nga n’ebimu ku bintu byabwe byatwalibwa. Omu ku bano alumiriza nti yalina ssente ze yalina okusuubulamu ab’ebyokwerinda we bayingirira mu dduuka lya Ddamulira ne babatwala ku Lwomukaaga. Wabula bwe yabadde ayogerako n’omukutu gwa Daily Monitor, Omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala n’emirilaano, Patrick Onyango, yagambye nti kituufu baliko abantu abawerako abakwatibwa omuli ne Ddamulira olw’okwetaba mu kwekalaakasa naye n’awakanya eky’okubatulugunya. “Tetulina gwe twatulugunyiza. Ng’ekitongole tetukkirizibwa kukozesa kutulugunya kuggya mawulire oba bujulizi mu muntu,” Onyango bwe yategeezezza olupapula lwa Monitor. Omwogezi wa Uganda Police Force CP Fred Enanga, avuddeyo n’ategeeza nti okwekalakaasa okwaliwo mwafiiramu abantu 45 nga ku bano 39 baali basajja n’abakyala 6 nga bali wakati w’emyaka 25-40. Emirambo 42 gye gyatwaliddwa, ng’esatu gikyabuliddwako bannyini gyo.

headline: Aba NUP abaalondebwa mu Mukono babanguddwa
text: Bya Jesse  Lwanga Mukono Bannabyabufuzi abaawangulira akalulu ku kkaadi ya ‘National Unity Platform (NUP),’ bakung’aanidde mu Mukono ne babangulwa ku ngeri gye bagenda okutambuzaamu emirimu, okusobola okutuusa obuweereza ku bantu. Bano balagiddwa engeri gye basobola okukolera abantu ate nga banywerera ku miramwa gy’ekibiina kyabwe ekya NUP. Bano bakung’aanidde ku kyalo  Nakabago ekisangibwa mu kibuga ky’e Mukono, okulaba engeri gye bagenda okugabanamu ebifo, okusobola okutuusa empeereza ku bannamukono. Kinajjukirwa nti ebifo ebisinga obungi mu Mukono byawangulwa aba NUP era bwekityo ekibuga kino ekimaze ebbanga nga kiri mu mikono gya Democratic Party (DP), ne kidda mu gya NUP. Akulira NUP e Mukono,  Betty Nambooze Bakireke, abalabudde nti wadde akalulu baakawangula era nga n’abamu baatandise dda okulwanira ebifo mu kkanso, balina okukimanya nti ng’eggwanga tukyali mu busibe era ekigendererwa ekinene kya kutwala ntebe ya bwapulezidenti. Wano abamu ku beegwanyiza ekifo kya Sipiika wa kkanso y’e Mukono, beesowoddeyo era ne baweebwa ekirayiro kye baakubye wamu n’okussaako omukono, okukakasa nti tebagenda kuva ku musingi gwa kibiina singa omu ku bo akiwangula. Mu kiseera kino abavuganya bali bataano era ku bano kuliko; Vincent Lubwama, Augustine Romeo, Nakaddu Dorah, Bazanye Rogers ne Saul Nakibenge. Obwedda bano buli omu ayogerako eri olukiiko luno era n’alaga bwe yeetegese okutambuzaamu emirimu gya kkanso singa banaaba bawangudde.

headline: Tewali asobola kutuggyako bifo byaffe bya Nnono – Owek Kyewalabye
text: Minisita w’ebyobuwangwa n’olulimi, Owek. David Kyewalabye Male, ategeezezza nti kikafuuwe Buganda okukkiriza abantu abeesenza ku ttaka ly’ebifo by’ebyobuwangwa n’ebika okutandika okuligabanyizaako Buganda. Omutaka Muyige nga aliko byalaga Minisita Kyewalabye “Abatali bantu baffe wano okusalawo okuba nga be. bafung’amye era be bakuuma ebifo byaffe eby’ebyobuwangwa babitugabanyizeeko, ekyo ng’Obwakabaka tetujja kukkiriza,” Owek. Kyewalabye bw’agambye. Owek. Kyewalabye yakadde ku Lwokubiri okulambula embuga y’Omutaka Muyige akulira ekika ky’Ekibe e Wantaayi mu Kyaggwe, bw’atyo bweyalidde mu ttama oluvannyuma lw’okusanga nga waliwo abagisibyeko ekikomera. Ono annyonnyodde nti beetegefu okulwanirira ebifo bino okutuusa ng’embeera eteredde. Kyewalabye alambuludde nti mu ngeri ey’okutwala ebifo bino, kabonero kankukunala akalaga nti omulabe ayagala okusaanyaawo Buganda atandikidde waka. Minisita Kyewalabye nga bamulambuza ettaka ly’ Ekibe Minisita Kyewalabye yennyamidde okulaba ng’Omutaka akulira ekika ky’Ekibe mu kadde kano talina w’ayita kutuuka wuwe nga n’ekifo we bamuteerako ng’alya obukulu, abatwala ettaka lino baasendawo. Ono yabagumizza nga bwe bagenda okulwana olutalo luno mu bukkakkamu basobole okuluggusa nga bakwataganidde wamu n’ekitongole kya Buganda Land Board. Ssenkulu wa Buganda Land Board, Simon Kaboggoza, yategeezezza nti wabaddewo enkola etyoboola ettaka ly’ebika naye kati baasazeewo okukwatatagana n’abakulu b’ebika okusobola okutaasa ettaka wonna mu Buganda. Kaboggoza agambye nti singa abeesenza ku ttaka lino banaalemwa okuleeta obukakafu ku ttaka lino, ensonga bagenda kuzitwala mu kkooti.Omutaka w’ekika ky’ Ekibe, Muyige Sulaiman Kinaalwa, yalaze obweraliikirivu ku butaka bw’ebika obwenjawulo obusaanyeewo era ng’ensonga eno yagiroopa Embuga. Yasabye Obwakabaka okufaayo okukuuma Obutaka bw’ebika era n’obwo obutakyalina butaka buzzibwewo kubanga Buganda enywera bika era nga tesobola kutuuka ku ntikko ng’ebika abatamanyang’amba babiwambye. Omutaka Kinaalwa yannyonnyodde ng’ekkubo erimutuusa ku butaka bwe lyazibibwa era nga waliwo n’olukomera olwateekebwawo okumulemesa okutuuka ku butaka buno era nga abalisengako basiiba bamulabula okulyesonyiwa.

headline: Obwakabaka bulambise kubirina okugobererwa okwewala Coronavirus mu maka
text: Minisita wa Ssaabasajja Kabaka akola ku nsonga z’eby’obulamu Oweek. Dr Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma afulumizza ensonga mwenda abazadde zebalina okussaako ennyo omulaka ng’abaana baabwe bali ewaka okusobola okwewala okusaasanya akawuka ka Coronavirus akali mu kutabaala amawanga. Ku lw’okusatu, omukelembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni yalagira amasomero gonna okuggalawo gasindike abayizi ewaabwe okubatangira okufunira akawuka ku ssomero. Olwaleero, minisita Nankindu ategeezezza nti kisaanidde abazadde okumanya butya bwebayinza okukuumira abaana ewaka nga tebafunye kawuka kano. “Abaana n’abazadde balina okukimanya nti luno ssi luwummula lwa bulijjo. N’olwekyo, tetubasuubira kugenda mu kookingi oba okugenda okusoma kwonna. Tubaagala nga bali waka okusobola okwerinda obulwadde buno,” Nankindu bwagambye. Asabye abaana okukomya okwenjeera mu bibuga nga bali ewaka kubanga kino kiyinza okuvaako okusaasanya akawuka. Zino wammanga z’ensonga omwenda. Abaana tebalina kugenda mu kookingiAbaana tebalina kwenjeeraTwagala abaana basomesebwe era baweebwe obutambi obukwata ku COVID-19 kubanga abamu babadde mu masomero nga tebabigoberera. Twagala bamanye okwekuuma ng’abategedde bukwata butya. Twagala okumalirawo ddala okukyala kw’abaana nab’okukyaza eka. Baleme kugenda mu katale era okugula ebintu kukolebwe omuntu omu eyeekakasa kyateekeddwa okukola ngali mu bantu abangi. Nebwebakomawo ewaka banaabe mu ngalo nga tebannaba kuyingira kwetabula mu bantu ba mu maka ago.Abaana benyigire nnyo mu kuyonja awaka basobole okumanya omugaso gw’okukuuma awaka nga wayonjoBuli muntu ayingira oba afuluma awaka tukimanye nti asobola okuleeta akawuka. Twagala okukubiriza Obuganda fenna ewaka tuteekewo amateeka ag’enjawulo n’okwekuuma era ebikozesebwa biteekebwe ku mulyango ne ku geeti zaffe nga wewali akadomola akalimu amazzi n’essabbuni buli ayingira anaabe mu ngalo.Twongere ku bukambwe ku nkyaaza y’abagenyi . Abaganda tulina engombo egamba nti mu nnyumba temuli kkubo. Tusaba enjogera eno tugikyuseemu nti mu nnyumba mulimu ekkubo. Sibuli muntu nti ajja kukyama mbu azze ku kubuzaako.Tukuuume ebisenge by’abaana baffe ng’amadirisa n’enzijji biggule. Twagala empewo eyingire ate nga efuluma. Kino kikulu kubanga abaana abamu bato era twagala abakulu babayambeko.Abasobola okukendeeza ku bungi bw’abantu abali ewaka . Abakozi abasobola okudda ewaabwe bagirenga baddayo tusobola okukendeeza ku bungi bw’abantu mukifo ekimu.

headline: Sipiika Kadaga  asabye abantu okwekebeza Kkookolo
text: Sipiika wa Palamenti Rebecca Alitwala Kadaga asabye bannayuganda okwongera okwekebeza ekirwadde ki Kkansa kibayambe okutandika eddagala nga obudde bukyali. Kadaga yagambye nti, “Mu mwezi gwa March omwaka guno tewali yalowooza nti kijja kuba kimenya mateeka okukungaana nemudduka naye ekyokubanga emisinde gino egya Virtual Rotary Cancer Run giddukiddwa mu ngeri eno kabonero ka buwanguzi.”  Okwogera bino Kadaga abadde Muyenga leero ku Ssande nga asimbula emisinde gya Rotary Cancer Run egy’omwaka gwa 2020.Kadaga yasiimye abavugirizi aba Centenary Bank nategeeza nga ekisigadd kwekulaba nga abantu basobola okwekebeza wansi mu byalo nebasobola okutandika obujjanjabi nga bukyali. Ate yye Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga nga ono yagiddukidde mu Butikkiro yagambye nti, mu emisinde gino aba Rotary baluubirira okulaba nga bamanyisa abantu endwadde eno, okukungaanya ssente okuzimba bbanka oluvanyuma lwokumaliriza waadi wamu n’okutumbula eby’obulamu mu ggwanga  Mayiga yagambye nti, ” Mu kaweefube ono yenna waadi n’empuku (Banker) n’ekyuma twongerera mu buwumbi 18.5 era beetema okutuuka mu mwaka gwa 2025 nga omulimu guwedde. Woodi yazimbibwa nga kati balinawo obuwumbi 2.5 ssente zikyetaagibwa naye tubatendereza kubanga bamalirivu” Katikkiro Mayiga yasabye abantu okubakwasizzaako kubanga ssente ezikyetaagibwa nnyingi.  Ate yye akulira Rotary mu Uganda ne Tanzania Rosetti Nabbumba Nayenga, yagambye nti kati kkookolo weyatuuka yafuuka kitundu ku ffe naye nasuubizza nti bakola buli kimu okulaba nga afuuka ekimu ku byayita. Emisinde gino Mubunabyalo ku murundi guno giddukiddwa mu ngeri ya Sayansi era nga okujjako abantu abatono ababadde e Muyenga awabadde emikolo emikulu abalala baddukidde mu maka gabwe wamu n’ebitundu ebyenjawulo olwo nebeyunga butereevu ku mutimbagano gwa ZOOM

headline: Okufa kwa Ssaabasumba Lwanga ddibu ddene eri Buganda – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, akungubagidde Ssaabasumba w’essaza ekkulu ery’e Kampala, Dr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga, eyasangiddwa ng’afiiridde mu maka ge enkya ya leero.Owek. Mayiga asinzidde mu maka ge e Lweza ku leero Lwomukaaga n’agamba nti Ssaabasumba abadde ayagala nnyo ekika kye ne Kabaka we. Katikkiro Mayiga nga ayogerako eri Obuganda gyebuvuddeko. Ekif: Bamulanzeki “Mbadde mpuliziganya naye ku nsonga enkulu ez’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda naye era tubadde twogerezeganya nnyo ku nsonga ezikwata ku Uganda eyaawamu. Kale kufiirwa ku nnene nnyo.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agambye. Mayiga ategeezezza nti by’akoze abikoze naddala mu ssaza ekkulu ery’e Kampala naye akabonero akalabika kwe kukyusa ekifaananyi kya Namugongo n’amutuusa ku ddaala ly’ ensi yonna.Katikkiro Mayiga ayogedde ku Ssaabasumba ng’omuntu abadde omumalirivu era ayagala ennyo Kabaka we n’ekika kye eky’emmamba. “Nzijjukira ab’Emmamba lwe baasooka okutongoza SACCO yaabwe era Ssaabasumba yaliwo nnyo, omukolo twagukolera awo ku Pope II. Kiwa nnyo essuubi abakulembeze b’eddiini bwe balaga nti bategeera ensonga z’obuwangwa n’eddiini.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Owek. Mayiga akkaatirizza nti Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde teyeekweka ku nsonga z’Obwakabaka era ng’ajjukiza gavumenti egabane obuyinza mu nkola ya Federo kireetewo obwenkanya eri ebitundu ebyenjawulo.“Abadde yeenyumiriza nnyo mu Ssekabaka Muteesa I, Ssekabaka Muteesa I ye yayita Abamisane, oyinza n’okugamba nti Uganda nga bw’ogiraba olwaleero etandikira ku Ssekabaka I.” Owek. Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde yatandika ekkadiyizo ly’Eklezia n’alibbulamu erinnya lya Ssekabaka I okulaga okusiima kwe eri Obwakabaka mu kuleeta kuno eddiini.Owek. Mayiga agasseeko nti Ssaabasumba abadde alina enteekateeka ey’okutambula n’ebitongole bya Buganda nga BUCADEF okuyamba okukulaakulanya abantu n’okubagobako obwavu kuba abadde akubiriza abantu okwegayirira Katonda nga bwe bakola.Katikkiro Mayiga asaasidde Obuganda, Eklezia n’abenganda, olw’okufa kwa Ssaabasumba. Asaba Omukama Katonda abagumye.

headline: Ab’Ensuma basomesezza abantu ku Mukenenya
text: Bya Jesse Lwanga Kyaggwe Abeekika ky’e Nsuma nga bakulembedwamu Katikiro waabwe, Peter Magoba Kayima n’abakungu ab’enjawulo  okuli n’Omulangira Mathew Balagira kibondwe, batandise okusomesa abantu ku kirwadde kya Mukenenya okulaba nga kiggwaawo mu ggwanga.  Bano omusomo ogusoose baagukubye ku Destiny Primary School ku kyalo  kigombya Mukono era nga gwetabidwamu abaana, abakadde wamu n’abavubuka era nga guno gugendereddwamu okubangula abantu mu ggwanga lyonna engeri gye bayinza okwewala ekirwadde kino. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro w’ekika ky’Ensuma, Magoba Peter Kayima, agamba nti bagenze bafuna emisomo egy’enjawulo ne babangulwa ku kulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya.
