Okusinziira ku bakulu b’ebyobulamu balina kaweefube okulaba nti omwaka gwa 2030 we gunaatuukira ekirwadde kya Mukenenya kijja kuba kifuuse lufumo. Magoba akubirizza abantu okwettanira  obuuma omuntu bw’asobola okukozesa okukebera akawuka ka Mukenenya wonna w’abeera ali.  Asabye abantu abasangibwa n’akawuka okwewala okukasiiga abalala kiyambe okukendeeza ku muwendo gw’abakwatibwa. Bo abatuuze abeetabye mu musomo guno  baliko bye bannyonnyodde era nga bangi ku bo basimye Ssaabasajja okulengerera ewala nazza ebyobulamu ku mutendera ogusookerwako. Omulangira we kika kye Nsuma Mathiew Balagira kibondwe nga yabade omugenyi omukulu mu musomo guno  asiimye obumalirivu bw’abantu bwe balina eri Ssaabasajja era n’asuubiza okubakwtizako mu nteeekateka zonna. Bino byonna bituukiddwako ng’ebula ennaku mbale okukuza amazaalibwa ga Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi  2 ag’emyaka 66 egyobuto era ekyoto kikumiddwa okulaga ekitangaala eri Obuganda . Kinajjukirwa nti ekirwadde kino ekya Mukenenya kikosezza nnyo eggwanga lino.

headline: Kabaka agguddewo empaka z’emipiira gy’amasaza eza 2021
text: Ssaaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II asiimye n’aggulawo empaka z’emipiira gy’amasaza ez’omwaka 2021 eziyindidde mu kisaawe kya FUFA Technical Centre e Njeru mu Kyaggwe. Omutanda ayaniriziddwa omumyuka asooka owa Katikkiro, Owek. Twaha Kigongo Kaawaase, Minisita w’ebyemizannyo n’okwewummuza, Owek. Henry Kiberu Ssekabembe awamu n’abakulira olukiiko olutegesi olw’empaka zino.  Omupiira ogugguddewo gubadde wakati wa ttiimu y’essaza lya Gomba nga lizannya ne Kyaddondo era gye biggweeredde ngaKyaddondo ewangudde ku ggoolo 2-0 nga zombi ziteebeddwa Omusambi Ssenyunja Isaac mu kitundu ky’omuzannyo ekisoose. Kino kitegeeza nti Kyaddondo y’ekulembedde ekibinja kya Masengere n’obubonero busatu era oluzannya luno lugenda kuddirirwa emipiira mu bibinja ebyenjawulo; Butikkiro, Muganzirwazza ne Bulange era gigenda kusambibwa mu ngeri ya ssaayansi olw’ekirwadde ya Ssennyiga Corona. Gomba ye Nnantameggwa w’ekikopo kino nga yakuba Busiro ggoolo 3-1 okusitukira mu kikopo.

headline: Balambudde ekifo ewagenda okuzimbibwa eddwaliro ly’Obwakabaka
text: Abakungu ba Buganda enkya ya leero ku Lwokuna balambudde ettaka ewagenda okuzimbibwa eddwaliro lya Buganda okusobola okutuusa obujjanjabi obw’omulembe ku bantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka ate mu bwangu. Bano ababadde bakulembeddwamu Ssentebe wa Buganda Twezimba, Omuk. John Fred Kiyimba Freeman balambudde ettaka mu Ggombolola za mutuba etaano okuli; Nakisunga, Ngogwe ne Nyenga mu ssaza ly’e Kyaggwe mu distulikiti y’e Buikwe, okwekenneenya ekifo Obwakabaka we buba buzimba eddwaliro eriri ku mutendera gwa Health Centre IV. Omuk. Kiyimba ategeezezza nti, “Beene yasiimye amasaza asatu gazimbibwemu eddwaliro limu limu era ekituleese kwe kulaba kifo kya ekisaanidde, obwetaavu buli luddawa? Tutumiddwa Kabineeti y’Obwakbaka bwa Buganda okujja okulaba ebifo bino.” Ono ategeezezza nti abantu ba Buganda ebbanga lyonna babadde basaba eddwaliro kuba obwetaavu webuli n’obulumi kale nga kye baliko kwekukola alipoota naye n’asaba abantu okumanya nti omulimu guno gutandise era basuubira enteekateeka eno okubuna amasaza gonna. Omuk. Kiyimba abasabye okumanya nti ekigambo ky’obulamu kikulu nnyo era Omutanda yasazeewo okugisoosowoza okusobola okukuuma abantu be nga balamu. Omwami wa Ssaabasajja Kabaka ow’eggombolola y’e Nyenga Mutuba etaano, Benson Ssenyonga ategeezezza abakungu ba Beene nti wakyaliwo ekizibu ky’ekibbattaka mu ggombolola ye era ayagala kirwanyisibwe mu bwangu nga Buganda ekolera ku ttaka lino. Ye alamulirako Beene essaza Kyaggwe Ssekiboobo Boogere Lubanga Mulembya agambye nti eddwaliro lino lyakufaayo nnyo okutumbula ebyobulamu by’abantu ba Kabaka ate nga tebakulembezza nsimbi. Kinajjukirwa nti emirundi mingi Ssaabasajja Kabaka azze akubiriza abantu be okwekuuma nga balamu bulungi, nga bettanira abakugu mu byobulamu ng’obudde bukyali okwewala okufiirwa obulamu. Obwakabaka era bwabakana n’eddimu ery’okubunyisa obujjanjabi mu bantu nga butegeka ensiisira z’ebyobulamu okugaba obujjanjabi obw’obwereere era enkola yaagugenda mu maaso mu masaza gonna aga Buganda.

headline: Bakolokose Mao ku by’okwegatta ne NRM, azizza omuliro
text: Bannayuganda ab’enjawulo bavuddeyo nebakolokota Ssenkaggale w’ekibiina ki Democratic Party (DP), olw’endagaano gyeyakoze ne Ssentebe w’ekibiina ki National Resistance Movement (NRM), Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni okukolera awamu batwale eggwanga mu maaso. Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP), David Lewis Rubongoya yayise ku mutimbagano nagamba nti, “Okwebuzaabuza kukomye, kino kinnyonnyola olutalo lwabadde yaggula ku NUP.” Eyaliko Pulezidenti w’ekibiina ki Forum for Democratic Change, Dr Kizza Besigye yasinzidde ku mutimbagano nategeeza nti, “Hmmn Kale Bye!” so nga Omuloodi wa Kampala, Erias Lukwago yagambye nti, “Kitalo nnyo, yazaalibwa 1954 na………” Ate akulira ekibiina ki DP mu disitulikiti ye Buikwe, Dr Lulume Bayiga ategeezezza nti eby’okwegatta ku NRM ebyakoleddwa Mao ne Ssaabawandiisi Gerald Siranda babyekangidde mu mawulire nawera nti singa anagezaako okubiguza olukiiko olufuzi olw’ekibiina bakuggyayo amaanyi gonna okumulemesa. Abantu abalala bangi bayise ku mutimbagano okutegeeza nga Mao bw’abadde aludde nga akolagana ne Museveni nga ekikyuuse kyokka kyakuvaayo nakiteeka mu lwatu. Abamu kino bakisanyukidde nga bagamba nti Mao abadde akeereyesa olutalo lw’okwetakkuluza ku Pulezidenti Museveni era tekyewunyisa nti abadde amuwolereza entakera ate nakolokota banne bwebali ku ludda olumu. Wabula Mao ategeezezza nti ye tagenda kubeera nga abakulembeze b’ebibiina abalala abeefuula abatakolagana na gavumenti ate nga bakukuta nayo, Mao awadde ekky’okulabirako kya Col. Kizza Besigye eyali akukuta ne Museveni kyokka mu bantu nga alaga nga bwatasobola kutuula na Museveni. Ono agamba nti NUP eriwo mu bukyamu era gavumenti yagirekawo kuba ekimanyi nti ekolerayo. Mao agamba nti tewali kikyamu kulabika nga ali ne Pulezidenti Museveni kuba abadde yeetaba n’abakulembeze ab’enjawulo mu ggwanga nasaba bannayuganda okukyuusa endowooza zaabwe kuba okukolagana ne gavumenti ssi musango. Ensonga ya Mao ewagiddwa munnamateeka Edgar Tabaro ategeezezza nti Mao ekkubo akutte ddungi era kijja kuyamba okukyuusa endowooza z’abantu abalowooza nti oli bwabeera ku ludda oluvuganya talina kukolagana wadde okuwuliza abali mu gavumenti.

headline: Mao awaddeyo emikono egimusemba ku bwapulezidenti
text: Kampala Ekibiina kya Democratic Party (DP) kiwaddeyo emikono egisemba Ssenkaggale waabwe, Nobert Mao, okwesimbawo ku bwapulezidenti mu kalulu ka bonna aka 2021.  Okusinziira ku bannakibiina emikono gye bawaddeyo gisoba mu egyo egiragira mu mateeka era nga kati balinze kimu kya kakiiko ka byakulonda kukakasa muntu waabwe. “Etteeka liragira emikono gy’abalonzi okuva mu Disitulikiti 100 naye tubawadde gya Disitulikiti 120,” Omwogezi w’ekibiina Okeler Opio bw’agambye. Aba DP era basabye akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kabawe olwa Mmande nga 2 mu ssaawa z’amalya g’ekyemisana okuwandiisizaako omuntu waabwe era nga bakakasa nti wadde ebula ennaku 2 okutuuka ku nsalessale, tebalina kwekengera kwonna ku kusunsulamu omuntu waabwe. Wabula omwogezi w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda, Paul Bukenya, agambye nti tebasobola kugaana mikono gya DP naye n’alaga okutya nti bayinza okuba ekikeerezi singa wabaawo ekyetaaga okutereeza mu mikono gino. Ssenkaggale Nobert Mao ye yawangula kkaadi y’ekibiina kya DP okwesimbawo ku bwapulezidenti mu kalulu ka bonna aka 2021. Bino we bijjidde ng’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kaamaze dda okufulumya amakubo agagenda okukozesebwa abeesimbyewo ku bwapulezidenti nga bagenda okwewandiisa ku bwapulezidenti Ssabbiiti ejja ku kisaawe e Kyambogo.

headline: Luttamaguzi, Mpuuga, Ssebunnya n’abalala balayidde, balaze kwe batandikira
text: Kampala Olwaleero ababaka ba Palamenti y’e 11 abalala bayingidde olunaku olw’okusatu nga balayira okunywerera ku ssemateeka wamu n’okuweereza bannayuganda awatali kwe balira mu nteekateeka eno egenda okumala ennaku 4 ennamba. Ababaka abalayidde enkya ya leero omubadde Omubaka wa Nyendo Mukungwe, Owek. Mathias Mpuuga, era ono ategeezezza nga bw’agenda okukola ennyo okulaba nga bawaliriza gavumenti okutambulira ku nfuga ey’amateeka mu kisanja kino. “Tusobola okutwala amazzi amayonjo mu byalo ne tuzimba n’amasomero  naye bwe tutabeera na nfuga y’amateeka tetusobola kugenda mu maaso.” Owek. Mpuuga bw’agambye olumaze okulayira. Mpuuga ategeezezza nti bo ng’abaludde mu Palamenti, baakuyamba okubangula abavubuka abato abayingidde mu Palamenti ye 11 kuba nabo baaliko abapya.  Abalala abalayidde ye mubaka, Amos Lugoloobi owa Ntenjeru North mu Kayunga n’omuyimbi era omubaka wa Kakuuto mu Palamenti, Geofrey Lutaaya. Omubaka Luttamaguzi Ssemakula owa Nakaseke South naye akubye ebirayiro enkya ya leero. Omubaka wa Nakaseke Central mu Palamenti, Allan Mayanja Ssebunnya naye alayidde era ono ategeezezza ng’essira bw’agenda okuliteeka ku kutumbula embeera z’abantu abasookerwako mu kitundu kye. Mu babaka abalala abalayidde ye munnamateeka era omubaka omukyala omulonde owa Kampala, Shamim Malende, omubaka omukyala owa Kalungu era eyali Minisita Idah Nantaba, Muwanga Kivumbi, Nandala Mafabi awamu n’abalala. Omubaka omukyala omulonde owa Bugweri era omuyimbi Rachel Magoola, Moses Magogo nabo balayidde awamu n’abakiise b’amagye mu palamenti okuli omuduumizi wa UPDF, Gen. David Muhoozi. Ate ye muwala wa Minisita Kuteesa olumaze okulayira n’ayambalira abantu abamugamba nti famire ye yeefuze ebifo by’obukulembeze n’ategeeza nti bannamawogola baamulonda mu bungi era n’asuubiza okukola buli kimu okutereeza embeera zaabwe. Ababaka abalala okuli; Jim Muhwezi, John Musila owa Bubulo East, omubaka omukyala owa Mbale, Miriam Mukhaye, nabo bakubye ebirayiro. Palamenti w’egendedde mu kuwummulamu ng’ababaka 68 bamaze okulayira. Buli omu ku bano akubye ebirayiro okuli okugondera Ssemateeka n’okugondera amateeka ga Palamenti nga tebannatandika kisanja kyabwe eky’emyaka ettaano era ne baweebwa Ssemateeka w’eggwanga awamu n’amateeka agafuga Palamenti okubakakasa nti emirimu bagitandise. Emikolo gy’okulayiza ababaka gikyagendera ddala mu maaso okutuusa olunaku olw’enkya era eno Palamenti y’e 11 eyingidde ebyafaayo ng’emu ku Palamenti ezigenda okusingamu ababaka nga bagenda kubeera 529.

headline: Gavumenti eyimirizza okukebera COVID-19 e Malaba ne Busia okulwanyisa ebbula ly’amafuta
text: Minisitule y’ebyobulamu eyimirizza okukebera ekirwadde kya Corona ku nsalo e Malaba ne Busia kisobozese akalippagano k’ebimotoka ebitambuza ebyamaguzi n’amafuta okukendeera. Dr. Charles Olaro eyatadde omukono ku kiwandiiko ku lw’akulira ebyobulamu mu ggwanga agamba nti akalippagano kano kasobola okuvaako ekirwadde okweyongera era kwe kusalawo bagira bayimirizaamu. “Minisitule esazeewo okuyimirizaamu okukebera abantu bano kisobozese ebimotoka okutambula nga biyingira mu ggwanga era twewale n’embeera eyinza okuvaako ekirwadde kino okweyongera olw’omugotteko gw’abantu.” Ebbaluwa bw’esomye. Okusinziira ku Minisitule eno, ekiragiro kino kya kaseera era bajja kuddamu bakyekenneenye bwe banaaba batudde mu lukung’aana lwa baminisita ba East Africa, ssabbiiti eno okulaba ekiddako. Kinajjukirwa nti Uganda yali yaddamu okukebera okw’obuwaze eri abantu bonna abayingira mu ggwanga okuli ne baddereeva b’ebimotoka ebitambuza ebyamaguzi mu Desemba wa 2021 era Minisitule yategeeza nti kino kyali kikolebwa okutaasa eggwanga ku kawuka akeeyubula aka Omicron. Wabula kino kyavaamu ennyiriri z’ebimotoka bino okweyongera nga zigendera ddala okutuuka mu Amagoro ekya Kenya era embeera bw’eti bw’ebadde okuva January 1. Ekibiina ekitaba bannabyantambula mu Kenya ekya ‘Kenya Transporters Association (KTA)’ kyavaayo ne kirabula nga bwe bagenda okwediima okuyingiza kuno ebyamaguzi byabwe singa gavumenti ya Uganda tetereeza mbeera eno.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asiimye aba UMEME okugula emijoozi
text: Katikkiro Mayiga asiimye ab’ekitongole ky’amasannyalaze ekya UMEME olw’okugula obujoozi bw’emisinde gy’amazaalibwa ga Kabaka era n’okuwaayo ettu liyambeko ku lutalo lw’okulwanyisa Mukenenya. Katikkiro Mayiga nga akwasa aba UMEME obujoozi bwebakoze Bino Kamalabyonna abyogeredde ku Bulange e Mmengo bw’abadde akwasibwa aba UMEME, cceeke ya bukadde 5 nga ku zino kuliko ez’okugula obujoozi kikumi ate endala ziyambeko ku lutalo lw’okugoba Mukenenya. “Kirungi nnyo okuba nti aba UMEME batwegasseeko ku lutalo lw’okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya kuba ensi yonna okukula abantu baayo balina kubanga balamu.” Owek. Mayiga bw’ategeezezza ng’atikkula aba UMEME ettu. Mayiga agambye nti obulwadde bwa Mukenenya bukoseza nnyo abantu mu Uganda ne Africa okutwaliza awamu era ng’okusaasaana kw’ekirwadde kino mu Africa kyava ku kubulwa kumanya kutuufu. Ono alaze nti n’okutuusa essaawa ya leero abamu bakyalowooza nti Siriimu ava mu ddogo era kino kye kimu ku biraga obwetaavu bw’okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya. Katikkiro Mayiga asiimye aba UMEME olw’okutereeza mu mpeereza yaabwe nga kati amasannyalaze tegakyavaavaako era n’abeebaza olw’okugula obujoozi n’okuwaayo ettoffaali. Ate ye Ssenkulu wa Majestic Brand, Omuk. Ronald Kawaddwa, ategeezezza nti okumala emyaka 5 aba UMEME babadde bakwasizaako Obwakabaka mu misinde gino. Omwogezi w’ekitongole kya UMEME era eyakulembedde ttiimu ya UMEME, Peter Kauju, yategeezezza nti baagala okutumbula enkolagana yaabwe n’Obwakabaka. “Guno omulimu mukulu nnyo era tubadde tetusobola kusubwa ku mulundi guno era ntumiddwa ne bampa cceeke ya bukadde butaano era tweyama ssebo nti emijoozi gyonna gye tugenda okutwala tugenda kugikozesa.” Kauju bwe yeeyamye. Kauju yawerekeddwako abakungu okuva mu UMEME okuli; Nansasi Jane, Micheal Wamakuyu, Joseph Balikuddembe n’abalala.

headline: Nnaabagereka akunze abantu  okugaba omusaayi kitaase obulamu
text: Nnaabagereka wa Buganda,Maama Sylvia Nagginda, akunze abantu okuwaayo omusaayi kiyambeko okutaasa obulamu bw’abo abagwetaaga mu kiseera kino ng’eggwanga lyakava ku muggalo. Okusaba kuno Nnaabagereka akukoledde mu bimuli bya Bulange ku Lwokubiri bw’abadde atongoza enteekateeka y’empaka z’okukung’aanyaomusaayi okuva mu masaza ga Buganda okwang’anga ebbula ly’omusaayi eriri mu ggwanga. “Obwakabaka bwa Buganda nga buyita mu Minisitule y’ebyobulamu, tugenda kukuba ensiisira mu masaza ga Buganda ag’enjawulo tusobole okukung’aanya omusaayi okudduukirira bannaffe abagwetaaga. Nga tukoledde wamu tusobola okukung’aanya omusaayi ebitundu 80 ku buli 100 eby’omusaayi ogwetaagibwa. Obwetaavu bw’omusaayi mu malwaliro weebuli bwamaanyi wadde ng’omusaayi gubadde gukung’aanyizibwa aba Kabaka Foundation nga beegasse wamu n’abaRedcross wamu n’ebitongole ebirala.” Nnaabagereka Nagginda bw’ategeezezza. Nnaabagereka Nagginda agambye nti wadde ebitongole bino bibadde bikola omulimu guno emirundi egiwera naye obwetaavu bukyali bwamaanyi. Ono asabye abantu ssekinnoomu okujjumbira enteekateeka eno kuba enkya basobola okubeera abamu ku bagwetaaga okutaasa obulamu. Okusinziira ku Nnaabagereka enteekateeka eno ejja kuyamba nnyo okukendeeza ku bungi bw’omusaayi obwetaagibwa era ekendeeze n’omuwendo gw’abantu abafa olw’ebbula ly’omusaayi. Nnaabagereka asabye abantu bonna gye bali okwegatta mu nteekateeka eno era ne yeebaza ebitongole eby’enjawulo okuli; Redcross, Mengo Hospital ne Kabaka Foundation olw’omulimu amakula gwe bakola okukung’aanya omusaayi. Mu ngeri yeemu asabye abantu okusigala ku bwerinde ku kirwadde kya ssennyiga Corona ekikyalemedde mu bantu n’abasaba okwongera okufaayo ku biragiro ebitangira ekirwadde kino. Abakuutidde okusigala nga balya bulungi naddala nga bettanira emmere nnasangwa kuba eno ejja kubakuuma nga balamu era ebongere okufuna omusaayi. Ssenkulu w’ekitongole kya Kabaka Foundation, Omukungu Kaggwa Ndagala ategeezezza nti Ssaabasajja Kabaka yasiima n’abasindika mu lutabaalo luno okusobola okutaasa bamaama abafiira mu malwaliro nga bazaala. Omuk. Ndagala agamba nti okusingaomusaayi babadde baguggya mu baana b’amasomero naye kati giweze emyaka 2 nga tebafuna musaayi guno olw’ensonga nti abaana bano baasindikibwa awaka oluvannyuma lw’amasomero okuggalwa olw’ekirwadde kya ssennyiga Corona. Omwogezi w’ekitongole kya Red Cross Irene Nakasiita, ategeezezza nti bakwatagana n’ekitongole kya Kabaka Foundation ne banoonya omusaayi nga bakikola emirundi 2 buli mwaka. Ono era agamba nti enteekateeka y’okugenda mu masaza etuukidde mu kiseera kituufu kuba eggwanga libadde ku muggalo.

headline: Museveni ne Kagame bakkiriziganyizza ku kirina okukolwa ensalo okuggulwa
text: Museveni ku kkono ng’abuuza ku Kagame  Musais waffe  Abakulembeze ba mawanga Rwanda ne Uganda bakkiriziganyizza kukirina okukolwa ensalawo egatta amawanga g’ombi eya Katuna okuggulwa.  Yoweri Museveni owa Uganda ne Paul Kagame owa Rwanda olwaleero basisinkanye ku nsalo e Katuna okongera okuteesa kukuzzaawo enkolagana wakati wamawanga gombiriri eyasasika omwaka oguwedde.  Rwanda erumiriza Uganda okukwata bannansi baayo nebaggalira mu makomera awatali musango.  Era Uganda erumirizibwa okubudamya abayeekera abagazaako okusekeeterera gavumenti ya Kagame. Mu nsisinkano ya leero amawanga gombu gakkiriziganyizza nti Uganda yakutunula mu nsonga eno okulaba oba waliyo Abanyalwanda abasinziira wano okugezaako okumamulako gavumenti ya Kagame.  Kino bwenaakikolwa, wajjakubaawo alipoota era singa kizuulwa nti abantu bano weebali, balina okukwatibwako ng’amateeka bwegalagira.  Oluvanyuma abakulu bombi baakuddamu okusisinkana e Katuna okuggulawo ensalo.  Kagame ne Museveni basanyufu nti ebyakanyizibwako mu kibuga Luanda ekya Angola bitandise okussibwa mu nkola ng’okuta abasibe.  Wiiki eno Uganda yayimbudde Abanyalwanda 13 nebeegatta ku mwenda gweyali yayimbula edda era bano nebaddizibwayo ewaabwe.  Ne Rwanda era yayimbudde Bannayuganda 15.

headline: Rotary edduukiridde essomero lya Ndwadde Mutwe
text: Mukono Abazirakisa abeegattira mu Rotary Club ya Sunrise mu Kampala, badduukiridde essomero lya Ndwadde Mutwe e Mukono n’ebyetaagisa okutangira ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona lisobole okuggulawo. Akulira Rotary mu Uganda ne Tanzania, Rosette Nabbumba  nga  akwasa Minisita  Mayanja bbendera ya Rotary Minisita wa Buganda ow’ebyobulimi n’Obutonde, Owek.Nkalubo, asinzidde ku mukolo guno n’akubiriza abantu okwongera okufaayo okuyamba abalala era basimbe emiti okusobola okutaasa obutonde. Oweekitiibwa asiimye emirimu egikolebwa banna Rotary mu ggwanga n’ategeeza nti bano bafaananira dda n’Obwakabaka mu kufaayo ku balala n’okulwanirira obutonde. Gavana wa Rotary mu Uganda ne Tanzania, Rosette Nabbumba, annyonnyodde nti embeera essomero lino mwe libadde ye yabawaliriza okuvaayo babeeko kye bakola. Nabbumba agasseeko nti basobodde okuddaabiriza ebibiina bisatu, okuteerawo essomero ttanka y’amazzi n’okubasimira Nayikondo kiyambeko okutumbula obuyonjo ku ssomero. Ate ye akulira essomero lino, Rebecca Namaganda, ategeezezza nti wadde essomero lino liri ku musingi gwa gavumenti, naye liringa eryerabirwa kuba okuva lwe lyazimbibwa mu 1930 lyakaddaabirizibwa emirundi mibale nga n’obusolya ku bibiina ebimu bwavaako. Namaganda annyonnyodde nti embeera essomero mwe libadde mbi nnyo ng’egenda kubalemesa okuggulawo naye ne yeebaza banna Rotary olw’obuyambi bwe babawadde. Omukolo guno gwakomekkerezeddwa nakusimba miti ne kigendererwa eky’okutumbula obutonde bw’ensi.

headline: Kyaddaaki Gen.Tumukunde akakasiddwa okwesimbawo, akunze Bannayuganda okulonda mu bungi
text: Kampala Eyaliko Minisita w’ebyokwerinda, Gen Henry Tumukunde, asabye bannayuganda okuvaayo mu bungi beetabe mu kalulu ka bonna aka 2021. Tumukunde nga ayogerako eri bannamawulire Okusaba kuno Tumukunde akukoze yaakamala okukakasibwa ng’omu ku bagenda okwesimbawo ku bwapulezidenti, bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire, Tumukunde agambye nti akalulu kano kakulu nnyo mu byafaayo bya Uganda. “Kano ke kalulu akasinga ok’omugaso mu bulamu bwange okuva mu 1980,” Tumukunde bw’agambye. Tumukunde annyonnyodde nti ayagala bannayuganda abawera obukadde 17.9 bakole ng’Abamerika bajjumbire akalulu kano ng’Abangereza bwe baakola mu ‘Brexit’ nabo balonde mu bungi. Ono asabye banne abali ku ludda oluvuganya baveeyo bakunge abantu okwetaba mu kulonda kuno. Okusooka okukakasibwa kwa Tumukunde, kwasoose kujjamu mukoosi oluvannyuma lwa ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda okumulagira asooke atereeze ebibadde bitakwatagana mu biwandiiko bye. Kino kyazzeewo olw’obutaba na mukono gwa Kamisona akubisa ebirayiro era bw’atyo n’asabibwa okugenda agufune n’oluvannyuma akomewo akakasibwe. Oluvannyuma Ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda, Simon Byabakama, amukakasizza ng’omu ku beesimbyewo era n’amusaba alonde akabonero k’agenda okukozesa mu kalulu kano. Tumukunde alonzeewo essaawa nga gy’agenda okukozesa mu kalulu kano. “Twekenneenyezza empapula za Tumukunde Henry Kakulugu. Era Nze Omulamuzi Byabakama Mugenyi Simon nga nze nkuliddemu okuwandiisa abeesimbyewo, nangirira Henry Tumukunde Karuguru ng’omu ku bantu abeesimbyewo nga atuukirizza obukwakkulizo bwonna obwa ‘Presidential Elections Act,” Byabakama bw‘annyonnyodde. Byabakama amusabye okubawa enteekateeka ye gy’agenda okunoonyezaako akalulu, kibayambe okumulambika obulungi.

headline: AFCON qualifiers: Bannayuganda 7 balondeddwa okugiramula
text: Bannayuganda musanvu balondeddwa okulamula emipiira gya AFCON Qualifiers wakati wa 9 ne 17 Novemba era ng’amawanga agabbinkana galina okuzannya emipiira ebiri. Nga bw’eri enkola, abalina okulamula ttiimu zino baasooka kulangirirwa nga ttiimu zino tezinnakwatagana. Mike Letti yoomu ku balondeddwa Abalondeddwa kuliko; Mike Letti, Dixson Okello, Humphrey Mandu, Chelanget Ali Sabila, Dick Okello, Isa Masembe ne William Oloya. Letti agenda kubeera Kamisona w’omupiira wakati wa Egypt ne Togo nga 14 Novemba. Okello yalondeddwa okukulira eby’okwerinda mu mupiira gwa Ethiopia ne Niger ate nga Mandu y’ajja okulira eby’okwerinda nga Ghana egenda mu kibuga Sundan nga Novemba 17. Abalala kuliko; Sabila, Dick, Magembe ne Oloya nga bano be baddifiri abagenda okulamula omupiira wakati wa Lesotho ne Benin. Mu mpaka zino, Uganda egenda kuttunka ne South Sudan e Kampala nga 9 Novemba ate oluvannyuma baddemu okubbinkana nga 17 Novemba mu kibuga Nairobi ekya Kenya.

headline: Abakulembeze bennyamivu olw’ebyobulamu mu Masaka
text: Abakulembezze b’omu disitulikiti y’e Masaka balaze okutya olw’ebyobulamu ebisereba buli ddakiika era ne basaba gavumenti okusitukiramu ebeeko ky’ekolawo mu bwangu. Bino Omubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti y’e Masaka, JoanNamutaawe n’omubaka wa Bukoto East, Ronald Evans Kanyike, baabyoogeredde mu kulambula amalwaliro okuli Kyannamukaaka Health Centre IV awamu n’amalwaliro amalala mu kitundu kino, gye baasanze nga tewali bikozesebwa ate awamu ng’abalwadde abakazi n’abasajja, bonna bajjanjabirwa mu waadi emu. Ababaka bano era baliko kaweefube gwe baakoze okuduukirira amalwaliro n’ebikozesebwa okuyambako abasawo okunywerera ku mirimu oluvannyuma lw’abamu okulabula nti bagenda kusuulawo ebikola, olw’obutaba nabikozesebwa wakati g’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kyeyongera buli kadde. Omubaka Namutaawe yennyamiddde olw’embeera eri ku ddwaliro lya Kyannamukaaka Health Centre IV n’agamba nti kiswaza abakyala n’abasajja okusuzibwa mu waadi emu ate nga n’ebyeyambisibwa tebalina so nga n’abasawo tebalina we basula. Yagasseeko nti akasenge mwe balina okujjanjabira abantu kati mwe baasalawo okusula. Ono yasinzidde wano n’asaba gavumenti eveeyo ebakwatizeeko nga disitulikiti y’e Masaka kubanga embeera eno yaakwongera okutta abantu n’abasawo. Mu ngeri y’emu Omubaka Namutaawe yasabyeeddwaliro lino lisuumusibwe lisobole okwang’anga embeera y’obungi bw’abantu ate era wateekebwewo ekifo we bakolerako ku bantu ba Covid-19. Ate Ssentebe w’eggombolola y’e Kyannamukaaka, Cyrusi Kalema, agamba nti weewaawo ekitundu kino kibadde kikiikirirwa omumyuka wa Pulezidenti Edward Kiwanuka Ssekandi, kyokka embeera y’ebyobulamu naddala ku ddwaliro lino ekyali mbi nnyo. Ye musawo Proscovia Nakyanzi eyasangiddwa ku ddwaliro lino era nga ye yakwasiddwa ebintu bino, yeebazizza nnyo omubaka olw’ettu lye yakubye eddwaliro. Ye omubaka Kanyike Ronald Evans naye yatalaaze amalwaliro gonna agasangibwa mu magombolola okuli Buwunga ne Bukakata mu ssaza ly’e Bukoto East mu disitulikiti y’e Masaka, n’agawa ebikozesebbwa mu kwetangira obulwadde bwa Covid-19. Ono yasabye gavumenti esse essira ku by’obulamu naddala ng’esookera ku malwaliro ag’omu byalo nti kubanga gano ge gasinga okukola omulimu ogwamaanyi mu kujjanjaba bannayuganda nga singa tegafiibwako abantu baakubonaabona nnyo. Kanyike era yakoowodde gavumenti etuuse obuyambi ne ku bantu abawangaalira mu byalo kuba omuggalo eggwanga lye guliko tegwabataliza, obuyambi buleme kukoma mu ba mu bibuga bokka.

headline: Bobi Wine : Omulamuzi Kisakye bamuyiganya lwa kuyimirira ku mazima
text: Akulira ekibiina ki National Unity Platform, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine) agamba nti okuyiganyizibwa okuliwo ku mulamuzi wa kkooti ensukkulumu Esther Kisakye biriwo lwakubaganba yayimirira ku mazima nasalawo okulwanirira Ssemateeka. Kino kiddiridde olutalo lw’ebigambo okubalukawo wakati w’omuteesiteesi omukulu ow’essiga eddamuzi Pius Bigirimana n’omulamuzi Kisakye. Ennaku eziyise Bigirimana yavaayo nawandiikira omulamuzi Kisakye ebbaluwa nga ayimiriza omusaala gwe okumuweebwa olw’okwebulankanya ku mulimu nga takkiriziddwa. Bweyali ayanukula, Omulamuzi Kisakye yategeeza Bigirimana okumulwanyisa kuba mu byafaayo tewaliwo mulamuzi yenna wa kkooti ensukkulumu eyali yeetaaze kweyanjula eri omuwandiisi w’ekitongole kino. Ye Bobi Wine agamba nti okusinziira mu biriwo ekitabula ababiri bano si musaala naye avunaanwa kuyimirira ku mazima wamu n’okulwanirira bannayuganda. “Omulamuzi Kisakye bamuvunaana kuyimirira na bannayuganda nakunywerera ku kirayiro kyeyakuba nagaana okukozesebwa mu kifo kyokugondera ebiragiro by’ abakulu. Omulamuzi Kisakye tumusiima olw’okuyimirirawo era tukakasa nti ebiseera by’omu maaso bijja kumwejjeereza,”Bobi Wine bw’agambye. Kyagulanyi ategeezezza nti eby’okutulugunya omulamuzi Kisakye byongera kutatana kifananyi kya ssiga ddamuzi kuba ennyingo 128 . Bobi Wine agasseeko nti abalamuzi abalina obukugu tebakuzibwa era batulugunyizibwa olw’ensonga nti balabibwa nga abawakanya gavumenti. Ono yeewunya lwaki Omulamuzi nga Kisakye emyaka egisoba mu 13 alekebwawo obwa Ssaabalamuzi nebuweebwa Owiny Dollo atamwenkanya bumanyirivu. Kinajjukirwa nti omwaka oguwedde bwebaali mu musango gw’eby’okulonda ogwa 2022, Kisakye yagugulana ne Ssaabalamuzi Owiny Dollo era nasoma ensala ye eyayawukana ku ya banne ku kifuba era yaliwo yekka. Abatwala ekitongole baggyako emizindaalo awamu n’amasanyalaze nga Kisakye agenda mu maaso n’okusoma ensala ye.

headline: Gen Muntu asabye Muhoozi asooke awummule amagye bwaba ayagala okwenyigira mu by’obufuzi
text: Akulira ekibiina ki Alliance for National Transformation(ANT) Gen Mugisha Muntu, asabye omuduumizi w’amagye g’oku ttaka Lt Gen Muhoozi Kainerugaba era mutabani wa Pulezidenti Museveni, awummule amagye bwaba ayagala okusigaza ekitibwa kye olwo ayingire eby’obufuzi. Muntu okwogera bino abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku bubaga bwa Gen. Muhoozi obutambuzibwa mu bitundu by’eggwanga n’obubaka obulaga nti agenda kwesimbawo mu 2026, Muntu amulabudde okutazannyira ku magye kuba gabatwalidde ebbanga okuzimba. “Njagala okusaba Omuduumizi w’amagye g’oku ttaka okuwummula amagye okutwala eby’obufuzi bye mu maaso. Wadde alina eddembe okukola kino naye ate yunifoomu y’amagye erina okusigaza ekitiibwa kyaayo,” Gen. Muntu bwe yannyonnyodde. Kino kiddiridde Gen. Muhoozi okutegeka obubaga obumuyozaayoza okuweza emyaka 48 mu bitundu eby’enjawulo nga obubaga obukulu bwali Kololo ne mu maka g’Obwapulezidenti. Abakugu bagamba nti ebikujjuko bino byagendereddwamu okutongoza ‘Muhoozi Project’ bannayuganda gyebaludde nga boogerako nga Museveni ayagala mutabani we Muhoozi yaba amusikira ku bwapulezidenti. Okusinziira ku Muntu eggye lya NRA/ UPDF lyazimbibwa mu kwelekereza nokuyiwa omusaayi nga teryetaaga kutambuzibwa mu ngeri Muhoozi gyakolamu ebintu. “Tukwaniriza mu by’obufuzi naye sooka oyambulemu Yunifoomu yaffe,” Muntu bwe yakaatiriza. Abamu ku batunuulizi b’ensonga bagamba ekya Muhoozi okulangirira nga bwajja okuvuganya ku bwapulezidenti mu 2026 kikontana ne ssemateeka awamu n’etteeka erifuga eggye lya UPDF ekigaana abajaasi okwenyigira mu by’obufuzi ebyawulayawula mu bantu. Bino webijjidde nga , Gawaya Tegulle yaddukidde mu kkooti etaputa ssemateeka nga asaba erung’amye ku nsonga eno eya Muhoozi okwenyigira mu by’obufuzi ate nga akyali mu magye.

headline: Kyagulanyi aweze okulemesa Museveni okuggyawo okweyimirirwa ku bavunaanibwa obutemu
text: Bannakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) nga bakuliddwa Pulezidenti waakyo, Robert Kyagulanyi aka Bobi Wine, baweze okulemesa enteekateeka za Pulezidenti Museveni ne bannakibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM) abaagala abantu abavunaanibwa emisango gy’obutemu n’emirala eminene okubeera nti tebeeyimirirwa. Bino we bijjidde ng’ababaka babiri okuli Allan Ssewanyana ne Muhammad Ssegirinya, bazzeemu okukwatibwa abeebyokwerinda oluvannyuma lw’okuyimbulwa ku kakalu ka kkooti ku misango okugezaako okutemula abantu n’obutujju. Kyagulanyi ku Mmande yavumiridde ekya gavumenti okulinnyirira eddembe ly’ababaka bano n’ategeeza nti gavumenti egezaako kunafuya ludda lugivuganya. Omwogezi wa poliisi mu ggwanga, Fred Enanga yakakasizza nga Ssegirinya bwe yakwatiddwa ng’agenda kuggulwako emisango emipya egy’okulya mu nsi olukwe. Mu ngeri yeemu Kyagulanyi avumiridde engeri amateeka ga COVID-19 gye gateekebwa mu nkola n’ategeeza nti buli ekikolebwa gavumenti egendereramu kulaba bw’esobola kwenywereza mu buyinza nga bbizineesi z’abantu ba wansi ziggalwa ate ez’abanene mu gavumenti ne zirekebwa nga nzigule. Bobi Wine era alaze okutya ku biseera by’ebyenjigiriza by’eggwanga eby’omu maaso kuba abaana bamaze ebbanga eriwera emyaka 2 nga batudde awaka, kyokka ne gavumenti by’eyogera ku nsonga eno tebimatiza era eraga nti tefaayo.

headline: Emipiira gy’Amasaza
text: Empaka z’emipiira gy’amasaza gisembedde era nga gigenda kubeera ku kisaawe e Namboole nga 26th October 2019. Bulemeezi egenda kuzannya  ne Busiro mu mpaka ez’akamalirizo. Ssaabasajja Kabaka nga abuuza ku basambi b’omupiira Empaka zamasaza ziberayo buli mwaka era nga Ssaabasajja Kabaka yaziggulawo era n’aziggalawo.

headline: Okugema Obulwadde bw’ekibumba, ‘Hepatitis B’
text: Kaweefube azeemu wali mu  bimuli bya Bulange Ekitongole kya Kabaka Foundation kye kiwomyeemu omutwe mu kawefube ono ow’okugema obulwadde bw’ekibumba mu bimuli bya Bulange- Mengo era nga kaweefube ono wakumala ennaku bbiri mu bitundu bye Kampala . Abamu ku bantu abazze okugemebwa ku Bulange-MengoOwekitiibwa Hajji Amisi Kakomo Minisita wa Kabaka nga bamugema Hepatitis B Omwami Kaggwa Ndagala Edward, Ssenkulu wa Kabaka Foundation akubidde bana Uganda bonna omulanga okujjumbira enkola ey’okwekebeza awamu n’okwegemesa ekirwadde kino naddala abavubuka. Era mwami Ndagala asabye abakozesa bakubirize ate bakirizze abakozi baabwe okugenda okwekebeza okutegeera obulamu bwaabwe bwebuyimiridde ate era n’okwegemesa obulwadde buno obwa Hepatitis B.  Obulwadde buno bumanyiddwa nnyo mu kukwata ekibumba era nga bwabulabe nnyo eri obulamu bw’omuntu yenna abeera abufunye, abakugu bagamba nti busobola okuvirako omuntu okufa. Omuntu yetaaga okugenda okumugema emirundi esatu  era nga tonagemebwa wetaaga osooke okeberebwe wekenenyezebwe, era bwekizuulibwa nga olina obulwadde buno awo nga otandika eddagala ate bwoba nga tolina awo bakugeme okukuziyiza okufuna obulwadde buno .

headline: Bulemeezi awuumye nga Ssaabasajja Kabaka aggulawo empaka z’Ebika 2022
text: Essaza lya Beene ery’e Bulemeezi liwuumye, Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi bw’abadde alabiseeko eri Obuganda nga aggulawo empaka z’emipiira gy’Ebika bya Buganda ez’omwaka 2022 mu kisaawe kya Kasana Luweero mu Bulemeezi. Obwedda buli Omutanda wayita nga abantu bakwatiridde ku makubo era obwedda Empologoma ewalirizibwa okuvaamu natambuza ku bigere nga bwababuuzaako n’okubawuubira, olwo essanyu nerijula okubatta. Beene bwatuuse ku kisaawe e Kasana ayaniriziddwa Omumyuka Asooka owa Katikkiro Owek. Twaha Kaawaase Kigongo ne Minisita Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu awamu n’abakungu abalala.  Ssaabasajja Kabaka awandiise ku mupiira ng’akabonero akakaga nti atongozza empaka zino era bwezityo empaka naziggulawo. Oluvannyuma omupiira oguggulawo empaka zino, gutandise ku ssaawa 9 ez’olweggulo wakati wa bazzukulu ba Muteesaasira ab’eddira Engo nab’eddira Engo wakati mu bawagizi ababaddewo okubugiriza Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka. Wasooseewo omupiira gw’okubaka wakati w’Engo n’ Embwa nga guno guwanguddwa bazzukulu ba Mutasingwa ab’eddira Embwa ku ggoolo.  Empaka zino zibadde zimaze emyaka 2 nga tezizanyibwa olw’omuggalo gwa Covid-19, zaasemba okuzannyibwa mu 2019 zaawangulwa Embogo, ate Ennyonyi Ennyange n’ewangula engabo y’okubaka. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako bajjajja abataka abakulu ab’Obusolya, baminisita mu Bwakabaka bwa Buganda , abakungu n’abantu ab’enjawulo .

headline: Owek. Mpuuga alabudde Ssaabaminisita Nabbanja ku kutiisatiisa aba Opozisoni
text: Kampala  Akulira oludda oluvuganya mu Palamenti, Mathias Mpuuga, alabudde Ssaabaminisita Robinah Nabbanja, akomye okutiisatiisa ab’oludda oluvuganya naye abaleke bakole emirimu gyabwe. Mpuuga bino yabyogeredde mu Kampala oluvannyuma lwa Ssaabaminisita Nabbanja okutegeeza nga gavumenti bw’etandise okunoonyereza ku bakulira obukiiko ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti ababukozesa okufuna ssente mu bantu be banoonyerezaako. Bino we bijjidde ng’akakiiko akalondoola enkozesa y’ensimbi z’omuwi w’omusolo aka ‘Public Accounts Committee (PAC), kamaze okutegeeza nga bwe kagenda okunoonyereza ku nsimbi ezayisibwa Palamenti okuyambako abantu abakoseddwa omuggalo. Nabbanja yagambye nti gavumenti tegenda kuttira muntu yenna ku liiso kasita kinaazuulibwa nti yeenyigidde mu bulyi bw’enguzi nga si nsonga wa gavumenti oba oludda oluvuganya. “Bangi ku babaka b’oludda oluvuganya abanoonyereza ku bitongole bya gavumenti, mumanyi bwe bakola emirimu gyabwe mu bukiiko, abasinga ku bano bagagga era tukimanyi. Naye ssente zino bazifuna batya?” Nabbanja bwe yabuuzizza. Ku nsonga eno, Owek. Mpuuga agasseeko nti Nabbanja ky’akola kya kubatiisatiisa era abalemese okunoonyereza ku mazima agakwata ku nsaasaanya n’enkozesa ya ssente z’omuwi w’omusolo. “ Ndabye ensonga eno ku mutimbagano nga Ssaabaminisita awera okunoonyereza ku b’oludda oluvuganya ku bugagga bwabwe. Njagala okumukakasa obuwagizi bwaffe ku nsonga eno, naye tewali kutiisatiisa kwonna kujja kulemesa kakiiko ka PAC kunoonyereza ku nsimbi emitwalo 10 egyasindikibwa eri bannansi.” Mpuuga bwe yagambye. Owek. Mpuuga agamba nti ssente zino zaagabwa wansi wa woofiisi Nabbanja gy’akulembera. Noolwekyo okunoonyereza kulina okukolebwa okuzuula amazima ku nsimbi zino.

headline: Minisita Ssekabembe akunze abantu okwongera okugula emijoozi
text: Minisita w’ebyemizannyo, okwewummuza n’abavubuka, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu, akunze abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka okugula emijoozi gy’emisinde gya Kabaka Birthday Run egy’omwaka guno kisobozese kaweefube w’okulwanyisa akawuka ka Mukenenya okutambula obulungi. Minisita Ssekabembe nga akwasa ab’e Bulemeezi emijoozi Owek. Ssekabembe agambye nti wadde ensi yonna essira eritadde ku kulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona, naye olugendo lw’okulwanyisa akawuka ka Mukenenya lukyali lunene. Bino Ssekabembe abyogedde akwasa ab’eggombolola ya Ssaabawaali Kalagala -Masiki okuva e Bulemeezi, emijoozi gy’emisinde gy’amazaalibwa ga Kabaka gya mitwalo 70 ku Bulange olwaleero. “Njagala okukunga Obuganda bwonna, amagombolola gonna gakole kye mukoze, amasaza gonna, ebitongole ebisoboka naddala ebyo ebiri mu lwokaano luno okulwanyisa Mukenenya, bannabyabufuzi n’abantu Ssekinnoomu, okuwagira kaweefube w’okutaasa abaana b’eggwanga.” Owek. Ssekabembe bw’agambye. Ono abajjukiza omulamwa gw’emisinde gino ogw’abasajja okukulemberamu olutabaalo okutaasa abaana abawala okukwatibwa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya, nga Ssaabasajja Kabaka bwe yasiima. Owek. Ssekabembe asiimye ab’eggombolola n’essomero lya Bulemeezi Senior Secondary School olw’okuvaayo nebagula emijoozi gino, okusobola okuyambako okunnyikiza kaweefube ono. Omwami w’eggombolola ya Ssaabawaali Kalagala -Masiki mu Ssaza ly’e Bulemeezi, Rev. Fr. George Abraham Kaleebu, ategeezezza nti basazeewo okwenyigiramu olw’omukwano gwe balina eri Obuganda wadde ng’embeera y’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ebakosezza nnyo. Nannyini ssomero lya Bulemeezi SSS, annyonnyodde nti omusingi gw’essomero lyabwe gwa Buganda nga n’abayizi babaggya mu Buganda ng’eno y’ensonga lwaki bakwatibwako butereevu. Emisinde gino gigenda kuddukibwa mu nkola ya Sayansi, nga 29/ November/ 2020 era nga Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye okugisimbula n’abantu batonotono mu Lubiri e Mmengo.

headline: Omuwagizi wa NUP attiddwa mu bukambwe
text: Bya Jesse Lwanga Mukono Ebitalo bigudde mu bawagizi b’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform mu Mukono North, omu ku bannabwe eyali yabula okumala akaseera bwasangiddwa nga yafa omulambo gwe negusuulibwa mukibira kya gavumenti ekisangibwa e Kifu mu Kyampisi. Abapoliisi nga batwala omulambo gwa Ssemakula Omugenzi ye Rogers Ssemakula ow’emyaka 36 nga mutuuze we Kiyunga nga kigambibwa nti yabadde akulira abavubuka ba Ghetto mukitundu kino. Kigambibwa nti Ssemakula yafa mukiro ekyakeesa olunaku lw’okulonda Pulezidenti n’ababaka bapalamenti. Omulambo gwa Ssemakula gwazuuliddwa omulaalo abadde alunda ente era nga gubadde gutandise okuunda. Abatuuze balumirizza nti ono y’omu ku bantu abazze bawambibwa abantu abatambulira mu mmotoka y’ekika kya ‘Drone’ etaliiko nnamba era nga babadde bamunoonya okumala ennaku eziwerako. Isma Byekwaso nga abadde awangaala n’omugenzi agamba nti, Rogers abadde omuntu atalina buzibu bwonna nga abadde akola mirimu gwa kukuba matoffaali ssako okutunda enku nga n’ebyobufuzi abadde tabiriimu nnyo okuggyako okuwagira Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu. Namwandu w’omugenzi, Nampijja Zalfa kyokka nga babadde tebabeera wamu ategeezezza nti yasembayo okubeera ne bba nga 13 namuwa nakakonge ke ng’amukuutira okugenda okulonda kyokka byamusobera bwatamulabako mu kulonda era nga okuva olwo babadde bamunoonya. Ono amulekedde abaana babiri abalenzi ku myaka musanvu n’etaano. Omubaka w’ekitundu kino omulonde, Abudallah Kiwanuka ategeezezza nti bamaze batutte omusango ku poliisi era nga basuubira kkooti okutandika okuwulira omusango gwabwe ku lunaku lw’enkya. Ono agamba Ssemakula y’omu ku bantu abasoba mu 10 abaze bawambibwa mu ssaza lino nga agamba nti ekizibu kyava ku byabufuzi wakati we ne Minisita w’amazzi Ronald Kibuule.

headline: AKAMYUFU KA NRM : Abaagala okwesimbawo balagiddwa okuwaayo wofiisi
text: Kampala Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina ki National Resisitance Movement (NRM) Justine Kasule Lumumba, alagidde abakulembeze b’ekibiina abaagala okwesimbawo mu kamyufu okuwaayo wofiisi beewale okubeera nekyekubira. Ssaabawandiisi Kasule Lumumba                                                  Bino Lumumba yabitadde bubaka obw’omunda (Internal Memo) bweyawereza abakozi b’ekibiina ku Lwokubiri nategeeza nti yeewunyizza okulaba nga abamu ku bakulembeze babadde bakyalemeddwa okuwaayo wofiisi zebalimu ate nga bakimanyi nti bagenda mu kalulu. “Nkizudde nga bangi ku bakulembeze okuva ku disitulikiti okutuuka wansi ku byalo baagala kwesimbawo mu kalulu ka 2021 ku mnitendera egy’enjawulo n’abamu bamaze dda okusunsulwa okwetaba mu kamyufu k’ekibiina ”Lumumba bweyagambye. Lumumba yategeezezzza nti buli lwebabeera bagenda mukalulu abakulembeze abatuula ku bukiiko obwenjawulo balina okuyambako okukunga abantu n’okulaba nga okulonda kwa Kamyufu kutambula bulungi. Wano weyasinzidde nalabula abo bonna abagenda okwesimbawo mu Kamyufu okuwaayo wofiisi eri abantu abaddirira kiyambe okwewala enkaayana wamu n’okuteekawo obwenkanya. Lumumba yabalagidde okuwaayo wofiisi n’okulekulira ebifo byabwe bakuteeke mu buwandiike era kkopi y’ebbaluwa bagiwe akulira emirimu gy’ekibiina ku disitulikiti era baweeko nakulira eby’okulonda ku disitulikiti. Bino webigidde nga ebibiina ebyenjawulo bituula bufoofofo okulaba n’okunoonya abantu bebanasimbawo ku mitendera egy’enjawulo mu kalulu ka bonna aka 2021.

headline: Ssewanyana wakuvuganya Magogo ku bwa FUFA pulezidenti
text: Omubaka wa Palamenti akiikirira Makindye West, alangiridde  nti waakuvuganya Pulezidenti w’ekibiina ekiddukanya omupiira mu ggwanga ekya Federation of Uganda Football Associations (FUFA), Eng. Moses Magogo ku kifo kino. Ssewannyana ategeezezza bannamawulire leero ku Lwokubiri nti agenda kukyusa omupiira mu ggwanga gusobole okweyagaza buli omu singa anaalondebwa ku bukulu buno. Ono awadde Pulezidenti aliko Moses Magogo amagezi addeko wabbali kuba ky’akoze akikoze nga ke kaseera n’abalala basobole okuweereza. Ssewannyana ajjukiza bannamawulire nti Magogo si mutuufu kwesimbawo kuba mu 2017 yamuwaabira ng’amuvunaana okutunda kkaadi z’ekikopo ky’ensi yonna ekya 2014. Wano Ssewannyana w’asinzidde n’asaba Magogo aleme kuddamu kwesimbawo nti bwe kinaamulema agenda kuzuukusa emisango gye egy’okulya enguzi era n’asaba amuwe embalirira ku ngeri gy’abadde atambuzaaamu emirimu mu bbanga lya nnaku 7 zokka. Kinajjukirwa nti Ssewannyana yagezaako okwesimbawo mu mwaka gwa 2013 naye n’alemesebwa. Kati akomyewo era ekirindiriddwa kwe kulaba oba ku mulundi guno anaasobola okusukka emisanvu egimulindiridde.

headline: Museveni yasigala aneesiga wadde ensi yanneesamba – Gen Elwelu
text: Kampala Amyuka omuduumizi w’eggye lya UPDF omuggya, Lt Gen. Peter Elwelu, asiimye Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni olw’okusigala ng’amulinamu essuubi n’amuwa obuvunaanyizibwa buno. Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni era nga ye muduumizi w’ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda ow’okuntikko Ssabbiiti ewedde yakoze enkyukakyuka mu ggye lya UPDF n’alonda Gen. Elwelu okumyuka Gen. Wilson Mbadi eyazze mu kifo kya Gen. David Muhoozi ng’Omuduumizi w’eggye lya UPDF. Bwe yabadde akwasibwa woofiisi ku Lwokubiri e Mbuya mu Kampala, Elwelu yatenderezza Gen. Museveni olw’okumwesiga. “Njagala okwebaza Pulezidenti Museveni era omuduumizi w’amaggye ow’okuntikko olw’okunneesiga. Ne mu kiseera ng’ensi enneesambye yasigala anzikiririzaamu. ebbanga lyonna asigadde ku kkubo ely’amazima.” Elwelu bwe yannyonnyodde ku Lwokubiri. Gen. Elwelu alabikidde ku mikutu egy’enjawulo ng’awanda omuliro eri abantu ababadde bamunenya olw’okulumba n’okutta abantu e Kasese mu Lubiri lw’Omusinga Charles Wesley Mumbere. Bino byaliwo nga Elwelu ye muduumizi w’ekibinja ky’amagye ekyokubiri mu Novemba wa 2016 era gye byaggweera ng’abantu 100 babufiiriddemu. Oluvannyuma lw’obulumbaganyi buno, ab’oludda oluvuganya baddukira mu kkooti y’ensi yonna nga basaba Gen. Elwelu ne Pulezidenti Museveni avunaanibwe okutirimbula abantu bano wadde kkooti y’ensi yonna omusango yagugoba. Elwelu era y’omu ku bakulira eby’okwerinda abaateekebwako nnatt, eggwanga lya Amerika nga babavunaana olw’okulinnyirira eddembe ly’obuntu. Gye buvuddeko Elwelu yategeeza nga bw’atayinza kwetonda olw’okutta abantu e Kasese kuba baakigwanira. “Abo baali bazzi ba misango, Sirina mulala gwe natta. Baagwanira okufa kuba nze naliyo ate gwe tewaliiyo era ekyo ky’ekizibu. Ne ICC yazingyako emisango era ndya butaala, kati ggwe biki byoyogerako? Nkimanyi bwemba nkola emirimu gyange nange ku lwange mbeera nga mulamuzi era kye nkola mbeera nkimanyi y’ensonga lwaki sikirinaako buzibu.” Elwelu bwe yannyonnyola bannamawulire gye buvuddeko. Ono agamba nti emirembe egiri e Kasese kati bagirina lwakuba yasalawo nga bwe yasalawo mu 2016. Okuva Gen. Elwelu lwe yalumba Kasese, yaakakuzibwa mu maggye emirundi ebiri okuva ku ddaala lya Brigadier n’atuuka ku Lieutenant General, erimu ku gasembayo mu ggwanga. Ono era yaggyibwa ku kubeera Omuduumizi w’ekibinja ekyokubiri n’azzibwa ku kuduumira eggye ly’okuttaka erya UPDF.Kati ye mumyuka w’omuduumizi w’eggye lya UPDF, ekyongedde okukakasa obwesige Pulezidenti Museveni bw’alina mu Gen. Elwelu.

headline: DP: Tugenda kwasanguza era tuswaze ababulankanya eza COVID-19
text: Kampala Ekibiina kyaDemocratic Party (DP) kirayidde okwasanguzaabakozi ba gavumenti ababulankanya ssente za COVID-19 ezirina okuyamba abantu mu mbeera ya COVID19. Bwe babadde boogerako eri bannamawulire, omwogezi w’ekibiina kino, Okoler Opio Lo Amanu, yategeezezza nti enteekateeka eno eruubirirwa okukunga bannayuganda okukyawa abalyi b’enguzi. “Tusaba gavumenti ebonereze abo abakozesa obubi ssente za COVID-19 awatali ekyo DP egenda kutandika kaweefube gwe tutuumye ‘name and shame,” Okoler bwe yagambye. Omwezi oguwedde, Minisita w’ebyobulamu, Dr. Jane Ruth Aceng, yalabula bannabyabufuzi n’abantu ba bulijjo bakomyeokubalangira obulyake kuba bagezaako nnyo okubeera abeerufu. Aceng yategeeza eggwanga nti eby’okutiisatiisa ab’ebyobulamu kibamalamu amaanyi ate nga balina okukola ennyo okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino. DP egamba nti ekya gavumenti okusumulula mu muggalo nga tetaddewo nteekateeka emala okuziyiza ekirwadde kya Corona kiteeka eggwanga mu katyabaga k’okudda ku muggalo. Bano bagamba nti kaweefube w’okwasanguza abalyake agenda kutandika mu bwangu singa gavumenti tevaayo kuvunaana bakozi baayo bano abakozesa obubi woofiisi zaabwe n’okufiiriza eggwanga ensimbi eziwerako.

headline: Owek. Mayiga atenderezza obuweereza bw’ Omulabirizi  Ssebaggala
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga atenderezza nnyo obuweereza bw’ Omulabirizi Rt. Rev. William Ssebaggala bwakoze okumala akaseera era nasaba abantu okumulabirako. Bino Kamalabyonna Mayiga abyogeredde mu Bulange e Mmengo mu nsisinkano gyabaddemu n’ Omulabirizi Ssebaggala agenda okuwummula obuweereza buno mu mwezi gw’okubiri ogwa 2023. Owek. Mayiga ategezezza nti obwakabaka n’ekkanisa ya Uganda waliwo enkwatagana ey’omuggundu era waliwo essuubi nti agenda okumuddira mu bigere waakugikuuma. Ono atendereza omukululo gwalese nti nakakasa nti basanyufu nga Buganda olw’ omukululo gwagenda okuleka emabega. Katikkiro ategezezza nti obwakabaka bwa Buganda n’ekkanisa ya Uganda bukwatagana bulungi nga nabwekityo emirimu gyalese tejinaggwa tewali kuwannaanya agenda okumuddira mu bigere alina watandikira. Omulabirizi Ssebaggala abadde azze kuloopa lutabaalo lwabaddemu emyaka 12 ng’Omulabirizi w’e Mukono oluvannyuma lw’okudda mu bigere bya Rt. Rev. Eria Paul Luzinda mu 2010 nga 10.  Ku bugenyi buno, Omulabirizi ayaniriziddwa omukubiriza wolukiiko lwa Buganda Owek. Patrick Luwagga Mugumbule ngali ne Ssaabawolereza wa buganda Owek. Christpopher Bwanika abamutembeese okutuuka mu kkakalabizo lya Mukuumaddamula nebeesogga akafubo omutakiriziddwa bannamawulire. Ye Omulabirizi Ssebaggala yeebazizza obwakabaka owlokufuuka ekyokulabirako naddala mu by’obulamu nga Ssaabasajja yakulembeddemu kubanga basobodde okukulaakulanya obulabirizi ngobwakabaka kwebalabira bwatyo neyebaza Katikkiro olwa kawefube gwatadde mu kulima emmwanyi. Omulabirizi William Ssebagala abadde awerekeddwako mukyala we Tezira Ssebagala n’abaana baabwe babiri, yebazizza nnyo Ssaabasajja Kabaka olw’okukwata omumuli mu kuwandiika Bayibuli y’ Oluganda, omulimu ogwakulemberwamu Omulabirizi Ssebaggala.

headline: Ababaka  b’Acholi  baleeta  Hilary Onek ku bwasipiika
text: Ababaka ba Palamenti abava mu kitundu kya Acholi  bakkiriziganyiza okuleeta omubaka w’ekitundu kya Lamwo, Hillary Onek okuvuganya ku kifo kya Sipiika.  Onek mu kiseera kino ye Minisita w’ebigwa bitalaze, ensonda zitegeezezza  nti kino bakituuseeko mu lukiiko lwabwe lwe batuuzizza e Gulu gye baakungaanidde okuteekateeka okuziika kw’abadde Sipiika Jacob Oulanyah eyafiiridde mu ggwanga ly’Amerika ku Ssande.  Ensonda mu kabondo kano zigamba  nti ekifo kino kisaanye okusigala mu mikono gy’ababaka abava mu mambuka ewabadde wava Jacob Oulanyah.  Onek tannaggyayo mpapula wadde okutegeeza mu butongole oba anaavuganya ku kifo kino.  Era akabondo kano era kaagala omubaka okuli; Aber Lillian, Ojara Martin Mapenduzi ne Lamwaka okuvuganya ku bumyuka  bwasipiika.  Mu kadde kano omumyuka wa Sipiika Anita Among,  Amyuka Ssaabawolereza Jackson Kafuuzi n’Omubaka wa Arua, Atima Buti be baagala okuvuganya okudda mu bigere bya Oulanyah.

headline: NUP eyise Olusirika basalewo gwe banaawagira ku Bwasipiika
text: Kampala Bannakibiina kya National Unity Platform(NUP), bayitiddwa mu lusirika Ssabbiiti ewedde okusalawo ani gwe banaasimbawo oba okuwagira ku Bwasipiika anaakubiriza Palamenti y’e 11. Abamu ku babaka abawangulira ku kkaadi ya NUP  Kino kibikkuddwa Omubaka John Baptist Nambeshe, omumyuka wa Pulezidenti w’ekibiina avunaanyizibwa ku buvanjuba bw’eggwanga, bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku kitebe kya NUP e Kamwokya. “Ssabbiiti ejja tugenda kubeera n’Olusirika era emu ku nsonga ezigenda okuteesebwako lwe Lwokaano lwa Sipiika.  Tukkiriza nti ng’ekibiina tujja kuvaayo n’okusalawo oluvannyuma lw’Olusirika luno era tujja kubategeeza ekinaasalibwawo.” Nambeshe bw’ategeezezza. Nambeshe agamba nti abantu basuubire ekyewuunyisa ku muntu aba NUP gwe bagenda okusalawo ku Bwasipiika mu kifo okusukka ku ky’abamu okulowooza nti NUP eyinza okuwagira omu ku bali mu lwokaano. Ono ategeezezza nti ekibiina kyabwe tekitundibwa era tekigenda kukozesebwa muntu yenna ayagala okutuukiriza ebintu bye nga Ssekinnoomu. Nambeshe annyonnyodde nti baakuteesa ku nsonga y’abantu baabwe abaawambibwa abakyalemedde mu mikono gy’abeebyokwerinda. Ate amyuka Pulezidenti mu Buganda, Mathias Mpuuga, agamba nti ng’ekibiina bawaddeyo Ssabbiiti eno Entukuvu si kujjukira Yesu Kristo yekka naye baakusabira abantu baabwe abali mu buwambe mu masomero mu bitundu ebyenjawulo. “Tusaba bannaddiini okutweyungako tusabire abawagizi baffe wonna webali. Nga tujjukira Yesu Kristo, tujjukire n’abo abatalina musango abali mu makomera n’abo abattiddwa awatali musango.” Mpuuga bw’annyonnyodde. Bino we bijjidde ng’akulira ekibiina kya NUP, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine ng’ali bweru wa ggwanga ku mirimu emitongole.

headline: Obwakabaka bwakukwatagana n’ebibiina by’obweggasi okutumbula emmwanyi
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bwakukwatagana n’ebibiina by’obwegassi binnansangwa okwongera okutumbula ekirime ky’emmwanyi mu Buganda, kisobozese okuagoba obwavu mu bantu ba Buganda ne Uganda. Katikkiro Mayiga n’ abeebitibwa wamu naba Masaka Cooperative Union Bino byogeddwa Kamalabyonna wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, bw’abadde asisinkanye ab’ekibiina ky’obwegassi ekya Masaka Cooperative Union mu Bulange e Mmengo leero ku Lwokubiri. Owek. Mayiga agambye nti Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka, azze abalagira okuzzaawo ebibiina by’obwegassi era nga guno gwe gwali omulamwa Amatikkira ga 26 mu 2019 kwe gaatambulira. “Ffe ng’abakulembera Obwakabaka, kye tulowooza kwe kukolagana n’ebibiina by’obwegassi ebiriwo nga Masaka Cooperative Union. Tutambulize wamu kaweefube w’ebibiina bino eby’obwegassi naddala bino ebyaffe ebyedda, Masaka Cooperative Union, Wamala Cooperative Union East ne West Mmengo Cooperative Union.” Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Ono agambye nti kiyinza okuba nga Buganda teyeetaaga kutandika bibiina bipya naye basobola okukola olukiiko olubataba ne bakkaanya ku ngeri y’okutambuzaamu ensonga. Katikkiro Mayiga nga alaga emmwanyi ezikolebwa aba Masaka Cooperatives Union Kamalabyonna Mayiga alambuludde nti oluvannyuma lw’okwagazisa abantu okulima emmwanyi n’okuzitumbula, kati balina okuzisuubula ku balimi bano, bazigatteko omutindo wamu n’okuzitunda ebweru. Ababuulidde nti baamaze dda okutondawo kkampuni ya Emmwanyi Terimba Ltd ng’eno y’egenda okukwatagana n’ebibiina bino awamu n’abalimi. Mayiga atenderezza omulimu ogwakolebwa Masaka Union, okuyamba Uganda ne Buganda era n’asiima ebimu ku bikulu bye basobodde okukola wakati mu bizibu bye bayitamu. Agambye nti enteekateeka ya Emmwanyi Terimba erimu ebirala okuli; okulima emmere n’okulunda, kibasobozese okufunamu emmere wamu n’okuliikiriza ettaka erikaddiye, wadde nga baasooka kusoosoowaza mmwanyi. Katikkiro Mayiga abakubirizza okufaayo ku mutindo gw’emmwanyi kubanga ebbeeyi kwe zigulibwa ku katale k’ensi yonna, esinziira ku mutindo. Ssentebe w’ekibiina kya Masaka Cooperative Union, Joseph Kavuma Mwanje, alaze Mukuumaddamula ebimu ku bye bakola era n’amubuulira n’okusoomoozebwa kwe basanga. Kavuma ku lwa banne, asuubizza okwongera okukolagana n’Obwakabaka basobole okuganyulwamu. Ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwamu Omumyuka Owoookubiri owa Katikkiro, Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa, Minisita Mayanja Nkalubo, Minisita Amis Kakomo n’abalala.

headline: COVID-19: Gavumenti Eyimirizza Bannayuganda Abakomawo Mu Ggwanga
text: Abamu ku Bannauganda nga batuuka ku kisaawe Entebbe Gavumenti eyimirizza okudda kwa Bannayuganda abakonkomalidde mu mawanga amalala olw’ekirwadde kya Coronavirus. Okusinziira ku kiwandiiko ekifulumiziddwa minisitule y’ensonga z’ebunaayira, okuva enkya nga July 4, teri muntu yenna agenda kukkirizibwa kuyingira ggwanga oluvannyuma lw’ebifo gyebakuumibwa biyite kalantiini okujjula. Minisitule ekola ku nsonga z’ebyobulamu yassaawo ebifo 37 mu Kampala ne Entebbe abantu bano gyebalina okukuumibwa nga birina ebisenge ebisulwamu 2500. Kiteeberezebwa nti abantu abasukka 1500 be bagenda okukosebwa enteekateeka eno. Bano bali mu mawanga nga Qatar, UAE, China ne Malaysia. Bano babadde basuubirwa okutuuka mu ggwanga wiiki eno. Ambassador Patrick Mugoya, omuwandiisi owenkalakkalira mu minisitule y’ensonga z’ebweru yategeezezza nti bajja kuddamu okukkiriza Bannayuganda okudda okwaboobwe, oluvannyuma lwa minisitule y’ebyobulamu okukola kwabo abaamaze okudda mu ggwanga. Kyali kirowoozebwa nti buli sabbiiti bbiri, abantu 300 bebagenda okudda mu ggwanga naye mu sabbiiti emu yokka, abantu abasukka mu 300 bebaakomyewo mu ggwanga. Bano bonna balina okuteekebwa mu kalantiini okumala sabbiiti bbiri. Abo abakomyewo bava mu mawanga nga South Africa, Turkey, India, United Kingdom, Switzerland, Italy, Sudan ne United Arab Emirates. Enkya Bannayuganda okuva e New Dehli mu India basuubirwa okuttuka mu ggwanga. Kwabo abaakadda, 13 basangiddwamu ekirwadde kya coronavirus. URN

headline: Ssaabalabirizi Kaziimba akungubagidde Omulabirizi  Magezi
text: Kampala Ssaabalabirizi Stephen Samuel Kaziimba akungubagidde omulabirizi wa North Kigezi, Rt. Rev Benon Magezi. Magezi yafudde kawungeezi k’eggulo oluvannyuma lwa Ssabbiiti nnamba ng’azuuliddwamu ekirwadde kya COVID-19 n’atwalibwa mu ddwaliro ekkulu e Mbarara gy’abadde ajjanjabirwa. Magezi yatuuzibwa ng’Omulabirizi nga January 8, 2017 ku Lutikko ya Emmanuel Cathedral, Kinyasano, Rukungiri. Okusinziira ku Ssaabalabirizi Kaziimba, ono abadde yakatongoza enteekateeka y’okugaziya Lutikko eno okwongera okubunyisa obukulisitaayo mu kitundu kino. Amwogeddeko ng’omusajja eyakuzibwa nga mukulisitaayo era abadde tasubwa kusaba awamu n’abennyumba ye. Magezinga tannalondebwa nga Bisoopu ye yali omuwanika w’Obulabirizi bwa North Kigezi. Bino we bijjidde nga Minisitule y’ebyobulamu yaakamala okukakasa nga bannayuganda abawera 25 baafudde ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ku Ssande nga June 13, 2021. Okusinziira ku Minisitule eno, kati omuwendo gw’abafudde ekirwadde kino okuva mu myezi gwa March omwaka oguwedde ekirwadde kino lwe kyalangirirwa bawera 459. Omugenzi Magezi alese Nnamwandu Gladys Magezi n’abaana bataano.

headline: Abaali bawambibwa bazuuliddwa mu bibira e Masaka
text: Bya Jesse Lwanga Abavubuka bataano abagambibwa okuwambibwa emyezi ebiri emabega ng’eggwanga ligenda okulonda bamaze ne bazuulibwa nga babasudde mu bibira by’e Masaka. Kino kiddiridde ab’enganda z’abavubuka abawera 15 okutandika okwekalakaasa nga babanja abavubuka bano. Abamu ku bavubuka nga bannyonnyola ebyabatuusiddwako  Bano kuliko; Kiberu Julius‚ Kagimu Twaha ddereeva wa taxi e Kabembe‚ Mukasa Juma ne Naheru Mohamed era bano bonna tubasanze ku kyalo Kabembe mu ggombolola y’e Kyampisi mu Mukono.  Abavubuka bano balumiriza okukwatibwa abasajja abaalina emmundu era nga bano babalagira okulinnya emmotoka era bwe batyo ne batwalibwa mu bifo bye tamanyi wakati mu kutulugunyizibwa n’okubwa emiggo. Ye Kiberu Julius agamba tagenda kwerabira engeri gy’abadde aliira ku muguwa ng’embuzi nga kw’otadde n’omusiba akakookolo okumala emyezi ebiri. Ono agamba nti wakati mu kutulugunyizibwa yafuna n’olubale ku mutwe era awulira obulumi bungi. Balumiriza nti waliwo ekizimbe mwe babadde bakuumirwa era mulimu n’abantu abalala abasoba mu ana (40) era ng’ekifo kino kitiisa olw’emiranga egikwaniriza ng’otuuseeyo. Bano bagamba nti baabavuze mu kiro ku ssaawa nga 8 ez’ekiro ne babasuula mu bibira ebyenjawulo mu Masaka era bwe batyo baatandise okutambula ekiwalazima okutuusa lwe bafunye ababayamba. Ssentebe w’ekyalo Kisowera, Abbey Bitwaalo, agamba nti abavubuka bangi baawambibwa olw’enjawukana mu ndowooza z’ebyobufuzi nga kino kyalabikira nnyo mu kitundu kya Mukono North era naye yafuna abaamutiisatiisa. Ono asabye abali ku gw’okuwamba abantu bwe baba baliko omusango gwe bazza, batwalibwe mu kkooti oba si kyo bayimbulwe kuba eggwanga lyonna balitadde ku bunkenke.

headline: Minisita Kiyimba akunze abantu beegemese Corona
text: Busiro Minisita wa Buganda ow’ebyamawulire, Noah Kiyimba, akunze abantu okwegemesa ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona nga balabira ku kabonero ka Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka awamu ne Nnaabagereka Sylvia Nagginda. Bino Owek. Kiyimba abyogeredde mu kusaba okwenjawulo okujjukira obulamu bw’Omugenzi Boaz Muwanga eyali omukozi mu kitongole kya Buganda Land Board olwaleero bw’abadde akiikiridde, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga e Kikandwa mu Wakiso. “Ssaabasajja Kabaka olunaku lw’eggulo bamugemye ne maama Nnaabagereka. Obanga Nnyinimu ne Maama wamu n’abomulubiri bonna babagemye olwo ffe baani,” Owek. Noah bw’annyonnyodde. Mu kutuusa obubaka bwa Katikkiro, Owek. Noah, ayogedde ku mugenzi Muwanga ng’eyali omukozi ennyo era eyayamba okutuukiriza obulungi emirimu gye mu kiseera nga n’Eggwanika teryalimu nsimbi zimala kutambuza mirimu. Eyakulembeddemu okusaba kuno, Omubuulizi  w’e Bunnamwaya, Robert  Kitaka, asabye abantu okwezza obuggya era bafube okuleka omukululo abantu basobole okubaako bye babajjukirako. Kinajjukirwa nti Omugenzi Boaz Kibirige yaweereza Obwakabaka emyaka  egisukka mu 10 kyokka nga yafa mu mwaka oguwedde era olw’ekirwadde kya Corona yaziikibwa abantu ba lubatu bwe batyo abooluganda kwe kutegeka okusaba okwenjawulo okumujjukira. Owaakasolya k’e Mmamba Kakoboza, Omutaka Nnankere Moses Kanoonya, akubiriza abakerekere okubeera obumu, okwagala eggwanga lyabwe era beerinde ekirwadde kya  Ssennyiga Corona.

headline: Obubaka bwa Kabaka obw’ Amazuukira
text: Twegatta ku bantu ba Katonda mwenna okujaguza Amazuukira ga Mukama waffe Yesu Kristu ag’omwaka 2021. Omwaka oguwedde, tetwasobola kwetaba ffena mu masinzizo, olw’embeera y’obulwadde bwa covid-19, obwasaanyalaza eggwanga lyonna mu bintu ebitali bimu. Tusaasira bannaffe abalwadde n’abafiiriddwa abantu baabwe olw’obulwadde bwa covid-19. Tubasaba okugondera endagiriro z’abasawo ezituyamba obutakwatibwa bulwadde buno. Tubakulisa okulonda kw’abakulembeze baffe okubaddewo ku ntandikwa y’omwaka guno. Tusaba Katonda okukkakkanya abo bonna abakyalina obusungu, obuswavu n’obulumi okwekuba mu kifuba era bamanye nti, eddembe lya ssekinnoomu okulonda omuntu gw’oyagadde. Tusaba obwenkanya mu misango gyonna egyekuusa ku by’okulonda okuwedde n’okuteebwa kwabo bonna abali mu makomera nga balangibwa endowooza zaabwe ez’ebyobufuzi. Amazuukira gatujjukiza okuyiika kw’omusaayi, okubonyaabonyezebwa, okwewaayo n’amaziga ebyavaamu okununula kw’ensi. Kitukakatako naffe okwewaayo bulijjo mu bwesimbu okubonaabonera abalala mu bye tukola. Kyokka twewuunya nnyo okulaba ng’ebikolebwa mu ggwanga lyaffe, naddala ensangi zino, tebyesigamizibwa ku babonaabona olw’abalala. Kitukwasa ennaku okulaba ngabakulembeze bakyalemedde mu bikolwa eby’obunnanfuusi, obwennakyemalira, amaddu, obukuusa, okwekkusa n’okwekuza ku bitali byabwe. Tubakubiriza obutasaabulula omulamwa gw’okuzuukira ng’abantu bamalibwako eddembe lyabwe. Tubaagaliza Amazuukira ag’Essanyu n’Emirembe.

headline: Ababaka baagala  Ssaabawolereza Kiwanuka yeetonde olw’okuwakanya ekya gavumenti okuwamba abantu n’ n’okubatulugunya
text: Abamu ku babaka ba Palamenti batadde Ssaabawolereza w’eggwanga Kiryowa Kiwanuka ku nninga nga baagala yeetondere eggwanga olw’okusaagira mu bulamu bwa bannansi awamu nokudaalira famire z’ abantu ababuzibwawo n’okutulugunyizibwa. Ababaka bagamba nti Kiryowa Kiwanuka bweyali mu lukung’aana lw’ amawanga amagatte olw’omulundi ogwe 75 ku kutulugunya n’okutyoboola eddembe ly’obuntu yawakanya ekya gavumenti okubeera n’ebifo mwekuumira abantu abagiwakanya ebimanyiddwa nga ‘Safe House’ n’okutulugunya bannansi nga agamba si bituufu wadde nga akimanyi nti weebiri wano. Kiryowa Kiwanuka yategeeza akakiiko kano nga Uganda bwevumirira ennyo ebikolwa by’okutulugunya abantu n’okulinyirira eddembe ly’obuntu kubanga tebiri mu mateeka era Ssemateeka abigaanira ddala era ababikola babikola ku lwabwe. Ssaabawolereza Kiwanuka agamba nti gavumenti ya Uganda ebonereza abo bonna abasangibwa nga beenyigidde mu bikolwa bino era gavumenti yeemu eriyiridde abantu abawerako kkooti bezikakasizza nti baatulugunyizibwa. Ababaka okuli owa Bukonzo West, Atkins Katusabe nowa Bbale, Charles Tebandeke bagamba nti buno Kiryowa Kiwanuka asaasaanya bulimba bwenyini kuba bannayuganda bangi bafunye obuleme oluvannyuma lw’okutulugunyizibwa ate nga bangi babifiiriddemu. Ye omubaka omukyala owa disitulikiti ye Luweero, Brenda Nabukenya yategeezezza nga ebigambo bya Ssaabawolereza Kiwanuka bwebiraga gavumenti etakolera wadde okulumirirwa bannansi nga ebyeddembe ly’obuntu tebibakwatako. Bino webijjidde nga ab’ekibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP) bakyalumiriza gavumenti bwekyakwata abawagizi babwe nga bangi bafunye enkozi, abalala balemadde ate nga abamu balufiiriddemu.

headline: Bobi Wine alumbye Pulezidenti Museveni ku kuwagira okutulugunya bannansi
text: Kyaggwe Akwatidde ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu(Bobi Wine), alumbye Pulezidenti Museveni ku bigambo bye yayogedde ng’avumirira abeekalakaasa n’okubalabula obutakiddira. Bobi Wine nga atabaala Nakifuma Kyagulanyi bw’abadde anoonya akalulu mu bitundu by’e Mukono ku Mmande, agambye nti aba NRM bapangisa abavubuka ne babagatta mu bawagizi baabwe okukola effujjo ku poliisi n’amagye okubavumaganya. Kino kiddiridde Pulezidenti Museveni eggulo bwe yabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga, okulabula abeekalakaasi abakuba abapoliisi okukikomya era n’awagira ekya bakuumaddembe abakuba amasasi mu okwetaasa oluvannyuma lw’okukwata Kyagulanyi eyali e Luuka mu Busoga ng’anoonya akalulu. “Museveni yabadde ku ttivvi jjo n’agamba nti agenda kusasula abantu be battidde abantu baabwe naye abantu b’e Nakifuma ka mbabuuze, omuntu ayinza kusasula ssente mmeka okukuttira owuwo.” Kyagulanyi bw’abuuzizza abawagizi be. Kyagulanyi ategeezezza ab’e Nakifuma okunyweza obumu nga tebafudde ku mawanga g’abantu kubanga bonna ebibaluma bye bimu. Ab’eno Kyagulanyi abagambye nti olutalo lw’okuggya Museveni ku buyinza lugenda kubaamu okufiirwa n’okwelekereza era n’abakunga obutakomya kubanja ddembe lyabwe. Kyagulanyi yayaniriziddwa ebikumi n’ebikumi by’abantu e Nakifuma, yavuddewo bubi n’abakuumaddembe obwedda abamugaana okukozesa enguudo zimwasa njala nga bagamba nti kijja kuleetawo akalipaggano k’ebidduka mu kitundu kino. Abamu ku balonzi e Nakifuma Kyagulanyi bamusabye olutuuka mu ntebe asooke abakolerere ku by’obulamu, ebyenguudo wamu n’okubagobako obwavu obuyitiridde mu byalo byabwe.

headline: Munnayuganda  Cheptegei awangudde  zzaabu mu z’abasajja eza mmita 5000
text: Munnayuganda omuddusi w’emisinde emiwanvu,Joshua Cheptegei, awangulidde Uganda omudaali gwa zzaabumu misinde gya mmita 5000 egibadde mu Olympic Stadium e Japan ku Lwokuna. Cheptegeieyasooka okulemererwa okuwangula zzaabu mu misinde gya mmita 10000 bwe yatuuka ku kaguwa muddakiika 12:58:15 n’akwata ekyokubiri. Bannayuganda okuli; Jacob Kiplimo ne Oscar Chelimo, bakutte kyakutaano n’ekya 16. Guno gwe mudaali gwa zzaabu ogwokubiri, Uganda gw’efunye nga ogwasoose gwawanguddwa Peruth Chemutai mu mpaka z’abakyala eza mmita 3000 eza Steeplechase. Kati Uganda ewezezza emidaali 4 mu mpaka z’omwaka guno okuli; ffeeza eyawanguddwa Cheptegei n’ogwekikomo ogwawanguddwa Kiplimo.

headline: Dr Besigye akungubagidde  Gen Tumwine, asabye bannayuganda obutamusalira musango
text: Akulira ekisinde ki People’s Front for Transition (PFT), Dr Kizza Besigye akungubagidde Gen Elly Tumwine eyafudde wiiki ewedde era nabasaba bannayuganda obutamusalira musango kwebyo ebyamusobako. Okusaba kuno Besigye yakukoledde mu Kampala bweyabadde ayogerako ne bannamawulire ku Lwomukaaga. “Ndowooza twewale okusalira abantu omusango naddala ng’omuntu amaze okufa kuba mu kiseera kino buli kimu kibeera kisigadde mu mikono gya Katonda,” Dr Besigye bw’annyonnyodde. Besigye agamba sikya buntu abamu okujaganya nga waliwo afudde nasaba abakikola okweddako. Okusinziira ku Besigye kizibu okumanya omuntu enkolagana gyabadde alina ne Katonda mu kadde wafiiridde kuba wadde oli abadde yeeyisa bubi naye ate asobola okufa nga yeenenyeza. Besigye annyonnyodde nti ennono y’obwenkanya ewa omuntu ayogerwako eddembe okwewozaako naye ate kino tekisoboka ku muntu abeera afudde. Gen. Tumwine yafiira Nairobi ku Lwokuna gyeyali atwaliddwa okujjanjabwa oluvannyuma lw’okumala ekiseera nga atawaanyizibwa ekirwadde kya kkookolo. Oluvannyuma lw’amawulire g’okufa kwa Tumwine okusaasaanya obubaka obwenjawulo bwatandika okuva mu bannayuganda omuli obwali busaasira ate obulala bwali bukudaala nabamu okulaga nti tebanyoleddwa. Besigye ategeezezza nti wadde bannayuganda bawulira nti batwaliddwako buli kimu gavumenti ya NRM olw’engeri gyebayisizaamu naye tebalina kusanyukira kufa kwa muntu. Bw’abadde ayogera ku mugenzi naddala kwebyo byeyakola mu lutalo lw’ emyaka 5 olwaleeta NRA mu buyinza nga yali muntu wa mpisa era omukozi ekyo.

headline: Abayizi 3855 be bafunye embuto mu muggalo e Luweero
text: Luweero Abayizi 3855 be baakafuna embuto mu ttundutundu ly’e Luweero okuva Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni lwe yaggala amasomero ng’agezaako okutangira ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ekyali kitandise okulonda mu bitundu by’eggwanga eby’enjawulo.  Ettundutundu lya Luweero litwalira disitulikiti okuli; Luweero, Nakaseke ne Nakasongola naye ng’eno yonna abakugu bagamba nti omuze guno gususse.Ebibalo biraga nti abawala 3855 abali mu myaka egisoma, abasajja basedduvuto babafunyisa embuto mu bbanga ly’emyezi omukaaga gye babadde ku muggalo. Abatwala eby’abaana mu kitundu kino bategeezezza nti Luweero ekyakutte kisooka mu kubeeramu abayizi abafunye embuto ng’erina abawala 2082, Nakasongola erina 922 ate Nakaseke neddako n’abayizi 851.Kino kireeseewo obweraliikirivu nti wakati ng’abayizi abamalako emitendera egy’enjawulo baddamu okusoma, abamu mu kitundu kino bandiremwa okudda ku ssomero okutuukiriza ebirooto byabwe olw’okutya okusekererwa olw’okufuna embuto wamu n’abazadde okugaana okubazzaayo. Omuwandiisi w’akakiiko k’ebyenjigiriza mu Luweero, Zenar Nasur agambye nti bakizudde nti basedduvutto bakozesa akaseera abaana bano we balekebwa awaka bokka okubasendasenda nebabafunyisa embuto. Nasur agasseeko nti bye baazuula biraga ng’abaana abasinze okukosebwa beebo ababeera ne bajjajja awamu n’abeng’anda nga bano babawa eddembe erisusse. Abamu ku baana bano o be yasanze ku malwaliro ag’enjawulo nga banywa eddagala, baagaanye okubaako kye boogera ku nsonga eno wabula omu ku batuuze Joseph Mugabe alumiriza obuzibu okuva ku muze gw’okuganza abaana abataneetuuka ogususse mu kitundu kino. Akulira ebyenjigiriza mu disitulikiti y’e Nakaseke, Stephen Batanudde, asabye abayizi okudda ku ssomero bamalirize emisomo ne yeeyama nti gavumenti ejja kusobola okubawa obukuumi wabula n’alaga obweraliikirivu olw’okuba nti abamu ku baana bano baayingidde dda obufumbo. Omwaka oguwedde, abayizi 123 baalemererwa okutuula ebibuuzo ebimalako P.7 oluvannyuma lw’okufuna embuto mu kitundu kino era ng’akulira ensonga z’abaana e Nakasongola, Irene Ssanyu, alumiriza aba Boodabooda n’eng’anda okuvaako kalunsambulira ono. Maama Nnaabagereka Sylvia Nagginda bwe yali ayogerako eri eggwanga ku lunaku lw’omwana omuwala, yasaba abantu bonna okusitukiramu bayambe ku baana abawala okutuukiriza ebirooto byabwe.  Nnaabagereka yalabula abasajja okukomya okuganza abayizi bano n’okubafiiriza ebiseera byabwe eby’omu maaso. Alipoota y’ekitongole ky’ebigezo mu ggwanga ekya Uganda National Examination Board (UNEB) eraga nti abayizi abawera obukadde 5 be baakalemererwa okumalako ekibiina kya P.7 mu myaka 20 agayise, ng’entabwe eva ku kufuna mbuto.

headline: Aba Bobi Wine balemeseddwa okukuba olukungaana e Gulu
text: Tony Kitara okulira Wooteeri ya De Covenant olukungaana gyerubadde lugenda okubeera   URN Abawagizi b’omubaka wa palamenti akiikirira Kyaddondo ey’obuvanjuba ng’ono ayagala kuvuganya ku kifo kyamukulembeze w’eggwanga balemeseddwa okukuba olukungaana lwabwe e Gulu. Okusinziira ku mubaka wa pulezidenti e Gulu, Maj. Santos Okot Lapolo, abawagizi ba Bobi Wine akulira ekisinde ky’ebyobubufuzi ekya People Power, baalemereddwa okutuukiriza obukwakkulizo nga bwebaalagirwa akulira Poliisi mu ggwanga Martin Okoth-Ochola nga bagoberera etteeka erirungamya enkugaana erya Public Order Management Act. Bino nga tebinabaawo, Kyagulanyi yabadde yategeezezza bannamawulire mu Kampala nti yabadde asazizzaamu okugenda e Gulu oluvanyuma lw’abebyokwerinda okutiisatiisa abawagizibe. Maj. Lapolo yanyoyodde nti olukiiko lw’abebyokwerinda n’akulira wooteeri ya De Covenant, Tonny Kitara, wamu n’abantu ba Bobi Wine, baazudde emiwaatwa mu nteekateeka muli n’okulemererwa okulaga nti ekifo olukungaana werwabadde lugenda okubeera weekusifu bulungi. Wabula  Tonny Olanya Olenge, omukwanaganya wa People Power mu kitundu kye Acholi yagambye nti baafunye ekifo ekirala wabula nga ab’ebyokwerinda nebagaana okukirambula okulaba nga kisaana. Omubaka w’ekibuga ky’e Mityana Francis Zaake Butebi omu kubaabadde bamaze okutuuka e Gulu yanakuwalidde nnyo ab’ebyokwerinda okulemesa olukungaana lwabwe. Eggulo, Bobi Wine era yalemeseddwa okukuba olukungaana lw’e Gayaza nga poliisi egamba nti yabadde tatuukirizza obumu kubukwakkulizo b’okukuba olukungaana. Muno mwabaddemu obutaba na kabuyonjo abantu mwebanagenda, saako obuuma obukebera bbomu. Poliisi era yagambye nti Bobi Wine teyakkirizibbwa kutegeka nkungaana mu bibangirizi wabula mu bifo ebyekusifu nga wooteri.

headline: Sodo awangudde omusango gw’okumumma kkaadi
text: Kampala Kkooti enkulu mu Kampala esazizzaamu ekiragiro ky’ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM) olw’okugaana okuwa Sodo Aine Kaguta bbendera y’ekibiina gye yali awangudde mu kamyufu ka Mawogola North. Sodo Aine nga ayogerako eri abawagizi be Omulamuzi Musa Ssekaana bw’abadde awa ensala ye ku Mmande, agambye nti kyali kikyamu akakiiko akakola ku kwemulugunya ne Ssaabawandiisi wa NRM okusazaamu obuwanguzi bwa Sodo nga beesigama ku nsala y’akakiiko eyalimu ebirumira. Sodo yalumiriza nga bw’ataweebwa mukisa kwewozaako ng’akakiiko kasalawo okumuggyako kkaadi era okusinziira ku mulamuzi Ssekaana kino aba NRM tebaakiwakanyizza. Sodo yali yawaabira ekibiina kya NRM ne munne bwe bavuganya ku bubaka bwa Mawogola North, Shartsi Nayebare Kutesa Musherure ng’agamba nti yawangula kkaadi mu mazima kyokka ekibiina ne kirangirira nti tekisimbyewo muntu mu Mawogola North. Kinajjukirwa nti mu mwezi gw’Omwenda eyakulira okulonda kwa NRM mu disitulikiti y’e Ssembabule, George William Katokoozi, yalangirira Sodo Aine Kaguta ku buwanguzi n’obululu 17343 ate Shartsi nafuna 16104, ng’omugate gwali gwa 1239 sodo gwe yasinza Shartsi ate Kisekka Salim n’abuukayo 4274. Oluvannyuma Musherure yaddukira mu kakiiko akaateekebwawo okutunula mu kwemulugunya kuno wabula ate akakiiko k’ekibiina ak’oku ntikko akamanyiddwa nga CEC kaalangirira ng’ekibiina bwe kitasimbyewo muntu mu kitundu kino kkooti ky’egambye nti kyali kikyamu. Bw’abadde ayogera ku nsala ya kkooti, Sodo asabye abawagizi be okusigala ku mulamwa gw’okunoonya akalulu basobole okuwangula akalulu. Okulonda kw’ekitundu kino kwasooka kwongezebwayo emirundi ebiri oluvannyuma lw’abawagizi okuva ku njuyi zombi okwegwa mu malaka.

headline: Bobi Wine agamba eby’okukuza Muhoozi bamusembereza ntebe ya bwapulezidenti
text: Akulira ekibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi (Bobi Wine) agamba ekya Museveni okukuza mutabani we Lt Gen Muhoozi Kainerugaba namutuusa ku ddaala lya Genero omujjuvu kigendereddwamu kumusembereza ntebe ya bwapulezidenti. Bino Kyagulanyi yabyogedde wakayita ssaawa busaawa nga Pulezidenti Museveni agobye mutabani we ku kifo ky’omudduumizi w’eggye ly’okuttaka wabula ate namukuza okufuuka Genero. Kainerugaba, Museveni yamusikizza Lt Gen Kayanja Muhanga. Bweyabadde ayogera ku nkyukakyuka zino, Kyagulanyi yagambye nti, “Oluvannyuma lw’okuteeka obubaka obw’ekiralu ku Twitter natiisatiisa Kenya ku Mmande, Pulezidenti Museveni asazeewo awe mutabani we ekirabo kya Genero. Ono mu bwangu agenda kuwummuzibwa akakatibwe ku bannansi nga Pulezidenti w’eggwanga, abo bonna abaagaliza Uganda ebirungi kino balina okukigaana.” Kyagulanyi agamba nti Museveni ne mutabani we bebali emabega w’okulinyirira eddembe ly’obuntu era nga bebasinga okukifunamu kuba Uganda baagala gitambuza nga bwebagala. Ono asabye amawanga g’abazungu okukomya okuteeka ssente mu gavumenti ya Museveni kuba tezigasa bannansi wabula gavumenti ezikozesa kubatulugunya nga kino kirina okukoma okutaasa ebiseera bya Uganda eby’omu maaso. Enkyukakyuka zino ezaakoleddwa zavudde ku Muhoozi okusinziira ku mutimbagano gwe ogwa Twitter nategeeza nti ye n’abajaasi be beetaaga wiiki 2 zokka nga bamaze okuwamba ekibuga ekikulu ekya Kenya ki Nairobi. Kino kyatabudde abantu abawerako era nga bangi basoose kulowooza nti waliwo abayingidde mu kibanja kye wabula oluvannyuma yakakasizza nti obubaka buno yeyabutaddeyo naye yabadde asaaga.

headline: Gavumenti erabudde abanaagingirira sitiika z’emmotoka
text: Gen Katumba-Wamala Minisita avunanyibwa ku by’enguudo n’entambula Gen Edward Katumba Wamala alabudde abantu bonna banaagezaako okujingirira sitiika z’emotoka ezaagabiddwa abantu n’ebitongole eby’enjawulo abakkiriziddwa okusigala nga bazikozesa.  Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Museveni kuntandikwa ya ssabbiiti eno, yawera emmotoka zonna okutambula mu kaweefube w’okulwanyisa ensaasaana y’ekirwadde kya COVID-19.  Wamala yagambye nti sitiika zaabwe baazitaddemu ebintu ebikizibuwaza okuzijingirira.  “Oyo yenna gwetunaakwata ne sitiika enjigirire, emmotokaye tugenda kugiwamba ppaka ennaku pulezidenti zeyateekawo okulwanyisa COVID nga ziweddeyo ate oluvanyuma tubatwale mu kkooti,” Katumba bweyagambye.  Yagasseeko nti abo abaweereddwa sitiika  tebakkirizibwa kufuluma bitundu bya Kampala n’emirirwano ng’oyo yenna ayagala okufuluma Kampala n’emirirwano, ateekeddwa okusaba olukusa okuva eri minisita avunanyizibwa ku by’entambula. Uganda woosomera bino ng’erimu abalwadde ba COVID-19 44.

headline: Kabaka aggaddewo empaka z’emipiira gy’ebika by’abaganda e Buddu.
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka nga abuuza ku bazannyi b’omupiira gw’ebika by’aBaganda e Kkobe ne Mbogo mu kisaawe e Masaka mu Buddu.  Omupiira guno gubadde wakati w’ekika ky’Embogo n’e Kkobe wali e Masaka mu Recration Ground.  Omupiira gugenze okugwa nga Embogo ewangudde empaka z’omupiira gw’ebika by’abaganda bw’ekubye e Kkobe goolo 1-0, eteebeddwa Nelson Ssenkatuuka. Ate mu bakyala e Nnyonyi e Nnyange ekubye e Mmamba.Ssaabasajja akwasizza abawanguzi engabo wamu n’emidaali.  Ssaabasajja Kabaka nga akwaasa ab’ekika kye Mbogo e Ngabo oluvanyuma lw’oluwangula e mipiira gy’ebikaTiimu y’ekika kye Mbogo nga bajaganya oluvanyuma lw’okukwasibwa engabo wali e Masaka mu Buddu.Ssaabasajja Kabaka, omumyuka wa Pulezidenti Edward Kiwanuka Ssekandi, Katikkiro wa Buganda ne Minisita w’ebyemizannyo mu Bwakabaka Owek. Henry Sekabembe nga bambaza tiimu y’abawala emidaali wali e Masaka mu Buddu.

headline: Kabaka yeetabye ku mukolo gw’ennyimba z’Amazaalibwa ga Yesu Kristo
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II asiimye okusanyusibwa abaweereza be okuva mu bitongole eby’enjawulo mu kivvulu ky’ennyimba z’amazaalibwa ga Yesu Kristo e Bulange -Mmengo akawungeezi konna ak’Olwokutaano. Beene azze ne Nnaabagereka Sylvia Nagginda, Nnaabagereka Sylivia Nagginda, Nnaalinnya Lubuga Agnes Nabaloga, Omulangira David Kintu Wassajja ne Ssaabaganzi, nebaanirizibwa Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga n’abakungu abalala. Era bw’atudde ku Nnamulondo, Omukolo ne gutandika n’okusabaokukulembeddwamu Ssaabasumba w’essaza enkulu erya Kampala, Paul Ssemogerere eyeebazizza omutonzi olw’okuyisa Buganda mu mbeera ez’enjawulo ezibadde zigisoomooza.  Oluvannyuma Kkwaya ez’enjawulo ziyimbye ennyimba z’amazaalibwa nga mu zino mubaddemu ez’abaana b’abakozi, St. Francis Xavier e Bweyogerere, abakozi awamu n’ezivudde mu bitundu eby’enjawulo. Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ategeezezza nti guno gwe mukolo ogwokubiri nga bajaguliza mu mbeera y’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. Owek. Mayiga annyonnyodde Omuteregga ng’abantu be bwe bajjumbidde enteekateeka za Buganda ez’enjawulo ng’Oluwalo, Emmwanyi Terimba n’endala. Wano Mayiga ayanjulidde Kabaka abakoziabasinze banne awamu n’ekitongole ekisinze.  Ekitongole kya Nnamulondo Investments kye kisinze ne kiddirira BBS Terefayina olwo Buganda Land Board n’ekwata ekyokusatu era bano baweereddwa ebirabo eby’enjawulo. Omutanda era asiimye n’akoleeza omuti gwa Ssekukkulu n’oluvannyuma n’akwasa abaami b’amasaza emmotoka kapyata kika kya Harrier okubayambako okutambuza emirimu. Nnyinimu oluvannyuma asiimye n’agabula Obuganda n’ekijjulo kya Cceeki era n’asiima okwekubya ebifaananyi n’abagenyi be ab’enjawulo.

headline: Nabillah Naggayi awangudde kkaadi ya NUP ku Bwaloodimmeeya
text: Kamwokya Omubaka wa Kampala omukyala Nabillah Naggayi Ssempala, aweereddwa kkaadi y’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) ku kifo ky’Obwaloodimmeeya bwa Kampala. Omubaka Nabillah Naggayi Ssempala Leero ku Mmande, Nabillah akedde ku kitebe kya kibiina kya NUP okusunsulwamu era nga ono ne munne Hajji Kadra Ssali bwe babadde bavuganya balaze ebisaanyizo byabwe era bwekatyo akakiiko k’ekibiina ak’ebyokulonda nekasalawo kkaadi eweebwe Nabillah Naggayi Ssempala. Okusinziira ku kakiiko k’ebyokulonda, Nabillah yafunye obubonero 166 ku obwo 200 ab’akakiiko bwe babadde bataddewo ate ye Ssali ku 200 yafunyeko 87. Nabillah oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula kkaadi eno ategeezezza nti buno buwanguzi bw’amaanyi era nga mwetegefu okuvuganya era aleetere ekibiina kino obuwanguzi. “Abantu b’e Kampala beetaaga entandikwa empya, Pulezidenti abeere mupya nga ne Loodimmeeya mupya. Bannayuganda olunaamala okulonda Robert Kyagulanyi nga Pulezidenti waabwe nga olwo baddako nze nga Loodimmeeya waabwe.” Naggayi bw’alambuludde. Naggayi yava mu Forum for Democratic Change (FDC), mw’abadde ayitira okwesimbawo mu palamenti okumala emyaka 15. Bweyammibwa kkaadi ng’ayagala okuvuganya ku Bwaloodimmeeya bwa Kampala, Nabillah yalangira abakulu mu FDC olw’okumma abakyala omukisa okutuula ku bifo ebinene mu kibiina. “Ndi musanyufu okulaba nga mu NUP abakyala baweebwa enkizo.” Naggayi bw’agambye. Nabillah Naggayi yasaba kkaadi y’ekibiina oluvannyuma lwe yali agiwangudde Hajji Latif Ssebagala okugisuulawo olwo abakulu mu kibiina nebaddamu okulanga. Mu kiseera ky’ekimu, Omuyimbi Joseph Mayanja (Jose Chameleon) abadde akyawakanya eky’okumulemesa kkaadi eno era ng’oluvannyuma lw’okulondawo Ssebagala, yavaayo n’awandiikira akakiiko kano nga yeemulugunya ku butali bwenkanya obwamukolebwako. Kati Nabilah Naggayi asuubirwa okuvuganya Loodimeeya aliko Erias Lukwago, Omuyimbi Daniel Kazibwe (Raggae Dee) owa NRM awamu n’Omuyimbi Joseph Mayanja amanyiddwa nga Jose Chameleone.

headline: Kkooti egobye oguvunaanibwa Omubaka Wakayima Musoke
text: Kkooti enkulu mu Kampala egobye omusango ogubadde guvunaanibwa omubaka wa Munisipaali y’e Nansana, Hannington Musoke Nsereko Wakayimanga gwekuusa kukuba nti talina buyigirize bumufuula mubaka wa Palamenti. Eyavuganya ku kifo kino, Hamis Musoke Walusimbi yamutwala mu kkooti ng’agamba nti taweza bitabo ate nga n’amannya ge galina obutakwatagana.
