Ku Lwokubiri, OmulamuziHenrietta Wolayoyategeezezza nti omusango gwa Walusimbi munafu era bw’atyo n’agugoba. “Nneetegerezza obujulizi bw’omuwaabi ne kizuula nga bunafu.Ebbaluwa za Wakayima okuli eyaUCE, UACE ne Diploma gye yafuna ku ttendekero lya ITEK, zonna zakakasibwa nekizuulibwa nti ntuufu. Wakayima yakuba ekirayiro era n’alanga ne mu mawulire okusigaza erinnya lye ekadde erya Musoke Hanningtonawamu n’erya Wakayima Nsereko, kkooti ejulirwamu bye yali yasuubiza.” Wolayo bw’agambye. Omulamuzi annyonnyodde nti waddeWalusimbi yawaabira Wakayimaku mpapula z’obuyigirize naye talina bujulizi wadde omuntu yenna alumiriza nti ebiwandiiko byaWakayima bibye. Okusinziira ku mulamuzi, Wakayima yagoberera emitendera gyonna gye yalina okuyitamu okutwala erinnya lya Wakayima Musoke Hannington Nserekoera amannya amalala gonna yageggyako. “Nzudde nti omuwawaabirwa yawandiisibwa mu butuufu kuba teyali munnansi ate omulonzi kyokka, naye yalina n’obuyigirize okuli ebbaluwaya UCEne UACE emusobozesa okufuuka omubaka. Bwegutyo omusango gugobeddwa.” Omulamuzi bw’agasseeko. Omulamuzi era alagidde Hamis Musoke Walusimbi okusasula Wakayima engassi olw’okumumalira obudde. Bw’abadde ayogera ku nsala eno, Wakayima ayanirizza okugoba omusango guno n’ategeeza nti okusalawo kw’abantu b’e Nansana, kkooti ekukakasizza.

headline: Museveni alagidde ab’enganda z’abaaliko ba Pulezidenti basasulwe akawumbi
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni alagidde Minisitule y’abakozi ba gavumenti okuwaayo akawumbi ka Ssiringi za Uganda kamu eri buli famire y’eyaliko Pulezidenti w’eggwanga olw’eddimu lye baakola okukulaakulanya eggwanga. Eyali muka Pulezidenti Obote, Miria Kalule Obote y’omu ku bagenda okuganyulwa mu kino Ekyama kino kibotoddwa Minisita omubeezi avunaanyizibwa ku bakozi ba gavumenti, David Karubanga, bw’abadde asisinkanye ababaka ba Palamenti okubategeeza ku kiragiro kino. Kurabanga annyonnyodde nti baamaze dda okuwaayo obukadde 330 eri bakamisona abaali bakola ku lwa bapulezidenti wakati wa May 22 ne Decemba 15 mu 1980.Ku bano kuliko; Saulo Musoke, Polycarp Nyamuchoncho ne Yoweri Hunter Wacha-Olwol. Kino kiddiridde omubaka omukyala owa Rukungiri mu Palamenti, Betty Muzanira, okuleeta ekiteeso ng’asaba gavumenti esasule obuwumbi 4.5 eri famire za bakamisona bano abali bakola ku lwa Pulezidenti.  Muzanira yagamba nti embeera famire z’abantu bano mwe bali eyungula ezziga nga beetaaga okuyambibwako mu bwangu. Okusinziira ku Karubanga, famire ezigenda okuganyulwa mu nteekateeka eno kuliko eya; Ssekabaka Edward Muteesa II, Milton Obote, Idi Amin, Yusuf Lule, Godfrey Binaisa, Paulo Muwanga ne ya Gen. Tito Okello Lutwa.

headline: Ticket z’omupiira gw’Amasaza ogw’akamalirizo zituuse ku katale.
text: Ticket z’omupiira gw’akamalirizo zituuse ku katale era nga zino zitongozeddwa minisita w’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda ow’ebyemizannyo Oweek. Henry Sekabembe Kiberu.  Oweek. Henry Sekabembe Kiberu nga alaga ekikopo ekigenda okukwasibwa omuwanguzi mu mpaka z’amasaza. Ticket abazagala muzigule okuva mu bifo bino ebitongole; Amaduuka ga Airtel gona okwetolola eggwanga; Kampala road, Kikuubo, Kiseka market, Lugogo, Masaka, Luwero, Bulenga, Kajjansi. Ku masundiro g’amafuta aga Total Shops mu bitundu by’eggwanga eby’enjawulo; Nateete, Masaka-Nyendo, Entebbe, Kasana, Kyengera, Namasuba, Luwero, Kasangati, Bweyogerere, Mukono. Ku Centenary Bank; Masaka, Mukono, Luwero, Mapeera. Ebifo ebirala; Hardware world, Namboole, Bulange, Wakiso Giants shop. Omupiira gw’Amasaza  ogw’akamalirizo gwakuberayo nga 26/10/2019 mu kisaawe e Namboole era nga Ssaabasajja Kabaka yasiima okuguggalawo wakati wa Bulemeezi ne Busiro. Ku lunaku lwelumu wagenda kusookawo omupira wakati wa Buddu ne Kyaddondo nga kuno anawangula yaggya okukwata ekifo eky’okusatu era nga guno Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga yagenda okuba omugenyi omukulu.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asisinkanye akulira ebikonde mu nsi yonna, asabye ebifo ebitendekebwamu ebikonde biddewo
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga alaze obwetaavu bw’okuzzaawo ebifo ebyo ebyatendekebwangamu abakubi b’ebikonde ebyali bitadde Uganda ku mutindo n’okumanyibwa munsi yonna. Obubaka buno, Owek. Mayiga abuweeredde mu nsisinkano gyabaddemu nakulira ekibiina ekitwala omuzannyo gw’ebikonde munsi yonna ki International Boxing Federation, Umar Kremlev amukyalidde mu Bulange e Mengo ku Lwokuna nga awerekeddwako akulira ebikonde mu Uganda, Moses Muhangi.  Mu bubaka bwe, Katikkiro Mayiga ategeezezza nti Buganda yawaddeyo yiika 10 ez’ettaka eriri e Gombe – Matugga, Kremlev asobole okuteekako essomero eritendeka ebikonde awamu n’ebintu ebirala. Owomumbuga agamba nti Uganda emu ku nsi mu Africa ezaafulumyanga abakubi b’ebikonde abalungi kyokka entalo zaayonoona ebifo bano byebatendekebwangamu naalaga obwetaavu bwokubizzaawo. Kamalabyonna asuubizza enkolagana ennungi wakati wa Buganda ne IBA nga bakwataganye ne UBA okutumbula ebitone byabavubuka kyokka nasaba buli kimu okukolebwa mu budde mu nteekateeka yokukulaakulanya ettaka lino. Akulira ekibiina ki IBA, Umar Kremlev ategezezza nti kimuwadde essanyu okubanga agenda kukwatagana n’ Obwakabaka neyebaza olwa kaweefube Uganda ne Africa okutwalira awamu gwebatadde mu byemizannyo naddala ebikonde.  Ate atwala ebikonde mu Uganda, Moses Muhangi yebazizza Obwakabaka obwabawa omukisa bwebaabutuukirira nga baagala ettaka Kremlev kwayinza okussa enkulaakulana ebalirwamu obutitimbe bwensimbi. Kino kiddiridde abakulembeze b’ebikonde okuva mu mawanga Nigeria, Cameroon ne Kenya okuwaayo obukadde bwa ddoola butaano mu pulojekiti eno omuli ekisaawe ky’ essaza, woteeri gaggadde, ettendekero lyebikonde n’ebirala. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako Omukubiriza wolukiiko lwa Buganda Owek. Patrick Luwagga Mugumbule, minisitaw’ebyemizannyo mu Buganda akiikiriddwa Owek. Noah Kiyimba, asuubizza enkolagana ennungi n’ebibiina byebikonde mu Uganda n’ensi yonna.

headline: Cheptegei anoonya akawumbi 1.7 okumaliriza webatendekera abaddusi
text: Munnayuganda eyawangulidde Uganda emidaali okuli ogwa zzaabu awamu ne ffeeza mu mpaka za Olympics eza 2020, Joshua Cheptegi, atongozza kaweefube w’okunoonya ssente eziwera akawumbi kamu n’obukadde 700 ( 1.7b) asobole okumaliriza ekifo ewatendekerwa abaddusi e Kapchorwa. Okuzimba ekifo kino kwatandika mu 2018, oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula ezimu ku mpaka z’emisinde gy’amawanga agaliko mu luse olumu ne Bungereza. Bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku Hotel Serena mu Kampala ku Lwona, Cheptegei agambye nti ekifo kino kigenda kukozesebwa ng’ekaddiyizo ly’abaddusi awamu n’ekifo abaddusi we batendekerwa. “Ekifo kino kigenda kuleeta abalambuzi abanyumirwa eby’emizannyo, tutongozza kaweefube agenda okumala ennaku 100 nga tusonda ssente akawumbi 1.7 okumaliriza omulimu guno.” Cheptegei bw’agambye. Okusinziira ku Cheptegei, abaddusi beetaaga ekifo ekituufu we balina okutendekerwa okusobola okuvuganya obulungi era n’asaba bannayuganda okuwagira ekirooto. “Bannayuganda bannange, Olympics atulaze nti omuddusi yenna asobola okubeera owaamaanyi naye okutuukiriza kino kyetaaga embeera ennungi ne w’atendekerwa awatuukana n’omutindo.” Cheptegei bw’annyonnyodde. Enteekateeka eno etuumiddwa“Run with Cheptegei” era abazirakisa bajja kuwaayo ssente nga bayita ku nkola ya Momo Pay awamu ne akawunta ng’okugyetabako omuntu anyiga *165 * 3 olwo n’anyigamu ennamba 319325. Ono era abawadde ennamba ya kawunti 9030016912866 okusonderako ssente nga eri mu mannya gaCheptegei Joshya Kiprui. Cheptegeiasiimye bannayuganda ne Pulezidenti Museveni olw’obuwagizi bwe baabawadde mu mpaka za Tokyo Olympics 2020.

headline: Ssentebe w’abavubuka e Ssembabule asattira lwa ssente za Museveni
text: Ssembabule Ssentebe w’abavubuka mu disitulikiti y’e Ssembabule atuuyana zikala, olw’ebigambibwa nti aliko ssente ze yabulankanya nga zino zaali zaakuweebwa bavubuka ku byalo okusobola okunoonyeza Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta akalulu.  Ssentebe w’abavubuka mu Ssembabule Bill Clinton Ssente ezireese leenya ziwera obukade asatu mu kamu mu emitwalo nsavu mu etaano mu enkumi biri (3175200) nga zino zaali zaakuweebwa ebyalo ebiwera 504 ebiri mu Ssembabule. Buli kyalo kyali kyakufuna emitwalo 5, ekintu kye bagamba nti tekyakolebwa.  “Twafuna okwemulugunya nga ssentebe w’abavubuka yafuna obukadde bw’ensimbi 3175200/= nga zaali zaakugenda ku byalo 504 mu Ssembabule era buli kyalo kyalina okufuna 50,000 okunoonyeza Museveni obuwagizi mu kalulu akawede, kyoKka twakizuula nga tezaatuukayo mu bavubuka era kye kimu ku kyaviirako n’omuntu waffe okukola obubi mu kitundu kino.” Omu ku bavubuka Rameka Masiko bwe yagambye. Omwogezi w’abavubuka mu disitulikiti eno, Kamya Kibudiya yategeezezza nti tajja kukkiriza muntu omu kwezibika ssente z’abavubuka era ajja kukola kyonna okusobola okuteekawo obwenkanya. Abavubuka bano balumiriza nti ssentebe waabwe yajingirira ebiwandiiko ebiraga ensaasaanya ya ssente zino era bwe baagezezzaako okuzuula obukakafu bw’ekiwandiiko kino, baakivudde nga zino zaaliibwa bantu ab’olubatu. Ate ye Ssentebe w’abavubuka mu kitundu kino gwe balumiriza, Bill Clinton, akkirizza nti ssente yazifuna wabula zaamuweebwa kikeerezi ne kivaako obutazigaba mu budde era bwe yasalawo okuziwa bassentebe b’eggombolola okuzigabira abavubuka wabula nabo tebaazituusaayo, ekintu ekimwonoonedde erinnya. Yayongeddeko nti abataafuna ssente batuufu okwemulugunya wabula ye alina embalirira entuufu ku nsaasaanya ya ssente zino.

headline: Omusumba Jjumba asabidde Buddu omukisa etwale ekikopo
text: Omusumba w’essaza lye Masaka, Serverus Jjumba awadde ttiimu y’essaza lya Buddu omukisa esobole okuwangula Buweekula mu lumeggana lweb bagendamu ku Lwomukaaga luno okusalawo muwanguzi w’ekikopo ky’omwaka 2021. OmukisaOmusumba Jjumba yagubawadde ku Lwokubiri bwe yabadde asisinkanyeabasambi n’abakungu ba ttiimu eno okubasiibula n’okubawa omukisa ku kitebe ky’essaza lya Ekeleziya e Kitovu mu Buddu. Omusumba Jjumbaabasambi yabakuutidde okunyweza empisa awamu n’obumu bwebaba baagala okuleeta obuwanguzi. Yategeezezza nti wadde tagenda kulabikako mu kisaawe naye amaaso agenda kugakuumira ku ttivvi essaawa yonna okulaba oba Buddu ereeta obuwanguzi. Ate ye omutendesi wa Buddu, Steven Bogere ategeezezza abawagizi nti balina enkizo ey’amaanyi okutwala ekikopo kino kubanga beetegese bulungi era abazannyi bonna bali mu mbeera nnungi. “Ntwala omukisa guno okubakakasa nti tugenda kuleetera kikopo kino kuba tukyagala era kitukolera era kitwongerayo mu maaso.” Bogere bwe yategeezezza. Ye omukungu wa kkiraabu ya bannamasaka eya Ambiance, Sarah Ssebuggwawo agamba nti singa ttiimu eno ewangula empaka zino, bategese ekivvulu ku ttabi lyabwe ery’e Bukesa omuli ne Afrigo Band okubayozaayoza era abakungu ba ttiimu yonna baakuyingirira bwereere era banywe n’ebyokunywa.

headline: Ekisiibo kitandika nkya, Taraweeh yakusaalira waka
text: Kampala Akulira Sharia mu ggwanga era omumyuka wa Mufti wa Uganda, Sheikh Muhammed Ali Waiswa,  akakasizza nti okusiiba omwezi Omutukuvu ogwa Ramadan kutandika nkya ku Lwokubiri April 13. Waiswa yategeezezza bannamawulire eggulo ku Ssande nti olw’okuba omwezi tegwalabise, ekisiibo kijja kutandika ku Lwokubiri.  Ono yategeezezza nti olw’okuba ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kikyaliwo, tewajja kubaawo Swalah ya Taraweeh ku muzikiti  gwa Old Kampala nga bwe kibadde kitera okuba okuggyako nga Pulezidenti akiggyeewo Kafyu. Waiswa yasabye abasiraamu okusalira awaka nga bwe balidde ekiva mu gavumenti. Olwa Corona, abakkiriza basabiddwa okugenda n’amazzi gaabwe aga wudhu era bakimanyi nti tewali ajja kukkirizibwa kukozesa kaabuyonjo okwewala okusaasaanya Ssennyiga Corona. Abasiraamu bano basabiddwa okwereetera emisaalo gyabwe okwewala okusaalira buli we basanze  era batambule n’obukookolo bwabwe. Okusinziira ku Busiraamu okulabika kw’omwezi kusalawo ddi ekisiibo lwe kitandika ne ddi ekisiibo lwe kirina okuggwa. Mu kaseera kano, abasiraamu tebakomba ku mmere wadde okunywa era buli lwaggulo basisinkana nga famire n’emikwano nga basiibululuka. Ku mulundi guno abayisiramu mu mawanga ag’enjawulo tebajja kwetaaya bulungi olw’amateeka agaateekebwawo era Eswala z’ekiro asinga tezijja kubaayo olwa kafyu era amawanga ag’enjawulo gasabye abantu okusaalira awaka.

headline: Ssaabaminisita Nabbanja ne Minisita Onek batabaganye
text: Ssaabaminisita Robinah Nabbanja ne Minisita w’ebibamba n’ebigwa tebiraze awamu n’abanoonyi b’obubudamu, Hillary Onek bakkirizza obutakkaanya bwabwe okubuteeka ebbali bakolere abantu. Bano enzikiriziganya bagituuseeko ku Lwokuna era ne bakakasa mu maaso g’omumyuka wa Pulezidenti, Jessica Alupo nga bwe bagenda okukolera bannayuganda. “Tubadde n’olukiiko oluwanvu era bakkaanyizza okukolera awamu. Tukkiriziganyizza ensonga ezimu tuzireke emabega ku lw’obulungi bw’eggwanga kuba ffenna tuli muntu omu.” Alupo bw’ategeezezza oluvannyuma lw’ensisinkano eno etakkiriziddwamu bannamawulire. Olukiiko luno lubaddemu n’omumyuka wa Ssaabaminisita owookubiri, Gen. Moses Ali awamu n’akulira abakozi ba gavumenti era omuwandiisi wa Kabineeti, Lucy Nakyobe, Minisita Chris Baryomunsi, Ssaabawolereza Kiryowa Kiwanuka awamu ne Minisita omubeezi ow’ebigwa tebiraze, Esther Anyakun. Olukiiko luno luddiridde okulumagana wakati wa Ssaabaminisita Nabbanja ne Hillary Onek ng’entabwe eva ku ngeri Ssaabaminisita gy’akolamu emirimu gye, Onek ky’agamba nti kimumazeeko emirimu era yavuddeyo n’alaga nga bw’ayinza okulekulira. Onek abadde alumiriza Nabbanja olw’obutamuyita mu nkiiko ezikwata obutereevu ku Minisitule ye kyokka ate n’ayita abakozi, Onek b’atwala wabula Nabbanja yategeeza nga Onek bw’asussizza obunafu nga n’okuteeka ebbaluwa eraga obutali bumativu ku mutimbagano kyabadde kiraga obutaba na mpisa. Kati ekirindiriddwa kwe kulaba oba abakulu bano banaakwatagana nga bwe beeyamye emirimu ne gisobola okutambula obulungi.

headline: Obubaga bw’Amazaalibwa ga Muhoozi bikolwa byakulya mu nsi lukwe – Prof. Oloka
text: Omusomesa w’ensonga z’amateeka ku Ssettendekero wa Makerere, Prof. Joe Oloka-Onyango ategeezezza nti ebikolwa bya Lt. Gen Muhoozi Kainerugaba okutegeka obubaga bw’amazaalibwa awamu n’okwogera ku nsonga z’ebyobufuzi kiyisa olugaayu mu Ssemateeka era bikolwa bya kulya mu nsi lukwe. Kino kiddiridde mutabani wa Pulezidenti Museveni era omudduumizi w’eggye ly’oku ttaka mu UPDF, Muhoozi okutegeka ebikujjuko by’amazaalibwa ge mu bibuga eby’enjawulo awamu n’okuwandiika ku mutimbagano nga alaga nga bweyetese okuddira kitaawe Gen. Yoweri Museveni mu bigere ku bwapulezidenti. Prof. Oloka agamba nti kino kikyamu kuba Muhoozi akyali mu ggye lya UPDF nga ebikolwa bye eby’okwegwanyiza entebe y’Obwapulezidenti kuba kuwamba Ssemateeka wa 1995. Ono anokoddeyo ennyingo ya Ssemateeka nnamba 208 (2), ekakasa nti eggye lya UPDF teririna kubaako naludda, lirina kuba lya ggwanga lyonna, ery’ empisa era erikola ebintu mu nkola ey’ekikugu naye bino byonna Muhoozi abiyisizaamu olugaayu. ” Ennyingo 208(2) eya Ssemateeka egamba nti UPDF terina kubaamu kyekubira, erina okulaga ekifananyi ky’eggwanga lyonna, okulaga obwagazi eri ensi Uganda, okukola n’obukugu, empisa era nga liweereza bannansi bonna. Sigenda kwogera bingi naye omuntu omu agezaako kuwamba Ssemateeka nga ayita mu byateeka ku Twitter n’okutegeka obubaga bw’amazaalibwa,” Prof. Oloka bw’ annyonnyodde. Oloka annyonnyodde nti ebiri emabega w’obubaga buno byabufuzi byennyini era Muhoozi okubikola aga agezaako kujeemera Ssemateeka mu kumanya oba mu butamanya nasaba Palamenti eyingire mu mu nsonga eno mu bwangu. “Ennyingo nnamba 3 nkulu nnyo kuba egamba nti omuntu yenna agezaako okuwamba Ssemateeka abeera alidde mu nsi olukwe era aba alina okuvunaanibwa. Kati n’omuntu ali mukutegeka obubaga bw’amazaalibwa okwetoloola eggwanga agezaako kuwamba Ssemateeka,” Oloka bw’alambuludde. Wiiki ewedde, Omubaka wa Kalungu West, Joseph Gonzaga Ssewungu ne Ibrahim Ssemujju Nganda owa Munisipaali ye Kira, ensonga bagitwala mu Palamenti nga basaba Muhoozi akwatibwe era avunaanibwe okulya mu nsi olukwe. Wabula Sipiika Anita Among Annet, bano yabategeeza nti tewali kikyamu na Muhoozi kujaguza mazaalibwa era nalaga nti singa ne Ssemujju ategeka akabaga k’amazaalibwa babaka banne bamwegattako okujaguliza awamu. Obubaga bw’ Amazaalibwa ga Muhoozi aga 48, bwaliwo April 24 era bwatukiza enteekateeka z’okulaga bw’ayagala okusikira kitaawe ku bwapulezidenti era bwali mu bitundu by’eggwanga ebyenjawulo wabula akabaga akakulu kaali mu maka g’Obwapulezidenti Entebbe era kategekebwa Pulezidenti Museveni nga ne Pulezidenti wa Rwanda, Paul Kagame yakaliko ng’omugenyi omuyite. Oluvannyuma lwa bino, Munnamateeka Gawaya Tegulle yaddukira mu kkooti etaputa Ssemateeka nga ayagala eyimirize Muhoozi okukola obubaga buno nga akyali mu ggye lya UPDF. Tegulle mu mpaaba ye yalaga nti ebikolwa bya Muhoozi ne nneeyisa ye bikontana n’ etteeka lya UPDF eryakolebwa mu 2005. Tegulle mu balala beyawaabidde ne Muhoozi kuliko Ssaabawolereza olw’okulemwa okuwabula munnamagye ali ku ddaala lya genero mu nsonga z’amateeka awamu n’Omudduumizi w’amagye ow’oku ntikko olw’okulemwa okulambika omujaasi we.

headline: Gavumenti esabye ennyogereza ya obusse3.8, kuliko eza Buganda z’ebanja obuwmbi 26.3
text: Minisitule y’ebyensimbi eyanjudde embalirira y’ennyongereza ya buse 3.8eri akakiiko ka Palamenti akakola ku mbalirira nga basaba ensimbi zino zibaweebwe emirimu gisobole okutambula. Ku nsimbi zino kuliko ensimbi eziwerera ddala obuwumbi 26.3 okusobola okusasula Obwakabaka bwa Buganda ensimbi ze bubanja gavumenti eyaawakati ng’ezimu ku zino zaava mu nsimbi z’obupangisa. Wabula ababaka abatuula ku kakiiko kano bategeezezza nti si bamativun’engeri gavumenti gy’esuubira okufunamu ensimbi zino eziwera obuse 3 n’obuwumbi 800 ze baagala okusaasaanya mu mbalirira y’ennyogereza. Okusinziira ku ministule y’ebyensimbi, obuse 2 obuwumbi 49 zigenda kwewolwa kuno ate akase 1 n’obuwumbi 298 zikecuddwaku bitongole bya gavumenti naddala ku ntambula, enkung’aana n’obubaga. Abamu ku babaka abatuula ku kakiiko kano okuli; Muwanga Kivumbi ne Abdul Katuntu, batabuse nga bagamba nti ebyenfuna by’eggwanga bikoseddwa nnyo Ssennyiga Corona ng’okuddira okubiggyamu obuse obuwera obubiri, kigenda kwongera okukosa eggwanga. Ababaka bagamba nti singa ensimbi zino zeewolwa, ebbanga lya Uganda ligenda kulinnya okuva ku 52.7%okutuuka ku 54.0% . Era mu mbalirira eno mulimu n’ensimbi endala obuwumbi 35 okuyimirizaawo ebibiina by’obufuzi ebiri mu Palamenti nga zino zaakugabanibwa okusinziira ku muwendo ekibiina gwe kirina mu Palamenti. Embalirira eno ey’ennyongereza erimu n’ensimbi obuwumbi 67 Minisitule y’ebyenjigiriza z’esaba okuddaabiriza ekisaawe ky’e Namboole kuba kino mu kiseera kino kiri mu mbeera mbi nnyo wadde akakiiko kano tekannasisinkana bakungu ba minisitule eno kubaako bye bannyonnyola. Wabula minisitule y’ebyensimbi ejjuludde okusaba kwa buwumbi butaaano obubadde obwokuwa abategesi b’ebivvulu abakosebwa Ssennyiga ng’egamba nti ensimbi zino zaakukusibwa bukukusibwa amaka g’omukulembeze w’eggwanga ng’olukiiko lwa baminisita terwazikkiriza.

headline: Abasawo  baddukidde mu Palamenti ku by’okubongeza emisaala
text: Abasawo abayamba ku badokita awamu n’abazaalisa nga bayita mu kibiina ekibagatta ki ‘Federation of Uganda Nurses and Midwives’ beekubidde enduulu eri Palamenti nga baagala etunule mu nsonga y’okubongeza omusaala. Ekiwandiiko ky’ abasawo bano kyanjuddwa omubaka wa Maracha East, Ruth Lematia nasaba olukiiko okutwala ensonga eno nga nkulu kuba abasawo basanga ebizibu bingi ku mirimu era bakole nekunsonga y’ abasawo abali mukugezesebwa. “ Abakugu b’ebyobulamu abasinga obungi mu ggwanga lino basawo, 70 ku buli 100 era wadde emyaka giweze nga beekalakaasa era nga amaanyi gabaggwamu olw’omusaala omutono gwebafuna naye ensonga yabwe tekolwako,” Lematia bw’annyonnyodde. Lemati agamba nti wadde bano batendekebwa era nga bakoleredde eby’obulamu, naye ensonga yabwe gavumenti egaanye okutuukiriza obweyamo bwayo okwongeza abasawo bano ssente mu mwaka gw’ebyensimbi oguwedde naye tewali kyakolebwa nga kati ayagala Palamenti eyingire mu nsonga eno. Ono asabye gavumenti okutereeza ensonga y’omusaala guno era nasaba gavumenti okomye okulanga emirimu gy’abasawo bano nga egaseeko eky’okuwa enkizo eri oyo abeera alina ddiguli so nga abasawo abasinga balina satifikeeti. Ensonga eno Palamenti egyongeddeyo eri akakiiko k’abakozi ba gavumenti ne gavumenti ez’ebitundu okusobola okugitunulamu.

headline: Bannabuddu beefumiitirizza ku Mukenenya
text: Bya Muwuluzi Yusuf  Abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka mu ssaza ly’e Buddu basisinkanye okwefumiitiriza ku ngeri ekirwadde kya Mukenenya gye kikosezzaamu abantu naddala abaliko obulemu. Ppookino n’abamu ku baliko obulemu Bino byabaddewo eggulo ku lunaku lw’ensi yonna olw’ekirwadde kino era ng’ensisinkano eno yabaddemu ab’ekitongole kya MADIPHA ekiyambako abaliko obulemu naye nga mu kiseera kye kimu bawangaala n’ekirwadde kino n’okulaba bwe basobola okubulwanyisa. Ku mukolo ogwabadde ku ssaza nga gwabaddemu ebikonge by’Obwakabaka, abakulembeze mu Masaka, bannaddiini n’abakulembeze babaliko obulemu mu kitundu kino. Mu bubaka bwe obwamusomeddwa Ppookino Jude Muleke, Minisita wa gavumenti z’ebitundu mu Buganda, Owek.Joseph Kawuki yategeezezza nti abantu amaanyi babadde bagamalidde ku Ssennyiga Corona ne beerabira Mukenenya. Minisita yagasseeko nti Obwakabaka busaale nnyo mu kulwanyisa obulwadde bwa Ssiriimu era n’akubiriza abantu okwekuuma. “Tusaana tutaase abaliko obulemu obutasaabaana kawuka ka Mukenenya.” Bw’atyo Owek. Kawuuki bwe yayongeddeko era ne yeebaza essaza Buddu n’ekitongole kya MADIPHA. Ye Ppookino mu bubaka bwe yavumiridde nnyo ebikolwa eby’ekko ebyetobese mu kalulu kano naddala ebyo ebikolebwa abakuumaddembe. Wabula ono yasabye abavubuka okwewala ebikolwa eby’effujjo olwo lwe banaateekebwamu obwesige. Ssenkulu w’ekibiina kya MADIPHA, Musisi Richard, yannyonnyodde nti ng’abaliko obulemu basanga okusoomoozebwa okuwangaala n’ekirwadde kino. Rev. Fr. Aloysius Kalwowa nga ye yakiikiridde omusumba w’ssaza ly’e Masaka, Bishop Serverus Jjumba, ku lwa bannaddiini yasabye wabeewo okunoonyereza ku bintu ebiremesa abantu okuvaayo okwatula mu lwatu nti balina Siriimu nga n’abamu eddagala balimirira mu nkukutu. Oluvannyuma woofiisi ya Ppookino yawaddeyo ebimu ku bikozesebwa abantu abaliko obulemu.

headline: Besigye : Sigenda kwesimbawo mu 2021
text: Najjanankumbi Eyali pulezidenti w’ekibiina ki Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) Col Dr. Kizza Besigye, agamba nti tagenda kwesimbawo ku bwapulezidenti mu kalulu ka 2021.  Dr. Kizza Besigye  Kino kimazeewo okubuusabuusa abantu abamu kwebabadde nakwo nga balowooza nti Besigye akomawo. “Nkiriziganyizza ne bannange tufune omuntu omulala akulembera pulaani A ey’ akalulu, nze ngenda kulembera  ku pulaani B.Tebabalimba nti nsobola kuva mu lutalo lw’ okunnunula ggwanga, ” Besigye bwetegeezezza Bino abyogeredde Najjanankumbi ku Lwokusatu bwabadde ayogerako ne bannakibiina. Embeera okusooka yabadde ya bunkenke nga Besigye atuuka e ku kitebe era buli omu obwedda alinze okuwulira ekirangiriro Besigye kyabadde agenda okukola. Abamu ku bavubuka bagezezzaako okukakka Dr. Besigye ajjeyo empapula ekintu kyagaanye. Abavubuka bakakkanye Besigye bwalaze nti wakuwagira omuntu yenna ekibiina gwekinaleeta okuvuganya ku bwapulezidenti. Bino webigidde nga ssentebe wa FDC mu ggwanga Wasswa Birigwa ne pulezidenti aliko Patrick Amuriat bamaze dda okujjayo empapula bavuganye ku bwapulezidnti mu kalulu ka 2021. Besigye agamba nti yalina okubeera pulezidenti omutuufu kubanga ye yawangula akalulu ka 2016 sso si Museveni. Besigye nga emirundi giweze nga ajja yeesimba ku Museveni mukulonda okwasembayo yafuna ebitundu 35 n’obutundutundu 4 ku 100 ate nga Museveni yawangulira ku  bitundu 60. n’obutundutundu 8 mu kalulu ka 2016.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asabye Gavumenti okusoosowaza ebiyamba abantu okuva mu bwavu
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Owek. Charles Peter Mayiga, asabye gavumenti okussa ennyo essira kw’ebyo ebiyamba abantu okwejja mu bwavu era eyambe okutondawo emirimu kisobozese abaana abatikkirwa buli lukya okufuna emirimu. Bino abyogeredde Masaka, Kirumba mu Buddu ku Lwokutaano, ku mukolo ogw’amatikkira g’abayizi ba Muteesa I Royal University ag’omulundi ogw’ekkumi. “Bano bayingidde ekisaawe eky’okunoonya emirimu so nga ggya bbula, ekikuumidde abantu mu bwavu. Gavumenti tugisaba okusoosoowaza ensonga eziyamba abantu okulwanyisa obwavu, omuli; okutondawo emirimu; eby’enjigiriza eby’omutindo, awamu n’ebyobulamu. Amakolero gayambako ku bbula ly’emirimu, kyokka gasaana okwesigamizibwa ku bye tulinamu enkizo, nga obulimi,” Owek. Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde.  Owek. Mayiga abatikkiddwa abayozaayozezza olw’okutuuka ku kkula lino era nabakuutira okwongera okwekuuma endwadde naddala mukenenya. Katikkiro Mayiga agamba nti kikulu nnyo okuzimba amakolero okusobola okulaakulanya eggwanga kyokka era gano bweba gakugasa galina kwezigamizibwa kwebyo Uganda byerinamu enkizo nga eby’obulimi n’obulunzi. Ono yeebazizza abo bonna abalina kyebakoze okuyamba Ssettendekero ono okuweza emyaka 15 nga abangula abaana b’eggwanga. Cansala wa Ssettendekero wa Muteesa era Omulamuzi wa kkooti yensi yonna Julia Ssebutinde, asinzidde ku mukolo guno neyebaza Obwakabaka olwokubakwasizaako ngabaddukanya essomero lino naasibirira abayizi ensonga ssatu okwekirirzaamu, obuvumu, nokuwa ekitiibwa obukugu bwebafuna ate babukwate wakati mu butanyooma mirimu.  Ye Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku nkulaakulana z’Abantu awamu n’ebyenjigiriza, Owek. Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma akubiriza abayizi bano okukullembeza ebyo abakozesa byebasinga okuyaayanira okusinga empapula zebafunye. Abayizi 80 bafunye Certificate, 270 ddaala lya Diploma ate 884 degree mu masomo okuli ebyamawulire, ba yinginiya, abasomesa nobuyigirize obulala.  Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako omumyuka asooka owa Katikkiro Owek. Dr. Hajji Twaha Kigongo Kaawaase, Owek. Noah Kiyimba minisita wamawulire, Omuk. Josephine Nantege omuteesiteesi omukulu mu Buganda, Omuk. Eng. Patrick Ssembajjo nabalala.

headline: AKAMYUFU KA NRM:  Eyeesimbyewo Bamusuulidde Ssanduuke y’Abafu
text: Mitooma Abatuuze ku kyalo Rwakikambuzi mu Mitooma basattidde oluvanyuma lw’okukeera nga luggya lwa munnabwe eyeesimbyewo Arthur Kazoora nga musuliddwamu Ssanduuke y’abafu nga eriko ne ssente. Ssanduuke eyasuuliddwa mu maka ga Kazoora Kazoora nga ayagala kukikirira Ruhinda South mu Palamenti, yategeezezza nti balirwana be bebamuyise ku makya ga leero ku Lwokubiri okulaba ekikolwa kino ekya Sitaani era nga kyabulogo. Ono yanyonyodde nti ku Ssanduuke kubaddeko ssente z’obupapula bw’enkumi ebbiri okugyetoola nga ziwera emitwalo musanvu mu enkumi nnya (74000). Kino RDC we Mitooma Ada Nasiima yakikasizza nategeeza nti batandise dda okunoonya ali emabega w’ekikolwa kino asobole okuvunaanibwa. Nisiima yagasseeko nga abatuuze be Rwakikambuzi bwebamukubidde ne poliisi era bweyatuusewo nasanga nga mu maka ga Kazoora musuliddwamu Ssanduuke y’abafu. “ Ekikolwa kino bakikoze okutiisatiisa bantu obutalonda naye mubeere bakakafu nti ku Lwokutaano tugenda kulonda era wakati wa bonna abeesimbyewo tugenda kufunako omuwanguzi omu,” Nisiima bweyalambuludde. Ono yalabudde abeesimbyewo okukomya ebikolwa nga bino kubanga eno ssi y’engeri entuufu ey’okufunamu obuwagizi era nasaba ne Kazoora okusigala nga mugumu. Kazoora yategeezezza nti talina kyatidde kubanga musajja mukkiriza, era nasuubizza abawagizi be okuwangula akamyufu ka NRM ku Lwokutaano lwa wiiki eno. Oluvanyuma poliisi Ssanduuke ne ssente ebitutte okwongera okunoonyereza abali emabega w’ekikolwa kino. Abavuganya mu kamyufu ke Ruhinda South kuliko; Arthur Kazoora, Ambrosio Byamugisha Muhoozi n’omubaka aliyo Capt. Dononzio Kahonda.

headline: DP erabudde abagaana abatannagemebwa okuyingira mu bifo byabwe, bamenya mateeka
text: Ekibiina ky’ebyobufuzi ekyaDemocratic Party (DP) kirabudde gavumenti, ebitongole ne kkampuni ezitandise okugaana abantu abatali bageme okuyingira mu woofiisi zaabwe, okweddako kuba kino kimenya mateeka. Omuwabuzi w’ekibiina kya DP ku nsonga z’amateeka, Luyimbaazi Nalukoola ntibw’eba nga gavumentieyagala okukozesa kino okukunga abantu okwegemesa, balina okuddayo mu mateeka okunoonya we bayinza okwekwata. Bino Nalukoola yabyogeredde mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire olwatudde ku City House mu Kampala ku Lwokubiri. “Ekibiina kya Democratic Partykyagala ebitongole bya gavumenti okukulembeza amateeka mu bye bakola so si kukola nga bwe baagala kuba kiba kimenya mateeka.” Nalukoola bwe yagambye. Bino we bijjidde ng’ebimuku bitongole bya gavumenti bigaanye abantu abatannaba kwegemesa okuyingira mu bizimbe byabwe, mu bano mulimu; National Medical Stores, National Drug Authority, Ministry of Health n’ebirala. Abamu ku bakulu omuli amyuka Ssaabawandiisi wa NRM, Rose Namayanja yavaayo n’awagira eky’okugaana abatannagemebwa okuyingira mu woofiisi zino, ng’agamba nti kijja kuwaliriza abantu okwongera okwegemesa batuuke waakiri obukadde 4.8 Decemba w’anaatuukira. Okusinziira ku Minisitule y’ebyobulamu, mu kadde kano abantu obukadde 3 bwe bwakagemebwa n’eddoozi esooka.

headline: Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye okulabikako eri Obuganda nga aggulawo  emipiira gy’Amasaza 2021
text: Omumyuka owookubiri owa Katikkiro, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa ategeezezza nti Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II asiimye okulabikako eri Obuganda ku Lwomukaaga luno era aggulewo emipiira gy’Amasaza egy’omwaka guno 2021. Bino Owek. Nsibirwa abyogeredde mu Bulange bw’abadde atongoza empaka zino ku lwa Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga n’asaba abantu okwaniriza Nnamunswa ku lunaku olwo era bayambeko ne ttiimu zaabwe okweteekateeka. “Mbategeeza mwenna abali wano wamu n’abatulaba ku Terefayinanti Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye alabikeko eri Obuganda nga 20 ku Lwomukaaga luno n’omupiira ogugenda okutandikirwako wakati wa Kyaddondo ne Gomba.” Owek. Nsibirwa bw’agambye. Owek.Waggwa ategeezezza nti empaka zino zimanyiddwa okuleetawo okutabagana wakati w’abantu ba Kabaka kuba zizannyibwa abantu abali mu bitundu ebyo nga si nsonga baganda oba nedda. Okusinziira ku Owek. Waggwa, okweteekateeka mu masaza ag’enjawulo kubadde mu masaza agatali gamu ng’abakwatibwako obutereevu babanguddwa era waliwo n’ebitone ebizuuliddwa awamu n’okufuna emirimu nga byonna bibala by’amasaza. Owek. Nsibirwa agambye nti ku mulundiguno balina bye bagenda okwesibako nga mwe muli okunyweza obumu mu bantu ba Kabaka nga bakulembeza ebibagatta ng’emipiira gy’Amasaza awamu n’okusaba abaami okukola buli ekisoboka okutaasa abaana aboobuwala ku kirwadde kya Mukenenya. Ku nsonga y’obutebenkevu mu ggwanga,Owek. Nsibirwa asabye bannayuganda okumanya nti tebalina ndowooza yeemu era beewale obutujju era bakkakkanye ku busungu era beekengere n’okutebuka abalabe bonna abasobola okubatuusaako obulabe wabula basigale nga bavumu basobole okutambuza emirimu. Owek.Waggwa Nsibirwa agamba nti ekiseera kituuse gavumenti ya Uganda ku bigambo ebingi byeyogera egatteko amaanyi kisobole okukomya omuze gw’abatujju abamalawo obulamu bwa bannayuganda. AteMinisita Ssekabembe asabye abazannyi mu ttiimu z’Amasaza ez’enjawulo okukozesa omukisa guno ogubaweereddwa Ssaabasajja Kabaka okutumbula ebitone byabwe mu kusamba omupiira basobole okwekulaakulanya.  Minisita w’abavubuka n’ebyemizannyo, Owek. Ssekabembe asiimye bannamikago olw’obuwagizi bwe bawadde Obwakabaka mu kikopo ky’Amasaza ebbanga lyonna ne mu kiseera ng’ekirwadde kya Corona kizing’amizza ebyenfuna naye ne basigala ku mulamwa okukyusa embeera z’abantu ba Kabaka. Owek. Ssekabembe annyonnyodde nti omuwanguzi w’ekikopo ky’Amasaza agenda kwewangulira obukadde bwa ssente 12, owookubiri afune obukadde 9 ate owookusatu aweebwe obukadde 7 ate anaasinga banne okulengera obutimba aweebwe emitwalo gya ssiringi 30.

headline: Ssekiboobo alagidde abasenze ku ttaka lya Buganda lye yawa ekkanisa okwewandiisa
text: Bya Jesse Lwanga  Omwami w’essaza lya Ssaabasajja Kabaka ery’e Kyaggwe, Ssekiboobi Elijah Bogere Mulembya, alagidde abatuuze ku ttaka ly’Obwakabaka ery’e Nakanyonyi mu Mukono  okuwandiika bannanyini bibanja okusobola okumalawo embiranye wakati w’Obulabirizi bw’e Mukono n’abatuuze.  Ssekiboobo okwogera bino abadde ku kyalo Nakanyonyi ekisangibwa mu ggombolola y’e Nabbaale mu disitulikiti y’e Mukono, okulaba ng’atabaganya abatuuze n’ekkanisa oluvannyuma lw’omulabirizi we, Mukono James Williams Ssebagala okwekubira enduulu ewa Katikkiro. Kino kiddiridde abatuuze ku kyalo Nakanyonyi okukkakkana ku mmere ya babuulizi gye babadde baasimba neb agisaawa nga bawakanya ekkanisa okutwala ebibanja byabwe nga tennaba kubasasula. Okusinziira ku batuuze ettaka lino Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bwe bwaliwa Ekkanisa y’e Mukono nga kati Obulabirizi bw’e Mukono okutwala ebibanja byabwe ku mpaka, si kya bwenkanya. Mu lukiiko olutudde ku kyalo kino,  abatuuze bategeezezza Ssekiboobo nti Ekkanisa ye yabasangako nga bo ba bibanja wabula tebasobola kugikkiriza okubasindiikiriza nga temaze kubasasula. Abatuuze balumiriza Ekkanisa okukozesa poliisi y’e Naggalama ne babasiba oluvannyuma yo n’etandika okusaawa ebintu byabwe nga bali mu makomera.  Ssentebe w’ekyalo kino, Peter Kaweesa agamba nti kituufu ettaka lya Kkanisa naye ate Ekkanisa ye yasangako abatuuze  era eky’okuwamba ebibanja byabwe n’okusaanyaawo emmere yaabwe, tekikola makulu.  Wabula ye omwogezi w’Obulabirizi bw’e Mukono, Derrick Kaddu, abiwakanyizza n’ategeeza nti  ku ttaka lino tekwaliko muntu yenna wabula bajja beesenzaako era n’akakasa nti ng’ekkanisa tebagenda kukkiriza kufiirwa ttaka lyabwe. Ettaka lino kigambibwa lituddeko abantu abasoba mu 300 nga likunukkiriza yiika 400.

headline: Abalina ebitone mwefubeeko – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Kamalabyonna wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga, asabye bannabyamizannyo okwerwanako batumbule ebitone byabwe, basobole okubifunamu ettutumu wamu n’ensimbi beekulaakulanye. Katikkiro Mayiga, Shafic Kiwanuka ne Salim Uhuru  Owek. Mayiga okwogera bino abadde asisinkanye bannabyamizannyo abakubi b’ebikonde abeegattira mu kibiina kya Great Strikers International olwaleero ku Lwokutaano mu bimuli bya Bulange nga bamwanjulira nnantameggwa wa World Boxing Federation ku lukalu lwa Africa, Shafic Kiwanuka.  “Abaaweebwa ebitone mulina okwefubako ennyo okulaba ng’ebitone bikula kuba ebitone byokka ku lwabyo tekimala. Munnabyamizannyo alina ekitone alina okubeera mu kutendekebwa ebbanga lyonna.” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye. Kamalabyonna bannabyamizannyo abawadde amagezi okweyambisa talanta zaabwe nga bakyasobola era banyikire okukola ennyo. “Omuntu yenna okuwangula obulamu ateekwa okuzuula oba okuvumbula ebitone Katonda bye yamuwa ate n’abikozesa bulungi ne bimutuusa ku kukulaakulana.” Mayiga bw’agasseeko. Owek. Mayiga agamba nti singa omuntu atuula ku kitone kye n’agaana okukikozesa tewaba njawulo n’oyo atakirina. Ono yagambye nti emizannyo gwafuuka mulimu nga bw’olaba abatuula mu woofiisi oba abakeera okulima mu nnimiro wadde nga gisobola okusanyusa abantu wamu ne nannyini kyo. Kamalabyonna yabasabye ebitone babitwale ng’omulimu basobole okubifunamu ettutumu wamu n’ensimbi. Abakuutidde okukola ennyo dduyiro wamu n’okulya emmere entuufu wamu n’okwewala emize ng’ettamiiro, ebiragalalagala n’abakazi, kuba bino bisobola okubalemesa ebitone. Owek. Mayiga agamba nti balina okwewala okulowooza kuba kusobola okubaggya ku mulamwa. “Enneeyisa ya munnabyamizannyo y’evaako obuwanguzi bwe n’okuwangulwa kwe,” Mayiga bw’abalambise. Bano abakulembeddwamu Pulezidenti wa ‘Uganda Professional Boxers Commission’, Salim Uhuru, basiimye Kamalabyonna olw’okubaaniriza n’entanda gy’abawadde era ne bagula Ssatifikeeti ya mitwalo nkaaga (600,000) okuwagira emirimu gy’Obwakabaka.

headline: Abavuzi ba takisi bazinzeeko ekitebe kya KCCA
text: Abavuzi ba takisi  ku KCCA  Abavuzi ba takisi abakolera mu ppaaka ya Usafi olwaleero zazinzeeko ekitebe kya KCCA mu Kampala okulaga obutali bumativu bwabwe olw’okubaawo bannabwe abakolera wabweru wa paaka.  Bano bavunaana abakulira ekitongole kya KCCA okulemererwa okussa munkola ekiragiro kyabwe ekigaana takisi zonna ezikolera ku luguudo lw’Entebe okubeera mu ppaaka.   KCCA mu Mukulukusabitongotungo w’omwaka oguwedde yayise ebiragiro ebipya ebijja takisi zonna eziri ku siteegi y’e Kajjansi, Zana, Namasuba, Kasenyi, Ndeeba, Sembuule, Kibuye Queens way ne Ndejje okuva mu ppaka enkadde okudda mu Usafi park.   Kyokka takisi ezimu zaasigala ku luguudo lwa Nasser, ku kibangirizi ky’eggali y’omukka, wamu ne mu paaka enkadde yennyini. Joseph Kato, omuvuzi wa takisi yagambye nti okugenda mu maaso n’okuzimuula ekiragiro kya KCCA nga takisi ezimu zisigala ku nguudo kireetera abasaabaza obutagenda mu Usafi, ekintu ekibafiiriza.   Twaha Wakirobo, naye omuvuzi wa takisi agamba olunaku agenda Entebbe emirundi ebiri gyokka kubanga waliyo takisi nnyingi mu ppaka. Ono agamba bw’osaako 6000 kaasasula buli lutikka, aba tasigazaawo yadde akasente k’okuwa nnanyini takisi.  Bano baagala KCCA ebiyingiremu egobe abo bonna abaasigala ku nguudo okugenda mu Usafi buli muntu asobole okukola.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga avumiridde ekiwambabantu ekisusse
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga avumiridde ekiwambabantu ekisusse mu ggwanga era n’asaba abantu abawambibwa bakwatibwe mu bwerufu era bwe babaako omusango gwe bazza basimbibwe mu mbuga z’amateeeka. Bino Katikkiro yabyogeredde mu Lukiiko lwa Buganda olwatudde ku Mmande bwe yabadde ayogera ku bigenda mu maaso mu ggwanga nga bw’eri enkola y’Olukiiko. Katikkiro nga ayogerera mu lukiiko lwa Buganda “Mu Uganda eya kaco kano, abantu bakyakwatibwa ne bawambibwa. Nalaba ebifaananyi ky’omwana nga bamuggyeemu enjala, musango ki oguggyisaamu omuntu enjala bannange?” Katikkiro Mayiga bwe yabuuzizza. Owek. Mayiga yasabye, abantu abateeberezebwa okubeera abazzi b’emisango ababanonye basooke kubeeyanjulira olwo bakwatibwe era bategeezebwe emisango gye bavunaanibwa era n’ababakwata babeere n’ebiboogerako. Ku nsonga y’ebintu Buganda by’ebanja Gavumenti, Katikkiro Mayiga asabye Buganda esasulwe obuwumbi 51 Gavumenti bwe yali esuubizza okusasulwa mu 2018/19 ne 2019/20 kuba ku zino Buganda yafunako obuwumbi 13 bwokka. Katikkiro Mayiga era yasinzidde mu Lukiiko luno n’avumirira abantu abatandise okutabikiriza eby’obufuzi mu nteekateeka z’Obwakabaka ng’Emmwanyi Terimba n’agamba nti kino kirina okukoma kuba enteekateeka eno yaakununula bantu banaku. Mu ngeri yeemu, Mukuumaddamula Mayiga yalabudde abantu abakozesa obubi omutimbagano n’asaba abantu okubeegendereza kuba bano baliko omuntu abasasula balemesa emirimu okutambula mu Bwakabaka. ” Abantu ne muddawo ne mubika Ssaabasajja Kabaka ne Kabaka yennyini n’atuuka n’okyogerako! Kabaka abeewuunya. Mwegendereze nnyo bamuloddokaayi nkuuwe.” Owek. Mayiga bwe yalambuludde. Katikkiro Mayiga yavumiridde n’ebikolwa ebityoboola Obuwangwa wamu n’Ennono mu mikolo naddala okwanjula era yasabye ababikola okweddako era abakiise ab’enjawulo baavumiridde ebikolwa bino ne basaba wabeewo ekikolebwa mu bwangu. “Abantu batyobodde nnyo Ennono yaffe ku mikolo egy’okwanjulwa. Abantu ne bentinkuula mu ngeri eswaza ennyo. Obulenzi bu katumwa ne bwekola ebintuntu. Omuko ayanjuddwa n’adda mu kwentinkuula olwo bakutende batya?” Mayiga bw’agasseeko Omu ku bakiise era Ssaabagunjuzi w’ekisaakaate kya Maama Nnaabagereka, Omuk. Rashid Lukwago, yategeezezza nti ebikolwa bino byoleka ekifaananyi ekikyamu era bivudde ku kukoppa n’okutabikkiriza eby’obuwangwa ky’agambye nti kikyamu. Olukiiko luno luliko ebiteeso bye lwasembye nga kuno kuliko; ensonga ya Federo, okusiima Nnamuswa Ssaabasajja Kabaka, okuvumirira ekiwambabantu, okukomya okutyoboola ennono mu kwanjula wamu ne nnongoosereza ezaayisiddwa mu mateeka agafuga Olukiiko luno.

headline: Omuwendo gw’abakyala abalongoosebwa okuzaala gweraliikiriza – Alipoota
text: Kampala Omuwendo gw’abakyala abalongoosebwa nga batuuse okuzaala guli waggulu nnyo n’ogwo ogwateekebwawo ekitongole ky’ensi yonna eky’ebyobulamu, ekimanyiddwa nga ‘World Health Organisation (WHO).’ Minisita w’ebyobulamu ebisokerwako Kaducu Okusinziira alipoota efulumizibwa Minisitule y’ebyobulamu buli mwaka, ekitundu kiramba ku bamaama abatwalibwa mu malwaliro g’obwannannyini okuzaala, balongoosebwa. Bino biri mu alipoota eno eyafulumiziddwa olunaku lw’eggulo aba Minisitule y’ebyobulamu. Alipoota eraga nti ebitundu 51 ku buli 100 ku bakyala abatwalibwa mu ddwaliro lya St. Francis e Nsambya, balongoosebwa ate ng’omwaka omuwendo ebitundu 72 ku buli 100 ku bakyala abatwalibwa mu ddwaliro e Nakasero, nabo balongosebwa. Ebifulumiziddwa biraga nti omuwendo gw’abalongosebwa mu ddwaliro e Mengo ne Lubaga nagwo guli waggulu ku bitundu 47 ku buli 100, ne 41 ku buli 100 Omukungu wa Minisitule y’ebyobulamu, Dr. Henry Mwebesa yagambye nti, “Omuwendo gwabalongoosebwa mu malwaliro g’obwannannyini n’agatali guli waggulu. Mu malwaliro gavumenti omuwendo kukkiridde okuva ku bantu 35 ku buli 100 ne gutuuka ku bantu 34 ku buli 100.” Dr. Mwebesa yannyonnyodde nti omuwendo gw’abakyala abalongoosebwamu abaana mu ggwanga lyonna gukendedde ebitundu 7 ku buli 100 okuva ku bantu 49,369 mu mwaka gwa 2018/2019 ne gukka ku bakyala 45,806. Wabula amalwaliro okuli; Mubende hospital, Hoima hospital, Fort Portal hospital ne Mulago Specialized Women’s and Neonatal Hospital, abakyala abalongoosebwamu abaana, gweyongera ebitundu 2 ku buli 100. Okusinziira ku Alipoota eno, eddwaliro lye Gulu lye lirina omuwendo ogusembayo okubeera wansi n’ebitundu 12 ku buli 100 mu mwaka gw’ebyensimbi ogwa 2019/2020. Minisita w’ebyobulamu ebisookerwako Dr. Joyce Kaducu, yategeezezza nti omuwendo guno gwetaaga kunoonyerezaako bamanye lwaki guli waggulu. Dr. Kaducu yannyonnyodde nti omuwendo guno gwandiba nga gujja lw’abamu ku bali embuto okusindikibwa mu malwaliro amanene oluvannyuma lwa Health Center IVs okulemererwa naye n’asuubizza okunoonyereza ku nsonga eno. Ekitongole kye nsi yonna kyalambika nti omuwendo gw’abakyala abalongoosebwamu abaana gulina kubeera wakati wa bakyala 10-15 ku buli 100 mu buli ddwaliro. Aba WHO bagamba nti okulongoosebwamu omwana, maama alina kusooka kulemererwa okuzaala bulungi.

headline: Poliisi etandise omuyiggo gw’ abakoze efujjo mukuziika Jakana Nadduli
text: Poliisi y’eggwanga etandise omuyiggo ku bawagizi ba NRM naba NUP abalwanidde mu maka ga Hajji Abdul Nadduli bwebabadde baziika mutabani we Jakana Nadduli eyafudde olunaku lw’eggulo ku Mmande. Jakana Nadduli yasangiddwa mu makaage nga afiridde mu buliri wabula abantu ab’enjawulo naddala bannabyabufuzi batandise okubaako bebasongamu nga bagamba nti balina kyebamanyi ku nfa ya Jakana. Era wano Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni yalagidde wabeewo okunoonyerea ku nfa ya Jakana ensi esobole okutegeera ekituufu. Wabula eggulo mu kumuziika e Kadunda – Kapeeka mu Nakaseke aba NRM nga bakuliddwamu Mpologoma Majjambere balwanaganye naba NUP oluvannyuma lwa Majjambere okubalemesa okwogera era omukolo negusooka gusanyalalamu okumala akaseera. Ekiwandiiko ekifulumiziddwa poliisi ku Lwokubiri, Omwogezi wa poliisi Fred Enanga agamba nti batandise okunoonyereza ku fujjo lino awamu n’akabinja k’abavubuka akamu akeefudde ekirala mu kutabangula emirembe. “ Waliwo aba Opozison abeeyisa mu ngeri etasaana ku mikolo gy’okuziika. Tulabula abantu bano era tubakowoola okwewala embeera eno kuba si ya buntubulamu,” Enanga bw’agambye. Ono alabudde abo bonna ababadde bakola kino okwewala okutabiikiriza eby’obufuzi mu kufa n’ ennyimbe kuba akaseera kano tekasosola era tekasanaamu bukyaayi. Enanga agamba nti bagenda kunoonya buli muntu eyakoze efujjo ekika kino ewa Nadduli asobole okusimbibwa mu mbuga z’amateeka era avunaanibwe. Enanga agamba nti abakugu bapoliisi bamaze dda okugenda mu ddwaliro lye Nakasero ewali abamu ku bakoseddwa nga ebiwundu byebafunya byakuyamba nnyo mukunoonyereza kwebaliko nga Poliisi.

headline: Okusunsulamu okwa gavumenti ez’ebitundu kukwatiddwa bubi – FDC
text: Bya Gladys NamyaloKampala Ekibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) kyemulugunyizza ku ngeri akakiiko k’ebyokulonda gye kakuttemu ensonga y’okusunsula abeesimbyewo ku bifo bya gavumenti ez’ebitundu naddala ekya bakkansala. Ssemujju Nganda nga ayogerako eri bannamawulire Okusinziira ku FDC abeesimbyewo babadde bangi nnyo era ng’abasinga babadde basula mu bifo awasunsulibwa mu bitundu nga; Mukono, Wakiso, Kampala n’ebirala. Okwemulugunya kuno kukoleddwa omwogezi w’ekibiina kino Ibrahim Ssemujju Nganda bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire leero ku kitebe ky’ekibiina e Najjanankumbi mu Kampala. “Okusunsulamu kuno kukwatiddwa bubi mu bitundu by’ebibuga; omuwendo gwa bakkansala gye guli omunene. Abeesimbyewo babadde basula mu bifo bino e Wakiso, Mukono n’ewalala. Mu bifo ebimu babadde balina okugulirira abakuumi ku ggeeti babakkirize okuyingira munda we basunsulira.” Ssemujju Nganda bw’agambye. Okusunsulamu abeesimbyewo bano kugenda kukomekerezebwa ku Lwokuna lwa wiiki eno nga 1/10/2020. Ssemujju yagambye nti e Wakiso enkola y’okukola ku oyo asoose okutuuka, baagivuddeko nebatandika okuwa ennaku buli kitundu kwe balina okukikolerako era nga n’okutuusa kati abantu bangi tebannakolebwako. Ono alumiriza nti obwedda okusinga bakola ku bannakibiina kya NRM era n’asaba Ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda okunoonyereza ku nsonga eno mu bwangu. Nganda ategeezezza nti okuva lwekiri nti abeesimbyewo bamaze okubasunsula, akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kalina okuvaayo okulambika enkug’aana bwe zigenda okukubibwa awamu n’abeesimbyewo abatalina ssente zigenda ku leediyo ne ttiivi bwe bagenda okunoonyaamu akalulu kano. Ono era ategeezezza nti wadde akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kaali kakkiriza enkung’aana ez’abantu abatonotono, wabula tekaateekako kkomo ku muwendo gw’abantu. Ssemujju asinzidde wano ku lw’ekibiina n’akungubagira eyali Mmeeya wa Kampala, Al Hajji Nasser Ntege Sebaggala eyafudde ku lun Lwomukaaga lwa wiiki ewedde. Mu bubaka obw’enjawulo ekibiina bwe kyafulumizza Sebaggala bamwogeddeko ng’omusajja abadde omumalirivu buli lw’abadde asalawo okubaako ky’akola. “Okuva omugenzi lwe yeesowolayo mu 1998 okuvuganya ku kifo ky’obwammeeya, yawa abantu bamufunampola n’abantu abatasomangako essuubi ly’amaanyi okwetaba mu by’obufuzi bwa Uganda era ekyo tugenda kukimujjukirirako lubeerera.” Ssemujju bw’agambye. Ssemujju yagasseeko nti Sebaggala abadde kyakulabirako mu by’obufuzi era ng’abadde talina lusozi lwonna lw’atya kuwalampa, ekintu ekyamufuula eddoboozi lya bannakampala era ng’emirundi mingi abadde abalwanirira.

headline: Aba NUP batongozza okusonda ssente  za Kampeyini
text: Bannakibiina ki NUP nga batomgozza okusonda ssente  Kamwokya Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi era Pulezidenti w’ekibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP) atongozza kaweefube w’okunoonya ssente ezinabayambako okunoonya akalulu atuumiddwa ‘Muda ku Muda’. Kaweefube Kyagulanyi yamutongozza ku Lwokubiri wali ku kitebe ky’ekibiina e Kamwokya nasaba bannayuganda bonna okuwaayo kyebalina kubanga beetaaga ssente mu kalulu kano. Kyagulanyi era yalabudde bannakibiina naddala abakakiiko k’ebyokulonda akalina okusunsulamu abakwatira ekibiina bbendera okwewala okulya enguzi kubanga eggwanga lyonna libataddeko amaaso. Omubaka Kyagulanyi yagambye nti,“Ffenna ffenna twenkana era tulina obuvunanyizibwa bwebumu. Tewali gwetugenda kusukkulumya ku munne ate tetulina gwetugenda kukakkanya ku mulala.” Ono yakuutidde akakiiko k’ebyokulonda akapya okumanya nti bebakutte ekifananyi kye kibiina era nga bannayuganda balinze okulaba nga boolesa obwerufu n’obwesimbu mukusalawo anakwata bbendera. Yazzeemu nakukkulumira ab’ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda ababalemesa okugenda ku mikutu gy’ebyempuliziganya egy’enjawulo wadde nga bakimanyi nti akalulu kano kakunoonyezebwa mu nkola ya sayansi nalaga nga bwebagenda okwongera okubatwala mu kkooti. Kyagulanyi asabye abavubuka okuvaayo beesimbewo kubanga lino ddembe lyabwe era bafube okulaba nga NUP oba Opozisoni esimbawo omuntu nalaga nga bwebalina enteekateeka y’okukolera awamu nga Opozisoni gyebafumba. Mu kwogera kwe, ssentebe akanoonya ssente era nga y’amyuka Ssaabawandiisi wa NUP Aisha Kabanda,yategeezezza nga bwebanoonya ssente akawumbi kalamba okusobola okutambuza kampeyini zabwe. Zino Kabanda agamba nti basuubira okuzijja mu bannayuganda abawera obukadde 12 okwetoloola ensi yonna era nga bajja kukola buli kimu okulaba nga buli nnusu etuukirizza ekigendererwa.

headline: Museveni alagidde ekkanisa y’omu Ndeeba eddemu ezimbibwe
text: Pulezidenti Museveni alagidde ekkanisa ya St. Peter’s mu Ndeeba eyamenyeddwa okuddamu okuzimbibwa mu bwangu ddala era nawera nga bweyegasse ku lutalo lw’okunnunula ekkanisa eno. Museveni yabyogedde ku nkya ya leero bweyabadde alambula ekkanisa eno eyakoneddwa wali mu Ndeeba. “Ngenda kukubira Bisoopu Kityo Luwalira era ettaka lijja kusigala nga lya kkanisa, negasse mu lutalo luno era tugenda kuzimba ekkanisa empya,” Museveni bweyagambye. Ekkanisa ya St. Peter’s yasendeddwa mu kiro kya Ssande bawanyondo ba kkooti abafunye olukusa okuva mu Kampala Capital City Authority (KCCA). Museveni yasabye akakiiko ka ‘ State House Anti Corruption Unit’ akakulirwa Edith Nakalema okunoonyereza ensonga eno. Akakiiko kano kabadde kamaze dda okukwarta abapoliisi wamu n’omukungu wa KCCA bakayambeko mu kunoonyerezza Omugagga Dodovico yagambibwa okubeera emabega w’okusenda ekkanisa eno nga alumirizza nti ekkanisa yiye. Museveni yasuubizza ‘Vicar General’ Augustine Kayemba nga bwamaze okuyingira mu nsonga eno agigonjoole. “Ndi mwenyamivu ku kyatuusewo ku kkanisa eno naye tugenda kubonereza buli yenyigiddemu,” Museveni bweyalambise. Museveni yategeezezza nti n’ ekkanisa naye yabadde mu nsobi, naye banditudde nebagonjoola ensonga eno nga tebamenye kkanisa. “Abantu bammwe nga abalamuzi balina okubaako ekkomo, mulabe kyebakoze. Wadde ekkanisa eyinza okuba nga yabadde mu nsobi naye banditudde neboogera mukifo ky’okumenya ekkanisa,” Museveni bweyagambye. Ono yawakkanyizza ebigambibwa nti gavumenti yabaddemu mu lukwe nategeeza nti ye mukulisitaayo atasobola kukkiriza kino.

headline: Bataata be basinze okukabassanya abaana abawala mu muggalo – Alipoota
text: Alipoota efulumiziddwa Minisitule y’ekikula ky’abantu n’abakozi, eraze nti abasajja naddala bataata mu maka be basinze okwenyigira mu bikolwa by’okukabassanya abaana okuva omuggalo lwe gwatandika mu mwezi Gwokusatu. Kamisona Fred Ngabirano nga aliko byanyonyola Kamisona w’abavubuka n’abaana mu Minisitule eno, Fred Ngabirano ategeezezza nti ebivudde mu ssimu gye baateekawo eya Sauti 116 okuyambirako abaana, eraze nti bafuna misango 3,673. Omuwendo guno gukola ebitundu 43 ku buli 100 era nga gino gyonna girumiriza bataata. “Ebitundu 77 ku buli 100 ku bantu abeenyigira mu bikolwa by’okukabassanya abaana abawala byakolebwa ba kitaabwe, eno y’ensonga lwaki tukwataganya n’obukulembeze obw’ensikirano wamu n’abalala abakwatibwako okumalawo omuzze guno, ” Ngabirano bw’agambye. Alipoota era eraga nti ebikolwa by’okukabassanya abaana okuva mu mwezi Gwokusatu gwalinnya okuva ku bitundu 20.1 ku buli 100 negutuuka ku bitundu 40 ku buli 100 mu mwezi Gwomusanvu. Ngabirano agambye nti essimu ge bafuna nga geekuusa ku bakazi gali 569 mu kiseera mu bbanga lya Janwari okutuuka mu Gwomwenda.Ono agamba nti nga gavumenti essira bagenda kuliteeka ku kuyigiriza bazadde bamanye engeri gye basobola okukwatamu abaana. Ono agasseeko nti emisango gy’okukulusanya abaana, okubakuba wamu n’obutafaayo ku baana gye gisinze obungi era nasaba abantu mubitundu ebyenjawulo okufaayo bakuume abaana bano naddala ab’obuwala. Alipoota era ennyonnyola nti essimu 199,000 ze zaakuba ku Sauti 116 era nga ku zino abasajja bakola ebitundu 57 ku buli 100, abakazi bali ebitundu 43 ku buli 100 ate abaana nebabeera ebitundu 12 ku buli 100. Bino we bijjidde nga Maama Nnaabagereka Sylvia Nagginda yaakamala okukubiriza abazadde baleme kufumbiza baana bawala nga tebanneetuuka era n’alaga okunyolwa nti ebikolwa by’okutulugunya abaana ate bisinga mu maka abaana gye bandifunidde obukuumi.

headline: Anita Among:  Muve ku ng’ambo, Sipiika Oulanyah akyali mulamu era ajjanjabwa
text: Amyuka Sipiika wa Palamenti, Anita Among asabye abantu okwesonyiwa eng’ambo ezitambuzibwa ku mitimbagano ku bulamu bwa Sipiika Jacob Oulanyah n’ategeeza nti akyali mulamu. Oulanyah yaddusiddwa mu ggwanga lya Amerika wiiki ewedde gy’akyali n’okutuusa kati ng’afuna obujjanjabi. Wabaddewo ebiyinting’ana nga biraga ng’embeera ya Sipiika Jacob Oulanyah bwe yatabuse ate abamu ne bategeeza nti yabadde avudde mu bulamu bw’ensi ekintu ekitali ekitabadde kituufu. Mu bubaka bw’atadde ku mutimbagano gwe ogwa Twitter, Among agamba nti abantu tebalina kugendera ku ng’ambo zino kuba teziriimu makulu era bulimba bwennyini. Okusinziira ku Among, Oulanyah akyafuna obujjanjabi era asabye bannayuganda okwongera okumusabira asobole okusukka amangu. “ Bannansi bannange abaami n’abakyala, Omukulembeze waffe era muganda waffe Rt. Hon. Jacob Oulanyah ali mukufuna obujjanjabi okuva mu basawo abakugu. Temugendera ku bulimba obuli ku mitimbagano ku bulamu bwe. Mbasaba mumusabire assukke mangu.” Among bw’annyonnyodde. Kinajjukirwa nti Ssabbiiti ewedde Omumyuka wa Sipiika yategeeza Palamenti nga Sipiika Oulanyah bw’ali omulwadde era nga yatwaliddwa mu ggwanga lya Amerika okusobola okufuna obujjanjabi obusingawo. Among agamba nti yasobodde okwogerako naye era n’amukakasa nti embeera egenda etereera.

headline: Uganda yetaaga Federo – Katikkiro
text: Kamalabyonna wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga, ategeezezza nga bwewaliwo obwetaavu Uganda okufuna enfuga ya Federo kiyambe ebitundu ebimu okwekolera ku bizibu byabyo mu bwangu. Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga Okwogera bino Mukuumaddamula yabadde ku ttendekero lya Buganda Royal Institute e Mengo mu Kampala ku Mmande nga aggulawo Olusirika lw’Olukiiko lwa Buganda olw’omwaka guno. “Nze sirabawa mutawaana ab’e Busoga bwebekolera ku nsonga zabwe nga ebyenjigiriza, ebyobulamu nze sirabawo. N’okugaba obukookolo, Ssebo gavumenti esinziire e Kampala egabe obukookolo e Masaba, bunatuuka. Waliyo ettaka libumbulukuka eyo e Buduuda, bwetuteekayo gavumenti eyamanyi oludda eyo tesobola kukola kwebyo?” Mayiga bweyabuuzizza. Mayiga yategeezezza nti eno yengeri yokka ebintu nga ebibira gyebisobola okukuumibwa wamu n’okukola ku bizibu ebiruma abantu mu bitundu ebyenjawulo. “Singa nalina obuyinza wandibaddewo omuntu azimba mu lutobazi mbu munnamakolero, tewali gwenaganyiza kuzimba mu ntobazi ntino musigansimbi,” Katikkiro bweyalambuludde. Abamu ku beetabye mu Lusirika luno Katikkiro yasabye abantu okukuuma ettaka lyabwe nga bwekirambikiddwa mu nsonga Ssemasonga za Buganda ettaano. Katikkiro yategezezza nti, okuzza Buganda ku ntikko gulina kubeera mulimu gwa bantu bonna ssi balondemu kubanga Bulange kitebe ekigatta abantu bonna era bfa tewali alinawo buzaale. “Okuzza Buganda ku ntikko, ssi mulimu gwabe Mengo, buli omu waali alina ettofaali lyalina okusaako. Ab’e Mengo be baani, abantu nze bagamba banzaala Kasanje ggombolola Ssabawaali Bukoto mu Buddu, eno ndi ku kyeyo nasomoka Lwera ssiri we Mengo,”Bwatyo Mayiga bweyategeezezza. Yasabye abantu okukolera awamu balwanyise obwavu nalambulula nti, eno y’ensonga lwaki baleeta puloojeekiti y’Emmwanyi Terimba era nabakuutira okukuuma ettaka kubanga lino lyelituulako obutaka bw’ebika bya Baganda eby’enjawulo. “Bwetutakuuma ttaka ennono ejja kusabulukukuka,” Mayiga bweyagambye. Katikkiro Mayiga yanyonyodde nti, buli lwe bakungaana mu nteekateeka y’Olusirika ekigendererwa kyabwe kibeera kya kuwangana magezi n’okulaba engeri gyebasobola okutambuliza awamu emirimu kiyambe Buganda okugenda mu maaso. Mayiga yalambise ababadde mu lusirika ku mirimu egy’enjawulo egyakolebwanga abantu abenjawulo okuli; Abataka, abasiige n’abaami wabula nga mu byonna banoonyangamu kya kunywezza Buganda n’okutaasa Nnamuswa Kabaka.

headline: Gavumenti egenda kugula ettaka ly’ekkanisa y’e Ndeeba eyamenyebwa
text: Gavumenti emalirizza enteekateeka z’okugulira Abakulisitaayo ba St. Peter’s Church mu Ndeeba, ettaka eryali lituddeko ekkanisa eno era nga likaayanirwa omugagga Dodoviko Mwanje amanyiddwa nga Dodo n’ekkanisa eno. Ekifo ewaali ekkanisa, gavumenti gyeyagala okugulira abakulisitaayo Omugagga Dodovico ne gyebuli eno akyakalambidde ng’agamba nti ettaka lirye era enkaayana zino ze zaavaako okumenya ekkanisa eweza emyaka 40 Ku biragiro by a kkooti, era okusinziira ku biwandiiko lyamuguzibwa ab’enju y’Omumbejja Evelyn Nachwa. Okusinziira ku kkooti ettaka lino lyakyusibwa mu bukyamu okudda mu mannya ga Bisoopu Danistani Nsubuga, Rev. Yuda Kitaka ne Esau Kizito era wano we yasinziira n’eragira ekkanisa okuva ku ttaka lino. Wabula oluvannyuma lw’okugimenya, Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni yavumirira ekikolwa kino era n’asuubiza gavumenti ye okuddamu okuzimba ekkanisa eno. Waliwo n’ekiwandiiko era ekyayisibwa mu kyapa kya Uganda Gazette nga 28 Ogwomunaana 2020 nga Minisita w’ebyettaka alabula abantu okwesonyiwa ettaka lino erisangibwa ku bulooko nnamba 7 Poloti 39 kubanga gavumenti yali eryagala era ng’egenda kuddamu okuzimbako ekkanisa eno. Mu mateeka singa Minisita abeera mumativu nti ettaka gavumenti ly’egenda okutwala ligenda kugasiza wamu abantu, ekitundu nnamba 3 mu tteeka erikkiriza gavumenti okutwala ettaka (Land Acquistions Act) limuwa obuyinza okweddiza ettaka eryo. Etteeka lino liragira gavumenti okulaga ky’egenda okulikozesa era eriyirire oyo yenna abadde nannyini lyo era wano ekibeera kiddako ye gavumenti okuleeta omubalirizi waayo n’alaba ssente ezigya mu ttaka lino olwo ne lisasulwa. Ekya gavumenti okugulira ekkanisa ettaka lino kireeseewo ebibuuzo kubanga waliwo omusango oguli mu kkooti ento e Makindye ng’eno abantu 22 okuli omugagga Dodovico n’abapoliisi abawerako bavunaanibwa omusango gw’okubba ettaka lino, okujeemera ebiragiro, okwekobaana bazze omusango awamu n’okwonoona ebintu. Ku nsonga eno, Munnamateeka Max Mutabingwa yategeezezza nti ekikolwa kya Minisita okuyisa ekiragiro ng’ayagala ettaka lino, kiraga nti gavumenti ekkiriza nti ettaka lino lya muntu mulala era nga kkooti yasalawo ku ani nannyini ttaka omutuufu. Ono yasabye kkooti egobe omusango oguvunaanibwa Dodovico ne banne kubanga bano bavunaanibwa omusango ogukwata ku ttaka gavumenti ly’eyagala okugula erikulaakulanye. Omulamuzi wa kkooti ento e Makindye, Prossy Katushabe yasabye abo bonna abawakanya ekya gavumenti okweddiza ettaka lino, okuwaayo okwemulugunya kwabwe eri Ssaabawaabi wa gavumenti.

headline: Abapoliisi ababadde batambulira mu “Drone” bakubye omukazi amasasi e Wakiso
text: Poliisi e Wakiso ekutte basajja baayo babiri nebaggalira olw’okukuba omukazi amasasi bwebabadde mu kikwekweto. Abakwate kuliko Erisa Muhumuza ne Evelyn Akello nga bano bebamu ku b’ebyokwerinda abayambako aba Uganda National Roads Authority (UNRA) okukwasisa amateeka mu disitulikiti eno. Kyategeerekese nti abapoliisi bano babadde batambulira mu mmotoka kika kya Drone nnamba UBJ 885Q eyali yakwatibwa poliisi. “Kigambibwa nti ku Lwokusatu nga September 28, ku ssaawa nga 10 ez’olweggulo, bano bagobye emmotoka ya Eria Twase era wakati nga bamugona bakubye amasasi agalumizza Violet Nansereko eyabadde ku bibye, ” Amyuka omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala n’emirilaano Luke Owoyesigire bwe yagambye. Owoyesigire agamba nti Nansereko bamututte mu ddwaliro e Mulago asobole okujjanjabwa. Ono akakasizza nti Muhumuza yeyakubye amasasi naye bakyagenda mu maaso n’okunoonyereza okuzuula ekyamuwaliriza okufulumya amasasi gano. Okusinziira ku poliisi emmundu egambibwa okukozesebwa mu kikolwa kino eri mu mikono gya poliisi ng’ ekizibiti nga okunoonyereza bwekugenda mu maaso.

headline: Abatunda eby’okulya bawereddwa okuyingira palamenti
text: Sipiika wa palamenti Rebecca Alitwala Kadaga  Palamenti eweze abatembeeyi abataundirayo ebintu eby’enjawulo oluvanyuma lw’abavubuka babiri, Mutasa Kafeero ne Senjako Dafala okubuuka okuva mu kabanyi awatuula abagenyi nebagwa ababaka webatuula.  Abakulira eby’okwerinda kati tebakyakkiriza muntu yenna atalina densite eraga nti akolera mu palamenti.  Kati abakkirizibwa bebabaka, abakozi wamu ne bannamawulire abakolera mu palamenti saako abalongoosa wamu nabakola mu birabo by’emmere abalina densite ezibakkiriza okuyingira.  Abasigadde baweebwa densite ey’ekiseera okusobola okukyalako mu palamenti. Ng’abavubuka tebannabuuka kugwa mu palamenti, abantu baabulijjo baatundanga ebintu eby’enjawulo omuli ebibala, emmere, amaggi n’ebintu ebirala.   Ababadde batunda eby’okulya bino aboogeddeko ne URN bagambye nti bafiiriddwa ssente nyingi olw’okugaanibwa okuyingira palamenti. Omu kubano agambye nti abadde akola 150,000 buli lunaku naye kati nga takyalina kyakola.  Omubaka akiikirira essaza ly’e Kazo   Gordon Bafaki ne munne akiikirira ebizinga by’e Bukooli, Abbot Ouma bagambye nti okunyweza eby’okwerinda tekitegeeza kugyako batembeeyi bano mirimu.   Kyokka ayogerera palamenti Helen Kaweesa yeeganye nti wabaddewo abatembeeyi abatunda ebyokulya mu palamenti.

headline: Bannaddiini basabye Pulezidenti aggule amasinzizo
text: Bannaddiini mu kibuga ky’e Ntebe basabye omukulembeze w’eggwanga aggulewo amasinzizo okusobola okukendeeza ebikolobero ebyeyongedde muggwanga. Bano bagamba nti abantu baweddemu omutima ogutya Katonda olw’akaseera amasinzizo ke gamaze nga maggale ne basaba Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni agaggule basobole okubalyowa emyoyo, badde eri omutonzi. Okusinziira ku Rev. Nathan Mulondo ng’ono y’asumba ekkanisa y’Omutukuvu Apollo esangibwa e Nkumba, ategeezezza nti abantu bangi beenyigidde mu bikolwa ebyettima n’obukaba olwokubulwa entiisa ya Katonda. Onoagambanti amasinzizo tegakoma ku kulyowa myoyo wabula galina n’enkolaebudaabuda abantu awamu n’okwenenyaeyamba ennyo abantu ne bagumira embeera y’okusoomoozebwamwe babeera bayita. Ate ye Omusumba w’ekkanisa ya Kingdom FaithChurch, Charles Kayisali Kiwanuka nayeagambanti ekkanisa ky’ekifo ekiyamba ennyo abantu okweggyako ebirowoozo ebyekko era n’ategeeza nti ekkanisa erina enkola egoberera amateeka agaatekebwawo ministule y’ebyobulamu ekyasinze okubeera ennung’amu, nabwekityo asabye gavumenti eggulewo amasinzizo mu bwangu. Kati ekirindiriddwa kwe kulaba oba Pulezidenti Museveni anaggula amasinzizo gano ekiro kya leero, bw’anaaba ayogerako eri eggwanga ku biragiro ebiggya eby’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona.

headline: MASAZA CUP 2021 | Ssese ekubye Kkooki 6-1, Bulemeezi ewangudde  Mawokota
text: Ttiimu y’essaza ly’e Ssese egudde ekiyiifuyiifu ku Kkooki n’egikuba ggoolo 6-1 n’etangaaza emikisa gyayo okuva mu kibinja kya Butikkiro ate Bulemeezi n’ekuba Mawokota ggoolo 1-0 mu mupiira oguyindidde ku kisaawe kya FUFA Technical Center Njeru ku Lwokuna. Ggoolo za Ssese ziteebeddwa abazannyi; Andrew Mukasa, Christopher Bwambale ne Abubaker Mayanja ateebye ggoolo 4, ate nga Issa Mugoya y’ateebye eya Kkooki. Omutendesi wa Ssese Edrisa Walusimbi agamba nti ekibaleetedde okuwangula omupiira guno kwe kuba ng’abazannyi be baguzannye nga fayinolo. Ye Kapiteeni wa Ssese, Allan Bukenya ategeezezza nti bagenda kuzimbira ku buwanguzi bwe bafunye olwaleero okuwangula omupiira gwayo oguddako, basobole okuyitamu okwesogga omutendera oguddako. Ggoolo ya Bulemeezi emu yokka eteebeddwa Shafiq Hakiramu mu ddakiika ey’ekkumi n’ettaano mu kitundu ky’omuzannyo ekisooka Ekibinja kino kati kigenda kukomekerezebwa olunaku olw’enkya n’emipiira ebiri wakati wa Bulemeezi ng’ettunka ne Ssese n’ogwa Mawokota ng’ezannya Kkooki.

headline: Museveni alonze Shifra Lukwago, Fr. Lukodo ne Kaheru ku bwakamisona
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni alonze abadde Minisita w’empisa wamu n’obuntubulamu, Fr. Simon Lukodo ne munnakibiina kya Democratic Party Shifra Lukwago, okubeera bakamisona b’akakiiko k’eddembe ly’obuntu aka Uganda Human Rights Commission mu ggwanga. Kinajjukirwa nti Fr. Lukodo yali yasuulibwa ku bwaminisita mu kyukakyuka Pulezidenti Museveni ze yakola ng’alonda abantu b’agenda okuweereza nabo mu kisanja kino ekipya. Abalala abalondeddwa ku bwakamisoma ye yali omukwanaganya w’ekitongole ekirafuubanira enfuga ya demokulaasiya ekya ‘Citizens’ Coalition for Electoral Democracy in Uganda (CCEDU), Crispin Kaheru, eyaliko kkansala wa KCCA, Shifra Lukwago ne Jackie Atuheire. Mu ngeri yeemu Mariam Wangadya, y’alondeddwa nga ssentebe w’akakiiko kano omuggya, era amannya ga bano bonna gasindikiddwa mu Palamenti basobole okusunsulwamu ku Lwokusatu, akakiiko ka Palamenti akakola ku kwekenneenya abantu ababeera balondeddwa omukulembeze w’eggwanga. “Akakiiko ka ‘Appointments Committee’ kagenda kusisinkana abantu abalondeddwa Pulezidenti ku Lwokusatu nga 25, August 2021 mu kisenge kya Conference Hall,” ekiwandiiko ekyafulumiziddwa kkiraaka wa Palamenti, Adolf Mwesigwa bwe kitegeezezza. Akakiiko kanoaka Uganda Human Rights Commission kaateekebwawo Ssemateeka wa 1995 okusobola okugoberera n’okunnyikiza eddembe ly’obuntu mu ggwanga. Era ebimu ku bifo bya bakamisona birudde nga bikalu era okulondebwa kwa Lokodo n’abalala kijjidde mu kiseera kituufu.

headline: Gen. Tumukunde yeetonze ku nsobi ze yakola ng’akyali mu gavumenti
text: Rukungiri Eyeesimbyewo ku bwapulezidenti, Lt. Gen Henry Tumukunde, yeetondedde bannayuganda ku nsobi ze yakola ng’akyali mu gavumenti, n’asaba bamusonyiwe era bamwesige. Gen. Henry Tumukunde Okwetonda kuno, Gen. Tumukunde, yakukoledde Rukungiri ku Lwokubiri n’annyonnyola nti mwetegefu okukolagana n’omuntu yenna ayagala okuleeta enkyukakyuka mu Uganda, singa abeera aweereddwa omukisa okufuuka Pulezidenti wa Uganda. “Kano ke kaseera ke tulina okukyusizaamu eggwanga lyaffe Uganda. Ndi mwetegefu okukola n’abantu abamaze mu Opozisoni emyaka 10 ate nabo abaakagiyingira ku lw’obulungi bwa Uganda.” Tumukunde bwe yagambye. Tumukunde yannyonnyodde nti enteekateeka y’okufuna avuganya omu ku bwapulezidenti ekyagenda mu maaso, era n’abasaba okuwagira omuntu yenna anaaba alondeddwa. Ono yasabye abantu okuvaayo mu bungi balonde ku lw’enkyukakyuka era bafube okulaba nga bakuuma obululu bwabwe, buleme okubbibwa. Okusooka waabaddewo okuwanyisiganya ebisongovu oluvannyuma lwa poliisi okukuba mu bawagizi ba Tumukunde ttiyaggaasi, bwe baabadde bakung’aanidde mu kifo ewaabadde walina okubeera olukung’aana luno. Poliisi yategeezezza nti bano baabadde bajeemedde ebiragiro by’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda ne Minisitule y’ebyobulamu Wabula Tumukunde yagambye nti ennamba y’abantu be yabadde nabo yabadde ntono ddala nga tewaabadde nsonga lwaki poliisi yabadde etabangula emirembe gyabwe. Tumukunde yasuubizza okutereeza ebyenjigiriza wamu n’ebyobulamu mu disitulikiti eno ng’abazimbira Ssettendekero n’eddwaliro eddene mu Rukungiri.

headline: Embalirira: Gav’t etadde omusolo ku Pulasitika, data ne Airtime
text: Gavumenti ya Uganda etadde omukolo ku ‘airtime ne data’ ng’omu ku kaweefube w’okwongera okufuna ensimbi ezinaakozesebwa mu mbalirira eno ey’omwaka 2021/ 20221 ebalirirwamu obuse 44 n’obuwumbi 7. Mu mbalirira eno, gavumenti esuubira obuse 22. 4 okubuggya mu bannayuganda munda mu ggwanga. Ku zin, obuse 20.8 zigenda kuggyibwa ku musolo ate obuse obuwera 1.5 ebuggye ku bintu ebirala nga engassi n’ebintu ebirala ebitali musolo. Bw’abadde asoma embalirira eno, Minisita omubeezi ow’ebyensimbi, Amos Lugoloobi, ategeezezza Palamenti nti gavumenti yasazeewo okuggyawo omusolo gwa OTT n’ereeta ogwa Data ne Airtime. Okusooka nga bateekateeka embalirira eno, eyali Minisitule w’ebyensimbi yategeeza Palamenti nga bannayuganda bwe baali basusse okwepena omusolo gwa OTT nga bakozesa enkola ya VPN. Minisita Lugoloobi annyonnyodde nti gavumenti ereese omusolo gwa bitundu 12.0% (12 ku buli 100) ku Airtime ne Data wabula n’agattako nti abakozesa emikutu gy’emitimbagano egisomesa bo si baakusasula musolo guno. Mu ngeri y’emu gavumenti etadde omusolo ku nnuuni z’emputa gwa bitundu 7% (7 ku buli 100) etwalibwa ebweru. Kino kiddiridde gavumenti ya Uganda okukkiriziganya ne China okutandika okutundayo ennuuni butereevu nga bayitira mu Minisitule y’ebyobulimi n’obulunzi awamu n’obuvubi eyakwasiddwa Minisita Frank Tumwebaze. Ennuuni y’emu ku bintu ebyettunzi ku katale k’ensi yonna nga kkiro egula wakati w’akakadde kamu n’emitwalo nkaaga (1.6M) n’obukadde 3 n’emitwalo nkaaga (3.6M). Eno bagikozesa mu kulongoosa abantu, okukola ebimu ku bitundu by’ennyonyi, eddagala ate waliwo n’amawanga agagirya ng’emmere ekigifudde eyettunzi n’evuganya n’ebintu ebirala ng’amafuta. Waliwo omusolo omulala ogw’ebitundu 5 ku buli 100 ne 10 ku buli 100 ku by’obugagga eby’omuttaka nga zzaabu esunsuddwa n’atannaba era mu ngeri y’emu gavumenti etadde omusolo ku bintu byonna ebikolebwa n’okuyingizibwa mu ggwanga nga bya Pulasitiki.

headline: Bobi Wine:  Museveni ali mu bbanga, amawanga g’ebweru gatandise okumusosola
text: Kampala Omukulembeze w’ekibiina kya  National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi amanyiddwa Bobi Wine, agamba nti Pulezidenti Museveni ali mu bbanga kuba amawanga g’ebweru batandise okumusosola. Bino Kyagulanyi yabyogedde oluvannyuma lwa Pulezidenti Museveni okutegeeza ng’ayita ku mutimbagano gwa Twitter  nti asisinkanye abakwanaganya ne bannakibiina kya NUP mu maka g’obwapulezidenti e Ntebe. Museveni yagambye nti bano bamulaze ebimu ku bintu NRM by’eremeddwa okukola era n’abasuubiza nti ebizibu bino bajja kubikolerako wamu nga ttiimu. Mu kwanukula ku Twitter, Bobi Wine yategeezezza nti kano kakodyo ka Museveni emyaka gyonna egiyise nga alaga abantu balimba nti babeera basaze eddiiro ekitali kituufu. “Ono omubbi w’akalulu era nnakyemalira akola buli kimu okusobola okulongoosa ekifaananyi kye. Alemeddwa okumanya nti obudde bwamuyitako, mu kalulu akawedde baatuuka ne kussa erifuna abajaasi ne babambaza ebyambalo bya NUP okulaga nti abantu baffe basaze ne beegatta ku NRM.” Kyagulanyi bwe yagambye. Bobi Wine yannyonnyodde nti Pulezidenti Museveni ali ku kyokya era awangaalira mu kutya kubanga kkooti y’ensi yonna ewozesa emisango gya Nnagomola  ejja ku mwetaaga ate nga n’amawanga agamu ag’ebweru agabadde gakolagana naye gamusuddewo. “Ategeka okwerayiza wiiki ejja mu bukyamu era yenna takyalina kitiibwa. Atandise okusikayo obumu ku bukodyo bwe obukadde asobole okwenaazaako enziro mu maaso ga bannansi be bamu batirimbudde, bawambye awamu n’okutulugunya,” Bobi Wine bwe yagasseeko. Kinajjukirwa nti n’okutuusa kati Kyagulanyi akyakalambira nti obuwanguzi bwe bwanyagibwa Pulezidenti Museveni ng’akozesa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda era ne bweyasalawo okuddukira mu kkooti era teyafunayo bwenkanya.

headline: Poliisi ezudde ebikola bbomu aba ADF bye babadde bakozesa okutigomya Uganda
text: Ab’ebyokwerinda mu Kampala bagamba nti bazudde ebyeyambisibwa okukola bbomu e Nabweru ku njegoyego za Kampala mu bikwekweto bye baliko okuzuula abatujju abakozesebwa abaAllied Democratic Forces(ADF) mu ggwanga. Bw’abadde ayogerako ne bannamawulire ku Mmande, Fred Enanga agambye nti oluvannyuma lwa bbomu ez’emirundi ebiri okubalukira mu Kampala ku CPS ne Parliamentary Avenue, bazze bakola ebikwekweto okuzuula abakolagana ne ADF mu bitundu by’eggwanga ebyenjawulo. Enanga agamba nti Ssabbiiti ewedde baliko amaka g’omu ku bateeberezebwa ge baalumbye e Nabweru ne basangayo ebikozesebwa okukola bbomu. “Nga bwe twongera okufufuggaza aba ADF abaagala okwongera okulumya bannayuganda, twazudde ebyeyambisibwa okukola bbomu omuli n’emisipi awamu ne Jaketi ezeeyambisibwa okwetulisizaako bbomu e Nabweru.” Enanga bw’agambye. Enanga agamba ebikwekweto bino bigendereddwamu okunoonya abo ababadde bakolagana ne ADF eyasooka okuwamba abantu ng’eyagala ssente wabula kati yadda mu kukola butujju n’okutabangula emirembe gya bannayuganda. Okusinziira ku Enanga, okuziyiza obutujju kye kimu kati ab’ebyokwerinda kye basinze okuteekako essira era agamba nti abamu ku bantu abakolagana n’abatujju bano baafulumye dda mu kibuga nga beekwese mu byalo naye n’ategeeza nti bagenda kukwatibwa akadde konna. Bino we bijjidde ng’ebitongole by’amawulire eby’ensi yonna bimaze okufulumya amawulire agalaga nga gavumenti ya Congo bwe yamaze edda okukkiriza Uganda okuyingira munda mu ggwanga eryo okusobola okufufuggaza abatujju ba ADF.

headline: Omuloodi waali: Erias Lukwago akulembeddemu banne ku bwaloodimmeeya
text: Kampala Omuloodi wa Kampala Erias Lukwago ayolekedde okulangirirwa nga Loodimmeeya omulonde ow’ekibuga Kampala nga mu lwokaano addirirwa Nabilah Naggayi Ssempala ow’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP). Omuloodi Erias Lukwago nga akuba akalulu Ebiva mukulonda biraga nti ku bifo eby’enjawulo awalonderwa Erias Lukwago akubidde waggulu mubitundu nga Lubaga, Makindye, Kawempe awamu n’awalala. Ono banne abalala bwebavuganya okuli Daniel Kazibwe amanyiddwa nga Ragga Dee ne Joseph Mayanja amanyiddwa nga Jose Chameleone, olwokaano terubatambulidde bulungi. Oluvannyuma lw’okulonda okukomekerezebwa era obululu nebutandika okubalibwa, abawagizi ba Loodimmeeya Erias Lukwago batandise okujaganya olw’ omuntu waabwe okulembera olwokaano luno. Bano okuli; abavuzi batakisi, ababoodabooda, abatembeeyi n’abantu abalala abagamba nti Lukwago abadde abalwanirira balabiddwako ku nguudo za Kampala nga bajaganya olw’obuwanguzi buno. E Nateete mu Mackay Zzooni, abawagizi ba Lukwago balabiddwako nga batambula n’empapula wamu ne kkalaamu nga bawandika obululu bwa Lukwago mubifo eby’enjawulo awalonderwa. Ku kifo awalonderwa ekya Njovu mu zzooni ya Lubya, Erias Lukwago afunye obululu 433 naddirirwa Nabilah n’obululu 161. Daniel Kazibwe nafuna obululu 42 ate Chameleone nafuna obululu 36 so nga Charles James Ssenkubuge afunyewo akalulu 06. Nakivubo Blue, Lukwago afunye obululu 305 ate Nabilah Naggayi afunye obululu 53, Kazinwe afunye 22, Joseph Mayanja 12 ate Charles Ssenkubuge owa DP nafuna akalulu 1 ate nga abalala tebafunyewo. Ekisinze okucamula bannakampala kwekuba nti nekifo kyenyini Nabilah walondera ku Katuuso Church of Uganda Lukwago awangulidde waggulu battunka nabo. Wano, Charles afunye 3, Nabillah Naggayi 95, Omuloodi Erias Lukwago afunye 414, Daniel Kazibwe 20 ate Joseph Mayanja nafuna 23.

headline: Abantu bakubiriziddwa okukola bagobe obwavu
text: Abantu ba Kabaka basabiddwa okubeera abakozi basobole okwegobako obwavu n’okuvvuunuka ebisoomoozo ebiriwo mu mbeera y’okukyusa embeera zaabwe. Okusaba kuno kukoleddwa Katikkiro w’ebyalo bya Kabaka, Omuk. Moses Luutu mu Lubiri e Mmengo bw’abadde atikkula Amakula okuva ku bantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka abawangaalira mu ssaza ly’e Lwengo. Omukungu Luutu abafalaasidde okwesigama ku bukozi ng’empagi ey’okubatuusa ku nkulaakulana okubayanba okuvvuunuka okusoomoozebwa kwe basing’ana mu bulamu kiyambe okuzza Buganda ku ntikko n’eggwanga likulaakulane. Ono awadde abaami ba Kabaka amagezi okunnyikiza obumu ky’agambye nti ly’ekkubo eryokubayamba okukomya nokwewala abakyalakimpadde abeesomye okwesenza ku ttaka ly’Obwakabaka.  Amakula gano galeeteddwa abantu b’eggombolola ya Kigemuzi Mutuba VII era bano Omuk. Luutu abasiimye olw’okutuukiriza ennono obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe ng’Abaganda obw’okulaba nti embiri za Beene teziggwaamu byakulya. Omwami wa Kabaka akulembeddemu bannabuddu ategeezezza nti basanga okusoomoozebwa okutambuza emirimu gya Beene obulungi olw’abantu abeefunyiidde okuwa amawulire amakyamu abantu ba Ssaabasajja ng’okukomya kino waliwo obwetaavu bw’emisomo. Amakula agaleeteddwa kubaddeko; emmere , ebisolo , ebibala n’ebirala.

headline: Abayizi babanguddwa mu by’obulimi n’obulunzi.
text: Abayizi okuva mu masomero ag’enjawulo okwetoloola Uganda bakungaanidde ku ssomero lya Gayaza High School okubangulwa wamu n’okubakubiriza okwenyigira mu by’obulimi kibasobozese okutangaaza ebiseera byabwe eby’omumaaso.    Guno mulundi gwa mukaaga (6th)nga abayizi babangulwa nga ku luno batambulidde wansi w’omulamwa, “LEARNING TO DO AND DOING TO LEARN”. Ng’omu ku kaweefube w’Obwakabaka okutumbula eby’obulimi ssaako n’okukubiriza abavubuka okwerwanako nga bayita mu nkola ya mmwanyi terimba, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga, alambudde ennimiro ssaako n’eddundiro ly’ente n’ebisolo ebitali bimu, ebirundibwa mu kifo ekifunda naye nga ofuna ekiwera. Katikkiro wa Buganda nga ali wamu ne Minisita omubeezi ow’obulimi n’obulinzi mu Buganda ku Gayaza High SchoolKatikkiro nga alambula emu ku famu y’ente ku Gayaza High School Katikkiro asimbye ekitooke ekiwooleddwa obulungi okusobola okukula n’ekiriisa, era alambudde ekyuuma ekiwoza amanda agafumbisibwa nekigakuuma nga akola bulungi. Katikkiro nga asimba ekitooke Katikkiro nga alaba ekyuuma ekiwoza amanda agafumbisibwa Mu bubaka bwe, Katikkiro agambye nti Abavubuka beetaaga okumanya nti ekintu ekisinga obukulu mu bulamu ssi kyekyo oli kyakola oba kyeyegwanyiza, wabula kyekyo ekimuwa essanyu nga byokola bitambula era obulimi kyekimu kubintu omuntu byayinza okukola nagaggawala. Era abaana balina okukimanya nti obulimi ssi kibonerezo, wabula kukozesa bwongo n’ogaggawala. Agasseeko nti okubeera mu bulamu obulungi tekitegeeza kuba lawyer, kitegeeza kukola Kintu ekikuwa ensimbi ggwe nab’omu makaago ne mubeera bulungi. Farm Camp yeetabiddwamu amasomero 91 okwetoloola eggwanga.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga atongozza omujoozi gw’emisinde gy’ Amazaalibwa ga Kabaka ag’e 67
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga atongozza omujoozi ogugenda okwambalibwa mu misinde mubunabyalo egigenda okuddukibwa ng’Obuganda bujaguza amazaalibwa ga Kabaka ag’emyaka 67 awamu n’akakiiko akateesiteesi. Bwabadde atongoza olukiiko luno mu bimuli bya Bulange ku Lwokubiri, Katikkiro agambye nti okukuza amazaalibwa ga Kabaka kuba kukuza bulamu y’ensonga lwaki buli mwaka gatambulira ku miramwa egy’okulwanyisa endwadde ez’enjawulo nga ne kumulundi guno gali ku kulwanyisa Mukenenya. “Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye okusimbula abaddusi mu misinde gy’Amazaalibwa nga July 3 mu Lubiri e Mmengo. Okukuza amazaalibwa ga Kabaka tubeera tukuza bulamu. Mbakubiriza tudduke emisinde wonna gyemuli ate twongere okwewala Mukenenya,” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’ ategeezezza.   Owek. Mayiga akunze abantu ba Kabaka okweyuna emisinde gino era nabasaba okugula emijoozi mu budde kuba gyatuuse dda ku katale era neyeebaza Airtel Uganda, dfcu Bank ne UNAIDS okuwagira emisinde gino. Ate ye Ssenkulu w’ekitongole kya Majestic Brands, Omuk. Remmy Kisaakye yeebazizza aba Airtel olw’okuwagira enteekateeka za Buganda ez’enjawulo. “Twagala okwebaza Airtel Uganda okukkiririza mu mulamwa guno era nokutambula naffe. Twatandika n’ abaddusi 1000 mu 2014 naye kati tutunuulidde ababbi 80,000,” Omuk. Remmy Kisaakye bw’alambuludde. Akakiiko kano kakulirwa Omumyuka Asooka owa Katikkiro era Minisita wobuyiiya n’enzirukanya y’emirimu Oweek Prof Twaha Kigongo Kaawaase, amyukibwa oweek Henry Sekabembe Kiberu. Bammemba abalala kuliko, Owek Dr. Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma, Owek. Noah Kiyimba, Omukungu Remmie Kisakye, Afande Stanley Musaazi n’abalala. Emisinde gyakuddukibwa ku Ssande nga 3/ July/ 2022 mu Lubiri e Mmengo.

headline: Tulina kubeera balamu okukulaakulana – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abantu okufaayo ennyo ku bye balya kibayambe okubeera abalamu era bakulaakulane. Katikkiro Mayiga nga atongoza Health Heart Foundation Okusaba kuno Katikkiiro akukoledde ku Mestil wano mu Kampala ng’atongoza ekibiina kya Health Heart Foundation ekirafuubana okulaba ng’abantu bamanya ebifa ku mitima gyabwe wamu n’okugikuuma okuva ku ndwadde nga kitandikiddwawo eyali Minisita, Ritah Namyalo Kisitu. Katikkiro Mayiga agambye nti omutima kintu kikulu nnyo mu mubiri kubanga gwe gukola ng’ebbomba epika omusaayi ogusaasaanira ebitundu by’omubiri ebyenjawulo olwo omuntu n’asobola okubeera omulamu era eyeeyagaza. Mayiga ategeezezza nti emu ku ngeri abantu gye basobola okukulaakulana kwe kubeera nti abantu balamu era nga y’ensonga lwaki Obwakabaka bwasalawo okusoosoowaza ebyobulamu kuba abantu bwe babeera abalamu obulungi n’okwezimba kwanguwa. “Tetuyinza kukyusa mbeera z’abantu era tetuyinza kwogera ku kuzza Buganda ku ntikko ng’abantu bonna balwadde.Twagala eggwanga eririmu abantu abalamu, eggwanga nga litambula lidda mu maaso awo nno eby’obulamu byankizo.” Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Ono asabye abantu bulijjo okufaayo ku ebyo bye balya era nga kyandibadde kirungi beewale ebintu ng’amasavu, ennyama, butto, ssukkaali n’omunyu era bakendeeze ne ku bungi bw’emmere gye balya kubanga omubiri mu kikula kyagwo tegwetaaga mmere eyitiridde. Katikkiro alaze akabi akali mu kunywa omwenge oguyitiridde ne Ssigala wabula bayitirize okulya enva endiirwa ezifumbiddwako ekitono kubanga omubiri gwe byagala. Akubirizza abantu okukola dduyiro awamu n’okufuna akadde okutambulamu kiyambe okukuuma omubiri nga mulamu bulungi kiyambe omutima obutalumbibwa ndwadde. “Mu bitundu by’omubiri nze ndowooza nti mutima gwe gusinga obukulu kubanga bwe gubeera omulwadde ebitundu ebirala byonna tebikola bulungi.” Mayiga bw’agasseeko.
