Minisita Nakiwala Kiyingi yasiimye aba Plascon okukwatagana ne FUFA bakulaakulanye ebyemizannyo. Okujja kwa Plascon kutegeeza nti ekirabo omuwanguzi kyatwala kyeyongeddeko nga mu myaka 2 egijja, omuwanguzi waakutwala obukadde 50 okuva ku bukadde 30 obubaddewo. Akulira ebyokuvuganya ku kibiina kya FUFA, Hajjat Aisha Nalule yannyonnyodde nti empaka z’omwaka guno zigenda kuzannyibwa mu ngeri ya njawulo olw’ekirwadde kya COVID-19. Okusinziira ku Nalule, ttiimu ezigenda okuzannya omulundi guno, zigenda kubeera ntono nga zigenda kubeera 32 zokka okuva mu Uganda Premier League ne Fufa Big League. Empaka zino zaakutandika mu mwezi ogujja Ogwokuna nga 5, ate empaka z’akamalirizo zisambibwe nga 24 Ogwomusanvu, 2021 ku kifo ekinaalangirirwa. Omuwanguzi w’empaka zino y’anaakiikirira Uganda mu kikopo kya Afrika ekya Caf Confederation Cup. Engabana ya ssente zino; Omuwanguzi – 50m Owookubiri – 20m Abatuuse ku Semi – 12m buli omu Abatuuse ku Quarter –6m buli omu Abakomye ku ‘Round of’ 16 – 3m buli omu Abakomye ku Round of 32 – 1.5m buli omu.

headline: FDC ekomye okwekwasa NUP ku by’okuwangulwa ku bwasipiika – Mpuuga
text: Kampala Omukulembeze w’oludda oluvuganya mu Palamenti y’e 11, Mathias Mpuuga Nsamba, atabukidde ab’ekibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) n’abasaba bakomye okwekwasa ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) ku by’okuwangulwa ku bwasipiika. Kino kiddiridde omubaka Ssemujju Nganda eyavuganyizza ku bwasipiika ne yavuganyizza ku bumyuka bwa Sipiika, Yusuf Nsibambi, okulumiriza aba NUP okukwatagana n’ekibiina kya NRM mu kulonda kuno. Owek. Mpuuga agamba nti oluvannyuma lw’okulemwa akalulu kati FDC esazeewo kwekwasa kibiina kya NUP. “FDC emanyi bulungi ekituufu ekyatuukawo naye kati baasazeewo kwekwasa NUP kuba n’abantu baabwe bennyini tebaabalonda, basazeewo obutabeera baamazima.” Owek. Mpuuga bw’ategeezezza bannamawulire. Owek. Mpuuga agasseeko nti Ssemujju naba FDC balina okumanya nti mu maaso gye tulaga bweba tebeekakasa kukola kimu waakiri bakireke mu kifo ky’okwekwasa abalala. Mu kulonda kuno Ssemujju yafunye obululu 15 bwokka mu kalulu akaawanguddwa Jacob Oulanyah n’addirirwa Rebecca Kadaga. Mpuuga agamba nti tebakkaanyangako nga NUP kubaako muntu wa NRM yenna nga FDC bw’ebijweteka.

headline: Ssaabaminisita Nabbanja alabudde abakozi ba gavumenti ku nsimbi ezisaasaanyizibwa mu misomo egitaggwa
text: Ssaabaminisita wa Uganda, Robinah Nabbanja atabukidde abakulu mu Minisitule y’ebyobulimin’abasaba okutuusa empeereza eri bannansi era bakomye n’okusiibanga mu misomo egyabuli kadde nga tewali kyanjawulo kye bawa bannansi. Nabbanja abawadde amagezi okusoosowaza empeereza eri abantu mu myaka gino etaano kuba bye bimu ku biruubirirwa Pulezidenti Museveni bye yasuubiza bannayuganda nga alayira. “Mulina kukyusa bulamu bwa balimi so si obwammwe ng’abakozi ba Minisitule. Eby’okusaasaanya ssente z’omuwi w’omusolo ku misomo egitaggwa birina okukoma.” Nabbanja bw’agambye. Bino Nabbanja yabyogeredde mu kuggalawo omusomo gw’ennaku ettaano ogwategekeddwa Minisitule y’ebyobulimi nga gwayindidde ku National Leadership Institute e Kyankwanzi. Okusinziira ku Nabbanja, ebiruma abalimi bimanyiddwa nga mu bino mulimu ebikozesebwa ebitali bya mutindo, ebbula ly’akatale, ebbula ly’amazzi awamu n’ebizibu ebirala nga kino kye kiseera bikolebweko, basobole okufuna mu mulimu gwabwe. ono yabasabye okumanya nti balina okulondoolaempeereza za gavumenti ez’enjawulo okukakasa nti bannansi bafuna ekyo kyennyini ekibagwanidde. “Omuntu yenna agula oba ayambako okugula ensigoez’ebicupuli, ebigimusa oba eddagala, abeera azzizza musango era tasaana kubeera mukozi wa gavumenti. Tulina okulwanyisa obulyi bw’enguzi n’abo abavumaganya gavumenti.” Nabbanja bwe yagambye.

headline: Gavumenti esabiddwa okutereeza eby’obulamu eggwanga likulaakulane
text: Abakulira ekitongole ki Kabaka Foundation basabye gavumenti eyawakati okutereeza eby’obulamu mu ggwanga kiyambeko okukyuusa endowooza z’abantu ku kugaba omusaayi. Bino byogeddwa Ssenkulu w’ekitongole kino, Omuk. Eddy Kaggwa Ndagala bw’abadde akuliddemu okukung’aanya omusaayi mu ssaza lye Butambala mu ggombolola ya Musaale Budde. “Uganda tukyalina ebizibu bingi naye ebitutawaanya tetunakola nguudo, tetunakola ki naye embalirira yaffe esinga obunene egende nnyo mu by’obulamu kuba abantu bwebanaaba abalamu n’enkulaakulana ejja kwanguwa,” Omuk. Ndagala bw’agambye. Abantu bagijumbidde okuyambako ku bantu abagwetaaga nga enteekateeka eno ebadde ekulembeddwamu akulira ezikkiriza ya balokole mu Mpigi omusumba Godfrey kabugo akiikiriddwa Lwakatale Isaac. Omusumba Lwakatale yebaziiza obwakabaka olw’okuwoma omutwe mu nteekateeka y’okugaba omusaayi era n’akubiriza abantu okugaba omusaayi n’okwagala olwo lwebanafuna nabo obuyambi bwebaliba batuuse okugwetaaga. Akiikiridde Katambala Hajj Sulaiman Magala ye mumyuka wa Katambala Haji Lubega Manooti agambye nti okugaba musaayi kiba Kya bulungi bwabuli omu era n’asaba abantu okukitwala ng’e kikulu nnyo. Omukungu okuva mu kitongole ki Red Cross, Sarah Muteegombwa, yeebazizza abantu ba Kabaka abajjumbidde enteekateeka eno era nawera okumalawo ekizibu kino nga akolera wamu ne Buganda. Enteekateeka eno ekuliddwamu ekitongole ki Kabaka Foundation ne bannamikago okuli Uganda Red Cross Society awamu naba Uganda Blood Bank.

headline: Abayivu ku mirimu emisome mugatteko okulima – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Kamalabyonna wa Buganda, Owek. Charles Peter Mayiga abasoma abasabye okweyuna okulima bakugatte ku mirimu egy’enjawulo gye bakola bwe baba baagala okugenda mu maaso n’eggwanga okukulaakulana. Okusaba kuno Katikkiro Mayiga akukoledde mu kulambula abalimi b’Emmwanyi mu ssaza ly’e Gomba mu nteekateeka y’Emmwanyi Terimba ku Lwokusatu, mu kaweefube gw’abaddeko ow’okwagazisa abantu okulima emmwanyi awamu n’okutumbula omutindo gwazo. Bw’abadde alambula ennimiro ya Mw. Fred Kitandwe ku kyalo Matongo, Katikkiro Mayiga abayivu abawadde amagezi ku bye bakola okugattako okulima n’okulunda basobole okwongera ku nnyingiza yaabwe. “Bamwagala luzungu batugyeko akajanja balabire ku mwami Kitande n’omukyala ne Ssentebe wa Bucadef kubanga ono naye Yinginiya ate si bano bakamyufu naye bayingiya abaagenda e Makerere naye ennimiro azirina. Kaakati Yinginiya alima atya ate munnamateeka n’ogamba nti emmwanyi tezifuna.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Kamalabyonna asookedde wa Mw. Joseph Ssebandeke ku kyalo Kateete mu ggombolola y’e Kabulasoke era asinzidde wano n’akunga abantu okwongera okulima emmwanyi bakomye okwekwasa akawuka k’emmwany, kuba eziriwo kati teziriibwa buwuka. “Oli asobola okuba ne yiika emu ey’olusuku n’ayunja amatooke buliwiiki naye ggwe n’oba ne yiika 10 ne bigaana. Ne ku mmwanyi bwekiri ennima, okuwembera, okubikka obunyogovu busigale mu ttaka, okuweta zizaale amatabi.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agambye. Katikkiro Mayiga abalimi abawadde amagezi okulunda ebisolo bisobole okubawa obusa bwe basobola okukozesa ng’ebigimusa, emmwanyi zaabwe zisobole okufuna empeke ennene n’omutindo omulungi, basobole okufunamu ssente ezeegasa. Omwami w’essaza Gomba, Celestino Musisi ategeezezza Katikkiro Mayiga nti eky’okusaba abaganda okuddamu okulima emmwanyi kikulu nnyo kuba bangi bakulaakulanye. Mu kulambula kuno, Kamalabyonna awerekeddwako Minisita w’Ettaka, Obulimi n’obutonde bw’ensi, Owek. Hajjat Mariam Nkalubo, Minisita omubeezi ow’obulimi n’Obwegassi, Owek Hajji Amisi Kakomo, Minisita w’Amawulire era Omwogezi w’Obwakabaka, Owek Noah Kiyimba, Omwami w’essaza Butambala, Katambala Hajji Sulaiman Magala, Kasujju Mark Jiingo Kaberenge, Kitunzi ow’e Gomba, n’abakungu mu bitongole by’Obwakabaka ebyenjawulo.

headline: Tetulina ssente za NUP ze twatutte – Ennanga
text: Kampala Poliisi y’eggwanga evuddeyo n’etangaaza ku byogerwa bannakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) nti bano lwe baakoze ekikwekweto baabuzeewo ne ssente z’ekibiina ezisoba mu bukadde 20 awamu n’emikono egisemba Omubaka Kyagulanyi okwesimbawo ku bwapulezidenti. Omwogezi wa Poliisi mu ggwanga, Fred Ennanga Omwogezi wa Poliisi, Fred Ennanga, agambye nti bino si bituufu kubanga aba NUP abamu bagamba bwali obukadde 23 ate abalala bagamba musanvu ekiraga obutakwatagana mu bigambo byabwe. “Waliwo abagamba nti twabbye emikono gya NUP, naye aba NUP baveeyo n’olukalala lw’ebintu bye bagamba bye twabbye naffe tulina olwaffe, omulamuzi ajja kutulamula,” Ennanga bw’alambise. Kino kiddiridde ekikwekweto poliisi kye yakoze ku Lwokusatu ku kitebe kya NUP e Kamwokya n’ekwata abamu ku bannakibiina awamu n’okutwala ebimu ku byambalo by’ekibiina poliisi by’egamba nti bifaanana eby’amagye. Ennanga agambye nti kino kigendereddwamu kwonoona kifaananyi kya poliisi y’eggwanga naye ng’aba NUP bye boogera tebiriiko mutwe na magulu. Ku Lwokusatu oluvannyuma lw’ekikwekweto kya Poliisi, Omwogezi wa NUP, Joel Ssenyonyi yategeezezza bannamawulire nti wadde emikono egiwerera ddala 7000 gyali gitwaliddwa Poliisi, naye Bannayuganda abaagibawa baali bakyaliyo era nti bajja kuddayo bagifune. Ssenyonyi yannyonnyodde nti bagenda kukwatagana ne bannamateeka baabwe okulaba ekiddako kubanga tebayinza kukkiriza bumenyi bw’amateeka kugenda mu maaso. Ono yalaze nti, bino byonna byabadde bigendereddwamu kulemesa Robert Kyagulanyi (Bobi Wine) okwesimbawo naye n’agumya bannayuganda ng’ono bw’agenda okwesimbawo awatali kulemesebwa. Kinajjukirwa nti ku Lwokusatu poliisi era yakola ekikwekweto ku bantu bonna ababadde batunga, abatunda n’okusaasaanya ebyambalo bya NUP era nga bano abasoba mu 30 baamaze dda okusimbibwa mu kkooti.

headline: Aba NRM abaagala Uganda muyambeko tuggye Museveni mu buyinza – Gen. Mugisha Muntu
text: Wakiso Alina omumuli gw’ekibiina kya Alliance for National Transformation (ANT), Gen. Mugisha Muntu, akoowodde abawagizi ba NRM abaagaliza Uganda ebirungi, bayambeko mu kusindiikiriza Pulezidenti Museveni ave mu buyinza. Gen. Mugisha Muntu nga anoonya akalulu mu Busiro Muntu yategeezezza nti abantu bonna ababadde bakyawagira Pulezidenti Museveni ekintu eky’omugaso kye basobola okukolera eggwanga, kwe kulaba nga bamuwummuza kubanga eggwanga lyonna alitadde ku bunkenke olwo butayagala kuta buyinza. Okusaba kuno Muntu yakukoledde Mende mu Wakiso olunaku lw’eggulo ng’anoonya obululu obunaamuwanguza akalulu k’Obwapulezidenti aka 2021. “Gen. Museveni bw’awummula amagye gajja kuba nga gawummudde, poliisi n’ebitongole by’okwerinda bijja kuba nga biwummudde, kubanga ensobi zonna ze bakola kati bazikolera ku biragiro bya Pulezidenti Museveni.” Mugisha Muntu bw’agambye. Muntu yawabudde nti abantu e Libya baali mu bulamu bulungi nnyo naye bwe baalemwa okukyusa obukulembeze mu mirembe, ebintu byayonooneka, n’asaba aba NRM okubayambako banunule eggwanga. Eyaduumirako amagye, Gen. Muntu yagambye nti wadde bava mu kitundu kye kimu ne Museveni, naye bawukanya enzikiriza n’endowooza zaabwe kubanga buli omu ebintu abiraba bulala. “Saalina lutalo naye ng’omuntu era singa nkyali mu NRM kubanga sirwanangako naye ng’omuntu, naye tetukkiriziganya mu nkola. Era waliwo ambuuzizza e Buloba nti Muntu ggwe ne Museveni nga muva wamu, kituufu naye ekitwawula y’enzikiriza n’endowooza.” Muntu bwe yannyonnyodde. Ono yasabye bannayuganda buli omu okuwaayo ky’alina bayambeko ebibiina ebivuddeyo okununula eggwanga mu kaseera kano nga Pulezidenti Museveni aggyeeyo amaanyi gonna, okubusigaza. Alina bbendera ya ANT ku kifo ky’omubaka wa Busiro East mu palamenti, Hamidah Nassimbwa, yasinzidde wano n’asaba abantu mu Busiro okubeesiga balonde abantu ANT b’ebawadde kuba bonna ba nsonga.

headline: Kkooti egaanye okuddamu okubala obululu bwa Nyanzi, Nsereko awangudde
text: Kampala Omulamuzi wa kkooti esookerwako e Mmengo, Esther Nsambu, agobye okusaba kwa munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Fred Nyanzi Ssentamu kwe yateekayo ng’ayagala akalulu kaddemu okubalibwa. Omubaka Muhammad Nsereko Nyanzi yaddukidde mu kkooti ng’alumiriza akakiiko k’ebyokulonda okukwatagana n’Omubaka Muhammad Nsereko ne bakwata mu kalulu era Nsereko n’alangirirwa ku buwanguzi bw’omubaka wa Kampala Central kyatakkaanya nakyo. Bw’abadde awa ensala ye omulamuzi Nansambu agambye nti Nyanzi yeesigama ku bigambo obugambo okutali bujulizi n’addukira mu kkooti ng’asaba obululu buddemu okubalibwa. Ono agambye nti kkooti ye terina buyinza kuddamu kusaba kwa Nyanzi bw’atyo omusango n’agugoba era n’alagira Nyanzi aliyirire Nsereko ssente z’asaasaanyizza mu musango guno. Okusinziira ku byava mu kalulu, Omubaka Nsereko yafuna obululu 16,998 ate Nyanzi n’afuna 15,975. Mu mpaaba ye Nyanzi yategeezezza nti okulonda kwonna wamu n’okubala obululu kwalimu emivuyo era gino gyakolebwa kakiiko ka byakulonda awamu ne baagenti ba Nsereko. Ono agamba abantu be abalina okulondoola akalulu kano baaganibwa okutuuka mu bifo ebimu ebironderwamu. Ono agamba nti emivuyo okusinga gyali mu bifo ebironderwamu omuli; Summit View, Nakasero 1 ne 2, Hoima Flats awamu n’awalala. Nyanzi yannyonnyodde nti olw’okuba abamu ku baagenti be baagobwa mu bifo ewalonderwa, baalemwa okuteeka emikono ku mpapula okwalangirirwa ebivudde mu kulonda n’omuwanguzi. Nyanzi yategeezezza kkooti nti baagenti ba Nsereko bajingirira empapula z’ebivudde mu kalulu era ne basaanyaawo kkopi entuufu awamu ne vvulugu omulala mungi. Wano we yasinzidde n’asaba kkooti ekkirize obululu buddemu okubalibwa naddala obwo obwakubwa ku Balikuddembe Primary School, KCC Primary School, Seroma Parking Yard, All saints, Martin Road, Old Kampala SS, National Theatre, Nakivubo Road, Basajjabala Taxi Park, Kampala Library, Bombo Road awamu n’ebifo ebirala, kkooti ky’egaanye.

headline: UPDF erabudde abeesomye okulemesa Museveni okulayira
text: Kampala Eggye lya UPDF lirabudde abo bonna abalowooza nti bayinza okulemesa okulayira kw’omukulembeze w’eggwanga awamu n’abantu abakozesa olulimi olusiga obukyayi n’okukuma mu bantu omuliro. Okulabula kuno kukoleddwa omwogezi w’amagye, Brig Gen. Flavia Byekwaso, olwaleero ku Mmande bw’abadde mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire.  Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta  Museveni asuubirwa okulayira omwezi ogujja ku kisanja kye ekyomukaaga oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula banne bwe bavuganya ku kalulu ka 2021.Byekwaso agamba nti waliwo bannayuganda abategeka okutabula emikolo gino naye tebajja kubakkiriza kuba babeetegekedde. “Bannayuganda abamu balowooza nti basobola okutuukiriza ebigendererwa byabwe nga balemesa Pulezidenti okulayira.” Brig Gen. Byekwaso bw’ategeezezza. Ono alaze nga bwe baliko ebipande ebibadde bikuma mu bantu omuliro bye bakutte nga biriko ebigambo ebisosola mu mawanga , “Tajja kulayira n’omuganda afugeko.” Byekwaso agamba nti beetegekedde embeera yonna eneebaawo singa wabaayo abantu abaagala okulemesa omukolo guno. Kinajjukirwa nti akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kaalangirira Yoweri Kaguta Museveni ku buwanguzi kyokka munne bwebaali ku mbiranye Robert Kyagulanyi n’abigaana  ng’agamba akalulu kaalimu okubbira. Kyagulanyi yaddukira mu kkooti kyokka nayo omusango n’aguggyayo ng’agamba nti Ssaabalamuzi Alfonse Owiny Dollo yali alaze kyekubiira mu musango guno.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga akuutidde abakulira ebitongole  okuyiiya bayite mu mbeera y’ebyenfuna esomooza
text: Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abakulira ebitongole mu Bwakabaka okubeera abayiiya kibayambe okuyita mu mbeera y’ebyenfuna eriwo mu ggwanga. Ensisinkano eno ebeerawo buli mwaka n’ekigendererwa eky’okusala entotto ku ngeri ey’okwongera amaanyi mu ntambuza y’emirimu gy’Obwakabaka nga eyindidde mu Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokutaano.  “Tuli mu biseera bizibu olwa COVID-19, ensimbi zinaabuuse ate tekiri wano wokka ensi zonna zirina ekizibu. Ebintu birinnya ebbeeyi ate nenyingiza ntono, awo ebitongole namakampuni mulina okukanya enkasi mu mbeera eno enzibu,” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, omulimu omukulu ebitongole ne kampuni z’Obwakabaka byezirina kwe kutambuza emirimu gya Kabaka.  Owek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti mu mbeera nga Buganda terina Federo waliwo okusomooza ku ngeri obuweereza gyebulina okutuuka ku bantu nasaba abaami okuyiiya engeri ez’enjawulo okutumbula embeera z’abantu. Owek. Mayiga abeebazizza olw’emirimu egikoleddwa kubanga be betooloolerwako emirimu gy’Obwakabak gyonna. Ensisinkano yeetabiddwamu Ssabawolereza wa Buganda, Oweek. Christopher Bwanika ne Minisita w’Olukiiko, Amawulire, Kkabineeti Abagenyi, era Omwogezi w’Obwakabaka, Oweek. Noah Kiyimba.

headline: AKAMYUFU KA NRM : Muwala wa Kuteesa agaanye ebyavuddemu, agamba baamubbye
text: Abadde avuganya ku bbendera y’ekibiina kya NRM mu Mawogola North era muwala wa Minisita Sam Kuteesa, Shartis Musherure, awakanyizza ebyavudde mu kamyufu k’eggulo ng’alumiriza muganda wa Pulezidenti Museveni, Aine Kaguta Sodo nti, akalulu yakakuttemu.  Godfrey Aine Sodo Kaguta alangiriddwa ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda mu NRM ku buwanguzi n’obululu 17343 munne Musherure yafunye 16104 ate Salim Kisekka n’akung’aanya 4274. Oluvannyuma lw’okulangirira Sodo, Mushereru yalagiriddewo nti abbiddwa era n’agamba nti okwemulugunya kwe agenda kukuteeka mu buwandiike era asuubira abakulu okukutunulamu. “Akalulu kabuzeemu obwerufu era tekabadde ka bwenkanya. Sigenda kukkiriza bivuddemu. Tetuwanguddwa wabula batubbye.” Mushereru bwe yagambye. Ebimu ku bintu Mushereru byawakanya ky’ekyokuba ng’ebyavudde mu byalo mukaaga byalaze nti teyafunyeeyo wadde akalulu akamu ng’obululu bwonna bwatwaliddwa Aine, ky’agamba nti tekisoboka mu kalulu ak’amazima. “Ng’enda kuwaayo okwemulugunya kwange naddala ku byalo bino omukaaga byesaamatidde era nsuubira nti akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kajja kuwa ensala yaako ku nsonga eno.”Mushereru bwe yasuubizza. Ono alumiriza nga bweyafunye obululu 345 ku kyalo ky’e Kikoma kyokka ate Dr. Tanga Odoi n’alagirira baddemu balonde ng’abantu baabadde baamaze okugenda. Okusinziira ku Mushereru kino kyakoleddwa mu byalo ebiwerako kyabagamba nti lyabadde kkobaane. “Kisoboka okufuna abalonzi abatono naye obutafuna wadde akalulu akamu, kitegeeza nti tulinga abataalonze era twetaaga okumanya lwaki. Mushereru. Yagumizza abawagizi be nga eno bweri entandikwa era ng’ajja kulwana masajja okutuuka nga bafunye obuwanguzi bwabwe obwabanyagiddwako.Mushereru bweyabuuziddwa oba ng’anajja mu kalulu kano nga talina kkaadi ya kibiina, yagambye nti obudde bukyali okusalawo ku nsonga eno. Akalulu kano kaalina kubeerawo nga 4/09/2020, naye olw’emivuyo n’okulwanagana wakati w’enjuyi zino zombi, kaayongerwayo okutuuka olunaku lw’eggulo. Kino kyawaliriza abakulira eby’okwerinda okusisinkana enjuyi zombi okusala amagezi akalulu kano kalondebwe mu mirembe. Ku lunaku lw’akalulu, amyuka Ssaabaddumizi wa Poliisi, Sabbiiti Muzeeyi awamu n’akulira bambega Grace Akullo, baasiibye Mawogola okulaba nga batangira ebiyinza okutabula akalulu. Akalulu kano ke kamu kaawaliriza Pulezidenti Museveni okuvaayo n’atangaaza nga bwe yali takaliimu era nga wadde abakalimu bombi ba ng’anda ze naye yabalabula obutakozesa linnya lye.

headline: Tewali muyaga gwa byabufuzi nga bwe byogerwa – Owek. Mayiga
text: Mukuumaddamula Charles Peter Mayiga awakanyizza ebyogerwa abantu abamu nti, waliwo omuyaga gw’ebyobufuzi wabula n’agamba nti waliwo ekisuubirwa mu bakulembeze era y’ensonga lwaki abantu balonze nga bwe balonze. Katikkiro Mayiga nga alambika abakulembeze abaggya “Abantu bano aba bulijjo tugenda ne tubagaya naye amaaso babeera balaba. Ani yagamba ab’e Masaka balonde mmwe nga bwe baabalonze, kijja kitya nti nga bwe baalonze Kimanya-Kabonero bwe baalonze Nyendo -Mukungwe, kijja kitya ab’e Bulemeezi ne Kyotera ne balonda kimu?” Owek. Mayiga bw’abuuzizza. Kamalabyonna bino abitegeezezza abakulembeze b’e Masaka abalonde abamusisinkanye mu Bulange e Mmengo leero ku Lwokutaano n’abasaba obutekkiriranya. “N’abalina ssente baabasudde ne bawa abatalina ssente, ogwo gw’oyita omuyaga. Si mawanga, e Mityana baaleseewo omuganda ne bagenda ne Mugisha. Noolwekyo abantu balina kye babasuubiramu.” Mayiga bw’agasseeko. Abamu ku bakulembeze ne Mukuumaddamula Katikkiro Mayiga abakuutidde obutawukana ku bantu kuba baabalonze nga balina bye babasuubiramu era abasabye obutabayiwa era bakimanye nti babeera bagoberera. Abasabye okusoosowaza ensonga za Buganda Ssemasonga ettaano era n’abasaba okubeera abavumu era bakimanye nti kino tekibaggyaako mwoyo gwa Uganda. Katikkiro Mayiga ategeezezza nti Obwakabaka bugenda kulangirira akakiiko akanaakwatagana ne bannabyabufuzi, kayambe okuwuliziganya n’abakulembeze abalonde, bamanye ensonga za gavumenti ya Buganda, bazituuse mu nkiiko za disitulikiti ne Palamenti. “Buganda erina okufuna omugabo gwayo mu Uganda. Ffe tusinga n’okuwa omusolo, kaakati bwe tuba tubabuulidde nti enteekateeka ziri bwe ziti ne muzituusa ku disitulikiti ne Palamenti, abantu ba Buganda bajja kwongera okuba abasanyufu.” Owek. Mayiga bw’abalambise. Mayiga era yalaze okutya olw’abantu abavundira mu makomera n’abo abali mu kuwambibwa buli lukya olw’ebyobufuzi nti, kino kijja kutabangula ensi. Kamalabyonna abalabudde ku bisoomoozo bye bagenda okusanga naye n’abagumya okunywera, kuba omulimu gw’abakulembeze kubeera kutema mpenda ezisobola okuvvuunuka ebizibu ebyo era bamanye nti, balina obuwagizi bw’abantu. “Obuwanguzi si kutambulira ku musentwe, obuwanguzi kuvvuunuka buwonvu na bugga.” Kamalabyonna bw’abakuutidde. Ate Minisita w’Obwakabaka ow’amawulire, Owek. Noah Kiyimba, asiimye bannabuddu olw’okudda okuloopa Olutabaalo era n’alaga essanyu olw’okuba nti bano abaawangudde obukulembeze, bannankobazambogo era n’abasaba okukola ennyo bazze Buddu ku ntikko. Mmeeya w’ekibuga kya Ssaabasajja Kabaka ekya Masaka, Florence Namayanja, ategeezezza nti Masaka tewali ky’erina kuba n’ebintu ebitono bye yalina banne ababadde mu buyinza babitunze. Ye omubaka omulonde owa Kimanya Kabonera, Abed Bwanika, annyonnyodde Katikkiro Mayiga nti bakkiriziganyiza enkulaakulana bagitabulize ku by’obulambuzi mu nnono, wamu n’empisa za Buganda, okulima n’ebirala, basobole okukulaakulana. Omubaka Mathias Mpuuga alaze Kamalabyonna nti beetegese okuzimbira Buganda ekibuga ekitambulira ku nnono n’empisa za Buganda obutafaananako Kampala eyava ku mulamwa. Ensisinkano eno, yeetabiddwamu abakulembeze okuli; Omubaka Mathias Mpuuga, Abed Bwanika, Mmeeya Florence Namayanja, Batemyeto, Kansala Kimuli, Achiles Mawanda awamu n’abalala, nga bonna beeyamye okutambulira awamu ne Buganda.

headline: Nga bwetulindirira Federo, tulina okutandika okwetekateeka-Katikkiro
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga agambye teri kubuusabuusa nti Buganda yakufuna federo, n’olwekyo, Obwakabaka bulina okutandika okugyeteekateekera. Ng’ayogerera mu Lusirika lwa Bakulembeze ab’okuntikko mu Buganda, oluyindira ku Brovad Sands Lodge mu ssaza lya Kabaka erye Ssese, Mayiga yategeezeza nti olw’okweteekateekera federo, Obwakabaka bwakizuula nti kyali kyetaagisa okukendeeza ku bwa nnakyewa e Mmengo. Katikkiro yagasseko nti mu Mukutulansanja wo’mwaka guno, Beene yakola enkyukakyuka mugavumenti ye nakendeeza baminisita n’obwannakyewa ku mutendera ogwo nebugyibwawo, okusobola okunnyikiza obuweereza nga baminisita batuula mu makkakalabizo gaabwe okuva kumakya okuzibya obudde ennaku zonna ez’okukola. “Oluvanyuma lwa Kabaka okutuula ku Namulondo emyaka 25, twakiraba nti byetufunye mubwannakyewa bisaana okwongerwayo mumaaso nga birabirirwa bulungi. Twagala kufuna federo, tulina okutandika okweteekateeka n’okumanyiira obuweereza obwo [obutali bwannakyewa]. Sikirungi federo kujja nga tetumanyi nzirukanya ya mirimu nnungamu bwebeera,” Mayiga bweyategeezezza. Yagambye nti newankubadde federo kati teriiwo, akimanyi bulungi nti ssosolya bwatafa atuuka kulyengedde. “Okunnyikiza obuweereza twefananyirize abalina Federo gyetwegomba, kyetaaga ensimbi nkumu. Bwotaba na ssente z’alutentezi, toyinza kukola mirimu negituukirira. Bwetunaafuna Federo, tujja kuba n’omutemwa okuva kumisolo egyikunganyizibwa mu Buganda naye nga tetunatuukaawo, twetaaaga okuba abayiiya,” Mayiga bwagambye. Ategeezezza abakiise nti Ssabasajja yamutegeezeza abagambe nti kikulu nnyo okutuula awekusifu nebeetunulamu, okulaba nga bwebatambuza emirimu. “Kikulu okwongera mumaaso ebyo byetukoze obulungi ate n’okukkiriza ensobi ezikoleddwa n’okuzisalira amagezi,” Mayiga bwagambye. Olusirika olugenda okuggwa ku lw’okutaano nga 29, Musenene, lwetwololera kumulamwa ogugamba, “Okufunira Obwakabaka ensimbi ez’olutentezi.”

headline: Katikkiro akyalidddeko aba Joint Clinical Research Center.
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda alambudde amaka amaggya aga Joint Clinical research center e Lubowa. Alambudde laboratory wamu n’ebyuma eby’enjawulo ebikozesebwa mu kukebera obulwadde bwa Nalubiri ne mukenenya. Katikkiro Mayiga nga ali n’abasawo ba Joint Clicinal Research Center. Mu kwogera kwe, agambye nti “obulwadde bwa mukenenya bwazza nnyo Uganda emabega era yeebazizza JCRC ekoze omulimu mu kunoonyereza n’okulwanyisa akawuka ka mukenenya, ebizuuliddwa mu kunoonyereza JCRC kwekoze bikoze kinene nnyo mu kutaasa obulamu bwabantu mu Uganda ne mu nsi yonna.  Agasseeko nti JCRC nkulu nnyo mu Uganda kumpi buli muntu akoseddwa akawuka ka mukenenya, oba afiiriddwa abantu be, alwazizza abantu be, oba ye yennyini ye mulwadde. N’olwekyo abakola mu kunoonyereza ku kawuka ka mukenenya bebazira baffe betulinawo betusaana okutendereza kubanga omuntu afa ku bulamu bwo abeera mukwano gwo asooka.” Minisita w’Obwakabaka ow’enkulaakulana y’abantu era avunaanyizibwa ku by’obulamu, Dr. Prosperous Nankindu ategeezezza nti obwakabaka nga buyita mu Ssaabasajja Kabaka bukyagenda mu maaso okukubiriza abantu naddala abaami okwekebeza akawuka ka mukenenya nga ne ku mulundi guno ku mpaka z’amasaza ez’akamalirizo mu kisaawe e Namboole wajja kubeerawo enteekateeka ey’enjawulo okutuusa obubaka eri bannabyamizannyo abanaaba bazze okuwagira Amasaza gaabwe.  Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako; omukubiriza w’olukiiko lwa Buganda Owek Patrick Luwagga Mugumbule, Minisita webyobulamu eyawummula, Dr. Ben Mukwaya, Kaggo, n’abaami ba Kabaka ku mitendera egy’enjawulo era nga gubadde mu maka ga Joint Clinical Research Center amaggya e Lubowa ku luguudo lw’Entebbe.

headline: Obwakabaka N’ekitongole kya Wells of Life.
text: Obwakabaka busisinkanye abakulu b’Ekitongole kya Wells of Life okukubaganya ebirowoozo okulaba omukago gwebatta bwegutambula.  Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga, Minisita Omubeezi ow’ebyobulimi n’obulunzi mu Bwakaba nga bali wamu n’aba Wells of Life ku Bulange Katikkiro agambye nti ekizibu ekisinga okuvaako obwavu ly’ebbula ly’amazzi kubanga atalina mazzi tasobola kuba muyonjo, era wano Katikkiro akubiriza abantu okuba abayonjo basobole okwewala endwadde eziva ku bujama era nakubiriza bantu okufaayo ennyo okukola bave mu bwavu. Katikkiro akubirizza abantu ba Kabaka bakuume nayikondo ezabawebwa awamu n’ezo ezigenda okusimibwa bulungi kubanga ky’ekirabo Kabaka kyabawadde nga ayagala bafune amazzi. Era wano agambye nti basuubira ebbanga ly’omukago werinaggwerako nga Ssaabasajja alina kyakozeewo ku nsonga y’amazzi mu Buganda. Ekitongole kya Wells of Life Kya bwannakyewa okuva mu America, kyatta omukago n’obwakabaka okutuusa amazzi mu bantu ba Kabaka. Mu kiseera kino baatandise okusima nayikondo mu Ssaza lye Ssingo ne Buweekula , era e Mityana bagenda kuteekayo ettendekero erinaasomesa abagenda okulabirira nayikondo, okuziddaabiriza n’okuzisima.

headline: Museveni alabudde ababaka ba Palamenti y’e 11 tagenda kukkiriza kwejalabya
text: Kampala Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni era Ssentebe w’ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement  (NRM), alabudde ababaka abalonde naddala mu kibiina kye obutagezaako kwonoonera ssente za muwi wa musolo mu kwejalabya nga bagenda emitala w’amayanja. Museveni bino abitegeezezza abamu ku babaka abalonde aba NRM bw’abadde abasisinkanye e Kyankwanzi leero ku Lwokuna okubaako bye bawayaamu. “Enkola eno ey’ababaka okugenda ebweru okulaba abaayo bwe batambuza ebintu, bulyi bwa nguzi bwennyini.” Museveni bw’agambye. Ono abalabudde nti ababaka ba NRM ku mulundi guno bandyewaze okulwanagana naye ku nsonga yonna kuba mwetegefu ebitagambika. “Ebiseera ebimu saagala kuswaza bantu bange aba NRM, nsalawo okwogera obwogezi nabo nga ndowooza nti banaakyusaamu naye bamaliriza ffenna batuzingiddemu olw’ensobi zebakola. Tekikola makulu okwonoona ssente z’eggwanga mu kutambula ebunaayira.” Pulezidenti Museveni bw’annyonnyodde. Museveni awadde ekyokulabirako kya eyali Pulezidenti wa Tanzania, John Pombe Magufuli, eyasalawo okusala ku ng’endo z’ababaka be okugenda ebweru ne kiyamba okukendeeza ku nsimbi ezisaasaanyizibwa. Abawadde amagezi okukomya okutunuulira ensimbi naye bafeeyo nnyo ku bizibu ebiruma abantu ng’okubagobako obwavu. Gyebuvuddeko Museveni yalabula ababaka mu Palamenti y’e 11 nga bw’atajja bakkiriza kwegabira musimbi awamu n’emmotoka. Museveni enkya asuubirwa okusomesa ababaka bano ku mutindo gw’obukulembeze gwe balina okubeera nagwo.

headline: Kyambeeredde kizibu okulonda kabineeti- Museveni
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni ategeezezza nti kyamubeeredde kizibu okulonda kabineeti naye bwe yagifulumizza buli omu yeewuunyizza. Kino kiddiridde Pulezidenti Museveni okufulumya olukalala lwa kabineeti ng’alonze eyali minisita w’ebyenjigiriza, Jessica Alupo, okubeera omumyuka we, Robinah Nabbanja n’alondebwa okubeera Ssaabaminisita. Abamu ku bantu naddala bannabyabufuzi baatandikiddewo okukolokota abaalondeddwa nga bagamba nti tebalina ky’amaanyi kye bagenda kutuusa ku ggwanga, ekintu Museveni ky’awakanya. Bw’abadde ayogerako eri Palamenti ku Lwokuna oluvannyuma lw’okusoma embalirira, Museveni yeewaanye nga bwe yeewuunyisizza buli omu n’abantu be yalonze. “ Bwe nabadde nnonda kabineeti nabadde nzekka. Kino kyevkimu ku bintu bye sseetaagako muyambi. Naye guno omulimu mulungi kuba bangi ku mmwe muli balungi era musobola okuweereza.” Museveni bw’ategeezezza. “Bwe nabadde nkola kabineeti obwedda okula okugatta okwenjawulo ate ne ngabiza ate ne mbiddamu. Mbadde nnina okutunuulira eggwanga, eddiini n’ekitundu oli gy’ava.” Bw’atyo Museveni bw’agasseeko. Museveni annyonnyodde nti abantu abalungi bangi era bonna bandiweereddwa omukisa kyokka n’agamba nti ne Yesu Kristo yalondamu bamu okumwegattako kuba buli omu yali tasobola kumuwa mukisa. “Yesu bwe yali atandika obuweereza bwe, waaliwo abagezi ng’abafalisaayo naye yalondayo bavubi. Noolwekyo bwe mutunuulira kabineeti yange mukimanye nti nagoberedde kkubo lya Yesu Kristo.” Museveni bw’ategeezezza ababaka. Oluvannyuma lw’okulangirira kabineeti eno, waliwo amaloboozi ageemulugunyizza nga bwe gataaweereddwa bifo nga kuno kwabaddeko Kasese. Ku kino, Museveni akkiriza nti yabadde yamuteekamu eyali mmeeya wa munisipaali y’e Kasese, Godfrey Kabyanga naye erinnya lyamuvudde mu mutwe n’amwerabira ng’akola kabineeti. Abamu ku batunuulizi b’ensonga bategeezezza nti kiyinza okubeera ekizibu eri Nabbanja nga Ssaabaminisita era akulira bbizineesi za gavumenti mu Palamenti okutambaala abasajja ba Opozisoni nga Mathias Mpuuga akulira oludda oluvuganya. Bano Nabbanja abasabye okumuwa omukisa kuba abadde mu bifo bingi okuli obwaminisita, RDC, Kamisona wa Palamenti wamu n’omubaka nga yonna akung’aanyizzaayo obukugu obwenjawulo era ng’ebisaanyizo byonna abirina.

headline: Bobi Wine asanyukidde ekkoligo Amerika ly’etadde ku banene mu Uganda
text: Kampala Pulezidenti w’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine, asanyukidde ekya gavumenti ya Amerika okuteeka envumbo ku ntambula z’abanene abamu mu Uganda olw’okutyoboola eddembe ly’obuntu. Kyagulanyi agamba nti kisaanidde abakulu abamu okusasulira ebikolwa byabwe naddala ku ngeri gye baakwatamu akalulu akawedde. “Ekiwandiiko kya Amerika kikakasa nti okulonda okwawedde tekwali kwa mazima nabwenkanya. Kizzaamu amaanyi kuba kiraga nti wadde Pulezidenti Museveni yezza ebitongole byonna ebyandimugambyeko naye ensi eraba era etandise okubaako ky’ekolawo.” Kyagulanyi bw’ategeezezza. Kino kiddiridde akulira minisitule y’Amerika ey’ensonga ez’ebweru, Antony John Blinken okutegeeza nga demokulaasi mu Uganda bw’asebengeredde olw’ebikolwa by’abanene abamu nga bwe kyalabikira mu kalulu ka 2021. Ku kino Kyagulanyi agamba natti zino zijjidde mu kaseera akatuufu. Ono agamba nti basuubira nti n’amawanga amalala gajja kukola nga Amerika bwe yakoze babayambeko ku lutalo lw’okununula eggwanga n’okunyweza enfuga ya demokulaasi, bannansi bafune eddembe lyabwe. Ku Lwokutaano, Minisita omubeezi ow’ensonga zeebweru, Henry Okello Oryem,  yagambye nti gavumenti mwali terina ky’etidde ku natti zino. “Kyannaku okulaba nti Amerika eriko abantu b’etandise okubonereza mu Uganda nga terina bujulizi, bye baali beebuuza twabyanukula era twabadde tusuubirwa Amerika n’abalala okussa ekitiibwa  mu kye twabagamba.” Minisita Oryem bwe yategeezezza. Minisita Okello alumiriza nti bano baasinzidde ku biwandiikibwa mu mpapula z’amawulire, ebisinde eby’enjawulo, abantu ssekinnoomu n’abeenoonyeza ebyabwe abaagala okuttattana ekifaananyi ky’eggwanga. Ono yagumiza bannayuganda nti ebya natti tebijja kubaggya ku mulamwa gwa kukolera bannayuganda era n’asuubiza nti baakugenda mu maaso okutuukiriza Manifesito gye balina, bannayuganda bafune empeereza ennungi.

headline: Abawangaala ne  Mukenenya basiimye Kabaka olw’okulwanyisa ekirwadde
text: Masaka – Buddu Abantu ba Kabaka mu Buddu basiimbye Omuteregga olw’okubeera omusaale mu kulwanyisa akawuka ka Mukenenya  mu Uganda ne Africa yonna, ekintu ekiyambye ku mbeera. Abamu ku bano nga balina akawuka ssaako abatalina, okwogera bino basinzidde mu musomo ogw’okubabangula ku bika by’obuwuka obulwaza Mukenenya obuliwo ensangi zino wamu n’okubanjulira alipoota ekwatagana  ku kuvumbula eddagala erinaawonya ssaako n’okutangira Mukenenya ku Maple leaf Hotel esangibwa mu kibuga. Omusomo guno gwetabiddwamu abantu okuva mu biti ebyenjawulo omuli; Bannaddiini, abasawo, Bannamawulire, abakulembeze ku mitendera egyenjawulo, abakulira ebitongole by’obwannakyewa, ssaako n’abo abalina akawuka ka Mukenenya, n’abantu abaze batambulirwako okunoonyereza kuno. Abantu abalina akawuka bategeezezza nti Ssaabasajja Kabaka okuvaayo n’abakubiriza okumira eddagala, okwekebeza, ssaako okubagumya,  ekibayambye okusigala nga balamu era ne bamwagaliza amazaalibwa amalungi. “Tusaba Katonda awangaaze Ssaabasajja Kabaka wa Buganda kubanga atubeereddewo nnyo ffe abantu abalina akawuka ka Mukenenya ng’atuwa obubaka n’ebigambo ebirungi ebutugumya, ebituzzaamu amaanyi kubanga twali twaggwaamu essuubi era singa si ye singa  abamu twafa dda.” Abamu ku bantu abalina akawuka bwe bategeezezza. Mu ngeri y’emu Rev. Fr. Emmanuel Katabazi  nga y’akulira eby’obulamu mu ssaza ly’Eklezia Katolika ery’e Masaka, ategeezezza nti omusomo guno  gubayambye  okubabangula ku bikwatagana n’akawuka ka Mukenenya ebipya bye babadde tebamanyi. Ate ye Dr.  Sheila  Balinda nga kakensa mu kunoonyereza ku kawuka ka Mukenenya  okuva mu kitongole kya Medical Research Council, agambye  nti babadde balina okutegeka omusomo guno okusobola okutegeeza Bannabuddu ebivudde mu kunoonyereza olw’okuba nti beewaddeyo nnyo  mu nteekateeka ey’okulaba ng’olutalo lw’okulwanyisa akawuka kano luggusibwa. Dr Balinda agambye nti mu kunoonyereza okupya okwakatuukibwako, bavumbudde  nti obuwuka bwanjawulo era nga si bwonna obubeera mu mubiri gw’omuntu afunye Siriimu nti, buviirako omulala okulwala Siriimu. Ono asinzidde wano n’agumya bannauganda nti eggwanga Uganda lirina abakugu abakenkuse ennyo mu kuketta n’okutegeera enneeyisa endya ne nneebaka ya kawuka kano nga we batuuse batandise okukataayiza. Ono alabudde abo bonna abatannakafuna obutalyaguzibwa  kyokka beekuume akawuka kano.

headline: Eyaliko omubaka wa Ppaapa Dr Kasujja asabye bannayuganda obutasaagira mu byabulamu
text: Omubaka wa Ppaapa mu Belgium eyawummula, Ssabasumba Dr. Augustine Kasujja, asabye bannayuganda okukomya okusaagira mu nsonga z’ebyobulamu bweba baagala okulaakulana. Ssaabasumba Kasujja bino yabyogeredde Mawogola mu ggombolola ya Ssaabaddu Mateete mu ssaza lye Mawogola ku Mmande bweyabadde atongoza enteekateeka y’okugaba omusaayi. Dr Kasujja asinzidde wano nakubirizza abantu b’Omutanda mu Ssaza lino okwenyigira mu nteekateeka eno kubanga yeyoka ettalimu kusosola mawanga, eddiini wadde ebibiina by’obufuzi . Ono mungeri ey’enjawulo yebazizza Beene olw’okusiima abantu be okwenyigira mu nkola y’okugaba omusaayi wamu nokwenyigira mu by’obulamu nekigendererwa ky’okutaasa obulamu kuba abantu abalamu bebasobola okulaakulana.  Omwami wa Kabaka ow’Essaza Mawogola, Muteesa Muhammad Sserwadda, akkikaatirizza nti kati obujjumbize n’obuweereza tebikyapimirwa ku bigambo, wabula ebikolwa. Ye Ssenkulu wa Kabaka Foundation, Omuk. Edward Kaggwa Ndagala, asiimye Bannamawogola olw’obujjumbize bwe balaze mu kuwaayo omusaayi era nasaba n’abalala okubalabirako. Okugaba Omusaayi mu Ssaza lino kwakumala ennaku ttano era olwa leero kugenda kubeera mu gombolola ya Ssabawaali Mijwala.  Enteekateeka y’okugaba omusaayi mu Masaza yateekebwawo oluvannyuma lwa Beene okulagira abantu be okuwaayo omusaayi kiyambeko okukendeeza ku bbula lyagwo era ewagirwa ebitongole okuli Uganda Blood Transfusion Service, Uganda Red Cross awamu n’ekitongole ki Kabaka Foundation.

headline: Abakungu ba FUFA balambudde ekisaawe omunaazannyirwa amasaza
text: Abakungu b’ekibiina ekifuga omupiira mu ggwanga ekya Uganda Football Association awamu n’akakiiko akategesi ak’empaka z’amasaza ez’omwaka guno, balambudde ekisaawe kya FUFA Technical Centre e Njeru, ne bakakasa omutindo gwakyon’obusobozi bw’okukyaza empaka zino. “Enteekateeka ku kisaawe buli kimu kiri bulungi era ekisaawe kyeyongeddeko ku mutindo okusinga bwe kyali omwaka oguwedde. Era buli kimu kikwatagana bulungi nnyo n’enteekateeka yaffe ey’omwaka guno okulaba nti tubeera n’empaka eziri ku mutindo okusingako omwaka oguwedde.”Omuk. Ssejjengo bw’ategeezezza. Okusinziira ku Ssejjengo, baalabye abazannyi, abakungu awamu ne badiifiri we bagenda okusula era ne bakakasa enteekateeka y’omupiira ogunaggulawo empaka zinoogwa nga 20 Novemba nga Gomba, esamba Kyaddondo era Beene y’agenda okugiggulawo. Ono annyonnyodde nti tebagenda kukkiriza bawagizi mu kisaawe olw’ekirwadde kya Corona naye n’akakasa nti enteekateeka y’okugulaga ku ntimbe za TV yaakoleddwako era nga buli kimu kigenda kuba kya mutindo n’abasaba okusigala nga bagumiikiriza. Amyuka atwala omupiira mu FUFA, Decolas Kizza ategeezezza nti tebagenda kutaataaganya ttiimu zibadde zikozesa kisaawe okuli; Busoga United ne SC Villa bajja kusigala nga bazannya kuba enteekateeka ekoleddwa bulungi. Bannantameggwa b’empaka zino ab’omwaka oguwedde aba Gomba baakuzannya Ssingo ate Kyaddondo ekwatagane ne Kabula awamu ne Buluuli mu kibinja kya Masengere. Buddu Mawogola, Busujju, Buweekula ne Butambala bali mu kibinja kya Muganzirwazza. Mu kibinja Bulange; Busiro, Bugerere, Kyaggwe ne Buvumaate Butikkiro mulimu; Bulemeezi, Kkooki, Mawokota ne Ssese.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga akungubagidde Paasita Yiga
text: Kawaala Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga, ayogedde ku Paasita Augustine Yiga eyakazibwako erya Abizaayo ng’omusajja abadde omukozi ennyo era omumalirivu mu byabadde akola. Katikkiro Mayiga ne mutabani wa Paasita Yiga Okwogera bino Owek. Mayiga, abadde agumya abagoberezi b’ ekkanisa ya Christian Revival Centre e Kawaala wamu n’abooluganda lwa Paasita Yiga leero ku Lwokuna, bwabadde agenzeyo okubakubagiza. “Singa Paasita Yiga yali yenyooma oba singa yali yeekubagiza teyandisobodde kutuuka kwebyo byeyatuukako mu bulamu, bwogerageranya gyeva eyo e Mawogola. Mu ngeri eyo ebyo byeyasobola okukola tugambe ekkanisa eno mwetuli, essomero, ttivi bibeere essomo eri fenna nti bwomalirira osobola okutuuka ku birungi nkumo,” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agambye Mayiga agambye nti wadde okufa kutuuka ku buli muntu naye tekumanyirika era nga wadde abagoberezi be babadde bakimanyi nti mulwadde naye amawulire g’okufa kwe gabakubye wala. Ono ajjukiza abakungubazi nga Omusumba Yiga bweyali omu ku bantu abavaayo okwanukula omulanga gw’ettofaali mu kaweefube w’okunoonya ssente ez’okuzimba buggwe ku masiro era nasiima abagoberezi b’ekkanisa eno olw’omutima omugabi gwebalaga. Mayiga alabudde abasumba okukomya okwelumbagana kubanga ebigambo by’enzirikiriza buli omu abitaputa bubwe, abasabye bawangane ebitiibwa mwebyo byebakiririzaamu. Kamalabyonna awerekeddwako Minisita w’amawulire Noah Kiyimba era nayanirizibwa Kaggo Agnes Nakibirige Ssempa n’abakulu b’ekkanisa.

headline: Bobi Wine akukkulumye ku kyekubiira ali mu bitongole by’ebyokwerinda
text: Kampala Pulezidenti w’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu amanyiddwa nga Bobi Wine, alaze obutali bumativu ku kyekubiira w’ekitongole by’ebyokwerinda ebisusse okuyigganya ekibiina kye. Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi Kino kiddiridde amagye ne poliisi okusalako ekitebe ky’ekibiina nebatandika okufuuza buli kasenge ne woofiisi leero ku Lwokusatu. Abakuumaddembe ababadde babagalidde emigemerawala awamu n’obukebe bwa ttiyaggaasi bazibye enguudo zonna ezituuka ku kitebe kino era nebamenya enzigi eziyingira mu woofiisi zino. Okufuuza ekifo kyonna kumalidde ddala essaawa ennungi bbiri.Ssaabawandiisi wa NUP, David Lewis Rubongoya akakasizza nga poliisi bw’ekuuliise n’obukoofiira bwabwe obumyufu, ebipande n’ebintu ebirala bye babadde bagenda okukozesa mu kalulu  n’ebiwandiiko byabwe. Rubongoya annyonnyodde nti bano tebabadde nakiragiro kya kkooti era ng’okuyingira munda mu woofiisi zaabwe enzigi bamenyemenye. Omwogezi wa poliisi Fred Ennanga akakasizza okuzingako ekitebe kino n’alaga nti babadde banonyeyo bukoofiira obumyufu era n’ebyambalo ebifaanana eby’amagye ebibadde ku kitebe kino. “Tunoonya ebifo byonna ebifulumya n’okusaasaanya awamu n’okutunda ebyambalo wamu n’ebintu ebyenjawulo ebifaanana ebyamagye kubanga ge gokka agalina olukkusa okubeera n’ebintu bino.” Onyango bw’agambye. Ku nsonga eno, Bobi Wine annyonnyodde nti abawagizi be abawerako poliisi ebataddeko ebisago n’akiikira ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda ensigo olw’okubeera nekyekubiira. Ate ye akulira ekibiina kya Alliance for National Transformation (ANT), Gen. Mugisha Muntu, alaze ng’ekikolwa kino bwekiri ekibi naye n’ategeeza nti kibadde tekyewuunyisa. Muntu asabye ab’ebyokwerinda okusigalamu ak’obuntu era bakimanye nti buli kye bakola bakikola ku lwa Bannayuganda, si nsonga ani atudde mu woofiisi n’abalabula nti ababawaga akedde konna obuyinza busobola okubava mu ngalo

headline: Buddu egobye Steven Bogere ku butendesi
text: Abaddukanya ttiimu y’essaza lya Buddu banaabidde abadde Omutendesi Steven Bogere mu maaso nga bagamba nti ebintu bibadde tebikyatambula. Bogere okumugoba yabadde yakamala okuwangulwa ttiimu ya Buluuli 2-1 mu kibinja kya Masengere mu kikopo ky’omwaka guno mu mupiira ogwazanyiddwa ku Lwomukaaga. Kati balonze abadde omumyuka we Andy Ssali okudda mu bigere bya Bogere abadde yakamala okuwangulira ttiimu eno ebikopo 2 biramba mu mpaka zino. Buddu eri mu kifo kyakubiri n’obubonero 4 mu kibinja Masengere ekikulembeddwa ttiimu ya Ssingo.

headline: NRM etandise ku nteekateeka y’okuzza obuganzi mu Buganda ne Busoga
text: Ekibiina ki National Resistance Movement (NRM) kituula bufoofofo okulaba nti kiddamu okwegulira obuganzi mu Buganda awamu ne Busoga gyeyakyawangulwa ennyo ekibiina ki National Unity Platform. Ssaabawandiisi wa NRM, Richard Todwong yategeezezza abakulira ekibiina mu Buganda ne Busoga ku Mmande bwebabadde basisinkanye e Nakasero e Kampala. Bano basimbye essira kwebyo byebalowooza nti byebyabaviirako okufiirwa obuwagizi bwebalina mu bitundu bino. “Era tuzze wano okuyiga engeri ekibiina ekisinga obuganzi mu ggwanga gyekisobola okukolaganamu nammwe okusobola okukomyawo obuwagizi bwakyo,” Todwong bwe yagambye. Okusinziira ku Todwong ekitundu kya Buganda kirina ebizibu byakyo gamba nga bannakyalo abangi abeeyuna okujja mu bibuga nga bano bazze basale eddiiro nebadda mu bibiina ebirala. Todwong asabye bannakibiina naddala ababaka okuyambako ekibiina okuyambako okuvuunuka ekizibu kino mwebali. Kinajjukirwa nti ekibiina ki NUP kyefuga Buganda ne Busoga mu kalulu akawedde aka 2021. Ssaabakunzi w’ekibiina ki NRM, Rosemary Nansubuga Sseninde agamba nti omulimu omukulu kwekulaba nga bannakibiina n’abakulembeze bafuba okulaba nti empeereza mu bitundu ebyenjawulo ebeera nnungi. Ye omwogezi w’ekibiina, Emmanuel Dombo Lumala, yannyonnyodde nti bwekuba kuzza buwagizi kirina kukolebwa nga batandikira wansi mu byalo era basaabulule obulimba obubadde butambuzibwa ab’ ebibiina ebirala ku NRM

headline: Abatabula eddagala ly’Ekinnansi basabye Obwakabaka buyambe okukuuma emiti omuva eddagala
text: Abasawo abajjanjaba nga bayita mu buwangwa n’okutabula eddagala ly’ekinnaansi abeegattira mu kibiina kya ‘National Council of Traditional Healers and Herbalists Association (NACOTHA), basabye Obwakabaka okubayamba mu nteekateeka yaabweokukuuma n’okutaakiriza omuddo n’emiti egivaamu eddagala lye beeyambisa okujjanjaba abantu. Okusaba kuno bakukoze enkya ya leero ku Mmande bwe babadde basisinkanye Minisita w’Obuwangwa, Obulambuzi n’Embiri mu Bwakabaka, Owek. DavidKyewalabye Male mu Bulange e Mmengo mwe boogeredde ku ngeri gye basobola okutambuza emirimu gyabwe wansi w’okulambikibwa kwa Buganda. Mu nsisinkano eno, Owek. Kyewalabye Male asabye okusitula omutindo gw’omulimu gwabwe ng’eno y’engeri gye basobola okusikiriza abalala okugweyunira wamu n’okuguwa ekitiibwa. “Omuwendo gw’abantu abejjanjabisa obutonde guli waggulu nnyo ku gw’abagenda mu malwaliro ag’ekizungu. Mbasaba mwongere okukola okunoonyereza ku ddagala lye mukola okusobola okusitula omutindo gwalyo, kisobozese abantu abalala okwettanira eddagala lyaffe ery’ekinnansi.” Owek. Kyewalabye bw’agambye. Akola nga Ssentebe w’ekitongole kino, Dr. Alex Victor Biomark Tugume ategeezezza nti Buganda bwe Bwakabaka obusinga obukulu mu Uganda era nga bwe bulina okuba obusaale mu nteekateka y’okukuuma eddagala ly’ekinnansi. Minisita Kyewalabye ayanirizza ekirowoozo kye bamuwadde eky’okukola omukago ne Buganda, era n’abasuubiza okutambulira wamu nabo, okukuuma ebyo bajjajjaffe bye baaleka. Abasawo bano batonedde Minisita Kyewalabye erimu ku ddagala lye bakola omuli eriwonya Ssennyiga Lumiimamawuggwe n’erisenya amannyo. “Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bubadde busaale nnyo mu kutumbula obuwangwa bw’abaddugavu wano mu Uganda, tusuubira nti bwe bulina obusobozi okutuyambako mu kukuuma emiti n’omuddo gwe tweyambisa okuvaamu eddala obutasaanawo.” Dr. Tugume bw’agasseeko. “Mu kiseera kino tulina obuzibu bw’okuvuganyizibwa eddagala eriva mu mawanga g’ebweru naddala ery’Abacayina. Kyewuunyisa nti ekitongole ekivunaanyizibwa ku ddagala mu Uganda kiwa nnyo omukisa eddagala ly’ebweru okusinga eryaffe erya wano.” Dr. Tugume ayongedde okunnyonnyola. Ye Ssaabawandiisi w’ekitongole kino, Dr. Abdul-Karim Musaasizi ategeezezza nti ekitongole kirina enteekateeka y’okutta omukago n’Obwakabaka okusobola okukulaakulanya obuwangwa. Annyonnyodde nti balina obweraliikirivu nti etteeka gavumenti ly’ereeta liyinza okulemesa abantu abawerako okukola eddagala ly’obutonde olw’obukwakkulizo obungi bwe babataddeko. “Tufubye okulaba nti tusitula omutindo gw’eddagala lyaffe era tutandiseewo enkola y’okusoma ne tukuguka mu ddagala. Wabula tuli bennyamivu nti etteeka erireetebwa gavumenti ya wakati ku ddagala ly’obutonde, liyinza okuziyiza bannaffe bangi okukola omulimu guno.” Dr. Musaasizi.

headline: Joseph Kabuleta asindikiddwa ku alimanda
text: Pulezidenti w’ekibiina ki National Economic Empowerment Dialogue (NEED), Joseph Kabuleta asimbiddwa mu kkooti e Nakawa navunaanwa omusango gw’okusiga obukyaayi mu mawanga n’oluvannyuma nasindikibwa ku alimanda mu kkomera e Luzira. Kabuleta nga yavuganyaako ku bwapulezidenti yakwatibwa okuva ku woofiisi z’ekibiina kye ki NEED e Bugolobi naggalirwa mu kaduukulu ka poliisi okutuuka leero ku Lwokusatu lwasimbiddwa mu kkooti abitebye. Ono Omulamuzi amusindise ku alimanda okutuuka Decemba 14 lwanazzibwa mu kkooti avunaanibwe. Kabuleta yakwatibwa ku Mmande ku bigambibwa yali asize obukyaayi mu mawanga n’okwawulayawula mu bantu wabula abamu ku bakola nabo bategeeza nti ono yali awambiddwa buwambibwa okutuusa lwaleeteddwa mu kkooti. Omusango ogumuvunaanwa Oludda oluwaabi lugamba nti nga May 30, 2022 nga ali wamu ne bannakibiina abalala, Kabuleta yakuba olukung’aana lwa bannamawulire mu Kampala nategeeza nti obuweereza obukolebwa e Mbarara bwesigamiziddwa ku mawanga omuli erya Batutsi, Bahima, Bakiga nab’Abanyankole. Singa omusango gunaamusinga Kabuleta ajja kusibwa mu nkomyo okumala emyaka ettaano.

headline: Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kongezezzaayo ennaku z’okukebera enkalala
text: Omulamuzi Simon Byabakama   Akakiiko akakola ku by’okulonda mu ggwanga kongezezzayo ennnaku z’okukebereramu enkalala z’abalonzi wamu n’okwewandiisa kwa balonzi abapya. Mukiwandiiko eri abamawulire nga kyateereddwako omukono ssentebe w’akakiiko Omulamuzi Simon Byabakama Mugyenyi, Akakiiko kategeezezza nti okwongezaayo kuno okwabadde kukoma nga Ntenvu 17 kwavudde kukusaba kwabo bekikwatako wamu n’omuwendo gw’abantu omungi mu bifo awakebererwa enkalala. Okukebera enkalala kwatandika nga Musenene 12 era nga kwali kwakuggwa nga Ntenvu 11 wabula era akakiiko nekongezaayo okutuusa nga Ntenvu 17. “Akaiiko kaatudde ku makya ga leero nakatunuulira ensonga ezenjawulo ezaaleeteddwa bakikwatako lwaki tulina okwongerayo enteekateeka eno. Muno mwabaddemu embeera y’obudde embi mu bitundu by’eggwanga ebyenjawulo, abantu abangi abaagala okwewandiisa. N’olwekyo akakiiko kasazeewo okwongarayo enteekateeka eno okutuusa nga Ntenvu 23. Oluvanyuma lw’ennaku ezo, tejja kuba kwongezaayo kulala kwonna,” Byabakama bweyategezezza mukiwandiiko. Eggwanga ligenda genda mukulonda kwabonna mu 2021 mwerinaakyusiza abakulembeze ku mitendera gyonna okuva ku pulezidenti okutuukira ddala ku gavumenti ez’ebitundu.

headline: Kabaka ayagalizza Abasiraamu Idd ennungi
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II,  ayagalizza Abasiraamu Eid el Fitri ey’essanyu, n’abeebaza n’okusiiba kubanga ekisiibo kino kiraze nti abantu bonna benkanankana mu maaso ga Katonda. Era nga kibadde ekiseera ekya basiraamu okwefumiitiriza ku nsonga z’omwoyo awamu n’obulamu bwabwe obwabulijjo Obubaka bwa Kabaka eri Abasiraamu yabutadde mu kiwandiiko eky’enjawulo ekifulumiziddwa olunaku lwaleero ku Lwokubiri n’agamba nti okusiiba kuyamba abantu okwezza obuggya wamu n’okulongoosa ku nkolagana yaabwe ne bantu bannaabwe. Omutanda era abeebazizza olw’okusabira abakulembeze ab’enjawulo okusobola okuyisa obulungi abantu be bakulembera. Era abasabye okugenda mu maaso n’okwegayirira Katonda  era basabire ebisoomooza eggwanga omuli; endwadde,  obutabanguko mu maka, n’abantu abasibirwa obwereere awatali kuwozesebwa. Omuteregga asabye abasiraamu okusabira abo bonna abeeyagaliza, abeekkusa bokka awamu n’abavulubanira ebitali byabwe. Abasiraamu wonna mu ggwanga basuubira okujaguza  olunaku olumalako ekisiibo kya ‘Ramadhan’ esuubirwa okubaawo olunaku lw’enkya ku Lwokusatu oba Olwokuna singa omwezi gunaabera gulabise.

headline: Buganda yakuddamu okugema abantu Corona – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ategeezezza nti Obwakabaka bwakuddamu okugema abantu Lumiima mawuggwe (Corona) okwekikungo okusobola okutuula ekirwadde kino ku nfeete. Bino Owek. Mayiga abyogeredde mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire olutudde mu Bulange ku Lwokubiri okulambulula ku nteekateeka eno. ” Mujje babageme, temutya eddagala teririimu butwa wadde okubagaana okuzaala, okuva ennaku z’omwezi nga 20 – 23 April tugenda kuba tugema wano mu Bulange. Temweyibaala nti abalwadde bakendedde naye tekitegeeza nti obulwadde bwaggwayo,” Owek. Mayiga bw’alambuludde. “Lumiimamawuggwe bulwadde bwa bulabe era buli muntu ali wano yamukosa nga abamu bafiirwa ababwe, abalala balwadde, abamu tebanabakutereera bulungi” Kamalabyonna Mayiga bw’agasseeko. Katikkiro Mayiga agamba nti abantu bwebatabeera balamu tewali kyebasobola kukola era n’enteekateeka zonna ez’oku bakulaakulanya zigwa butaka. Owek. Mayiga annyonnyodde nti abantu basaanye okukomya okutya nti eddagala lino lirimu obutwa ate abalala nga balowooza nti lisobola okubagaana okuzaala nabasaba okutwala eky’okulabirako kya Ssaabasajja Kabaka eyagemebwa ng’ensi yonna eraba. Ono asabye okusigala ku biragiro by’ abasawo okutuusa lwebalirangirira ekisembayo ku kirwadde kino ekitadde ensi yonna ku bunkenke. Ye Minisita w’ebyobulamu n’embeera z’abantu b’ Omutanda, Owek. Dr. Prosperous Nankindu ategeezezza nti ku mulundi ogwasooka mu Novemba 6-7 bagema abantu abaali bakunukkiriza mu 8000 nga bakolagana ne KCCA eyawaayo abasawo abakugu. Owek. Nankindu annyonnyodde nti okugema tekubeera kwa Baganda bokka naye abantu ba Kabaka bonna kuba ekirwadde kino tekisosola. Ono asabye abantu abatanagemebwa mulundi gwakubiri okuginona kuba kisobola okumubeerera obuzibu okulwanyisa COVID-19 era nabo abatuuse emyaka egigemebwa ekirwadde kino nabo okukozesa omukisa guno. Enteekateeka y’omulundi guno ewagiddwa ab’ekitongole kya Kampala Capital City Authority n’ekitongole ki FHI360.

headline: Beene aggaddewo empaka z’amasaza 2021, Buddu ye Nnantameggwa
text: Essaza lya Kabaka ery’e Buddu lisitukidde mu kikopo ky’omwaka 2021 eky’omupiira gwa Masaza nga bano ekyafaayo kino baakikoledde mu maaso ga Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II bwe yalabiseeko okuggalawo empaka zino. Bano okuwangula baazannye ne Buweekula ne bagiwangula ggoolo 2-0 mu kisaawe ekyabadde kikubyeko obugule ku St. Marys’s Stadium Kitende ekiri mu disitulikiti y’e Wakiso mu ssaza ly’e Busiro. Buddu omupiira yaguwangulidde mu kitundu kyakubiri oluvannyuma lw’okumalako ekitundu ekisooka nga tewali alengedde katimba ka munne. Ggoolo yasoose yateebeddwa omuzannyi Marvin Kavuma ne Bruno Bunyaga era zino ze zawadde Buddu obuwanguzi wadde Buweekula nayo engabo yabadde egirumizza mannyo. “Tusabye bulungi era nneebaza bannange olw’okukola obulungi wadde tumalirizza obuwanguzi bugenze naye twasamba bulungi okuviira ddala mu bibinja okutuuka ku ssaawa ya leero.” Kapiteeni wa Buweekula, Shafic Kakande bwe yategeezezza.  Buddu yaweereddwa obukadde bwa ssiringi 12, ekikopo awamu n’emidaali gya zzaabu ate Buweekula n’efuna obukadde 9 n’emidaala gya Ffeeza. Obwedda bano battunka nga Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II abeegese amaaso. Waasooseewo omupiira ogw’okulondako essaza erikutte ekyokusatu mu mpaka z’omwaka guno era wano Bulemeezi yasobodde okuwangula Mawokota ggoolo 1-0 eyateebeddwaGabriel Eragu.  Abaafunye ebirabo Omukwasi wa ggoolo ya Buddu, Micheal Lutaaya ye musambi eyasinze banne mu mpaka z’omwaka 2021. Omusambi wa Buweekula, Isaac Musiima,yawangudde ekya omuteebi eyasinze ggoolo enyingi ne ggoolo 6. Akulira akakiiko akateekateeka empaka zino, Omuk. Sulaiman Ssejjengo ategeezezza nti batandikiddewo okwetegekera empaka eziddako eza 2022 kuba ekirwadde kya COVID-19 kyali kyacankalanya ebintu. Ate ye Minisita w’ebyemizannyo mu Buganda, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu yeebazizza abo bonna abaasobodde okuyamba empaka zino okutambula obulungi.

headline: Ebikolwa bya kiwambabantu bigenda kuleetera abantu okwekyawa  –  Owek. Waggwa Nsibirwa
text: Omumyuka Asooka owa Katikkiro, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa alabudde gavumenti ku bikolwa by’okuwamba abantu ebyeyongera buli lukya nti bino bisobola okuleetera bannansi okwekyaawa n’okwetamwa embeera nebakola ebitajja. Bino omumyuka owokubiri owa Katikkiro era Omuwanika wa Buganda Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa abyogeredde ku mukolo gw’okutikkula Oluwalo lwa bukadde 17 okuva ewa Loodimmeeya Erias Lukwago ne Bannalwengo ku Lwokuna e Bulange Mengo. “Bwetunagenda bwetutyo abantu bagenda kwekyawa, bagenda kwetamwa, nkubiriza gavumenti ebeere ya buvunaanyizibwa abantu bakole emirimu gyabwe. Bwebaba balina gwebeetaaga, banoonyereze nga balina obujulizi olwo babasimbe mu mbuga z’ amateeka gubasinge olwo balyoke basibwe,” Owek. Nsibirwa bw’agambye. Owek. Wagwa asabye ensonga eno etunulwemu ku mitendera gyonna nasaba ababaka okuli Allan Ssewanyana ne Muhammad Ssegiriinya baweebweko obujulizi waveeyo ensonga y’okwekwasa ensonga ezitaliimu. Ono ategeezezza nti wadde abantu beelondera abakulembeze babwe naye gavumenti erina embeera y’okuyingirira emirimu gy’abantu bano ekintu ekitali kirungi nasaba gavumenti ebawe ebikolwa n’obuyambi okusobola okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe.  Owek. Nsibirwa agambye nti Obwakabaka bukkiririza nnyo mu bukulembeze n’enfuga ey’amateeka era buwakanya nnyo abamenya amateeka era singa omuntu abeera agamenye aba alina okukwatibwa navunaanibwa mu mateeka. Minisita Omubeezi owa gavumenti ez’ebitundu, Joseph Kawuki asabye abakulu mu KCCA okufuba okulaba nti basoosowaza ensonga za Buganda basobole okuggyayo omugabo gwaayo. Omuloodi Erias Lukwago ategeezezza nti ng’ekitongole KCCA bali mu kattu olw’ amaka g’obwapulezidenti okuyingirira buli nsonga y’ekibuga Kampala nga kati batuuse nemu butale.  Abakulembeze ba KCCA basoose mu kafubo akatakkiriziddwamu bannamawulire era oluvannyuma Erias Lukwago annyonnyodde bakyalwana okulaba ngebintu by’Obwakabaka ebiri mu mikono gya KCCA bizzibwa. Ono era yeeyamye kulwa banne okwekolamu omulimu ku kulongoosa akayanja ka Kabaka. Bano baleese Oluwalo olusobye mu bukadde 16 okuva mu ggombolola ya Mutuba IV Masekati Kyaddondo mu Kampala ne Mutuba VII Lwengo okuva mu ssaza Buddu mu disitulikiti ye Lwengo.

headline: Enteekateeka z’olunaku lw’abajulizi zifulumye, Masaka yeetegeka
text: Enteekateeka z’okujjukira olunaku lw’abajulizi zifulumye era nga Masaka yeddiziddwa omukisa okuddamu okutegeka okulamaga kw’omulundi guno oluvannyuma lw’emikolo gino obutabeerayo omwaka oguwedde olwa Ssennyiga Corona. Kino kyabikkuddwa Omusumba w’essaza ly’Eklezia erya Masaka mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire lwe yatuuzizza e Kitovu, n’asaba abakkiriza okusabira ewaka ku ttivvi n’emitimbagano okusobola okwewala omujjuzo oguyinza okuvaako ekirwadde kya Corona okweyongera. Mu mwaka gwa 2020, essaza ly’e Masaka lye lyali eryokutegeka emikolo gino era nga kaweefube w’okukung’aanya ensimbi zino yali atandikiddwako. Okulamaga kuno okunaabeerawo nga 3 June omwaka guno okutandika ssaawa ssatu ez’okumakya, abateesiteesi balambuludde ku nteekateeka nga bw’eneebeera ng’abantu wajja kukkirizibwayo bayite bokka. Okusinziira ku musumba Jjumba, abalamazi abava ebweru w’eggwanga n’abo abalamaza ebigere okuva wano mu ggwanga, nabo sibaakukkirizibwa. Omusumba Jjumba alambuludde nti omulundi guno bajja kusinga okusabira emirembe mu ggwanga, okunyweza abakristu wamu n’okuwegayirira ensi esobola okuzuula eddagala lya Ssennyiga Corona. Ku ky’abalamazi ababadde bafuna amazzi g’omukisa e Namugongo, Omusumba abasabye bafune amazzi bagatwalire abasasorodooti baabwe, bagawe omukisa eyo mu bigo byabwe kuba ku lunaku lwennyini abantu tebajja kukkirizibwa kunona mazzi gano. Omuwanika w’enteekateeka eno, Rev. Fr. Anselm Edward Ssemwogerere, yategeezezza nti ku mulundi guno beetaaga obukadde bw’ensimbi 250 okutegeka okulamaga kuno nga ku zino balinako obukadde 151 zokka. Asabye abantu okudduukirira omulimu guno. Kino kitegeeza nti beetagayo obukadde 99 wabula era okwawukanako n’okusolooza ssente okubadde kujja kubeerawo ng’abantu basonda mu kikungo, zino ezibulayo bakunze ebitongole okubakwasizaako. Eyakulembeddemu enteekateeka eno, Fr.George William Lubega, yannyonnyodde nti enkola eno abaviiriddeko okusubwa ebintu bingi omuli n’okutongoza olunaku lw’okulamaga olw’abaana abato nga be baali bagenda okukitandika nga n’amasaza amalala gaali gaakulabira okwo.

headline: Omusango gwa Ssegiriinya ne Kidandala gwongezeddwayo, Ssegiriinya talabiseeko
text: Okuwulira omusango oguvunaanibwa omubaka wa Kawempe North mu Palamenti eyawangula akalulu ka 2021, Muhammad Ssegiriinya mwatunkira n’eyali omumyuka wa Loodimmmeeya Sulaiman Kidandala gwongezeddwayo okutuuka nga September 2, 2021 oluvannyuma lwa Ssegiriinya obutalabikako mu kkooti. Bw’abadde alabiseeko mu maaso g’omulamuzi wa kkooti enkulu, Henrietta Wolayo, munnamateeka w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda Edwin Tabaro ategeezezza nti waliwo obwetaavu okusooka okukakasa oba Omubaka Ssegiriinya yaweebwa ebbaluwa eraga nti bamuguddeko omusango nga amateeka bwegalagira. Mu kwanukula, munnamateeka wa Kidandala, Kenneth Paul Kakande ategeezezza kkooti nga bwebagezaako enfunda eziwera okuwa Ssegiriinya ebbaluwa zino wabula nazigaana era nebakozesa amakubo kkooti geyali ebawadde. “Twagenda mu kkomera e Kitalya okumuwa ebbaluwa zino naye nazigaana, netugezaako okuziwa OC w’e Kitalya naye nagaana okuzikkiriza era kino bwakitadde mu bujulizi n’ebirayiro byetuwadde kkooti,” Kakande bw’ ategeezezza. Kakande annyonnyodde nti kkopi endala bagiteeka ku ‘Notice Board’ ya kkooti nga bwebalagira kkooti. Wano Omulamuzi omusango agwongeddeyo okutuuka ku Lwokuna 2, September 2021. Ssegiriinya yatwalibwa mu kkooti Kidandala nga ayagala okulondebwa kwe kusazibwemu kuba empapula zeyasinzirako okuwandiisibwa zaali njingirire. Kidandala era agamba nti okuwandiisibwa kwa Ssegiriinya tekwaliko mannya n’emikono gy’abalonzi 10 mu Kawempe North nga amateeka agafuga okulondebwa kw’ ababaka bwegagamba.

headline: Museveni akirizza boda boda okukola okusukka ssaawa munaana
text: Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni akawungeezi kaleero akirizza abavuzi ba boda boda okugenda mu maaso n’emirimu gyabwe okusukka essaawa omunaana.  Bwabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga mu maka g’obwapulezidenti e Nakasero, Museveni agambye nti akakiiko akakulirwa Ssaabaminisita Livingstone Ruhakana Rugunda kaamuwadde alipoota nti tekirina buzibu kukola okusukka ssaawa munaana.  Kyokka ono yagambye nit bano balina okukoma okukola ku ssaawa kkumi neemu ez’olweggulo.  Museveni yagambye baali bagambye aba boda boda n’obugaali obutasukka ssaawa munaana kubanga abakozi b’ebikolobero baali batanidisse okuzeeyambisa.  Kyokka era Museveni yakozesezza okwogerakwe kuno n’agamba nti akakiiko ka Rugunda kagenda kwetegereza okulaba oba kisoaboka emmottok enneetissi z’emigugu okutambuliramu dereeva yekka.  Ygaambye nti newankubadde baali bakirizza abantu basatu, bangi bamugambye nti omu amala kubanga abangi kyangu okusaasaanya obulwadde. Mu birala, Museveni yalabudde abantu bonna abaagala okukweka emmere basobole okulinyissa emiwendo n’agamba nti wakugitumya okuva ebweru w’eggwanga. “Kasita mpulira akantu konna nti mugezaako kukulira emmere ng’enderawo wabweru; essente n’enziwa abagwira kubanga kirabika temwagaliza baganda bammwe kalungi,” Museveni bweyagambye.  Ono era yakkirizza abakazi be’mbuto okutwalibwa mu malwaliro mu motoka ez’obwannanyini newankubadde tebafunye lusa lwa RDC.  ”Omukazi ali olubuto alabika okujjako ng’oli atadde bulangiti mu lubuto kubanga bannayuganda sibangu,” Museveni bweyagambye.

headline: Omulangira Nakibinge asabye Pulezidenti Museveni ayimbule abakwate
text: Kampala Jjajja w’Obuyisiraamu, Omulangira Kassim Nakibinge, asabye Pulezidenti Museveni okuyimbula abaakwatibwa mu nsonga y’ebyobufuzi ng’akabonero akalaga obwetegefu okukolagana n’abo bwe baali bavuganya. Omulangira Nakibinge, bino yabyogeredde  mu makaage e Kibuli ng’agabula abakulembeze ab’enjawulo ku kijjulo kya Eid- al -fitr n’abasaba okufaayo ennyo ku mbeera z’abantu. “Nsaba gavumenti eyimbule abo bonna abakyali mu buwambe. Y’engeri yokka gye tusobola okugenda mu maaso. Kino nkyogedde enfunda eziwera nti tosobola kukaka muntu yenna kwagala by’oyagala oba okukyawa by’okyawa. Tusonyiwagane era tukkirize abakwate okudda eri famire zaabwe ng’akabonero ak’okugatta bannayuganda.” Omulangira Kakungulu bwe yagambye. Omulangira Nakibinge yalabudde eggye lya UPDF ku muze gw’okukuba bannamawulire mu ggwanga n’abasaba kino kikome mu bwangu era abakikola bavunaanibwe. Kakungulu era yasabye abakulembeze abaggya okwerabira enjawukana z’obululu naye beegatte bakole ku nsonga eziruma bannayuganda, basobole okukulaakulana. “Eby’akalulu tubiteeke emabega tutunuulire ebyo ebitugatta nga bannansi. Akalulu kaava kudda naye tufeeyo ku ebyo ebinaatuyamba okufunira abantu baffe eky’okulya.” Omulangira Nakibinge bwe yasabye. Omulangira Nakibinge yasabye abakulembeze okubeera abenkanya eri abantu bonna si nsonga baabalonda oba nedda. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako abakungu ab’enjawulo omwabadde omumyuka asooka owa Katikkiro, Twaha Kaawaase Kigongo,  Jjajja Muteesaasira,  Omuloodi Erias Lukwago awamu n’abalala.

headline: Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kagumizza Kyagulanyi ku by’okwerinda bye
text: Kyambogo Ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda, Omulamuzi Simon Byabakama, agumiza munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine), ng’akakiiko bwe kagenda okumukuuma asobole bulungi okunoonya akalulu ka 2021. Kyagulanyi Ssentamu ne mukyala we nga batuuka okwewandiisa Bino Byabakama abyogedde akwasa Kyagulanyi ne ttiimu ye, ttiimu y’abapoliisi egenda okukola ku by’okwerinda bye wamu n’omukwasa emmotoka gy’agenda okukozesa mu kalulu. “Ebyokwerinda bye tukuwa byakulaba nga bikukuuma so si kutiisatiisa era tugenda kuteeka abapoliisi bana mu maka go kubanga weesimbyewo era buvunaanyizibwa bwaffe okulaba ng’okuumibwa.”/Byabakama bw’agambye. Wabula Kyagulanyi alaze obutali bumativu bw’ategeezzza nti ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda byakufuba okulaba nga bimulemesa okunoonya akalulu. Ono Byabakama amukakasizza ng’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda bwe kalina omulimu gw’okulaba ng’abeesimbyewo bonna bakuumibwa butiribiri. Kyagulanyi aloopedde Byabakama ku nneeyisa y’abapoliisi abazze bakuba abantu be wamu n’okubagobaganya abawagizi ababadde bamulinze ku makubo okumuwubirako. Ono acoomedde poliisi olw’okulaga kyekubiira olw’okuleka abawagizi ba Museveni nebeetaayiza ku nguudo za Kampala ku Mmande wamu n”okuyisa ebivvulu. Bobi Wine asabye ab’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda okumanya nti Uganda ebatunuulidde era bafube okulaba nga wabaawo obwenkanya mu kalulu ka bonna 2021. Oluvannyuma Kyagulanyi ayogeddeko eri bannamawulire n’abalaga ebimu ku bintu ebikulu by’atandikirako okukola singa anaaba awangudde akalulu kano.

headline: Ssaabaminisita wa Bungereza senyiga wa kolona amuyodde
text: Ssaabaminisita wa Bungereza Boris Johnson  Ssaabaminisita w’eggwanga lya Bungereza Boris Johnson olwaleero ategeezezza ensi nti naye senyiga omukambwe owa Coronavirus amanyiddwa ennyo nga COVID-19 naye yabadde amuyodde.  Olwaleero, Johnson agambye nti eggulo yabadde ayokerera wamu n’okuba ne senyiga ekyareetedde omusawo we okumulagira yeekebeze.  Wabula ebyavudde mu kwekeebeza byalaze nti on yabadde ayooloddwa.  “Yadde nfunye ekirwadde kino, ngenda genda mumaaso nga nkulira gavumenti mu kaweefube w’okulwanyisa Coronavirus,” Johnson bweyagmbye. Ono wakubeera mu maka gw’obwa Ssabaminita ku 10 Downing Street mu kibuga ekikulu London nga ajjanjjabwa era singa kino kigaana, minisita avunanyizibwa ku nsonga z’amawanga amalala Dominic Raab, etteeka gwerikkiriza okuddira Jonson mu bigere.  Johnson si ye munene mu ggwanga lya Bungereza yekka asoose okuzuulibwa n’akawuka kano.  Ku ntandikwa ya wiiki eno, amawulire gaategeeza nti omulangira alindiridde okutwala entebe ya Bungereza, Charles naye alina kolona.  Ono naye abeera waka wajjamjjabibwa.

headline: Bikaaye  : Abekalakaasa  67 e Jinja basindikiddwa ku alimanda
text: Omulamuzi omukulu owa kkooti esookerwako e Jinja, Jude Okumu Muwone asindise abantu abawera 67 abakwatibwa nga beekalakaasa e Jinja okuwakanya ebbeeyi y’ebintu ku alimanda e Kirinya nga abalanga okwekalaasa mu ngeri emenya amateeka. Bano ku alimanda batwaliddwayo ku Mmande nga bano bebamu ku bantyu abeetaba mu kwekalakaasa okwali e Bugembe, Mafubira ne Namulesa. Kati bano bakudda mu kkooti nga August, 9, 2022. Abeekalakaasi bano baali balaga obutali bumativu ku gavumenti gyebagamba nti terina kintu kyonna kyekozeewo nga emiwendo gy’ebintu gyongera okupaala. Wabula okwekalakaasa kuno kwavaamu obuvuyo era abamu ku bakwetabamu babuukawo n’ebisago, poliisi bweyali egezaako okubagumbulula. Oluvannyuma lw’obunkenke kati ebintu bitandise okudda mu nteeko mu bitundu bye Bugembe, Kikalamoja, Namulesa ne Mafubira era abamu ku basuubuzi batandise okudda ku mirimu. Kigambibwa nti okwekalakaasa kuno kwava ku bubaka obwenjawulo obwayitira ku mitimbagano nga busaba bannansi obutakola nga akabonero akalaga obutali bumativu ku bbeeyi y’ebintu.

headline: “Ekya aboopozisoni okuzira entuula za Palamenti tekijja kukosa ntambula ya mirimu”
text: Minisita w’ebyamawulire n’okulung’amya eggwanga, Dr. Chris Baryomunsi ategeezezza nga eky’ababaka ku ludda oluvuganya okwekandagga ne bafuluma Palamenti nti, tekirina ngeri yonna gye kigenda kutataaganyaamu mirimu gya Palamenti. Okusinziira ku Baryomunsi, ababaka ba NRM bangi, ekimala okuweza omuwendo gw’essalira ogukkirizibwa Palamenti okugenda mu maaso. Kino kiddiridde ababaka ba Opozisoni okulangirira ku Lwokusatu nga bwe batagenda kuddamu kulinnya kigere mu Palamenti okutuusa nga bannaabwe okuli; Allan Ssewanyana ne Muhammad Ssegirinya, bayimbuddwa mu bwenkanya. Ssewanyana ne Ssegirinya bavunaanwa emisango egyekuusa ku ttemu ly’ebijambiya e Masaka awamu n’obutujju era babadde bakaddamu okukwatibwa oluvannyuma lw’okuyimbulwa ku kakalu ka kkooti. “Aba Opozisoni basobola okwekandaggane bafuluma naye tekisobola kulemesa Palamenti kugenda mu maaso. Batono nnyo mu Palamenti era ne we batali tubadde tutuula.” Baryomunsi bw’ategeezezza bannamawulire. Ono annyonnyodde nti nga gavumenti baakugenda mu maaso n’okukola emirimu gyabwe mu Palamenti okutuusa ng’aba Opozisoni beenyudde ne bakomawo. Baryomunsi agamba nti aba Opozisoni okwekandagga kyabadde tekyetaagisa kuba ababakabano bajja kuyimbulwa mu kaseera akatuufu kuba okunoonyereza ku misango gyabwe kugenda mu maaso. Abakulembeze ab’enjawulo naddala ku ludda oluvuganya batenderezzaekikolwa kya Opozisoni kino eky’okufuluma. Omuloodi wa Kampala era munnamateeka w’ababaka bano, Erias Lukwago yalaze nti kyabadde kigwanidde era baakikoze mu mirembe kuba baabadde balaga obutali bumativu ku ngeri ensonga eno gy’ekwatiddwamu.

headline: Ttiyaggaasi anyoose nga bagumbulula Barbie Kyagulanyi n’aba NUP
text: Poliisi ekubye ttiyaggaasi n’amasasi okugumbulula Omukyala wa Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, Barbie Kyagulanyi ne bannakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) e Nakaseke gye babadde batutte obuyambi eri abawala abazaala nga bakyali bato. Bannakibiina kya NUP nga bakulembeddwamu Barbie Kyagulanyi, bakedde kwolekera ddwaliro lya Kikamulo Health Centre III e Nakaseke okuwaayo obuyambi nga bayitira mu kibiina kye ekya Caring Hearts Uganda nga poliisi tennabasalako. Ono ne banne babadde batwalidde abawala bano ebintu ebyenjawulo okuli; Mama kits, amasuuka, ebisabika ebyeyambisibwa mu nsonga awamu ne mmere nga bino byonna poliisi ebiwambye. Ababaka ababadde bawerekedde ku Barbie Kyagulanyi okuli; Kirumira Hassan (Katikamu South) ne Ssekabira Denis (Katikamu North), nabo balozezza ku bukambwe bwa poliisi. Kyagulanyi ategeezezza bannamawulire nga bw’atamanyi bukambwe we buvudde balyoke babakubemu ttiyaggaasi kuba tebalina tteeka lyonna lye bamenye. “Ekisinze okunnuma nti mu be bakubye ttiyaggaasi mulimu bamaama awamu n’abaana abato ddala. Uganda ya bannayuganda so si babyakwerinda kuba nabo tebali bulungi.” Kyagulanyi bw’agambye. Poliisi ebadde tennavaayo kutangaaza ku nsonga eno n’ensonga eyavuddeko okukuba ttiyagaasi mu bamaama abalina n’abaana abato be basitudde.

headline: Minisita Musenero bamutaddeko akakiiko kamunoonyerezeeko
text: Palamaenti etaddewo akakiikko ak’enjawulo okunoonyereza ku Minsita wa Ssaayansi ne Tekinologiya kanoonyereze ku Minisita Monica Musenero ku ngeri gavumenti gy’ezze emuwaamu ensimbi ez’okukola eddagala erigema Ssennyiga Corona mu bukyamu so nga tewali kyamaanyi kyakoleddwa. Kinajjukirwa nti okuva Ssennyiga corona lwe yalumba eggwanga,omukulembeze w’eggwanga azze ajuliza bannassaayansi ba kuno nga bwe bagenda okutandika okukola eddagala erigema Ssennyiga Corona n’ebirwadde ebirala, Uganda ekomye okulindanga abazungu. Ensimbi Pulezidenti Museveni yaziyisa mu kitongole kya ‘Presidential Initiative on Science and Innovation’ ekikulirwa Dr. Musenero era nga kiteereddwamu ensimbi ezisoba mu buwumbi 30 era nga gye buvuddeko bayongerwa obuwumbi 50 kyokka tewali kyamaanyi kye baali bakoze. Omubaka wa Ntungamo yategeezezza Palamenti nti wadde abakulu abakulirwa Dr. Musenero bafunye ssente z’omuwi w’omusolo eziwera, naye kirabika balya ndye kuba eggwanga teririna kye lyali lirabye. Musinguzi yannyonnyodde Palamenti nti Ssaababalirizi w’ebitabo bya gavumenti yatuuka n’okusaba Dr. Musenero ne ttiimu ye ensaasaanya ya ssente zino, naye tebaagimuwa kyokka nga bw’otunuulira n’obuyigirize bw’omuntu eyakwasibwa okukulemberamu omulimu guno, bwa munguuba. Embeera eno yawalirizza omumyuka wa Sipiika abadde mu mitambo gy’olukiiko luno okussaawo akakiiko ak’enjawulo okunoonyereza ku Dr. Musenero okulaba w’atuuse ku nteekateeka eno. Ababaka okuli; owa Bukoto Central, Richard Ssebamala n’owa Mawogola South, Gorreth Namugga baategeezezza nti enteekateeka nga zino zizze ziteekebwawo Pulezidenti Museveni naye ne zimaliriza nga zikoze kimu kya kulya ssente za bannayuganda nga tewali kikoleddwa.

headline: COVID-19: Museveni Wakuddamu Okw’ogerako Eri Eggwanga
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni Kaguta  Ng’ekirwadde kya senyiga amanyiddwa nga COVID-19 kikyeyongera okweriisa enkuuli, Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni wakuddamu okw’ogerako eri eggwanga olwaleero.  Okusinziira ku Don Wanyama, omwogezi wa pulezidneti, Museveni wakw’ogerako eri eggwanga ku ssaawa bbiri ez’ekiro.  Guno gugenda kuba mulundi gwakutaano nga Museveni ayogerako eri eggwanga mu bbanga lya ssabbiiti bbiri.  Olwaleero minisitule evunanyizibwa ku by’obulamu erangiridde nti abantu abalala bataano bebaazuuliddwa nti bebalina ekirwadde kino ekyakatta abantu abagenda mu mitwalo ebiri munsi yonna.

headline: Aba UNAIDS basiimye obubaka bwa Ssaabasajja Kabaka bweyawadde mu kukuza olunaku lwa Bulungibwansi.
text: UNAIDS esanyukidde obubaka bwa Kabaka bweyawadde mu kukuza olunaku lwa Bulungibwansi ne Gavumenti ez’ebitundu Oweek. Dr Prosperous Nankindu  Minisita wa Kabaka ow’Ebyobulamu nga ali Sarah Nakku ne Angela Kateemu Nuwahereza okuva mu UNAIDS. Abakungu b’ekibiina ky’amawanga amagatte ekya UNAIDS basisinkanye Minisita w’enkulaakulana y’abantu era avunaanyizibwa ku by’obulamu, Dr. Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma, abatuusize okusiima kwabwe eri Ssaabasajja Kabaka olw’obubaka obukwata ku bulwadde bwa mukenenya bweyawadde ku mukolo gw’okukuza olunaku lwa Bulungibwansi ne Gavumenti ez’ebitundu e Masuliita. Sarah Nakku, Community mobilization and networking advisor, ne Angela Kateemu Nuwahereza, Communications and Coordination Officer, bebazze okwebaza kulwa UNAIDS.Mu bubaka bwe, Ssaabasajja yagambye nti,“Nga bwetubategeeza bulijjo, tetujja kuzimba Buganda nga tetuli balamu, n’olwekyo twongera okubakubiriza okwekuuma, okwekebeza n’okwejjanjaba obulwadde bwa siriimu n’endwadde endala.Mu mwaka 2017 omuwendo gw’abantu abaakwatibwa siriimu gwali gusse okuva ku bantu 90% okutuuka ku bantu 42%, okusinziira ku miwendo egyo, tulina essuubi nti omuwendo gweyongedde okukka. Ago amawulire ga ssanyu era gatuwa essuubi nti olutalo siriimu tujja kuluwangula. Twebaza minisitule y’obwakabaka ey’ebyobulamu, ne radio yaffe CBS, olw’omulimu omunene gwebakoze, okukubiriza abasajja okugenda okwekebeza siriimu.AIDS Information Center, ekitongole ekikungaanya amawulire gonna agakwata ku nsasaana ya siriimu, balaze mu byebazudde mu bbanga ery’emyezi ebiri egiwedde, nti mu Wakiso ne Kampala, abasajja basinze abakyala okwekebeza, nga abaami 60% ate abakyala 40%, songa emabegako kibadde, abakyala 70% ate abaami 30%. Kino kikulu nnyo ddala kubanga ekizibu ekikulu ennyo mu kulwanyisa obulwadde buno, kibadde nti abaami babadde n’okutya kuyitirivu okwekebeza. Twongera okubiriza abasajja n’abalenzi okutwala ensonga y’okwekebezanga nga nkulu, ssi siriimu yekka naye n’endwadde endala zonna”.   Mu 2017 ekitongole kya UNAIDS kyalonda Ssaabasajja Kabaka okubeera emunyeenye mu kulwanyisa obulwadde bwa siriimu mu buvanjuba bwa Africa, nga kino akikola mu kukubiriza abantu okwewala obulwadde bwa mukenenya, okwekebeza, okwekuuma, naabo ababulina bagende bafune obujjanjabi.

headline: UPDF yeegaanye eby’okusibira aba NUP mu nkambi z’amagye
text: Kampala Eggye ly’eggwanga erya Uganda People’s Defence Forces (UPDF), liwakanyizza ebyogerwa Pulezidenti wa National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine), nti abamu ku bannakibiina abaakwatiddwa e Masaka, bakuumirwa mu nkambi y’amagye. Abamu ku bammemba ba NUP nga batwalibwa ab’ebyokwerinda UPDF esabye Kyagulanyi agoberere amakubo amatuufu mu mateeka amanye ekituufu abantu be we bali aleme kuwabya ggwanga. Bobi Wine eggulo yategeezezza nti; Nubian li, Eddie Mutwe n’abalala 18 baabadde bakuumirwa mu nkambi y’amagye era nga bannamateeka n’enganda baagaaniddwa okubalabako. Kino kiddiridde Kyagulanyi ne banne okukwatibwa e Kalangala bwe yabadde agenzeeyo okunoonya akalulu. Abaakwatiddwa poliisi yavuddeyo n’etegeeza nti bagenda kuvunaanibwa omusango gw’okukola ebikolwa ebisaasaanya Corona ate abamu bavunaanibwe okuggya omukka mu mmotoka za poliisi awamu n’emisango emirala. Enkya yaleero Kyagulanyi ayise ku mutimbagano n’agamba nti abalala ku ttiimu ye bakuumirwa mu bitundu by’e Masaka era ng’ekiro ky’eggulo baatulugunyiziddwa n’okukubwa mu ngeri embi ennyo. Amyuka omwogezi w’eggye lya UPDF, Lt.Col Deo Akiiki, bwabuuziddwa ku by’okuggalira aba NUP mu nkambi z’amagye, ategeezezza nti si kituufu kuba bo bakola kimu kya kukuuma ggwanga nga litebenkedde. Akiiki annyonnyodde nti wadde amagye gayitibwa okuyambako poliisi mu biseera ebimu, talina muntu yenna munnabyabufuzi gw’amanyi yasibiddwa mu nkambi z’amagye. “Ebikwekweto byonna ebibeeramu ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda nga bikoledde wamu, bikulemberwamu poliisi, oyo yenna alina okwemulugunya muwa amagezi gy’aba asookera.” Akiiki bw’alambise.

headline: Obubonero bw’abeesimbyewo ku lwabwe tebutundibwa – Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda
text: Kampala Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kalabudde abantu abeesimbyewo ku lwabwe (Independents) okwewala ababasaba ssente nga babasuubiza okubawa obubonero bwe banaakozesa ku bukonge mu kalulu ka bonna aka 2021.  Omwogezi w’akakiiko kano Paul Bukenya yagambye nti obubonero buno akakiiko kabugaba ku bwereere ng’omuntu asooka okubatuukirira gwe basooka okuwa akabonero k’ayagala. “Obubonero tetubutunda era asooka okujja y’alondawo akabonero k’abeera ayagala.” Bukenya bwe yagambye. Okwogera bino Bukenya yabadde mu woofiisi ye mu Kampala n’ategeeza nti omuwendo gw’obubonero buno gwongeddwako okuva ku bubonero 10 nga kati bufuuse 20, kisobozese abeesimbyewo okweroboza. Bukenya yakubirizza abantu abatalina bibiina kwe bajjidde okutuukirira akakiiko kasobole okuweebwa obubonero buno obulina okuteekebwa ku kakonge. Obubonero obupya obuleeteddwa mulimu; essimu, ttivvi, omuti, ennyumba, ekiwagu ky’amatooke, emmotoka, omuzindaalo wamu n’ekidomola.Ate obukadde kubaddeko; eggaali, ensuwa, essaawa, entebe, ssefuliya, emmeeza, ekikopo, leediyo, ebbinika wamu n’omupiira. Obubonero buno obupya bwakugattibwa ku bw’ebibiina ebyenjawulo okuli; bbaasi ekozesebwa aba NRM, Manvuuli ekozesebwa aba NUP, enkumbi eya DP, minzaani eya JEEMA n’ekisumuluzo kya FDC, ate ng’ekibatu kya UPC wamu n’obubonero bw’ebibiina ebirala. Bukenya yalabudde abeesimbyewo ku bwannamunigina okwewala okukozesa obubonero obutali mu obo bukkiriziddwa kakiiko kubanga kijja kutataaganya abawagizi baabwe. Okusinziira ku mwogezi w’akakiiko kano Paul Bukenya, abeesimbyewo tebalina kuferebwa kubanga obubonero buno bwa bwereere.

headline: Kkooti egobye ogwa People Power obutabeera mpandiise
text: Kampala Kkooti etaputa Ssemateeka mu Kampala egobye omusango ogwali guwakanya ekisinde kya People Power ekikulirwa Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine, okukolera mu ggwanga nga si kiwandiise mu mateeka agafuga ebibiina by’ebyobufuzi. Leero ku Lwokubiri, abalamuzi 4 aba kkooti eno okuli; omumyuka wa Ssaabalamuzi Richard Buteera, Kenneth Kakuru, Catherine Bamugemereire ne Irene Mulyagonja, bategeezezza nti kkooti eno terina buyinza kuwulira musango nga guno era bwebatyo ne bagugoba. “Omuwaabi teyeesigama ku nnyingo 50 ng’aleeta omusango gwe era ne mu mpaaba ye tagisiinyaako. Noolwekyo mu ndaba yange omusango guno gwalina kuwaabwa omuntu ng’agoberera ennyingo eyo era gwalina kutwalibwa mu kkooti enkulu si wano.” Omulamuzi Mulyagonja bw’asomye ensala ye. Abalamuzi abalala okuli; Richard Buteera, Kenneth Kakuru ne Catherine Bamugemereire nabo bakkaanyiza ne Mulyagonja wadde ng’omuwaabi tebamulagidde kuliyirira bawawaabirwa.
