Wabula Omulamuzi Christopher Mandrama ayawukanye ku banne n’agamba nti kyali kikyamu Kyagulanyi okutambuliza emirimu gye mu People Power omwali n’okuvujjirira abantu okuvuganya ate ng’ekibiina kino si kiwandiise mu mateeka. Mu mwaka gwa 2019 munnayuganda Aden Rutaro Ntare, yatwala Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine mu kkooti awamu n’eyali Pulezidenti wa Forum for Democratic Change (FDC),  ng’abavunaana okukulembera ebisinde bino ebitali biwandiise mu mateeka. Rutaro yagamba nti Kyagulanyi y’akulira People Power ng’olumu beeyita ‘People Power-Uganda’ oba ‘People Power’ n’ekigendererwa ky’okuwa abantu akadaala basobole okuvuganya mu bifo ebyenjawulo. Ate ye Dr. Besigye, Rutaro yamuvunaana kutondawo People’s Government’ eyeefaananyiriza gavumenti eri mu buyinza, ekintu ky’agamba nti kikkirizibwa bibiina byabufuzi ebiwandiise mu mateeka.

headline: Ssaabalamuzi Owiny-Dollo alabudde aba Kyagulanyi kukumutiisatiisa
text: Kampala Ssaabalamuzi Alphonse Alphonse Owiny-Dollo alabudde enjuyi zombi mu musango oguwakanya obuwanguzi bwa Pulezidenti Museveni mu kalulu ka 2021 okukomya okutiisatiisa abalamuzi ba kkooti ensukkulumu.  Ssabbiiti ewedde, ab’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform nga bakuliddwamu Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu batiisatiisa okuggyayo omusango gwabwe singa abalamuzi basatu be balumiriza okukolagana ne Museveni banaagulemeramu. Ssaabalamuzi Alfonse Owiny Dollo Kyagulanyi alumiriza Ssaabalamuzi Alfonse Owiny-Dollo, Omulamuzi Mike Chibita ne Ezekiel Kurabiraho Muhanguzi okubeera n’enkolagana n’omuwawaabirwa. Olwaleero ku Lwokutaano, Ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti William Byaruhanga aloopedde kkooti ng’oludda oluwaabi bwe lutandise okutiisatiisa abalamuzi. “Kirabika waliwo enteekateeka okugezaako okulaga nti abalamuzi balina kyekubiira naye balina okumanya nti eno ye kkooti ensukkulumu mu ggwanga era balina okugiwa ekitiibwa ekigisaanira.” Ssaabawolereza Byaruhanga bw’ategeezezza. Ssaabawolereza agamba nti ebigambo ebyayogedde Kyagulanyi mu mawulire tebyakoleddwa mu bwesimbu. Bannamateeka ba Kyagulanyi bwe baabuuziddwa ku nsonga zino baategeezezza nga bwe batazimanyiiko era nga baazisanze mu kkooti. Mu kwanukula, Ssaabalamuzi Owiny Dollo ategeezezza nti tebagenda kutiisibwatiisibwa era balina essuubi nti omusango guno gwakukwatibwa mu bwenkanya. “Bwe wabaawo omuntu yenna alina okwemulugunya ku balamuzi, akikolere mu kkooti naye bwe munaalowooza nti musobola okututiisatiisa oba Ssaabalamuzi okudda ku ludda lwabwe oyo ajja kutomera.” Ssaabalamuzi bw’annyonnyodde. Owiny- Dollo agamba nti ekigendererwa kye ekikulu kwe kulaba ng’abali mu musango guno bafuna obwenkanya era nga tewali kigenda kumulemesa. Ono agamba ebigambo bya Kyagulanyi tebiriimu mpeke era bannayuganda tebalina kubiwa makulu. “Bw’oba totwesiga totuleetera misango gyo. Bw’oba olina entegeka zo eza ‘Plan B’ genda mu maaso nazo tetugenda kukulemesa. Enkola za kkooti zawuka ku by’obufuzi.” Ssaabalamuzi bw’afundikidde.

headline: Baabano baminisita Museveni b’asudde n’alonda abapya
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Tibuhaburwa Museveni, kyaddaaki alangiridde kabineeti empya gy’agenda okukola nayo mu kisanja, kino erabise nga yeewuunyisizza bantu ab’enjawulo olw’abo abagirabikiddemu n’abo abasuuliddwa. Olukalala luno olwafulumiziddwa eggulo ku Lwokubiri, omumyuka wa Pulezidenti Edward Kiwanuka Ssekandi abadde mu kifo kino okumala emyaka 10 y’omu ku basuuliddwa era ono yawangulwa ku bubaka bwa Palamenti bwa Bukoto Central. Ssekandi asikiziddwa eyali minisita w’ebyenjigiriza, Jessica Alupo. Abadde Ssaabaminisita Ruhakana Rugunda naye takomyewo wadde ng’ensonda zaategeezezza ng’ono bwe yali yasaba mukama we obutamuzza ku kifo kino, ono asikiziddwa ne Robinah Nabbanja. Abadde Minisita w’ensonga ez’ebweru, Sam Kuteesa abadde mu kifo kino okuva mu 2005 naye asuuliddwa n’asikizibwa Gen. Jeje Odongo abadde mu minisitule y’ensonga z’omunda mu ggwanga. Okusinziira ku lukalala luno, Minisita w’ensonga z’Obwapulezidenti, Esther Mbayo naye takomyewo ng’ono asikiziddwa Mariam Dhoka Babalanda ate Gen. Elly Tumwine naye asikiziddwa Jim Muhwezi. Abadde Ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti, William Byaruhanga, ekifo mw’abadde kitwaliddwa Kiryowa Kiwanuka ate Mary Gorreti Kitutu n’asikizibwa Ruth Nankabirwa nga Minisita w’ebyamasannyalaze. Amelia Anne Kyambadde eyaakawangulwa mu kalulu ka Mawokota North naye asikiziddwa Francis Mwebesa nga Minisita w’ebyobusuubuzi, amakolero n’obwegassi. Adolf Mwesigye, abadde minisita wa difensi n’abaazirwanako naye takomyewo era ekifo kye kirekeddwa nga kikalu, ate era ne Minisita Godfrey Kiwanda naye erinnya lye lisuuliddwa mu kasero. Mu ngeri y’emu, Minisita Nakiwala Kiyingi, Beti Kamya, Sarah Kanyike ne Ronald Kibuule abadde minisita w’amazzi awamu n’abalala, nabo basuuliddwa.

headline: Abantu 500 bokka be bayitiddwa okuziika Ssaabasumba Lwanga
text: Kampala Enteekateeka z’okuziika Ssaabasumba wa Kampala, Dr. Cyprian Kiziito Lwanga nga zigenda mu maaso, Ekereziya Katolika evuddeyo n’etegeeza nti abantu 500 bokka be bagenda okukkirizibwa okuziika era nti bano baamaze dda n’okutegeezebwa ku nteekateeka eno. Ssaabasumba Lwanga agenda kuziikibwa nkya munda mu Ekereziya ya Lubaga wabula abakulu ba Ekereziya bategeezezza nti okusalawo ku muwendo gw’abantu kyakoleddwa okusobola okutangira ensaasaana ya Ssennyiga kolona.  “Tukimanyi nti buli muntu alina eddembe okukungubaga era tewali asaana kulimuggyako mu buli mbeera wabula waliwo abantu abalondeddwa Ekereziya n’aboobuyinza mu Gavumenti. Abo be bagenda okukiikirira ffe abalala  olw’okuba nti tuli mu biseera bya Ssenyiga Kolona.” Rev.Fr. Nicholas Mulumba omwogezi w’Obusumba bwa Kampala bw’ategeezezza. Rev.Fr Mulumba era ayongedde n’atangaaza ku nsonga eno nti tewali kya njawulo kyesigamiziddwako okulonda abantu abagenda okuziika okuggyako okuba nti bakulisitu ate nga beebo abalina akakwate akaamaanyi ku mugenzi. Ono yeegattidwako omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala n’emiriraano, Luke Oweyesigire, akkaatirizza nti bagenda kubeera bulindaala nnyo ku nsonga y’okutangira  ekirwadde kya Kolona okusaasaana era n’asaba abakungubazi okukakasa nti bambala obukookolo bwabwe. Ono era alabudde nti wagenda kubaawo okutataaganya eby’entambula naddala ku nguudo ezolekera Ekereziya ye Lubaga. Wano agambye nti abavuzi ba boodabooda tebagenda kukkirizibwa ku nguudo zino okuggyako nga balina ebipapula (stickers) ate nga nabo bagenda kulambikibwa enguudo ze banaakozesa.  Ssaabasumba Lwanga yasangibwa mu kisenge kye ng’afudde ku Lwomukaaga kumakya ng’entabwe yava ku kirwadde kya mutima. Ono yafiiridde ku myaka 68, wabula ng’abadde Ssaabasumba okumala emyaka 15.

headline: Bannayuganda basabiddwa okwetangira endwadde
text: Bannayuganda basabiddwa okufaayo okwetangira endwadde ezitali zimu bweba baagala okulaakulana n’okukyuusa embeera yabwe olwo Buganda edde ku ntikko. Okusaba kuno kukoleddwa Omulangira Felix Muteesa bw’abadde atikkula Amakula okuva mu bannassingo mu lubiri e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri. Bano Muteesa abasabye okwewala endwadde zinamutta basobole okubeera abalamu kuba abantu abalamu bokka be basobola okulaakulanya ensi Buganda. Omulangira era abakubiriza okuba abakozi nga lwebagya okusoboola okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byabwe . Katikkiro w’Ebyalo bya Kabaka Omuk.Moses Luutu asabye abazadde okwongera okugumiza obuvunqnnyizibwa bwabwe eri abaana okuteekateeka eggwanga eryenkya erituukiridde. Ye Omwami wa Kabaka amulamulirako eggombolola ya mumyuka Busimbi David Ssendikadiwa agamba nti basoomozebwa enjala kyokka nakakasa nti olw’obukulembeze obulungi ebisoomozo bagezezaako okubirinya ku nfeete. Mukwenda eyawummula era omukiise wa Ssingo mu lukiiko lwa Buganda owek. Stanley Kijjambu yeebaziza banassingo olw’okufaayo okutuukiriza ennono yabwe nga lino ryerimu ku makubo ag’okuzza Buganda ku ntikko Amakula gano gavudde mu ggombolola ya Mumyuka Busimbi okuva mu ssaza lye Ssingo.

headline: Abatulugunya bannayuganda basabiddwa okwenenya mu kisiibo kino
text: Kampala Bannaddiini ab’enjawulo basabye abavunaanyizibwa, okukomya embeera y’okukwata n’okutulugunya bannayuganda era beenenye mu kiseera kino ekya Kalema basobole okusonyibwa kuba kino kiseera kya kwagalana awamu n’okusonyibwa.  Akulira abeesikoopi mu Ekleziya, Omusumba Anthony Zziwa, avumiridde ebikolwa by’okutulugunya bannayuganda era n’asaba abakola ebikolwa bino okudda eri Katonda mu kaseera kano. “Nkoowoola abo bonna abakoze ebivve ebyo ku bannayuganda bannaffe, mwenenye. Mu mbeera eno oyinza okugamba nti Uganda etiirika omusaayi, mu Uganda abantu bakuba biwoobe naye eyo ye Uganda gye twatondebwamu.” Bw’atyo Omusumba Zziwa bw’ategeezezza abakedde okusiigibwa evvu. Fr. Achiles Mayanja nga awa abantu evvu basobole okwesiiga Ate ku Lutikko e Lubaga, Fr. Achilles Mayanja, yasabya abakkiriza okukozesa akadde kano okudda eri Katonda era beewale ebikolwa ebityoboola eddembe ly’abantu, kisobole okuleetawo emirembe mu ggwanga. “Abantu abakwata abantu mu Drone mulekere awo okutulugunya bannayuganda ate nammwe abavuganya gavumenti mulekere awo tusobole okufuna emirembe mu budde buno obwekisiibo.” Fr. Mayanja bw’ategeezezza. Ono asabye abantu okweddamu ku bikolwa byabwe era beekwate omutonzi asobole okubamalira ebyetaago byabwe kuba abisobolera ddala. Ffaaza Mayanja abasabye okwettanira okukola ebikolwa ebyekisa eri abo ababonaabona era banyweze okwagalana wakati waabwe. “Yezu Kristo agenda kutulamula ng’asinziira ku ngeri gye tumulabyemu mu bantu ababonaabona, abantu bangi abatalina mmere tubawe emmere balye, abatalina byakwambala tubawe engoye bambale, n’abali mu makomera tubalambuleko, ebyo n’ebirala bye bitukubirizibwa okukola mu budde bw’ekisiibo.” Faaza Mayanja bw’agasseeko. Mu ngeri y’okwewala ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga ku Corona, evvu terisiigiddwa butereevu ku mitwe gy’abantu wabula limansiddwa mu kyenyi by’Abakkiriza okusobola okubakuuma nga balamu. Ate bo Abakkiriza mu disitulikiti y’e Mubende ku Kigo kya Our Lady of Fatima, bakedde mu kitambiro kya Mmisa ku makya, okwetegekera ekisiibo era eno ekwatiddwa mu ngeri etangira Ssennyiga Corona era Abakkiriza be beesiize evvu ng’akabonero akalaga okwagalana. Abakkiriza ab’enjawulo bategeezezza nti kano ke kadde akatuufu okutabagana ne Katonda era ne basaba bannaabwe okubeera abagumiikiriza era bakomye emize egy’enjawulo. Kinajjukirwa nti Abakatoliki n’Abakulisitaayo, basiiba ennaku ana, okugoberera Yezu Kristo ekiseera kye yamala ng’asiiba mu ddungu awamu n’okwetegekera Ppaasika.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga  akunze Bannabulemeezi okulima emmwaanyi, aggaddewo ekitundu ky’Emmwaanyi Terimba A
text: Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga alambudde abalimi b’Emmwaanyi abasukkulumye mu ssaza Bulemeezi era nasaba n’abantu abalala okubalabirako bazirime bwebaba baagala okuwona obwavu n’okwekulaakulanya. Obubaka buno Katikkiro Mayiga abuwadde alambula abalimi ab’enjawulo wansi w’enteekateeka y’Emmwaanyi Terimba neyeebaza Palamenti olw’okusimbira endagaano y’ Emmwaanyi ekkuuli. “Omuganda agamba nti Obulangira bw’omukopi kwekolera era singa Ssebitosi tabadde mukozi ne mukyala we wano sandizeewo. Twetubadde ewa Mwami Ssemyaano ow’ E mmamba bagambye nti ebiseera by’okwekubagiza byaggwako. Ndabye abantu bangi abava e Bulemeezi abeekubagiza nga bajjukira olutalo naye buli aneekubagiza talisomesa baana wadde okwekulaakulanya,” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye.  Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga obulimi bwebugenda okutuusa ku bannayuganda ku mutendera oguddako era akikakasa nti obulimi busobola okubatwala mu makolero awamu ne Saayansi ne Tekinologiya nga bwegwali e South Korea. Owek. Mayiga asabye abazadde okusomesa abaana awatali kwawula mu ddiini kuba essuubi lya Buganda liri mu baana era bafube okubeera abakozi era abatetenkanya okusobola okutwala Buganda mu maaso. Ono abalabudde okukomya okuyimba ebibasomooza era bafube okuliikiriza ennimiro zabwe nga bakozesa ente ne Nnakavundira bwebaba baagala okugatta kwebyo byebafuna era nasaba abalimi okugabana amagezi kuba amagezi muliro.  Mu kulambula kuno, Katikkiro Mayiga asookedde wa Mw. Ssemyano Timothy ku kyalo Magere e Semuto gy’alambulidde yiika ezisoba mu 9 ez’emmwaanyi. Oluvannyuma yeyongeddeyo e Nnyanja mu ggombolola ye Ssemuto ewa Mw. Adam Ssebitosi nga naye alima emmwaanyi mu bungi era namulaga watuuse. Minisita w’ebyobulimi, obulunzi obwegassi era avunaanyizibwa ku Butondebwensi mu Buganda, Owek. Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo, akubirizza abantu okusoosowaza Obutondebwensi olwo bajja kusobola okulima awatali kwelarikirira kuba enkuba bajja kuba bagifuna mu budde. Ye omubaka omukyala owa Nakaseke, Sarah Najjuma yeebazizza Katikkiro Mayiga olw’okugezaako okuyiiyiza Buganda enteekateeka ez’enjawulo ezikulaakulanya abantu ba Buganda okusobola okubaggya mu bwavu era nakunga abalimi okunywerera ku Mmwaanyi. Omu ku balimi Adam Ssebitosi ategeezezza nti ekimu ku kyasinga okumukwatako bwe bubaka bweyawa nga agamba nti obugagga ntuuyo era namwebaza olw’enteekateeka ez’enjawulo okutumbula embeera z’abantu mu Buganda. Mu kulambula kuno Katikkiro Mayiga abadde awerekeddwako Omulangira Daudi Chwa, Owek. Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo, Minisita Hamis Kakomo, Owek. Noah Kiyimba n’abakungu ab’enjawulo.

headline: Bobi Wine, Besigye  bayozaayozezza  Hichilema okuwangula obwapulezidenti bwe Zambia
text: Bannabyabufuzi ku ludda oluvuganya mu ggwanga okuli; Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine) ne Dr. Kizza Besigye, basindise obubaka obuyozaayoz munnaabweHakainde Hichilemaeyawangudde obwapulezidenti bwa Zambia mu kulonda okwabaddewo ku Lwokuna. Okusinziira ku bano, okulondebwa kwa Hichilema kabonero kanene ku nkulaakulana ya Demokulaasiya mu ggwanga. Kino kiddiridde abakulembeze naddala ku ludda oluvuganya okuyozaayozaHakainde Hichilemaeyamezze Edgar Lungu. Hichilema yalangiriddwa ku Mmande oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula Lungu ku2,810,777ate Lungu n’afuna obululu1,814,201.Guno gwe gubadde omulundi ogwomukaaga nga Hichilema avuganya ku bwapulezidenti. Kyagulanyi Ssentamu agamba nti obuwanguzi obwavudde e Zambia si bwa ggwanga lino lyokka wabula Ssemazinga Afirika awamu n’okubukala kwa Demokulaasiya. Mu ngeri yeemu Dr. Kizza Besigye nga naye azze avuganya ku bwapulezidenti efunda eziwera, yayozaayozezza Hichilema n’abantu b’eggwanga lya Zambia olw’obuwanguzi buno. Era n’akulira oludda oluvuganya e Tanzania,Zitto Kabweagambye nti Zambia eraze ensi w’etuuse mu nkulaakulana kwa demokulaasiya nga bakyusa obuyinza mu Mirembe. Nelson Chamisa,akulira oludda oluvuganya eZimbabweyalaze essanyu olw’ekyo Zambia ky’etuuseeko. Mu buufu bwebumu akulira oludda oluvuganya e Kenya,Raila Odingaagamba nti abantu b’e Zambia bawanise bbendera ya Afirika oluvannyuma lw’okulonda mu Mirembe.

headline: Minisita Kyewalabye asiimye ababaka abaawakanyizza endagaano y’Emmwaanyi, asekeredde abagaana okujogerako
text: MINISITA w’ebyobuwangwa, ennono n’obulambuzi mu Buganda, Owek. David Kyewalabye Male asiimye obumu n’obuvumu,ababaka ba Palamenti bwe bataddewo okuwakanya endagaano y’ Emmwaanyi era nasekerera abakugira bannansi okujogerako. Okusiima kuno, Owek. Kyewalabye akukoledde mu Lubiri e Mmengo nga atikkula Amakula okuva mu bantu ba Kabaka ab’eggombolola ya Gombe Ssaabawaali ku Lwokusatu. “Omanyi Uganda erimu amafuta naye ffe amafuta agaffe y’ Emmwaanyi, bwogateekako obukwakkulizo nogatunda nga tetunaba nagaggya mu ttaka nga n’emiti tekuli bimuli, nebawa omuntu endagaano erina emmwaanyi okusukka zetulima kati nga nezirijja mu maaso nazo zizze,” Owek. Kyewalabye bw’annyonnyodde.  Minisita Kyewalabye agamba nti tekikola makulu muntu omu okuweebwa emmwaanyi n’obuvunaanyizibwa bwonna. “Waliwo abatutiisa obutajogerako naye tetusobola naddala bwetutunuulira mu maaso nga bayinza obutabaawo, tosobola kung’aana kujogerako nga nkimanyi nti mu myaka 40 tojja kubaawo, emmwaanyi gyetwogerako abasinga kwetwasomera era kyetutegeera,” Minisita Kyewalabye bw’agasseeko. Minisita Kyewalabye ababaka abasabye bafefete endagaano ezirina ez’emmwaanyi kuba nnyingi gyeziri nga zinyigiriza bannansi. Abasabye okwewala eby’obufuzi ebyawula mu bantu ba Kabaka kuba abali mu gavumenti eyawakati ne Buganda bonna baagala kulaba nga abantu bonna babeera bulungi. Ku bantu abeefunyiridde okulumba Buganda, Minisita Kyewalabye alabudde nti singa ensobi eyakolebwa mu mwaka gwa 1966 eddamu okulowoozebwa, Uganda ejja kusangulwa ku maapu. “Tetusobola kuddamu kukkiriza jjoogo eryo, kuba bwebamala ye olwo ggwe abeera addako, luli kyaliwo nga tetumanyi naye kati tetujja kukkiriza muntu yenna abyelogolezaako,” Minisita Kyewalabye bw’agambye. Owek. Kyewalabye Male ategeezezza nti kati buli mutongole avunaanyizibwa butereevu ku mikolo gy’okwanjula okusobola okukuuma ennono n’obuwangwa ebadde enaabuuse mu Buganda nategeeza nti ensonga z’okusanyuka zirina okusigalamu naye ate n’ennono nkulu nnyo. Minisita Kyewalabyey’ennyimbe ategeezezza nti omuntu yenna asumika alina okuba nga alina ekifundikwa era ensonga eno bagenda kugikola nga bali wamu n’Abataka abakulu ab’Obusolya kiyambe okulwanirira ekitiibwa kya Kabakaokukizza mu bantu.  Minisita Kyewalabye asiimye Ssaabawaali w’eggombola eno olw’okukunga abantu okutuukiriza ennono y’okuleeta Amakula embuga era nabasaba okuginywererako. Katikkiro w’Ebyalo bya Kabaka Omuk. Moses Luutuakubiriza abakulembeze bulijjo nga baweereza okussa essira ku kukola ku bwetaavu bw’abantu bebakulemberanga beeyambisa obumu. Omwami w’eggombolola eno, Dr. Eric Sserugo yeebaziza banna Kyaddondoolw’okufaayo okutuukirizaobuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe era nayanjula egimu ku mirimu egikoleddwa mu ggombololayabwe. Agamu ku Makula agaleeteddwa mu baddemu emmere, ente n’embuzi awamu n’ebintu ebirala.

headline: Abawanguddwa ewalala balabuddwa obuteesimbawo mu NUP
text: Mukono Abasunsula abeesimbyewo mu kibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP) e Mukono, basabye bannabyabufuzi abawanguddwa mu bibiina ebirala obutasuubira kubawa Kkaadi ya NUP kuvuganya ku bifo bya bukulembeze mu Mukono. Abamu ku bannakibiina ki NUP mu lukiiko   “Twakizudde nti, waliwo abawanguddwa mu Kamyufu ka NRM naye nga oli wano, twagala mukituyambeko nga olina obujulizi nga ono bamubalira nti afunye bbiri nga kati azze wano acankalanye buleete,” Akulira okusunsula kwa NUP e Mukono bweyagambye. Kino kiddiridde bannabyabufuzi abawanguddwa mu Kamyufu ka National Resistance Movement (NRM) n’abamu ku bavudde mu kibiina ki Democratic Party (DP) okuddukira mu NUP ekikulembera Robert Kyagulanyi aka Bobi Wine bafune Kkaadi. Abaddukidde mu NUP kuliko; Micdad Mulimira eyawanguddwa mu kamyufu ka NRM ku kifo kya Meeya, Davis Lukyamuzi eyaganguddwa Godfrey Mwebe ku bwa kkansala we Nagojje ku lukiiko lwa disitulikiti. Lugoloobi yalabudde nga abawanguddwa mu bibiina ebirala baleme kumalira NUP budde kubanga omugaso gwayo bagulabye mu kaseera kazibu. Munnakibiina ki NUP Allan Mawanda, yasanyukidde eky’okugaana abawanguddwa mu Kamyufu awalala nti, kijja kukendeeza ku bambega abava mu kibiina ki NRM nga baagala okukyankalanya NUP. Mukusunsulamu kuno okutandise leero e Kavule Mukono kugenda kumala ennaku ssatu nga kw’ abakulembeze ku mutendera gw’ abakiise ku disitulikiti, ba ssentebe b’eggombolola ne bakkansala. Ababaka ne bassentebe ba Disitulikiti bo bakusunsulibwa ku kitebe ky’ekibiina e Kamwokya. Lugoobi yanyonyodde nti, mukusunsulamu okusinga bagenda kutunuulira buwulize eri ekibiina wamu n’amaanyi eyeesimbyewo galina mu bantu. Omubaka Betty Nambooze eyakava mu DP neyegatta ku NUP yategeezezza nti, olwokuba ekibiina tekinanywera wansi ku byalo okusunsulamu kwa kuyamba okufuna omuntu omutuufu alina okwesimbawo.

headline: Abavubuka muyigire ku Sebaggala okwekkiririzaamu – Kasule Lumumba
text: Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM), Kasule Lumumba, asabye abavubuka okutwala omugenzi Al- Hajji Nasser Ntege Sebaggala ng’ekyokulabirako kibayambe okwekkiririzaamu wamu n’okuggyayo obusobozi bwabwe. Ssaabawandiisi Kasule Lumumba Lumumba ategeezezza bannamawulire ku Ssande ku kitebe ky’ekibiina mu Kampala, nga Sebaggala bw’abadde omusajja eyeerandiza yekka mu bukozi era ng’abadde akola emikwano okwetooloola ebitundu ebyenjawulo. Al-Hajji Nasser Ntege Sebaggala yafudde ku Lwomukaaga ku makya mu ddwaliro lya International Hospital of Kampala (IHK) oluvannyuma lw’okugwa mu kinaabiro wamu n’okusangibwa ng’alina ekizibu mu lubuto. “Nkubiriza abavubuka okumulabirako era mwekkiririzeemu kibayambe okubaako bye mutuukako.” Lumumba bw’ategeezezza. Lumumba asinzidde mu lukung’aana luno n’akiggumiza ng’akakiiko k’ebyamateeka bwe kali mu kutunula mu nsonga za vvulugu eyali mu kamyufu mu bitundu ebyenjawulo wamu n’okwemulugunya. Akakasizzaa ng’abaavaako emivuyo gino bwe bagenda okuvunaanibwa mu mbuga z’amateeka. Ku kalulu ka Mawogola South ne North, Lumumba ategeezezza nga bwe bazzeemu okukongerayo okutuusa nga 30/09/2020 kiyambe okwekenneenya enteekateeka y’okulaba nga kalondebwa mu mazima era mu bwenkanya. “Akalulu kayongeddwayo kiyambe, abeesimbyewo, abalonzi n’abalondesa okwetegeka obulungi, tuleme kuddamu kufuna kutiisibwatiisibwa ng’okwaliwo mu kusooka.” Lumumba bw’agambye. Akulira ebyamateeka mu NRM, Oscar Kihika naye asinzidde mu lukung’aana lwe lumu n’alaga we batuuse mu kutunula mu kwemulugunya kwa bannakibiina era n’ategeeza nti okutandika ne Mmande nga 26 okutuuka nga 4/09/2020, bagenda kutandika kuyita abeemulugunya mu buntu basobole okuttaanya ku ebyo bye beemulugunyaako. Kihika alambuludde nga bwe baliko okwemulugunya okuwerako kwe baamaze edda okugonjoola era n’asuubiza okuwa obwenkanya eri buli munnakibiina.

headline: Abakung’aanya omusaayi basiimye Kabaka olw’okutumbula eby’obulamu
text: Ebitongole ebyenjawulo ebivunaanyizibwa ku kukung’aanya omusaayi mu ggwanga okuli; Red cross ne Uganda blood Transfussion Services, bisiimye Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi n’ejjinja ery’omuwendo olw’eddimu ly’aliko ery’okutaasa abantu abeetaaga omusaayi ng’ayitira mu kitongole kye ekya Kabaka Foundation. Bano ejjinja lino balikwasizza Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ku Lwokusatu mu Bulange e Mmengo ne bamusaba abatuusize okusiima kwabwe ewa Ssaabasajja Kabaka. Mu kwogera kwe, Katikkiro Mayiga ategeezezza nti kikakata ku buli muntu okuvaayo okukwatiza ku Ssaabasajja Kabaka batumbule ebyobulamu bya bannayuganda. “Mwebale kwebaza Kabaka era ekimu ku byasindika Omuteregga okutandika Kabaka Foundation kwe kulwanirira omuntu owa bulijjo mu nsonga ezimukwatako butereevu ng’ebyobulamu.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agambye. Ono agasseeko nti essira ekitongole kino lyaliteeka ku ndwadde ezitawaanya abantu, abakazi n’abantu abeetaaga okubeerwa. Ate ye Ssenkulu wa Kabaka Foundation, Omuk. Eddie Kaggwa Ndagala, ategeezezza nti balina enteekateeka y’okukung’aanya omusaayi nga basinziira mu masaza okusobola okutaasa abantu ba Kabaka abagwetaaga. Minisita w’ebyobulamu n’embeera z’abantu ba Kabaka, Owek. Prosperous Nankindu, ategeezezza nti ebintu byonna ebirabise nti bizibu bwe biweerezebwa ewa Ssaabasajja Kabaka bigguka mangu era kino kyeyolekera mu kulwanyisa Nnalubiri (Sickle Cells), Heptatis B, obulwadde bwa Mukenenya awamu n’ebbula ly’omusaayi. Akulira Uganda Blood Transfussion, Dr.Dorothy Byabazaire agamba nti, “Twakwataganye ne Kabaka Foundation nga tugenda kugenda mu masaza ga Buganda ag’enjawulo mu bantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka okulaba nga batuwa omusaayi ekiseera kyonna mu myezi gino egigenda okuddako.” Dr. Byabazaire agamba nti baamaze dda okubangula abaamasaza ku bulungi bw’okugaba omusaayi era ne ani ayinza okugaba omusaayi era n’okubalaga engeri gye basobola okubayamba okukunga abantu ba Beene basobole okuziba eddibu eririwo ku bbula ly’omusaayi eriri mu ggwanga.

headline: Poliisi erabudde abaagala okwerayiza; kuba kulya mu nsi lukwe
text: Kampala Poliisi erabudde omuntu yenna atagese okwerayiza, okwetabamu oba okulaga amawulire agalaga omuntu omulala yenna nga yeerayiza nti ajja kuba alidde mu nsi olukwe. Leero, omwogezi wa poliisi Fred Enanga ategeezezza olukiiko lwa bannamawulire olutudde e Nagulu nti bafunye amawulire ng’abamu ku baavuganya mu kalulu kaggwa,  bwe bategese okwerayiza.  “Tufunye amawulire okuva mu bakessi baffe nga omu ku baavuganya bwategese omukolo gw’okwerayiza ogw’enjawulo mu wooteeri emu e Iganga. Tulina olukalala lw’abaavuganya ne bagaana okukkiriza ebyava mu kalulu nga bagamba nti, be baawangula akalulu. Naye twagala okubajjukiza n’abawagizi baabwe nti, bino bimenya mateeka.”  Enanga bw’agambye. Bino we bijjidde nga Pulezidenti Museveni agenda kulayizibwa ku Lwokusatu ku kisanja kye ekyomukaaga oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula akalulu n’ebitundu 58 ku buli 100. Mu mwaka gwa 2016, eyali Pulezidenti wa Forum for Democratic Change, Dr. Kizza Besigye eyali avuganyizza mu kalulu yeerayiza nga Pulezidenti omulonde era n’akwatibwa n’aggalirwa e Karamoja. Enanga agamba nti bano ne bwe balemerako ne balayira,  bajja kukoma ku kimu kya kukola mukolo era byakumala budde.  Omuntu yenna, emikutu gy’amawulire, ab’ekitongole ekiramuzi oba omuntu yenna eyeetaba mu  bikolwa bino, ajja kuvunaanibwa ogw’okulya mu nsi olukwe. Afande Enanga annyonnyodde nti kano ke  kaseera abaavuganya bazannye ebyobufuzi  eby’ekikulu, bakkirize ebyava mu kalulu era bagoberere amateeka kye gagamba, bave mu by’okuzannya obuzannyo. Ono alaze nti bano abaagala okwerayiza, baagala kimu bantu ku boogerako naye temuli makulu. Okusinziira ku Enanga, ebitongole byonna eby’ebyokwerinda bimaze okwetegeka okulaba nga bikola ku yenna ayinza okwagala okutabula emikolo gino.  Gye buvuddeko, akulira  ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi,  yavaayo n’alaga nti  Pulezidenti Museveni okulayira, tekijja kumulemesa kulwanirira bannayuganda.

headline: Minisita Bwanika asabye abantu okujjumbira okugaba omusaayi
text: Minisita wa gavumenti ez’ebitundu era Ssaabawolereza w’Obwakabaka, Owek. Christopher Bwanika, asabye abantu bakabaka okujjumbira enteekateeka ya Ssaabasajja Kabaka ey’okugaba omusaayi basobole okutaasa obulamu bw’abo abagwetaaga okuli abakyala abazaala, abagudde ku bubenje n’abantu abalina endwadde enzibu nga Nnalubiri. Owek. Bwanika yasinzidde Wakiso bwe yabadde atongoza enteekateeka y’okukung’aanya omusaayi mu ssaza Busiro ku ddwaliro lya St John’s Hospital e Wakiso. Owek. Bwanika bano yabalaze obukulu bw’omusaayi mu mubiri gw’omuntu n’asaba abantu ba Kabaka naddala bannabusiro okujjumbira enteekateeka eno. “Obwetaavu bw’omusaayi bugabirira amalwaliro nga 419 mu Uganda. Noolwekyo kitegeeza nti twetaaga okukung’aanya yuniti z’omusaayi nga 1500 buli lunaku nga kino tulina kikola nga tukubiriza abantu okuguwaayo.” Owek. Bwanika bwe yagambye. ono era yasiimye Omuteregga olw’okwolesebwa kuno era n’asaba amasaza ag’enjawulo okujjumbira enteekateeka eno.

headline: Eyavuganya  ky’omubaka wa Tororo bamusibye emyaka 50 lwa kutta muntu
text: Kkooti enkulu e Tororo esindise eyavuganyaako ku bubaka bwa Tororo North mu nkomyo okumala emyaka 50 oluvannyuma lw’okusingisibwa omusango gw’okutemula eyali omuwandiisi w’ekibiina kya NRM mu kitundu ekyo mu kamyufu k’ekibiina akaaliwo mu mwaka 2020. Akalulu ka NRM mukitundu kino kaalimu ebbugumu n’emivuyo egiwerako era gyebyagwera nga Oketcho Sinambio eyali omuwandiisi w’ekibiina mu ggombolola ye Mukuju attiddwa. Wano poliisi yakwata Richard Ojore eyali yeesimbyewo, Moses Emojong ne Geoffrey Imai nebavunaana ogw’obutemu, obubbi obw’amaanyi awamu n’okugezaako okutta omuntu. Okusinziira ku bujulizi obwaleeteddwa woofiisi ya Ssaabawaabi wa gavumenti, bwalaze nti nga September, 4, 2020 ku ssaawa 7 nga bali ku kamyufu ka NRM, omugenzi Oketcho yatuuka ewaali walonderwa awamanyiddwa nga Akoret B mu zzooni ya Akoret mu disitulikiti ye Tororo okukebera ku mbeera nga bweyali mu bifo ebyenjawulo ebironderwamu. Wabula bwebaali wano, Oketcho nowa boodabooda Thomas Emukurut balumbibwa Ojore ne banne nebatandika okubalumiriza okubbira gwebaali bavuganya naye akalulu. Sinambio yakubwa omuggo ku nsingo era nowa boodabooda Emukurut nakubwa bubi nnyo era nebamubbako ssente emitwalo 4 n’ekitundu awamu n’essimu byeyalina. Omuwandiisi Sinambio yaddusibwa mu ddwaliro yabula nafa nga yakatuusibwayo. Ku Lwokubiri, Omulamuzi wa kkooti enkulu Esta Nambayo bano yabasingisizza omusango gw’obutemu, n’okugezaako okutta omuntu. Bano buli omu yasibiddwa emyaka 30 olw’obutemu wabula eyali yeesimbyewo Ojore ne Imai neboogerwako emyaka 20 egy’okugezaako okutta omuntu. Abasatu bano beejerezeddwa omusango gw’obubbi obwamanyi olw’omuwaabi wa gavumenti okulemererwa okuleeta obujulizi obubaluma ku musango guno. Omulamuzi Nambayo yategeezezza nti ebibonerezo bino bigenda kutambulira wamu.

headline: Minisita Kakomo atongozza emmerezo y’emmwanyi mu Buddu
text: Minisita omubeezi avunaanyizibwa ku by’obulimi, obulunzi, obusuubuzi n’obwgassi mu Buganda, Owek. Hajji Amis Mukasa Kakomo akunze bannabuddu okuddamu balime emmwanyi nga bwe gwali emabegako, kibayambe okuva mu bwavu wamu n’okukulaakulanya Buganda. Okusaba kuno Owek. Kakomo akukoledde Masaka mu Buddu bw’abadde atongoza emmerezo y’emmwanyi eteereddwa ku mbuga y’essaza okusobola okutumbula ekirime kino mu Buddu ne Buganda. Owek. Kakomo era aliko ebintu ebyeyambisibwa mu kulima by’awaddeyo eri Buddu ne Mawogola nga bino abikwasizza Ppookino Jude Muleke nga bino byatoneddwa bannamukago gwa Private Sector Foundation. Ono awabudde abantu okwettanira okunywa kkaawa basobole okutondawo akatale k’ekirime ky’emmwanyi akasookerwako era balowooze nnyo ne ku ngeri gye basobola okuzigattako omutindo baleme kitundirawo kuba bafiirwa. Minisita Kakomo era aliko abalimisa b’awadde Satifikeeti oluvannyuma lw’okutendekebwa Obwakabaka n’ekitongole kya Directorate of Industrial Training (DTI), okunnyikiza ennima y’emmwanyi n’emmere ey’omulembe mu bitundu by’e Mawogola ne Buddu. Onoyeebazizza nnyo ebitongole ebizze bikola emikago ne Bugandanga bigiyambako mu lugendo luno wamu n’okwebaza abalimisa abeewaddeyo ne babangulwa wakati mu kubakubiriza okukola obulungi omulimu guno. Ate ye omwami wa Kabaka akulembera Buddu, Ppookino Jude Muleke yeebazizza abantu ba Kabaka olw’okujjumbira enteekateeka eno ey’Emmwanyi Terimba basobole okuzza Buganda ku ntikko.  Ye omukungu w’ekitongole ekirung’amya okulima emmwanyi mu ggwanga ekya ‘Uganda Coffee Development Authority ( UCDA),’ Robert Ssentamu yeenyumirizza mu nkolagana ekitongole kino gye kirina n’Obwakabaka era n’alaga nti emmerezo eno egenda kuwonya abalimi emmwanyi ezitali za mutindo. Omu ku balimisa abafunye amabaluwa, Disan Muwanga Matovu ategeezezza nti beetefuteefuokuyigiriza abantu ennima ey’omulembe wakati mu kusaba ekitongole kya UCDA okwongera ku bungi bw’emmwanyi bwekiwa abalimi kubanga tebasobola kuzeetuusaako mu kiseera kino. Kinajjukirwa nti Obwakabaka bwatongoza enteekateeka y’okusimba emmerezo ku buli mbuga ya ssaza my Buganda wadde nga egenda kutandikira mu masaza 7 okuli; Buddu, Mawokota, Ssingo, Kyaggwe n’amalala.

headline: Cheptegei  amenye likodi y’ensi yonna, awangudde Zzaabu
text: Omuddusi w’emisinde Joshua Kiprui Cheptegei, ekiro ky’eggulo yamenyewo likodi y’ensi yonna mu misinde gya mmita 5000 bwatyo nawangulira Uganda omuddaali gwa Zzaabu mu mpaka za 2020 Diamond League ezibadde e Monaco mu Bufalansa. Emisinde gino Cheptegei yagiddukidde eddakiika 12:35.36 naggyawo likodi ya munnansi wa Ethiopia Kenenisa Bekele ey’eddakiika 12:37.35 gyeyateekawo mu 2004 bweyali e Hengelo ekya Netherlands mu 2004. Cheptegei okusooka yasanze okuvuganya okwamanyi okuva eri munnakenya Nicholas Kimeli Kipkorir, ono mukusooka yamubadde ku lyanda,  okukkakana nga amalidde mu kifo kya kubiri ate munnakenya omulala Jacob Krop  namalira mu nnamba ssatu. Munnayuganda omulala eyabadde mu misinde gino ye Stephen Kissa, ono  yabadde omu ku bataddewo okuvuganya okusooka naye gyebyagweredde nga awanduse era teyamazeeko. Pulezident Yoweri Kaguta Museveni yavuddeyo nayozaayoza Cheptegei nga ayita ku kibanja kye ekya Twitter, nategeeza nga ono bwayongedde okutumbula Uganda n’okuleetera bannansi esanyu ely’omujjirano. Abaddusi abalala okuli Halimah Nakaayi ne Winnie Nanyondo ebintu tebyabatambulidde bulungi era okukkakana nga bakutte ekifo eky’okutaano n’ ekyomunaana. Kinajjukirwa nti, ku Lwomukaaga lwa wiiki  Cheptegei ne banne basimbulwa minisita w’ebyenjigiriza n’emizannyo  okugenda e Bufalansa bayambibwako pulezidenti Museveni.

headline: Obwakabaka buzizza buggya omukago gwabwo ne Uganda Breweries
text: Katikkiro kukono ne Alvin Mbugua owa UBL  Obwakabaka buzizza buggya endaagaano gyebwakola ne kkampuni ensogozi y’omwenge eya Nile Breweries Ltd [UBL] okusogola omwenge gwa Ngule. Ssenkulu wa kkampuni eno Alvin Mbugua yeyataddeko omukono kulwa UBL ate Ssenkulu wa Majestic Brands, Omukungu Ronald Kawadwa naateekako kulw’Obwakabaka. Endagaano y’amyaka essatu. Ng’ayogerera munsisinkano gyebabaddemu ku mbuga enkulu e Bulange Mmengo, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga yatageezezza nti ng’Obwakabaka, balina essanyu okukolagana n’abantu abenjawulo okutuukiriza ebigendererwa by’obwakabaka omuli n’okujja abantu mubwavu. “Omugaso gwaffe omukulu wano kwekukuma ennonno n’ebyobuwangwa bya Buganda. Tosobola kuba Bwakabaka nga tolina byabuwangwa ebiraga kyoli. Tulina okozesa emikisa gyonna egyamikago okutumbula obuwangwa bwa Buganda. Kizzaamu amannyi nti omukago gwetulina ne Uganda Breweries gutuyamba okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byaffe ng’okulwanyisa obwavu,” Mayiga bweyagambye. Katikkiro yagasseko nti omukago gwonna okuvaamu ebibala, guteekeddwa okutambula okumala akaseera akawera. Yeeyamye okugenda mumaaso n’okuwagira UBL kubanga kyelaze lwatu nti baamazima ate baagaliza Obwakabaka. Katikkiro era yakubirizza abantu okwewala okuba bawaddanga. “Abantu baleme kunywa mwenge gyobeera nti gugenda kuggwa mubita oba tegugenda kubaawo enkya.” Ye Alvin Mbugua ku lwa UBL, yeebazizza nnyo Kabaka olw’okusiima nebatandikawo omukago guno. “Sikyabulijjo ffe banneekolera gyange okukwatagana n’obukulembeze nga buno. Tulina essuubi nti Ngule ajjakuba wamannyi siwano mu Uganda wokka wabula n’ebweruwaayo,” Mbugua bweyategeezezza. Yabikudde ekyama nti bukyanga batandika enkolagana eno, batadde muggwanika lya Buganda akawumbi k’esimbi kalamba. “Omukago guno gutuyambye okusobozesa abantu baffe obutanywa mwenge guyinza okubaviirako obuzibu. Ngule gwe mwenge ogusoose mu Uganda okusogolwa mu bintu byonna nga bikolebwa wano omuli muwogo n’omuwemba,” Mbugua bweyagambye

headline: Oweek. Kaawaase agamba Obwavu obuli mu Buganda tebusosola
text: Oweek. Kaawaase ne Boodi ya BUCADEF empya  Bulange Omumyuka Asooka owa Katikkiro Prof. Twaha Kaawaase Kigongo, ategeezezza nti obwavu obuluma abantu mu Buganda tebusosola mu ddiini, langi  wadde ebibiina by’ebyobufuzi. Okwogera bino Kaawaasa abadde atongozza boodi y’ekitongole ki ‘Buganda Culture and Development Foundation (BUCADEF)’ empya ku Lwokubiri e . “Bwewetoloola Buganda eno olaba abantu baffe nga obwavu buyitirivu, endwadde tezaawula, obutamanya nabwo tebwawula,” Kaawaase bweyagambye. Ono alaze emiramwa okwazimbira ekitongole ki BUCADEF omuli; okukuuma eby’obuwangwa n’ennono, okusitula embeera z’abantu ba Buganda wamu n’okubeera n’ensimbi. Oweek.  Kaawaase anyonyodde nga ekitongole kino bwekiri ekisaale mu kutumbula embeera z’abantu mu bulamu obwa bulijjo era nabasaba okutegeera amasiga Obwakabaka kwebuyimiridde. “Tosobola kubeera ku boodi ya BUCADEF okugiddukanya nga totogedde bwakabaka kyeki kubanga ojja kulemwa okutegeera ebigendererwa bya BUCADEF. Olina okutegeera amasiga kwetuyimiridde, ” Oweek. Kaawaase bwagasseeko. Eng. Ishak Lukenge, Dr. Gorette Nabanoga n’ Oweek. Kaawaase Ate ye Minisita Hajjati Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo yeebazizza boodi enkadde olw’okukola omulimu ogwagiweebwa era nasuubizza nga minisitule ye bwegenda okubayamba okulaba nga omulimu gwanguwa. Boodi empyaekulirwa Engineer Ishak Lukenge,  Dr. Gorette Nabanoga amyuka Ssentebe,  abalala kuliko; Mw. Tyaba Bazilio, Prof. Yefusa Kitungulu Zaake, Mw. Luyimbazi Nalukoola, Dr. Emma Naluyima,  ne Mw. Saul Kaye Ssentebe omuggya Ishak Lukenge, yeebazizza Ssaabasajja Kabaka okusiima nabalonda okukulembera boodi eno. Ono ategeezezza nti BUCADEF gwe mutima gwa Buganda kubanga yesuubirwa okukyusa obulamu bwa bantu ba Buganda era nawera okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa obwamuwereddwa.

headline: Ow’emyaka 14 Alina Akawuka Ka Siriimu Alemedde Mu Ddwaliro Ly’e Kiwoko
text: Omwana w’emyaka 14 alina akawuka kassiriimu akonkomalidde mu ddwaliro ly’e Kiwoko oluvannyuma lw’abazaddebe okumusuulawo. Omwana omulenzi ono yaweebwa ekitanda oluvannyuma lw’okufuna obulwadde obuva ku kirwadde kya siriimu. Ono yali yasuulibwa mu maka ga jjajjawe e Wankwale mu Nakaseke nga talina bujjanjjabi bwonna Nga July 10, omwana ono yeekubira enduulu ku poliisi eyamutwala ddwaliro nakati gyakyali. Paul Mugisha, abudaabuda abalina siriimu mu ddwaliro ly’e Kiwoko, yagambye nti omuvubuka yaleetebwa mu ddwaliro nga mukovvu nnyo wamu n’okuba n’amabwa ku mubiri . Ono, agamba nti yali erya omulundi gumu gwokka oba oluusi obutaliira ddala kyokka nga agamba nti tamanyi maamawe gyali. Jjajjawe Alex Bambasi agamba tayagala mwana ono adde waka kubanga talina busobozi bumulabirira. Ono agamba nti omwana ono yaleetebwa ewuwe abantu abataategeerekeka era nga naye tamanyi nnyina gyali.  Pastor William Kintu, akulira ekitongole ekikola ku balina siriimu mu ddwaliro ly’e Kiwoko agamba nti bagezezzaako okuyamba omwana nga bamuwa obujjanjjabi wamu n’okumuwa ebyokulya. Kyokka Kintu, agamba nti eddwaliro lyali lyagala okusiibula omwnaa ono wiiki ewedde kyokka nga talina wakulaga. URN

headline: Bakansala ba KCCA baakulonda sipiika ku Lwokuna
text: Minisita wa Kampala Betty Amongi  Ekitongole ekiddukanya ekibuga Kampala ekya Kampala Capital City Authority ku Lwokuna wiiki eno kyakufuna sipiika n’omumyukawe. Minisita mu gavumenti yawakati atwala KCCA Betty Amongi ategeezezza bannamawulire ku kitebe kyessunsuliro ly’amawulire ga gavumenti ekya Uganda Media Center, nti enteekateeka y’okufuna sipiika etandika ku saawa ssatu ez’okumakya.  Bakansala abatuula ku lukiiko luno bebagenda okwenyigira mu kulonda kuno.  Amongi yategeezezza nti abo bokka abalina obuvunanyizibwa mu KCCA beebokka abagenda okukirizibwa mu kisenge ekiteesezebwamu.   Embiranyi eri wakati wa banna FDC babiri Doreen Nyanjula ne Abubaker Kawalya.  Ne munna NRM Buruhan Byaruhanga naye yeesimbyewo. KCCA erina bakansala 32 nga kubbo 18 ba FDC. Okulonda kuno kwaddirira enkyukakyuka ezaakolebwa mu tteeka erifuga KCCA eyateetawo ekifo kya sipiika ekyali kyajjibwawo nga loodi meeya oba omumyukawe yabadde akolanga sipiika.

headline: Owek. Nkalubo asabye abalima emmwaanyi bagatteko obulunzi
text: Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku bulimi, obulunzi n’obutonde bwensi, Owek. Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo Nasejje awadde abantu ba Kabaka amagezi obulimi bw’emmwaanyi babugatteko obulunzi kuba eno y’engeri yokka esoboka okubaganyula. Amagezi gano, Owek. Nkalubo akukoze aggulawo omusomo gw’abalimi b’emmwaanyi mu ssaza ly’e Bugerere oguyindide ku mbuga ye ggombolola Musaale e Kangulumira. Minisita annyonnyodde nti singa abalimi bano balima nga bwebalunda tewajja kubaawo bwetaavu kugula bigimusa okusobola okuliikiriza ettaka basobole okuganyulwamu.  Omusomo guno gukulungudde ennaku 5 nga gutambuziddwa mu ggombolola ez’enjawulo mu ssaza lye Bugerere okubangula abantu ba Ssaabasajja ku bulimi n’obulunzi ku kirime ky’emmwannyi okusobola okweggya mu bwavu. Owek. Mayanja abakubiriza okulima n’ebirime ebirala nga beyambisa ennima ey’omutindo okufuna ensimbi ate n’emmere emala. Abamu ku bannamukago abeetabye mu nteekateeka eno aba Nkumbi Terimba Ltd. nga bakuliddwamu Ssenkulu wabwe Kironde awadde amagezi abalimi b’emwaannyi okufaayo okuzirabirira n’okukuuma omutindo gwazo okusobola okufuna akatale. Omumyuka Asooka owa Mugerere Hajji Bashir Ziraba Kawanguzi yakunze Obwakabaka n’abakulembeze okusimbira ekkuuli etteeka lye mwannyi eryagala okuleteebwa kubanga lirinyirira eddembe ly’omulimi. Bino webijjidde nga abalimi b’Emmwaanyi mu ggwanga bakyatabudde oluvannyuma lwa gavumenti okukola endagaano ne kampuni ya Vinci negiwa obuvunaanyizibwa ku kutunda n’okugula emmwaanyi mu ggwanga ekintu ekireetedde abalimi n’abakulembeze okusaba endagaano eno esazibwemu.
